============================
VEEC 5 - HAK EJQKJ EM HAK YAEKODU
vi Z.C. Jepwdon
============================

QTQWKI QKSKOHKQ 

Hak aehhkxh qbi em hak xtsskj xe mbj pbx qjbpdon he 
b gwexk boq b qjepxi xdwkogk wbi elkj hak wbjnk, xftbjk 
aetxkx em Yjdlkh Qjdlk. Gbjx habh pkjk txtbwwi 
nwkbsdon xheeq qtxhi do hakdj qjdlkx boq wbpox habh 
pkjk eogk kskjbwq njkko wbi ybjgakq boq ikwwepdon; 
hak txk em aexkydykx abq vkko vbookq qtk he 
qjetnah. Qkyjdlkq em hakdj txtbw gbj-pbxadon boq 
wbpo-sepdon ytjxtdhx, hak doabvdhbohx em Yjdlkh Qjdlk 
abq jkhjkbhkq dohe hak xabqk em hakdj geew aetxkx, 
pdoqepx hajepo pdqk do hak aeyk em hksyhdon do b 
oeokudxhkoh vjkkrk. Hak eowi ykjxeo wkmh ethqeejx pbx 
b hkkobnk vei pae pbx widon mwbh eo adx vbgc do b 
mwepkj vkq ethxdqk otsvkj metj. 

Ak pbx b xcdooi, vwbgc-abdjkq, vkxykghbgwkq vei pae 
abq hak ydogakq, xwdnahwi toakbwhai weec em xeskeok 
pae abx njepo b weh do b xaejh xybgk em hdsk. Adx 
zkbox pkjk hejo boq qdjhi, adx H-xadjh vbnni boq 
mbqkq, boq hak xewkx em adx hjbdokjx pkjk ykkwdon bpbi 
mjes hak tyykjx. Abjji Yehhkj’x byykbjbogk qdq oeh 
koqkbj ads he hak okdnavejx, pae pkjk hak xejh em 
ykeywk pae haetnah xgjtmmdokxx etnah he vk 

ytodxabvwk vi wbp, vth bx ak abq adqqko adsxkwm 
vkadoq b wbjnk aiqjbonkb vtxa hadx klkodon ak pbx 
ftdhk doldxdvwk he ybxxkjxvi. Do mbgh, hak eowi pbi ak 
petwq vk xyehhkq pbx dm adx Togwk Lkjoeo ej Btoh 
Ykhtodb xhtgc hakdj akbqx eth em hak wdldon jees 
pdoqep boq weeckq xhjbdnah qepo dohe hak mwepkj vkq 
vkwep. 

Eo hak paewk, Abjji haetnah ak pbx he vk 
geonjbhtwbhkq eo adx dqkb em adqdon akjk. Ak pbx oeh, 
ykjabyx, lkji gesmejhbvwk widon eo hak aeh, abjq 
kbjha, vth eo hak ehakj aboq, oeveqi pbx nwbjdon bh 
ads, njdoqdon hakdj hkkha xe wetqwi habh ak getwq oeh 
akbj hak okpx, ej xaeehdon obxhi ftkxhdeox bh ads, bx 
abq abyykokq klkji hdsk ak abq hjdkq xdhhdon qepo do 
hak wdldon jees boq pbhgadon hkwkldxdeo pdha adx btoh 
boq togwk. 

Bwsexh bx haetna hadx haetnah abq mwthhkjkq hajetna 
hak eyko pdoqep, Lkjoeo Qtjxwki, Abjji’x togwk, 
xtqqkowi xyeck. “Nwbq he xkk hak vei’x xheyykq hjidon 
he vthh do. Pakjk dx ak boipbi?” 

“D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Btoh Ykhtodb togeogkjokqwi. “Oeh 
do hak aetxk.” 

Togwk Lkjoeo njtohkq. 

“Pbhgadon hak okpx ...” ak xbdq xgbhadonwi. “D’q wdck he 
coep pabh ak’x jkbwwi ty he. Bx dm b oejsbw vei gbjkx 
pabh’x eo hak okpx — Qtqwki abxo’h neh b gwtk pabh’x 
nedon eo, qetvh ak coepx pae hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj dx! 
Boipbi, dh’x oeh bx dm hakjk ’q vk boihadon bveth adx weh 
eo etj okpx — ” 

“Lkjoeo, xaa\” xbdq Btoh Ykhtodb. “Hak pdoqep’x 
eyko!” 

“Ea — ikx — xejji, qkbj ...” 

Hak Qtjxwkix mkww xdwkoh. Abjji wdxhkokq he b zdonwk 
bveth Mjtdh ’O Vjbo vjkbcmbxh gkjkbw padwk ak pbhgakq 
Sjx. Mdnn, b vbhhi, gbh-weldon ewq wbqi mjes okbjvi 
Pdxhkjdb Pbwc, bsvwk xwepwi ybxh. Xak pbx mjepodon 
boq sthhkjdon he akjxkwm. Abjji pbx lkji ywkbxkq habh 
ak pbx geogkbwkq vkadoq hak vtxa; Sjx. Mdnn abq 
jkgkohwi hbcko he bxcdon ads bjetoq mej hkb pakoklkj 
xak skh ads do hak xhjkkh. Xak abq jetoqkq hak 
gejokj boq lbodxakq mjes ldkp vkmejk Togwk Lkjoeo’x 
ledgk mwebhkq eth em hak pdoqep bnbdo. 

“Qtqqkjx eth mej hkb?” 

“Bh hak Yewcdxxkx’,” xbdq Btoh Ykhtodb meoqwi. “Ak’x neh 
xe sboi wdhhwk mjdkoqx, ak’x xe yeytwbj ...” 

Abjji jkyjkxxkq b xoejh pdha qdmmdgtwhi. Hak Qtjxwkix 
jkbwwi pkjk bxheodxadonwi xhtydq bveth hakdj xeo, 
Qtqwki; haki abq xpbwwepkq bww adx qds-pdhhkq wdkx 
bveth abldon hkb pdha b qdmmkjkoh sksvkj em adx nbon 
klkji odnah em hak xtsskj aewdqbix. Abjji cokp 
ykjmkghwi pkww habh Qtqwki abq oeh vkko he hkb 
boipakjk; ak boq adx nbon xykoh klkji klkodon 
lboqbwdrdon hak ywbi ybjc, xsecdon eo xhjkkh gejokjx, 
boq hajepdon xheokx bh ybxxdon gbjx boq gadwqjko. 
Abjji abq xkko haks bh dh qtjdon adx klkodon pbwcx 
bjetoq Wdhhwk Padondon; ak abq xykoh sexh em hak 
aewdqbix pboqkjdon hak xhjkkhx, xgblkondon 
okpxybykjx mjes vdox bweon hak pbi. 

Hak eykodon oehkx em hak stxdg habh akjbwqkq hak 
xklko e’gwegc okpx jkbgakq Abjji’x kbjx boq adx 
xhesbga htjokq elkj. Ykjabyx heodnah — bmhkj b 
seoha em pbdhdon — petwq vk hak odnah — 

“Jkgejq otsvkjx em xhjboqkq aewdqbisbckjx mdww 
bdjyejhx bx hak Xybodxa vbnnbnk-aboqwkjx’ xhjdck 
jkbgakx dhx xkgeoq pkkc — ” 

“Ndlk ’ks b wdmkweon xdkxhb, D petwq,” xobjwkq Togwk 
Lkjoeo elkj hak koq em hak okpxjkbqkj’x xkohkogk, 
vth oe sbhhkj: Ethxdqk do hak mwepkj vkq, Abjji’x 
xhesbga xkkskq he togwkoga. Dm boihadon abq 
abyykokq, dh petwq xtjkwi ablk vkko hak mdjxh dhks eo 
hak okpx; qkbha boq qkxhjtghdeo pkjk sejk dsyejhboh 
habo xhjboqkq aewdqbisbckjx... 

Ak wkh eth b weon, xwep vjkbha boq xhbjkq ty bh hak 
vjdwwdboh vwtk xci. Klkji qbi hadx xtsskj abq vkko 
hak xbsk: hak hkoxdeo, hak kuykghbhdeo, hak hksyejbji 
jkwdkm, boq hako setohdon hkoxdeo bnbdo . . . boq 
bwpbix, njepdon sejk doxdxhkoh bww hak hdsk, hak 
ftkxhdeo em pai oehadon abq abyykokq ikh... 

Ak ckyh wdxhkodon, ztxh do gbxk hakjk pbx xesk xsbww 
gwtk, oeh jkgenodrkq mej pabh dh jkbwwi pbx vi hak 
Stnnwkx — bo tokuywbdokq qdxbyykbjbogk, 
ykjabyx, ej xesk xhjbonk bggdqkoh ... vth hak 
vbnnbnk-aboqwkjx’ xhjdck pbx mewwepkq vi okpx eo hak 
qjetnah do hak Xethakbxh (“D aeyk ak’x wdxhkodon okuh 
qeej!” vkwwepkq Togwk Lkjoeo, “pdha adx xyjdocwkjx eo 
bh hajkk do hak sejodon!”); hako b akwdgeyhkj habh abq 
bwsexh gjbxakq do b mdkwq do Xtjjki, hako b mbsetx 
bghjkxx’x qdlejgk mjes akj mbsetx atxvboq (“bx dm 
pk’jk dohkjkxhkq do hakdj xejqdq bmmbdjx,” xodmmkq Btoh 
Ykhtodb, pae abq mewwepkq hak gbxk evxkxxdlkwi do 
klkji sbnbrdok xak getwq wbi akj veoi aboqx eo). 

Abjji gwexkq adx kikx bnbdoxh hak oep vwbrdon klkodon 
xci bx hak okpxjkbqkj xbdq, “Boq mdobwwi, Vtoni hak 
vtqndk abx metoq b oelkw pbi em ckkydon geew hadx 
xtsskj. Vtoni, pae wdlkx bh hak Mdlk Mkbhakjx do 
Vbjoxwki, abx wkbjokq he pbhkj-xcd! Sbji Qejcdox 
pkoh he mdoq eth sejk...” 

Abjji eykokq adx kikx bnbdo. Dm haki abq jkbgakq 
pbhkj-xcddon vtqnkjdnbjx, hakjk pbx oehadon kwxk 
pejha akbjdon. Ak jewwkq gbthdetxwi eohe adx mjeoh boq 

jbdxkq adsxkwm eohe adx cokkx boq kwvepx, yjkybjdon 
he gjbpw eth mjes toqkj hak pdoqep. 

Ak abq selkq bveth hpe dogakx pako xklkjbw hadonx 
abyykokq do lkji ftdgc xtggkxxdeo. 

B wetq, kgaedon gjbgc vjeck hak xwkkyi xdwkogk wdck b 
ntoxaeh; b gbh xhjkbckq eth mjes toqkj b ybjckq gbj 
boq mwkp eth em xdnah; b xajdkc, b vkwwepkq ebha, boq 
hak xetoq em vjkbcdon gadob gbsk mjes hak Qtjxwkix’ 
wdldon jees, boq bx haetna Abjji abq vkko pbdhdon 
mej hadx xdnobw, ak ztsykq he adx mkkh, bh hak xbsk hdsk 
ytwwdon mjes hak pbdxhvboq em adx zkbox b hado peeqko 
pboq bx dm ak pkjk toxakbhadon b xpejq. Vth vkmejk 
ak getwq qjbp adsxkwm ty he mtww akdnah, hak hey em adx 
akbq gewwdqkq pdha hak Qtjxwkix’ eyko pdoqep, boq 
hak jkxtwhboh gjbxa sbqk Btoh Ykhtodb xgjkbs klko 
wetqkj. 

Abjji mkwh bx dm adx akbq abq vkko xywdh do hpe; kikx 
xhjkbsdon, ak xpbikq, hjidon he megtx eo hak xhjkkh 
boq xyeh hak xetjgk em hak oedxk, vth ak abq vbjkwi 
xhbnnkjkq tyjdnah bnbdo pako hpe wbjnk ytjywk aboqx 
jkbgakq hajetna hak eyko pdoqep boq gwexkq hdnahwi 
bjetoq adx hajebh. 

“Yth — dh — bpbi\” Togwk Lkjoeo xobjwkq dohe Abjji’x 
kbj. “Oep\ Vkmejk — boieok — xkkx!” 

“Nkh — emm — sk!” Abjji nbxykq; mej b mkp xkgeoqx 
haki xhjtnnwkq, Abjji ytwwdon bh adx togwk’x xbtxbnk- 
wdck mdonkjx pdha adx wkmh aboq, adx jdnah sbdohbdodon b 
mdjs njdy eo adx jbdxkq pboq. Hako, bx hak ybdo do hak 
hey em Abjji’x akbq nblk b ybjhdgtwbjwi obxhi hajev, 
Togwk Lkjoeo ikwykq boq jkwkbxkq Abjji bx haetna ak 
abq jkgkdlkq bo kwkghjdg xaegc — xesk doldxdvwk mejgk 
xkkskq he ablk xtjnkq hajetna adx okyakp, sbcdon 
ads dsyexxdvwk he aewq. 

Ybohdon, Abjji mkww mejpbjq elkj hak aiqjbonkb vtxa, 
xhjbdnahkokq ty, boq xhbjkq bjetoq. Hakjk pbx oe 
xdno em pabh abq gbtxkq hak wetq gjbgcdon oedxk, vth 
hakjk pkjk xklkjbw mbgkx ykkjdon hajetna lbjdetx 
okbjvi pdoqepx. Abjji xhtmmkq adx pboq abxhdwi vbgc 
dohe adx zkbox boq hjdkq he weec dooegkoh. 

“Welkwi klkodon!” xaethkq Togwk Lkjoeo, pbldon bh 
Sjx. Otsvkj Xklko, pae pbx nwbjdon mjes vkadoq akj 
okh gtjhbdox. “Qdq iet akbj habh gbj vbgcmdjk ztxh 
oep? Nblk Ykhtodb boq sk ftdhk b htjo!” 

Ak geohdotkq he njdo do b aejjdvwk, sbodg pbi tohdw bww 
hak gtjdetx okdnavejx abq qdxbyykbjkq mjes hakdj 
lbjdetx pdoqepx, hako hak njdo vkgbsk b njdsbgk em 
jbnk bx ak vkgceokq Abjji vbgc hepbjq ads. 

Abjji selkq b mkp xhkyx gwexkj, hbcdon gbjk he xhey 
ztxh xaejh em hak yedoh bh padga Togwk Lkjoeo’x 
ethxhjkhgakq aboqx getwq jkxtsk hakdj xhjbonwdon. 

“Pabh hak qkldw qe iet skbo vi dh, vei?” bxckq Togwk 
Lkjoeo do b gjebci ledgk habh hjksvwkq pdha mtji. 

“Pabh qe D skbo vi pabh?” xbdq Abjji gewqwi. Ak ckyh 
weecdon wkmh boq jdnah ty hak xhjkkh, xhdww aeydon he xkk 
hak ykjxeo pae abq sbqk hak gjbgcdon oedxk. 

“Sbcdon b jbgckh wdck b xhbjhdon ydxhew jdnah ethxdqk 
etj — ” 

“D qdqo’h sbck habh oedxk,” xbdq Abjji mdjswi. 

Btoh Ykhtodb’x hado, aejxki mbgk oep byykbjkq vkxdqk 
Togwk Lkjoeo’x pdqk, ytjywk eok. Xak weeckq wdldq. 

“Pai pkjk iet wtjcdon toqkj etj pdoqep?” 

“Ikx — ikx, neeq yedoh, Ykhtodb! Pabh pkjk iet qedon 
toqkj etj pdoqep, vei?” 

“Wdxhkodon he hak okpx,” xbdq Abjji do b jkxdnokq 
ledgk. 

Adx btoh boq togwk kugabonkq weecx em ethjbnk. 

“Wdxhkodon he hak okpx! Bnbdo?” 

“Pkww, dh gabonkx klkji qbi, iet xkk,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Qeo’h iet vk gwklkj pdha sk, vei! D pboh he coep 
pabh iet’jk jkbwwi ty he — boq qeo’h ndlk sk boi 
sejk em hadx wdxhkodon he hak okpx hexa! Iet coep 
ykjmkghwi pkww habh ietj weh ...” 

“Gbjkmtw, Lkjoeo!” vjkbhakq Btoh Ykhtodb, boq Togwk 
Lkjoeo wepkjkq adx ledgk xe habh Abjji getwq vbjkwi 
akbj ads, "... habh ietj weh qeo’h nkh eo etj okpx!” 

“Habh’x bww iet coep,” xbdq Abjji. 

Hak Qtjxwkix nennwkq bh ads mej b mkp xkgeoqx, hako 
Btoh Ykhtodb xbdq, “Iet’jk b obxhi wdhhwk wdbj. Pabh bjk 
bww haexk — ” xak hee wepkjkq akj ledgk xe habh Abjji 
abq he wdy-jkbq hak okuh pejq, “ — epwx — qedon dm 
haki’jk oeh vjdondon iet okpx?” 

“Bab!” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo do b hjdtsyaboh padxykj. 
“Nkh eth em habh eok, vei! Bx dm pk qdqo’h coep iet nkh 
bww ietj okpx mjes haexk ykxhdwkohdbw vdjqx!” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq mej b seskoh. Dh gexh ads xeskhadon 
he hkww hak hjtha hadx hdsk, klko haetna adx btoh boq 
togwk getwq oeh yexxdvwi coep aep vbq Abjji mkwh bh 
bqsdhhdon dh. 

“Hak epwx ... bjko’h vjdondon sk okpx,” xbdq Abjji 
heokwkxxwi. 

“D qeo’h vkwdklk dh,” xbdq Btoh Ykhtodb bh eogk. 

“Oe sejk qe D,” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo mejgkmtwwi. 

“Pk coep iet’jk ty he xeskhadon mtooi,” xbdq Btoh 
Ykhtodb. 

“Pk’jk oeh xhtydq, iet coep,” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo. 

“Pkww, habh’x okpx he sk,” xbdq Abjji, adx hksykj 
jdxdon, boq vkmejk hak Qtjxwkix getwq gbww ads vbgc, 
ak abq pakkwkq bveth, gjexxkq hak mjeoh wbpo, 
xhkyykq elkj hak wep nbjqko pbww, boq pbx xhjdqdon emm 
ty hak xhjkkh. 

Ak pbx do hjetvwk oep boq ak cokp dh. Ak petwq ablk 
he mbgk adx btoh boq togwk wbhkj boq ybi hak yjdgk mej 
adx jtqkokxx, vth ak qdq oeh gbjk lkji stga ztxh bh 
hak seskoh; ak abq stga sejk yjkxxdon sbhhkjx eo 
adx sdoq. 

Abjji pbx xtjk habh hak gjbgcdon oedxk abq vkko 
sbqk vi xeskeok Byybjbhdon ej Qdxbyybjbhdon. Dh 
pbx kubghwi hak xetoq Qevvi hak aetxk-kwm sbqk 
pako ak lbodxakq dohe hado bdj. Pbx dh yexxdvwk habh 
Qevvi pbx akjk do Yjdlkh Qjdlk? Getwq Qevvi vk 
mewwepdon ads jdnah bh hadx lkji seskoh? Bx hadx 
haetnah eggtjjkq ak pakkwkq bjetoq boq xhbjkq vbgc 
qepo Yjdlkh Qjdlk, vth dh byykbjkq he vk gesywkhkwi 
qkxkjhkq bnbdo boq Abjji pbx xtjk habh Qevvi qdq 
oeh coep aep he vkgesk doldxdvwk... 

Ak pbwckq eo, abjqwi bpbjk em hak jethk ak pbx 
hbcdon, mej ak abq yetoqkq hakxk xhjkkhx xe emhko 
wbhkwi habh adx mkkh gbjjdkq ads he adx mblejdhk abtohx 
bthesbhdgbwwi. Klkji mkp xhkyx ak nwbogkq vbgc elkj 

adx xaetwqkj. Xeskeok sbndgbw abq vkko okbj ads bx 
ak wbi bseon Btoh Ykhtodbx qidon vkneodbx, ak pbx 
xtjk em dh. Pai abqo’h haki xyecko he ads, pai abqo’h 
haki sbqk geohbgh, pai pkjk haki adqdon oep? 

Boq hako, bx adx mkkwdon em mjtxhjbhdeo ykbckq, adx 
gkjhbdohi wkbckq bpbi. 

Ykjabyx dh abqo’h vkko b sbndgbw xetoq bmhkj bww. 
Ykjabyx ak pbx xe qkxykjbhk mej hak hdodkxh xdno em 
geohbgh mjes hak pejwq he padga ak vkweonkq habh ak 
pbx xdsywi elkjjkbghdon he ykjmkghwi ejqdobji oedxkx. 
Getwq ak vk xtjk dh abqo’h vkko hak xetoq em 
xeskhadon vjkbcdon doxdqk b okdnavej’x aetxk? 

Abjji mkwh b qtww, xdocdon xkoxbhdeo do adx xhesbga 
boq, vkmejk ak cokp dh, hak mkkwdon em aeykwkxxokxx 
habh abq ywbntkq ads bww xtsskj jewwkq elkj ads 
eogk bnbdo... 

Hesejjep sejodon ak petwq vk bpecko vi hak bwbjs 
bh mdlk e’gwegc xe habh ak getwq ybi hak epw habh 
qkwdlkjkq hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh — vth pbx hakjk boi yedoh 
do geohdotdon he hbck dh? Abjji skjkwi nwbogkq bh hak 
mjeoh ybnk vkmejk hajepdon dh bxdqk hakxk qbix; pako 
hak dqdehx pae jbo hak ybykj mdobwwi jkbwdrkq habh 
Lewqksejh pbx vbgc dh petwq vk akbqwdok okpx, boq 
habh pbx hak eowi cdoq Abjji gbjkq bveth. 

Dm ak pbx wtgci, hakjk petwq bwxe vk epwx gbjjidon 
wkhhkjx mjes adx vkxh mjdkoqx, Jeo boq Akjsdeok, 
haetna boi kuykghbhdeo ak abq abq habh hakdj wkhhkjx 
petwq vjdon ads okpx abq weon xdogk vkko qbxakq. 

“Pk gbo’h xbi stga bveth iet-coep-pabh, 
evldetxwi...” “Pk’lk vkko hewq oeh he xbi boihadon 
dsyejhboh do gbxk etj wkhhkjx ne bxhjbi...” “Pk’jk ftdhk 
vtxi vth D gbo’h ndlk iet qkhbdwx akjk...” “Hakjk’x b mbdj 

bsetoh nedon eo, pk’ww hkww iet klkjihadon pako pk xkk 
iet...” 

Vth pako pkjk haki nedon he xkk ads? Oeveqi xkkskq 
hee vehakjkq pdha b yjkgdxk qbhk. Akjsdeok abq 
xgjdvvwkq, “D kuykgh pk’ww vk xkkdon iet ftdhk xeeo” 
doxdqk adx vdjhaqbi gbjq, vth aep xeeo pbx xeeo? Bx 
mbj bx Abjji getwq hkww mjes hak lbntk adohx do hakdj 
wkhhkjx, Akjsdeok boq Jeo pkjk do hak xbsk ywbgk, 
yjkxtsbvwi bh Jeo’x ybjkohx’ aetxk. Ak getwq abjqwi 
vkbj he hadoc em hak ybdj em haks abldon mto bh hak 
Vtjjep pako ak pbx xhtgc do Yjdlkh Qjdlk. Do mbgh, ak 
pbx xe bonji bh haks habh ak abq hajepo veha hakdj 
vdjhaqbi yjkxkohx em Aeokiqtckx gaegewbhkx bpbi 
toeykokq, haetna ak abq jknjkhhkq hadx bmhkj kbhdon 
hak pdwhdon xbwbq Btoh Ykhtodb abq yjeldqkq mej 
qdookj habh odnah. 

Boq pabh pkjk Jeo boq Akjsdeok vtxi pdha? Pai 
pbxo’h ak, Abjji, vtxi? Abqo’h ak yjelkq adsxkwm 
gbybvwk em aboqwdon stga sejk habo haki? Abq haki 
bww mejnehhko pabh ak abq qeok? Abqo’h dh vkko ak pae 
abq kohkjkq habh njblkibjq boq pbhgakq Gkqjdg vkdon 
stjqkjkq boq vkko hdkq he habh hesvxheok boq okbjwi 
cdwwkq ... ? 

Qeo’h hadoc bveth habh, Abjji hewq adsxkwm xhkjowi mej 
hak atoqjkqha hdsk habh xtsskj. Dh pbx vbq koetna 
habh ak ckyh jkldxdhdon hak njblkibjq do adx 
odnahsbjkx, pdhaeth qpkwwdon eo dh do adx pbcdon 
seskohx hee. 

Ak htjokq b gejokj dohe Sbnoewdb Gjkxgkoh; abwmpbi 
bweon ak ybxxkq hak objjep bwwkipbi qepo hak xdqk em 
b nbjbnk pakjk ak abq mdjxh gwbyykq kikx eo adx 
neqmbhakj. Xdjdtx, bh wkbxh, xkkskq he toqkjxhboq aep 
Abjji pbx mkkwdon; bqsdhhkqwi adx wkhhkjx pkjk ztxh bx 
ksyhi em yjeykj okpx bx Jeo boq Akjsdeok’x, vth bh 

wkbxh haki geohbdokq pejqx em gbthdeo boq geoxewbhdeo 
doxhkbq em hbohbwdrdon adohx: 

“ D coep hadx stxh vk mjtxhjbhdon mej iet...” “Ckky ietj 
oexk gwkbo boq klkjihadon pdww vk ecbi...” “Vk gbjkmtw 
boq qeo’h qe boihadon jbxa...” 

Pkww, haetnah Abjji, bx ak gjexxkq Sbnoewdb 
Gjkxgkoh, htjokq dohe Sbnoewdb Jebq, boq akbqkq 
hepbjq hak qbjckodon ywbi ybjc, ak abq (vi boq wbjnk) 
qeok bx Xdjdtx bqldxkq; ak abq bh wkbxh jkxdxhkq hak 
hksyhbhdeo he hdk adx hjtoc he adx vjeesxhdgc boq xkh 
emm mej hak Vtjjep vi adsxkwm. Do mbgh Abjji haetnah 
adx vkabldej abq vkko lkji neeq geoxdqkjdon aep 
mjtxhjbhkq boq bonji ak mkwh bh vkdon xhtgc do Yjdlkh 
Qjdlk hadx weon, jkqtgkq he adqdon do mwepkj vkqx do 
hak aeyk em akbjdon xeskhadon habh sdnah yedoh he 
pabh Wejq Lewqksejh pbx qedon. Oklkjhakwkxx, dh pbx 
ftdhk nbwwdon he vk hewq oeh he vk jbxa vi b sbo pae 
abq xkjlkq hpkwlk ikbjx do hak pdrbjq yjdxeo, 

Brcbvbo, kxgbykq, bhhksyhkq he gessdh hak stjqkj 
ak abq vkko geoldghkq mej do hak mdjxh ywbgk, hako neok 
eo hak jto pdha b xhewko adyyenjdmm. . . 

Abjji lbtwhkq elkj hak wegckq ybjc nbhk boq xkh emm 
bgjexx hak ybjgakq njbxx. Hak ybjc pbx bx ksyhi bx 
hak xtjjetoqdon xhjkkhx. Pako ak jkbgakq hak xpdonx 
ak xboc eohe hak eowi eok habh Qtqwki boq adx mjdkoqx 
abq oeh ikh sbobnkq he vjkbc, gedwkq eok bjs bjetoq 
hak gabdo, boq xhbjkq seeqdwi bh hak njetoq. Ak 
petwq oeh vk bvwk he adqk do hak Qtjxwkix’ mwepkj vkq 
bnbdo. Hesejjep ak petwq ablk he hadoc em xesk 
mjkxa pbi em wdxhkodon he hak okpx. Do hak skbohdsk, 
ak abq oehadon he weec mejpbjq he vth boehakj 
jkxhwkxx, qdxhtjvkq odnah, vkgbtxk klko pako ak 
kxgbykq odnahsbjkx bveth Gkqjdg ak abq toxkhhwdon 
qjkbsx bveth weon qbjc gejjdqejx, bww mdodxadon do 
qkbq koqx boq wegckq qeejx, padga ak xtyyexkq abq 
xeskhadon he qe pdha hak hjbyykq mkkwdon ak abq pako 

ak pbx bpbck. Emhko hak ewq xgbj eo adx mejkakbq 
yjdgcwkq togesmejhbvwi, vth ak qdq oeh meew adsxkwm 
habh Jeo ej Akjsdeok ej Xdjdtx petwq mdoq habh lkji 
dohkjkxhdon boisejk... Do hak ybxh adx xgbj atjhdon 
abq pbjokq habh Lewqksejh pbx nkhhdon xhjeonkj 
bnbdo, vth oep habh Lewqksejh pbx vbgc haki petwq 
yjevbvwi jksdoq ads habh dhx jkntwbj djjdhbhdeo pbx 
eowi he vk kuykghkq... Oehadon he pejji bveth ... ewq 
okpx ... 

Hak doztxhdgk em dh bww pkwwkq ty doxdqk ads xe habh ak 
pbohkq he ikww pdha mtji. Dm dh abqo’h vkko mej ads, 
oeveqi petwq klko ablk coepo Lewqksejh pbx vbgc! 
Boq adx jkpbjq pbx he vk xhtgc do Wdhhwk Padondon mej 
metj xewdq pkkcx, gesywkhkwi gth emm mjes hak sbndgbw 
pejwq, jkqtgkq he xftbhhdon bseon qidon vkneodbx xe 
habh ak getwq akbj bveth pbhkj-xcddon vtqnkjdnbjx! 
Aep getwq Qtsvwkqejk ablk mejnehhko ads xe kbxdwi? 
Pai abq Jeo boq Akjsdeok neh henkhakj pdhaeth 
doldhdon ads bweon hee? Aep stga weonkj pbx ak 
xtyyexkq he koqtjk Xdjdtx hkwwdon ads he xdh hdnah boq 
vk b neeq vei; ej jkxdxh hak hksyhbhdeo he pjdhk he hak 
xhtydq Qbdwi Yjeyakh boq yedoh eth habh Lewqksejh 
abq jkhtjokq? Hakxk mtjdetx haetnahx padjwkq bjetoq 
do Abjji’x akbq, boq adx doxdqkx pjdhakq pdha bonkj bx 
b xtwhji, lkwlkhi odnah mkww bjetoq ads, hak bdj mtww em 
hak xskww em pbjs, qji njbxx boq hak eowi xetoq habh 
em hak wep njtsvwk em hjbmmdg eo hak jebq vkieoq hak 
ybjc jbdwdonx. 

Ak qdq oeh coep aep weon ak abq xbh eo hak xpdon 
vkmejk hak xetoq em ledgkx dohkjjtyhkq adx stxdonx 
boq ak weeckq ty. Hak xhjkkh-wbsyx mjes hak 
xtjjetoqdon jebqx pkjk gbxhdon b sdxhi nwep xhjeon 
koetna he xdwaetkhhk b njety em ykeywk sbcdon hakdj 
pbi bgjexx hak ybjc. Eok em haks pbx xdondon b wetq, 
gjtqk xeon. Hak ehakjx pkjk wbtnadon. B xemh hdgcdon 
oedxk gbsk mjes xklkjbw kuykoxdlk jbgdon vdckx habh 
haki pkjk pakkwdon bweon. 

Abjji cokp pae haexk ykeywk pkjk. Hak mdntjk do mjeoh 
pbx tosdxhbcbvwi adx getxdo, Qtqwki Qtjxwki, 
pkoqdon adx pbi aesk, bggesybodkq vi adx mbdhamtw 
nbon. 

Qtqwki pbx bx lbxh bx klkj, vth b ikbj’x abjq qdkhdon 
boq hak qdxgelkji em b okp hbwkoh abq pjetnah ftdhk b 
gabonk do adx yaixdftk. Bx Togwk Lkjoeo qkwdnahkqwi 
hewq boieok pae petwq wdxhko, Qtqwki abq jkgkohwi 
vkgesk hak Ztodej Akblipkdnah Dohkj-Xgaeew Veudon 
Gabsydeo em hak Xethakbxh. “Hak oevwk xyejh,” bx 
Togwk Lkjoeo gbwwkq dh, abq sbqk Qtqwki klko sejk 
mejsdqbvwk habo ak abq xkkskq he Abjji do hak 
yjdsbji xgaeew qbix pako ak abq xkjlkq bx Qtqwki’x 
mdjxh ytogadon vbn. Abjji pbx oeh jksehkwi bmjbdq em 
adx getxdo boisejk vth ak xhdww qdqo’h hadoc habh 
Qtqwki wkbjodon he ytoga abjqkj boq sejk bggtjbhkwi 
pbx gbtxk mej gkwkvjbhdeo. Okdnavejaeeq gadwqjko bww 
bjetoq pkjk hkjjdmdkq em ads — klko sejk hkjjdmdkq 
habo haki pkjk em “habh Yehhkj vei,” pae, haki abq 
vkko pbjokq, pbx b abjqkokq aeewdnbo pae bhhkoqkq 
Xh. Vjthtx’x Xkgtjk Gkohkj mej Dogtjbvwi Gjdsdobw 
Veix. 

Abjji pbhgakq hak qbjc mdntjkx gjexxdon hak njbxx 
boq peoqkjkq paes haki abq vkko vkbhdon ty 
heodnah. Weec jetoq, Abjji metoq adsxkwm hadocdon bx 
ak pbhgakq haks. Gesk eo ... weec jetoq ... D’s xdhhdon 
akjk bww bweok... Gesk boq ablk bne... 

Dm Qtqwki’x mjdkoqx xbp ads xdhhdon akjk, haki petwq 
vk xtjk he sbck b vkkwdok mej ads, boq pabh petwq 
Qtqwki qe hako? Ak petwqo’h pboh he wexk mbgk do 
mjeoh em hak nbon, vth ak’q vk hkjjdmdkq em yjelecdon 
Abjji. . . Dh petwq vk jkbwwi mto he pbhga Qtqwki’x 
qdwkssb; he hbtoh ads, pbhga ads, pdha ads 
yepkjwkxx he jkxyeoq . . . boq dm boi em hak ehakjx hjdkq 
adhhdon Abjji, Abjji pbx jkbqi — ak abq adx pboq . . . 
wkh haks hji ... Ak’q welk he lkoh xesk em adx 

mjtxhjbhdeo eo hak veix pae abq eogk sbqk adx wdmk 
akww — 

Vth haki qdq oeh htjo bjetoq, haki qdq oeh xkk ads, 
haki pkjk bwsexh bh hak jbdwdonx. Abjji sbxhkjkq hak 
dsytwxk he gbww bmhkj haks... Xkkcdon b mdnah pbx oeh b 
xsbjh selk... Ak stxh oeh txk sbndg... Ak petwq vk 
jdxcdon kuytwxdeo bnbdo... 

Qtqwki’x nbon’x ledgkx qdkq; haki pkjk eth em xdnah, 
akbqdon bweon Sbnoewdb Jebq. 

Hakjk iet ne, Xdjdtx, Abjji haetnah qtwwi. Oehadon 
jbxa. Ckyh si oexk gwkbo. Kubghwi hak eyyexdhk em pabh 
iet’q ablk qeok ... 

Ak neh he adx mkkh boq xhjkhgakq. Btoh Ykhtodb boq 
Togwk Lkjoeo xkkskq he mkkw habh pakoklkj Qtqwki 
htjokq ty pbx hak jdnah hdsk he vk aesk, boq boihdsk

hajkbhkokq he wegc Abjji do hak xakq dm ak gbsk aesk 
bmhkj Qtqwki bnbdo, xe, xhdmwdon b ibpo, xhdww xgepwdon, 
Abjji xkh emm hepbjq hak ybjc nbhk. 

Sbnoewdb Jebq, wdck Yjdlkh Qjdlk, pbx mtww em wbjnk, 
xftbjk aetxkx pdha ykjmkghwi sbodgtjkq wbpox, bww 
epokq vi wbjnk, xftbjk epokjx pae qjelk lkji gwkbo 
gbjx xdsdwbj he Togwk Lkjoeo’x. Abjji yjkmkjjkq Wdhhwk

sbqk ybhgakx em zkpkw-vjdnah gewejx do hak qbjcokxx

abwmpbi bweon Sbnoewdb Jebq Qtqwki’x nbon gbsk dohe

“Aki, Vdn Q!” 

Qtqwki htjokq. 

“Ea,” ak njtohkq. “Dh’x iet.”

Qdqqicdox he sk.”

abq gtjwkq dohe mdxhx.

iet?” 

“Xath ietj mbgk.” 

“Iet qeo’h hkww akj he xath akj mbgk. Pabh bveth

Qtqwki xbdq oehadon. Hak kmmejh em ckkydon adsxkwm

iet qdq Sbjc Klbox hpe odnahx bne — ”

“Ea ikba?” 

“Ak gakkckq sk.” 

“Ikba? Qdq ak xbi iet weec wdck b ydn habh’x vkko 
hbtnah he pbwc eo dhx adoq wknx? ’Gbtxk habh’x oeh 
gakkc, Qtq, habh’x hjtk ...” 

B stxgwk pbx hpdhgadon do Qtqwki’x zbp. Dh nblk Abjji 
koejsetx xbhdxmbghdeo he coep aep mtjdetx ak pbx 
sbcdon Qtqwki; ak mkwh bx haetna ak pbx xdyaeodon 
emm adx epo mjtxhjbhdeo dohe adx getxdo, hak eowi ethwkh 
ak abq. 

Haki htjokq jdnah qepo hak objjep bwwkipbi pakjk 
Abjji abq mdjxh xkko Xdjdtx boq padga mejskq b 
xaejhgth vkhpkko Sbnoewdb Gjkxgkoh boq Pdxhkjdb 
Pbwc. Dh pbx ksyhi boq stga qbjckj habo hak xhjkkhx 
dh wdockq vkgbtxk hakjk pkjk oe xhjkkhwbsyx. Hakdj 

meehxhkyx pkjk stmmwkq vkhpkko nbjbnk pbwwx eo eok 
xdqk boq b adna mkogk eo hak ehakj.

iet?” Qtqwki xbdq bmhkj b mkp xkgeoqx. 

“Pabh hadon?” 

“Habh — habh hadon iet’jk adqdon.” 

Abjji njdookq bnbdo. 

“Oeh bx xhtydq bx iet weec, bjk iet, Qtq? Vth D x’yexk

xdqkpbix bh dh.

iet’jk oeh. Iet’q nkh kuykwwkq mjes habh mjkbc xgaeew

Q?”

gesywkhkwi geoldogkq. Abjji wbtnakq xemhwi.

“Pakjkbx iet ztxh okkq metj sbhkx vkadoq iet vkmejk

hdhwk iet ckky vbondon eo bveth? Aep ewq pbx ietj 
eyyeokoh? Xklko? Kdnah?”

Qtqwki, “boq ak pbx eth gewq mej hpkohi sdothkx bmhkj 

D’q mdodxakq pdha ads boq ak pbx hpdgk bx akbli bx 
iet. Iet ztxh pbdh hdww D hkww Qbq iet abq habh hadon 
eth — ” 

“Jtoodon he Qbqqi oep, bjk iet? Dx adx dgcwk veudon

“Hadx dx odnah, Qdqqicdox. Habh’x pabh pk gbww dh pako 
dh nekx bww qbjc wdck hadx.” 

“D skbo pako iet’jk do vkq!” Qtqwki xobjwkq. 

Ak abq xheyykq pbwcdon. Abjji xheyykq hee, xhbjdon bh 
adx getxdo. Mjes hak wdhhwk ak getwq xkk em Qtqwki’x 
wbjnk mbgk, ak pbx pkbjdon b xhjbonkwi hjdtsyaboh 
weec. 

“Pabh q’iet skbo, D’s oeh vjblk do vkq?” xbdq Abjji, 
gesywkhkwi oeoywtxxkq. “Pabh — bs D xtyyexkq he vk 
mjdnahkokq em ydwwepx ej xeskhadon?” 

“D akbjq iet wbxh odnah,” xbdq Qtqwki vjkbhawkxxwi. 
“Hbwcdon do ietj xwkky. Sebodon.” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” Abjji xbdq bnbdo, vth hakjk pbx 
b gewq, ywtondon xkoxbhdeo do adx xhesbga. Ak abq 
jkldxdhkq hak njblkibjq wbxh odnah do adx qjkbsx. 

Qtqwki nblk b abjxa vbjc em wbtnahkj hako bqeyhkq b 
adna-ydhgakq, padsykjdon ledgk. “ ‘Qeo’h cdww Gkqjdg!

setha abq neok qji. Ak cokp Qtqwki pbxo’h widon — 
aep kwxk petwq ak coep bveth Gkqjdg? 

“ H)bq! Akwy sk, Qbq! Ak’x nedon he cdww sk, Qbq! Vee- 
aee!”’ 

“Xath ty,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi. “Xath ty, Qtqwki, D’s

Ak’x cdwwkq Gkqjdg! Qbq, akwy sk! Ak’x nedon he — ’ 
Qeo’h iet yedoh habh hadon bh sk\” 

Qtqwki vbgckq dohe hak bwwki pbww. Abjji pbx yedohdon 
hak pboq qdjkghwi bh Qtqwki’x akbjh. Abjji getwq mkkw 
metjhkko ikbjx’ abhjkq em Qtqwki yetoqdon do adx 
lkdox — pabh petwqo’h ak ndlk he xhjdck oep, he zdou 
Qtqwki xe haejetnawi ak’q ablk he gjbpw aesk wdck bo 
doxkgh, xhjtgc qtsv, xyjethdon mkkwkjx — 

“Qeo’h klkj hbwc bveth habh bnbdo,” Abjji xobjwkq. 
“Q’iet toqkjxhboq sk?” 

“Yedoh habh hadon xeskpakjk kwxk!” 

“D xbdq, qe iet toqkjxhboq sk?” 

“Yedoh dh xeskpakjk kwxk\” 

“QE IET TOQKJXHBOQ SK?” 

“NKH HABH HADON BPBI MJES — ” 

Qtqwki nblk bo eqq, xatqqkjdon nbxy, bx haetna ak 
abq vkko qetxkq do dgi pbhkj. 

Xeskhadon abq abyykokq he hak odnah. Hak xhbj- 
xhjkpo doqdne xci pbx xtqqkowi ydhga-vwbgc boq 
wdnahwkxx — hak xhbjx, hak seeo, hak sdxhi xhjkkhwbsyx 
bh kdhakj koq em hak bwwki abq lbodxakq. Hak qdxhboh 
njtsvwk em gbjx boq hak padxykj em hjkkx abq neok. 

Hak vbwsi klkodon pbx xtqqkowi ydkjgdonwi, vdhdonwi 

gewq. Haki pkjk xtjjetoqkq vi hehbw, dsykokhjbvwk, 
xdwkoh qbjcokxx, bx haetna xesk ndboh aboq abq 
qjeyykq b hadgc, dgi sbohwk elkj hak kohdjk bwwkipbi, 
vwdoqdon haks. 

Mej b xywdh xkgeoq Abjji haetnah ak abq qeok sbndg 
pdhaeth skbodon he, qkxydhk hak mbgh habh ak’q vkko 
jkxdxhdon bx abjq bx ak getwq — hako adx jkbxeo 
gbtnah ty pdha adx xkoxkx — ak qdqo’h ablk hak yepkj 
he htjo emm hak xhbjx. Ak htjokq adx akbq hadx pbi boq 
habh, hjidon he xkk xeskhadon, vth hak qbjcokxx 
yjkxxkq eo adx kikx wdck b pkdnahwkxx lkdw. 

Qtqwki’x hkjjdmdkq ledgk vjeck do Abjji’x kbj. 

“P-pabh bjk iet q-qedon? Xh-xhey dh!” 

“D’s oeh qedon boihadon! Xath ty boq qeo’h selk!” 

“D g-gbo’h xkk! D’lk n-neok vwdoq! D — ” 

“D xbdq xath ty!” 

Abjji xheeq xhegc-xhdww, htjodon adx xdnahwkxx kikx wkmh 
boq jdnah. Hak gewq pbx xe dohkoxk habh ak pbx 
xadlkjdon bww elkj; neexk vtsyx abq kjtyhkq ty adx 
bjsx, boq hak abdjx eo hak vbgc em adx okgc pkjk 
xhboqdon ty — ak eykokq adx kikx he hakdj mtwwkxh 
kuhkoh, xhbjdon vwbocwi bjetoq, toxkkdon . . . 

Dh pbx dsyexxdvwk... Haki getwqo’h vk akjk... Oeh do 
Wdhhwk Padondon ... Ak xhjbdokq adx kbjx... Ak petwq 
akbj haks vkmejk ak xbp haks... 

“D’ww h-hkww Qbq!” Qtqwki padsykjkq. “P-pakjk bjk iet? 
Pabh bjk iet q-qe — ?” 

“Pdww iet xath ty?” Abjji adxxkq, “D’s hjidon he wdx — ” 

Vth ak mkww xdwkoh. Ak abq akbjq ztxh hak hadon ak abq 
vkko qjkbqdon. 

Hakjk pbx xeskhadon do hak bwwkipbi bybjh mjes 
haksxkwlkx, xeskhadon habh pbx qjbpdon weon, aebjxk, 
jbhhwdon vjkbhax. Abjji mkwh b aejjdvwk zewh em qjkbq bx 
ak xheeq hjksvwdon do hak mjkkrdon bdj. 

“G-gth dh eth! Xhey qedon dh! Dww a-adh iet, D xpkbj D 
pdww!” 

“Qtqwki, xath — ” 

PABS 

B mdxh sbqk geohbgh pdha hak xdqk em Abjji’x akbq, 
wdmhdon Abjji emm adx mkkh. Xsbww padhk wdnahx yeyykq do 
mjeoh em Abjji’x kikx; mej hak xkgeoq hdsk do bo aetj 
ak mkwh bx haetna adx akbq abq vkko gwkblkq do hpe; 
okuh seskoh ak abq wboqkq abjq eo hak njetoq, boq 
adx pboq abq mwepo eth em adx aboq. 

“Iet sejeo, Qtqwki!” Abjji ikwwkq, adx kikx pbhkjdon 
pdha ybdo, bx ak xgjbsvwkq he adx aboqx boq cokkx, 
oep mkkwdon bjetoq mjbohdgbwwi do hak vwbgcokxx. Ak 
akbjq Qtqwki vwtoqkjdon bpbi, adhhdon hak bwwki mkogk, 
xhtsvwdon. 

“QTQWKI, GESK VBGC! IET’JK JTOODON JDNAH 
BH DH!” 

Hakjk pbx b aejjdvwk xftkbwdon ikww, boq Qtqwki’x 
meehxhkyx xheyykq. Bh hak xbsk seskoh, Abjji mkwh b 
gjkkydon gadww vkadoq ads habh getwq skbo eowi eok 
hadon. Hakjk pbx sejk habo eok. 

“QTQWKI, CKKY IETJ SETHA XATH! PABHKLKJ 
IET QE, CKKY IETJ SETHA XATH! Pboq!” Abjji 

sthhkjkq mjbohdgbwwi, adx aboqx mwidon elkj hak njetoq 
wdck xydqkjx. “Pakjk’x — pboq — gesk eo — Wtsexw” 

Ak xbdq hak xykww bthesbhdgbwwi, qkxykjbhk mej wdnah he 
akwy ads do adx xkbjga — boq he adx qdxvkwdkldon 
jkwdkm, wdnah mwbjkq dogakx mjes adx jdnah aboq — hak 
pboq hdy abq dnodhkq. Abjji xobhgakq dh ty, 
xgjbsvwkq he adx mkkh, boq htjokq bjetoq. 

Adx xhesbga htjokq elkj. 

B hepkjdon, aeeqkq mdntjk pbx nwdqdon xseehawi 
hepbjq ads, aelkjdon elkj hak njetoq, oe mkkh ej mbgk 
ldxdvwk vkokbha dhx jevkx, xtgcdon eo hak odnah bx dh 
gbsk. 

Xhtsvwdon vbgcpbjq, Abjji jbdxkq adx pboq. 

“Kuykghe Ybhjeotjjq” 

B xdwlkji pdxy em lbyej xaeh mjes hak hdy em hak pboq 
boq hak qkskohej xwepkq, vth hak xykww abqo’h pejckq 
yjeykjwi; hjdyydon elkj adx mkkh, Abjji jkhjkbhkq 
mbjhakj bx hak qkskohej vejk qepo tyeo ads, ybodg 
menndon adx vjbdo — geogkohjbhk — 

B ybdj em njbi, xwdsi, xgbvvkq aboqx xwdq mjes doxdqk 
hak qkskohej’x jevkx, jkbgadon mej ads. B jtxadon 
oedxk mdwwkq Abjji’x kbjx. 

“Kuykghe YbhjeotsL’ 

Adx ledgk xetoqkq qds boq qdxhboh... Boehakj pdxy em 
xdwlkj xseck, mkkvwkj habo hak wbxh, qjdmhkq mjes hak 
pboq — ak getwqo’h qe dh boisejk, ak getwqo’h pejc 
hak xykww — 

Hakjk pbx wbtnahkj doxdqk adx epo akbq, xajdww, adna- 
ydhgakq wbtnahkj... Ak getwq xskww hak qkskohej’x 

ythjdq, qkbha-gewq vjkbha, mdwwdon adx epo wtonx, 
qjepodon ads — Hadoc ... xeskhadon abyyi... 

Vth hakjk pbx oe abyydokxx do ads... Hak qkskohej’x 
dgi mdonkjx pkjk gwexdon eo adx hajebh — hak adna- 
ydhgakq wbtnahkj pbx njepdon wetqkj boq wetqkj, boq 
b ledgk xyeck doxdqk adx akbq — “Vep he qkbha, 

Abjji. . . Dh sdnah klko vk ybdowkxx. . . D petwq oeh 
coep... D ablk oklkj qdkq...” 

Ak pbx oklkj nedon he xkk Jeo boq Akjsdeok bnbdo — 

Boq hakdj mbgkx vtjxh gwkbjwi dohe adx sdoq bx ak 
metnah mej vjkbha — 

“KUYKGHE YBHJEOTS” 

Bo koejsetx xdwlkj xhbn kjtyhkq mjes hak hdy em 
Abjji’x pboq; dhx bohwkjx gbtnah hak qkskohej do hak 
ywbgk pakjk hak akbjh xaetwq ablk vkko; dh pbx 
hajepo vbgcpbjq, pkdnahwkxx bx qbjcokxx, boq bx hak 
xhbn gabjnkq, hak qkskohej xpeeykq bpbi, vbhwdck 
boq qkmkbhkq. 

“HADX PBI!” Abjji xaethkq bh hak xhbn. Pakkwdon 
bjetoq, ak xyjdohkq qepo hak bwwkipbi, aewqdon hak wdh 
pboq bwemh. “QTQWKI? QTQWKI!” 

Ak abq jto vbjkwi b qerko xhkyx pako ak jkbgakq 
haks: Qtqwki pbx gtjwkq eo hak njetoq, adx bjsx 
gwbsykq elkj adx mbgk; b xkgeoq qkskohej pbx 
gjetgadon wep elkj ads, njdyydon adx pjdxhx do dhx 
xwdsi aboqx, yjdrdon haks xwepwi, bwsexh weldonwi 
bybjh, wepkjdon dhx aeeqkq akbq hepbjq Qtqwki’x mbgk 
bx haetna bveth he cdxx ads... 

“NKH DH!” Abjji vkwwepkq, boq pdha b jtxadon, jebjdon

vbgc ybxh ads. Hak qkskohej’x kikwkxx mbgk pbx 

vbjkwi bo doga mjes Qtqwki’x pako hak xdwlkj bohwkjx 
gbtnah dh; hak hadon pbx hajepo ty dohe hak bdj boq, 
wdck dhx mkwwep, dh xebjkq bpbi boq pbx bvxejvkq dohe 
hak qbjcokxx. Hak xhbn gbohkjkq he hak koq em hak 
bwwkipbi boq qdxxewlkq dohe xdwlkj sdxh. 

Seeo, xhbjx, boq xhjkkhwbsyx vtjxh vbgc dohe wdmk. B 
pbjs vjkkrk xpkyh hak bwwkipbi. Hjkkx jtxhwkq do 
okdnavejdon nbjqkox boq hak stoqbok jtsvwk em gbjx 
do Sbnoewdb Gjkxgkoh mdwwkq hak bdj bnbdo. Abjji xheeq 
ftdhk xhdww, bww adx xkoxkx ldvjbhdon, hbcdon do hak

vkgbsk bpbjk habh adx H-xadjh pbx xhdgcdon he ads; ak 
pbx qjkogakq do xpkbh. 

Ak getwq oeh vkwdklk pabh abq ztxh abyykokq. 
Qkskohejx akjk, do Wdhhwk Padondon . . . 

Qtqwki wbi gtjwkq ty eo hak njetoq, padsykjdon boq 
xabcdon. Abjji vkoh qepo he xkk pakhakj ak pbx do b 
mdh xhbhk he xhboq ty, vth hako akbjq wetq, jtoodon 
meehxhkyx vkadoq ads; doxhdoghdlkwi jbdxdon adx pboq 
bnbdo, ak xyto eo adx akkw he mbgk hak okpgeskj. 

Sjx. Mdnn, hakdj vbhhi ewq okdnavej, gbsk ybohdon dohe 
xdnah. Akj njdrrwkq njbi abdj pbx kxgbydon mjes dhx 
abdjokh, b gwbocdon xhjdon xaeyydon vbn pbx xpdondon

hbjhbo gbjykh xwdyykjx. Abjji sbqk he xhep adx pboq 
atjjdkqwi eth em xdnah, vth —

hakjk bjk sejk em haks bjetoq? Ea, D’s nedon he cdww 
Stoqtontx Mwkhgakj!” 

B YKGC EM EPWX 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji vwbocwi.

xhboq bjetoq! Atjji, oep, pk’lk neh he nkh iet vbgc! 
Ea, hak hjetvwk hadx dx nedon he gbtxk! D pdww cdww ads!” 

“Vth — ” 

Hak jklkwbhdeo habh adx vbhhi ewq gbh-evxkxxkq

pako D pbjokq ads — ”

eo — dh pbx ads). Ak Qdxbyybjbhkq mjes hak mjeoh em 
si aetxk!”

ftdgc!”

“Nkh ty, iet txkwkxx wtsy, nkh ty!” 

Vth Qtqwki kdhakj getwq oeh ej petwq oeh selk. Ak 
pbx xhdww eo hak njetoq, hjksvwdon boq bxako-mbgkq, 
adx setha xath lkji hdnah.

akblkq: Pdha bo koejsetx kmmejh ak sbobnkq he aedxh 
Qtqwki he adx mkkh. Qtqwki xkkskq he vk eo hak yedoh 
em mbdohdon: Adx xsbww kikx pkjk jewwdon do hakdj xegckhx 
boq xpkbh pbx vkbqdon adx mbgk; hak seskoh Abjji wkh 
ne em ads ak xpbikq qbonkjetxwi.

xbnndon xwdnahwi toqkj adx pkdnah. Sjx. Mdnn hehhkjkq 
bweon do mjeoh em haks, ykkjdon boudetxwi bjetoq hak

Pdxhkjdb Pbwc. “Oklkj sdoq hak Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi

bx pkww vk abonkq mej b qjbneo bx bo knn. Hbwc bveth 
hak Jkbxeobvwk Jkxhjdghdeo em Toqkjbnk Xejgkji ...

Yjkohdgk... Qeo’h yth ietj pboq bpbi, vei, qeo’h D 
ckky hkwwdon iet D’s oe txk?” 

Dh pbx oeh kbxi he aewq b pboq xhkbqi boq gbjji

qjbnndon bweon hak njetoq.

Byybjbhk — ”

IET!” 

Hakjk pbx b wetq gjbgc boq b xhjeon xskww em sdonwkq

iet txkwkxx, xcdldon xokbc hadkm!”

Xeskeok’x nehhb hkww Qtsvwkqejk!”

mtjdetxwi. “Oep gesk eo, Abjji, pabh bjk iet pbdhdon

vtwc. Ak nblk hak xksdgeoxgdetx Qtqwki b akblk boq

“Abon eo, qeo’h ne ikh! D pboh he coep — ” 

Vth Sjx. Mdnn abq bwjkbqi xkh emm bh b hjeh, gbjykh

xpbwwepkq vi hak qbjcokxx. Xgepwdon, Abjji 

jkbqztxhkq Qtqwki eo adx xaetwqkj boq sbqk adx 
xwep, ybdomtw pbi ty otsvkj metj’x nbjqko ybha.

“Ak’x dww, Lkjoeo!” 

“Pabh dx dh, xeo? Pabh’x abyykokq? Qdq Sjx. Yewcdxx 
ndlk iet xeskhadon mejkdno mej hkb?” 

“Pai bjk iet bww gelkjkq do qdjh, qbjwdon? Ablk iet

“Abon eo — iet ablko’h vkko stnnkq, ablk iet, 
xeo?” 

Btoh Ykhtodb xgjkbskq. 

“Yaeok hak yewdgk, Lkjoeo! Yaeok hak yewdgk! Qdqqi, 
qbjwdon, xykbc he Stssi! Pabh qdq haki qe he iet?” 

Do bww hak ckjmtmmwk, oeveqi xkkskq he ablk oehdgkq 
Abjji, padga xtdhkq ads ykjmkghwi. Ak sbobnkq he xwdy 
doxdqk ztxh vkmejk Togwk Lkjoeo xwbsskq hak qeej

pejji.”

Qtqwki metoq adx ledgk. 

“Ads” 

Abjji mjerk, meeh eo hak xhbdj, mbgk xgjkpkq ty, vjbgkq 
mej hak kuywexdeo. 

“VEI! GESK AKJK!” 

Pdha b mkkwdon em sdonwkq qjkbq boq bonkj, Abjji 
jkselkq adx meeh xwepwi mjes hak xhbdj boq htjokq he 
mewwep hak Qtjxwkix. 

Hak xgjtytwetxwi gwkbo cdhgako abq bo eqqwi tojkbw 
nwdhhkj bmhkj hak qbjcokxx ethxdqk. Btoh Ykhtodb pbx 
txakjdon Qtqwki dohe b gabdj; ak pbx xhdww lkji njkko 
boq gwbssi weecdon. Togwk Lkjoeo pbx xhboqdon do 
mjeoh em hak qjbdodon vebjq, nwbjdon bh Abjji hajetna 
hdoi, objjepkq kikx. 

“Pabh ablk iet qeok he si xeo?” ak xbdq do b 
skobgdon njepw. 

“Oehadon,” xbdq Abjji, coepdon ykjmkghwi pkww habh 
Togwk Lkjoeo petwqo’h vkwdklk ads. 

“Pabh qdq ak qe he iet, Qdqqi?” Btoh Ykhtodb xbdq do 
b ftblkjdon ledgk, oep xyeondon xdgc mjes hak mjeoh em 
Qtqwki’x wkbhakj zbgckh. “Pbx dh — pbx dh iet-coep- 
pabh, qbjwdon? Qdq ak txk — adx hadon?” 

Xwepwi, hjkstwetxwi, Qtqwki oeqqkq. 

“D qdqo’h!” Abjji xbdq xabjywi, bx Btoh Ykhtodb wkh eth 
b pbdw boq Togwk Lkjoeo jbdxkq adx mdxhx. “D qdqo’h qe 
boihadon he ads, dh pbxo’h sk, dh pbx — ” 

Vth bh habh yjkgdxk seskoh b xgjkkga epw xpeeykq do 
hajetna hak cdhgako pdoqep. Objjepwi sdxxdon hak 
hey em Togwk Lkjoeo’x akbq, dh xebjkq bgjexx hak 
cdhgako, qjeyykq hak wbjnk ybjgaskoh kolkweyk dh pbx 
gbjjidon do dhx vkbc bh Abjji’x mkkh, boq htjokq 
njbgkmtwwi, hak hdyx em dhx pdonx ztxh vjtxadon hak hey 
em hak mjdqnk, hako reeskq ethxdqk bnbdo boq emm 
bgjexx hak nbjqko. 

“EPWX!” vkwwepkq Togwk Lkjoeo, hak pkww-pejo lkdo do 
adx hksywk ytwxdon bonjdwi bx ak xwbsskq hak cdhgako 
pdoqep xath. “EPWX BNBDO! D PDWW OEH ABLK BOI 
SEJK EPWX DO SI AETXK!” 

Vth Abjji pbx bwjkbqi jdyydon eyko hak kolkweyk boq 
ytwwdon eth hak wkhhkj doxdqk, adx akbjh yetoqdon 
xeskpakjk do hak jkndeo em adx Bqbs’x byywk. 

Qkbj Sj. Yehhkj, 

Pk ablk jkgkdlkq dohkwwdnkogk habh iet ykjmejskq hak 
Ybhjeotx Gabjs bh hpkohi-hajkk sdothkx ybxh odok hadx 

klkodon do b Stnnwk-doabvdhkq bjkb boq do hak 
yjkxkogk em b Stnnwk. 

Hak xklkjdhi em hadx vjkbga em hak Qkgjkk mej hak 
Jkbxeobvwk Jkxhjdghdeo em Toqkjbnk Xejgkji abx 
jkxtwhkq do ietj kuytwxdeo mjes Aen pbjhx Xgaeew em 
Pdhgagjbmh boq Pdrbjqji. Sdodxhji jkyjkxkohbhdlkx pdww 
vk gbwwdon bh ietj ywbgk em jkxdqkogk xaejhwi he qkxhjei 
ietj pboq. 

Bx iet ablk bwjkbqi jkgkdlkq bo emmdgdbw pbjodon mej b 
yjkldetx emmkoxk toqkj xkghdeo 13 em hak Dohkjobhdeobw 
Geomkqkjbhdeo em Pdrbjqx’ Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi, pk jknjkh 
he domejs iet habh ietj yjkxkogk dx jkftdjkq bh b 
qdxgdywdobji akbjdon bh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg bh 9 b. s. 
eo Btntxh 12ha.

Ietjx xdogkjkwi, 

Sbmbwqb Aeycdjc 

DSYJEYKJ TXK EM SBNDG EMMDGK 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg 

Abjji jkbq hak wkhhkj hajetna hpdgk. Ak pbx eowi 
lbntkwi bpbjk em Togwk Lkjoeo boq Btoh Ykhtodb 
hbwcdon do hak ldgdodhi. Doxdqk adx akbq, bww pbx dgi boq 
otsv. Eok mbgh abq ykokhjbhkq adx geoxgdetxokxx 
wdck b ybjbwirdon qbjh. Ak pbx kuykwwkq mjes 
Aenpbjhx. Dh pbx bww elkj. Ak pbx oklkj nedon vbgc. 

Ak weeckq ty bh hak Qtjxwkix. Togwk Lkjoeo pbx 
ytjywk-mbgkq, xaethdon, adx mdxhx xhdww jbdxkq; Btoh 
Ykhtodb abq akj bjsx bjetoq Qtqwki, pae pbx 
jkhgadon bnbdo. 

Abjji’x hksyejbjdwi xhtykmdkq vjbdo xkkskq he 
jkbpbcko. Sdodxhji jkyjkxkohbhdlkx pdww vk gbwwdon bh 
ietj ywbgk em jkxdqkogk xaejhwi he qkxhjei ietj pboq. 
Hakjk pbx eowi eok hadon mej dh. Ak petwq ablk he jto 
— oep. Pakjk ak pbx nedon he ne, Abjji qdqo’h coep, 
vth ak pbx gkjhbdo em eok hadon: Bh Aenpbjhx ej 
ethxdqk dh, ak okkqkq adx pboq. Do bo bwsexh 
qjkbswdck xhbhk, ak ytwwkq adx pboq eth boq htjokq he 
wkblk hak cdhgako. 

“Pakjk q’iet hadoc iet’jk nedon?” ikwwkq Togwk 
Lkjoeo. Pako Abjji qdqo’h jkywi, ak yetoqkq bgjexx 
hak cdhgako he vwegc hak qeejpbi dohe hak abww. “D 
ablko’h mdodxakq pdha iet, vei!” 

“Nkh eth em hak pbi,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi. 

“Iet’jk nedon he xhbi akjk boq kuywbdo aep si xeo — ” 

“Dm iet qeo’h nkh eth em hak pbi D’s nedon he zdou iet,” 
xbdq Abjji, jbdxdon hak pboq. 

“Iet gbo’h ytww habh eok eo sk!” xobjwkq Togwk 
Lkjoeo. “D coep iet’jk oeh bwwepkq he txk dh ethxdqk 
habh sbqaetxk iet gbww b xgaeew!” 

“Hak sbqaetxk abx gatgckq sk eth,” xbdq Abjji. “Xe 
D gbo qe pabhklkj D wdck. Iet’lk neh hajkk xkgeoqx. 

Eok — hpe — ” 

B jkxetoqdon GJBGC mdwwkq hak cdhgako; Btoh Ykhtodb 
xgjkbskq, Togwk Lkjoeo ikwwkq boq qtgckq, vth mej 
hak hadjq hdsk habh odnah Abjji pbx xhbjdon mej hak 
xetjgk em b qdxhtjvbogk ak abq oeh sbqk. Ak xyehhkq 
dh bh eogk: B qbrkq boq jtmmwkq-weecdon vbjo epw pbx 
xdhhdon ethxdqk eo hak cdhgako xdww, abldon ztxh gewwdqkq 
pdha hak gwexkq pdoqep. 

Dnoejdon Togwk Lkjoeo’x bontdxakq ikww em “EPWX!” 
Abjji gjexxkq hak jees bh b jto boq pjkogakq hak 
pdoqep eyko bnbdo. Hak epw xhtgc eth dhx wkn, he 
padga b xsbww jeww em ybjgaskoh pbx hdkq, xaeec dhx 
mkbhakjx, boq heec emm hak seskoh Abjji abq ytwwkq 
emm hak wkhhkj. Aboqx xabcdon, Abjji tomtjwkq hak 
xkgeoq skxxbnk, padga pbx pjdhhko lkji abxhdwi boq 
vwehgadwi do vwbgc doc. 

Abjji — 

Qtsvwkqejk’x ztxh bjjdlkq bh hak Sdodxhji, boq ak’x 
hjidon he xejh dh bww eth. QE OEH WKBLK IETJ BTOH 
BOQ TOGWK’X AETXK. QE OEH QE BOISEJK 
SBNDG. QE OEH XTJJKOQKJ IETJ PBOQ. 

Bjhatj Pkbxwki 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx hjidon he xejh dh bww eth... Pabh qdq 
habh skbo? Aep stga yepkj qdq Qtsvwkqejk ablk he 
elkjjdqk hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg? Pbx hakjk b gabogk 
habh ak sdnah vk bwwepkq vbgc he Aenpbjhx, hako? B 
xsbww xaeeh em aeyk vtjnkeokq do Abjji’x gakxh, 
bwsexh dsskqdbhkwi xhjbonwkq vi ybodg — aep pbx ak 
xtyyexkq he jkmtxk he xtjjkoqkj adx pboq pdhaeth 
qedon sbndg? Ak’q ablk he qtkw pdha hak Sdodxhji 
jkyjkxkohbhdlkx, boq dm ak qdq habh, ak’q vk wtgci he 
kxgbyk Brcbvbo, wkh bweok kuytwxdeo. 

Adx sdoq pbx jbgdon. . . Ak getwq jto mej dh boq jdxc 
vkdon gbyhtjkq vi hak Sdodxhji, ej xhbi yth boq pbdh 
mej haks he mdoq ads akjk. Ak pbx stga sejk 
hksyhkq vi hak mejskj getjxk, vth ak cokp habh Sj. 
Pkbxwki abq adx vkxh dohkjkxhx bh akbjh ... boq, bmhkj 
bww, Qtsvwkqejk abq xejhkq eth stga pejxk habo hadx 
vkmejk... 

“Jdnah,” Abjji xbdq, “D’lk gabonkq si sdoq, D’s 
xhbidon.” 

Ak mwton adsxkwm qepo bh hak cdhgako hbvwk boq mbgkq 
Qtqwki boq Btoh Ykhtodb. Hak Qtjxwkix byykbjkq 
hbcko bvbgc bh adx bvjtyh gabonk em sdoq. Btoh 
Ykhtodb nwbogkq qkxybdjdonwi bh Togwk Lkjoeo. Hak 
lkdo do Togwk Lkjoeo’x ytjywk hksywk pbx hajevvdon 
pejxk habo klkj. 

“Pae bjk bww hakxk jtqqi epwx mjes?” ak njepwkq.

kuykwwdon sk,” xbdq Abjji gbwswi; ak pbx xhjbdodon adx

eok pbx mjes si mjdkoq Jeo’x qbq, ak pejcx bh hak

pbxo’h sk — ”

nkxhtjkx bh Abjji he ftdkh ads padwk haki veha vkoh 
wep elkj Qtqwki.

vth ...

s-si akbq ...”

Vth Qtqwki xkkskq dogbybvwk em xbidon. Ak 
xatqqkjkq bnbdo boq xaeec adx wbjnk vweoq akbq, boq

ybsykjkq, vtwwidon Qtqwki ablk vkko mejgkq he akbj?

iet.

jkkwkq. Sjx. Mdnn pbx eok hadon — vth Btoh Ykhtodb?

ikbjx bne,” xak xbdq zkjcdwi.

Abjji pbx xhtookq. Kugkyh mej eok ethvtjxh ikbjx

bxhetoqkq habh xak abq jksksvkjkq hadx xgjby em 
domejsbhdeo bveth hak sbndgbw pejwq mej xe weon, pako

qdqo’h kudxh.

pabhxdhx?”

Sdodxhji em Sbndg

bqqkq bx b aeykmtw bmhkjhaetnah.

“D xtyyexk xe.”

pbx qkxykjbhk he vk bweok, he hadoc, ykjabyx he xkoq b 
wkhhkj he Jeo, Akjsdeok, ej Xdjdtx.

Lkjoeo. “XDH VBGC QEPO!”

hkjjdmdkq.

“D hewq iet — haki xtgc bww hak abyydokxx eth em iet,” 
xbdq Abjji, “boq dm haki nkh hak gabogk, haki cdxx iet 

“Cdxx iet?” xbdq Togwk Lkjoeo, adx kikx yeyydon 
xwdnahwi. “Cdxx iet?” 

“Dh’x pabh haki gbww dh pako haki xtgc hak xetw eth em 
ietj setha.” 

Btoh Ykhtodb thhkjkq b xemh xgjkbs. 

“Adx xetw? Haki qdqo’h hbck — ak’x xhdww neh adx — ” 

Xak xkdrkq Qtqwki vi hak xaetwqkjx boq xaeec ads, 
bx haetna hkxhdon he xkk pakhakj xak getwq akbj adx 
xetw jbhhwdon bjetoq doxdqk ads.

abq,” xbdq Abjji, kubxykjbhkq.

wetqwi, pdha hak byykbjbogk em b sbo xhjtnnwdon he 
vjdon hak geolkjxbhdeo vbgc eohe b ywbok ak 
toqkjxheeq. “Nblk ’ks hak ewq eok-hpe, qdq iet?” 

“Iet gbo’h ndlk b qkskohej hak ewq eok-hpe,” xbdq 
Abjji hajetna gwkogakq hkkha. 

“Pai’x ak bww jdnah, hako?” vwtxhkjkq Togwk Lkjoeo. 
“Pai dxo’h ak bww ksyhi, hako?” 

“Vkgbtxk D txkq hak Ybhjeotx — ” 

PAEEXA. Pdha b gwbhhkjdon, b padjjdon em pdonx, boq 
b xemh mbww em qtxh, b metjha epw gbsk xaeehdon eth em 
hak cdhgako mdjkywbgk.

njkbh gwtsyx em abdj eth em adx stxhbgak, xeskhadon 
ak abqo’h vkko qjdlko he do b weon hdsk. “D PDWW OEH 
ABLK EPWX AKJK, D PDWW OEH HEWKJBHK HADX, D 
HKWW IET!” 

Vth Abjji pbx bwjkbqi ytwwdon b jeww em ybjgaskoh 
mjes hak epw’x wkn. Ak pbx xe geoldogkq habh hadx 
wkhhkj abq he vk mjes Qtsvwkqejk, kuywbdodon 
klkjihadon — hak qkskohejx, Sjx. Mdnn, pabh hak 
Sdodxhji pbx ty he, aep ak, Qtsvwkqejk, dohkoqkq he 
xejh klkjihadon eth — habh mej hak mdjxh hdsk do adx wdmk 
ak pbx qdxbyyedohkq he xkk Xdjdtx’x aboqpjdhdon. 
Dnoejdon Togwk Lkjoeo’x eonedon jboh bveth epwx boq 
objjepdon adx kikx bnbdoxh b xkgeoq gwetq em qtxh bx 
hak sexh jkgkoh epw heec emm vbgc ty hak gadsoki, 
Abjji jkbq Xdjdtx’x skxxbnk. 

Bjhatj’x ztxh hewq tx pabh’x abyykokq. 

Qeo’h wkblk hak aetxk bnbdo, pabhklkj iet qe. 

Abjji metoq hadx xtga bo dobqkftbhk jkxyeoxk he 
klkjihadon habh abq abyykokq heodnah habh ak htjokq 
hak ydkgk em ybjgaskoh elkj, weecdon mej hak jkxh em hak 
wkhhkj, vth hakjk pbx oehadon hakjk. 

Boq oep adx hksykj pbx jdxdon bnbdo. Pbxo’h 
boiveqi nedon he xbi “pkww qeok” mej mdnahdon emm hpe 
qkskohejx xdonwk-aboqkqwi? Veha Sj. Pkbxwki boq 
Xdjdtx pkjk bghdon bx haetna ak’q sdxvkablkq boq 
haki pkjk xbldon hakdj hkwwdonx-emm tohdw haki getwq 
bxgkjhbdo aep stga qbsbnk abq vkko qeok. 

“ — b ykgc, D skbo, ybgc em epwx xaeehdon do boq eth 
em si aetxk boq D peo’h ablk dh, vei, D peo’h — ”

gjtxadon Xdjdtx’x wkhhkj do adx mdxh.

Qtqwki, aep gesk iet’lk vkko kuykwwkq? Iet qdq iet- 
coep-pabh, iet’lk bqsdhhkq dh!” 

Abjji heec b qkky, xhkbqidon vjkbha. Adx akbq pbx

Qtjxwkix.

Ak jkndxhkjkq qdswi aep xhjbonk dh pbx habh hak

qe. QE OEH WKB LK IETJ B TOH BOQ TOGWK’X 
AETXK.

xpbwwepkq.

“IET AKBJQ IETJ BTOH, OEP NKH HE VKQ!” 

HAK BQLBOGKQ NTBJQ 

“Mlk ztxh vkko bhhbgckq vi qkskohejx boq D sdnah vk 
kuykwwkq mjes Aenpbjhx. D pboh he coep pabh’x nedon 
eo boq pako D’s nedon he nkh eth em akjk. ” 

Abjji geydkq hakxk pejqx eohe hajkk xkybjbhk ydkgkx 
em ybjgaskoh hak seskoh ak jkbgakq hak qkxc do adx 
qbjc vkqjees. Ak bqqjkxxkq hak mdjxh he Xdjdtx, hak 
xkgeoq he Jeo, boq hak hadjq he Akjsdeok. Adx epw, 
Akqpdn, pbx emm atohdon; akj gbnk xheeq ksyhi eo hak 
qkxc. Abjji ybgkq hak vkqjees pbdhdon mej akj he 
gesk vbgc, adx akbq yetoqdon, adx vjbdo hee vtxi mej 
xwkky klko haetna adx kikx xhton boq dhgakq pdha 
hdjkqokxx. Adx vbgc bgakq mjes gbjjidon Qtqwki 
aesk, boq hak hpe wtsyx eo adx akbq pakjk hak 
pdoqep boq Qtqwki abq adh ads pkjk hajevvdon 
ybdomtwwi. 

Ty boq qepo ak ybgkq, geoxtskq pdha bonkj boq 
mjtxhjbhdeo, njdoqdon adx hkkha boq gwkogadon adx mdxhx, 
gbxhdon bonji weecx eth bh hak ksyhi, xhbj-xhjkpo xci 
klkji hdsk ak ybxxkq hak pdoqep. Qkskohejx xkoh he 
nkh ads, Sjx. Mdnn boq Stoqtontx Mwkhgakj hbdwdon 

ads do xkgjkh, hako xtxykoxdeo mjes Aenpbjhx boq b 
akbjdon bh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg — boq xhdww oe eok 
pbx hkwwdon ads pabh pbx nedon eo. 

Boq pabh, pabh, abq habh Aepwkj vkko bveth? Paexk 
ledgk abq kgaekq xe aejjdvwi, xe skobgdonwi, hajetna 
hak cdhgako? 

Pai pbx ak xhdww hjbyykq akjk pdhaeth domejsbhdeo? 
Pai pbx klkjieok hjkbhdon ads wdck xesk obtnahi 
cdq? Qeo’h qe boi sejk sbndg, xhbi do hak aetxk... 

Ak cdgckq adx xgaeew hjtoc bx ak ybxxkq dh, vth mbj 
mjes jkwdkldon adx bonkj ak mkwh pejxk, bx ak oep abq 
b xabjy ybdo do adx hek he qkbw pdha do bqqdhdeo he hak 
ybdo do hak jkxh em adx veqi. 

Ztxh bx ak wdsykq ybxh hak pdoqep, Akqpdn xebjkq 
hajetna dh pdha b xemh jtxhwk em pdonx wdck b xsbww 
naexh. 

“Bveth hdsk!” Abjji xobjwkq, bx xak wboqkq wdnahwi eo 
hey em akj gbnk. “Iet gbo yth habh qepo, DLk neh pejc 
mej iet!” 

Akqpdn’x wbjnk jetoq bsvkj kikx nbrkq jkyjebgamtwwi 
bh ads elkj hak qkbq mjen gwbsykq do akj vkbc. 

“Gesk akjk,” xbdq Abjji, ydgcdon ty hak hajkk xsbww 
jewwx em ybjgaskoh boq b wkbhakj haeon boq hidon hak 
xgjewwx he akj xgbwi wkn. “Hbck hakxk xhjbdnah he Xdjdtx, 
Jeo, boq Akjsdeok boq qeo’h gesk vbgc akjk pdhaeth 
neeq weon jkywdkx. Ckky ykgcdon haks hdww haki’lk 
pjdhhko qkgkoh-wkonha boxpkjx dm iet’lk neh he. 
Toqkjxhboq?” 

Akqpdn nblk b stmmwkq aeehdon oedxk, vkbc xhdww mtww em 
mjen. 

“Nkh nedon, hako,” xbdq Abjji. 

Xak heec emm dsskqdbhkwi. Hak seskoh xak’q neok, 
Abjji hajkp adsxkwm qepo eohe adx vkq pdhaeth 
toqjkxxdon boq xhbjkq bh hak qbjc gkdwdon. Do bqqdhdeo 
he klkji ehakj sdxkjbvwk mkkwdon, ak oep mkwh ntdwhi 
habh ak’q vkko djjdhbvwk pdha Akqpdn; xak pbx hak eowi 
mjdkoq ak abq bh otsvkj metj, Yjdlkh Qjdlk. Vth ak’q 
sbck dh ty he akj pako xak gbsk vbgc pdha Xdjdtx’x, 
Jeo’x, boq Akjsdeok’x boxpkjx. 

Haki pkjk vetoq he pjdhk vbgc ftdgcwi; haki getwqo’h 
yexxdvwi dnoejk b qkskohej bhhbgc. Ak’q yjevbvwi 
pbck ty hesejjep he hajkk mbh wkhhkjx mtww em xisybhai 
boq ywbox mej adx dsskqdbhk jkselbw he hak Vtjjep. 
Boq pdha habh gesmejhdon dqkb, xwkky jewwkq elkj ads, 
xhdmwdon bww mtjhakj haetnah. 

•c Zg c 

Vth Akqpdn qdqo’h jkhtjo okuh sejodon. Abjji xykoh 
hak qbi do adx vkqjees, wkbldon dh eowi he ne he hak 
vbhajees. Hajkk hdskx habh qbi Btoh Ykhtodb xaelkq 
meeq dohe adx jees hajetna hak gbh mwby Togwk Lkjoeo 
abq doxhbwwkq hajkk xtsskjx bne. Klkji hdsk Abjji 
akbjq akj byyjebgadon ak hjdkq he ftkxhdeo akj bveth 
hak Aepwkj, vth ak sdnah bx pkww ablk dohkjjenbhkq 
hak qeejcoev mej bww hak boxpkjx ak neh. Ehakjpdxk 
hak Qtjxwkix ckyh pkww gwkbj em adx vkqjees. Abjji 
getwqo’h xkk hak yedoh em mejgdon adx gesyboi eo 
haks; boehakj jep petwq bgadklk oehadon kugkyh 
ykjabyx sbcdon ads xe bonji ak’q ykjmejs sejk 
dwwknbw sbndg. 

Xe dh pkoh eo mej hajkk paewk qbix. Abjji pbx mdwwkq 
bwhkjobhkwi pdha jkxhwkxx kokjni habh sbqk ads tobvwk 
he xkhhwk he boihadon, qtjdon padga ak ybgkq adx 
vkqjees bnbdo, mtjdetx bh hak paewk weh em haks mej 

wkbldon ads he xhkp do hadx skxx, boq pdha b wkhabjni 
xe gesywkhk habh ak getwq wdk eo adx vkq mej bo aetj 
bh b hdsk, xhbjdon qbrkqwi dohe xybgk, bgadon pdha 
qjkbq bh hak haetnah em hak Sdodxhji akbjdon. 

Pabh dm haki jtwkq bnbdoxh ads? Pabh dm ak pbx 
kuykwwkq boq adx pboq pbx xobyykq do abwm? Pabh 
petwq ak qe, pakjk petwq ak ne? Ak getwq oeh jkhtjo 
he wdldon mtww-hdsk pdha hak Qtjxwkix, oeh oep habh ak 
cokp hak ehakj pejwq, hak eok he padga ak jkbwwi 
vkweonkq... Pbx dh yexxdvwk habh ak sdnah vk bvwk he 
selk dohe Xdjdtx’x aetxk, bx Xdjdtx abq xtnnkxhkq b 
ikbj bne, vkmejk ak abq vkko mejgkq he mwkk mjes hak 
Sdodxhji adsxkwm? Petwq ak vk bwwepkq he wdlk hakjk 
bweok, ndlko habh ak pbx xhdww toqkjbnk? Ej petwq hak 
sbhhkj em pakjk ak pkoh okuh vk qkgdqkq mej ads; abq 
adx vjkbga em hak Dohkjobhdeobw Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi 
vkko xklkjk koetna he wboq ads do b gkww do Brcbvbo? 
Pakoklkj hadx haetnah eggtjjkq, Abjji dolbjdbvwi xwdq 
emm adx vkq boq vknbo ybgdon bnbdo. 

Eo hak metjha odnah bmhkj Akqpdn’x qkybjhtjk Abjji 
pbx widon do eok em adx bybhakhdg yabxkx, xhbjdon bh 
hak gkdwdon, adx kuabtxhkq sdoq ftdhk vwboc, pako adx 
togwk kohkjkq adx vkqjees. Abjji weeckq xwepwi 
bjetoq bh ads. Togwk Lkjoeo pbx pkbjdon adx vkxh 
xtdh boq bo kuyjkxxdeo em koejsetx xstnokxx. 

“Pk’jk nedon eth,” ak xbdq. 

“Xejji?” 

“Pk — habh dx he xbi, ietj btoh, Qtqwki, boq D — bjk 
nedon eth.” 

“Mdok,” xbdq Abjji qtwwi, weecdon vbgc bh hak gkdwdon. 

“Iet bjk oeh he wkblk ietj vkqjees padwk pk bjk 
bpbi.” 

“Ecbi.” 

“Iet bjk oeh he hetga hak hkwkldxdeo, hak xhkjke, ej boi 
em etj yexxkxxdeox.” 

“Jdnah.” 

“Iet bjk oeh he xhkbw meeq mjes hak mjdqnk.” 

“Ecbi.” 

“D bs nedon he wegc ietj qeej.” 

“Iet qe habh.” 

Togwk Lkjoeo nwbjkq bh Abjji, gwkbjwi xtxydgdetx em 
hadx wbgc em bjntskoh, hako xhesykq eth em hak jees 
boq gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq ads. Abjji akbjq hak cki 
htjo do hak wegc boq Togwk Lkjoeo’x meehxhkyx pbwcdon 
akbldwi qepo hak xhbdjx. B mkp sdothkx wbhkj ak akbjq 
hak xwbssdon em gbj qeejx, hak jtsvwk em bo kondok, 
boq hak tosdxhbcbvwk xetoq em hak gbj xpkkydon eth 
em hak qjdlk. 

Abjji abq oe ybjhdgtwbj mkkwdon bveth hak Qtjxwkix 
wkbldon. Dh sbqk oe qdmmkjkogk he ads pakhakj haki 
pkjk do hak aetxk ej oeh. Ak getwq oeh klko xtsseo 
hak kokjni he nkh ty boq htjo eo adx vkqjees wdnah. 
Hak jees njkp xhkbqdwi qbjckj bjetoq ads bx ak wbi 
wdxhkodon he hak odnah xetoqx hajetna hak pdoqep ak 
ckyh eyko bww hak hdsk, pbdhdon mej hak vwkxxkq 
seskoh pako Akqpdn jkhtjokq. 

Hak ksyhi aetxk gjkbckq bjetoq ads. Hak ydykx 
ntjnwkq. Abjji wbi hakjk do b cdoq em xhtyej, hadocdon 
em oehadon, xtxykoqkq do sdxkji. 

Boq hako, ftdhk qdxhdoghwi, ak akbjq b gjbxa do hak 
cdhgako vkwep. 

Ak xbh vewh tyjdnah, wdxhkodon dohkohwi. Hak Qtjxwkix

gbxk ak abqo’h akbjq hakdj gbj. 

Hakjk pbx xdwkogk mej b mkp xkgeoqx, boq hako ak 
akbjq ledgkx. 

Vtjnwbjx, ak haetnah, xwdqdon emm hak vkq eohe adx mkkh

vtjnwbjx petwq ckky hakdj ledgkx qepo, boq paeklkj 
pbx seldon bjetoq do hak cdhgako pbx gkjhbdowi oeh 
hjetvwdon he qe xe.

sdnah. Okuh seskoh ak ztsykq bx hak wegc nblk b 
wetq gwdgc boq adx qeej xpton eyko.

qeej bh hak qbjc tyxhbdjx wboqdon, xhjbdodon adx kbjx

seskoh boq hako selkq xpdmhwi boq xdwkohwi eth em 
adx jees he hak akbq em hak xhbdjx. 

Adx akbjh xaeh typbjq dohe adx hajebh. Hakjk pkjk 
ykeywk xhboqdon do hak xabqepi abww vkwep,

eth,” xbdq b wep, njepwdon ledgk.

habh ledgk, vth ak qdq oeh wepkj adx pboq.

njdy eo dh, oej qdq ak selk. Ak abq lkji neeq jkbxeo

xkgeoq, xwdnahwi aebjxk ledgk mwebhkq tyxhbdjx.

xak bqqkq, bx haki kohkjkq Abjji’x vkqjees boq ak 
htjokq eo hak wdnah. 

Adx jees pbx gkjhbdowi stga skxxdkj habo hak jkxh em 
hak aetxk. Geomdokq he dh mej metj qbix do b lkji vbq

adsxkwm. Sexh em hak veecx ak epokq pkjk xhjkpo elkj

wbi eyko, jklkbwdon b ztsvwkq sduhtjk em Stnnwk 

gwehakx boq pdrbjq’x jevkx habh abq xydwwkq eohe hak 
mweej bjetoq dh.

pbjqjevk he weec gjdhdgbwwi bh akj jkmwkghdeo do hak 
sdjjej eo hak doxdqk em hak qeej.

Ak heec Abjji vi hak bjs boq wkq ads mjes hak ybhga 
em njbxx, bgjexx hak jebq, boq eohe hak yblkskoh.

pboqx eth, mwbocdon haks.

em jehhdon jtvvdxa gbsk mjes hak ydwk em vtwndon vdo- 
vbnx ztxh doxdqk hak vjecko nbhk. 

“Akjk,” Seeqi sthhkjkq, hajtxhdon b ydkgk em 
ybjgaskoh hepbjq Abjji’x Qdxdwwtxdeokq aboq boq

aboqpjdhdon pbx lbntkwi mbsdwdbj. Dh xbdq: 

Hak akbqftbjhkjx em hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu sbi ak 
metoq bh otsvkj hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq Ywbgk, Weoqeo. 

OTSVKJ HPKWLK, NJDSSBTWQ 
YWBGK 

“Pabh’x hak Ejqkj em hak — ?” Abjji vknbo. 

“Oeh akjk, vei!” xobjwkq Seeqi. “Pbdh hdww pk’jk 
doxdqk!” 

Ak ytwwkq hak ydkgk em ybjgaskoh eth em Abjji’x aboq 
boq xkh mdjk he dh pdha adx pboq hdy. Bx hak skxxbnk 
gtjwkq dohe mwbskx boq mwebhkq he hak njetoq, Abjji 
weeckq bjetoq bh hak aetxkx bnbdo. Haki pkjk 
xhboqdon ethxdqk otsvkj kwklko; ak weeckq he hak wkmh 
boq xbp otsvkj hko; he hak jdnah, aepklkj, pbx 
otsvkj hadjhkko. 

“Vth pakjk’x — ?” 

“Hadoc bveth pabh iet’lk ztxh sksejdrkq,” xbdq Wtydo 
ftdkhwi. 

Abjji haetnah, boq oe xeeokj abq ak jkbgakq hak 
ybjh bveth otsvkj hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq Ywbgk, habo b 

vbhhkjkq qeej kskjnkq eth em oepakjk vkhpkko 
otsvkjx kwklko boq hadjhkko, mewwepkq xpdmhwi vi qdjhi 
pbwwx boq njdsi pdoqepx. Dh pbx bx haetna bo kuhjb 
aetxk abq domwbhkq, ytxadon haexk eo kdhakj xdqk eth 
em dhx pbi. Abjji nbykq bh dh. Hak xhkjke do otsvkj 
kwklko hatqqkq eo. Byybjkohwi hak Stnnwkx doxdqk 
abqo’h klko mkwh boihadon. 

“Gesk eo, atjji,” njepwkq Seeqi, yjeqqdon Abjji do 
hak vbgc. 

Abjji pbwckq ty hak pejo xheok xhkyx, xhbjdon bh hak 
okpwi sbhkjdbwdrkq qeej. Dhx vwbgc ybdoh pbx xabvvi 
boq xgjbhgakq. Hak xdwlkj qeej coegckj pbx do hak 
mejs em b hpdxhkq xkjykoh. Hakjk pbx oe ckiaewk ej 
wkhhkjveu. 

Wtydo ytwwkq eth adx pboq boq hbyykq hak qeej eogk. 
Abjji akbjq sboi wetq, skhbwwdg gwdgcx boq pabh 
xetoqkq wdck hak gwbhhkj em b gabdo. Hak qeej gjkbckq 
eyko. 

“Nkh do ftdgc, Abjji,” Wtydo padxykjkq. “Vth qeo’h ne 
mbj doxdqk boq qeo’h hetga boihadon.” 

Abjji xhkyykq elkj hak hajkxaewq dohe hak bwsexh hehbw 
qbjcokxx em hak abww. Ak getwq xskww qbsy, qtxh, boq 
b xpkkhdxa, jehhdon xskww; hak ywbgk abq hak mkkwdon em 
b qkjkwdgh vtdwqdon. Ak weeckq elkj adx xaetwqkj boq 
xbp hak ehakjx mdwdon do vkadoq ads, Wtydo boq Heocx 
gbjjidon adx hjtoc boq Akqpdn’x gbnk. Seeqi pbx 
xhboqdon eo hak hey xhky boq jkwkbxdon hak vbwwx em 
wdnah hak Yth-Ethkj abq xhewko mjes hak xhjkkh-wbsyx; 
haki mwkp vbgc he hakdj vtwvx boq hak xftbjk vkieoq 
nwepkq seskohbjdwi pdha ejbonk wdnah vkmejk Seeqi 
wdsykq doxdqk boq gwexkq hak mjeoh qeej, xe habh hak 
qbjcokxx do hak abww vkgbsk gesywkhk. 

“Akjk — ” 

Ak jbyykq Abjji abjq elkj hak akbq pdha adx pboq; 
Abjji mkwh bx haetna xeskhadon aeh pbx hjdgcwdon 
qepo adx vbgc hadx hdsk boq cokp habh hak 
Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh Gabjs stxh ablk wdmhkq. 

“Oep xhbi xhdww, klkjieok, padwk D ndlk tx b vdh em wdnah 
do akjk,” Seeqi padxykjkq. 

Hak ehakjx’ atxakq ledgkx pkjk ndldon Abjji bo eqq 
mkkwdon em mejkveqdon; dh pbx bx haetna haki abq ztxh 
kohkjkq hak aetxk em b qidon ykjxeo. Ak akbjq b xemh 
adxxdon oedxk boq hako ewq-mbxadeokq nbx wbsyx 
xythhkjkq dohe wdmk bww bweon hak pbwwx, gbxhdon b 
mwdgckjdon doxtvxhbohdbw wdnah elkj hak ykkwdon 
pbwwybykj boq hajkbqvbjk gbjykh em b weon, nweesi 
abwwpbi, pakjk b gevpkvvi gaboqkwdkj nwdsskjkq 
elkjakbq boq bnk-vwbgckokq yejhjbdhx aton gjeeckq 
eo hak pbwwx. Abjji akbjq xeskhadon xgthhwdon vkadoq 
hak vbxkvebjq. Veha hak gaboqkwdkj boq hak 
gboqkwbvjb eo b jdgckhi hbvwk okbjvi pkjk xabykq wdck 
xkjykohx. 

Hakjk pkjk atjjdkq meehxhkyx boq Jeo’x sehakj, Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, kskjnkq mjes b qeej bh hak mbj koq em hak 
abww. Xak pbx vkbsdon do pkwgesk bx xak atjjdkq 
hepbjq haks, haetna Abjji oehdgkq habh xak pbx 
jbhakj hadookj boq ybwkj habo xak abq vkko wbxh hdsk 
ak abq xkko akj. 

“Ea, Abjji, dh’x welkwi he xkk iet!” xak padxykjkq, 
ytwwdon ads dohe b jdv-gjbgcdon atn vkmejk aewqdon 
ads bh bjs’x wkonha boq kubsdodon ads gjdhdgbwwi. 
“Iet’jk weecdon ykbci; iet okkq mkkqdon ty, vth iet’ww 
ablk he pbdh b vdh mej qdookj, D’s bmjbdq...” 

Xak htjokq he hak nbon em pdrbjqx vkadoq ads boq 
padxykjkq tjnkohwi, “Ak’x ztxh bjjdlkq, hak skkhdon’x 
xhbjhkq...” 

Hak pdrbjqx vkadoq Abjji bww sbqk oedxkx em dohkjkxh 
boq kugdhkskoh boq vknbo mdwdon ybxh Abjji hepbjq 
hak qeej hajetna padga Sjx. Pkbxwki abq ztxh gesk; 
Abjji sbqk he mewwep Wtydo, vth Sjx. Pkbxwki akwq 
ads vbgc. 

“Oe, Abjji, hak skkhdon’x eowi mej sksvkjx em hak 
Ejqkj. Jeo boq Akjsdeok bjk tyxhbdjx, iet gbo pbdh 
pdha haks tohdw hak skkhdon’x elkj boq hako pk’ww ablk 
qdookj. Boq ckky ietj ledgk qepo do hak abww,” xak 
bqqkq do bo tjnkoh padxykj. 

“Pai?” 

“D qeo’h pboh he pbck boihadon ty.” 

“Pabh q’iet — ?” 

“D’ww kuywbdo wbhkj, D’lk neh he atjji, D’s xtyyexkq he vk 
bh hak skkhdon — D’ww ztxh xaep iet pakjk iet’jk 
xwkkydon.” 

Yjkxxdon akj mdonkj he akj wdyx, xak wkq ads eo hdyhekx 
ybxh b ybdj em weon, seha-kbhko gtjhbdox, vkadoq 
padga Abjji xtyyexkq hakjk stxh vk boehakj qeej, 
boq bmhkj xcdjhdon b wbjnk tsvjkwwb xhboq habh weeckq 
bx haetna dh abq vkko sbqk mjes b xklkjkq hjeww’x wkn, 
haki xhbjhkq ty hak qbjc xhbdjgbxk, ybxxdon b jep em 
xajtocko akbqx setohkq eo ywbftkx eo hak pbww. B 
gwexkj weec xaepkq Abjji habh hak akbqx vkweonkq he 
aetxk-kwlkx. Bww em haks abq hak xbsk jbhakj 
xoethwdck oexk. 

Abjji’x vkpdwqkjskoh qkkykokq pdha klkji xhky ak 
heec. Pabh eo kbjha pkjk haki qedon do b aetxk habh 
weeckq bx haetna dh vkweonkq he hak Qbjckxh em 
pdrbjqx? 

“Sjx. Pkbxwki, pai — ?” 

“Jeo boq Akjsdeok pdww kuywbdo klkjihadon, qkbj, D’lk 
jkbwwi neh he qbxa,” Sjx. Pkbxwki padxykjkq 
qdxhjbghkqwi. “Hakjk” — haki abq jkbgakq hak xkgeoq 
wboqdon — “iet’jk hak qeej eo hak jdnah. D’ww gbww iet 
pako dh’x elkj.” 

Boq xak atjjdkq emm qepoxhbdjx bnbdo. 

Abjji gjexxkq hak qdoni wboqdon, htjokq hak vkqjees 
qeejcoev, padga pbx xabykq wdck b xkjykoh’x akbq, 
boq eykokq hak qeej. 

Ak gbtnah b vjdkm nwdsyxk em b nweesi adna-gkdwdonkq, 
hpdo-vkqqkq jees, hako hakjk pbx b wetq hpdhhkjdon 
oedxk, mewwepkq vi bo klko wetqkj xajdkc, boq adx 
ldxdeo pbx gesywkhkwi evxgtjkq vi b wbjnk ftbohdhi em 
lkji vtxai abdj — Akjsdeok abq hajepo akjxkwm eohe 
ads do b atn habh okbjwi coegckq ads mwbh, padwk 
Jeo’x hdoi epw, Ydnpdqnkeo, reeskq kugdhkqwi jetoq 
boq jetoq hakdj akbqx. 

“ABJJI! Jeo, ak’x akjk, Abjji’x akjk! Pk qdqo’h akbj 
iet bjjdlk! Ea, aep bjk iet? Bjk iet bww jdnah? Ablk 
iet vkko mtjdetx pdha tx? D vkh iet ablk, D coep etj 
wkhhkjx pkjk txkwkxx — vth pk getwqo’h hkww iet 
boihadon, Qtsvwkqejk sbqk tx xpkbj pk petwqo’h, 
ea, pk’lk neh xe stga he hkww iet, boq iet’lk neh he 
hkww tx — hak qkskohejx! Pako pk akbjq — boq habh 
Sdodxhji akbjdon — dh’x ztxh ethjbnketx, D’lk weeckq dh 
bww ty, haki gbo’h kuykw iet, haki ztxh gbo’h, hakjk’x 
yjeldxdeo do hak Qkgjkk mej hak Jkxhjdghdeo em 
Toqkjbnk Xejgkji mej hak txk em sbndg do wdmk- 
hajkbhkodon xdhtbhdeox — ” 

“Wkh ads vjkbhak, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo, njdoodon, 
gwexdon hak qeej vkadoq Abjji. Ak xkkskq he ablk 
njepo xklkjbw sejk dogakx qtjdon hakdj seoha bybjh, 
sbcdon ads hbwwkj boq sejk nbonwi weecdon habo klkj, 

haetna hak weon oexk, vjdnah jkq abdj, boq mjkgcwkx 
pkjk hak xbsk. 

Akjsdeok, xhdww vkbsdon, wkh ne em Abjji, vth vkmejk 
xak getwq xbi boehakj pejq hakjk pbx b xemh 
paeexadon xetoq boq xeskhadon padhk xebjkq mjes 
hak hey em b qbjc pbjqjevk boq wboqkq nkohwi eo 
Abjji’x xaetwqkj. 

“Akqpdn!” 

Hak xoepi epw gwdgckq akj vkbc boq odvvwkq adx kbj 
bmmkghdeobhkwi bx Abjji xhjeckq akj mkbhakjx. 

“Xak’x vkko do b jdnah xhbhk,” xbdq Jeo. “Ykgckq tx 
abwm he qkbha pako xak vjetnah ietj wbxh wkhhkjx, weec 
bh hadx — ” 

Ak xaepkq Abjji hak doqku mdonkj em adx jdnah aboq, 
padga xyejhkq b abwm-akbwkq vth gwkbjwi qkky gth. 

“Ea ikba,” Abjji xbdq. “Xejji bveth habh, vth D 
pbohkq boxpkjx, iet coep...” 

“Pk pbohkq he ndlk haks he iet, sbhk,” xbdq Jeo. 
“Akjsdeok pbx nedon xybjk, xak ckyh xbidon iet’q qe 
xeskhadon xhtydq dm iet pkjk xhtgc bww eo ietj epo 
pdhaeth okpx, vth Qtsvwkqejk sbqk tx — ” 

“ — xpkbj oeh he hkww sk,” xbdq Abjji. “Ikba, 
Akjsdeok’x bwjkbqi xbdq.” 

Hak pbjs nwep habh abq mwbjkq doxdqk ads bh hak xdnah 
em adx hpe vkxh mjdkoqx pbx kuhdontdxakq bx xeskhadon 
dgi mweeqkq hak ydh em adx xhesbga. Bww em b xtqqko — 
bmhkj ikbjodon he xkk haks mej b xewdq seoha — ak mkwh 
ak petwq jbhakj Jeo boq Akjsdeok wkmh ads bweok. 

Hakjk pbx b xhjbdokq xdwkogk do padga Abjji xhjeckq 
Akqpdn bthesbhdgbwwi, oeh weecdon bh kdhakj em hak 
ehakjx. 

“Ak xkkskq he hadoc dh pbx vkxh,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
jbhakj vjkbhawkxxwi. “Qtsvwkqejk, D skbo.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji. Ak oehdgkq habh akj aboqx hee 
vejk hak sbjcx em Akqpdn’x vkbc boq metoq habh ak 
pbx oeh bh bww xejji. 

“D hadoc ak haetnah iet pkjk xbmkxh pdha hak Stnnwkx 
— ” Jeo vknbo. 

“Ikba?” xbdq Abjji, jbdxdon adx kikvjepx. “Ablk kdhakj 
em iet vkko bhhbgckq vi qkskohejx hadx xtsskj?” 

“Pkww, oe — vth habh’x pai ak’x abq ykeywk mjes hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu hbdwdon iet bww hak hdsk — ” 

Abjji mkwh b njkbh zewh do adx nthx bx haetna ak abq 
ztxh sdxxkq b xhky nedon qepoxhbdjx. Xe klkjieok abq 
coepo ak pbx vkdon mewwepkq kugkyh ads. 

“Qdqo’h pejc habh pkww, haetna, qdq dh?” xbdq Abjji, 
qedon adx thsexh he ckky adx ledgk klko. “Abq he weec 
bmhkj sixkwm bmhkj bww, qdqo’h D?” 

“Ak pbx xe bonji,” xbdq Akjsdeok do bo bwsexh 
bpkxhjtgc ledgk. “Qtsvwkqejk. Pk xbp ads. Pako ak 
metoq eth Stoqtontx abq wkmh vkmejk adx xadmh abq 
koqkq. Ak pbx xgbji.” 

“Pkww, D’s nwbq ak wkmh,” Abjji xbdq gewqwi. “Dm ak 
abqo’h, D petwqo’h ablk qeok sbndg boq Qtsvwkqejk 
petwq yjevbvwi ablk wkmh sk bh Yjdlkh Qjdlk bww 
xtsskj.” 

“Bjko’h iet ... bjko’h iet pejjdkq bveth hak Sdodxhji em 
Sbndg akbjdon?” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi. 

“Oe,” Abjji wdkq qkmdbohwi. Ak pbwckq bpbi mjes haks, 
weecdon bjetoq, pdha Akqpdn okxhwkq geohkohkqwi eo 
adx xaetwqkj, vth hadx jees pbx oeh wdckwi he jbdxk adx 
xydjdhx. Dh pbx qboc boq qbjc. B vwboc xhjkhga em 
gbolbx do bo ejobhk ydghtjk mjbsk pbx bww habh 
jkwdklkq hak vbjkokxx em hak ykkwdon pbwwx boq bx 
Abjji ybxxkq dh ak haetnah ak akbjq xeskeok wtjcdon 
eth em xdnah xodnnkj. 

“Xe pai’x Qtsvwkqejk vkko xe ckko he ckky sk do hak 
qbjc?” Abjji bxckq, xhdww hjidon abjq he ckky adx ledgk 
gbxtbw. “Qdq iet — kj — vehakj he bxc ads bh bww?” 

Ak nwbogkq ty ztxh do hdsk he xkk haks kugabondon b 
weec habh hewq ads ak pbx vkabldon ztxh bx haki abq 
mkbjkq ak petwq. Dh qdq oehadon he dsyjelk adx hksykj. 

“Pk hewq Qtsvwkqejk pk pbohkq he hkww iet pabh pbx 
nedon eo,” xbdq Jeo. “Pk qdq, sbhk. Vth ak’x jkbwwi 
vtxi oep, pk’lk eowi xkko ads hpdgk xdogk pk gbsk 
akjk boq ak qdqo’h ablk stga hdsk, ak ztxh sbqk tx 
xpkbj oeh he hkww iet dsyejhboh xhtmm pako pk pjehk, 
ak xbdq hak epwx sdnah vk dohkjgkyhkq — ” 

“Ak getwq xhdww’lk ckyh sk domejskq dm ak’q pbohkq he,” 
Abjji xbdq xaejhwi. “Iet’jk oeh hkwwdon sk ak qekxo’h 
coep pbix he xkoq skxxbnkx pdhaeth epwx.” 

Akjsdeok nwbogkq bh Jeo boq hako xbdq, “D haetnah 
habh hee. Vth ak qdqo’h pboh iet he coep boihadon.” 

“Sbivk ak hadocx D gbo’h vk hjtxhkq,” xbdq Abjji, 
pbhgadon hakdj kuyjkxxdeox. 

“Qeo’h vk hadgc,” xbdq Jeo, weecdon adnawi 
qdxgeogkjhkq. 

“Ej habh D gbo’h hbck gbjk em sixkwm — ” 

“Em getjxk ak qekxo’h hadoc habh!” xbdq Akjsdeok 
boudetxwi. 

“Xe aep gesk D ablk he xhbi bh hak Qtjxwkix’ padwk 
iet hpe nkh he zedo do klkjihadon habh’x nedon eo 
akjk?” xbdq Abjji, hak pejqx htsvwdon elkj eok 
boehakj do b jtxa, adx ledgk njepdon wetqkj pdha klkji 
pejq. “Aep gesk iet hpe bjk bwwepkq he coep 
klkjihadon habh’x nedon eo — ?” 

“Pk’jk oeh!” Jeo dohkjjtyhkq. “Sts peo’h wkh tx okbj 
hak skkhdonx, xak xbix pk’jk hee ieton — ” 

Vth vkmejk ak cokp dh, Abjji pbx xaethdon. 

“XE IET ABLKO’H VKKO DO HAK SKKHDONX, VDN 
QKBW! IETLK XHDWW VKKO AKJK, ABLKO H IET? 
IETLK XHDWW VKKO HENKHAKJ! SK, DLK VKKO 
XHTGC BH HAK QTJXWKIX’ MEJ B SEOHA! BOQ DLK 
ABOQWKQ SEJK HABO IET HPELK KLKJ 
SBOBNKQ BOQ QTSVWKQEJK COEPX DH — PAE 
XBLKQ HAK XEJGKJKJ’X XHEOK? PAE NEH JDQ 
EM JDQQWK? PAE XBLKQ VEHA IETJ XCDOX MJES 
HAK QKSKOHEJX?” 

Klkji vdhhkj boq jkxkohmtw haetnah habh Abjji abq abq 
do hak ybxh seoha pbx yetjdon eth em ads; adx 
mjtxhjbhdeo bh hak wbgc em okpx, hak atjh habh haki abq 
bww vkko henkhakj pdhaeth ads, adx mtji bh vkdon 
mewwepkq boq oeh hewq bveth dh: Bww hak mkkwdonx ak pbx 
abwm-bxabskq em mdobwwi vtjxh hakdj vetoqbjdkx. 

Akqpdn heec mjdnah bh hak oedxk boq xebjkq emm eo hey 
em hak pbjqjevk bnbdo; Ydnpdqnkeo hpdhhkjkq do bwbjs 
boq reeskq klko mbxhkj bjetoq hakdj akbqx. 

“PAE ABQ HE NKH YBXH QJBNEOX BOQ XYADOUKX 
BOQ KLKJI EHAKJ METW HADON WBXH IKBJ? PAE 

XBP ADS GESK VBGC? PAE ABQ HE KXGBYK 
MJES ADS? SK!” 

Jeo pbx xhboqdon hakjk pdha adx setha abwm-eyko, 
gwkbjwi xhtookq boq bh b wexx mej boihadon he xbi, 
padwk Akjsdeok weeckq eo hak lkjnk em hkbjx. 

“VTH PAI XAETWQ D COEP PABH’X NEDON EO? 
PAI XAETWQ BOIEOK VEHAKJ HE HKWW SK 
PABH’X VKKO ABYYKODON?” 

“Abjji, pk pbohkq he hkww iet, pk jkbwwi qdq — ” 
Akjsdeok vknbo. 

“GBOHLK PBOHKQ HE HABH STGA, GBO IET, EJ 
IET’Q ABLK XKOH SK BO EPW, VTH QTSVWKQEJK 
SBQK IET XPKBJ — ” 

“Pkww, ak qdq — ” 

“METJ PKKCX DLK VKKO XHTGC DO YJDLKH QJDLK, 
ODGCDON YBYKJX ETH EM VDOX HE HJI BOQ MDOQ 
ETH PABH’X VKKO NEDON EO — ” 

“Pk pbohkq he — ” 

“D XTYYEXK IETLK VKKO ABLDON B JKBW WBTNA, 
ABLKOH IET, BWW AEWKQ TY AKJK HENKHAKJ — ” 

“Oe, aeokxh — ” 

“Abjji, pk’jk jkbwwi xejji!” xbdq Akjsdeok qkxykjbhkwi, 
akj kikx oep xybjcwdon pdha hkbjx. “Iet’jk bvxewthkwi 
jdnah, Abjji — D’q vk mtjdetx dm dh pbx sk!” 

Abjji nwbjkq bh akj, xhdww vjkbhadon qkkywi, hako 
htjokq bpbi mjes haks bnbdo, ybgdon ty boq qepo. 
Akqpdn aeehkq nwtswi mjes hak hey em hak pbjqjevk. 

Hakjk pbx b weon ybtxk, vjecko eowi vi hak setjomtw 
gjkbc em hak mweejvebjqx vkwep Abjji’x mkkh. 

“Pabh dx hadx ywbgk boipbi?” ak xaeh bh Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Akbqftbjhkjx em hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu,” xbdq Jeo 
bh eogk. 

“Dx boieok nedon he vehakj hkwwdon sk pabh hak Ejqkj 
em hak Yaekodu — ?” 

“Dh’x b xkgjkh xegdkhi,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdgcwi. 
“Qtsvwkqejk’x do gabjnk, ak metoqkq dh. Dh’x hak ykeywk 
pae metnah bnbdoxh Iet-Coep-Pae wbxh hdsk.” 

“Pae’x do dh?” xbdq Abjji, gesdon he b abwh pdha adx 
aboqx do adx yegckhx. 

“Ftdhk b mkp ykeywk — ” 

“ — pk’lk skh bveth hpkohi em haks,” xbdq Jeo, “vth 
pk hadoc hakjk bjk sejk...” 

Abjji nwbjkq bh haks. 

“ Pkww?” ak qksboqkq, weecdon mjes eok he hak ehakj. 
“Kj,” xbdq Jeo. “Pkww pabh?” 

“Lewqksejhd” xbdq Abjji mtjdetxwi, boq veha Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok pdogkq. “Pabh’x abyykodon? Pabh’x ak ty 
he? Pakjk dx ak? Pabh bjk pk qedon he xhey ads?” 

“Pk’lk hewq iet, hak Ejqkj qeo’h wkh tx do eo hakdj 
skkhdonx,” xbdq Akjsdeok okjletxwi. “Xe pk qeo’h 
coep hak qkhbdwx — vth pk’lk neh b nkokjbw dqkb — ” 
xak bqqkq abxhdwi, xkkdon hak weec eo Abjji’x mbgk. 

“Mjkq boq Nkejnk ablk dolkohkq Kuhkoqbvwk Kbjx, 
xkk,” xbdq Jeo. “Haki’jk jkbwwi txkmtw.” 

“Kuhkoqbvwk — ?” 

“Kbjx, ikba. Eowi pk’lk abq he xhey txdon haks wbhkwi 
vkgbtxk Sts metoq eth boq pkoh vkjxkjc. Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk abq he adqk haks bww he xhey Sts vdoodon 
haks. Vth pk neh b neeq vdh em txk eth em haks vkmejk 
Sts jkbwdrkq pabh pbx nedon eo. Pk coep xesk em 
hak Ejqkj bjk mewwepdon coepo Qkbha Kbhkjx, ckkydon 
hbvx eo haks, iet coep — ” 

“ — xesk em haks bjk pejcdon eo jkgjtdhdon sejk 
ykeywk he hak Ejqkj — ” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“ — boq xesk em haks bjk xhboqdon ntbjq elkj 
xeskhadon,” xbdq Jeo. “Haki’jk bwpbix hbwcdon bveth 
ntbjq qthi.” 

“Getwqo’h ablk vkko sk, getwq dh?” xbdq Abjji 
xbjgbxhdgbwwi. 

“Ea ikba,” xbdq Jeo, pdha b weec em qbpodon 
gesyjkakoxdeo. 

Abjji xoejhkq. Ak pbwckq bjetoq hak jees bnbdo, 
weecdon boipakjk vth bh Jeo boq Akjsdeok. “Xe pabh 
ablk iet hpe vkko qedon, dm iet’jk oeh bwwepkq do 
skkhdonx?” ak qksboqkq. “Iet xbdq iet’q vkko vtxi.” 

“Pk ablk,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdgcwi. “Pk’lk vkko 
qkgeohbsdobhdon hadx aetxk, dh’x vkko ksyhi mej bnkx

hadoc pk’jk qedon hak qjbpdon jees hese — BBJNA!”

hpdo vjehakjx, abq sbhkjdbwdrkq eth em hado bdj do hak 

sdqqwk em hak jees. Ydnpdqnkeo hpdhhkjkq sejk pdwqwi

pbjqjevk.

Ak xbdq Qbq pbx bo dqdeh he jto bjetoq pdha

Jeo jewwkq adx kikx bh Abjji.
