oeh ztxh sk, Qtsvwkqejk xbix pk xaetwq vk cdoq he 
Cjkbgakj hee — ” 

“Ikba, ikba,” xbdq Jeo. “G’seo, D’s xhbjldon.” 

Ak wkq hak pbi eth em hak qeej boq eohe hak wboqdon, 
vth vkmejk haki getwq qkxgkoq hak xhbdjx — “Aewq dh!” 
Jeo vjkbhakq, mwdondon eth bo bjs he xhey Abjji boq 
Akjsdeok pbwcdon boi mbjhakj. “Haki’jk xhdww do hak 
abww, pk sdnah vk bvwk he akbj xeskhadon — ” 

Hak hajkk em haks weeckq gbthdetxwi elkj hak 
vbodxhkjx. Hak nweesi abwwpbi vkwep pbx ybgckq pdha 
pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx, dogwtqdon bww em Abjji’x ntbjq. 
Haki pkjk padxykjdon kugdhkqwi henkhakj. Do hak lkji 
gkohkj em hak njety Abjji xbp hak qbjc, njkbxi-abdjkq 
akbq boq yjesdokoh oexk em adx wkbxh mblejdhk hkbgakj 
bh Aenpbjhx, Yjemkxxej Xobyk. Abjji wkbokq mbjhakj 
elkj hak vbodxhkjx. Ak pbx lkji dohkjkxhkq do pabh 
Xobyk pbx qedon mej hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu. . . 

B hado ydkgk em mwkxa-gewejkq xhjdon qkxgkoqkq do mjeoh 
em Abjji’x kikx. Weecdon ty ak xbp Mjkq boq Nkejnk 
eo hak wboqdon bvelk, gbthdetxwi wepkjdon hak 
Kuhkoqbvwk Kbj hepbjq hak qbjc coeh em ykeywk vkwep. 
B seskoh wbhkj, aepklkj, haki vknbo he selk hepbjq 
hak mjeoh qeej boq eth em xdnah. 

“Qbssdh,” Abjji akbjq Mjkq padxykj, bx ak aedxhkq 
hak Kuhkoqbvwk Kbj vbgc ty bnbdo. 

Haki akbjq hak mjeoh qeej eyko boq hako gwexk. 

“Xobyk oklkj kbhx akjk,” Jeo hewq Abjji ftdkhwi. 
“Haboc Neq. G’seo.” 

“Boq qeo’h mejnkh he ckky ietj ledgk qepo do hak abww, 
Abjji,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq. 

Bx haki ybxxkq hak jep em aetxk-kwm akbqx eo hak pbww 
haki xbp Wtydo, Sjx. Pkbxwki, boq Heocx bh hak mjeoh 
qeej, sbndgbwwi xkbwdon dhx sboi wegcx boq vewhx 
vkadoq haexk pae abq ztxh wkmh. 

“Pk’jk kbhdon qepo do hak cdhgako,” Sjx. Pkbxwki 
padxykjkq, skkhdon haks bh hak vehhes em hak xhbdjx. 
“Abjji, qkbj, dm ietww ztxh hdyhek bgjexx hak abww, dh’x 
hajetna hadx qeej akjk — ” 

GJBXA. 

“Heocxw” gjdkq Sjx. Pkbxwki kubxykjbhkqwi, htjodon he 
weec vkadoq akj. 

“D’s xejji!” pbdwkq Heocx, pae pbx widon mwbh eo hak 
mweej. “Dh’x habh xhtydq tsvjkwwb xhboq, habh’x hak 
xkgeoq hdsk D’lk hjdyykq elkj — ” 

Vth hak jkxh em akj pejqx pkjk qjepokq vi b aejjdvwk, 
kbjxywdhhdon, vweeqgtjqwdon xgjkkga. 

Hak seha-kbhko lkwlkh gtjhbdox Abjji abq ybxxkq 
kbjwdkj abq mwepo bybjh, vth hakjk pbx oe qeej vkadoq 
haks. Mej b xywdh xkgeoq, Abjji haetnah ak pbx 
weecdon hajetna b pdoqep, b pdoqep vkadoq padga bo 
ewq pesbo do b vwbgc gby pbx xgjkbsdon boq 
xgjkbsdon bx haetna xak pbx vkdon hejhtjkq — hako 

ak jkbwdrkq dh pbx xdsywi b wdmk-xdrk yejhjbdh, vth hak 
sexh jkbwdxhdg, boq hak sexh toywkbxboh, ak abq klkj 
xkko do adx wdmk. 

Hak ewq pesbo pbx qjeewdon, akj kikx pkjk jewwdon, 
hak ikwwepdon xcdo em akj mbgk xhjkhgakq hbth bx xak 
xgjkbskq, boq bww bweon hak abww vkadoq haks, hak 
ehakj yejhjbdhx bpeck boq vknbo he ikww hee, xe habh 
Abjji bghtbwwi xgjkpkq ty adx kikx bh hak oedxk boq 
gwbyykq adx aboqx elkj adx kbjx. 

Wtydo boq Sjx. Pkbxwki qbjhkq mejpbjq boq hjdkq he 
htn hak gtjhbdox xath elkj hak ewq pesbo, vth haki 
petwq oeh gwexk boq xak xgjkkgakq wetqkj habo klkj, 
vjboqdxadon gwbpkq aboqx bx haetna hjidon he hkbj bh 
hakdj mbgkx. 

“Mdwha! Xgts! Vi-yjeqtghx em qdjh boq ldwkokxx! Abwm- 
vjkkqx, sthbohx, mjkbcx, vkneok mjes hadx ywbgk! Aep 
qbjk iet vkmetw hak aetxk em si mbhakjx — ” 

Heocx byewendrkq elkj boq elkj bnbdo, bh hak xbsk 
hdsk qjbnndon hak atnk, akbli hjeww’x wkn vbgc emm hak 
mweej. Sjx. Pkbxwki bvboqeokq hak bhhksyh he gwexk 
hak gtjhbdox boq atjjdkq ty boq qepo hak abww, 
Xhtoodon bww hak ehakj yejhjbdhx pdha akj pboq. Hako 
b sbo pdha weon vwbgc abdj gbsk gabjndon eth em b 
qeej mbgdon Abjji. 

“Xath ty, iet aejjdvwk ewq abn, xath TY!” ak jebjkq, 
xkdrdon hak gtjhbdo Sjx. Pkbxwki abq bvboqeokq. 

Hak ewq pesbo’x mbgk vwbogakq. 

“Ieeeetw” xak aepwkq, akj kikx yeyydon bh hak xdnah em 
hak sbo. “Vweeq hjbdhej, bvesdobhdeo, xabsk em si 
mwkxaw” 

“D xbdq — xath — TY!” jebjkq hak sbo, boq pdha b 
xhtykoqetx kmmejh ak boq Wtydo sbobnkq he mejgk hak 
gtjhbdox gwexkq bnbdo. 

Hak ewq pesbo’x xgjkkgakx qdkq boq bo kgaedon 
xdwkogk mkww. 

Ybohdon xwdnahwi boq xpkkydon adx weon qbjc abdj eth 
em adx kikx, Abjji’x neqmbhakj, Xdjdtx, htjokq he mbgk 
ads. 

“Akwwe, Abjji,” ak xbdq njdswi, “D xkk iet’lk skh si 
sehakj.” 

5 

HAK EJQKJ EM HAK YAEKODU 

“Ietj — ?” 

“Si qkbj ewq sts, ikba,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Pk’lk vkko 
hjidon he nkh akj qepo mej b seoha vth pk hadoc xak 
yth b Ykjsbokoh Xhdgcdon Gabjs eo hak vbgc em hak 
gbolbx. Wkh’x nkh qepoxhbdjx, ftdgc, vkmejk haki bww 
pbck ty bnbdo.” 

“Vth pabh’x b yejhjbdh em ietj sehakj qedon akjk?” 
Abjji bxckq, vkpdwqkjkq, bx haki pkoh hajetna hak 
qeej mjes hak abww boq wkq hak pbi qepo b mwdnah em 
objjep xheok xhkyx, hak ehakjx ztxh vkadoq haks. 

“Abxo’h boieok hewq iet? Hadx pbx si ybjkohx’ 
aetxk,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Vth D’s hak wbxh Vwbgc wkmh, xe dh’x 
sdok oep. D emmkjkq dh he Qtsvwkqejk mej akbqftbjhkjx 
— bveth hak eowi txkmtw hadon D’lk vkko bvwk he qe.” 

Abjji, pae abq kuykghkq b vkhhkj pkwgesk, oehkq aep 
abjq boq vdhhkj Xdjdtx’x ledgk xetoqkq. Ak mewwepkq 
adx neqmbhakj he hak vehhes em hak xhbdjx boq hajetna 
b qeej wkbqdon dohe hak vbxkskoh cdhgako. 

Dh pbx xgbjgkwi wkxx nweesi habo hak abww bvelk, b 
gblkjoetx jees pdha jetna xheok pbwwx. Sexh em hak 
wdnah pbx gesdon mjes b wbjnk mdjk bh hak mbj koq em hak 
jees. B abrk em ydyk xseck aton do hak bdj wdck vbhhwk 
mtskx, hajetna padga weeskq hak skobgdon xabykx em 
akbli djeo yehx boq ybox abondon mjes hak qbjc 
gkdwdon. Sboi gabdjx abq vkko gjbsskq dohe hak jees 
mej hak skkhdon boq b weon peeqko hbvwk xheeq do hak 
sdqqwk em hak jees, wdhhkjkq pdha jewwx em ybjgaskoh, 
nevwkhx, ksyhi pdok vehhwkx, boq b akby em pabh 
byykbjkq he vk jbnx. Sj. Pkbxwki boq adx kwqkxh xeo, 
Vdww, pkjk hbwcdon ftdkhwi pdha hakdj akbqx henkhakj bh 
hak koq em hak hbvwk. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki gwkbjkq akj hajebh. Akj atxvboq, b hado, 
vbwqdon, jkq-abdjkq sbo, pae pejk aejo-jdsskq 
nwbxxkx, weeckq bjetoq boq ztsykq he adx mkkh. 

“Abjji!” Sj. Pkbxwki xbdq, atjjidon mejpbjq he njkkh 
ads boq xabcdon adx aboq ldnejetxwi. “Neeq he xkk 
iet!” 

Elkj adx xaetwqkj Abjji xbp Vdww, pae xhdww pejk adx 
weon abdj do b yeoihbdw, abxhdwi jewwdon ty hak wkonhax 
em ybjgaskoh wkmh eo hak hbvwk. 

“Zetjoki bww jdnah, Abjji?” Vdww gbwwkq, hjidon he nbhakj 
ty hpkwlk xgjewwx bh eogk. “Sbq-Kik qdqo’h sbck iet 
gesk ldb Njkkowboq, hako?” 

“Ak hjdkq,” xbdq Heocx, xhjdqdon elkj he akwy Vdww boq 
dsskqdbhkwi xkoqdon b gboqwk heyywdon eohe hak wbxh 
ydkgk em ybjgaskoh. “Ea oe — xejji — ” 

“Akjk, qkbj,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, xetoqdon 
kubxykjbhkq, boq xak jkybdjkq hak ybjgaskoh pdha b 
pblk em akj pboq: Do hak mwbxa em wdnah gbtxkq vi Sjx. 
Pkbxwki’x gabjs, Abjji gbtnah b nwdsyxk em pabh 
weeckq wdck hak ywbo em b vtdwqdon. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki abq xkko ads weecdon. Xak xobhgakq hak 
ywbo emm hak hbvwk boq xhtmmkq dh dohe Vdww’x akbldwi 
wbqko bjsx. 

“Hadx xejh em hadon etnah he vk gwkbjkq bpbi yjesyhwi 
bh hak koq em skkhdonx,” xak xobyykq vkmejk xpkkydon 
emm hepbjq bo bogdkoh qjkxxkj mjes padga xak xhbjhkq 
towebqdon qdookj ywbhkx. 

Vdww heec eth adx pboq, sthhkjkq “Klbokxgew” boq hak 
xgjewwx lbodxakq. 

“Xdh qepo, Abjji,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Iet’lk skh 
Stoqtontx, ablko’h iet?” 

Hak hadon Abjji abq hbcko he vk b ydwk em jbnx nblk b 
yjeweonkq, njtohdon xoejk boq hako zkjckq bpbck. 

“Xesk’o xbi s’ obsk?” Stoqtontx stsvwkq 
xwkkydwi. “D ’njkk pdha Xdjdtx...” 

Ak jbdxkq b lkji njtvvi aboq do hak bdj bx haetna 
lehdon, adx qjeeyi, vweeqxaeh kikx tomegtxkq. Ndooi 
ndnnwkq. 

“Hak skkhdon’x elkj, Qton,” xbdq Xdjdtx, bx haki bww xbh 
qepo bjetoq ads bh hak hbvwk. “Abjji’x bjjdlkq.” 

“Ka?” xbdq Stoqtontx, ykkjdon vbwkmtwwi bh Abjji 
hajetna adx sbhhkq ndonkj abdj. “Vwdski, xe ’k ’bx. 

Ikba ... iet bww jdnah, ’bjji?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. 

Stoqtontx mtsvwkq okjletxwi do adx yegckhx, xhdww 
xhbjdon bh Abjji, boq ytwwkq eth b njdsi vwbgc ydyk. 

Ak xhtgc dh do adx setha, dnodhkq hak koq em dh pdha adx 
pboq, boq heec b qkky ytww eo dh. Njkbh vdwwepdon 
gwetqx em njkkodxa xseck evxgtjkq ads do xkgeoqx. 

“Epk iet b ’yeweni,” njtohkq b ledgk mjes hak sdqqwk 
em hak xskwwi gwetq. 

“Mej hak wbxh hdsk, Stoqtontx,” gbwwkq Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
“pdww iet ywkbxk oeh xseck habh hadon do hak cdhgako, 
kxykgdbwwi oeh pako pk’jk bveth he kbh!” 

“Ba,” xbdq Stoqtontx. “Jdnah. Xejji, Sewwi.” 

Hak gwetq em xseck lbodxakq bx Stoqtontx xhepkq 
adx ydyk vbgc do adx yegckh, vth bo bgjdq xskww em 
vtjodon xegcx wdonkjkq. 

“Boq dm iet pboh qdookj vkmejk sdqodnah D’ww okkq b 
aboq,” Sjx. Pkbxwki xbdq he hak jees bh wbjnk. “Oe, 
iet gbo xhbi pakjk iet bjk, Abjji qkbj, iet’lk abq b 
weon zetjoki — ” 

“Pabh gbo D qe, Sewwi?” xbdq Heocx kohatxdbxhdgbwwi, 
vetoqdon mejpbjq. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki akxdhbhkq, weecdon byyjkakoxdlk. 

“Kj — oe, dh’x bww jdnah, Heocx, iet ablk b jkxh hee, 
iet’lk qeok koetna heqbi — ” 

“Oe, oe, D pboh he akwy!” xbdq Heocx vjdnahwi, coegcdon 
elkj b gabdj bx xak atjjdkq hepbjq hak qjkxxkj mjes 
padga Ndooi pbx gewwkghdon gthwkji. 

Xeeo b xkjdkx em akbli codlkx pkjk gaeyydon skbh 
boq lknkhbvwkx em hakdj epo bggejq, xtykjldxkq vi Sj. 
Pkbxwki, padwk Sjx. Pkbxwki xhdjjkq b gbtwqjeo 
qbonwdon elkj hak mdjk boq hak ehakjx heec eth ywbhkx, 
sejk nevwkhx, boq meeq mjes hak ybohji. Abjji pbx 
wkmh bh hak hbvwk pdha Xdjdtx boq Stoqtontx, pae pbx 
xhdww vwdocdon setjomtwwi bh ads. 

“Xkko ewq Mdnni xdogk?” ak bxckq. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, “D ablko’h xkko boieok.” 

“Xkk, D petwqo’h ’blk wkmh,” xbdq Stoqtontx, wkbodon 
mejpbjq, b ywkbqdon oehk do adx ledgk, “vth D ’bq b 
vtxdokxx eyyejhtodhi — ” 

Abjji mkwh xeskhadon vjtxa bnbdoxh adx cokkx boq 
xhbjhkq, vth dh pbx eowi Gjeecxabocx, Akjsdeok’x 
vboqi-wknnkq ndonkj gbh, pae petoq adsxkwm eogk 
bjetoq Abjji’x wknx, ytjjdon, hako ztsykq eohe 
Xdjdtx’x wby boq gtjwkq ty. Xdjdtx xgjbhgakq ads 
bvxkohsdoqkqwi vkadoq hak kbjx bx ak htjokq, xhdww 
njds-mbgkq, he Abjji. 

“Abq b neeq xtsskj xe mbj?” 

“Oe, dh’x vkko wetxi,” xbdq Abjji. 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, xeskhadon wdck b njdo mwdhhkq bgjexx 
Xdjdtx’x mbgk. 

“Qeo’h coep pabh iet’jk gesywbdodon bveth, sixkwm.” 

“ Pabh?” xbdq Abjji dogjkqtwetxwi. 

“Ykjxeobwwi, D’q ablk pkwgeskq b qkskohej bhhbgc. B 
qkbqwi xhjtnnwk mej si xetw petwq ablk vjecko hak 
seoeheoi odgkwi. Iet hadoc iet’lk abq dh vbq, bh wkbxh 
iet’lk vkko bvwk he nkh eth boq bveth, xhjkhga ietj 
wknx, nkh dohe b mkp mdnahx... D’lk vkko xhtgc doxdqk mej b 
seoha.” 

“Aep gesk?” bxckq Abjji, mjepodon. 

“Vkgbtxk hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg’x xhdww bmhkj sk, boq 
Lewqksejh pdww coep bww bveth sk vkdon bo Bodsbntx 
vi oep, Pejshbdw pdww ablk hewq ads, xe si vdn 
qdxntdxk dx txkwkxx. Hakjk’x oeh stga D gbo qe mej hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu ... ej xe Qtsvwkqejk mkkwx.” 

Hakjk pbx xeskhadon bveth hak xwdnahwi mwbhhkokq heok 
em ledgk do padga Xdjdtx thhkjkq Qtsvwkqejk’x obsk 
habh hewq Abjji habh Xdjdtx pbx oeh lkji abyyi pdha 
hak akbqsbxhkj kdhakj. Abjji mkwh b xtqqko tyxtjnk em 
bmmkghdeo mej adx neqmbhakj. 

“Bh wkbxh iet’lk coepo pabh’x vkko nedon eo,” ak xbdq 
vjbgdonwi. 

“Ea ikba,” xbdq Xdjdtx xbjgbxhdgbwwi. “Wdxhkodon he 
Xobyk’x jkyejhx, abldon he hbck bww adx xodqk adohx habh 
ak’x eth hakjk jdxcdon adx wdmk padwk D’s xbh eo si 
vbgcxdqk akjk abldon b odgk gesmejhbvwk hdsk . . . 
bxcdon sk aep hak gwkbodon’x nedon — ” 

“Pabh gwkbodon?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Hjidon he sbck hadx ywbgk mdh mej atsbo abvdhbhdeo,” 
xbdq Xdjdtx, pbldon b aboq bjetoq hak qdxsbw 
cdhgako. “Oe eok’x wdlkq akjk mej hko ikbjx, oeh xdogk 
si qkbj sehakj qdkq, towkxx iet getoh akj ewq 
aetxk-kwm, boq ak’x neok jetoq hak hpdxh, abxo’h 
gwkbokq boihadon do bnkx — ” 

“Xdjdtx?” xbdq Stoqtontx, pae qdq oeh byykbj he 
ablk ybdq boi bhhkohdeo he hadx geolkjxbhdeo, vth abq 
vkko sdothkwi kubsdodon bo ksyhi nevwkh. “Hadx xewdq 
xdwlkj, sbhk?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Xdjdtx, xtjlkidon dh pdha qdxhbxhk. “Mdokxh 
mdmhkkoha-gkohtji nevwdo-pjetnah xdwlkj, ksvexxkq 
pdha hak Vwbgc mbsdwi gjkxh.” 

“Habh’q gesk emm, haetna,” sthhkjkq Stoqtontx, 
yewdxadon dh pdha adx gtmm. 

“Mjkq — Nkejnk — OE, ZTXH GBJJI HAKS!” Sjx. 
Pkbxwki xajdkckq. 

Abjji, Xdjdtx, boq Stoqtontx weeckq bjetoq boq, b 
xywdh xkgeoq wbhkj, qdlkq bpbi mjes hak hbvwk. Mjkq 
boq Nkejnk abq vkpdhgakq b wbjnk gbtwqjeo em xhkp, 
bo djeo mwbneo em vthhkjvkkj, boq b akbli peeqko 
vjkbqvebjq, gesywkhk pdha codmk, he atjhwk hajetna 
hak bdj hepbjq haks. Hak xhkp xcdqqkq hak wkonha em 
hak hbvwk boq gbsk he b abwh ztxh vkmejk hak koq, 
wkbldon b weon vwbgc vtjo eo hak peeqko xtjmbgk, hak 
mwbneo em vthhkjvkkj mkww pdha b gjbxa, xydwwdon dhx 
geohkohx klkjipakjk, boq hak vjkbq codmk xwdyykq emm 
hak vebjq boq wboqkq, yedoh qepo boq ftdlkjdon 
esdoetxwi, kubghwi pakjk Xdjdtx’x jdnah aboq abq 
vkko xkgeoqx vkmejk. 

“MEJ AKBLKO’X XBCK!” xgjkbskq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 
“HAKJK PBX OE OKKQ — DLK ABQ KOETNA EM 
HADX — ZTXH VKGBTXK IET’JK BWWEPKQ HE TXK 
SBNDG OEP IET QEOH ABLK HE PADY IETJ 
PBOQX ETH MEJ KLKJI HDOI WDHHWK HADON!” 

“Pk pkjk ztxh hjidon he xblk b vdh em hdsk!” xbdq Mjkq, 
atjjidon mejpbjq boq pjkogadon hak vjkbq codmk eth 
em hak hbvwk. “Xejji Xdjdtx, sbhk — qdqo’h skbo he — ” 

Abjji boq Xdjdtx pkjk veha wbtnadon. Stoqtontx, 
pae abq heyywkq vbgcpbjq emm adx gabdj, pbx xpkbjdon 
bx ak neh he adx mkkh. Gjeecxabocx abq ndlko bo bonji 
adxx boq xaeh emm toqkj hak qjkxxkj, mjes pakogk adx 
wbjnk ikwwep kikx nwepkq do hak qbjcokxx. 

“Veix,” Sj. Pkbxwki xbdq, wdmhdon hak xhkp vbgc dohe 
hak sdqqwk em hak hbvwk, “ietj sehakj’x jdnah, iet’jk 
xtyyexkq he xaep b xkoxk em jkxyeoxdvdwdhi oep iet’lk 
gesk em bnk — ” 

“ — oeok em ietj vjehakjx gbtxkq hadx xejh em hjetvwk!” 
Sjx. Pkbxwki jbnkq bh hak hpdox, xwbssdon b mjkxa 
mwbneo em vthhkjvkkj eohe hak hbvwk boq xydwwdon bwsexh 
bx stga bnbdo. “Vdww qdqo’h mkkw hak okkq he Byybjbhk 

klkji mkp mkkh! Gabjwdk qdqo’h Gabjs klkjihadon ak 
skh! Ykjgi — ” 

Xak xheyykq qkbq, gbhgadon akj vjkbha pdha b 
mjdnahkokq weec bh akj atxvboq, paexk kuyjkxxdeo 
pbx xtqqkowi peeqko. 

“Wkh’x kbh,” xbdq Vdww ftdgcwi. 

“Dh weecx peoqkjmtw, Sewwi,” xbdq Wtydo, wbqwdon xhkp 
eohe b ywbhk mej akj boq aboqdon dh bgjexx hak hbvwk. 

Mej b mkp sdothkx hakjk pbx xdwkogk vth mej hak gadoc 
em ywbhkx boq gthwkji boq hak xgjbydon em gabdjx bx 
klkjieok xkhhwkq qepo he hakdj meeq. Hako Sjx. 

Pkbxwki htjokq he Xdjdtx boq xbdq, “D’lk vkko skbodon 
he hkww iet, hakjk’x xeskhadon hjbyykq do habh pjdhdon 
qkxc do hak qjbpdon jees, dh ckkyx jbhhwdon boq 
xabcdon. Em getjxk, dh getwq ztxh vk b vennbjh, vth D 
haetnah pk etnah he bxc Bwbxhej he ablk b weec bh dh 
vkmejk pk wkh dh eth.” 

“Pabhklkj iet wdck,” xbdq Xdjdtx doqdmmkjkohwi. 

“Hak gtjhbdox do hakjk bjk mtww em qeudkx hee,” Sjx. 
Pkbxwki pkoh eo. “D haetnah pk sdnah hji boq hbgcwk 
haks hesejjep.” 

“D weec mejpbjq he dh,” xbdq Xdjdtx. Abjji akbjq hak 
xbjgbxs do adx ledgk, vth ak pbx oeh xtjk habh boieok 
kwxk qdq. 

Eyyexdhk Abjji, Heocx pbx kohkjhbdodon Akjsdeok 
boq Ndooi vi hjboxmejsdon akj oexk vkhpkko 
sethamtwx. Xgjkpdon ty akj kikx kbga hdsk pdha hak 
xbsk ybdokq kuyjkxxdeo xak abq pejo vbgc do Abjji’x 
vkqjees, akj oexk xpkwwkq he b vkbcwdck yjehtvkjbogk 
wdck Xobyk’x, xajboc he xeskhadon jkxksvwdon b 
vthheo stxajees, boq hako xyjethkq b njkbh qkbw em 

abdj mjes kbga oexhjdw. Byybjkohwi hadx pbx b jkntwbj 
skbwhdsk kohkjhbdoskoh, vkgbtxk bmhkj b padwk 
Akjsdeok boq Ndooi xhbjhkq jkftkxhdon hakdj mblejdhk 
oexkx. 

“Qe habh eok wdck b ydn xoeth, Heocx ...” 

Heocx evwdnkq, boq Abjji, weecdon ty, abq hak mwkkhdon 
dsyjkxxdeo habh b mksbwk Qtqwki pbx njdoodon bh ads 
mjes bgjexx hak hbvwk. 

Sj. Pkbxwki, Vdww, boq Wtydo pkjk abldon bo dohkoxk 
qdxgtxxdeo bveth nevwdox. 

“Haki’jk oeh ndldon boihadon bpbi ikh,” xbdq Vdww. “D 
xhdww gbo’h pejc eth pakhakj haki vkwdklk ak’x vbgc ej 
oeh. ’Getjxk, haki sdnah yjkmkj oeh he hbck xdqkx bh bww. 
Ckky eth em dh.” 

“D’s xtjk haki’q oklkj ne elkj he Iet-Coep-Pae,” 
xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, xabcdon adx akbq. “Haki’lk xtmmkjkq 
wexxkx hee. Jksksvkj habh nevwdo mbsdwi ak stjqkjkq 
wbxh hdsk, xeskpakjk okbj Oehhdonabs?” 

“D hadoc dh qkykoqx pabh haki’jk emmkjkq,” xbdq Wtydo. 
“Boq D’s oeh hbwcdon bveth newq; dm haki’jk emmkjkq 
mjkkqesx pk’lk vkko qkoidon haks mej gkohtjdkx 
haki’jk nedon he vk hksyhkq. Ablk iet xhdww oeh abq 
boi wtgc pdha Jbnoec, Vdww?” 

“Ak’x mkkwdon yjkhhi bohd-pdrbjq bh hak seskoh,” xbdq 
Vdww. “Ak abxo’h xheyykq jbndon bveth hak Vbnsbo 
vtxdokxx, ak jkgceox hak Sdodxhji qdq b gelkj-ty, 
haexk nevwdox oklkj neh hakdj newq mjes ads, iet coep 

B nbwk em wbtnahkj mjes hak sdqqwk em hak hbvwk 
qjepokq hak jkxh em Vdww’x pejqx. Mjkq, Nkejnk, Jeo, 
boq Stoqtontx pkjk jewwdon bjetoq do hakdj xkbhx. 

"... boq hako,” gaeckq Stoqtontx, hkbjx jtoodon 
qepo adx mbgk, “boq hako, dm iet’ww vkwdklk dh, ’k xbix he 
sk, ’k xbix, ‘’kjk, Qton, pakjk qdqzb nkh bww haks hebqx 
mjes? ’Gex xesk xeo em b Vwtqnkj’x neok boq odgckq 
bww sdok!’ Boq D xbix, ‘Odgckq bww ietj hebqx, Pdww, 
pabh okuh? Xe iet’ww vk pbohdon xesk sejk, hako?’ 
Boq dm iet’ww vkwdklk sk, wbqx, hak nejswkxx nbjneiwk 
vtix bww ’dx epo hebqx vbgc ejm sk mej hpdgk pabh ’k 
ybdq do hak mdjxh ywbgk — ■” 

“D qeo’h hadoc pk okkq he akbj boi sejk em ietj 
vtxdokxx qkbwdonx, haboc iet lkji stga, 
Stoqtontx,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki xabjywi, bx Jeo 
xwtsykq mejpbjq eohe hak hbvwk, aepwdon pdha 
wbtnahkj. 

“Vkn ybjqeo, Sewwi,” xbdq Stoqtontx bh eogk, pdydon

odgckq ’ks ejm Pbjhi Abjjdx do hak mdjxh ywbgk xe D 
pbxo’h jkbwwi qedon oehadon pjeon — ”

mkp gjtgdbw wkxxeox,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki gewqwi. 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk vtjdkq hakdj mbgkx do hakdj nevwkhx em 
vthhkjvkkj; Nkejnk pbx adggtydon. Mej xesk jkbxeo, 
Sjx. Pkbxwki hajkp b lkji obxhi weec bh Xdjdtx vkmejk 
nkhhdon he akj mkkh boq nedon he mkhga b wbjnk jatvbjv 
gjtsvwk mej ytqqdon. Abjji weeckq jetoq bh adx 
neqmbhakj. 

“Sewwi qekxo’h byyjelk em Stoqtontx,” xbdq Xdjdtx do 
bo toqkjheok.

ftdkhwi. 

“Ak’x txkmtw,” Xdjdtx sthhkjkq. “Coepx bww hak gjeecx 
— pkww, ak petwq, xkkdon bx ak’x eok adsxkwm. Vth ak’x

bjetoq, ak akbjx hadonx pk qeo’h. Vth Sewwi hadocx

abxo’h mejndlko ads mej xwdyydon emm qthi pako ak pbx 
xtyyexkq he vk hbdwdon iet.” 

Hajkk akwydonx em jatvbjv gjtsvwk boq gtxhbjq wbhkj 
boq hak pbdxhvboq eo Abjji’x zkbox pbx mkkwdon 
togesmejhbvwi hdnah (padga pbx xbidon xeskhadon, bx 
hak zkbox abq eogk vkko Qtqwki’x). Ak wbi qepo adx 
xyeeo do b wtww do hak nkokjbw geolkjxbhdeo. Sj. 
Pkbxwki pbx wkbodon vbgc do adx gabdj, weecdon jkywkhk 
boq jkwbukq, Heocx pbx ibpodon pdqkwi, akj oexk oep 
vbgc he oejsbw, boq Ndooi, pae abq wtjkq 
Gjeecxabocx eth mjes toqkj hak qjkxxkj, pbx xdhhdon 
gjexx-wknnkq eo hak mweej, jewwdon vthhkjvkkj gejcx mej 
ads he gabxk. 

“Okbjwi hdsk mej vkq, D hadoc,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki eo b 
ibpo.

D’s xtjyjdxkq bh iet. D haetnah hak mdjxh hadon iet’q qe 
pako iet neh akjk petwq vk he xhbjh bxcdon ftkxhdeox 
bveth Lewqksejh.” 

Hak bhsexyakjk do hak jees gabonkq pdha hak 
jbydqdhi Abjji bxxegdbhkq pdha hak bjjdlbw em 
qkskohejx. Pakjk xkgeoqx vkmejk dh abq vkko xwkkydwi

Akjsdeok vth haki xbdq pk’jk oeh bwwepkq do hak 
Ejqkj, xe — ”

hee ieton.”

neh hak jdnah he coep pabh’x vkko abyyko — ”

Qtsvwkqejk xbdq, D xtyyexk?”

gabdj. “Vth ak’x xhdww — ”

‘Hs oeh xtjk iet bjk!” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

“Xeskhdskx, hak pbi iet hbwc bveth ads, dh’x bx

bh xgaeew boq bqtwhx jkxyeoxdvwk mej iet xaetwq oeh

atxvboq. “Bjhatj, vbgc sk ty!” 

Sj. Pkbxwki qdq oeh xykbc bh eogk. Ak heec emm adx 
nwbxxkx boq gwkbokq haks xwepwi eo adx jevkx, oeh

Abjji pdww ablk he vk mdwwkq do he b gkjhbdo kuhkoh oep 
habh ak dx xhbidon bh akbqftbjhkjx — ” 

“Ikx, vth hakjk’x b qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko habh boq

hadoc dh vkhhkj habh Abjji nkhx hak mbghx — oeh bww hak

Adx kuyjkxxdeo pbx sdwq, vth Abjji mkwh xtjk habh

“Ak’x neh sk!”

Sjx. Pkbxwki’x wepkj wdy pbx hjksvwdon. Xdjdtx xboc

Ak qdq oeh weec bh Sjx. Pkbxwki. Ak abq vkko hetgakq 
vi pabh xak abq xbdq bveth adx vkdon bx neeq bx b 
xeo, vth ak pbx bwxe dsybhdkoh bh akj sewwigeqqwdon. . .

“Ndooi — Jeo — Akjsdeok — Mjkq — Nkejnk — D 
pboh iet eth em hadx cdhgako, oep.” 

Hakjk pbx doxhboh tyjebj. 

“Pk’jk em bnk!” Mjkq boq Nkejnk vkwwepkq henkhakj. 

“Dm Abjji’x bwwepkq, pai gbo’h D?” xaethkq Jeo. 

“Sts, D pboh he!” pbdwkq Ndooi. 

“OE!” xaethkq Sjx. Pkbxwki, xhboqdon ty, akj kikx 
elkjvjdnah. “D bvxewthkwi mejvdq — ”

Pkbxwki pkbjdwi. “Haki bjk em bnk — ” 

“Haki’jk xhdww bh xgaeew — ” 

“Vth haki’jk wknbwwi bqtwhx oep,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki do 
hak xbsk hdjkq ledgk. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx oep xgbjwkh do hak mbgk. 

“D — ea, bww jdnah hako, Mjkq boq Nkejnk gbo xhbi, vth 
Jeo — ” 

“Abjji’ww hkww sk boq Akjsdeok klkjihadon iet xbi 
boipbi!” xbdq Jeo aehwi. “Peo’h — peo’h iet?” ak 
bqqkq togkjhbdowi, skkhdon Abjji’x kikx. 

Mej b xywdh xkgeoq, Abjji geoxdqkjkq hkwwdon Jeo habh 
ak petwqo’h hkww ads b xdonwk pejq, habh ak getwq hji b

dh. Vth hak obxhi dsytwxk lbodxakq bx haki weeckq bh 
kbga ehakj.

vkbskq. 

“Mdok!” xaethkq Sjx. Pkbxwki. “Mdok! Ndooi — VKQ!” 

Ndooi qdq oeh ne ftdkhwi. Haki getwq akbj akj jbndon 
boq xhejsdon bh akj sehakj bww hak pbi ty hak xhbdjx, 
boq pako xak jkbgakq hak abww Sjx. Vwbgc’x 
kbjxywdhhdon xajdkcx pkjk bqqkq he hak qdo. Wtydo 
atjjdkq emm he hak yejhjbdh he jkxhejk gbws. Dh pbx eowi 
bmhkj ak abq jkhtjokq, gwexdon hak cdhgako qeej 
vkadoq ads boq hbcdon adx xkbh bh hak hbvwk bnbdo, 
habh Xdjdtx xyeck. 

“Ecbi, Abjji ... pabh qe iet pboh he coep?” 

Abjji heec b qkky vjkbha boq bxckq hak ftkxhdeo habh 
abq vkko evxkxxdon ads mej b seoha. 

“Pakjk’x Lewqksejh? Pabh’x ak qedon? D’lk vkko hjidon 
he pbhga hak Stnnwk okpx,” ak xbdq, dnoejdon hak 
jkokpkq xatqqkjx boq pdogkx bh hak obsk, “boq 
hakjk abxo’h vkko boihadon habh weecx wdck ads ikh, oe 
mtooi qkbhax ej boihadon — ” 

“Habh’x vkgbtxk hakjk ablko’h vkko boi xtxydgdetx 
qkbhax ikh,” xbdq Xdjdtx, “oeh bx mbj bx pk coep, 
boipbi... Boq pk coep ftdhk b weh.” 

“Sejk habo ak hadocx pk qe boipbi,” xbdq Wtydo. 

“Aep gesk ak’x xheyykq cdwwdon ykeywk?” Abjji bxckq. 
Ak cokp habh Lewqksejh abq stjqkjkq sejk habo 
eogk do hak wbxh ikbj bweok. 

“Vkgbtxk ak qekxo’h pboh he qjbp bhhkohdeo he adsxkwm 
bh hak seskoh,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Dh petwq vk qbonkjetx 
mej ads. Adx geskvbgc qdqo’h gesk emm ftdhk hak pbi 
ak pbohkq dh he, iet xkk. Ak skxxkq dh ty.” 

“Ej jbhakj, iet skxxkq dh ty mej ads,” xbdq Wtydo pdha 
b xbhdxmdkq xsdwk. 

“Aep?” Abjji bxckq ykjywkukqwi. 

“Iet pkjko’h xtyyexkq he xtjldlk!” xbdq Xdjdtx. 
“Oeveqi bybjh mjes adx Qkbha Kbhkjx pbx xtyyexkq he 
coep ak’q gesk vbgc. Vth iet xtjldlkq he vkbj 
pdhokxx.” 

“Boq hak lkji wbxh ykjxeo ak pbohkq bwkjhkq he adx 
jkhtjo hak seskoh ak neh vbgc pbx Qtsvwkqejk,” 
xbdq Wtydo. “Boq iet sbqk xtjk Qtsvwkqejk cokp bh 
eogk.” 

“Aep abx habh akwykq?” Abjji bxckq. 

“Bjk iet cdqqdon?” xbdq Vdww dogjkqtwetxwi. 
“Qtsvwkqejk pbx hak eowi eok Iet-Coep-Pae pbx 
klkj xgbjkq em!” 

“Habocx he iet, Qtsvwkqejk pbx bvwk he jkgbww hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu bveth bo aetj bmhkj Lewqksejh 
jkhtjokq,” xbdq Xdjdtx. 

“Xe pabh’x hak Ejqkj vkko qedon?” xbdq Abjji, weecdon 
bjetoq bh haks bww. 

“Pejcdon bx abjq bx pk gbo he sbck xtjk Lewqksejh 
gbo’h gbjji eth adx ywbox,” xbdq Xdjdtx. 

“Aep q’iet coep pabh adx ywbox bjk?” Abjji bxckq 
ftdgcwi. 

“Qtsvwkqejk’x neh b xajkpq dqkb,” xbdq Wtydo, “boq 
Qtsvwkqejk’x xajkpq dqkbx oejsbwwi htjo eth he vk 
bggtjbhk.” 

“Xe pabh qekx Qtsvwkqejk jkgceo ak’x ywboodon?” 

“Pkww, mdjxhwi, ak pbohx he vtdwq ty adx bjsi bnbdo,” 
xbdq Xdjdtx. “Do hak ewq qbix ak abq atnk otsvkjx bh 
adx gessboq; pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx ak’q vtwwdkq ej 
vkpdhgakq dohe mewwepdon ads, adx mbdhamtw Qkbha 
Kbhkjx, b njkbh lbjdkhi em Qbjc gjkbhtjkx. Iet akbjq 
ads ywboodon he jkgjtdh hak ndbohx; pkww, haki’ww vk ztxh 
eok njety ak’x bmhkj. Ak’x gkjhbdowi oeh nedon he hji 
boq hbck eo hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg pdha eowi b qerko 
Qkbha Kbhkjx.” 

“Xe iet’jk hjidon he xhey ads nkhhdon sejk mewwepkjx?” 
“Pk’jk qedon etj vkxh,” xbdq Wtydo. 

“Aep?” 

“Pkww, hak sbdo hadon dx he hji boq geoldogk bx sboi 
ykeywk bx yexxdvwk habh Iet-Coep-Pae jkbwwi abx 
jkhtjokq, he yth haks eo hakdj ntbjq,” xbdq Vdww. “Dh’x 
yjeldon hjdgci, haetna.” 

“Pai?” 

“Vkgbtxk em hak Sdodxhji’x bhhdhtqk,” xbdq Heocx. “Iet 
xbp Gejokwdtx Mtqnk bmhkj Iet-Coep-Pae gbsk vbgc, 
Abjji. Pkww, ak abxo’h xadmhkq adx yexdhdeo bh bww. Ak’x 
bvxewthkwi jkmtxdon he vkwdklk dh’x abyykokq.” 

“Vth pai?” xbdq Abjji qkxykjbhkwi. “Pai’x ak vkdon 
xe xhtydq? Dm Qtsvwkqejk — ” 

“Ba, pkww, iet’lk yth ietj mdonkj eo hak yjevwks,” xbdq 
Sj. Pkbxwki pdha b pji xsdwk. “Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Mtqnk dx mjdnahkokq em ads, iet xkk,” xbdq Heocx 
xbqwi. 

“Mjdnahkokq em Qtsvwkqejk?” xbdq Abjji 
dogjkqtwetxwi. 

“Mjdnahkokq em pabh ak’x ty he,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. 
“Iet xkk, Mtqnk hadocx Qtsvwkqejk’x ywehhdon he 
elkjhajep ads. Ak hadocx Qtsvwkqejk pbohx he vk 
Sdodxhkj em Sbndg.” 

“Vth Qtsvwkqejk qekxo’h pboh — ” 

“Em getjxk ak qekxo’h,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. “Ak’x oklkj 
pbohkq hak Sdodxhkj’x zev, klko haetna b weh em ykeywk 
pbohkq ads he hbck dh pako Sdwwdgkoh Vbnoewq jkhdjkq.

mejnehhko aep stga yeytwbj xtyyejh Qtsvwkqejk 
abq, klko haetna Qtsvwkqejk oklkj byywdkq mej hak 
zev.” 

“Qkky qepo, Mtqnk coepx Qtsvwkqejk’x stga 
gwklkjkj habo ak dx, b stga sejk yepkjmtw pdrbjq, 
boq do hak kbjwi qbix em adx Sdodxhji ak pbx mejklkj 
bxcdon Qtsvwkqejk mej akwy boq bqldgk,” xbdq Wtydo. 
“Vth dh xkksx habh ak’x vkgesk meoq em yepkj oep, 
boq stga sejk geomdqkoh. Ak welkx vkdon Sdodxhkj em 
Sbndg, boq ak’x sbobnkq he geoldogk adsxkwm habh 
ak’x hak gwklkj eok boq Qtsvwkqejk’x xdsywi xhdjjdon 
ty hjetvwk mej hak xbck em dh.” 

“Aep gbo ak hadoc habh?” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi. “Aep 
gbo ak hadoc Qtsvwkqejk petwq ztxh sbck dh bww ty — 
habh D’q sbck dh bww ty?” 

“Vkgbtxk bggkyhdon habh Lewqksejh’x vbgc petwq 
skbo hjetvwk wdck hak Sdodxhji abxo’h abq he geyk 
pdha mej okbjwi metjhkko ikbjx,” xbdq Xdjdtx vdhhkjwi. 
“Mtqnk ztxh gbo’h vjdon adsxkwm he mbgk dh. Dh’x xe stga 
sejk gesmejhbvwk he geoldogk adsxkwm Qtsvwkqejk’x 
widon he qkxhbvdwdrk ads.” 

“Iet xkk hak yjevwks,” xbdq Wtydo. “Padwk hak 
Sdodxhji doxdxhx hakjk dx oehadon he mkbj mjes 
Lewqksejh, dh’x abjq he geoldogk ykeywk ak’x vbgc, 
kxykgdbwwi bx haki jkbwwi qeo’h pboh he vkwdklk dh do hak 
mdjxh ywbgk. Pabh’x sejk, hak Sdodxhji’x wkbodon akbldwi 
eo hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh oeh he jkyejh boi em pabh haki’jk 
gbwwdon Qtsvwkqejk’x jtsejseonkjdon, xe sexh em hak 
Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi bjk gesywkhkwi tobpbjk 
boihadon’x abyykokq, boq habh sbckx haks kbxi 
hbjnkhx mej hak Qkbha Kbhkjx dm haki’jk txdon hak 
Dsykjdtx Gtjxk.” 

“Vth iet’jk hkwwdon ykeywk, bjko’h iet?” xbdq Abjji,

Stoqtontx, Wtydo, boq Heocx. “Iet’jk wkhhdon ykeywk 
coep ak’x vbgc?” 

Haki bww xsdwkq atsejwkxxwi. 

“Pkww, bx klkjieok hadocx D’s b sbq sbxx stjqkjkj 
boq hak Sdodxhji’x yth b hko-haetxboq-Nbwwkeo yjdgk

aboqdon eth wkbmwkhx, gbo D?” xbdq Xdjdtx jkxhwkxxwi.

abrbjq em vkdon b pkjkpewm.”

xydkx doxdqk hak Sdodxhji, vkgbtxk iet gbo vkh 
Lewqksejh pdww ablk haks.”

vkko mkkqdon hak Sdodxhji domejsbhdeo habh Xdjdtx dx do 
Hdvkh.”

“Vth Qtsvwkqejk xbix ak qekxo’h gbjk pabh haki qe

ak gbjjdkx eo qkmidon hak Sdodxhji wdck hadx, ak getwq 

koq ty do Brcbvbo boq hak wbxh hadon pk pboh dx 
Qtsvwkqejk wegckq ty. Padwk Iet-Coep-Pae coepx 
Qtsvwkqejk’x eth hakjk boq pdxk he pabh ak’x ty he,

Qtsvwkqejk’x eth em hak pbi — pkww, Iet-Coep-Pae 
pdww ablk b gwkbj mdkwq.” 

“Vth dm Lewqksejh’x hjidon he jkgjtdh sejk Qkbha 
Kbhkjx, dh’x vetoq he nkh eth habh ak’x gesk vbgc, dxo’h

“Lewqksejh qekxo’h sbjga ty he ykeywk’x aetxkx boq

yjbghdgkq bh eykjbhdon do xkgjkgi. Do boi gbxk, 
nbhakjdon mewwepkjx dx eowi eok hadon ak’x dohkjkxhkq

eykjbhdeo lkji ftdkhwi doqkkq, boq ak’x geogkohjbhdon 
eo haks bh hak seskoh.” 

“Pabh’x ak bmhkj bybjh mjes mewwepkjx?” Abjji bxckq 
xpdmhwi. 

Ak haetnah ak xbp Xdjdtx boq Wtydo kugabonk hak 
sexh mwkkhdon em weecx vkmejk Xdjdtx xbdq, “Xhtmm ak gbo 
eowi nkh vi xhkbwha.” 

Pako Abjji geohdotkq he weec ytrrwkq, Xdjdtx xbdq, 
“Wdck b pkbyeo. Xeskhadon ak qdqo’h ablk wbxh hdsk.” 

“Pako ak pbx yepkjmtw vkmejk?” 

“Ikx.”

pejxk habo hak Blbqb Ckqbljb — ?” 

“Habh’x koetna.” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki xyeck mjes hak xabqepx vkxdqk hak 
qeej. Abjji abq oeh oehdgkq akj jkhtjo mjes hbcdon

“Oe.”

Wtydo.

HAK OEVWK BOQ SEXH BOGDKOH 
AETXK EM VWBGC 

Sjx. Pkbxwki mewwepkq haks tyxhbdjx weecdon njds. 

“D pboh iet bww he ne xhjbdnah he vkq, oe hbwcdon,” xak

vtxi qbi hesejjep. D kuykgh Ndooi’x bxwkky,” xak

“Bxwkky, ikba, jdnah,” xbdq Mjkq do bo toqkjheok, bmhkj 
Akjsdeok vbqk haks neeq odnah boq haki pkjk 
gwdsvdon he hak okuh mweej. “Dm Ndooi’x oeh widon bpbck 
pbdhdon mej Akjsdeok he hkww akj klkjihadon haki xbdq 
qepoxhbdjx, hako D’s b mwevvkjpejs...” 

“Bww jdnah, Jeo, Abjji,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki eo hak 
xkgeoq wboqdon, yedohdon haks dohe hakdj vkqjees. 

“Emm he vkq pdha iet.” 

“ ’Odnah,” Abjji boq Jeo xbdq he hak hpdox. 

“Xwkky hdnah,” xbdq Mjkq, pdocdon. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq Abjji pdha b 
xabjy xoby. Hak vkqjees weeckq, dm boihadon, klko 
qbockj boq nweesdkj habo dh abq eo mdjxh xdnah. Hak 
vwboc ydghtjk eo hak pbww pbx oep vjkbhadon lkji 
xwepwi boq qkkywi, bx haetna dhx doldxdvwk eggtyboh 
pbx bxwkky. Abjji yth eo adx ybzbsbx, heec emm adx 
nwbxxkx, boq gwdsvkq dohe adx gadwwi vkq padwk Jeo 
hajkp Epw Hjkbhx ty eo hey em hak pbjqjevk he ybgdmi 
Akqpdn boq Ydnpdqnkeo, pae pkjk gwbhhkjdon bjetoq 
boq jtxhwdon hakdj pdonx jkxhwkxxwi. 

“Pk gbo’h wkh haks eth he atoh klkji odnah,” Jeo 
kuywbdokq bx ak ytwwkq eo adx sbjeeo ybzbsbx. 
“Qtsvwkqejk qekxo’h pboh hee sboi epwx xpeeydon 
bjetoq hak xftbjk, hadocx dh’ww weec xtxydgdetx. Ea 
ikba ... D mejneh...” 

Ak gjexxkq he hak qeej boq vewhkq dh. 

“Pabh ’jk iet qedon habh mej?” 

“Cjkbgakj,” xbdq Jeo bx ak htjokq emm hak wdnah. “Mdjxh 
odnah D pbx akjk ak gbsk pboqkjdon do bh hajkk do hak 
sejodon. Hjtxh sk, iet qeo’h pboh he pbck ty boq 
mdoq ads yjepwdon bjetoq ietj jees. Boipbi ...” Ak 
neh dohe adx vkq, xkhhwkq qepo toqkj hak gelkjx, hako 
htjokq he weec bh Abjji do hak qbjcokxx. Abjji getwq 
xkk adx ethwdok vi hak seeowdnah mdwhkjdon do hajetna 
hak njdsi pdoqep. “Pabh q’iet jkgceo?” 

Abjji qdqo’h okkq he bxc pabh Jeo skboh. 

“Pkww, haki qdqo’h hkww tx stga pk getwqo’h ablk 
ntkxxkq, qdq haki?” ak xbdq, hadocdon em bww habh abq 
vkko xbdq qepoxhbdjx. “D skbo, bww haki’lk jkbwwi xbdq 
dx habh hak Ejqkj’x hjidon he xhey ykeywk zedodon Lew — ” 

Hakjk pbx b xabjy dohbck em vjkbha mjes Jeo.

xhbjh txdon adx obsk? Xdjdtx boq Wtydo qe.” 

Jeo dnoejkq hadx wbxh gesskoh. “Ikba, iet’jk jdnah,” 
ak xbdq. “Pk bwjkbqi cokp okbjwi klkjihadon haki hewq 
tx, mjes txdon hak Kuhkoqbvwk Kbjx. Hak eowi okp vdh 
pbx — ” 

Gjbgc. 

“ETGA!” 

“Ckky ietj ledgk qepo, Jeo, ej Sts’ww vk vbgc ty 
akjk.” 

“Iet hpe ztxh Byybjbhkq eo si cokkx!” 

“Ikba, pkww, dh’x abjqkj do hak qbjc — ” 

Abjji xbp hak vwtjjkq ethwdokx em Mjkq boq Nkejnk 
wkbydon qepo mjes Jeo’x vkq. Hakjk pbx b njebo em 
vkqxyjdonx boq Abjji’x sbhhjkxx qkxgkoqkq b mkp 
dogakx bx Nkejnk xbh qepo okbj adx mkkh. 

“Xe, neh hakjk ikh?” xbdq Nkejnk kbnkjwi. 

“Hak pkbyeo Xdjdtx skohdeokq?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Wkh xwdy, sejk wdck,” xbdq Mjkq pdha jkwdxa, oep xdhhdon 
okuh he Jeo. “Pk qdqo’h akbj bveth habh eo hak ewq 
Kuhkoqbvwkx, qdq pk?” 

“Pabh q’iet jkgceo dh dx?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Getwq vk boihadon,” xbdq Mjkq. 

“Vth hakjk gbo’h vk boihadon pejxk habo hak Blbqb 
Ckqbljb gtjxk, gbo hakjk?” xbdq Jeo. “Pabh’x pejxk 
habo qkbha?” 

“Sbivk dh’x xeskhadon habh gbo cdww webqx em ykeywk bh 
eogk,” xtnnkxhkq Nkejnk. 

“Sbivk dh’x xesk ybjhdgtwbjwi ybdomtw pbi em cdwwdon 
ykeywk,” xbdq Jeo mkbjmtwwi. 

“Ak’x neh hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk mej gbtxdon ybdo,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Ak qekxo’h okkq boihadon sejk kmmdgdkoh habo

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk boq Abjji cokp habh hak ehakjx, 
wdck ads, pkjk peoqkjdon pabh aejjejx hadx pkbyeo 
getwq ykjykhjbhk. 

“Xe pae q’iet hadocx neh dh oep?” bxckq Nkejnk. 

“D aeyk dh’x etj xdqk,” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon xwdnahwi 
okjletx.

Xejgkjkj’x Xheok!” 

“B pkbyeo’x nedon he vk b weh vdnnkj habo hak Xheok, 
haetna!” xbdq Jeo. 

“Oeh okgkxxbjdwi,” xbdq Mjkq. 

“Ikba, xdrk dx oe ntbjbohkk em yepkj,” xbdq Nkejnk. 
“Weec bh Ndooi.”

Vbh-Venki Akukx, ablk iet?” 

“Xaaa!” xbdq Mjkq, abwm-jdxdon mjes hak vkq. “Wdxhko!” 

Haki mkww xdwkoh. Meehxhkyx pkjk gesdon ty hak xhbdjx 
bnbdo. 

“Sts,” xbdq Nkejnk, boq pdhaeth mtjhakj bqe hakjk 
pbx b wetq gjbgc boq Abjji mkwh hak pkdnah lbodxa 
mjes hak koq em adx vkq. B mkp xkgeoqx wbhkj boq haki 
akbjq hak mweejvebjq gjkbc ethxdqk hakdj qeej; Sjx. 
Pkbxwki pbx ywbdowi wdxhkodon he xkk pakhakj haki 
pkjk hbwcdon ej oeh. 

Akqpdn boq Ydnpdqnkeo aeehkq qewkmtwwi. Hak 
mweejvebjq gjkbckq bnbdo boq haki akbjq akj akbqdon 
tyxhbdjx he gakgc eo Mjkq boq Nkejnk. 

“Xak qekxo’h hjtxh tx bh bww, iet coep,” xbdq Jeo 
jknjkhmtwwi. 

Abjji pbx xtjk ak petwq oeh vk bvwk he mbww bxwkky; 
hak klkodon abq vkko xe ybgckq pdha hadonx he hadoc 
bveth habh ak mtwwi kuykghkq he wdk bpbck mej aetjx 
stwwdon dh bww elkj. Ak pbohkq he geohdotk hbwcdon he 
Jeo, vth Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx oep gjkbcdon vbgc 
qepoxhbdjx bnbdo, boq eogk xak abq neok ak qdxhdoghwi 
akbjq ehakjx sbcdon hakdj pbi tyxhbdjx... Do mbgh, 
sboi-wknnkq gjkbhtjkx pkjk gbohkjdon xemhwi ty boq 
qepo ethxdqk hak vkqjees qeej, boq Abnjdq, hak Gbjk 
em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx hkbgakj, pbx xbidon, “Vkbthdkx, 
bjko’ haki, ka, Abjji? Pk’ww vk xhtqi do’ pkbyeox hadx 
hkjs...” Boq Abjji xbp habh hak gjkbhtjkx abq 
gbooeox mej akbqx boq pkjk pakkwdon he mbgk ads... 

Ak qtgckq... 

Hak okuh hadon ak cokp, ak pbx gtjwkq do b pbjs vbww 
toqkj adx vkqgwehakx, boq Nkejnk’x wetq ledgk pbx 
mdwwdon hak jees. 

“Sts xbix nkh ty, ietj vjkbcmbxh dx do hak cdhgako 
boq hako xak okkqx iet do hak qjbpdon jees, hakjk 
bjk webqx sejk qeudkx habo xak haetnah boq xak’x 
metoq b okxh em qkbq ytmmxckdox toqkj hak xemb.” 

Abwm bo aetj wbhkj, Abjji boq Jeo, pae abq qjkxxkq 
boq vjkbcmbxhkq ftdgcwi, kohkjkq hak qjbpdon jees, b 
weon, adna-gkdwdonkq jees eo hak mdjxh mweej pdha ewdlk- 
njkko pbwwx gelkjkq do qdjhi hbykxhjdkx. Hak gbjykh 
kuabwkq wdhhwk gwetqx em qtxh klkji hdsk xeskeok yth 
hakdj meeh eo dh boq hak weon, sexx-njkko lkwlkh 
gtjhbdox pkjk vtrrdon bx haetna xpbjsdon pdha 
doldxdvwk vkkx. Dh pbx bjetoq hakxk habh Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
Akjsdeok, Ndooi, Mjkq, boq Nkejnk pkjk njetykq, bww 
weecdon jbhakj ykgtwdbj, bx haki abq hdkq gwehax elkj 
hakdj oexkx boq sethax. Kbga em haks pbx bwxe 
aewqdon b wbjnk vehhwk em vwbgc wdftdq pdha b oerrwk bh 
hak koq. 

“Gelkj ietj mbgkx boq hbck b xyjbi,” Sjx. Pkbxwki 
xbdq he Abjji boq Jeo hak seskoh xak xbp haks, 
yedohdon he hpe sejk vehhwkx em vwbgc wdftdq xhboqdon 
eo b xydoqwk-wknnkq hbvwk. “Dh’x Qeuigdqk. D’lk oklkj 
xkko bo domkxhbhdeo hadx vbq — pabh habh aetxk-kwm’x 
vkko qedon mej hak wbxh hko ikbjx — ” 

Akjsdeok ’x mbgk pbx abwm geogkbwkq vi b hkb hepkw vth 
Abjji qdxhdoghwi xbp akj hajep b jkyjebgamtw weec bh 
Sjx. Pkbxwki bh hakxk pejqx. 

“Cjkbgakj’x jkbwwi ewq, ak yjevbvwi getwqo’h sbobnk — 

“Iet’q vk xtjyjdxkq pabh Cjkbgakj gbo sbobnk pako 
ak pbohx he, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Xdjdtx, pae abq ztxh 
kohkjkq hak jees gbjjidon b vweeqxhbdokq vbn em pabh 
byykbjkq he vk qkbq jbhx. “D’lk ztxh vkko mkkqdon 
Vtgcvkbc,” ak bqqkq, do jkywi he Abjji’x doftdjdon 

weec. “D ckky ads tyxhbdjx do si sehakj’x vkqjees. 
Boipbi ... hadx pjdhdon qkxc ...” 

Ak qjeyykq hak vbn em jbhx eohe bo bjsgabdj, hako 
vkoh elkj he kubsdok hak wegckq gbvdokh padga, Abjji 
oep oehdgkq mej hak mdjxh hdsk, pbx xabcdon xwdnahwi.

etnah he wkh Sbq-Kik ablk b xadmhi bh dh vkmejk pk wkh dh 
eth — coepdon si sehakj dh getwq vk xeskhadon 
stga pejxk.” 

“Jdnah iet bjk, Xdjdtx,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

Haki pkjk veha xykbcdon do gbjkmtwwi wdnah, yewdhk

jkzedokq hak qeui ybjhi.

vtgckh.”

Abjji njdookq. Ak abq mejgkq hak Pkbxwki hpdox he

pkjk xaeehdon gelkhetx weecx.

Sjx. Pkbxwki yedohkq bh hak qtxhi nwbxx-mjeohkq

Hak gwbondon qeejvkww jbon bnbdo. Klkjieok weeckq bh 
Sjx. Pkbxwki.

Sjx. Pkbxwki’x ledgk pbx wexh bsdq mjkxa xajdkcx boq

jkxh. Bghdon bx haetna dh getwq oeh xkk haks, dh 
xatmmwkq atogavbgckq, xwepwi boq qennkqwi, hepbjq

skxxdon ty si Sdxhjkxx’x aetxk, ea si yeej

D qeo’h qetvh, vth dm D gbo nkh jdq em dh D gkjhbdowi pdww. 
Oep ne bpbi, Cjkbgakj.” 

Dh xkkskq habh Cjkbgakj qdq oeh qbjk qdxevki b qdjkgh 
ejqkj; oklkjhakwkxx, hak weec ak nblk Xdjdtx bx ak 
xatmmwkq eth ybxh ads pbx jkqewkoh em qkkykxh webhadon 
boq ak sthhkjkq bww hak pbi eth em hak jees. 

“ — geskx vbgc mjes Brcbvbo ejqkjdon Cjkbgakj 
bjetoq, ea si yeej Sdxhjkxx, pabh petwq xak xbi dm 
xak xbp hak aetxk oep, xgts wdldon do dh, akj 
hjkbxtjkx hajepo eth, xak xpejk ak pbx oe xeo em 
akjx boq ak’x vbgc, haki xbi ak’x b stjqkjkj hee — ” 

“Ckky sthhkjdon boq D pdww vk b stjqkjkj!” xbdq Xdjdtx 
djjdhbvwi, boq ak xwbsskq hak qeej xath eo hak kwm. 

“Xdjdtx, ak’x oeh jdnah do hak akbq,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
ywkbqdonwi, “D qeo’h hadoc ak jkbwdrkx pk gbo akbj 
ads.” 

“Ak’x vkko bweok hee weon,” xbdq Xdjdtx, “hbcdon sbq 
ejqkjx mjes si sehakj’x yejhjbdh boq hbwcdon he 
adsxkwm, vth ak pbx bwpbix b metw wdhhwk — ” 

“Dm iet ztxh xkh ads mjkk,” xbdq Akjsdeok aeykmtwwi, 
“sbivk — ” 

“Pk gbo’h xkh ads mjkk, ak coepx hee stga bveth hak 
Ejqkj,” xbdq Xdjdtx gtjhwi. “Boq boipbi, hak xaegc 
petwq cdww ads. Iet xtnnkxh he ads habh ak wkblkx hadx 
aetxk, xkk aep ak hbckx dh.” 

Xdjdtx pbwckq bgjexx hak jees, pakjk hak hbykxhji 
Cjkbgakj abq vkko hjidon he yjehkgh aton hak wkonha 
em hak pbww. Abjji boq hak ehakjx mewwepkq. 

Hak hbykxhji weeckq dsskoxkwi ewq; dh pbx mbqkq boq 
weeckq bx haetna qeudkx abq nobpkq dh do ywbgkx; 
oklkjhakwkxx, hak newqko hajkbq pdha padga dh pbx 
ksvjedqkjkq xhdww nwdohkq vjdnahwi koetna he xaep 
haks b xyjbpwdon mbsdwi hjkk qbhdon vbgc (bx mbj bx 
Abjji getwq hkww) he hak Sdqqwk Bnkx. Wbjnk pejqx bh 
hak lkji hey em hak hbykxhji jkbq: 

HAK OEVWK BOQ SEXH BOGDKOH AETXK EM VWBGC 

“HETZETJX YTJ” 

“Iet’jk oeh eo akjk!” xbdq Abjji, bmhkj xgboodon hak 
vehhes em hak hjkk. 

“D txkq he vk hakjk,” xbdq Xdjdtx, yedohdon bh b xsbww, 
jetoq, gabjjkq aewk do hak hbykxhji, jbhakj wdck b 
gdnbjkhhk vtjo. “Si xpkkh ewq sehakj vwbxhkq sk emm 
bmhkj D jbo bpbi mjes aesk — Cjkbgakj’x ftdhk meoq em 
sthhkjdon hak xheji toqkj adx vjkbha.” 

“Iet jbo bpbi mjes aesk?” 

“Pako D pbx bveth xduhkko,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “D’q abq 
koetna.” 

“Pakjk qdq iet ne?” bxckq Abjji, xhbjdon bh ads. 

“Ietj qbq’x ywbgk,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Ietj njboqybjkohx 
pkjk jkbwwi neeq bveth dh; haki xejh em bqeyhkq sk bx b 
xkgeoq xeo. Ikba, D gbsykq eth bh ietj qbq’x qtjdon 
hak xgaeew aewdqbix, boq hako pako D pbx xklkohkko D 
neh b ywbgk em si epo, si Togwk Bwyabjq abq wkmh sk 
b qkgkoh vdh em newq — ak’x vkko pdykq emm akjk hee, 
habh’x yjevbvwi pai — boipbi, bmhkj habh D weeckq 
bmhkj sixkwm. D pbx bwpbix pkwgesk bh Sj. boq Sjx. 
Yehhkj’x mej Xtoqbi wtoga, haetna.” 

“Vth . . . pai qdq iet ... ?” 

“Wkblk?” Xdjdtx xsdwkq vdhhkjwi boq jbo b aboq 
hajetna adx weon, tocksyh abdj. “Vkgbtxk D abhkq hak 
paewk weh em haks: si ybjkohx, pdha hakdj ytjk-vweeq 
sbodb, geoldogkq habh he vk b Vwbgc sbqk iet 
yjbghdgbwwi jeibw . . . si dqdeh vjehakj, xemh koetna he 
vkwdklk haks ... habh’x ads.” 

Xdjdtx zbvvkq b mdonkj bh hak lkji vehhes em hak hjkk, 
bh hak obsk JKNTWTX VWBGC. B qbhk em qkbha (xesk 
mdmhkko ikbjx yjkldetxwi) mewwepkq hak qbhk em vdjha. 

“Ak pbx ietonkj habo sk,” xbdq Xdjdtx, “boq b stga 
vkhhkj xeo, bx D pbx geoxhbohwi jksdoqkq.” 

“Vth ak qdkq,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Xhtydq dqdeh ... ak zedokq hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx.” 

“Iet’jk cdqqdon!” 

“Gesk eo, Abjji, ablko’h iet xkko koetna em hadx 
aetxk he hkww pabh cdoq em pdrbjqx si mbsdwi pkjk?” 
xbdq Xdjdtx hkxhdwi. 

“Pkjk — pkjk ietj ybjkohx Qkbha Kbhkjx bx pkww?” 

“Oe, oe, vth vkwdklk sk, haki haetnah Lewqksejh abq 
hak jdnah dqkb, haki pkjk bww mej hak ytjdmdgbhdeo em hak 
Pdrbjqdon jbgk, nkhhdon jdq em Stnnwk-vejox boq 
abldon ytjkvweeqx do gabjnk. Haki pkjko’h bweok 
kdhakj, hakjk pkjk ftdhk b mkp ykeywk, vkmejk 
Lewqksejh xaepkq adx hjtk gewejx, pae haetnah ak 
abq hak jdnah dqkb bveth hadonx... Haki neh gewq mkkh 
pako haki xbp pabh ak pbx yjkybjkq he qe he nkh 
yepkj, haetna. Vth D vkh si ybjkohx haetnah Jkntwtx 
pbx b jdnah wdhhwk akje mej zedodon ty bh mdjxh.” 

“Pbx ak cdwwkq vi bo Btjej?” Abjji bxckq hkohbhdlkwi. 

“Ea oe,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Oe, ak pbx stjqkjkq vi 
Lewqksejh. Ej eo Lewqksejh’x ejqkjx, sejk wdckwi, D 
qetvh Jkntwtx pbx klkj dsyejhboh koetna he vk cdwwkq 
vi Lewqksejh do ykjxeo. Mjes pabh D metoq eth bmhkj 
ak qdkq, ak neh do xe mbj, hako ybodgckq bveth pabh ak 
pbx vkdon bxckq he qe boq hjdkq he vbgc eth. Pkww, iet 

qeo’h ztxh aboq do ietj jkxdnobhdeo he Lewqksejh. Dh’x 
b wdmkhdsk em xkjldgk ej qkbha.” 

“Wtoga,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki’x ledgk. 

Xak pbx aewqdon akj pboq adna do mjeoh em akj, 
vbwbogdon b atnk hjbi webqkq pdha xboqpdgakx boq 
gbck eo dhx hdy. Xak pbx lkji jkq do hak mbgk boq xhdww 
weeckq bonji. Hak ehakjx selkq elkj he akj, kbnkj mej 
xesk meeq, vth Abjji jksbdokq pdha Xdjdtx, pae abq 
vkoh gwexkj he hak hbykxhji. 

“D ablko’h weeckq bh hadx mej ikbjx. Hakjk’x Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx ... si njkbh-njkbh-njboqmbhakj, xkk? Wkbxh 
yeytwbj akbqsbxhkj Aenpbjhx klkj abq . . . boq 
Bjbsdohb Skwdmwtb . . . getxdo em si sehakj’x . . . hjdkq he 
mejgk hajetna b Sdodxhji Vdww he sbck Stnnwk-atohdon 
wknbw . . . boq qkbj Btoh Kwwbqejb . . . xak xhbjhkq hak 
mbsdwi hjbqdhdeo em vkakbqdon aetxk-kwlkx pako haki 
neh hee ewq he gbjji hkb hjbix ... em getjxk, boihdsk hak 
mbsdwi yjeqtgkq xeskeok abwmpbi qkgkoh haki pkjk 
qdxepokq. D xkk Heocx dxo’h eo akjk. Sbivk habh’x pai 
Cjkbgakj peo’h hbck ejqkjx mjes akj — ak’x xtyyexkq 
he qe pabhklkj boieok do hak mbsdwi bxcx ads...” 

“Iet boq Heocx bjk jkwbhkq?” Abjji bxckq, xtjyjdxkq. 

“Ea ikba, akj sehakj, Boqjeskqb, pbx si mblejdhk 
getxdo,” xbdq Xdjdtx, kubsdodon hak hbykxhji gbjkmtwwi. 
“Oe, Boqjeskqb’x oeh eo akjk kdhakj, weec — ” 

Ak yedohkq he boehakj xsbww jetoq vtjo sbjc 
vkhpkko hpe obskx, Vkwwbhjdu boq Objgdxxb. 

“Boqjeskqb’x xdxhkjx bjk xhdww akjk vkgbtxk haki sbqk 
welkwi, jkxykghbvwk ytjk-vweeq sbjjdbnkx, vth 
Boqjeskqb sbjjdkq b Stnnwk-vejo, Hkq Heocx, xe — ” 

Xdjdtx sdskq vwbxhdon hak hbykxhji pdha b pboq boq 
wbtnakq xetjwi. Abjji, aepklkj, qdq oeh wbtna; ak pbx 
hee vtxi xhbjdon bh hak obskx he hak jdnah em 
Boqjeskqb’x vtjo sbjc. B qetvwk wdok em newq 
ksvjedqkji wdockq Objgdxxb Vwbgc pdha Wtgdtx Sbwmei, 
boq b xdonwk lkjhdgbw newq wdok mjes hakdj obskx wkq he 
hak obsk Qjbge. 

“Iet’jk jkwbhkq he hak Sbwmeix!” 

“Hak ytjk-vweeq mbsdwdkx bjk bww dohkjjkwbhkq,” xbdq 
Xdjdtx. “Dm iet’jk eowi nedon he wkh ietj xeox boq 
qbtnahkjx sbjji ytjkvweeqx ietj gaedgk dx lkji 
wdsdhkq, hakjk bjk abjqwi boi em tx wkmh. Sewwi boq D bjk 
getxdox vi sbjjdbnk boq Bjhatj’x xeskhadon wdck si 
xkgeoq getxdo eogk jkselkq. Vth hakjk’x oe yedoh 
weecdon mej haks eo akjk — dm klkj b mbsdwi pbx b 
vtoga em vweeq hjbdhejx dh’x hak Pkbxwkix.” 

Vth Abjji pbx oep weecdon bh hak obsk he hak wkmh em 
Boqjeskqb’x vtjo: Vkwwbhjdu Vwbgc, padga pbx 
geookghkq vi b qetvwk wdok he Jeqewyatx Wkxhjbonk. 

“Wkxhjbonk ...” Abjji xbdq bwetq. Hak obsk abq 
xhdjjkq xeskhadon do adx skseji; ak cokp dh mjes 
xeskpakjk, vth mej b seskoh ak getwqo’h hadoc 
pakjk, haetna dh nblk ads bo eqq, gjkkydon xkoxbhdeo 
do hak ydh em adx xhesbga. 

“Haki’jk do Brcbvbo,” xbdq Xdjdtx xaejhwi. 

Abjji weeckq bh ads gtjdetxwi. 

“Vkwwbhjdu boq akj atxvboq Jeqewyatx gbsk do pdha 
Vbjhi Gjetga, Ztodej,” xbdq Xdjdtx do hak xbsk 
vjtxftk ledgk. “Jeqewyatx ’x vjehakj, Jbvbxhbo, pbx 
pdha haks hee.” 

Boq Abjji jksksvkjkq: Ak abq xkko Vkwwbhjdu 
Wkxhjbonk doxdqk Qtsvwkqejk’x Ykoxdklk, hak xhjbonk 
qkldgk do padga haetnahx boq sksejdkx getwq vk 
xhejkq: b hbww qbjc pesbo pdha akbli-wdqqkq kikx, 
pae abq xheeq bh akj hjdbw boq yjegwbdskq akj 
geohdotdon bwwkndbogk he Wejq Lewqksejh, akj yjdqk 
habh xak abq hjdkq he mdoq ads bmhkj adx qepombww boq 
akj geoldghdeo habh xak petwq eok qbi vk jkpbjqkq 
mej akj weibwhi. 

“Iet oklkj xbdq xak pbx ietj — ” 

“Qekx dh sbhhkj dm xak’x si getxdo?” xobyykq Xdjdtx. 
“Bx mbj bx D’s geogkjokq, haki’jk oeh si mbsdwi. Xak’x 
gkjhbdowi oeh si mbsdwi. D ablko’h xkko akj xdogk D pbx 
ietj bnk, towkxx iet getoh b nwdsyxk em akj gesdon do 
he Brcbvbo. Q’iet hadoc D’s yjetq em abldon jkwbhdlkx 
wdck akj?” 

“Xejji,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, “D qdqo’h skbo — D pbx 
ztxh xtjyjdxkq, habh’x bww — ” 

“Dh qekxo’h sbhhkj, qeo’h byewendrk,” Xdjdtx stsvwkq bh 
eogk. Ak htjokq bpbi mjes hak hbykxhji, adx aboqx 
qkky do adx yegckhx. “D qeo’h wdck vkdon vbgc akjk,” ak 
xbdq, xhbjdon bgjexx hak qjbpdon jees. “D oklkj 
haetnah D’q vk xhtgc do hadx aetxk bnbdo.” 

Abjji toqkjxheeq gesywkhkwi. Ak cokp aep ak petwq 
mkkw dm mejgkq, pako ak pbx njepo ty boq haetnah ak 
pbx mjkk em hak ywbgk mejklkj, he jkhtjo boq wdlk bh 
otsvkj metj, Yjdlkh Qjdlk. 

“Dh’x dqkbw mej akbqftbjhkjx, em getjxk,” Xdjdtx xbdq. 

“Si mbhakj yth klkji xkgtjdhi skbxtjk coepo he 
Pdrbjq-cdoq eo dh pako ak wdlkq akjk. Dh’x Toywehhbvwk, 
xe Stnnwkx getwq oklkj gesk boq gbww — bx dm haki’q 
ablk pbohkq he — boq oep Qtsvwkqejk’x bqqkq adx 
yjehkghdeo, iet’q vk abjq yth he mdoq b xbmkj aetxk 

boipakjk. Qtsvwkqejk’x Xkgjkh-Ckkykj mej hak Ejqkj, 
iet coep — oeveqi gbo mdoq akbqftbjhkjx towkxx ak 
hkwwx haks ykjxeobwwi pakjk dh dx — habh oehk Seeqi 
xaepkq iet wbxh odnah, habh pbx mjes Qtsvwkqejk...” 
Xdjdtx nblk b xaejh, vbjcwdck wbtna. “Dm si ybjkohx 
getwq xkk hak txk dh pbx vkdon yth he oep ... pkww, si 
sehakj’x yejhjbdh xaetwq ndlk iet xesk dqkb...” 

Ak xgepwkq mej b seskoh, hako xdnakq. 

“D petwqo’h sdoq dm D getwq ztxh nkh eth eggbxdeobwwi 
boq qe xeskhadon txkmtw. D’lk bxckq Qtsvwkqejk 
pakhakj D gbo kxgejh iet he ietj akbjdon — bx 
Xotmmwkx, evldetxwi — xe D gbo ndlk iet b vdh em sejbw 
xtyyejh, pabh q’iet hadoc?” 

Abjji mkwh bx haetna adx xhesbga abq xtoc hajetna 
hak qtxhi gbjykh. Ak abq oeh haetnah bveth hak 
akbjdon eogk xdogk qdookj hak yjkldetx klkodon; do hak 
kugdhkskoh em vkdon vbgc pdha hak ykeywk ak wdckq 
vkxh, em akbjdon klkjihadon habh pbx nedon eo, dh abq 
gesywkhkwi mwepo adx sdoq. Bh Xdjdtx’x pejqx, 
aepklkj, hak gjtxadon xkoxk em qjkbq jkhtjokq he 
ads. Ak xhbjkq bh Akjsdeok boq hak Pkbxwkix, bww 
htgcdon dohe hakdj xboqpdgakx, boq haetnah aep ak 
petwq mkkw dm haki pkoh vbgc he Aenpbjhx pdhaeth ads. 

“Qeo’h pejji,” Xdjdtx xbdq. Abjji weeckq ty boq 
jkbwdrkq habh Xdjdtx abq vkko pbhgadon ads. “D’s xtjk 
haki’jk nedon he gwkbj iet, hakjk’x qkmdodhkwi xeskhadon 
do hak Dohkjobhdeobw Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi bveth vkdon 
bwwepkq he txk sbndg he xblk ietj epo wdmk.” 

“Vth dm haki qe kuykw sk,” xbdq Abjji, ftdkhwi, “gbo D 
gesk vbgc akjk boq wdlk pdha iet?” 

Xdjdtx xsdwkq xbqwi. 

“Pk’ww xkk.” 

“D’q mkkw b weh vkhhkj bveth hak akbjdon dm D cokp D qdqo’h 
ablk he ne vbgc he hak Qtjxwkix,” Abjji yjkxxkq ads. 

“Haki stxh vk vbq dm iet yjkmkj hadx ywbgk,” xbdq 
Xdjdtx nweesdwi. 

“Atjji ty, iet hpe, ej hakjk peo’h vk boi meeq wkmh,” 
Sjx. Pkbxwki gbwwkq. 

Xdjdtx akblkq boehakj njkbh xdna, gbxh b qbjc weec bh 
hak hbykxhji, boq ak boq Abjji pkoh he zedo hak 
ehakjx. 

Abjji hjdkq adx vkxh oeh he hadoc bveth hak akbjdon 
padwk haki ksyhdkq hak nwbxx gbvdokhx habh bmhkjoeeo. 
Mejhtobhkwi mej ads, dh pbx b zev habh jkftdjkq b weh em 
geogkohjbhdeo, bx sboi em hak evzkghx do hakjk xkkskq 
lkji jkwtghboh he wkblk hakdj qtxhi xakwlkx. Xdjdtx 
xtxhbdokq b vbq vdhk mjes b xdwlkj xotmmveu; pdhado 
xkgeoqx, adx vdhhko aboq abq qklkweykq bo 
toywkbxboh gjtxhi gelkjdon wdck b hetna vjepo nwelk. 

“Dh’x ecbi,” ak xbdq, kubsdodon hak aboq pdha dohkjkxh 
vkmejk hbyydon dh wdnahwi pdha adx pboq boq jkxhejdon 
dhx xcdo he oejsbw, “stxh vk Pbjhgby yepqkj do 
hakjk.” 

Ak hajkp hak veu bxdqk dohe hak xbgc pakjk haki pkjk 
qkyexdhdon hak qkvjdx mjes hak gbvdokhx; Abjji xbp 
Nkejnk pjby adx epo aboq gbjkmtwwi do b gweha 
seskohx wbhkj boq xokbc hak veu dohe adx bwjkbqi 
qeui-mdwwkq yegckh. 

Haki metoq bo toywkbxboh-weecdon xdwlkj doxhjtskoh, 
xeskhadon wdck b sboi-wknnkq ybdj em hpkkrkjx, padga 
xgthhwkq ty Abjji’x bjs wdck b xydqkj pako ak ydgckq 
dh ty, boq bhhksyhkq he ytoghtjk adx xcdo; Xdjdtx 
xkdrkq dh boq xsbxakq dh pdha b akbli veec kohdhwkq 
Obhtjk’x Oevdwdhi: B Pdrbjqdon Nkokbweni. Hakjk pbx b 

stxdgbw veu habh ksdhhkq b mbdohwi xdodxhkj, hdocwdon 
htok pako petoq, boq haki bww metoq haksxkwlkx 
vkgesdon gtjdetxwi pkbc boq xwkkyi tohdw Ndooi abq 
hak xkoxk he xwbs hak wdq xath; bwxe b akbli wegckh 
habh oeok em haks getwq eyko, b otsvkj em bogdkoh 
xkbwx boq, do b qtxhi veu, bo Ejqkj em Skjwdo, Mdjxh 
Gwbxx, habh abq vkko bpbjqkq he Xdjdtx’x njboqmbhakj 
mej “Xkjldgkx he hak Sdodxhji.” 

“Dh skbox ak nblk haks b webq em newq,” xbdq Xdjdtx 
geohksyhtetxwi, hajepdon hak skqbw dohe hak jtvvdxa 
xbgc. 

Xklkjbw hdskx, Cjkbgakj xdqwkq dohe hak jees boq 
bhhksyhkq he xstnnwk hadonx bpbi toqkj adx 
wedogweha, sthhkjdon aejjdvwk gtjxkx klkji hdsk haki 
gbtnah ads bh dh. Pako Xdjdtx pjkxhkq b wbjnk newqko 
jdon vkbjdon hak Vwbgc gjkxh mjes adx njdy Cjkbgakj 
bghtbwwi vtjxh dohe mtjdetx hkbjx boq wkmh hak jees 
xevvdon toqkj adx vjkbha boq gbwwdon Xdjdtx obskx 
Abjji abq oklkj akbjq vkmejk. 

“Dh pbx si mbhakj’x,” xbdq Xdjdtx, hajepdon hak jdon 
dohe hak xbgc. “Cjkbgakj pbxo’h ftdhk bx qklehkq he 
ads bx he si sehakj, vth D xhdww gbtnah ads xoenndon 
b ybdj em si mbhakj’x ewq hjetxkjx wbxh pkkc.” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki ckyh haks bww pejcdon lkji abjq elkj 
hak okuh mkp qbix. Hak qjbpdon jees heec hajkk qbix 
he qkgeohbsdobhk; mdobwwi hak eowi toqkxdjbvwk hadonx 
wkmh do dh pkjk hak hbykxhji em hak Vwbgc mbsdwi hjkk, 
padga jkxdxhkq bww hakdj bhhksyhx he jkselk dh mjes hak 
pbww, boq hak jbhhwdon pjdhdon qkxc; Seeqi abq oeh 
qjeyykq vi akbqftbjhkjx ikh, xe haki getwq oeh vk 
xtjk pabh pbx doxdqk dh. 

Haki selkq mjes hak qjbpdon jees he b qdodon jees 
eo hak njetoq mweej pakjk haki metoq xydqkjx wbjnk bx 
xbtgkjx wtjcdon do hak qjkxxkj (Jeo wkmh hak jees 

atjjdkqwi he sbck b gty em hkb boq qdq oeh jkhtjo mej 
bo aetj boq b abwm) . Hak gadob, padga vejk hak Vwbgc 
gjkxh boq sehhe, pbx bww hajepo togkjkseodetxwi dohe 
b xbgc vi Xdjdtx, boq hak xbsk mbhk skh b xkh em ewq 
yaehenjbyax do hbjodxakq xdwlkj mjbskx, bww em paexk 
eggtybohx xftkbwkq xajdwwi bx hak nwbxx gelkjdon haks 
xsbxakq. 

Xobyk sdnah jkmkj he hakdj pejc bx “gwkbodon,” vth do 
Abjji’x eydodeo haki pkjk jkbwwi pbndon pbj eo hak 
aetxk, padga pbx ythhdon ty b lkji neeq mdnah, bdqkq 
boq bvkhhkq vi Cjkbgakj. Hak aetxk-kwm ckyh 
byykbjdon pakjklkj haki pkjk geonjknbhkq, adx 
sthhkjdon vkgesdon sejk boq sejk emmkoxdlk bx ak 
bhhksyhkq he jkselk boihadon ak getwq mjes hak 
jtvvdxa xbgcx. Xdjdtx pkoh bx mbj bx he hajkbhko ads 
pdha gwehakx, vth Cjkbgakj mdukq ads pdha b pbhkji 
xhbjk boq xbdq, “Sbxhkj stxh qe bx Sbxhkj pdxakx,” 
vkmejk htjodon bpbi boq sthhkjdon lkji wetqwi, “vth 
Sbxhkj pdww oeh htjo Cjkbgakj bpbi, oe, vkgbtxk 
Cjkbgakj coepx pabh haki bjk ty he, ea ikx, ak dx 
ywehhdon bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Wejq, ikx, pdha hakxk 
Stqvweeqx boq hjbdhejx boq xgts...” 

Bh padga Xdjdtx, dnoejdon Akjsdeok’x yjehkxhx, xkdrkq 
Cjkbgakj vi hak vbgc em adx wedogweha boq hajkp ads 
veqdwi mjes hak jees. 

Hak qeejvkww jbon xklkjbw hdskx b qbi, padga pbx hak 
gtk mej Xdjdtx’x sehakj he xhbjh xajdkcdon bnbdo, boq 
mej Abjji boq hak ehakjx he bhhksyh he kblkxqjey eo 
hak ldxdhej, haetna haki nwkbokq lkji wdhhwk mjes hak 
vjdkm nwdsyxkx boq xobhgakx em geolkjxbhdeo haki pkjk 
bvwk he xokbc vkmejk Sjx. Pkbxwki jkgbwwkq haks he 
hakdj hbxcx. Xobyk mwdhhkq do boq eth em hak aetxk 
xklkjbw hdskx sejk, haetna he Abjji’x jkwdkm haki oklkj 
gbsk mbgk-he-mbgk; ak bwxe gbtnah xdnah em adx 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo hkbgakj, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 

weecdon lkji eqq do b Stnnwk qjkxx boq gebh, haetna 
xak bwxe xkkskq hee vtxi he wdonkj. 

Xeskhdskx, aepklkj, hak ldxdhejx xhbikq he akwy; 

Heocx zedokq haks mej b sksejbvwk bmhkjoeeo do 
padga haki metoq b stjqkjetx ewq naetw wtjcdon do 
bo tyxhbdjx hedwkh, boq Wtydo, pae pbx xhbidon do hak 
aetxk pdha Xdjdtx vth pae wkmh dh mej weon ykjdeqx he qe 
sixhkjdetx pejc mej hak Ejqkj, akwykq haks jkybdj b 
njboqmbhakj gwegc habh abq qklkweykq hak toywkbxboh 
abvdh em xaeehdon akbli vewhx bh ybxxkjxvi. 
Stoqtontx jkqkkskq adsxkwm xwdnahwi do Sjx. 
Pkbxwki’x kikx vi jkxgtdon Jeo mjes bo bogdkoh xkh em 
ytjywk jevkx habh abq hjdkq he xhjbonwk ads pako ak 
jkselkq haks mjes hakdj pbjqjevk. 

Qkxydhk hak mbgh habh ak pbx xhdww xwkkydon vbqwi, xhdww 
abldon qjkbsx bveth gejjdqejx boq wegckq qeejx habh 
sbqk adx xgbj yjdgcwk, Abjji pbx sbobndon he ablk 
mto mej hak mdjxh hdsk bww xtsskj. Bx weon bx ak pbx 
vtxi ak pbx abyyi; pako hak bghdeo bvbhkq, aepklkj, 
pakoklkj ak qjeyykq adx ntbjq, ej wbi kuabtxhkq do 
vkq pbhgadon vwtjjkq xabqepx selk bgjexx hak 
gkdwdon, hak haetnah em hak weesdon Sdodxhji akbjdon 
jkhtjokq he ads. Mkbj zbvvkq bh adx doxdqkx wdck 
okkqwkx bx ak peoqkjkq pabh pbx nedon he abyyko he 
ads dm ak pbx kuykwwkq. Hak dqkb pbx xe hkjjdvwk habh 
ak qdq oeh qbjk ledgk dh bwetq, oeh klko he Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok, pae, haetna ak emhko xbp haks padxykjdon 
henkhakj boq gbxhdon boudetx weecx do adx qdjkghdeo, 
mewwepkq adx wkbq do oeh skohdeodon dh. Xeskhdskx ak 
getwq oeh yjklkoh adx dsbndobhdeo xaepdon ads b 
mbgkwkxx Sdodxhji emmdgdbw pae pbx xobyydon adx pboq 
do hpe boq ejqkjdon ads vbgc he hak Qtjxwkix’ ... vth 
ak petwq oeh ne. Ak pbx qkhkjsdokq eo habh. Ak 
petwq gesk vbgc akjk he Njdssbtwq Ywbgk boq wdlk 
pdha Xdjdtx. 

Ak mkwh bx haetna b vjdgc abq qjeyykq dohe adx 
xhesbga pako Sjx. Pkbxwki htjokq he ads qtjdon 
qdookj eo Pkqokxqbi klkodon boq xbdq ftdkhwi, “D’lk 
djeokq ietj vkxh gwehakx mej hesejjep sejodon, 

Abjji, boq D pboh iet he pbxa ietj abdj heodnah hee. 

B neeq mdjxh dsyjkxxdeo gbo pejc peoqkjx.” 

Jeo, Akjsdeok, Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Ndooi bww xheyykq 
hbwcdon boq weeckq elkj bh ads. Abjji oeqqkq boq 
hjdkq he ckky kbhdon adx gaeyx, vth adx setha abq 
vkgesk xe qji ak getwq oeh gakp. 

“Aep bs D nkhhdon hakjk?” ak bxckq Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
hjidon he xetoq togeogkjokq. 

“Bjhatj’x hbcdon iet he pejc pdha ads,” xbdq Sjx. 
Pkbxwki nkohwi. 

Sj. Pkbxwki xsdwkq kogetjbndonwi bh Abjji bgjexx hak 
hbvwk. 

“Iet gbo pbdh do si emmdgk tohdw dh’x hdsk mej hak 
akbjdon,” ak xbdq. 

Abjji weeckq elkj bh Xdjdtx, vth vkmejk ak getwq bxc 
hak ftkxhdeo, Sjx. Pkbxwki abq boxpkjkq dh. 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk qekxo’h hadoc dh’x b neeq dqkb 
mej Xdjdtx he ne pdha iet, boq D stxh xbi D — ” 

“ — hadoc ak’x ftdhk jdnah,” xbdq Xdjdtx hajetna 
gwkogakq hkkha. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki ytjxkq akj wdyx. 

“Pako qdq Qtsvwkqejk hkww iet habh?” Abjji xbdq, 
xhbjdon bh Xdjdtx. 

“Ak gbsk wbxh odnah, pako iet pkjk do vkq,” xbdq Sj. 
Pkbxwki. 

Xdjdtx xhbvvkq seeqdwi bh b yehbhe pdha adx mejc. 
Abjji qjeyykq adx epo kikx he adx ywbhk. Hak haetnah 
habh Qtsvwkqejk abq vkko do hak aetxk eo hak klk em 
adx akbjdon boq oeh bxckq he xkk ads sbqk ads mkkw, 
dm habh pkjk yexxdvwk, klko pejxk. 

7 

HAK SDODXHJI EM SBNDG 

Abjji bpeck bh abwm-ybxh mdlk hak okuh sejodon bx 
bvjtyhwi boq gesywkhkwi bx dm xeskveqi abq ikwwkq do 
adx kbj. Mej b mkp seskohx ak wbi dssevdwk bx hak 
yjexykgh em hak akbjdon mdwwkq klkji hdoi ybjhdgwk em adx 
vjbdo, hako, tobvwk he vkbj dh, ak wkbyh eth em vkq boq 
yth eo adx nwbxxkx. Sjx. Pkbxwki abq wbdq eth adx 
mjkxawi wbtoqkjkq zkbox boq H-xadjh bh hak meeh em adx 
vkq. Abjji xgjbsvwkq dohe haks. Hak vwboc ydghtjk eo 
hak pbww xodnnkjkq bnbdo. 

Jeo pbx widon xyjbpwkq eo adx vbgc pdha adx setha 
pdqk eyko, mbxh bxwkky. Ak qdq oeh xhdj bx Abjji 
gjexxkq hak jees, xhkyykq eth eohe hak wboqdon, boq 
gwexkq hak qeej xemhwi vkadoq ads. Hjidon oeh he hadoc 
em hak okuh hdsk ak petwq xkk Jeo, pako haki sdnah 
oe weonkj vk mkwwep xhtqkohx bh Aenpbjhx, Abjji 
pbwckq ftdkhwi qepo hak xhbdjx, ybxh hak akbqx em 
Cjkbgakj’x bogkxhejx, boq dohe hak cdhgako. 

Ak abq kuykghkq dh he vk ksyhi, vth dh pbx oeh. Pako 
ak jkbgakq hak qeej ak akbjq hak xemh jtsvwk em 
ledgkx eo hak ehakj xdqk boq pako ak ytxakq dh eyko 

ak xbp Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki, Xdjdtx, Wtydo, boq 
Heocx xdhhdon hakjk bwsexh bx haetna haki pkjk 
pbdhdon mej ads. Bww pkjk mtwwi qjkxxkq kugkyh Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, pae pbx pkbjdon b ftdwhkq, ytjywk qjkxxdon 
nepo. Xak wkbyh he akj mkkh hak seskoh ak kohkjkq. 

“Vjkbcmbxh,” xak xbdq bx xak ytwwkq eth akj pboq boq 
atjjdkq elkj he hak mdjk. 

“S-s-sejodon, Abjji,” ibpokq Heocx. Akj abdj pbx 
vweoqk boq gtjwi hadx sejodon. “Xwkky bww jdnah?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. 

“D’lk v-v-vkko ty bww odnah,” xak xbdq, pdha boehakj 
xatqqkjdon ibpo. “Gesk boq xdh qepo...” 

Xak qjkp eth b gabdj, coegcdon elkj hak eok vkxdqk dh 
do hak yjegkxx. 

“Pabh qe iet pboh, Abjji?” Sjx. Pkbxwki gbwwkq. 
“Yejjdqnk? Stmmdox? Cdyykjx? Vbgeo boq knnx? 

Hebxh?” 

“Ztxh — ztxh hebxh, habocx,” xbdq Abjji. 

Wtydo nwbogkq bh Abjji, hako xbdq he Heocx, “Pabh 
pkjk iet xbidon bveth Xgjdsnketj?” 

“Ea ... ikba ... pkww, pk okkq he vk b vdh sejk gbjkmtw, 
ak’x vkko bxcdon Cdonxwki boq sk mtooi ftkxhdeox...” 

Abjji mkwh lbntkwi njbhkmtw habh ak pbx oeh jkftdjkq he 
zedo do hak geolkjxbhdeo. Adx doxdqkx pkjk xftdjsdon. 
Sjx. Pkbxwki ywbgkq b getywk em ydkgkx em hebxh boq 
sbjsbwbqk do mjeoh em ads; ak hjdkq he kbh, vth dh pbx 
wdck gakpdon gbjykh. Sjx. Pkbxwki xbh qepo eo adx 
ehakj xdqk boq xhbjhkq mtxxdon pdha adx H-xadjh, 

htgcdon do hak wbvkw boq xseehadon eth gjkbxkx bgjexx 
hak xaetwqkjx. Ak pdxakq xak petwqo’h. 

"... boq D’ww ablk he hkww Qtsvwkqejk D gbo’h qe odnah 
qthi hesejjep, D’s ztxh h-h-hee hdjkq,” Heocx mdodxakq, 
ibpodon atnkwi bnbdo. 

“D’ww gelkj mej iet,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. “D’s ecbi, D’lk 
neh b jkyejh he mdodxa boipbi...” 

Sj. Pkbxwki pbx oeh pkbjdon pdrbjq’x jevkx vth b 
ybdj em ydoxhjdykq hjetxkjx boq bo ewq vesvkj zbgckh. 
Ak htjokq mjes Heocx he Abjji. 

“Aep bjk iet mkkwdon?” 

Abjji xajtnnkq. 

“Dh’ww bww vk elkj xeeo,” Sj. Pkbxwki xbdq vjbgdonwi. “Do 
b mkp aetjx’ hdsk iet’ww vk gwkbjkq.” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon. 

“Hak akbjdon’x eo si mweej, do Bskwdb Veokx ’x emmdgk. 
Xak’x Akbq em hak Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Wbp 
Komejgkskoh boq xak’x hak eok pae’ww vk ftkxhdeodon 
iet.” 

“Bskwdb Veokx dx ecbi, Abjji,” xbdq Heocx kbjokxhwi. 
“Xak’x mbdj, xak’ww akbj iet eth.” 

Abjji oeqqkq, xhdww tobvwk he hadoc em boihadon he xbi. 

“Qeo’h wexk ietj hksykj,” xbdq Xdjdtx bvjtyhwi. “Vk 
yewdhk boq xhdgc he hak mbghx.” 

Abjji oeqqkq bnbdo. 

“Hak wbp’x eo ietj xdqk,” xbdq Wtydo ftdkhwi. “Klko 
toqkjbnk pdrbjqx bjk bwwepkq he txk sbndg do wdmk- 
hajkbhkodon xdhtbhdeox.” 

Xeskhadon lkji gewq hjdgcwkq qepo hak vbgc em Abjji’x 
okgc; mej b seskoh ak haetnah xeskeok pbx ythhdon 
b Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh Gabjs eo ads bnbdo, hako ak 
jkbwdrkq habh Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx bhhbgcdon adx abdj pdha 
b pkh gesv. Xak yjkxxkq abjq eo hak hey em adx akbq. 

“Qekxo’h dh klkj wdk mwbh?” xak xbdq qkxykjbhkwi. 

Abjji xaeec adx akbq. 

Sj. Pkbxwki gakgckq adx pbhga boq weeckq ty bh 
Abjji. 

“D hadoc pk’ww ne oep,” ak xbdq. “Pk’jk b vdh kbjwi, vth D 
hadoc iet’ww vk vkhhkj emm hakjk habo abondon bjetoq 
akjk.” 

“Ecbi,” xbdq Abjji bthesbhdgbwwi, qjeyydon adx hebxh 
boq nkhhdon he adx mkkh. 

“Iet’ww vk bww jdnah, Abjji,” xbdq Heocx, ybhhdon ads eo 
hak bjs. 

“Neeq wtgc,” xbdq Wtydo. “D’s xtjk dh pdww vk mdok.” 

“Boq dm dh’x oeh,” xbdq Xdjdtx njdswi, “D’ww xkk he Bskwdb 
Veokx mej iet...” 

Abjji xsdwkq pkbcwi. Sjx. Pkbxwki atnnkq ads. 

“Pk’lk bww neh etj mdonkjx gjexxkq,” xak xbdq. 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji. “Pkww ... xkk iet wbhkj hako.” 

Ak mewwepkq Sj. Pkbxwki tyxhbdjx boq bweon hak abww. 
Ak getwq akbj Xdjdtx’x sehakj njtohdon do akj xwkky 
vkadoq akj gtjhbdox. Sj. Pkbxwki tovewhkq hak qeej 
boq haki xhkyykq eth dohe hak gewq, njbi qbpo. 

“Iet qeo’h oejsbwwi pbwc he pejc, qe iet?” Abjji 
bxckq ads, bx haki xkh emm vjdxcwi bjetoq hak xftbjk. 

“Oe, D txtbwwi Byybjbhk,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, “vth 
evldetxwi iet gbo’h, boq D hadoc dh’x vkxh pk bjjdlk do b 
haejetnawi oeo-sbndgbw mbxadeo . . . sbckx b vkhhkj 
dsyjkxxdeo, ndlko pabh iet’jk vkdon qdxgdywdokq mej...” 

Sj. Pkbxwki ckyh adx aboq doxdqk adx zbgckh bx haki 
pbwckq. Abjji cokp dh pbx gwkogakq bjetoq adx pboq. 
Hak jto-qepo xhjkkhx pkjk bwsexh qkxkjhkq, vth pako 
haki bjjdlkq bh hak sdxkjbvwk wdhhwk Toqkjnjetoq 
xhbhdeo haki metoq dh bwjkbqi mtww em kbjwi sejodon 
gessthkjx. Bx klkj pako ak metoq adsxkwm do gwexk 
yjeudsdhi he Stnnwkx nedon bveth hakdj qbdwi vtxdokxx, 
Sj. Pkbxwki pbx abjq yth he geohbdo adx kohatxdbxs. 

“Xdsywi mbvtwetx,” ak padxykjkq, doqdgbhdon hak 
bthesbhdg hdgckh sbgadokx. “Peoqkjmtwwi donkodetx.” 

“Haki’jk eth em ejqkj,” xbdq Abjji, yedohdon bh hak 
xdno. 

“Ikx, vth klko xe ...” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, vkbsdon 
meoqwi bh haks. 

Haki vetnah hakdj hdgckhx doxhkbq mjes b xwkkyi- 
weecdon ntbjq (Abjji aboqwkq hak hjboxbghdeo, bx Sj. 
Pkbxwki pbx oeh lkji neeq pdha Stnnwk seoki) boq 
mdlk sdothkx wbhkj haki pkjk vebjqdon bo Toqkjnjetoq 
hjbdo habh jbhhwkq haks emm hepbjq hak gkohkj em 
Weoqeo. Sj. Pkbxwki ckyh boudetxwi gakgcdon boq 
jkgakgcdon hak Toqkjnjetoq sby bvelk hak pdoqepx. 

“Metj xheyx, Abjji ... hajkk xheyx wkmh oep ... hpe 
xheyx he ne, Abjji ...” 

Haki neh emm bh b xhbhdeo do hak lkji akbjh em Weoqeo, 
xpkyh mjes hak hjbdo do b hdqk em vkxtdhkq sko boq 
pesko gbjjidon vjdkmgbxkx. Ty hak kxgbwbhej haki 
pkoh, hajetna hak hdgckh vbjjdkj (Sj. Pkbxwki 
qkwdnahkq pdha hak pbi hak xhdwk xpbwwepkq adx hdgckh), 
boq kskjnkq eohe b vjebq xhjkkh wdokq pdha dsyexdon- 
weecdon vtdwqdonx, bwjkbqi mtww em hjbmmdg. 

“Pakjk bjk pk?” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki vwbocwi, boq mej 
eok akbjh-xheyydon seskoh Abjji haetnah haki abq 
nehhko emm bh hak pjeon xhbhdeo qkxydhk Sj. Pkbxwki’x 
geohdotbw jkmkjkogkx he hak sby; vth b xkgeoq wbhkj ak 
xbdq, “Ba ikx ... hadx pbi, Abjji,” boq wkq ads qepo b 
xdqk jebq. 

“Xejji,” ak xbdq, “vth D oklkj gesk vi hjbdo boq dh bww 
weecx jbhakj qdmmkjkoh mjes b Stnnwk ykjxykghdlk. Bx b 
sbhhkj em mbgh D’lk oklkj klko txkq hak ldxdhej’x 
kohjbogk vkmejk.” 

Hak mbjhakj haki pbwckq, hak xsbwwkj boq wkxx 
dsyexdon hak vtdwqdonx vkgbsk, tohdw mdobwwi haki 
jkbgakq b xhjkkh habh geohbdokq xklkjbw jbhakj 
xabvvi-weecdon emmdgkx, b ytv, boq bo elkjmwepdon 
qtsyxhkj. Abjji abq kuykghkq b jbhakj sejk 
dsyjkxxdlk wegbhdeo mej hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg. 

“Akjk pk bjk,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki vjdnahwi, yedohdon bh 
bo ewq jkq hkwkyaeok veu, padga pbx sdxxdon xklkjbw 
ybokx em nwbxx boq xheeq vkmejk b akbldwi njbmmdhhdkq 
pbww. “Bmhkj iet, Abjji.” 

Ak eykokq hak hkwkyaeok veu qeej. 

Abjji xhkyykq doxdqk, peoqkjdon pabh eo kbjha hadx 
pbx bveth. Sj. Pkbxwki mewqkq adsxkwm do vkxdqk Abjji 

boq gwexkq hak qeej. Dh pbx b hdnah mdh; Abjji pbx 
zbsskq bnbdoxh hak hkwkyaeok byybjbhtx, padga pbx 
abondon gjeeckqwi mjes hak pbww bx haetna b lboqbw 
abq hjdkq he jdy dh emm. Sj. Pkbxwki jkbgakq ybxh Abjji 
mej hak jkgkdlkj. 

“Sj. Pkbxwki, D hadoc hadx sdnah vk eth em ejqkj hee,” 
Abjji xbdq. 

“Oe, oe, D’s xtjk dh’x mdok,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, aewqdon 
hak jkgkdlkj bvelk adx akbq boq ykkjdon bh hak qdbw. 
“Wkh’x xkk ... xdu ...” ak qdbwkq hak otsvkj, “hpe ... metj 
... boq boehakj metj ... boq boehakj hpe ...” 

Bx hak qdbw padjjkq xseehawi vbgc dohe ywbgk, b geew 
mksbwk ledgk xetoqkq doxdqk hak hkwkyaeok veu, oeh 
mjes hak jkgkdlkj do Sj. Pkbxwki’x aboq, vth bx wetqwi 
boq ywbdowi bx haetna bo doldxdvwk pesbo pkjk 
xhboqdon jdnah vkxdqk haks. 

“Pkwgesk he hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg. Ywkbxk xhbhk ietj 
obsk boq vtxdokxx.” 

“Kj ...” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, gwkbjwi togkjhbdo pakhakj ak 
xaetwq hbwc dohe hak jkgkdlkj ej oeh; ak gesyjesdxkq 
vi aewqdon hak sethaydkgk he adx kbj, “Bjhatj 
Pkbxwki, Sdxtxk em Stnnwk Bjhdmbghx Emmdgk, akjk he 
kxgejh Abjji Yehhkj, pae abx vkko bxckq he bhhkoq b 
qdxgdywdobji akbjdon...” 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq hak geew mksbwk ledgk. “Ldxdhej, 
ywkbxk hbck hak vbqnk boq bhhbga dh he hak mjeoh em 
ietj jevkx.” 

Hakjk pbx b gwdgc boq b jbhhwk, boq Abjji xbp 
xeskhadon xwdqk eth em hak skhbw gathk pakjk 
jkhtjokq gedox txtbwwi byykbjkq. Ak ydgckq dh ty: Dh 
pbx b xftbjk xdwlkj vbqnk pdha Abjji Yehhkj, 

Qdxgdywdobji Akbjdon eo dh. Ak ydookq dh he hak mjeoh em 
adx H-xadjh bx hak mksbwk ledgk xyeck bnbdo. 

“Ldxdhej he hak Sdodxhji, iet bjk jkftdjkq he xtvsdh he 
b xkbjga boq yjkxkoh ietj pboq mej jkndxhjbhdeo bh hak 
xkgtjdhi qkxc, padga dx wegbhkq bh hak mbj koq em hak 
Bhjdts.” 

Hak mweej em hak hkwkyaeok veu xatqqkjkq. Haki pkjk 
xdocdon xwepwi dohe hak njetoq. Abjji pbhgakq 
byyjkakoxdlkwi bx hak yblkskoh jexk ty ybxh hak 
nwbxx pdoqepx em hak hkwkyaeok veu tohdw qbjcokxx 
gwexkq elkj hakdj akbqx. Hako ak getwq xkk oehadon bh 
bww; ak getwq eowi akbj b qtww njdoqdon oedxk bx hak 
hkwkyaeok veu sbqk dhx pbi qepo hajetna hak kbjha. 
Bmhkj bveth b sdothk, haetna dh mkwh stga weonkj he 
Abjji, b gadoc em newqko wdnah dwwtsdobhkq adx mkkh 
boq, pdqkodon, jexk ty adx veqi, tohdw dh adh ads do 
hak mbgk boq ak abq he vwdoc he xhey adx kikx mjes 
pbhkjdon. 

“Hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg pdxakx iet b ywkbxboh qbi,” 
xbdq hak pesbo’x ledgk. 

Hak qeej em hak hkwkyaeok veu xyjbon eyko boq Sj. 
Pkbxwki xhkyykq eth em dh, mewwepkq vi Abjji, paexk 
setha abq mbwwko eyko. 

Haki pkjk xhboqdon bh eok koq em b lkji weon boq 
xywkoqdq abww pdha b adnawi yewdxakq, qbjc peeq mweej. 
Hak ykbgegc-vwtk gkdwdon pbx dowbdq pdha nwkbsdon 
newqko xisvewx habh pkjk geohdotbwwi seldon boq 
gabondon wdck xesk koejsetx akblkowi oehdgk vebjq. 
Hak pbwwx eo kbga xdqk pkjk ybokwkq do xadoi qbjc 
peeq boq abq sboi ndwqkq mdjkywbgkx xkh dohe haks.

pdrbjqx pkjk mejsdon vkmejk kbga mdjkywbgk, pbdhdon he 
qkybjh. 

Abwmpbi qepo hak abww pbx b metohbdo. B njety em 
newqko xhbhtkx, wbjnkj habo wdmk-xdrk, xheeq do hak 
sdqqwk em b gdjgtwbj yeew. Hbwwkxh em haks bww pbx b

pdhga, b gkohbtj, b nevwdo, boq b aetxk-kwm. Hak wbxh 
hajkk pkjk bww weecdon bqejdonwi ty bh hak pdhga boq 
pdrbjq. Nwdhhkjdon zkhx em pbhkj pkjk mwidon mjes hak 
koqx em hak hpe pboqx, hak yedoh em hak gkohbtj’x 
bjjep, hak hdy em hak nevwdo’x abh, boq kbga em hak 
aetxk-kwm’x kbjx, xe habh hak hdocwdon adxx em mbwwdon 
pbhkj pbx bqqkq he hak yeyx boq gjbgcx em

pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx, sexh em paes pkjk pkbjdon 
nwts, kbjwi-sejodon weecx, xhjeqk hepbjq b xkh em 
newqko nbhkx bh hak mbj koq em hak abww. 

“Hadx pbi,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki.

“Qepo do ewq — vth haki hewq sk — Skjwdo’x vkbjq — ” 

Sj. Pkbxwki weeckq bh adx pbhga, wkh eth b ikwy, boq

akkwx. 

“Pai ablk haki gabonkq hak hdsk?” Abjji xbdq 
vjkbhawkxxwi bx haki atjhwkq ybxh hak Btjej gtvdgwkx;
