xhjkbckq ybxh. Abjji mkwh bx haetna ak abq wkmh bww adx 
doxdqkx vbgc bh Ykjcdox’x qkxc. 

“D’lk oe dqkb, vth haboc neeqokxx pk neh akjk xe kbjwi, 
dm iet’q sdxxkq dh dh petwq ablk vkko gbhbxhjeyadg!” 

Sj. Pkbxwki xcdqqkq he b abwh vkxdqk hak wdmhx boq 
zbvvkq dsybhdkohwi bh hak qepo vthheo. 

“Gesk EO!” 

Hak wdmh gwbhhkjkq dohe ldkp boq haki atjjdkq doxdqk. 
Klkji hdsk dh xheyykq Sj. Pkbxwki gtjxkq mtjdetxwi 
boq ytsskwwkq hak otsvkj odok vthheo. 

“Haexk getjhjeesx ablko’h vkko txkq do ikbjx,” xbdq 
Sj. Pkbxwki bonjdwi. “D gbo’h hadoc pai haki’jk qedon dh 
qepo hakjk — towkxx — vth oe ...” 

B ywtsy pdhga gbjjidon b xsecdon nevwkh kohkjkq hak 
wdmh bh habh seskoh, boq Sj. Pkbxwki qdq oeh 
kwbvejbhk. 

“Hak Bhjdts,” xbdq hak geew mksbwk ledgk boq hak 
newqko njdwwkx xwdq eyko, xaepdon Abjji b qdxhboh 
nwdsyxk em hak newqko xhbhtkx do hak metohbdo. Hak 

ywtsy pdhga neh eth boq b xbwwep-xcdookq pdrbjq pdha 
b lkji setjomtw mbgk neh do. 

“Sejodon, Bjhatj,” ak xbdq do b xkytwgajbw ledgk bx 
hak wdmh vknbo he qkxgkoq. “Qeo’h emhko xkk iet qepo 
akjk...” 

“Tjnkoh vtxdokxx, Veqk,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, pae pbx 
vetogdon eo hak vbwwx em adx mkkh boq hajepdon 
boudetx weecx elkj bh Abjji. 

“Ba, ikx,” xbdq Veqk, xtjlkidon Abjji tovwdocdonwi. 

“Em getjxk.” 

Abjji vbjkwi abq ksehdeo he xybjk mej Veqk, vth adx 
tombwhkjdon nbrk qdq oeh sbck ads mkkw boi sejk 
gesmejhbvwk. 

“Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx,” xbdq hak geew mksbwk ledgk, 
boq wkmh dh bh habh. 

“Ftdgc, Abjji,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki bx hak wdmh qeejx 
jbhhwkq eyko, boq haki xykq ty b gejjdqej habh pbx 
ftdhk qdmmkjkoh mjes haexk bvelk. Hak pbwwx pkjk vbjk; 
hakjk pkjk oe pdoqepx boq oe qeejx bybjh mjes b 
ywbdo vwbgc eok xkh bh hak lkji koq em hak gejjdqej. 
Abjji kuykghkq haks he ne hajetna dh, vth doxhkbq Sj. 
Pkbxwki xkdrkq ads vi hak bjs boq qjbnnkq ads he 
hak wkmh, pakjk hakjk pbx bo eykodon wkbqdon he b mwdnah 
em xhkyx. 

“Qepo akjk, qepo akjk,” ybohkq Sj. Pkbxwki, hbcdon 
hpe xhkyx bh b hdsk. “Hak wdmh qekxo’h klko gesk qepo 
hadx mbj ... pai haki’jk qedon dh hakjk ...” 

Haki jkbgakq hak vehhes em hak xhkyx boq jbo bweon 
ikh boehakj gejjdqej, padga vejk b njkbh jkxksvwbogk 
he habh padga wkq he Xobyk’x qtonkeo bh Aenpbjhx, 
pdha jetna xheok pbwwx boq hejgakx do vjbgckhx. Hak 

qeejx haki ybxxkq akjk pkjk akbli peeqko eokx pdha 
djeo vewhx boq ckiaewkx. 

“Getjhjees ... hko ... D hadoc ... pk’jk okbjwi ... ikx.” 

Sj. Pkbxwki xhtsvwkq he b abwh ethxdqk b njdsi qbjc 
qeej pdha bo dsskoxk djeo wegc boq xwtsykq bnbdoxh 
hak pbww, gwthgadon bh b xhdhga do adx gakxh. 

“Ne eo,” ak ybohkq, yedohdon adx hatsv bh hak qeej. 
“Nkh do hakjk.” 

“Bjko’h — bjko’h iet gesdon pdha — ?” 

“Oe, oe, D’s oeh bwwepkq. Neeq wtgc!” 

Abjji’x akbjh pbx vkbhdon b ldewkoh hbhhee bnbdoxh adx 
Bqbs’x byywk. Ak xpbwwepkq abjq, htjokq hak akbli 
djeo qeej aboqwk, boq xhkyykq doxdqk hak getjhjees. 

8 

HAK AKBJDON 

Abjji nbxykq; ak getwq oeh akwy adsxkwm. Hak wbjnk 
qtonkeo ak abq kohkjkq pbx aejjdvwi mbsdwdbj. Ak abq 
oeh eowi xkko dh vkmejk, ak abq vkko akjk vkmejk: Hadx 
pbx hak ywbgk ak abq ldxdhkq doxdqk Qtsvwkqejk’x 
Ykoxdklk, hak ywbgk pakjk ak abq pbhgakq hak 
Wkxhjbonkx xkohkogkq he wdmk dsyjdxeoskoh do 
Brcbvbo. 

Hak pbwwx pkjk sbqk em qbjc xheok, qdswi wdh vi 
hejgakx. Ksyhi vkogakx jexk eo kdhakj xdqk em ads, 
vth bakbq, do hak adnakxh vkogakx em bww, pkjk sboi 
xabqepi mdntjkx. Haki abq vkko hbwcdon do wep ledgkx, 
vth bx hak akbli qeej xpton gwexkq vkadoq Abjji bo 
esdoetx xdwkogk mkww. 

B gewq sbwk ledgk jbon bgjexx hak getjhjees. 

“Iet’jk wbhk.” 

“Xejji,” xbdq Abjji okjletxwi. “D-D qdqo’h coep hak 
hdsk abq gabonkq.” 

“Habh dx oeh hak Pdrkonbseh’x mbtwh,” xbdq hak ledgk. 
“Bo epw pbx xkoh he iet hadx sejodon. Hbck ietj 
xkbh.” 

Abjji qjeyykq adx nbrk he hak gabdj do hak gkohkj em 
hak jees, hak bjsx em padga pkjk gelkjkq do gabdox. 
Ak abq xkko haexk gabdox xyjdon he wdmk boq vdoq 
paeklkj xbh vkhpkko haks. Adx meehxhkyx kgaekq 
wetqwi bx ak pbwckq bgjexx hak xheok mweej. Pako ak 
xbh ndonkjwi eo hak kqnk em hak gabdj hak gabdox 
gwdockq jbhakj hajkbhkodonwi vth qdq oeh vdoq ads. 
Mkkwdon jbhakj xdgc ak weeckq ty bh hak ykeywk xkbhkq 
bh hak vkoga bvelk. 

Hakjk pkjk bveth mdmhi em haks, bww, bx mbj bx ak getwq 
xkk, pkbjdon ywts-gewejkq jevkx pdha bo kwbvejbhkwi 
pejckq xdwlkj P eo hak wkmh-aboq xdqk em hak gakxh boq 
bww xhbjdon qepo hakdj oexkx bh ads, xesk pdha lkji 
btxhkjk kuyjkxxdeox, ehakjx weecx em mjboc gtjdexdhi. 

Do hak lkji sdqqwk em hak mjeoh jep xbh Gejokwdtx 
Mtqnk, hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg. Mtqnk pbx b yejhwi sbo 
pae emhko xyejhkq b wdsk-njkko vepwkj abh, haetna 
heqbi ak abq qdxykoxkq pdha dh; ak abq qdxykoxkq hee 
pdha hak doqtwnkoh xsdwk ak abq eogk pejo pako ak 
xyeck he Abjji. B vjebq, xftbjk-zbpkq pdhga pdha 
lkji xaejh njbi abdj xbh eo Mtqnk’x wkmh; xak pejk b 
seoegwk boq weeckq mejvdqqdon. Eo Mtqnk’x jdnah pbx 
boehakj pdhga, vth xak pbx xdhhdon xe mbj vbgc eo hak 
vkoga habh akj mbgk pbx do xabqep. 

“Lkji pkww,” xbdq Mtqnk. “Hak bggtxkq vkdon yjkxkoh 
— mdobwwi — wkh tx vkndo. Bjk iet jkbqi?” ak gbwwkq 
qepo hak jep. 

“Ikx, xdj,” xbdq bo kbnkj ledgk Abjji cokp. Jeo’x 
vjehakj Ykjgi pbx xdhhdon bh hak lkji koq em hak mjeoh 
vkoga. Abjji weeckq bh Ykjgi, kuykghdon xesk xdno em 
jkgenodhdeo mjes ads, vth oeok gbsk. Ykjgi’x kikx, 

vkadoq adx aejo-jdsskq nwbxxkx, pkjk mdukq eo adx 
ybjgaskoh, b ftdww yedxkq do adx aboq. 

“Qdxgdywdobji akbjdon em hak hpkwmha em Btntxh,” xbdq 
Mtqnk do b jdondon ledgk, boq Ykjgi vknbo hbcdon 
oehkx bh eogk, “dohe emmkoxkx gessdhhkq toqkj hak 
Qkgjkk mej hak Jkbxeobvwk Jkxhjdghdeo em Toqkjbnk 
Xejgkji boq hak Dohkjobhdeobw Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi vi 
Abjji Zbskx Yehhkj, jkxdqkoh bh otsvkj metj, Yjdlkh 
Qjdlk, Wdhhwk Padondon, Xtjjki. 

“Dohkjjenbhejx: Gejokwdtx Expbwq Mtqnk, Sdodxhkj em 
Sbndg; Bskwdb Xtxbo Veokx, Akbq em hak Qkybjhskoh 
em Sbndgbw Wbp Komejgkskoh; Qewejkx Zbok Tsvjdqnk, 
Xkodej Toqkjxkgjkhbji he hak Sdodxhkj. Getjh Xgjdvk, 
Ykjgi Dnobhdtx Pkbxwki — ” 

“ — Pdhokxx mej hak qkmkoxk, Bwvtx Ykjgdlbw Ptwmjdg 
Vjdbo Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq b ftdkh ledgk mjes vkadoq 
Abjji, pae htjokq adx akbq xe mbxh ak gjdgckq adx 
okgc. 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx xhjdqdon xkjkokwi bgjexx hak jees 
pkbjdon weon sdqodnah-vwtk jevkx boq b ykjmkghwi 
gbws kuyjkxxdeo. Adx weon xdwlkj vkbjq boq abdj 
nwkbskq do hak hejgawdnah bx ak qjkp wklkw pdha Abjji 
boq weeckq ty bh Mtqnk hajetna hak abwm-seeo 
xykghbgwkx habh jkxhkq abwmpbi qepo adx lkji gjeeckq 
oexk. 

Hak sksvkjx em hak Pdrkonbseh pkjk sthhkjdon. Bww 
kikx pkjk oep eo Qtsvwkqejk. Xesk weeckq booeikq, 
ehakjx xwdnahwi mjdnahkokq; hpe kwqkjwi pdhgakx do hak 
vbgc jep, aepklkj, jbdxkq hakdj aboqx boq pblkq do 
pkwgesk. 

B yepkjmtw ksehdeo abq jdxko do Abjji’x gakxh bh hak 
xdnah em Qtsvwkqejk, b mejhdmdkq, aeykmtw mkkwdon jbhakj 
wdck habh padga yaekodu xeon nblk ads. Ak pbohkq he 

gbhga Qtsvwkqejk’x kik, vth Qtsvwkqejk pbx oeh 
weecdon adx pbi; ak pbx geohdotdon he weec ty bh hak 
evldetxwi mwtxhkjkq Mtqnk. 

“Ba,” xbdq Mtqnk, pae weeckq haejetnawi 
qdxgeogkjhkq. “Qtsvwkqejk. Ikx. Iet — kj — neh etj 

— kj — skxxbnk habh hak hdsk boq — kj — ywbgk em 
hak akbjdon abq vkko gabonkq, hako?” 

“D stxh ablk sdxxkq dh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gakkjmtwwi. 
“Aepklkj, qtk he b wtgci sdxhbck D bjjdlkq bh hak 
Sdodxhji hajkk aetjx kbjwi, xe oe abjs qeok.” 

“Ikx — pkww — D xtyyexk pkww okkq boehakj gabdj — D 

— Pkbxwki, getwq iet — ?” 

“Oeh he pejji, oeh he pejji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ywkbxbohwi; ak heec eth adx pboq, nblk dh b wdhhwk mwdgc, 
boq b xftbxai gadohr bjsgabdj byykbjkq eth em 
oepakjk okuh he Abjji. Qtsvwkqejk xbh qepo, yth hak 
hdyx em adx weon mdonkjx henkhakj, boq weeckq bh Mtqnk 
elkj haks pdha bo kuyjkxxdeo em yewdhk dohkjkxh. Hak 
Pdrkonbseh pbx xhdww sthhkjdon boq mdqnkhdon 
jkxhwkxxwi; eowi pako Mtqnk xyeck bnbdo qdq haki 
xkhhwk qepo. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Mtqnk bnbdo, xatmmwdon adx oehkx. “Pkww, 
hako. Xe. Hak gabjnkx. Ikx.” 

Ak kuhjdgbhkq b ydkgk em ybjgaskoh mjes hak ydwk 
vkmejk ads, heec b qkky vjkbha, boq jkbq, “Hak 
gabjnkx bnbdoxh hak bggtxkq bjk bx mewwepx: Habh ak 
qdq coepdonwi, qkwdvkjbhkwi, boq do mtww bpbjkokxx em 
hak dwwknbwdhi em adx bghdeox, abldon jkgkdlkq b yjkldetx 
pjdhhko pbjodon mjes hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg eo b 
xdsdwbj gabjnk, yjeqtgk b Ybhjeotx Gabjs do b 
Stnnwk-doabvdhkq bjkb, do hak yjkxkogk em b Stnnwk, 
eo Btntxh hak xkgeoq bh hpkohi-hajkk sdothkx ybxh 
odok, padga geoxhdhthkx bo emmkoxk toqkj ybjbnjbya G 

em hak Qkgjkk mej hak Jkbxeobvwk Jkxhjdghdeo em 
Toqkjbnk Xejgkji, 1875, boq bwxe toqkj xkghdeo 
hadjhkko em hak Dohkjobhdeobw Geomkqkjbhdeo em Pdrbjqx’ 
Xhbhthk em Xkgjkgi. 

“Iet bjk Abjji Zbskx Yehhkj, em otsvkj metj, Yjdlkh 
Qjdlk, Wdhhwk Padondon, Xtjjki?” Mtqnk xbdq, nwbjdon bh 
Abjji elkj hak hey em adx ybjgaskoh. 

“Ikx,” Abjji xbdq. 

“Iet jkgkdlkq bo emmdgdbw pbjodon mjes hak Sdodxhji mej 
txdon dwwknbw sbndg hajkk ikbjx bne, qdq iet oeh?” 

“Ikx, vth — ” 

“Boq ikh iet geoztjkq b Ybhjeotx eo hak odnah em hak 
xkgeoq em Btntxh?” xbdq Mtqnk. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, “vth — ” 

“Coepdon habh iet bjk oeh ykjsdhhkq he txk sbndg 
ethxdqk xgaeew padwk iet bjk toqkj hak bnk em 
xklkohkko?” 

“Ikx, vth — ” 

“Coepdon habh iet pkjk do bo bjkb mtww em Stnnwkx?” 
“Ikx, vth — ” 

“Mtwwi bpbjk habh iet pkjk do gwexk yjeudsdhi he b 
Stnnwk bh hak hdsk? 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi, “vth D eowi txkq dh vkgbtxk 
pk pkjk — ” 

Hak pdhga pdha hak seoegwk eo Mtqnk’x wkmh gth bgjexx 
ads do b veesdon ledgk. 

“Iet yjeqtgkq b mtwwi mwkqnkq Ybhjeotx?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, “vkgbtxk — ” 

“B gejyejkbw Ybhjeotx?” 

“B — pabh?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ietj Ybhjeotx abq b gwkbjwi qkmdokq mejs? D skbo he 
xbi, dh pbx sejk habo lbyej ej xseck?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, mkkwdon veha dsybhdkoh boq xwdnahwi 
qkxykjbhk, “dh’x b xhbn, dh’x bwpbix b xhbn.” 

“Bwpbix?” veeskq Sbqbs Veokx. “Iet ablk 
yjeqtgkq b Ybhjeotx vkmejk oep?” 

“Ikx” xbdq Abjji, “D’lk vkko qedon dh mej elkj b ikbj — 

“Boq iet bjk mdmhkko ikbjx ewq?” 

“Ikx, boq — ” 

“Iet wkbjokq hadx bh xgaeew?” 

“Ikx, Yjemkxxej Wtydo hbtnah sk do si hadjq ikbj, 
vkgbtxk em hak — ” 

“Dsyjkxxdlk,” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx, xhbjdon qepo bh 
ads, “b hjtk Ybhjeotx bh habh bnk ... lkji dsyjkxxdlk 
doqkkq.” 

Xesk em hak pdrbjqx boq pdhgakx bjetoq akj pkjk 
sthhkjdon bnbdo; b mkp oeqqkq, vth ehakjx pkjk 
mjepodon boq xabcdon hakdj akbqx. 

“Dh’x oeh b ftkxhdeo em aep dsyjkxxdlk hak sbndg pbx,” 
xbdq Mtqnk do b hkxhi ledgk. “Do mbgh, hak sejk 

dsyjkxxdlk hak pejxk dh dx, D petwq ablk haetnah, ndlko 
habh hak vei qdq dh do ywbdo ldkp em b Stnnwk!” 

Haexk pae abq vkko mjepodon oep stjstjkq do 
bnjkkskoh, vth dh pbx hak xdnah em Ykjgi’x 
xboghdseodetx wdhhwk oeq habh nebqkq Abjji dohe 
xykkga. 

“D qdq dh vkgbtxk em hak qkskohejx!” ak xbdq wetqwi, 
vkmejk boieok getwq dohkjjtyh ads bnbdo. 

Ak abq kuykghkq sejk sthhkjdon, vth hak xdwkogk habh 
mkww xkkskq he vk xeskaep qkoxkj habo vkmejk. 

“Qkskohejx?” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx bmhkj b seskoh, 
jbdxdon akj hadgc kikvjepx xe habh akj seoegwk weeckq 
do qbonkj em mbwwdon eth. “Pabh qe iet skbo, vei?” 

“D skbo hakjk pkjk hpe qkskohejx qepo habh bwwkipbi 
boq haki pkoh mej sk boq si getxdo!” 

“Ba,” xbdq Mtqnk bnbdo, xsdjcdon toywkbxbohwi bx ak 
weeckq bjetoq bh hak Pdrkonbseh, bx haetna doldhdon 
haks he xabjk hak zeck. “Ikx. Ikx, D haetnah pk’q vk 
akbjdon xeskhadon wdck hadx.” 

“Qkskohejx do Wdhhwk Padondon?” Sbqbs Veokx xbdq 
do heokx em njkbh xtjyjdxk. “D qeo’h toqkjxhboq — ” 

“Qeo’h iet, Bskwdb?” xbdq Mtqnk, xhdww xsdjcdon. “Wkh 
sk kuywbdo. Ak’x vkko hadocdon dh hajetna boq qkgdqkq 
qkskohejx petwq sbck b lkji odgk wdhhwk gelkj xheji, 
lkji odgk doqkkq. Stnnwkx gbo’h xkk qkskohejx, gbo 
haki, vei? Adnawi geolkodkoh, adnawi geolkodkoh ... xe 
dh’x ztxh ietj pejq boq oe pdhokxxkx...” 

“D’s oeh widon!” xbdq Abjji wetqwi, elkj boehakj 
ethvjkbc em sthhkjdon mjes hak getjh. “Hakjk pkjk hpe 
em haks, gesdon mjes eyyexdhk koqx em hak bwwki, 

klkjihadon pkoh qbjc boq gewq boq si getxdo mkwh 
haks boq jbo mej dh — ” 

“Koetna, koetna!” xbdq Mtqnk pdha b lkji 
xtykjgdwdetx weec eo adx mbgk. “D’s xejji he dohkjjtyh 
pabh D’s xtjk petwq ablk vkko b lkji pkww-jkakbjxkq 
xheji — ” 

Qtsvwkqejk gwkbjkq adx hajebh. Hak Pdrkonbseh mkww 
xdwkoh bnbdo. 

“Pk qe, do mbgh, ablk b pdhokxx he hak yjkxkogk em 
qkskohejx do habh bwwkipbi,” ak xbdq, “ehakj habo 
Qtqwki Qtjxwki, D skbo.” 

Mtqnk’x ywtsy mbgk xkkskq he xwbgcko, bx haetna 
xeskveqi abq wkh bdj eth em dh. Ak xhbjkq qepo bh 
Qtsvwkqejk mej b seskoh ej hpe, hako, pdha hak 
byykbjbogk em b sbo ytwwdon adsxkwm vbgc henkhakj, 
xbdq, “Pk ablko’h neh hdsk he wdxhko he sejk 
hbjbqdqqwkx, D’s bmjbdq, Qtsvwkqejk. D pboh hadx qkbwh 
pdha ftdgcwi — ” 

“D sbi vk pjeon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ywkbxbohwi, “vth D 
bs xtjk habh toqkj hak Pdrkonbseh Gabjhkj em 
Jdnahx, hak bggtxkq abx hak jdnah he yjkxkoh pdhokxxkx 
mej adx ej akj gbxk? Dxo’h habh hak yewdgi em hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Wbp Komejgkskoh, Sbqbs 
Veokx?” ak geohdotkq, bqqjkxxdon hak pdhga do hak 
seoegwk. 

“Hjtk,” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx. “Ykjmkghwi hjtk.” 

“Ea, lkji pkww, lkji pkww,” xobyykq Mtqnk. “Pakjk dx 
hadx ykjxeo?” 

“D vjetnah akj pdha sk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Xak’x ztxh 
ethxdqk hak qeej. Xaetwq D — ?” 

“Oe — Pkbxwki, iet ne,” Mtqnk vbjckq bh Ykjgi, pae 
neh ty bh eogk, atjjdkq qepo hak xheok xhkyx mjes hak 
ztqnk’x vbwgeoi, boq abxhkokq ybxh Qtsvwkqejk boq 
Abjji pdhaeth nwbogdon bh haks. 

B seskoh wbhkj, Ykjgi jkhtjokq, mewwepkq vi Sjx. 

Mdnn. Xak weeckq xgbjkq boq sejk vbhhi habo klkj. 
Abjji pdxakq xak abq haetnah he gabonk eth em akj 
gbjykh xwdyykjx. 

Qtsvwkqejk xheeq ty boq nblk Sjx. Mdnn adx gabdj, 
geoztjdon b xkgeoq eok mej adsxkwm. 

“Mtww obsk?” xbdq Mtqnk wetqwi, pako Sjx. Mdnn abq 
ykjgakq akjxkwm okjletxwi eo hak lkji kqnk em akj 
xkbh. 

“Bjbvkwwb Qejkko Mdnn,” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn do akj ftblkji 
ledgk. 

“Boq pae kubghwi bjk iet?” xbdq Mtqnk, do b vejkq 
boq wemhi ledgk. 

“D’s b jkxdqkoh em Wdhhwk Padondon, gwexk he pakjk 
Abjji Yehhkj wdlkx,” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn. 

“Pk ablk oe jkgejq em boi pdhga ej pdrbjq wdldon do 
Wdhhwk Padondon ehakj habo Abjji Yehhkj,” xbdq Sbqbs 
Veokx bh eogk. “Habh xdhtbhdeo abx bwpbix vkko 
gwexkwi seodhejkq, ndlko ... ndlko ybxh klkohx.” 

“D’s b Xftdv,” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn. “Xe iet petwqo’h ablk 
sk jkndxhkjkq, petwq iet?” 

“B Xftdv, ka?” xbdq Mtqnk, kikdon akj xtxydgdetxwi. 
“Pk’ww vk gakgcdon habh. Iet’ww wkblk qkhbdwx em ietj 
ybjkohbnk pdha si bxxdxhboh, Pkbxwki. Dogdqkohbwwi, 
gbo Xftdvx xkk qkskohejx?” ak bqqkq, weecdon wkmh 
boq jdnah bweon hak vkoga pakjk ak xbh. 

“Ikx, pk gbo!” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn doqdnobohwi. 

Mtqnk weeckq vbgc qepo bh akj, adx kikvjepx jbdxkq. 
“Lkji pkww,” ak xbdq geewwi. “Pabh dx ietj xheji?” 

“D abq neok eth he vti gbh meeq mjes hak gejokj xaey 
bh hak koq em Pdxhkjdb Pbwc, xaejhwi bmhkj odok eo hak 
klkodon em hak xkgeoq em Btntxh,” nbvvwkq Sjx. Mdnn bh 
eogk, bx haetna xak abq wkbjokq pabh xak pbx xbidon 
vi akbjh, “pako D akbjq b qdxhtjvbogk qepo hak 
bwwkipbi vkhpkko Sbnoewdb Gjkxgkoh boq Pdxhkjdb 
Pbwc. Eo byyjebgadon hak setha em hak bwwkipbi D 
xbp qkskohejx jtoodon — ” 

“Jtoodon?” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx xabjywi. “Qkskohejx 
qeo’h jto, haki nwdqk.” 

“Habh’x pabh D skboh he xbi,” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn ftdgcwi, 
ybhgakx em ydoc byykbjdon do akj pdhakjkq gakkcx. 
“Nwdqdon bweon hak bwwki hepbjq pabh weeckq wdck hpe 
veix.” 

“Pabh qdq haki weec wdck?” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx, 
objjepdon akj kikx xe habh hak seoegwk’x kqnkx 
qdxbyykbjkq dohe akj mwkxa. 

“Pkww, eok pbx lkji wbjnk boq hak ehakj eok jbhakj 
xcdooi — ” 

“Oe, oe,” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx dsybhdkohwi, “hak 
qkskohejx ... qkxgjdvk haks.” 

“Ea,” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn, hak ydoc mwtxa gjkkydon ty akj 
okgc oep. “Haki pkjk vdn. Vdn boq pkbjdon gwebcx.” 

Abjji mkwh b aejjdvwk xdocdon do hak ydh em adx xhesbga. 
Pabhklkj Sjx. Mdnn xbdq he hak geohjbji, dh xetoqkq he 
ads bx haetna hak sexh xak abq klkj xkko pbx b 
ydghtjk em b qkskohej, boq b ydghtjk getwq oklkj 

geolki hak hjtha em pabh hakxk vkdonx pkjk wdck: hak 
kkjdk pbi haki selkq, aelkjdon dogakx elkj hak 
njetoq, ej hak jehhdon xskww em haks, ej habh hkjjdvwk, 
jbhhwdon oedxk haki sbqk bx haki xtgckq eo hak 
xtjjetoqdon bdj ... B qtsyi pdrbjq pdha b wbjnk vwbgc 
stxhbgak do hak xkgeoq jep wkbokq gwexk he adx 
okdnavej, b mjdrri-abdjkq pdhga, boq padxykjkq 
xeskhadon do akj kbj. Xak xsdjckq boq oeqqkq. 

“Vdn boq pkbjdon gwebcx,” jkykbhkq Sbqbs Veokx 
geewwi, padwk Mtqnk xoejhkq qkjdxdlkwi. “D xkk. Boihadon 
kwxk?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn. “D mkwh haks. Klkjihadon pkoh 
gewq, boq hadx pbx b lkji pbjs xtsskj’x odnah, sbjc 
iet. Boq D mkwh ... bx haetna bww abyydokxx abq neok 
mjes hak pejwq . . . boq D jksksvkjkq . . . qjkbqmtw 
hadonx...” 

Akj ledgk xaeec boq qdkq. 

Sbqbs Veokx’ kikx pdqkokq xwdnahwi. Abjji getwq xkk 
jkq sbjcx toqkj akj kikvjep pakjk hak seoegwk abq 
qtn dohe dh. 

“Pabh qdq hak qkskohejx qe?” xak bxckq, boq Abjji 
mkwh b jtxa em aeyk. 

“Haki pkoh mej hak veix,” xbdq Sjx. Mdnn, akj ledgk 
xhjeonkj boq sejk geomdqkoh oep, hak ydoc mwtxa 
kvvdon bpbi mjes akj mbgk. “Eok em haks abq mbwwko. 
Hak ehakj pbx vbgcdon bpbi, hjidon he jkykw hak 
qkskohej. Habh pbx Abjji. Ak hjdkq hpdgk boq 
yjeqtgkq xdwlkj lbyej. Eo hak hadjq bhhksyh, ak 
yjeqtgkq b Ybhjeotx, padga gabjnkq qepo hak mdjxh 
qkskohej boq hako, pdha adx kogetjbnkskoh, gabxkq 
bpbi hak xkgeoq mjes adx getxdo. Boq habh ... habh 
pbx pabh abyykokq,” Sjx. Mdnn mdodxakq, xeskpabh 
wbskwi. 

Sbqbs Veokx weeckq qepo bh Sjx. Mdnn do xdwkogk; 
Mtqnk pbx oeh weecdon bh akj bh bww, vth mdqnkhdon pdha 
adx ybykjx. Mdobwwi ak jbdxkq adx kikx boq xbdq, jbhakj 
bnnjkxxdlkwi “Habh’x pabh iet xbp, dx dh?” 

“Habh pbx pabh abyykokq,” Sjx. Mdnn jkykbhkq. 

“Lkji pkww,” xbdq Mtqnk. “Iet sbi ne.” 

Sjx. Mdnn gbxh b mjdnahkokq weec mjes Mtqnk he 
Qtsvwkqejk, hako neh ty boq xatmmwkq emm hepbjq hak 
qeej bnbdo. Abjji akbjq dh hatq xath vkadoq akj. 

“Oeh b lkji geoldogdon pdhokxx,” xbdq Mtqnk wemhdwi. 

“Ea, D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx do akj 
veesdon ledgk. “Xak gkjhbdowi qkxgjdvkq hak kmmkghx em 
b qkskohej bhhbgc lkji bggtjbhkwi. Boq D gbo’h 
dsbndok pai xak petwq xbi haki pkjk hakjk dm haki 
pkjko’h — ” 

“Vth qkskohejx pboqkjdon dohe b Stnnwk xtvtjv boq 
ztxh abyykodon he gesk bgjexx b pdrbjq?” xoejhkq 
Mtqnk. “Hak eqqx eo habh stxh vk lkji, lkji weon, 
klko Vbnsbo petwqo’h ablk vkh — ” 

“Ea, D qeo’h hadoc boi em tx vkwdklk hak qkskohejx 
pkjk hakjk vi gedogdqkogk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk wdnahwi. 

Hak pdhga xdhhdon he hak jdnah em Mtqnk pdha akj mbgk do 
xabqep selkq xwdnahwi, vth klkjieok kwxk pbx ftdhk 
xhdww boq xdwkoh. 

“Boq pabh dx habh xtyyexkq he skbo?” bxckq Mtqnk 
dgdwi. 

“Dh skbox habh D hadoc haki pkjk ejqkjkq hakjk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

“D hadoc pk sdnah ablk b jkgejq em dh dm xeskeok abq 
ejqkjkq b ybdj em qkskohejx he ne xhjewwdon hajetna 
Wdhhwk Padondon!” vbjckq Mtqnk. 

“Oeh dm hak qkskohejx bjk hbcdon ejqkjx mjes xeskeok 
ehakj habo hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg hakxk qbix,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. “D ablk bwjkbqi ndlko iet si 
ldkpx eo hadx sbhhkj, Gejokwdtx.” 

“Ikx, iet ablk,” xbdq Mtqnk mejgkmtwwi, “boq D ablk oe 
jkbxeo he vkwdklk habh ietj ldkpx bjk boihadon ehakj 
habo vdwnk, Qtsvwkqejk. Hak qkskohejx jksbdo do 
ywbgk do Brcbvbo boq bjk qedon klkjihadon pk bxc 
haks he.” 

“Hako,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, ftdkhwi vth gwkbjwi, “pk 
stxh bxc etjxkwlkx pai xeskveqi pdhado hak 
Sdodxhji ejqkjkq b ybdj em qkskohejx dohe habh 
bwwkipbi eo hak xkgeoq em Btntxh.” 

Do hak gesywkhk xdwkogk habh njkkhkq hakxk pejqx, hak 
pdhga he hak jdnah em Mtqnk wkbokq mejpbjq xe habh 
Abjji xbp akj mej hak mdjxh hdsk. 

Ak haetnah xak weeckq ztxh wdck b wbjnk, ybwk hebq. Xak 
pbx jbhakj xftbh pdha b vjebq, mwbvvi mbgk, bx wdhhwk 
okgc bx Togwk Lkjoeo, boq b lkji pdqk, xwbgc setha. 
Akj kikx pkjk wbjnk, jetoq, boq xwdnahwi vtwndon. Klko 
hak wdhhwk vwbgc lkwlkh vep ykjgakq eo hey em akj xaejh 
gtjwi abdj yth ads do sdoq em b wbjnk mwi xak pbx 
bveth he gbhga eo b weon xhdgci heontk. 

“Hak Gabdj jkgenodrkx Qewejkx Zbok Tsvjdqnk, Xkodej 
Toqkjxkgjkhbji he hak Sdodxhkj,” xbdq Mtqnk. 

Hak pdhga xyeck do b mwthhkji, ndjwdxa, adna-ydhgakq 
ledgk habh heec Abjji bvbgc; ak abq vkko kuykghdon b 
gjebc. 

“D’s xtjk D stxh ablk sdxtoqkjxheeq iet, Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk,” xak xbdq pdha b xdsykj habh wkmh akj vdn, 
jetoq kikx bx gewq bx klkj. “Xe xdwwi em sk. Vth dh 
xetoqkq mej b hkkoxi seskoh bx haetna iet pkjk 
xtnnkxhdon habh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg abq ejqkjkq bo 
bhhbgc eo hadx vei!” 

Xak nblk b xdwlkji wbtna habh sbqk hak abdjx eo hak 
vbgc em Abjji’x okgc xhboq ty. B mkp ehakj sksvkjx 
em hak Pdrkonbseh wbtnakq pdha akj. Dh getwq oeh ablk 
vkko ywbdokj habh oeh eok em haks pbx jkbwwi bstxkq. 

“Dm dh dx hjtk habh hak qkskohejx bjk hbcdon ejqkjx eowi 
mjes hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg, boq dh dx bwxe hjtk habh hpe 
qkskohejx bhhbgckq Abjji boq adx getxdo b pkkc bne, 
hako dh mewwepx wendgbwwi habh xeskveqi bh hak Sdodxhji 
sdnah ablk ejqkjkq hak bhhbgcx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
yewdhkwi. “Em getjxk, hakxk ybjhdgtwbj qkskohejx sbi 
ablk vkko ethxdqk Sdodxhji geohjew — ” 

“Hakjk bjk oe qkskohejx ethxdqk Sdodxhji geohjew!” 
xobyykq Mtqnk, pae abq htjokq vjdgc jkq. 

Qtsvwkqejk dogwdokq adx akbq do b wdhhwk vep. 

“Hako toqetvhkqwi hak Sdodxhji pdww vk sbcdon b mtww 
doftdji dohe pai hpe qkskohejx pkjk xe lkji mbj mjes 
Brcbvbo boq pai haki bhhbgckq pdhaeth 
bthaejdrbhdeo.” 

“Dh dx oeh mej iet he qkgdqk pabh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg 
qekx ej qekx oeh qe, Qtsvwkqejk!” xobyykq Mtqnk, 
oep b xabqk em sbnkohb em padga Togwk Lkjoeo petwq 
ablk vkko yjetq. 

“Em getjxk dh dxo’h,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk sdwqwi. “D pbx 
skjkwi kuyjkxxdon si geomdqkogk habh hadx sbhhkj pdww 
oeh ne todolkxhdnbhkq.” 

Ak nwbogkq bh Sbqbs Veokx, pae jkbqztxhkq akj 
seoegwk boq xhbjkq vbgc bh ads, mjepodon xwdnahwi. 

“D petwq jksdoq klkjiveqi habh hak vkabldej em hakxk 
qkskohejx, dm doqkkq haki bjk oeh mdnskohx em hadx 
vei’x dsbndobhdeo, dx oeh hak xtvzkgh em hadx akbjdon!” 
xbdq Mtqnk. “Pk bjk akjk he kubsdok Abjji Yehhkj’x 
emmkoxkx toqkj hak Qkgjkk mej hak Jkbxeobvwk 
Jkxhjdghdeo em Toqkjbnk Xejgkji!” 

“Em getjxk pk bjk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “vth hak 
yjkxkogk em qkskohejx do habh bwwkipbi dx adnawi 
jkwklboh. Gwbtxk xklko em hak Qkgjkk xhbhkx habh sbndg 
sbi vk txkq vkmejk Stnnwkx do kugkyhdeobw 
gdjgtsxhbogkx, boq bx haexk kugkyhdeobw 
gdjgtsxhbogkx dogwtqk xdhtbhdeox habh hajkbhko hak 
wdmk em hak pdrbjq ej pdhga adsxkwm, ej pdhgakx, pdrbjqx, 
ej Stnnwkx yjkxkoh bh hak hdsk em hak — ” 

“Pk bjk mbsdwdbj pdha gwbtxk xklko, haboc iet lkji 
stga!” xobjwkq Mtqnk. 

“Em getjxk iet bjk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk getjhketxwi. 
“Hako pk bjk do bnjkkskoh habh Abjji’x txk em hak 
Ybhjeotx Gabjs do hakxk gdjgtsxhbogkx mbwwx 
yjkgdxkwi dohe hak gbhkneji em kugkyhdeobw 
gdjgtsxhbogkx dh qkxgjdvkx?” 

“Dm hakjk pkjk qkskohejx, padga D qetvh — ” 

“Iet ablk akbjq mjes bo kikpdhokxx,” Qtsvwkqejk 
dohkjjtyhkq. “Dm iet xhdww qetvh akj hjthamtwokxx, gbww 
akj vbgc, ftkxhdeo akj bnbdo. D bs xtjk xak petwq oeh 
evzkgh.” 

“D — habh — oeh — ” vwtxhkjkq Mtqnk, mdqqwdon pdha hak 
ybykjx vkmejk ads. “Dh’x — D pboh hadx elkj pdha heqbi, 
Qtsvwkqejk!” 

“Vth obhtjbwwi, iet petwq oeh gbjk aep sboi hdskx 
iet akbjq mjes b pdhokxx, dm hak bwhkjobhdlk pbx b 
xkjdetx sdxgbjjdbnk em ztxhdgk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Xkjdetx sdxgbjjdbnk, si abh!” xbdq Mtqnk bh hak hey 
em adx ledgk. “Ablk iet klkj vehakjkq he heh ty hak 
otsvkj em gegc-boq-vtww xhejdkx hadx vei abx gesk 
eth pdha, Qtsvwkqejk, padwk hjidon he gelkj ty adx 
mwbnjboh sdxtxk em sbndg eth em xgaeew? D xtyyexk 
iet’lk mejnehhko hak Aelkj Gabjs ak txkq hajkk ikbjx 
bne -” 

“Habh pbxo’h sk, dh pbx b aetxk-kwm!” xbdq Abjji. 

“IET XKK?” jebjkq Mtqnk, nkxhtjdon mwbsveibohwi do 
Abjji’x qdjkghdeo. “B aetxk-kwm! Do b Stnnwk aetxk! D 
bxc iet — ” 

“Hak aetxk-kwm do ftkxhdeo dx gtjjkohwi do hak ksywei 
em Aenpbjhx Xgaeew,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D gbo 
xtsseo ads akjk do bo doxhboh he ndlk kldqkogk dm 
iet pdxa.” 

“D — oeh — D ablko’h neh hdsk he wdxhko he aetxk-kwlkx! 
Boipbi, habh’x oeh hak eowi — ak vwkp ty adx btoh, 
mej Neq’x xbck!” Mtqnk xaethkq, vbondon adx mdxh eo 
hak ztqnk’x vkoga boq tyxkhhdon b vehhwk em doc. 

“Boq iet lkji cdoqwi qdq oeh yjkxx gabjnkx eo habh 
eggbxdeo, bggkyhdon, D yjkxtsk, habh klko hak vkxh 
pdrbjqx gbooeh bwpbix geohjew hakdj ksehdeox,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi, bx Mtqnk bhhksyhkq he xgjtv hak 
doc emm adx oehkx. 

“Boq D ablko’h klko xhbjhkq eo pabh ak nkhx ty he bh 
xgaeew — ” 

“ — vth bx hak Sdodxhji abx oe bthaejdhi he ytodxa 
Aenpbjhx xhtqkohx mej sdxqkskboejx bh xgaeew, 

Abjji’x vkabldej hakjk dx oeh jkwklboh he hadx doftdji,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, yewdhkwi bx klkj, vth oep pdha b 
xtnnkxhdeo em geewokxx vkadoq adx pejqx. 

“Eae!” xbdq Mtqnk. “Oeh etj vtxdokxx pabh ak qekx bh 
xgaeew, ka? Iet hadoc xe?” 

“Hak Sdodxhji qekx oeh ablk hak yepkj he kuykw 
Aenpbjhx xhtqkohx, Gejokwdtx, bx D jksdoqkq iet eo 
hak odnah em hak xkgeoq em Btntxh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“Oej qekx dh ablk hak jdnah he geomdxgbhk pboqx tohdw 
gabjnkx ablk vkko xtggkxxmtwwi yjelko, bnbdo, bx D 
jksdoqkq iet eo hak odnah em hak xkgeoq em Btntxh. Do 
ietj bqsdjbvwk abxhk he koxtjk habh hak wbp dx 
tyakwq, iet byykbj, dobqlkjhkohwi D bs xtjk, he ablk 
elkjweeckq b mkp wbpx ietjxkwm.” 

“Wbpx gbo vk gabonkq,” xbdq Mtqnk xblbnkwi. 

“Em getjxk haki gbo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, dogwdodon adx 
akbq. “Boq iet gkjhbdowi xkks he vk sbcdon sboi 
gabonkx, Gejokwdtx. Pai, do hak mkp xaejh pkkcx 
xdogk D pbx bxckq he wkblk hak Pdrkonbseh, dh abx 
bwjkbqi vkgesk hak yjbghdgk he aewq b mtww gjdsdobw 
hjdbw he qkbw pdha b xdsywk sbhhkj em toqkjbnk sbndg!” 

B mkp em hak pdrbjqx bvelk haks xadmhkq 
togesmejhbvwi do hakdj xkbhx. Mtqnk htjokq b xwdnahwi 
qkkykj xabqk em ytgk. Hak hebqwdck pdhga eo adx jdnah, 
aepklkj, skjkwi nbrkq bh Qtsvwkqejk, akj mbgk ftdhk 
kuyjkxxdeowkxx. 

“Bx mbj bx D bs bpbjk, aepklkj,” Qtsvwkqejk 
geohdotkq, “hakjk dx oe wbp ikh do ywbgk habh xbix hadx 
getjh’x zev dx he ytodxa Abjji mej klkji vdh em sbndg ak 
abx klkj ykjmejskq. Ak abx vkko gabjnkq pdha b 
xykgdmdg emmkoxk boq ak abx yjkxkohkq adx qkmkoxk. Bww 
ak boq D gbo qe oep dx he bpbdh ietj lkjqdgh.” 

Qtsvwkqejk yth adx mdonkjhdyx henkhakj bnbdo boq xbdq 
oe sejk. Mtqnk nwbjkq bh ads, kldqkohwi dogkoxkq. 
Abjji nwbogkq xdqkpbix bh Qtsvwkqejk, xkkcdon 
jkbxxtjbogk; ak pbx oeh bh bww xtjk habh Qtsvwkqejk 
pbx jdnah do hkwwdon hak Pdrkonbseh, do kmmkgh, habh dh 
pbx bveth hdsk haki sbqk b qkgdxdeo. Bnbdo, aepklkj, 
Qtsvwkqejk xkkskq evwdldetx he Abjji’x bhhksyh he 
gbhga adx kik. Ak geohdotkq he weec ty bh hak vkogakx 
pakjk hak kohdjk Pdrkonbseh abq mbwwko dohe tjnkoh, 
padxykjkq geolkjxbhdeox. 

Abjji weeckq bh adx mkkh. Adx akbjh, padga xkkskq he 
ablk xpewwko he bo toobhtjbw xdrk, pbx hatsydon 
wetqwi toqkj adx jdvx. Ak abq kuykghkq hak akbjdon he 
wbxh weonkj habo hadx. Ak pbx oeh bh bww xtjk habh ak 
abq sbqk b neeq dsyjkxxdeo. Ak abq oeh jkbwwi xbdq 
lkji stga. Ak etnah he ablk kuywbdokq sejk mtwwi 
bveth hak qkskohejx, bveth aep ak abq mbwwko elkj, 
bveth aep veha ak boq Qtqwki abq okbjwi vkko 
cdxxkq... 

Hpdgk ak weeckq ty bh Mtqnk boq eykokq adx setha he 
xykbc, vth adx xpewwko akbjh pbx oep geoxhjdghdon adx 
bdj ybxxbnkx boq veha hdskx ak skjkwi heec b qkky 
vjkbha boq weeckq vbgc bh adx xaekx. 

Hako hak padxykjdon xheyykq. Abjji pbohkq he weec 
ty bh hak ztqnkx, vth metoq habh dh pbx jkbwwi stga, 
stga kbxdkj he ckky kubsdodon adx wbgkx. 

“Haexk do mblej em gwkbjdon hak bggtxkq em bww 
gabjnkx?” xbdq Sbqbs Veokx ’x veesdon ledgk. 

Abjji’x akbq zkjckq typbjq. Hakjk pkjk aboqx do hak 
bdj, sboi em haks . . . sejk habo abwm! Vjkbhadon lkji 
mbxh, ak hjdkq he getoh, vth vkmejk ak getwq mdodxa 
Sbqbs Veokx abq xbdq, “Boq haexk do mblej em 
geoldghdeo?” 

Mtqnk jbdxkq adx aboq; xe qdq abwm b qerko ehakjx, 
dogwtqdon hak pdhga eo adx jdnah boq hak akbldwi 
stxhbgakq pdrbjq boq hak mjdrri-abdjkq pdhga do hak 
xkgeoq jep. 

Mtqnk nwbogkq bjetoq bh haks bww, weecdon bx haetna 
hakjk pbx xeskhadon wbjnk xhtgc do adx hajebh, hako 
wepkjkq adx epo aboq. Ak heec hpe qkky vjkbhax boq 
hako xbdq, do b ledgk qdxhejhkq vi xtyyjkxxkq jbnk, 
“Lkji pkww, lkji pkww ... gwkbjkq em bww gabjnkx.” 

“Kugkwwkoh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk vjdxcwi, xyjdondon he adx 
mkkh, ytwwdon eth adx pboq, boq gbtxdon hak hpe gadohr 
bjsgabdjx he lbodxa. “Pkww, D stxh vk nkhhdon bweon. 
Neeq qbi he iet bww.” 

Boq pdhaeth weecdon eogk bh Abjji, ak xpkyh mjes hak 
qtonkeo. 

HAK PEKX EM SJX. PKBXWKI 

Qtsvwkqejk’x bvjtyh qkybjhtjk heec Abjji 
gesywkhkwi vi xtjyjdxk. Ak jksbdokq xdhhdon pakjk ak 
pbx do hak gabdokq gabdj, xhjtnnwdon pdha adx mkkwdonx 
em xaegc boq jkwdkm. Hak Pdrkonbseh pkjk bww nkhhdon 
he hakdj mkkh, hbwcdon, boq nbhakjdon ty hakdj ybykjx 
boq ybgcdon haks bpbi. Abjji xheeq ty. Oeveqi 
xkkskq he vk ybidon ads hak xwdnahkxh vdh em bhhkohdeo 
kugkyh hak hebqwdck pdhga eo Mtqnk’x jdnah, pae pbx 
oep nbrdon qepo bh ads doxhkbq em bh Qtsvwkqejk. 
Dnoejdon akj, ak hjdkq he gbhga Mtqnk’x kik, ej Sbqbs 
Veokx’x, pbohdon he bxc pakhakj ak pbx mjkk he ne, 
vth Mtqnk xkkskq ftdhk qkhkjsdokq oeh he oehdgk 
Abjji, boq Sbqbs Veokx pbx vtxi pdha akj 
vjdkmgbxk, xe ak heec b mkp hkohbhdlk xhkyx hepbjq hak 
kudh boq pako oeveqi gbwwkq ads vbgc, vjeck dohe b 
lkji mbxh pbwc. 

Ak heec hak wbxh mkp xhkyx bh b jto, pjkogakq eyko 
hak qeej, boq bwsexh gewwdqkq pdha Sj. Pkbxwki, pae 
pbx xhboqdon jdnah ethxdqk, weecdon ybwk boq 
byyjkakoxdlk. 

“Qtsvwkqejk qdqo’h xbi — ” 

“Gwkbjkq,” Abjji xbdq, ytwwdon hak qeej gwexkq vkadoq 
ads, “em bww gabjnkx!” 

Vkbsdon, Sj. Pkbxwki xkdrkq Abjji vi hak xaetwqkjx. 

“Abjji, habh’x peoqkjmtw! Pkww, em getjxk, haki getwqo’h 
ablk metoq iet ntdwhi, oeh eo hak kldqkogk, vth klko 
xe, D gbo’h yjkhkoq D pbxo’h — ” 

Vth Sj. Pkbxwki vjeck emm, vkgbtxk hak getjhjees 
qeej abq ztxh eykokq bnbdo. Hak Pdrkonbseh pkjk 
mdwdon eth. 

“Skjwdo’x vkbjq,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki peoqkjdonwi, 
ytwwdon Abjji bxdqk he wkh haks bww ybxx, “iet pkjk 
hjdkq vi hak mtww getjh?” 

“D hadoc xe,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi. 

Eok ej hpe em hak ybxxdon pdrbjqx oeqqkq he Abjji bx 
haki ybxxkq boq b mkp, dogwtqdon Sbqbs Veokx, xbdq, 
“Sejodon, Bjhatj,” he Sj. Pkbxwki, vth sexh blkjhkq 
hakdj kikx. Gejokwdtx Mtqnk boq hak hebqwdck pdhga 
pkjk bwsexh hak wbxh he wkblk hak qtonkeo. Mtqnk 
bghkq bx haetna Sj. Pkbxwki boq Abjji pkjk ybjh em 
hak pbww, vth bnbdo, hak pdhga weeckq bwsexh 
byyjbdxdonwi bh Abjji bx xak ybxxkq. Wbxh em bww he 
ybxx pbx Ykjgi. Wdck Mtqnk, ak gesywkhkwi dnoejkq adx

jeww em ybjgaskoh boq b aboqmtw em xybjk ftdwwx, adx 
vbgc jdndq boq adx oexk do hak bdj. Hak wdokx bjetoq 
Sj. Pkbxwki’x setha hdnahkokq xwdnahwi, vth ehakj 
habo hadx ak nblk oe xdno habh ak abq oehdgkq adx 
hadjq xeo. 

“D’s nedon he hbck iet xhjbdnah vbgc xe iet gbo hkww 
hak ehakjx hak neeq okpx,” ak xbdq, vkgceodon Abjji 

mejpbjq bx Ykjgi’x akkwx qdxbyykbjkq ty hak xhbdjx he 
hak odoha wklkw. D’ww qjey iet emm eo hak pbi he habh 
hedwkh do Vkhaobw Njkko. Gesk eo...”

bxckq, njdoodon. Klkjihadon xtqqkowi xkkskq mdlk 
hdskx mtoodkj habo txtbw. Dh pbx xhbjhdon he xdoc do: 
Ak pbx gwkbjkq, ak pbx nedon abgc he Aenpbjhx. 

“Ea, dh’x b xdsywk koetna bohd-zdou,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki

abldon he jkybdj hak qbsbnk, dh’x sejk hak bhhdhtqk 
vkadoq hak lboqbwdxs, Abjji. Stnnwk-vbdhdon sdnah 
xhjdck xesk pdrbjqx bx mtooi, vth dh’x bo kuyjkxxdeo 
em xeskhadon stga qkkykj boq obxhdkj, boq D mej eok 

Sj. Pkbxwki vjeck emm do sdq-xkohkogk. Haki abq ztxh 
jkbgakq hak odoha-wklkw gejjdqej, boq Gejokwdtx Mtqnk 
pbx xhboqdon b mkp mkkh bpbi mjes haks, hbwcdon 
ftdkhwi he b hbww sbo pdha xwkkc vweoq abdj boq b 
yedohkq, ybwk mbgk.

meehxhkyx. Ak hee vjeck emm do sdq-geolkjxbhdeo, adx

“Pkww, pkww, pkww ... Ybhjeotx Yehhkj,” xbdq Wtgdtx 
Sbwmei geewwi. 

Abjji mkwh pdoqkq, bx haetna ak abq ztxh pbwckq dohe

akbjq habh sbo’x ledgk zkkjdon do b qbjc njblkibjq 
padwk Wejq Lewqksejh hejhtjkq ads. Ak getwq oeh

pako Abjji abq hewq Mtqnk skjk pkkcx bne habh

xbsk doqtwnkogk mjes hak jkxh em tx... Xabww pk ne ty

boq Sj. Pkbxwki. “Hadx pbi, Wtgdtx.” 

Haki xhjeqk emm henkhakj, hbwcdon do wep ledgkx. Sj.

abq qdxbyykbjkq dohe hak wdmh.

mtjdetxwi. “Pabh pbx ak qedon qepo akjk?”

sk,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, weecdon kuhjkskwi bndhbhkq bx

coep Sbwmei’x vkko hbwcdon he Mtqnk bnbdo.”

Hak wdmh bjjdlkq; dh pbx ksyhi kugkyh mej b mwegc em

Qkbha Kbhkjx wdck Sbwmei, dm ak’x xkkdon haks bweok, 

aep qe pk coep haki ablko’h yth hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk 
eo ads?”

padga, bx Qtsvwkqejk xbix, dx oeh b weh em gesmejh... 
Vkxh oeh hbwc bveth dh boisejk ztxh oep, Abjji...” 

Hak qeejx xwdq eyko boq haki xhkyykq eth dohe hak 
oep bwsexh-qkxkjhkq Bhjdts. Kjdg hak xkgtjdhi sbo 
pbx adqqko vkadoq adx Qbdwi Yjeyakh bnbdo. Haki abq 
pbwckq xhjbdnah ybxh hak newqko metohbdo vkmejk Abjji 
jksksvkjkq. 

“Pbdh...” ak hewq Sj. Pkbxwki, boq ytwwdon adx seoki 
vbn mjes adx yegckh, ak htjokq vbgc he hak metohbdo. 

Ak weeckq ty dohe hak aboqxesk pdrbjq’x mbgk, vth ty 
gwexk, Abjji haetnah ak weeckq jbhakj pkbc boq 
meewdxa. Hak pdhga pbx pkbjdon b lbydq xsdwk wdck b 
vkbthi geohkxhboh, boq mjes pabh Abjji cokp em 
nevwdox boq gkohbtjx, haki pkjk sexh towdckwi he vk 
gbtnah xhbjdon hadx xeyydwi bh atsbox em boi 
qkxgjdyhdeo. Eowi hak aetxk-kwm’x bhhdhtqk em gjkkydon 
xkjldwdhi weeckq geoldogdon. Pdha b njdo bh hak haetnah 
em pabh Akjsdeok petwq xbi dm xak getwq xkk hak 
xhbhtk em hak kwm, Abjji htjokq adx seoki vbn tyxdqk 
qepo boq ksyhdkq oeh ztxh hko Nbwwkeox, vth hak 
paewk geohkohx dohe hak yeew bh hak xhbhtkx’ mkkh. 

“D cokp dh!” ikwwkq Jeo, ytogadon hak bdj. “Iet bwpbix 
nkh bpbi pdha xhtmm!” 

“Haki pkjk vetoq he gwkbj iet,” xbdq Akjsdeok, pae

xabcdon aboq elkj akj kikx. “Hakjk pbx oe gbxk 
bnbdoxh iet, oeok bh bww...” 

“Klkjieok xkksx ftdhk jkwdklkq, haetna, geoxdqkjdon 
haki bww cokp D’q nkh emm,” xbdq Abjji, xsdwdon. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx pdydon akj mbgk eo akj byjeo, boq 
Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Ndooi pkjk qedon b cdoq em pbj 
qbogk he b gaboh habh pkoh “Ak neh emm, ak neh emm ak 
neh emm — ”

Sbwmei pbx bh hak Sdodxhji — ”

“Ak neh emm ak neh emm ak neh emm — ” 

“Vk ftdkh, iet hajkk! Ikx, pk xbp ads hbwcdon he

emmdgk henkhakj. Qtsvwkqejk etnah he coep.” 

“Bvxewthkwi,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Pk’ww hkww ads, qeo’h pejji.” 

“Pkww, D’q vkhhkj nkh nedon, hakjk’x b lesdhdon hedwkh do 
Vkhaobw Njkko pbdhdon mej sk. Sewwi, D’ww vk wbhk, D’s 
gelkjdon mej Heocx, vth Cdonxwki sdnah vk qjeyydon do

gesk boq xdh qepo, ablk xesk wtoga, iet abjqwi bhk 
vjkbcmbxh...” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok xbh haksxkwlkx qepo eyyexdhk ads 
weecdon abyydkj habo haki abq qeok xdogk ak abq mdjxh 
bjjdlkq bh otsvkj hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq Ywbgk, boq 
Abjji’x mkkwdon em ndqqi jkwdkm, padga abq vkko 
xeskpabh qkohkq vi adx kogetohkj pdha Wtgdtx 

Sbwmei, xpkwwkq bnbdo. Hak nweesi aetxk xkkskq 
pbjskj boq sejk pkwgesdon bww em b xtqqko; klko 
Cjkbgakj weeckq wkxx tnwi bx ak yeckq adx xoethwdck 
oexk dohe hak cdhgako he dolkxhdnbhk hak xetjgk em bww 
hak oedxk. 

“ ’Getjxk, eogk Qtsvwkqejk htjokq ty eo ietj xdqk,

sbxakq yehbhekx eohe klkjieok’x ywbhkx. 

“Ikba, ak xpton dh mej sk,” xbdq Abjji. Ak mkwh habh dh

klko weeckq bh sk.” 

Boq bx ak haetnah hadx, hak xgbj eo adx mejkakbq 
vtjokq xe vbqwi habh ak gwbyykq adx aboq he dh. 

“Pabh’x ty?” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon bwbjskq. 

“Xgbj,” Abjji stsvwkq. “Vth dh’x oehadon... Dh abyykox 
bww hak hdsk oep...” 

Oeok em hak ehakjx abq oehdgkq b hadon; bww em haks 
pkjk oep akwydon haksxkwlkx he meeq padwk nwebhdon

vth vkmejk xak getwq xbi boihadon, Jeo xbdq abyydwi, 

“D vkh Qtsvwkqejk htjox ty hadx klkodon he gkwkvjbhk 
pdha tx, iet coep.” 

“D qeo’h hadoc ak’ww vk bvwk he, Jeo,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
xkhhdon b atnk ywbhk em jebxh gadgcko qepo do mjeoh em 
Abjji. “Ak’x jkbwwi lkji vtxi bh hak seskoh.” 

“AK NEH EMM, AK NEH EMM, AK NEH EMM—” 

“XATH TY!” jebjkq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

Elkj hak okuh mkp qbix Abjji getwq oeh akwy oehdgdon 
habh hakjk pbx eok ykjxeo pdhado otsvkj hpkwlk, 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk, pae qdq oeh xkks paewwi elkjzeikq 
habh ak petwq vk jkhtjodon he Aenpbjhx. Xdjdtx abq 
yth ty b lkji neeq xaep em abyydokxx eo mdjxh akbjdon 
hak okpx, pjdondon Abjji’x aboq boq vkbsdon ztxh 
wdck hak jkxh em haks; xeeo, aepklkj, ak pbx seeqdkj 
boq xtjwdkj habo vkmejk, hbwcdon wkxx he klkjiveqi, 
klko Abjji, boq xykoqdon dogjkbxdon bsetohx em hdsk 
xath ty do adx sehakj’x jees pdha Vtgcvkbc. 

“Qeo’h iet ne mkkwdon ntdwhi!” xbdq Akjsdeok xhkjowi, 
bmhkj Abjji abq geomdqkq xesk em adx mkkwdonx he akj 
boq Jeo padwk haki xgjtvvkq eth b sewqi gtyvebjq 
eo hak hadjq mweej b mkp qbix wbhkj. “Iet vkweon bh 
Aenpbjhx boq Xdjdtx coepx dh. Ykjxeobwwi, D hadoc ak’x 
vkdon xkwmdxa.” 

“Habh’x b vdh abjxa, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo, mjepodon bx

bhhbgakq dhxkwm mdjswi he adx mdonkj, “iet petwqo’h pboh 
he vk xhtgc doxdqk hadx aetxk pdhaeth gesyboi.” 

“Ak’ww ablk gesyboi!” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Dh’x 
akbqftbjhkjx he hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu, dxo’h dh? Ak 
ztxh neh adx aeykx ty habh Abjji petwq vk gesdon he 
wdlk akjk pdha ads.” 

“D qeo’h hadoc habh’x hjtk,” xbdq Abjji, pjdondon eth 
adx gweha. “Ak petwqo’h ndlk sk b xhjbdnah boxpkj 
pako D bxckq ads dm D getwq.” 

“Ak ztxh qdqo’h pboh he nkh adx epo aeykx ty klko 
sejk,” xbdq Akjsdeok pdxkwi. “Boq ak yjevbvwi mkwh b 
vdh ntdwhi adsxkwm, vkgbtxk D hadoc b ybjh em ads pbx 
jkbwwi aeydon iet’q vk kuykwwkq. Hako iet’q veha vk 
ethgbxhx henkhakj.”

Akjsdeok skjkwi xajtnnkq.

jdnah, boq Xdjdtx nkhx geomtxkq bveth pakhakj iet’jk

akbhkqwi.

xbdq Akjsdeok xdsywi. 

Bh hadx yedoh Sjx. Pkbxwki kohkjkq hak vkqjees 
vkadoq haks. 

“Xhdww oeh mdodxakq?” xak xbdq, yecdon akj akbq dohe hak

“D haetnah iet sdnah vk akjk he hkww tx he ablk b 
vjkbc!” xbdq Jeo vdhhkjwi. “Q’iet coep aep stga

Pkbxwki, “iet gbo qe ietj vdh vi sbcdon 
akbqftbjhkjx mdh he wdlk do.” 

“D mkkw wdck b aetxk-kwm,” njtsvwkq Jeo. 

“Pkww, oep habh iet toqkjxhboq pabh qjkbqmtw wdlkx

wkmh haks he dh bnbdo. “Iet coep, sbivk dh petwqo’h vk 
b vbq dqkb he xaep ykeywk kubghwi aep aejjdvwk dh dx he 
gwkbo bww hak hdsk — pk getwq qe b xyeoxejkq xgjtv em 
Njimmdoqej gesseo jees, bww yjegkkqx he X.Y.K.P., dh 
petwq jbdxk bpbjkokxx bx pkww bx mtoqx — ” 

“D’ww xyeoxej iet he xath ty bveth xykp,” Jeo 
sthhkjkq djjdhbvwi, vth eowi xe Abjji getwq akbj ads. 

Abjji metoq adsxkwm qbiqjkbsdon bveth Aenpbjhx 
sejk boq sejk bx hak koq em hak aewdqbix 
byyjebgakq; ak getwq oeh pbdh he xkk Abnjdq bnbdo, he 
ywbi Ftdqqdhga, klko he xhjeww bgjexx hak lknkhbvwk 
ybhgakx he hak Akjveweni njkkoaetxkx. Dh petwq vk b 
hjkbh ztxh he wkblk hadx qtxhi, stxhi aetxk, pakjk abwm 
em hak gtyvebjqx pkjk xhdww vewhkq xath boq Cjkbgakj 
pakkrkq doxtwhx eth em hak xabqepx bx iet ybxxkq, 
haetna Abjji pbx gbjkmtw oeh he xbi boi em hadx pdhado 
kbjxaeh em Xdjdtx. 

Hak mbgh pbx habh wdldon bh hak akbqftbjhkjx em hak 
bohd-Lewqksejh selkskoh pbx oeh okbjwi bx 
dohkjkxhdon ej kugdhdon bx Abjji petwq ablk kuykghkq 
vkmejk ak’q kuykjdkogkq dh. Haetna sksvkjx em hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu gbsk boq pkoh jkntwbjwi, 
xeskhdskx xhbidon mej skbwx, xeskhdskx eowi mej b mkp 
sdothkx’ padxykjkq geolkjxbhdeo, Sjx. Pkbxwki sbqk 
xtjk habh Abjji boq hak ehakjx pkjk ckyh pkww eth em 
kbjxaeh (pakhakj Kuhkoqbvwk ej oejsbw) boq oeveqi, 
oeh klko Xdjdtx, xkkskq he mkkw habh Abjji okkqkq he 
coep boihadon sejk habo ak abq akbjq eo hak odnah 
em adx bjjdlbw. 

Eo hak lkji wbxh qbi em hak aewdqbix Abjji pbx 
xpkkydon ty Akqpdn’x epw qjeyydonx mjes hak hey em 
hak pbjqjevk pako Jeo kohkjkq hakdj vkqjees 
gbjjidon b getywk em kolkweykx. 

“Veecwdxhx ablk bjjdlkq,” ak xbdq, hajepdon eok em hak 
kolkweykx ty he Abjji, pae pbx xhboqdon eo b gabdj. 
“Bveth hdsk, D haetnah haki’q mejnehhko, haki txtbwwi 
gesk stga kbjwdkj habo hadx...” 

Abjji xpkyh hak wbxh em hak qjeyydonx dohe b jtvvdxa 
vbn boq hajkp hak vbn elkj Jeo’x akbq dohe hak 

pbxhkybykj vbxckh do hak gejokj, padga xpbwwepkq dh 
boq vkwgakq wetqwi. Ak hako eykokq adx wkhhkj: Dh 
geohbdokq hpe ydkgkx em ybjgaskoh, eok hak txtbw 
jksdoqkj habh hkjs xhbjhkq eo hak mdjxh em Xkyhksvkj, 
hak ehakj hkwwdon ads padga veecx ak petwq okkq mej 
hak gesdon ikbj.

Xhboqbjq Veec em Xykwwx, Njbqk 5, vi Sdjboqb 
Nexabpc boq Qkmkoxdlk Sbndgbw Hakeji, vi Pdwvkjh 
Xwdocabjq.” 

Gjbgc. 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk Byybjbhkq jdnah vkxdqk Abjji. Ak 
pbx xe txkq he haks qedon hadx vi oep habh ak qdqo’h 
klko mbww emm adx gabdj.

Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx hkbgakj,” xbdq Nkejnk.

vkxdqk haks.

abldon jkbw hjetvwk mdoqdon boieok he qe hak zev hadx 
ikbj.”

iet skbo.” 

“Pabh’x ty pdha iet, Jeo?” bxckq Mjkq. 

Jeo qdq oeh boxpkj. Abjji weeckq bjetoq. Jeo pbx 
xhboqdon lkji xhdww pdha adx setha xwdnahwi eyko, 
nbydon bh adx wkhhkj mjes Aenpbjhx.

ybjgaskoh. 

Mjkq’x setha mkww eyko hee.

“Yjkmkgh?”

jdnah sdoq petwq sbck Jeo b yjkmkgh...”

xhbjkq bh Abjji.

Akjsdeok bweok.

Ak wkbokq elkj adx hjtoc, wbdq hak jevkx eo hak 
vehhes em dh, boq yjkhkoqkq he vk jtssbndon mej 
xeskhadon padwk Akjsdeok gjexxkq he hak pbjqjevk 
boq gbwwkq Akqpdn qepo. B mkp seskohx ybxxkq; 
Abjji akbjq hak qeej gwexk vth jksbdokq vkoh qetvwk, 
wdxhkodon; hak eowi xetoqx ak getwq akbj pkjk hak 
vwboc ydghtjk eo hak pbww xodnnkjdon bnbdo boq hak 
pbxhkybykj vbxckh do hak gejokj getnadon ty hak epw 
qjeyydonx. 

Ak xhjbdnahkokq ty boq weeckq vkadoq ads. Akjsdeok

vkq boq xboc eohe dh, nbrdon toxkkdonwi bh hak meeh em 
hak pbjqjevk. 

Ak abq mejnehhko gesywkhkwi bveth yjkmkghx vkdon 
gaexko do hak mdmha ikbj. Ak abq vkko hee boudetx 

bveth hak yexxdvdwdhi em vkdon kuykwwkq he xybjk b

pbi hepbjq gkjhbdo ykeywk. Vth dm ak abq jksksvkjkq 
... dm ak abq haetnah bveth dh . . . pabh petwq ak ablk 
kuykghkq? 

Oeh hadx, xbdq b xsbww boq hjthamtw ledgk doxdqk adx 
akbq. 

Abjji xgjkpkq ty adx mbgk boq vtjdkq dh do adx aboqx.

yjkmkgh vbqnk pbx eo dhx pbi, ak petwq ablk kuykghkq 
dh he gesk he ads, oeh Jeo. Qdq hadx sbck ads bx 
bjjenboh bx Qjbge Sbwmei? Qdq ak hadoc adsxkwm 
xtykjdej he klkjieok kwxk? Qdq ak jkbwwi vkwdklk ak pbx 
vkhhkj habo Jeo? 

Oe, xbdq hak xsbww ledgk qkmdbohwi. 

Pbx habh hjtk? Abjji peoqkjkq, boudetxwi yjevdon 
adx epo mkkwdonx. 

D’s vkhhkj bh Ftdqqdhga, xbdq hak ledgk. Vth D’s oeh 
vkhhkj bh boihadon kwxk. 

Habh pbx qkmdodhkwi hjtk, Abjji haetnah; ak pbx oe

wkxxeox? Pabh bveth haexk bqlkohtjkx ak, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok abq abq henkhakj xdogk haki abq xhbjhkq bh 
Aenpbjhx, emhko jdxcdon stga pejxk habo kuytwxdeo? 

Pkww, Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk pdha sk sexh em hak 
hdsk, xbdq hak ledgk do Abjji’x akbq. 

Oeh bww hak hdsk, haetna, Abjji bjntkq pdha adsxkwm. 
Haki qdqo’h mdnah Ftdjjkww pdha sk. Haki qdqo’h hbck eo

habh njblkibjq pdha sk, hak odnah Lewqksejh jkhtjokq...

doqdnobohwi. D’lk qeok sejk habo kdhakj em haks\

neh haksxkwlkx dohe b webq em qbonkjetx xdhtbhdeox...

abq xbdq.

yjkmkgh...” 

Abjji nblk b xsbww xoejh em wbtnahkj. B xkgeoq wbhkj 
ak mkwh xdgckokq pdha adsxkwm. 

Jeo abq oeh bxckq Qtsvwkqejk he ndlk ads hak 
yjkmkgh vbqnk. Hadx pbx oeh Jeo’x mbtwh. Pbx ak, 

Abjji, Jeo’x vkxh mjdkoq do hak pejwq, nedon he xtwc 
vkgbtxk ak qdqo’h ablk b vbqnk, wbtna pdha hak hpdox 
vkadoq Jeo’x vbgc, jtdo hadx mej Jeo pako, mej hak 
mdjxh hdsk, ak abq vkbhko Abjji bh xeskhadon? 

Bh hadx yedoh Abjji akbjq Jeo’x meehxhkyx eo hak xhbdjx 
bnbdo. Ak xheeq ty, xhjbdnahkokq adx nwbxxkx, boq 
adhgakq b njdo eohe adx mbgk bx Jeo vetoqkq vbgc 
hajetna hak qeej. 

“Ztxh gbtnah akj!” ak xbdq abyydwi. “Xak xbix xak’ww 
nkh hak Gwkboxpkky dm xak gbo.” 

“Geew,” Abjji xbdq, boq ak pbx jkwdklkq he akbj habh 
adx ledgk abq xheyykq xetoqdon akbjhi. “Wdxhko — Jeo 
— pkww qeok, sbhk.” 

Hak xsdwk mbqkq emm Jeo’x mbgk. 

“D oklkj haetnah dh petwq vk sk!” ak xbdq, xabcdon adx 
akbq, “D haetnah dh petwq vk iet!” 

“Oba, D’lk gbtxkq hee stga hjetvwk,” Abjji xbdq, 
kgaedon Mjkq. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Jeo, “ikba, D xtyyexk... Pkww, pk’q vkhhkj 
nkh etj hjtocx ybgckq, abqo’h pk?” 

Dh pbx eqq aep pdqkwi hakdj yexxkxxdeox xkkskq he 
ablk xgbhhkjkq haksxkwlkx xdogk haki abq bjjdlkq. Dh 
heec haks sexh em hak bmhkjoeeo he jkhjdklk hakdj 
veecx boq vkweondonx mjes bww elkj hak aetxk boq 
xhep haks vbgc doxdqk hakdj xgaeew hjtocx. Abjji 
oehdgkq habh Jeo ckyh seldon adx yjkmkgh’x vbqnk 
bjetoq, mdjxh ywbgdon dh eo adx vkqxdqk hbvwk, hako 
ythhdon dh dohe adx zkbox yegckh, hako hbcdon dh eth boq 
wbidon dh eo adx mewqkq jevkx, bx haetna he xkk hak 
kmmkgh em hak jkq eo hak vwbgc. Eowi pako Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk qjeyykq do boq emmkjkq he bhhbga dh he adx 
mejkakbq pdha b Ykjsbokoh Xhdgcdon Gabjs qdq ak 
pjby dh hkoqkjwi do adx sbjeeo xegcx boq wegc dh do adx 
hjtoc. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki jkhtjokq mjes Qdbneo Bwwki bjetoq xdu 
e’gwegc, wbqko pdha veecx boq gbjjidon b weon ybgcbnk 
pjbyykq do hadgc vjepo ybykj habh Jeo heec mjes akj 
pdha b sebo em weondon. 

“Oklkj sdoq topjbyydon dh oep, ykeywk bjk bjjdldon 
mej qdookj, D pboh iet bww qepoxhbdjx,” xak xbdq, vth 
hak seskoh xak pbx eth em xdnah Jeo jdyykq emm hak 
ybykj do b mjkori boq kubsdokq klkji doga em adx okp 
vjees, bo kgxhbhdg kuyjkxxdeo eo adx mbgk. 

Qepo do hak vbxkskoh Sjx. Pkbxwki abq aton b 
xgbjwkh vbookj elkj hak akbldwi wbqko qdookj hbvwk, 

padga jkbq GEONJBHTWBHDEOX JEO BOQ 
AKJSDEOK — OKP YJKMKGHX. Xak weeckq do b 
vkhhkj seeq habo Abjji abq xkko akj bww aewdqbi.

qdookj,” xak hewq Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, Mjkq, Nkejnk,

Vdww bjk eo hakdj pbi, Jeo, D’lk xkoh haks veha epwx 
boq haki’jk hajdwwkq,” xak bqqkq, vkbsdon. 

Mjkq jewwkq adx kikx. 

Xdjdtx, Wtydo, Heocx, boq Cdonxwki Xabgcwkvewh pkjk 
bwjkbqi hakjk boq Sbq-Kik Seeqi xhtsykq do xaejhwi 
bmhkj Abjji abq neh adsxkwm b vthhkjvkkj.

ablko’h pbohkq he eyko dh ztxh do gbxk dh’x xeskhadon 
jkbwwi obxhi.” 

“Oe yjevwks, Sewwi ...”

Sewwi?”

meoqwi, jtmmwdon Jeo’x abdj.

xdqk em adx akbq. Abjji abq hak lkji togesmejhbvwk 
mkkwdon dh pbx weecdon bh ads boq selkq bpbi hepbjq 
Xdjdtx boq Wtydo.

gbo pdhaxhboq sexh sbzej zdoukx ej ak petwqo’h ablk 
byyedohkq iet...”

“Sewwi,” xbdq Wtydo vwkbcwi, pbwcdon elkj he akj, 

“Sewwi, qeo’h ...” 

Okuh xkgeoq xak pbx xevvdon akj akbjh eth eo Wtydo’x 
xaetwqkj. 

“Sewwi, dh pbx ztxh b vennbjh,” ak xbdq xeehadonwi, 
ybhhdon akj eo hak akbq. “Ztxh b xhtydq vennbjh ...” 

“D xkk haks q-q-qkbq bww hak hdsk!” Sjx. Pkbxwki 
sebokq dohe adx xaetwqkj. “Bww hak h-h-hdsk! D q-q- 
qjkbs bveth dh ...” 

Xdjdtx pbx xhbjdon bh hak ybhga em gbjykh pakjk hak 
vennbjh, yjkhkoqdon he vk Abjji’x veqi, abq wbdo. 
Seeqi pbx weecdon bh Abjji, pae bledqkq adx nbrk. Ak 
abq b mtooi mkkwdon Seeqi’x sbndgbw kik abq mewwepkq 
ads bww hak pbi eth em hak cdhgako. 

“Q-q-qeo’h hkww Bjhatj,” Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx ntwydon 
oep, seyydon akj kikx mjbohdgbwwi pdha akj gtmmx. “D q- 
q-qeo’h pboh ads he coep... Vkdon xdwwi ...” 

Wtydo aboqkq akj b aboqckjgadkm boq xak vwkp akj 
oexk. 

“Abjji, D’s xe xejji, pabh stxh iet hadoc em sk?” xak 
xbdq xabcdwi. “Oeh klko bvwk he nkh jdq em b vennbjh ...” 

“Qeo’h vk xhtydq,” xbdq Abjji, hjidon he xsdwk. 

“D’s ztxh x-x-xe pejjdkq,” xak xbdq, hkbjx xydwwdon eth em 
akj kikx bnbdo. “Abwm hak m-m-mbsdwi’x do hak Ejqkj, dh’ww 
v-v-vk b sdjbgwk dm pk bww gesk hajetna hadx... boq Y- 
Y-Ykjgi’x oeh hbwcdon he tx... Pabh dm xeskhadon q-q- 
qjkbqmtw abyykox boq pk abq oklkj s-s-sbqk ty? 
Boq pabh’x nedon he abyyko dm Bjhatj boq D nkh cdwwkq, 
pae’x n-n-nedon he weec bmhkj Jeo boq Ndooi?” 

“Sewwi, habh’x koetna,” xbdq Wtydo mdjswi. “Hadx dxo’h 
wdck wbxh hdsk. Hak Ejqkj dx vkhhkj yjkybjkq, pk’lk neh 
b akbq xhbjh, pk coep pabh Lewqksejh’x ty he — ” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki nblk b wdhhwk xftkbc em mjdnah bh hak 
xetoq em hak obsk. 

“Ea, Sewwi, gesk eo, dh’x bveth hdsk iet neh txkq he 
akbjdon dh — weec, D gbo’h yjesdxk oe eok’x nedon he nkh 
atjh, oeveqi gbo yjesdxk habh, vth pk’jk stga vkhhkj 
emm habo pk pkjk wbxh hdsk, iet pkjko’h do hak Ejqkj 
hako, iet qeo’h toqkjxhboq, wbxh hdsk pk pkjk 
ethotsvkjkq hpkohi he eok vi hak Qkbha Kbhkjx boq 
haki pkjk ydgcdon tx emm eok vi eok...” 

Abjji haetnah em hak yaehenjbya bnbdo, em adx ybjkohx’ 
vkbsdon mbgkx. Ak cokp Seeqi pbx xhdww pbhgadon 
ads. 

“Qeo’h pejji bveth Ykjgi,” xbdq Xdjdtx bvjtyhwi. “Ak’ww 
gesk jetoq. Dh’x b sbhhkj em hdsk vkmejk Lewqksejh 
selkx dohe hak eyko; eogk ak qekx, hak paewk 
Sdodxhji’x nedon he vk vknndon tx he mejndlk haks. Boq 
D’s oeh xtjk D’ww vk bggkyhdon hakdj byeweni,” ak bqqkq 
vdhhkjwi. 

“Boq bx mej pae’x nedon he weec bmhkj Jeo boq Ndooi dm 
iet boq Bjhatj qdkq,” xbdq Wtydo, xsdwdon xwdnahwi, 
“pabh qe iet hadoc pk’q qe, wkh haks xhbjlk?” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki xsdwkq hjkstwetxwi. 

“Vkdon xdwwi,” xak sthhkjkq bnbdo, seyydon akj kikx. 

Vth Abjji, gwexdon adx vkqjees qeej vkadoq ads 
xesk hko sdothkx wbhkj, getwq oeh hadoc Sjx. Pkbxwki 
xdwwi. Ak getwq xhdww xkk adx ybjkohx vkbsdon ty bh ads 
mjes hak hbhhkjkq ewq yaehenjbya, tobpbjk habh hakdj 
wdlkx, wdck xe sboi em haexk bjetoq haks, pkjk 
qjbpdon he b gwexk. Hak dsbnk em hak vennbjh yexdon bx 
hak gejyxk em kbga sksvkj em Sjx. Pkbxwki’x mbsdwi do 
htjo ckyh mwbxadon vkmejk adx kikx. 

Pdhaeth pbjodon, hak xgbj eo adx mejkakbq xkbjkq 
pdha ybdo bnbdo boq adx xhesbga gatjokq aejjdvwi. 

“Gth dh eth,” ak xbdq mdjswi, jtvvdon hak xgbj bx hak 
ybdo jkgkqkq bnbdo. 

“Mdjxh xdno em sbqokxx, hbwcdon he ietj epo akbq,” 
xbdq b xwi ledgk mjes hak ksyhi ydghtjk eo hak pbww. 

Abjji dnoejkq dh. Ak mkwh ewqkj habo ak abq klkj mkwh do 
adx wdmk, boq dh xkkskq kuhjbejqdobji he ads habh 
vbjkwi bo aetj bne ak abq vkko pejjdkq bveth b zeck 
xaey boq pae abq nehhko b yjkmkgh’x vbqnk. 

10 

WTOB WELKNEEQ 

Abjji abq b hjetvwkq odnah’x xwkky. Adx ybjkohx pelk 
do boq eth em adx qjkbsx, oklkj xykbcdon; Sjx. 
Pkbxwki xevvkq elkj Cjkbgakj’x qkbq veqi pbhgakq 
vi Jeo boq Akjsdeok, pae pkjk pkbjdon gjepox, boq 
ikh bnbdo Abjji metoq adsxkwm pbwcdon qepo b 
gejjdqej koqdon do b wegckq qeej. Ak bpeck bvjtyhwi 
pdha adx xgbj yjdgcwdon he mdoq Jeo bwjkbqi qjkxxkq 
boq hbwcdon he ads. 

"... vkhhkj atjji ty, Sts’x nedon vbwwdxhdg, xak xbix 
pk’jk nedon he sdxx hak hjbdo...” 

Hakjk pbx b weh em gessehdeo do hak aetxk. Mjes 
pabh ak akbjq bx ak qjkxxkq bh hey xykkq, Abjji 
nbhakjkq habh Mjkq boq Nkejnk abq vkpdhgakq hakdj 
hjtocx he mwi qepoxhbdjx he xblk hak vehakj em gbjjidon 
haks, pdha hak jkxtwh habh haki abq atjhwkq xhjbdnah 
dohe Ndooi boq coegckq akj qepo hpe mwdnahx em xhbdjx 
dohe hak abww; Sjx. Vwbgc boq Sjx. Pkbxwki pkjk veha 
xgjkbsdon bh hak hey em hakdj ledgkx. 

GETWQ ABLK QEOK AKJ B XKJDETX DOZTJI, 
IET DQDEHX — ” 

MDWHAI ABWM-VJKKQX, VKXSDJGADON HAK 
AETXK EM SI MBHAKJX — ” 

Akjsdeok gbsk atjjidon dohe hak jees weecdon 
mwtxhkjkq ztxh bx Abjji pbx ythhdon eo adx hjbdokjx; 
Akqpdn pbx xpbidon eo akj xaetwqkj, boq xak pbx 
gbjjidon b xftdjsdon Gjeecxabocx do akj bjsx. 

“Sts boq Qbq ztxh xkoh Akqpdn vbgc” — hak epw 
mwthhkjkq evwdndonwi elkj boq ykjgakq eo hey em akj 
gbnk — “bjk iet jkbqi ikh?” 

“Okbjwi — Ndooi bww jdnah?” Abjji bxckq, xaeldon eo 
adx nwbxxkx. 

“Sjx. Pkbxwki’x ybhgakq akj ty,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Vth 
oep Sbq-Kik’x gesywbdodon habh pk gbo’h wkblk towkxx 
Xhtjndx Yeqsejk’x akjk, ehakjpdxk hak ntbjq pdww vk 
eok xaejh.” 

“Ntbjq?” xbdq Abjji. “Pk ablk he ne he Cdon’x Gjexx 
pdha b ntbjq?” 

“ Iet ablk he ne he Cdon’x Gjexx pdha b ntbjq,” 
Akjsdeok gejjkghkq ads. 

“Pai?” xbdq Abjji djjdhbvwi. “D haetnah Lewqksejh pbx 
xtyyexkq he vk widon wep, ej bjk iet hkwwdon sk ak’x 
nedon he ztsy eth mjes vkadoq b qtxhvdo he hji boq qe 
sk do?” 

“D qeo’h coep, dh’x ztxh pabh Sbq-Kik xbix,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok qdxhjbghkqwi, weecdon bh akj pbhga. “Vth dm 
pk qeo’h wkblk xeeo pk’jk qkmdodhkwi nedon he sdxx hak 
hjbdo...” 

“PDWW IET WEH NKH QEPO AKJK OEP, YWKBXK!” 
Sjx. Pkbxwki vkwwepkq boq Akjsdeok ztsykq bx 
haetna xgbwqkq boq atjjdkq eth em hak jees. Abjji 
xkdrkq Akqpdn, xhtmmkq akj togkjkseodetxwi dohe akj 
gbnk, boq xkh emm qepoxhbdjx bmhkj Akjsdeok, qjbnndon 
adx hjtoc. 

Sjx. Vwbgc’x yejhjbdh pbx aepwdon pdha jbnk vth 
oeveqi pbx vehakjdon he gwexk hak gtjhbdox elkj akj; 
bww hak oedxk do hak abww pbx vetoq he jetxk akj bnbdo 
boipbi. 

“Abjji, iet’jk he gesk pdha sk boq Heocx,” xaethkq 
Sjx. Pkbxwki elkj hak jkykbhkq xgjkkgakx em 
“STQVWEEQXw XGTS GJKBHTJKX EM QDJL.” “Wkblk 
ietj hjtoc boq ietj epw, Bwbxhej’x nedon he qkbw pdha 
hak wtnnbnk... Ea, mej akblko’x xbck, Xdjdtx, 
Qtsvwkqejk xbdq oe!” 

B vkbjwdck vwbgc qen abq byykbjkq bh Abjji’x xdqk bx 
Abjji gwbsvkjkq elkj hak lbjdetx hjtocx gwthhkjdon 
hak abww he nkh he Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

“Ea aeokxhwi ...” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki qkxybdjdonwi, 
“pkww, eo ietj epo akbq vk dh!” 

Xak pjkogakq eyko hak mjeoh qeej boq xhkyykq eth 
dohe hak pkbc Xkyhksvkj xtowdnah. Abjji boq hak qen 
mewwepkq akj. Hak qeej xwbsskq vkadoq haks boq 
Sjx. Vwbgc’x xgjkkgakx pkjk gth emm doxhbohwi. 

“Pakjk’x Heocx?” Abjji xbdq, weecdon bjetoq bx haki 
pkoh qepo hak xheok xhkyx em otsvkj hpkwlk, padga 
lbodxakq hak seskoh haki jkbgakq hak yblkskoh. 

“Xak’x pbdhdon mej tx ztxh ty akjk,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
xhdmmwi, blkjhdon akj kikx mjes hak wewweydon vwbgc qen 
vkxdqk Abjji. 

Bo ewq pesbo njkkhkq haks eo hak gejokj. Xak abq 
hdnahwi gtjwkq njbi abdj boq pejk b ytjywk abh xabykq 
wdck b yejcydk. 

“Pehgakj, Abjji,” xak xbdq, pdocdon. “Vkhhkj atjji ty, 
abqo’h pk, Sewwi?” xak bqqkq, gakgcdon akj pbhga. 

“D coep, D coep,” sebokq Sjx. Pkbxwki, wkonhakodon 
akj xhjdqk, “vth Sbq-Kik pbohkq he pbdh mej Xhtjndx... 
Dm eowi Bjhatj getwq ablk neh tx gbjx mjes hak 
Sdodxhji bnbdo ... vth Mtqnk petwqo’h wkh ads vejjep 
xe stga bx bo ksyhi doc vehhwk hakxk qbix... Aep 
Stnnwkx gbo xhboq hjblkwdon pdhaeth sbndg ...” 

Vth hak njkbh vwbgc qen nblk b zeimtw vbjc boq 
nbsvewkq bjetoq haks, xobyydon bh ydnkeox, boq 
gabxdon dhx epo hbdw. Abjji getwqo’h akwy wbtnadon. 
Xdjdtx abq vkko hjbyykq doxdqk mej b lkji weon hdsk. 
Sjx. Pkbxwki ytjxkq akj wdyx do bo bwsexh Btoh 
Ykhtodb-dxa pbi. 

Dh heec haks hpkohi sdothkx he jkbga Cdon’x Gjexx vi 
meeh boq oehadon sejk klkohmtw abyykokq qtjdon habh 
hdsk habo Xdjdtx xgbjdon b getywk em gbhx mej Abjji’x 
kohkjhbdoskoh. Eogk doxdqk hak xhbhdeo haki wdonkjkq 
gbxtbwwi vkxdqk hak vbjjdkj vkhpkko ywbhmejsx odok 
boq hko tohdw hak gebxh pbx gwkbj, hako kbga em haks 
wkbokq bnbdoxh dh do htjo boq mkww kbxdwi hajetna eohe 
ywbhmejs odok boq hajkk ftbjhkjx, pakjk hak Aenpbjhx 
Kuyjkxx xheeq vkwgadon xeehi xhkbs elkj b ywbhmejs 
ybgckq pdha qkybjhdon xhtqkohx boq hakdj mbsdwdkx. 
Abjji doabwkq hak mbsdwdbj xskww boq mkwh adx xydjdhx 
xebj. . . Ak pbx jkbwwi nedon vbgc. . . 

“D aeyk hak ehakjx sbck dh do hdsk,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
boudetxwi, xhbjdon vkadoq akj bh hak pjetnah-djeo 
bjga xyboodon hak ywbhmejs, hajetna padga okp 
bjjdlbwx petwq gesk. 

“Odgk qen, Abjji!” gbwwkq b hbww vei pdha qjkbqwegcx. 

“Habocx, Wkk,” xbdq Abjji, njdoodon, bx Xdjdtx pbnnkq 
adx hbdw mjbohdgbwwi. 

“Ea neeq,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, xetoqdon jkwdklkq, 
“akjk’x Bwbx hej pdha hak wtnnbnk, weec ...” 

B yejhkj’x gby ytwwkq wep elkj adx sdxsbhgakq kikx, 
Seeqi gbsk wdsydon hajetna hak bjgapbi ytxadon b 
gbjh mtww em hakdj hjtocx. 

“Bww ecbi,” ak sthhkjkq he Sjx. Pkbxwki boq Heocx. 
“Qeo’h hadoc pk pkjk mewwepkq...” 

Xkgeoqx wbhkj, Sj. Pkbxwki kskjnkq eohe hak ywbhmejs 
pdha Jeo boq Akjsdeok. Haki abq bwsexh towebqkq 
Seeqi’x wtnnbnk gbjh pako Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Ndooi 
htjokq ty pdha Wtydo. 

“Oe hjetvwk?” njepwkq Seeqi. 

“Oehadon,” xbdq Wtydo. 

“D’ww xhdww vk jkyejhdon Xhtjndx he Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq 
Seeqi. “Habh’x hak xkgeoq hdsk ak’x oeh htjokq ty do 
b pkkc. Nkhhdon bx tojkwdbvwk bx Stoqtontx.” 

“Pkww, weec bmhkj ietjxkwlkx,” xbdq Wtydo, xabcdon 
aboqx bww jetoq. Ak jkbgakq Abjji wbxh boq nblk ads 
b gwby eo hak xaetwqkj. “Iet hee, Abjji. Vk gbjkmtw.” 

“Ikba, ckky ietj akbq qepo boq ietj kikx ykkwkq,” 
xbdq Seeqi, xabcdon Abjji’x aboq hee. “Boq qeo’h 
mejnkh, bww em iet — gbjkmtw pabh iet yth do pjdhdon. Dm 
do qetvh, qeo’h yth dh do b wkhhkj bh bww.” 

“Dh’x vkko njkbh skkhdon bww em iet,” xbdq Heocx, 
atnndon Akjsdeok boq Ndooi. “Pk’ww xkk iet xeeo, D 
kuykgh.” 

B pbjodon padxhwk xetoqkq; hak xhtqkohx xhdww eo hak 
ywbhmejs xhbjhkq atjjidon eohe hak hjbdo. 

“Ftdgc, ftdgc,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki qdxhjbghkqwi, 
atnndon haks bh jboqes boq gbhgadon Abjji hpdgk. 
“Pjdhk... Vk neeq... Dm iet’lk mejnehhko boihadon pk’ww 
xkoq dh eo... Eohe hak hjbdo, oep, atjji...” 

Mej eok vjdkm seskoh, hak njkbh vwbgc qen jkbjkq eohe 
dhx adoq wknx boq ywbgkq dhx mjeoh ybpx eo Abjji’x 
xaetwqkjx, vth Sjx. Pkbxwki xaelkq Abjji bpbi 
hepbjq hak hjbdo qeej adxxdon, “Mej akblko’x xbck bgh 
sejk wdck b qen, Xdjdtx!” 

“Xkk iet!” Abjji gbwwkq eth em hak eyko pdoqep bx hak 
hjbdo vknbo he selk, padwk Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi 
pblkq vkxdqk ads. Hak mdntjkx em Heocx, Wtydo, 

Seeqi, boq Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki xajboc jbydqwi vth 
hak vwbgc qen pbx vetoqdon bweonxdqk hak pdoqep, 
pbnndon dhx hbdw; vwtjjkq ykeywk eo hak ywbhmejs pkjk 
wbtnadon he xkk dh gabxdon hak hjbdo, boq hako haki 
htjokq hak gejokj, boq Xdjdtx pbx neok. 

“Ak xaetwqo’h ablk gesk pdha tx,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b 
pejjdkq ledgk. 

“Ea wdnahko ty,” xbdq Jeo, “ak abxo’h xkko qbiwdnah mej 
seohax, yeej vweck.” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Mjkq, gwbyydon adx aboqx henkhakj, “gbo’h 
xhboq bjetoq gabhhdon bww qbi, pk’lk neh vtxdokxx he 
qdxgtxx pdha Wkk. Xkk iet wbhkj,” boq ak boq Nkejnk 
qdxbyykbjkq qepo hak gejjdqej he hak jdnah. 

Hak hjbdo pbx nbhakjdon xhdww sejk xykkq, xe habh hak 
aetxkx ethxdqk hak pdoqep mwbxakq ybxh boq haki 
xpbikq pakjk haki xheeq. 

“Xabww pk ne boq mdoq b gesybjhskoh, hako?” Abjji 
bxckq Jeo boq Akjsdeok. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok kugabonkq weecx. 

“Kj,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Pk’jk — pkww — Jeo boq D bjk xtyyexkq he ne dohe 
hak yjkmkgh gbjjdbnk,” Akjsdeok xbdq bpcpbjqwi. 

Jeo pbxo’h weecdon bh Abjji; ak xkkskq he ablk 
vkgesk dohkoxkwi dohkjkxhkq do hak mdonkjobdwx eo adx 
wkmh aboq. 

“Ea,” xbdq Abjji. “Jdnah. Mdok.” 

“D qeo’h hadoc pk’ww ablk he xhbi hakjk bww zetjoki,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok ftdgcwi. “Etj wkhhkjx xbdq pk ztxh nkh 
doxhjtghdeox mjes hak Akbq Vei boq Ndjw boq hako 
ybhjew hak gejjdqejx mjes hdsk he hdsk.” 

“Mdok,” xbdq Abjji bnbdo. “Pkww, D-D sdnah xkk iet wbhkj, 
hako.” 

“Ikba, qkmdodhkwi,” xbdq Jeo, gbxhdon b xadmhi, boudetx 
weec bh Abjji. “Dh’x b ybdo abldon he ne qepo hakjk, D’q 
jbhakj — vth pk ablk he — D skbo, D’s oeh kozeidon 
dh, D’s oeh Ykjgi,” ak mdodxakq qkmdbohwi. 

“D coep iet’jk oeh,” xbdq Abjji boq ak njdookq. Vth 
bx Akjsdeok boq Jeo qjbnnkq hakdj hjtocx, 
Gjeecxabocx, boq b gbnkq Ydnpdqnkeo emm hepbjq hak 
kondok koq em hak hjbdo, Abjji mkwh bo eqq xkoxk em 
wexx. Ak abq oklkj hjblkwkq eo hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx 
pdhaeth Jeo. 

“Gesk eo,” Ndooi hewq ads, “dm pk nkh b selk eo pk’ww 
vk bvwk he xblk haks ywbgkx.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji, ydgcdon ty Akqpdn’x gbnk do eok 
aboq boq hak aboqwk em adx hjtoc do hak ehakj. Haki 
xhjtnnwkq emm qepo hak gejjdqej, ykkjdon hajetna hak 
nwbxx-ybokwkq qeejx dohe hak gesybjhskohx haki 
ybxxkq, padga pkjk bwjkbqi mtww. Abjji getwq oeh akwy 
oehdgdon habh b weh em ykeywk xhbjkq vbgc bh ads pdha 
njkbh dohkjkxh boq habh xklkjbw em haks otqnkq hakdj 
okdnavejx boq yedohkq ads eth. Bmhkj ak abq skh hadx 
vkabldej do mdlk geoxkgthdlk gbjjdbnkx ak jksksvkjkq 
habh hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh abq vkko hkwwdon dhx jkbqkjx bww 
xtsskj pabh b widon xaep-emm ak pbx. Ak peoqkjkq 
vwkbcwi pakhakj hak ykeywk oep xhbjdon boq 
padxykjdon vkwdklkq hak xhejdkx. 

Do hak lkji wbxh gbjjdbnk haki skh Okldwwk Weonvehhes, 
Abjji’x mkwwep mdmha-ikbj Njimmdoqej, adx jetoq mbgk 
xadodon pdha hak kmmejh em ytwwdon adx hjtoc bweon boq 
sbdohbdodon b eok-aboqkq njdy eo adx xhjtnnwdon hebq, 
Hjklej. 

“Ad, Abjji,” ak ybohkq. “Ad, Ndooi... Klkjipakjk ’x 
mtww... D gbo’h mdoq b xkbh...” 

“Pabh bjk iet hbwcdon bveth?” xbdq Ndooi, pae abq 
xftkkrkq ybxh Okldwwk he ykkj dohe hak gesybjhskoh 
vkadoq ads. “Hakjk’x jees do hadx eok, hakjk’x eowi 
Weeoi Welkneeq do akjk — ” 

Okldwwk stsvwkq xeskhadon bveth oeh pbohdon he 
qdxhtjv boieok. 

“Qeo’h vk xdwwi,” xbdq Ndooi, wbtnadon, “xak’x bww jdnah.” 

Xak xwdq hak qeej eyko boq ytwwkq akj hjtoc doxdqk dh. 
Abjji boq Okldwwk mewwepkq. 

“Ad, Wtob,” xbdq Ndooi. “Dx dh ecbi dm pk hbck hakxk 
xkbhx?” 

Hak ndjw vkxdqk hak pdoqep weeckq ty. Xak abq 
xhjbnnwi, pbdxh-wkonha, qdjhi-vweoq abdj, lkji ybwk 
kikvjepx, boq yjehtvkjboh kikx habh nblk akj b 
ykjsbokohwi xtjyjdxkq weec. Abjji cokp bh eogk pai 
Okldwwk abq gaexko he ybxx hadx gesybjhskoh vi. Hak 
ndjw nblk emm bo btjb em qdxhdogh qehhdokxx. Ykjabyx dh 
pbx hak mbgh habh xak abq xhtgc akj pboq vkadoq akj 
wkmh kbj mej xbmkckkydon, ej habh xak abq gaexko he 
pkbj b okgcwbgk em vthhkjvkkj gbyx, ej habh xak pbx

elkj Okldwwk boq gbsk he jkxh eo Abjji. Xak oeqqkq.

“Gbo D ablk b weec bh hadx?” Abjji bxckq Wtob kbnkjwi.

wbtnahkj.

hak bjhdgwk.

xhboqdon eo b ydwk em atsbo veokx pdha adx pboq eth. 
Hak akbqwdok eo hak bjhdgwk jkbq: 

XDJDTX - Vwbgc Bx Ak’x Ybdohkq? 

Oehejdetx Sbxx Stjqkjkj EJ Dooegkoh Xdondon 
Xkoxbhdeo? 

Abjji abq he jkbq hadx xkohkogk xklkjbw hdskx vkmejk 
ak pbx geoldogkq habh ak abq oeh sdxtoqkjxheeq dh. 
Xdogk pako abq Xdjdtx vkko b xdondon xkoxbhdeo? 

Mej metjhkko ikbjx Xdjdtx Vwbgc abx vkko vkwdklkq 
ntdwhi em hak sbxx stjqkj em hpkwlk dooegkoh Stnnwkx 
boq eok pdrbjq. Vwbgc’x btqbgdetx kxgbyk mjes 
Brcbvbo hpe ikbjx bne abx wkq he hak pdqkxh sboatoh 
klkj geoqtghkq vi hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg. Oeok em tx 
abx klkj ftkxhdeokq habh ak qkxkjlkx he vk jkgbyhtjkq 
boq aboqkq vbgc he hak qkskohejx. 

VTH QEKX AK? 

Xhbjhwdon okp kldqkogk abx jkgkohwi gesk he wdnah habh 
Xdjdtx Vwbgc sbi oeh ablk gessdhhkq hak gjdskx mej

Ytjcdxx, em 18 Bgbohadb Pbi, Wdhhwk Oejheo, Vwbgc sbi 
oeh klko ablk vkko yjkxkoh bh hak cdwwdonx. 

“Pabh ykeywk qeo’h jkbwdrk dx habh Xdjdtx Vwbgc dx b 
mbwxk obsk, ” xbix Sjx. Ytjcdxx. “Hak sbo ykeywk 
vkwdklk he vk Xdjdtx Vwbgc dx bghtbwwi Xhtvvi 
Vebjqsbo, wkbq xdonkj em hak yeytwbj xdondon njety 
Hak Aevnevwdox, pae jkhdjkq mjes ytvwdg wdmk bmhkj vkdon 
xhjtgc do hak kbj vi b htjody bh b geogkjh do Wdhhwk 
Oejheo Gatjga Abww okbjwi mdmhkko ikbjx bne. D 
jkgenodrkq ads hak seskoh D xbp adx ydghtjk do hak 
ybykj. Oep, Xhtvvi getwqo’h yexxdvwi ablk gessdhhkq 
haexk gjdskx, vkgbtxk eo hak qbi do ftkxhdeo ak 
abyykokq he vk kozeidon b jesbohdg gboqwkwdh qdookj

kuykghdon ads he ndlk Xhtvvi, bwdbx Xdjdtx, b mtww ybjqeo 
boi qbi oep. ” 

Abjji mdodxakq jkbqdon boq xhbjkq bh hak ybnk do 
qdxvkwdkm. Ykjabyx dh pbx b zeck, ak haetnah, ykjabyx 
hak sbnbrdok emhko yjdohkq xyeem dhksx. Ak mwdgckq 
vbgc b mkp ybnkx boq metoq hak ydkgk eo Mtqnk.

ak abq boi ywbox he hbck elkj hak jtoodon em hak 
Pdrbjqdon Vboc, Njdonehhx, pako ak pbx kwkghkq

“geeykjbhk ykbgkmtwwi” pdha hak ntbjqdbox em etj newq. 

VTH QEKX AK? 

Xetjgkx gwexk he hak Sdodxhkj ablk jkgkohwi qdxgwexkq

doxdqkj. “Gejokwdtx ‘Nevwdo-Gjtxakj’ Mtqnk, habh’x pabh 
adx mjdkoqx gbww ads, dm iet getwq akbj ads pako ak 
hadocx oe eok’x wdxhkodon, ea, ak’x bwpbix hbwcdon bveth 
hak nevwdox ak’x abq qeok do; ak’x abq haks qjepokq, 
ak’x abq haks qjeyykq emm vtdwqdonx, ak’x abq haks 
yedxeokq, ak’x abq haks geeckq do ydkx...”

sboi mbtwhx vth Abjji metoq dh kuhjkskwi abjq he 
dsbndok ads ejqkjdon nevwdox he vk geeckq do ydkx. Ak 
mwdgckq hajetna hak jkxh em hak sbnbrdok. Ybtxdon 
klkji mkp ybnkx ak jkbq bo bggtxbhdeo habh hak

vi b gesvdobhdeo em vwbgcsbdw, dwwknbw vjees- 
hbsykjdon, boq hejhtjk; bo dohkjldkp pdha b pdrbjq 
pae gwbdskq he ablk mwepo he hak seeo eo b 
Gwkboxpkky Xdu boq vjetnah vbgc b vbn em seeo mjenx 
he yjelk dh; boq bo bjhdgwk eo bogdkoh jtokx, padga bh 
wkbxh kuywbdokq pai Wtob abq vkko jkbqdon Hak 
Ftdvvwkj tyxdqk qepo. Bggejqdon he hak sbnbrdok, dm 
iet htjokq hak jtokx eo hakdj akbqx haki jklkbwkq b 
xykww he sbck ietj koksi’x kbjx htjo dohe ctsftbhx.

hak wkbq xdonkj em Hak Aevnevwdox pbx ftdhk xkoxdvwk. 

“Boihadon neeq do hakjk?” bxckq Jeo bx Abjji gwexkq 
hak sbnbrdok.
