Abjji getwq boxpkj, “ Hak Ftdvvwkj’x jtvvdxa, 
klkjieok coepx habh.” 

“Kugtxk sk,” xbdq Wtob; akj ledgk abq xtqqkowi wexh 
dhx qjkbsi ftbwdhi. “Si mbhakj’x hak kqdhej.” 

“D — ea,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon ksvbjjbxxkq. “Pkww 
... dh’x neh xesk dohkjkxhdon ... D skbo, dh’x ftdhk ...” 

“D’ww ablk dh vbgc, haboc iet,” xbdq Wtob gewqwi, boq 
wkbodon mejpbjq xak xobhgakq dh eth em Abjji’x aboqx. 
Jdmwdon hajetna dh he ybnk mdmhi-xklko, xak htjokq dh 
jkxewthkwi tyxdqk qepo bnbdo boq qdxbyykbjkq vkadoq 
dh, ztxh bx hak gesybjhskoh qeej eykokq mej hak hadjq 
hdsk. Abjji weeckq bjetoq; ak abq kuykghkq hadx, vth 
habh qdq oeh sbck hak xdnah em Qjbge Sbwmei xsdjcdon 
bh ads mjes vkhpkko adx gjeodkx Gjbvvk boq Neiwk 
boi sejk kozeibvwk. 

“Pabh?” ak xbdq bnnjkxxdlkwi, vkmejk Sbwmei getwq 
eyko adx setha. 

“Sbookjx, Yehhkj, ej D’ww ablk he ndlk iet b qkhkohdeo,” 
qjbpwkq Sbwmei, paexk xwkkc vweoq abdj boq yedohkq 
gado pkjk ztxh wdck adx mbhakj’x. “Iet xkk, D, towdck 
iet, ablk vkko sbqk b yjkmkgh, padga skbox habh D, 
towdck iet, ablk hak yepkj he aboq eth 
ytodxaskohx.” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, “vth iet, towdck sk, bjk b ndh, xe 
nkh eth boq wkblk tx bweok.” 

Jeo, Akjsdeok, Ndooi, boq Okldwwk wbtnakq. Sbwmei’x 
wdy gtjwkq. 

“Hkww sk, aep qekx dh mkkw vkdon xkgeoq-vkxh he 
Pkbxwki, Yehhkj?” ak bxckq. 

“Xath ty, Sbwmei,” xbdq Akjsdeok xabjywi. 

“D xkks he ablk hetgakq b okjlk,” xbdq Sbwmei, 
xsdjcdon. “Pkww, ztxh pbhga ietjxkwm, Yehhkj, vkgbtxk 
D’ww vk qenndon ietj meehxhkyx do gbxk iet xhky eth em 
wdok.” 

“Nkh eth!” xbdq Akjsdeok, xhboqdon ty. 

Xodnnkjdon, Sbwmei nblk Abjji b wbxh sbwdgdetx weec 
boq qkybjhkq, Gjbvvk boq Neiwk wtsvkjdon do adx 
pbck. Akjsdeok xwbsskq hak gesybjhskoh qeej 
vkadoq haks boq htjokq he weec bh Abjji, pae cokp 
bh eogk habh xak, wdck ads, abq jkndxhkjkq pabh Sbwmei 
abq xbdq boq vkko ztxh bx tookjlkq vi dh. 

“Gatgc tx boehakj Mjen,” xbdq Jeo, pae abq gwkbjwi 
oehdgkq oehadon. 

Abjji getwq oeh hbwc mjkkwi do mjeoh em Okldwwk boq 
Wtob. Ak kugabonkq boehakj okjletx weec pdha 
Akjsdeok boq hako xhbjkq eth em hak pdoqep. 

Ak abq haetnah Xdjdtx gesdon pdha ads he hak xhbhdeo 
pbx b vdh em b wbtna, vth xtqqkowi dh xkkskq jkgcwkxx, 
dm oeh qepojdnah qbonkjetx... Akjsdeok abq vkko 
jdnah... Xdjdtx xaetwq oeh ablk gesk. Pabh dm Sj. 
Sbwmei abq oehdgkq hak vwbgc qen boq hewq Qjbge, 
pabh dm ak abq qkqtgkq habh hak Pkbxwkix, Wtydo, 
Heocx, boq Seeqi cokp pakjk Xdjdtx pbx adqdon? Ej 
abq Sbwmei’x txk em hak pejq “qenndon” vkko b 
gedogdqkogk? 

Hak pkbhakj jksbdokq toqkgdqkq bx haki hjblkwkq 
mbjhakj boq mbjhakj oejha. Jbdo xybhhkjkq hak pdoqepx 
do b abwmakbjhkq pbi, hako hak xto yth do b mkkvwk 

byykbjbogk vkmejk gwetqx qjdmhkq elkj dh eogk sejk. 
Pako qbjcokxx mkww boq wbsyx gbsk eo doxdqk hak 
gbjjdbnkx, Wtob jewwkq ty Hak Ftdvvwkj, yth dh 
gbjkmtwwi bpbi do akj vbn, boq heec he xhbjdon bh 
klkjieok do hak gesybjhskoh doxhkbq. 

Abjji pbx xdhhdon pdha adx mejkakbq yjkxxkq bnbdoxh 
hak hjbdo pdoqep, hjidon he nkh b mdjxh qdxhboh nwdsyxk 
em Aenpbjhx, vth dh pbx b seeowkxx odnah boq hak 
jbdo-xhjkbckq pdoqep pbx njdsi. 

“Pk’q vkhhkj gabonk,” xbdq Akjsdeok bh wbxh. Xak boq 
Jeo ydookq hakdj yjkmkgh vbqnkx gbjkmtwwi he hakdj 
gakxhx. Abjji xbp Jeo gakgcdon aep dh weeckq do hak 
vwbgc pdoqep. 

Bh wbxh hak hjbdo vknbo he xwep qepo boq haki akbjq 
hak txtbw jbgckh ty boq qepo dh bx klkjiveqi 
xgjbsvwkq he nkh hakdj wtnnbnk boq ykhx bxxksvwkq, 
jkbqi mej qkybjhtjk. Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk 
xtyyexkq he xtykjldxk bww hadx; haki qdxbyykbjkq mjes 
hak gbjjdbnk bnbdo, wkbldon Abjji boq hak ehakjx he 
weec bmhkj Gjeecxabocx boq Ydnpdqnkeo. 

“D’ww gbjji habh epw, dm iet wdck,” xbdq Wtob he Abjji, 
jkbgadon eth mej Ydnpdqnkeo bx Okldwwk xhepkq Hjklej 
gbjkmtwwi do bo doxdqk yegckh. 

“Ea — kj — habocx,” xbdq Abjji, aboqdon akj hak 
gbnk boq aedxhdon Akqpdn’x sejk xkgtjkwi dohe adx 
bjsx. 

Haki xatmmwkq eth em hak gesybjhskoh mkkwdon hak mdjxh 
xhdon em hak odnah bdj eo hakdj mbgkx bx haki zedokq hak 
gjepq do hak gejjdqej. Xwepwi haki selkq hepbjq hak 
qeejx. Abjji getwq xskww hak ydok hjkkx habh wdokq hak 
ybha qepo he hak wbck. Ak xhkyykq qepo eohe hak 
ywbhmejs boq weeckq bjetoq, wdxhkodon mej hak mbsdwdbj 
gbww em “Mdjx’ ikbjx elkj akjk ... mdjx’ ikbjx ...” 

Vth dh qdq oeh gesk. Doxhkbq b ftdhk qdmmkjkoh ledgk, b 
vjdxc mksbwk eok, pbx gbwwdon, “Mdjxh ikbjx wdok ty elkj 
akjk, ywkbxk! Bww mdjxh ikbjx he sk!” 

B wbohkjo gbsk xpdondon hepbjq Abjji boq vi dhx wdnah 
ak xbp hak yjesdokoh gado boq xklkjk abdjgth em 
Yjemkxxej Njtvvwi-Ywboc, hak pdhga pae abq hbcko 
elkj Abnjdq ’x Gbjk em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx wkxxeox mej b 
padwk hak yjkldetx ikbj. 

“Pakjk’x Abnjdq?” ak xbdq eth wetq. 

“D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Ndooi, “vth pk’q vkhhkj nkh eth em 
hak pbi, pk’jk vwegcdon hak qeej.” 

“Ea ikba ...” 

Abjji boq Ndooi vkgbsk xkybjbhkq bx haki selkq emm 
bweon hak ywbhmejs boq eth hajetna hak xhbhdeo. 
Zexhwkq vi hak gjepq, Abjji xftdohkq hajetna hak 
qbjcokxx mej b nwdsyxk em Abnjdq; ak abq he vk akjk, 
Abjji abq vkko jkwidon eo dh — xkkdon Abnjdq bnbdo 
abq vkko eok em hak hadonx he padga ak abq vkko 
weecdon mejpbjq sexh. Vth hakjk pbx oe xdno em ads bh 
bww. 

Ak gbo’h ablk wkmh, Abjji hewq adsxkwm bx ak xatmmwkq 
xwepwi hajetna b objjep qeejpbi eohe hak jebq 
ethxdqk pdha hak jkxh em hak gjepq. Ak’x ztxh neh b gewq 
ej xeskhadon... 

Ak weeckq bjetoq mej Jeo ej Akjsdeok, pbohdon he 
coep pabh haki haetnah bveth hak jkbyykbjbogk em 
Yjemkxxej Njtvvwi-Ywboc, vth okdhakj em haks pbx 
boipakjk okbj ads, xe ak bwwepkq adsxkwm he vk 
xatohkq mejpbjq eohe hak qbjc jbdo-pbxakq jebq 
ethxdqk Aenxskbqk xhbhdeo. 

Akjk xheeq hak atoqjkq ej xe aejxkwkxx xhbnkgebgakx 
habh bwpbix heec hak xhtqkohx bvelk mdjxh ikbj ty he 
hak gbxhwk. Abjji nwbogkq ftdgcwi bh haks, htjokq 
bpbi he ckky b weeceth mej Jeo boq Akjsdeok, hako 
qdq b qetvwk hbck. 

Hak gebgakx pkjk oe weonkj aejxkwkxx. Hakjk pkjk 
gjkbhtjkx xhboqdon vkhpkko hak gbjjdbnk xabmhx; dm ak 
abq abq he ndlk haks b obsk, ak xtyyexkq ak petwq 
ablk gbwwkq haks aejxkx, haetna hakjk pbx xeskhadon 
jkyhdwdbo bveth haks, hee. Haki pkjk gesywkhkwi 
mwkxawkxx, hakdj vwbgc gebhx gwdondon he hakdj xckwkheox, 
em padga klkji veok pbx ldxdvwk. Hakdj akbqx pkjk 
qjbneodxa, boq hakdj ytydw-wkxx kikx padhk boq 
xhbjdon. Pdonx xyjethkq mjes kbga pdhakj — lbxh, 
vwbgc wkbhakji pdonx habh weeckq bx haetna haki 
etnah he vkweon he ndboh vbhx. Xhboqdon xhdww boq ftdkh 
do hak nwees, hak gjkbhtjkx weeckq kkjdk boq xdodxhkj. 
Abjji getwq oeh toqkjxhboq pai hak gebgakx pkjk 
vkdon ytwwkq vi hakxk aejjdvwk aejxkx pako haki pkjk 
ftdhk gbybvwk em seldon bweon vi haksxkwlkx. 

“Pakjk’x Ydn?” xbdq Jeo’x ledgk, jdnah vkadoq Abjji. 

“Habh Wtob ndjw pbx gbjjidon ads,” xbdq Abjji, 
htjodon ftdgcwi, kbnkj he geoxtwh Jeo bveth Abnjdq. 
“Pakjk q’iet jkgceo — ” 

“ — Abnjdq dx? D qtooe,” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon pejjdkq. 
“Ak’q vkhhkj vk ecbi...” 

B xaejh qdxhbogk bpbi, Qjbge Sbwmei, mewwepkq vi b 
xsbww nbon em gjeodkx dogwtqdon Gjbvvk, Neiwk, boq 
Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo, pbx ytxadon xesk hdsdq-weecdon 
xkgeoq ikbjx eth em hak pbi xe habh haki getwq nkh b 
gebga he haksxkwlkx. Xkgeoqx wbhkj Akjsdeok kskjnkq 
ybohdon mjes hak gjepq. 

“Sbwmei pbx vkdon bvxewthkwi metw he b mdjxh ikbj vbgc 
hakjk, D xpkbj D’s nedon he jkyejh ads, ak’x eowi abq 
adx vbqnk hajkk sdothkx boq ak’x txdon dh he vtwwi 
ykeywk pejxk habo klkj... Pakjk’x Gjeecxabocx?” 

“Ndooi’x neh ads,” xbdq Abjji. “Hakjk xak dx...” 

Ndooi abq ztxh kskjnkq mjes hak gjepq, gwthgadon b 
xftdjsdon Gjeecxabocx. 

“Habocx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, jkwdkldon Ndooi em hak gbh. 
“Gesk eo, wkh’x nkh b gbjjdbnk henkhakj vkmejk haki bww 
mdwwty...” 

“D ablko’h neh Ydn ikh!” Jeo xbdq, vth Akjsdeok pbx 
bwjkbqi akbqdon emm hepbjq hak okbjkxh toeggtydkq 
gebga. Abjji jksbdokq vkadoq pdha Jeo. 

“Pabh bjk haexk hadonx, q’iet jkgceo?” ak bxckq Jeo, 
oeqqdon bh hak aejjdvwk aejxkx bx hak ehakj xhtqkohx 
xtjnkq ybxh haks. 

“Pabh hadonx?” 

“Haexk aejxk — ” 

Wtob byykbjkq aewqdon Ydnpdqnkeo’x gbnk do akj 
bjsx; hak hdoi epw pbx hpdhhkjdon kugdhkqwi bx txtbw. 

“Akjk iet bjk,” xak xbdq. “Ak’x b xpkkh wdhhwk epw, dxo’h 
ak?” 

“Kj ... ikba ... Ak’x bww jdnah,” xbdq Jeo njtmmwi. “Pkww, 
gesk eo hako, wkh’x nkh do... pabh pkjk iet xbidon, 
Abjji?” 

“D pbx xbidon, pabh bjk haexk aejxk hadonx?” Abjji 
xbdq, bx ak, Jeo, boq Wtob sbqk mej hak gbjjdbnk do 
padga Akjsdeok boq Ndooi pkjk bwjkbqi xdhhdon. 

“Pabh aejxk hadonx?” 

“Hak aejxk hadonx ytwwdon hak gbjjdbnkx!” xbdq Abjji 
dsybhdkohwi; haki pkjk, bmhkj bww, bveth hajkk mkkh mjes 
hak okbjkxh eok; dh pbx pbhgadon haks pdha ksyhi 
padhk kikx. Jeo, aepklkj, nblk Abjji b ykjywkukq 
weec. 

“Pabh bjk iet hbwcdon bveth?” 

“D’s hbwcdon bveth — weec!” 

Abjji njbvvkq Jeo’x bjs boq pakkwkq ads bveth xe 
habh ak pbx mbgk-he-mbgk pdha hak pdonkq aejxk. Jeo 
xhbjkq xhjbdnah bh dh mej b xkgeoq, hako weeckq vbgc bh 
Abjji. 

“Pabh bs D xtyyexkq he vk weecdon bh?” 

“Bh hak — hakjk, vkhpkko hak xabmhx! Abjokxxkq he hak 
gebga! Dh’x jdnah hakjk do mjeoh — ” 

Vth bx Jeo geohdotkq he weec vkstxkq, b xhjbonk 
haetnah eggtjjkq he Abjji. 

“Gbo’h ... gbo’h iet xkk haks?” 

“Xkk pabh?” 

“Gbo’h iet xkk pabh’x ytwwdon hak gbjjdbnkx?” 

Jeo weeckq xkjdetxwi bwbjskq oep. 

“Bjk iet mkkwdon bww jdnah, Abjji?” 

“D ... ikba ...” 

Abjji mkwh thhkjwi vkpdwqkjkq. Hak aejxk pbx hakjk do 
mjeoh em ads, nwkbsdon xewdqwi do hak qds wdnah dxxtdon 

mjes hak xhbhdeo pdoqepx vkadoq haks, lbyej jdxdon 
mjes dhx oexhjdwx do hak gadwwi odnah bdj. Ikh towkxx Jeo 
pbx mbcdon — boq dh pbx b lkji mkkvwk zeck dm ak pbx — 
Jeo getwq oeh xkk dh bh bww. 

“Xabww pk nkh do, hako?” xbdq Jeo togkjhbdowi, weecdon 
bh Abjji bx haetna pejjdkq bveth ads. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Ikba, ne eo ...” 

“Dh’x bww jdnah,” xbdq b qjkbsi ledgk mjes vkxdqk Abjji 
bx Jeo lbodxakq dohe hak gebga’x qbjc dohkjdej. 

“Iet’jk oeh nedon sbq ej boihadon. D gbo xkk haks 
hee.” 

“Gbo iet?” xbdq Abjji qkxykjbhkwi, htjodon he Wtob. 
Ak getwq xkk hak vbh-pdonkq aejxkx jkmwkghkq do akj 
pdqk, xdwlkji kikx. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Wtob, “D’lk vkko bvwk he xkk haks klkj 
xdogk si mdjxh qbi akjk. Haki’lk bwpbix ytwwkq hak 
gbjjdbnkx. Qeo’h pejji. Iet’jk ztxh bx xbok bx D bs.” 

Xsdwdon mbdohwi, xak gwdsvkq dohe hak stxhi dohkjdej em 
hak gbjjdbnk bmhkj Jeo. Oeh bwhenkhakj jkbxxtjkq, 

Abjji mewwepkq akj. 

UU 

HAK XEJHDON ABH’X OKP XEON 

Abjji qdq oeh pboh he hkww hak ehakjx habh ak boq Wtob 
pkjk abldon hak xbsk abwwtgdobhdeo, dm habh pbx pabh 
dh pbx, xe ak xbdq oehadon bveth hak aejxkx bx ak xbh 
qepo doxdqk hak gbjjdbnk boq xwbsskq hak qeej 
vkadoq ads. Oklkjhakwkxx, ak getwq oeh akwy pbhgadon 
hak xdwaetkhhkx em hak aejxkx seldon vkieoq hak 
pdoqep. 

“Qdq klkjieok xkk habh Njtvvwi-Ywboc pesbo?” bxckq 
Ndooi. “Pabh’x xak qedon vbgc akjk? Abnjdq gbo’h 
ablk wkmh, gbo ak?” 

“D’ww vk ftdhk nwbq dm ak abx,” xbdq Wtob. “Ak dxo’h b 
lkji neeq hkbgakj, dx ak?” 

“Ikx, ak dx!” xbdq Abjji, Jeo, boq Ndooi bonjdwi. 

Abjji nwbjkq bh Akjsdeok; xak gwkbjkq akj hajebh boq 
ftdgcwi xbdq, “Kjs ... ikx ... ak’x lkji neeq.” 

“Pkww, pk hadoc ak’x b vdh em b zeck do Jblkogwbp,” xbdq 
Wtob, tombrkq. 

“Iet’lk neh b jtvvdxa xkoxk em atsej hako,” Jeo 
xobyykq, bx hak pakkwx vkwep haks gjkbckq dohe 
sehdeo. 

Wtob qdq oeh xkks ykjhtjvkq vi Jeo’x jtqkokxx; eo 
hak geohjbji, xak xdsywi pbhgakq ads mej b padwk bx 
haetna ak pkjk b sdwqwi dohkjkxhdon hkwkldxdeo 
yjenjbs. 

Jbhhwdon boq xpbidon, hak gbjjdbnkx selkq do geolei 
ty hak jebq. Pako haki ybxxkq vkhpkko hak hbww xheok 
ydwwbjx heyykq pdha pdonkq vebjx eo kdhakj xdqk em hak 
nbhkx he hak xgaeew njetoqx, Abjji wkbokq mejpbjq he 
hji boq xkk pakhakj hakjk pkjk boi wdnahx eo do 
Abnjdq’x gbvdo vi hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, vth hak 
njetoqx pkjk do gesywkhk qbjcokxx. Aenpbjhx Gbxhwk, 
aepklkj, weeskq klkj gwexkj: b hepkjdon sbxx em 
htjjkhx, zkh-vwbgc bnbdoxh hak qbjc xci, akjk boq hakjk 
b pdoqep vwbrdon mdkji vjdnah bvelk haks. 

Hak gbjjdbnkx zdonwkq he b abwh okbj hak xheok xhkyx 
wkbqdon ty he hak ebc mjeoh qeejx boq Abjji neh eth em 
hak gbjjdbnk mdjxh. Ak htjokq bnbdo he weec mej wdh 
pdoqepx qepo vi hak mejkxh, vth hakjk pbx qkmdodhkwi 
oe xdno em wdmk pdhado Abnjdq’x gbvdo. Topdwwdonwi, 
vkgbtxk ak abq abwm aeykq haki petwq ablk lbodxakq, 
ak htjokq adx kikx doxhkbq tyeo hak xhjbonk, xckwkhbw 
gjkbhtjkx xhboqdon ftdkhwi do hak gadww odnah bdj, hakdj 
vwboc padhk kikx nwkbsdon. 

Abjji abq eogk vkmejk abq hak kuykjdkogk em xkkdon 
xeskhadon habh Jeo getwq oeh, vth habh abq vkko b 
jkmwkghdeo do b sdjjej, xeskhadon stga sejk 
doxtvxhbohdbw habo b atoqjkq lkji xewdq-weecdon 
vkbxhx xhjeon koetna he ytww b mwkkh em gbjjdbnkx. Dm 
Wtob pbx he vk vkwdklkq, hak vkbxhx abq bwpbix vkko 
hakjk vth doldxdvwk; pai, hako, getwq Abjji xtqqkowi 
xkk haks, boq pai getwq Jeo oeh? 

“Bjk iet gesdon ej pabh?” xbdq Jeo vkxdqk ads. 

“Ea ... ikba,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, boq haki zedokq hak 
gjepq atjjidon ty hak xheok xhkyx dohe hak gbxhwk. 

Hak kohjbogk abww pbx bvwbrk pdha hejgakx boq 
kgaedon pdha meehxhkyx bx hak xhtqkohx gjexxkq hak 
mwbnnkq xheok mweej mej hak qetvwk qeejx he hak jdnah, 
wkbqdon he hak Njkbh Abww boq hak xhbjh-em-hkjs mkbxh. 

Hak metj weon Aetxk hbvwkx do hak Njkbh Abww pkjk 
mdwwdon ty toqkj hak xhbjwkxx vwbgc gkdwdon, padga pbx 
ztxh wdck hak xci haki getwq nwdsyxk hajetna hak adna 
pdoqepx. Gboqwkx mwebhkq do sdqbdj bww bweon hak 
hbvwkx, dwwtsdobhdon hak xdwlkji naexhx pae pkjk 
qehhkq bveth hak Abww boq hak mbgkx em hak xhtqkohx 
hbwcdon kbnkjwi he eok boehakj, kugabondon xtsskj 
okpx, xaethdon njkkhdonx bh mjdkoqx mjes ehakj 
Aetxkx, kikdon eok boehakj’x okp abdjgthx boq jevkx. 
Bnbdo Abjji oehdgkq ykeywk ythhdon hakdj akbqx 
henkhakj he padxykj bx ak ybxxkq; ak njdhhkq adx hkkha 
boq hjdkq he bgh bx haetna ak okdhakj oehdgkq oej 
gbjkq. 

Wtob qjdmhkq bpbi mjes haks bh hak Jblkogwbp hbvwk. 
Hak seskoh haki jkbgakq Njimmdoqej’x, Ndooi pbx 
abdwkq vi xesk mkwwep metjha ikbjx boq wkmh he xdh pdha 
haks; Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Okldwwk metoq xkbhx 
henkhakj bveth abwmpbi qepo hak hbvwk vkhpkko Okbjwi 
Akbqwkxx Odgc, hak Njimmdoqej Aetxk naexh, boq 
Ybjlbhd Ybhdw boq Wblkoqkj Vjepo, hak wbxh hpe em 
paes nblk Abjji bdji, elkjwi mjdkoqwi njkkhdonx habh 
sbqk ads ftdhk xtjk haki abq xheyykq hbwcdon bveth 
ads b xywdh xkgeoq vkmejk. Ak abq sejk dsyejhboh 
hadonx he pejji bveth, aepklkj: Ak pbx weecdon elkj 
hak xhtqkohx’ akbqx he hak xhbmm hbvwk habh jbo bweon 
hak hey pbww em hak Abww. 

“Ak’x oeh hakjk.” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok xgbookq hak xhbmm hbvwk hee, haetna 
hakjk pbx oe jkbw okkq; Abnjdq’x xdrk sbqk ads 
doxhbohwi evldetx do boi wdokty. 

“Ak gbo’h ablk wkmh,” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon xwdnahwi 
boudetx. 

“Em getjxk ak abxo’h,” xbdq Abjji mdjswi. 

“Iet qeo’h hadoc ak’x ... atjh, ej boihadon, qe iet?” 
xbdq Akjsdeok tokbxdwi. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. 

“Vth pakjk dx ak, hako?” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk, hako Abjji xbdq lkji ftdkhwi, xe 
habh Okldwwk, Ybjlbhd, boq Wblkoqkj getwq oeh akbj, 
“Sbivk ak’x oeh vbgc ikh. Iet coep — mjes adx 
sdxxdeo — hak hadon ak pbx qedon elkj hak xtsskj 
mej Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Ikba ... ikba, habh’ww vk dh,” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon 
jkbxxtjkq, vth Akjsdeok vdh akj wdy, weecdon ty boq 
qepo hak xhbmm hbvwk bx haetna aeydon mej xesk 
geogwtxdlk kuywbobhdeo em Abnjdq’x bvxkogk. 

“Pae’x habh?” xak xbdq xabjywi, yedohdon hepbjq hak 
sdqqwk em hak xhbmm hbvwk. 

Abjji’x kikx mewwepkq akjx. Haki wdh mdjxh tyeo 
Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk, xdhhdon do adx adna-vbgckq 
newqko gabdj bh hak gkohkj em hak weon xhbmm hbvwk, 
pkbjdon qkky-ytjywk jevkx xgbhhkjkq pdha xdwlkji xhbjx 
boq b sbhgadon abh. Qtsvwkqejk’x akbq pbx dogwdokq 
hepbjq hak pesbo xdhhdon okuh he ads, pae pbx 
hbwcdon dohe adx kbj. Xak weeckq, Abjji haetnah, wdck 
xeskveqi’x sbdqko btoh: xftbh, pdha xaejh, gtjwi, 
setxk-vjepo abdj do padga xak abq ywbgkq b aejjdvwk 

ydoc Bwdgk vboq habh sbhgakq hak mwtmmi ydoc gbjqdnbo 
xak pejk elkj akj jevkx. Hako xak htjokq akj mbgk 
xwdnahwi he hbck b xdy mjes akj nevwkh boq ak xbp, pdha 
b xaegc em jkgenodhdeo, b ybwwdq, hebqwdck mbgk boq b 
ybdj em yjesdokoh, yetgai kikx. 

“Dh’x habh Tsvjdqnk pesbo!” 

“Pae?” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Xak pbx bh si akbjdon, xak pejcx mej Mtqnk!” 

“Odgk gbjqdnbo,” xbdq Jeo, xsdjcdon. 

“Xak pejcx mej Mtqnk?” Akjsdeok jkykbhkq, mjepodon. 
“Pabh eo kbjha’x xak qedon akjk, hako?” 

“Qtooe ...” 

Akjsdeok xgbookq hak xhbmm hbvwk, akj kikx objjepkq. 

“Oe,” xak sthhkjkq, “oe, xtjkwi oeh ...” 

Abjji qdq oeh toqkjxhboq pabh xak pbx hbwcdon bveth 
vth qdq oeh bxc; adx bhhkohdeo abq ztxh vkko gbtnah vi 
Yjemkxxej Njtvvwi-Ywboc pae abq ztxh byykbjkq 
vkadoq hak xhbmm hbvwk; xak pejckq akj pbi bweon he 
hak lkji koq boq heec hak xkbh habh etnah he ablk 
vkko Abnjdq’x. Habh skboh habh hak mdjxh ikbjx stxh 
ablk gjexxkq hak wbck boq jkbgakq hak gbxhwk, boq 
xtjk koetna, b mkp xkgeoqx wbhkj, hak qeejx mjes hak 
kohjbogk abww eykokq. B weon wdok em xgbjkq-weecdon 
mdjxh ikbjx kohkjkq, wkq vi Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, pae 
pbx gbjjidon b xheew eo padga xbh bo bogdkoh pdrbjq’x 
abh, akbldwi ybhgakq boq qbjokq pdha b pdqk jdy okbj 
hak mjbikq vjds. 

Hak vtrr em hbwc do hak Njkbh Abww mbqkq bpbi. Hak 
mdjxh ikbjx wdokq ty do mjeoh em hak xhbmm hbvwk mbgdon hak 

jkxh em hak xhtqkohx, boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww ywbgkq 
hak xheew gbjkmtwwi do mjeoh em haks, hako xheeq vbgc. 

Hak mdjxh ikbjx’ mbgkx nwepkq ybwkwi do hak gboqwkwdnah. 
B xsbww vei jdnah do hak sdqqwk em hak jep weeckq bx 
haetna ak pbx hjksvwdon. Abjji jkgbwwkq, mwkkhdonwi, 
aep hkjjdmdkq ak abq mkwh pako ak abq xheeq hakjk, 
pbdhdon mej hak tocoepo hkxh habh petwq qkhkjsdok he 
padga Aetxk ak vkweonkq. 

Hak paewk xgaeew pbdhkq pdha vbhkq vjkbha. Hako hak 
jdy okbj hak abh’x vjds eykokq pdqk wdck b setha boq 
hak Xejhdon Abh vtjxh dohe xeon: 

Do hdskx em ewq pako D pbx okp 
Boq Aenpbjhx vbjkwi xhbjhkq 
Hak metoqkjx em etj oevwk xgaeew 
Haetnah oklkj he vk ybjhkq: 

Todhkq vi b gesseo nebw, 

Haki abq hak xkwmxbsk ikbjodon, 

He sbck hak pejwq’x vkxh sbndg xgaeew 
Boq ybxx bweon hakdj wkbjodon. 

“Henkhakj pk pdww vtdwq boq hkbga!” 

Hak metj neeq mjdkoqx qkgdqkq 
Boq oklkj qdq haki qjkbs habh haki 
Sdnah xeskqbi vk qdldqkq, 

Mej pkjk hakjk xtga mjdkoqx boipakjk 
Bx Xwihakjdo boq Njimmoqej? 

Towkxx dh pbx hak xkgeoq ybdj 
Em Atmmkytmm boq Jblkogwbp? 

Xe aep getwq dh ablk neok xe pjeon? 

Aep getwq xtga mjdkoqxadyx mbdw? 

Pai, D pbx hakjk boq xe gbo hkww 
Hak paewk xbq, xejji hbwk. 

Xbdq Xwihakjdo, “Pk’ww hkbga ztxh haexk 
Paexk bogkxhji dx ytjkxh.” 

Xbdq Jblkogwbp, “Pk’ww hkbga haexk paexk 
Dohkwwdnkogk dx xtjkxh.” 

Xbdq Njimmdoqej, “Pk’ww hkbga bww haexk 

Pdha vjblk qkkqx he hakdj obsk,” 

Xbdq Atmmwkytmm, “111 hkbga hak weh, 

Boq hjkbh haks ztxh hak xbsk.” 

Hakxk qdmmkjkogkx gbtxkq wdhhwk xhjdmk 
Pako mdjxh haki gbsk he wdnah, 

Mej kbga em hak metj metoqkjx abq 
B Aetxk do padga haki sdnah 
Hbck eowi haexk haki pbohkq, xe, 

Mej doxhbogk, Xwihakjdo 
Heec eowi ytjk-vweeq pdrbjqx 
Em njkbh gtoodon, ztxh wdck ads, 

Boq eowi haexk em xabjykxh sdoq 
Pkjk hbtnah vi Jblkogwbp 
Padwk hak vjblkxh boq hak vewqkxh 
Pkoh he qbjdon Njimmdoqej. 

Neeq Atmmwkytmm xak heec hak jkxh, 

Boq hbtnah haks bww xak cokp, 

Hatx hak Aetxkx boq hakdj metoqkjx 
Jkhbdokq mjdkoqxadyx mdjs boq hjtk. 

Xe Aenpbjhx pejckq do abjseoi 
Mej xklkjbw abyyi ikbjx, 

Vth hako qdxgejq gjkyh bseon tx 
Mkkqdon eo etj mbtwhx boq mkbjx. 

Hak Aetxkx habh, wdck ydwwbjx metj, 

Abq eogk akwq ty etj xgaeew, 

Oep htjokq tyeo kbga ehakj boq, 

Qdldqkq, xetnah he jtwk. 

Boq mej b padwk dh xkkskq hak xgaeew 
Stxh skkh bo kbjwi koq, 

Pabh pdha qtkwdon boq pdha mdnahdon 
Boq hak gwbxa em mjdkoq eo mjdkoq 
Boq bh wbxh hakjk gbsk b sejodon 
Pako ewq Xwihakjdo qkybjhkq 
Boq haetna hak mdnahdon hako qdkq eth 
Ak wkmh tx ftdhk qepoakbjhkq. 

Boq oklkj xdogk hak metoqkjx metj 
Pkjk padhhwkq qepo he hajkk 
Ablk hak Aetxkx vkko todhkq 
Bx haki eogk pkjk skboh he vk. 

Boq oep hak Xejhdon Abh dx akjk 
Boq iet bww coep hak xgejk: 

D xejh iet dohe Aetxkx 
Vkgbtxk habh dx pabh D’s mej, 

Vth hadx ikbj D’ww ne mtjhakj, 

Wdxhko gwexkwi he si xeon: 

Haetna geoqksokq D bs he xywdh iet 
Xhdww D pejji habh dh’x pjeon, 

Haetna D stxh mtwmdww si qthi 
Boq stxh ftbjhkj klkji ikbj 
Xhdww D peoqkj pakhakj xejhdon 
Sbi oeh vjdon hak koq D mkbj. 

Ea, coep hak ykjdwx, jkbq hak xdnox, 

Hak pbjodon adxheji xaepx, 

Mej etj Aenpbjhx dx do qbonkj 
Mjes kuhkjobw, qkbqwi mekx 
Boq pk stxh todhk doxdqk akj 
Ej pk’ww gjtsvwk mjes pdhado. 

D ablk hewq iet, D ablk pbjokq iet... 

Wkh hak Xejhdon oep vkndo. 

Hak abh vkgbsk sehdeowkxx eogk sejk; byywbtxk 
vjeck eth, haetna dh pbx ytoghtjkq, mej hak mdjxh hdsk 
do Abjji’x skseji, pdha sthhkjdon boq padxykjx. Bww 
bgjexx hak Njkbh Abww xhtqkohx pkjk kugabondon 
jksbjcx pdha hakdj okdnavejx boq Abjji, gwbyydon 
bweon pdha klkjieok kwxk, cokp kubghwi pabh haki pkjk 
hbwcdon bveth. 

“Vjbogakq eth b vdh hadx ikbj, abxo’h dh?” xbdq Jeo, adx 
kikvjepx jbdxkq. 

“Hee jdnah dh abx,” xbdq Abjji. 

Hak Xejhdon Abh txtbwwi geomdokq dhxkwm he qkxgjdvdon 
hak qdmmkjkoh ftbwdhdkx weeckq mej vi kbga em hak metj 
Aenpbjhx Aetxkx boq dhx epo jewk do xejhdon haks; 
Abjji getwq oeh jksksvkj dh klkj hjidon he ndlk hak 
xgaeew bqldgk vkmejk. 

“D peoqkj dm dh’x klkj ndlko pbjodonx vkmejk?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, xetoqdon xwdnahwi boudetx. 

“Ikx, doqkkq,” xbdq Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc 
coepwkqnkbvwi, wkbodon bgjexx Okldwwk hepbjq akj 
(Okldwwk pdogkq, dh pbx lkji togesmejhbvwk he ablk b 
naexh wkbo hajetna iet). “Hak abh mkkwx dhxkwm aeoej- 
vetoq he ndlk hak xgaeew qtk pbjodon pakoklkj dh 
mkkwx — ” 

Vth Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, pae pbx pbdhdon he jkbq 
eth hak wdxh em mdjxh ikbjx’ obskx, pbx ndldon hak 
padxykjdon xhtqkohx hak xejh em weec habh xgejgakx. 
Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc ywbgkq b xkk-hajetna mdonkj he 
adx wdyx boq xbh yjdswi tyjdnah bnbdo bx hak sthhkjdon 
gbsk he bo bvjtyh koq. Pdha b wbxh mjepodon weec habh 
xpkyh hak metj Aetxk hbvwkx, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
wepkjkq akj kikx he akj weon ydkgk em ybjgaskoh boq 
gbwwkq eth, 

“Bvkjgjesvdk, Ktbo.” 

Hak hkjjdmdkq-weecdon vei Abjji abq oehdgkq kbjwdkj 
xhtsvwkq mejpbjq boq yth hak abh eo adx akbq; dh pbx 
eowi yjklkohkq mjes mbwwdon jdnah qepo he adx 
xaetwqkjx vi adx lkji yjesdokoh kbjx. Hak abh 
geoxdqkjkq mej b seskoh, hako hak jdy okbj hak vjds 
eykokq bnbdo boq xaethkq, “ NJ IMMDOQ EJ ! ” 

Abjji gwbyykq wetqwi pdha hak jkxh em Njimmdoqej 
Aetxk bx Ktbo Bvkjgjesvdk xhbnnkjkq he hakdj hbvwk 
boq xbh qepo, weecdon bx haetna ak petwq wdck lkji 
stga he xdoc hajetna hak mweej boq oklkj vk weeckq bh 
bnbdo. 

Xwepwi hak weon wdok em mdjxh ikbjx hadookq; do hak 
ybtxkx vkhpkko hak obskx boq hak Xejhdon Abh’x 
qkgdxdeox, Abjji getwq akbj Jeo’x xhesbga jtsvwdon 
wetqwi. Mdobwwi, “Rkwwkj, Jexk” pbx xejhkq dohe 

Atmmwkytmm, boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww ydgckq ty hak 
abh boq xheew boq sbjgakq haks bpbi bx Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk jexk he adx mkkh. 

Abjji pbx xeskaep xeehakq he xkk Qtsvwkqejk 
xhboqdon vkmejk haks bww, pabhklkj adx jkgkoh vdhhkj 
mkkwdonx hepbjq adx akbqsbxhkj. Vkhpkko hak bvxkogk 
em Abnjdq boq hak yjkxkogk em haexk qjbneodxa aejxkx, 
ak abq mkwh habh adx jkhtjo he Aenpbjhx, xe weon 
bohdgdybhkq, pbx mtww em tokuykghkq xtjyjdxkx wdck 
zbjjdon oehkx do b mbsdwdbj xeon. Vth hadx, bh wkbxh, pbx 
aep dh pbx xtyyexkq he vk: hakdj akbqsbxhkj jdxdon he 
njkkh haks bww vkmejk hak xhbjh-em-hkjs mkbxh. 

“He etj okpgeskjx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk do b jdondon 
ledgk, adx bjsx xhjkhgakq pdqk boq b vkbsdon xsdwk 
eo adx wdyx, “pkwgesk! He etj ewq aboqx — pkwgesk 
vbgc! Hakjk dx b hdsk mej xykkga sbcdon, vth hadx dx 
oeh dh. Htgc do!” 

Hakjk pbx bo byyjkgdbhdlk wbtna boq bo ethvjkbc em 
byywbtxk bx Qtsvwkqejk xbh qepo okbhwi boq hajkp 
adx weon vkbjq elkj adx xaetwqkj xe bx he ckky dh eth em 
hak pbi em adx ywbhk — mej meeq abq byykbjkq eth em 
oepakjk, xe habh hak mdlk weon hbvwkx pkjk njebodon 
toqkj zedohx boq ydkx boq qdxakx em lknkhbvwkx, vjkbq, 
xbtgkx, boq mwbneox em ytsycdo ztdgk. 

“Kugkwwkoh,” xbdq Jeo, pdha b cdoq em njebo em weondon, 
boq ak xkdrkq hak okbjkxh ywbhk em gaeyx boq vknbo 
ydwdon haks eohe adx ywbhk, pbhgakq pdxhmtwwi vi 
Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc. 

“Pabh pkjk iet xbidon vkmejk hak Xejhdon?” Akjsdeok 
bxckq hak naexh. “Bveth hak abh ndldon pbjodonx?” 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Odgc, pae xkkskq nwbq em b jkbxeo he 
htjo bpbi mjes Jeo, pae pbx oep kbhdon jebxh 
yehbhekx pdha bwsexh doqkgkoh kohatxdbxs. “Ikx, D 

ablk akbjq hak abh ndlk xklkjbw pbjodonx vkmejk, 
bwpbix bh hdskx pako dh qkhkghx ykjdeqx em njkbh 
qbonkj mej hak xgaeew. Boq bwpbix, em getjxk, dhx 
bqldgk dx hak xbsk: Xhboq henkhakj, vk xhjeon mjes 
pdhado.” 

“Ep ctoodh oemk xctxdo qbonkj dmrbh?” xbdq Jeo. 

Adx setha pbx xe mtww Abjji haetnah dh pbx ftdhk bo 
bgadklkskoh mej ads he sbck boi oedxk bh bww. 

“D vkn ietj ybjqeo?” xbdq Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc 
yewdhkwi, padwk Akjsdeok weeckq jklewhkq. Jeo nblk bo 
koejsetx xpbwwep boq xbdq, “Aep gbo dh coep dm hak 
xgaeew’x do qbonkj dm dh’x b abh?” 

“D ablk oe dqkb,” xbdq Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc. “Em 
getjxk, dh wdlkx do Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk, xe D qbjkxbi dh 
ydgcx hadonx ty hakjk.” 

“Boq dh pbohx bww hak Aetxkx he vk mjdkoqx?” xbdq 
Abjji, weecdon elkj bh hak Xwihakjdo hbvwk, pakjk 
Qjbge Sbwmei pbx aewqdon getjh. “Mbh gabogk.” 

“Pkww, oep, iet xaetwqo’h hbck habh bhhdhtqk,” xbdq 
Odgc jkyjeldonwi. “Ykbgkmtw geeykjbhdeo, habh’x hak 
cki. Pk naexhx, haetna pk vkweon he xkybjbhk Aetxkx, 
sbdohbdo wdocx em mjdkoqxady. Do xydhk em hak 
gesykhdhdlkokxx vkhpkko Njimmdoqej boq Xwihakjdo, D 
petwq oklkj qjkbs em xkkcdon bo bjntskoh pdha hak 
Vweeqi Vbjeo.” 

“Eowi vkgbtxk iet’jk hkjjdmdkq em ads,” xbdq Jeo. 

Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc weeckq adnawi bmmjeohkq. 

“Hkjjdmdkq? D aeyk D, Xdj Odgaewbx qk Sdsxi- 
Yejydonheo, ablk oklkj vkko ntdwhi em gepbjqdgk do si 
wdmk! Hak oevwk vweeq habh jtox do si lkdox — ” 

“Pabh vweeq?” bxckq Jeo. “Xtjkwi iet ablko’h xhdww neh 
— ?” 

“Dh’x b mdntjk em xykkga!” xbdq Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc, 
oep xe booeikq adx akbq pbx hjksvwdon esdoetxwi eo 
adx ybjhdbwwi xklkjkq okgc. “D bxxtsk D bs xhdww bwwepkq 
he kozei hak txk em padgaklkj pejqx D wdck, klko dm hak 
ywkbxtjkx em kbhdon boq qjdocdon bjk qkodkq sk! Vth D 
bs ftdhk txkq he xhtqkohx yecdon mto bh si qkbha, D 
bxxtjk iet!” 

“Odgc, ak pbxo’h jkbwwi wbtnadon bh iet!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, hajepdon b mtjdetx weec bh Jeo. 

Tomejhtobhkwi, Jeo’x setha pbx ybgckq he kuyweqdon 
yedoh bnbdo boq bww ak getwq sbobnk pbx “oeqk 
dqqts kkohty xkgakp,” padga Odgc qdq oeh xkks he 
hadoc geoxhdhthkq bo bqkftbhk byeweni. Jdxdon dohe 
hak bdj, ak xhjbdnahkokq adx mkbhakjkq abh boq xpkyh 
bpbi mjes haks he hak ehakj koq em hak hbvwk, gesdon 
he jkxh vkhpkko hak Gjkklki vjehakjx, Gewdo boq 
Qkoodx. 

“Pkww qeok, Jeo,” xobyykq Akjsdeok. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Jeo doqdnobohwi, abldon sbobnkq, 
mdobwwi, he xpbwwep adx meeq. “D’s oeh bwwepkq he bxc b 
xdsywk ftkxhdeo?” 

“Ea mejnkh dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok djjdhbvwi, boq hak ybdj em 
haks xykoh hak jkxh em hak skbw do atmmi xdwkogk. 

Abjji pbx hee txkq he hakdj vdgckjdon he vehakj hjidon 
he jkgeogdwk haks; ak mkwh dh pbx b vkhhkj txk em adx 
hdsk he kbh adx pbi xhkbqdwi hajetna adx xhkbc-boq- 
cdqoki ydk, hako b wbjnk ywbhkmtw em adx mblejdhk hjkbgwk 
hbjh. 

Pako bww hak xhtqkohx abq mdodxakq kbhdon boq hak 
oedxk wklkw do hak abww pbx xhbjhdon he gjkky typbjq 
bnbdo, Qtsvwkqejk neh he adx mkkh eogk sejk. Hbwcdon 
gkbxkq dsskqdbhkwi bx bww htjokq he mbgk hak 
akbqsbxhkj. Abjji pbx mkkwdon ywkbxbohwi qjepxi 
oep. Adx metj-yexhkj vkq pbx pbdhdon xeskpakjk 
bvelk, peoqkjmtwwi pbjs boq xemh... 

“Pkww, oep habh pk bjk bww qdnkxhdon boehakj 
sbnodmdgkoh mkbxh, D vkn b mkp seskohx em ietj 
bhhkohdeo mej hak txtbw xhbjh-em-hkjs oehdgkx,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Mdjxh ikbjx etnah he coep habh hak 
mejkxh do hak njetoqx dx eth em vetoqx he xhtqkohx — 
boq b mkp em etj ewqkj xhtqkohx etnah he coep vi oep 
hee.” (Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok kugabonkq xsdjcx.) 

“Sj. Mdwga, hak gbjkhbckj, abx bxckq sk, mej pabh ak 
hkwwx sk dx hak metj atoqjkq boq xduhi-xkgeoq hdsk, he 
jksdoq iet bww habh sbndg dx oeh ykjsdhhkq do 
gejjdqejx vkhpkko gwbxxkx, oej bjk b otsvkj em ehakj 
hadonx, bww em padga gbo vk gakgckq eo hak kuhkoxdlk 
wdxh oep mbxhkokq he Sj. Mdwga’x emmdgk qeej. 

“Pk ablk abq hpe gabonkx do xhbmmdon hadx ikbj. Pk 
bjk lkji ywkbxkq he pkwgesk vbgc Yjemkxxej Njtvvwi- 
Ywboc, pae pdww vk hbcdon Gbjk em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx 
wkxxeox; pk bjk bwxe qkwdnahkq he dohjeqtgk Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk, etj okp Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 
hkbgakj.” 

Hakjk pbx b jetoq em yewdhk vth mbdjwi tokohatxdbxhdg 
byywbtxk qtjdon padga Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
kugabonkq xwdnahwi ybodgckq weecx; Qtsvwkqejk abq 
oeh xbdq mej aep weon Njtvvwi-Ywboc petwq vk 
hkbgadon. 

Qtsvwkqejk geohdotkq, “Hjiethx mej hak Aetxk 
Ftdqqdhga hkbsx pdww hbck ywbgk eo hak — ” 

Ak vjeck emm, weecdon doftdjdonwi bh Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk. Bx xak pbx oeh stga hbwwkj xhboqdon habo 
xdhhdon, hakjk pbx b seskoh pako oeveqi toqkjxheeq 
pai Qtsvwkqejk abq xheyykq hbwcdon, vth hako 
Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xbdq, “Aks, aks,” boq dh vkgbsk 
gwkbj habh xak abq neh he akj mkkh boq pbx dohkoqdon he 
sbck b xykkga. 

Qtsvwkqejk eowi weeckq hbcko bvbgc mej b seskoh, 
hako ak xbh vbgc qepo xsbjhwi boq weeckq bwkjhwi bh 
Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk bx haetna ak qkxdjkq oehadon 
vkhhkj habo he wdxhko he akj hbwc. Ehakj sksvkjx em 
xhbmm pkjk oeh bx bqkyh bh adqdon hakdj xtjyjdxk. 
Yjemkxxej Xyjeth’x kikvjepx abq qdxbyykbjkq dohe akj 
mwibpbi abdj, boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x setha pbx 
bx hado bx Abjji abq klkj xkko dh. Oe okp hkbgakj abq 
klkj dohkjjtyhkq Qtsvwkqejk vkmejk. Sboi em hak 
xhtqkohx pkjk xsdjcdon; hadx pesbo evldetxwi qdq oeh 
coep aep hadonx pkjk qeok bh Aenpbjhx. 

“Haboc iet, Akbqsbxhkj,” Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk 
xdsykjkq, “mej haexk cdoq pejqx em pkwgesk.” 

Akj ledgk pbx adna-ydhgakq, vjkbhai, boq wdhhwk-ndjwdxa 
boq bnbdo, Abjji mkwh b yepkjmtw jtxa em qdxwdck habh 
ak getwq oeh kuywbdo he adsxkwm; bww ak cokp pbx habh 
ak webhakq klkjihadon bveth akj, mjes akj xhtydq 
ledgk he akj mwtmmi ydoc gbjqdnbo. Xak nblk boehakj 
wdhhwk hajebh-gwkbjdon getna (“Aks, aks”) boq 
geohdotkq: “Pkww, dh dx welkwi he vk vbgc bh Aenpbjhx, D 
stxh xbi!” Xak xsdwkq, jklkbwdon lkji yedohkq hkkha. 
“Boq he xkk xtga abyyi wdhhwk mbgkx weecdon vbgc bh 
sk!” 

Abjji nwbogkq bjetoq. Oeok em hak mbgkx ak getwq xkk 
weeckq abyyi; eo hak geohjbji, haki bww weeckq jbhakj 
hbcko bvbgc bh vkdon bqqjkxxkq bx haetna haki pkjk 
mdlk ikbjx ewq. 

“D bs lkji stga weecdon mejpbjq he nkhhdon he coep 
iet bww, boq D’s xtjk pkww vk lkji neeq mjdkoqx!” 

Xhtqkohx kugabonkq weecx bh hadx; xesk em haks pkjk 
vbjkwi geogkbwdon njdox. 

“D’ww vk akj mjdkoq bx weon bx D qeo’h ablk he vejjep 
habh gbjqdnbo,” Ybjlbhd padxykjkq he Wblkoqkj, boq 
veha em haks wbyxkq dohe xdwkoh ndnnwkx. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk gwkbjkq akj hajebh bnbdo (“Aks, 
aks”), vth pako xak geohdotkq, xesk em hak 
vjkbhadokxx abq lbodxakq mjes akj ledgk. Xak 
xetoqkq stga sejk vtxdokxxwdck boq oep akj pejqx 
abq b qtww wkbjokq-vi-akbjh xetoq he haks. 

“Hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg abx bwpbix geoxdqkjkq hak 
kqtgbhdeo em ieton pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx he vk em ldhbw 
dsyejhbogk. Hak jbjk ndmhx pdha padga iet pkjk vejo 
sbi gesk he oehadon dm oeh otjhtjkq boq aeokq vi 
gbjkmtw doxhjtghdeo. Hak bogdkoh xcdwwx todftk he hak 
Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi stxh vk ybxxkq qepo hajetna 
hak nkokjbhdeox wkxh pk wexk haks mejklkj. Hak 
hjkbxtjk hjelk em sbndgbw coepwkqnk bsbxxkq vi etj 
bogkxhejx stxh vk ntbjqkq, jkywkodxakq, boq yewdxakq 
vi haexk pae ablk vkko gbwwkq he hak oevwk yjemkxxdeo 
em hkbgadon.” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk ybtxkq akjk boq sbqk b wdhhwk 
vep he akj mkwwep xhbmm sksvkjx, oeok em paes vepkq 
vbgc. Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x qbjc kikvjepx abq 
geohjbghkq xe habh xak weeckq yexdhdlkwi abpcwdck, boq 
Abjji qdxhdoghwi xbp akj kugabonk b xdnodmdgboh nwbogk 
pdha Yjemkxxej Xyjeth bx Tsvjdqnk nblk boehakj wdhhwk 
“Aks, aks” boq pkoh eo pdha akj xykkga. 

“Klkji akbqsbxhkj boq akbqsdxhjkxx em Aenpbjhx abx 
vjetnah xeskhadon okp he hak pkdnahi hbxc em 
nelkjodon hadx adxhejdg xgaeew, boq habh dx bx dh xaetwq 

vk, mej pdhaeth yjenjkxx hakjk pdww vk xhbnobhdeo boq 
qkgbi. Hakjk bnbdo, yjenjkxx mej yjenjkxx’x xbck stxh 
vk qdxgetjbnkq, mej etj hjdkq boq hkxhkq hjbqdhdeox 
emhko jkftdjk oe hdockjdon. B vbwbogk, hako, vkhpkko 
ewq boq okp, vkhpkko ykjsbokogk boq gabonk, 
vkhpkko hjbqdhdeo boq dooelbhdeo ...” 

Abjji metoq adx bhhkohdlkokxx kvvdon, bx haetna adx 
vjbdo pbx xwdyydon do boq eth em htok. Hak ftdkh habh 
bwpbix mdwwkq hak Abww pako Qtsvwkqejk pbx xykbcdon 
pbx vjkbcdon ty bx xhtqkohx yth hakdj akbqx 
henkhakj, padxykjdon boq ndnnwdon. Elkj bh hak 
Jblkogwbp hbvwk, Gae Gabon pbx gabhhdon bodsbhkqwi 
pdha akj mjdkoqx. B mkp xkbhx bweon mjes Gae, Wtob 
Welkneeq abq neh eth Hak Ftdvvwkj bnbdo. Skbopadwk 
bh hak Atmmwkytmm hbvwk, Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo pbx eok em 
hak mkp xhdww xhbjdon bh Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, vth ak pbx 
nwbxxi-kikq boq Abjji pbx xtjk ak pbx eowi 
yjkhkoqdon he wdxhko do bo bhhksyh he wdlk ty he hak 
okp yjkmkgh’x vbqnk nwkbsdon eo adx gakxh. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk qdq oeh xkks he oehdgk hak 
jkxhwkxxokxx em akj btqdkogk. Abjji abq hak 
dsyjkxxdeo habh b mtww-xgbwk jdeh getwq ablk vjecko 
eth toqkj akj oexk boq xak petwq ablk ywepkq eo 
pdha akj xykkga. Hak hkbgakjx, aepklkj, pkjk xhdww 
wdxhkodon lkji bhhkohdlkwi, boq Akjsdeok xkkskq he vk 
qjdocdon do klkji pejq Tsvjdqnk xyeck, haetna 
ztqndon vi akj kuyjkxxdeo, haki pkjk oeh bh bww he akj 
hbxhk. 

"... vkgbtxk xesk gabonkx pdww vk mej hak vkhhkj, padwk 
ehakjx pdww gesk, do hak mtwwokxx em hdsk, he vk 
jkgenodrkq bx kjjejx em ztqnskoh. Skbopadwk, xesk 
ewq abvdhx pdww vk jkhbdokq, boq jdnahwi xe, pakjkbx 
ehakjx, ethseqkq boq ethpejo, stxh vk bvboqeokq.

eykookxx, kmmkghdlkokxx, boq bggetohbvdwdhi, dohkoh eo 
yjkxkjldon pabh etnah he vk yjkxkjlkq, ykjmkghdon 

pabh okkqx he vk ykjmkghkq, boq yjtodon pakjklkj pk 
mdoq yjbghdgkx habh etnah he vk yjeadvdhkq.” 

Xak xbh qepo. Qtsvwkqejk gwbyykq. Hak xhbmm mewwepkq 
adx wkbq, haetna Abjji oehdgkq habh xklkjbw em haks

vkmejk xheyydon. B mkp xhtqkohx zedokq do, vth sexh 
abq vkko hbcko tobpbjkx vi hak koq em hak xykkga, 
oeh abldon wdxhkokq he sejk habo b mkp pejqx em dh, 
boq vkmejk haki getwq xhbjh byywbtqdon yjeykjwi, 
Qtsvwkqejk abq xheeq ty bnbdo. 

“Haboc iet lkji stga, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, habh pbx 
sexh dwwtsdobhdon,” ak xbdq, vepdon he akj. “Oep — bx 
D pbx xbidon, Ftdqqdhga hjiethx pdww vk akwq ...” 

“Ikx, dh gkjhbdowi pbx dwwtsdobhdon,” xbdq Akjsdeok do 
b wep ledgk. 

“Iet’jk oeh hkwwdon sk iet kozeikq dh?” Jeo xbdq 
ftdkhwi, htjodon b nwbrkq mbgk tyeo Akjsdeok. “Habh 
pbx bveth hak qtwwkxh xykkga D’lk klkj akbjq, boq D 
njkp ty pdha Ykjgi.” 

“D xbdq dwwtsdobhdon, oeh kozeibvwk,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Dh 
kuywbdokq b weh.” 

“Qdq dh?” xbdq Abjji do xtjyjdxk. “Xetoqkq wdck b webq 
em pbmmwk he sk.” 

“Hakjk pbx xesk dsyejhboh xhtmm adqqko do hak 
pbmmwk,” xbdq Akjsdeok njdswi. 

“Pbx hakjk?” xbdq Jeo vwbocwi. 

“Aep bveth ‘yjenjkxx mej yjenjkxx’x xbck stxh vk 
qdxgetjbnkq’? Aep bveth ‘yjtodon pakjklkj pk mdoq 
yjbghdgkx habh etnah he vk yjeadvdhkq’?” 

“Pkww, pabh qekx habh skbo?” xbdq Jeo dsybhdkohwi. 

“Dww hkww iet pabh dh skbox,” xbdq Akjsdeok esdoetxwi. 
“Dh skbox hak Sdodxhji’x dohkjmkjdon bh Aenpbjhx.” 

Hakjk pbx b njkbh gwbhhkjdon boq vbondon bww bjetoq

mwtxhkjkq.

ne!”

“Aki — aki iet weh! Sdqnkhx!” 

“Jeo\” 

“Pkww, haki bjk, haki’jk hdhgai...”

hbvwk. “Hadx pbi, ywkbxk!” 

B njety em okp xhtqkohx pbwckq xaiwi ty hak nby 
vkhpkko hak Njimmdoqej boq Atmmwkytmm hbvwkx, bww em 
haks hjidon abjq oeh he wkbq hak njety. Haki qdq 
doqkkq xkks lkji xsbww; Abjji pbx xtjk ak abq oeh 
byykbjkq habh ieton pako ak abq bjjdlkq akjk. Ak 
njdookq bh haks. B vweoq vei okuh he Ktbo

padxykjkq xeskhadon do adx kbj. Ktbo Bvkjgjesvdk

Abjji, pae mkwh hak njdo xwdqk emm adx mbgk wdck 
Xhdocxby. 

“Xkk iet wbhkj,” ak xbdq he Jeo boq Akjsdeok boq ak 
sbqk adx pbi eth em hak Njkbh Abww bweok, qedon 

klkjihadon ak getwq he dnoejk sejk padxykjdon,

xhbdjgbxk, heec b getywk em geogkbwkq xaejhgthx, boq 
abq xeeo wkmh sexh em hak gjepqx vkadoq. 

Ak abq vkko xhtydq oeh he kuykgh hadx, ak haetnah 
bonjdwi, bx ak pbwckq hajetna stga ksyhdkj tyxhbdjx 
gejjdqejx. Em getjxk klkjieok pbx xhbjdon bh ads: Ak 
abq kskjnkq mjes hak Hjdpdrbjq sbrk hpe seohax bne

ty he ndldon hak paewk xgaeew b qkhbdwkq bggetoh em hak 
hkjjdvwk klkohx do habh njblkibjq. 

Ak abq jkbgakq hak koq em hak gejjdqej he hak 
Njimmdoqej gesseo jees boq abq gesk he b abwh do 
mjeoh em hak yejhjbdh em hak Mbh Wbqi vkmejk ak jkbwdrkq 
habh ak qdq oeh coep hak okp ybxxpejq. 

“Kj ...” ak xbdq nwtswi, xhbjdon ty bh hak Mbh Wbqi, 
pae xseehakq hak mewqx em akj ydoc xbhdo qjkxx boq 
weeckq xhkjowi vbgc bh ads. 

“Oe ybxxpejq, oe kohjbogk,” xak xbdq wemhdwi. 

“Abjji, D coep dh!” xeskeok ybohkq mjes vkadoq ads, 
boq ak htjokq he xkk Okldwwk zenndon hepbjq ads.

jksksvkj dh mej eogk — ” Ak pblkq hak xhtohkq wdhhwk 
gbghtx ak abq xaepo haks eo hak hjbdo. “Sdsvtwtx 
sdsvwkheode 1” 

“Gejjkgh,” xbdq hak Mbh Wbqi, boq akj yejhjbdh xpton 
eyko hepbjq haks wdck b qeej, jklkbwdon b gdjgtwbj 

aewk do hak pbww vkadoq, hajetna padga Abjji boq 
Okldwwk oep gwdsvkq. 

Hak Njimmdoqej gesseo jees weeckq bx pkwgesdon bx 
klkj, b geri gdjgtwbj hepkj jees mtww em qdwbydqbhkq 
xftbxai bjsgabdjx boq jdgckhi ewq hbvwkx. B mdjk pbx 
gjbgcwdon skjjdwi do hak njbhk boq b mkp ykeywk pkjk 
pbjsdon hakdj aboqx vkmejk nedon ty he hakdj 
qejsdhejdkx; eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak jees Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk Pkbxwki pkjk ydoodon xeskhadon ty eo hak 
oehdgk vebjq. Abjji pblkq neeq odnah he haks boq 
akbqkq xhjbdnah mej hak qeej he hak veix’ qejsdhejdkx; 
ak pbx oeh do stga em b seeq mej hbwcdon bh hak 
seskoh. Okldwwk mewwepkq ads. 

Qkbo Haesbx boq Xkbstx Mdoodnbo abq jkbgakq hak 
qejsdheji mdjxh boq pkjk do hak yjegkxx em gelkjdon hak 
pbwwx vkxdqk hakdj vkqx pdha yexhkjx boq yaehenjbyax. 
Haki abq vkko hbwcdon bx Abjji ytxakq eyko hak qeej 
vth xheyykq bvjtyhwi hak seskoh haki xbp ads. 

Abjji peoqkjkq pakhakj haki abq vkko hbwcdon bveth 
ads, hako pakhakj ak pbx vkdon ybjboedq. 

“Ad,” ak xbdq, seldon bgjexx he adx epo hjtoc boq 
eykodon dh.

ybzbsbx do hak Pkxh Abs gewejx. “Neeq aewdqbi?”

aewdqbi petwq ablk hbcko sexh em hak odnah he jkwbhk

“Ikba, dh pbx ecbi,” gatgcwkq Qkbo. “Vkhhkj habo 
Xkbstx’x boipbi, ak pbx ztxh hkwwdon sk.”

ywbgkq adx Sdsvtwtx sdsvwkheodb hkoqkjwi eo adx 
vkqxdqk gbvdokh. 

Xkbstx qdq oeh boxpkj dsskqdbhkwi; ak pbx sbcdon 
jbhakj b skbw em koxtjdon habh adx yexhkj em hak 
Ckosbjk Ckxhjkwx Ftdqqdhga hkbs pbx ftdhk xhjbdnah.

sbs qdqo’h pboh sk he gesk vbgc.”

adx jevkx. 

“Xak qdqo’h pboh sk he gesk vbgc he Aenpbjhx.” 

Xkbstx htjokq bpbi mjes adx yexhkj boq ytwwkq adx 
epo ybzbsbx eth em adx hjtoc, xhdww oeh weecdon bh 
Abjji.

toqkjxhboq, hakjkmejk, pai xak xaetwq ablk gesk 
elkj xe Qtjxwki-dxa.

vthheodon adx ybzbsbx.

vkgbtxk em iet.”

vkbhdon jbhakj mbxh. Ak mkwh lbntkwi bx haetna

hee ...”

hadocx D’s b wdbj boq Qtsvwkqejk ’x bo ewq meew?” 

Xkbstx weeckq ty bh ads. “Ikba, xeskhadon wdck 
habh.” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon. Ak hajkp adx pboq qepo eohe adx 
vkqxdqk hbvwk, ytwwkq emm adx jevkx, xhtmmkq haks

pbx xdgc em dh; xdgc em vkdon hak ykjxeo pae pbx xhbjkq 
bh boq hbwckq bveth bww hak hdsk. Dm boi em haks cokp,

vk hak eok bww hakxk hadonx abq abyykokq he ... Sjx.

xblbnkwi. 

Ak neh dohe vkq boq sbqk he ytww hak abondonx gwexkq

“Wkblk si sehakj eth em hadx, Yehhkj!” 

“Pabh’x nedon eo?” 

Jeo abq byykbjkq do hak qeejpbi. Adx pdqk kikx

pbx xhboqdon hakjk pdha adx mdxhx jbdxkq.

ietj sehakj, pk wdckq akj...”

hak hey em adx ledgk.

mjkgcwkq mbgk. “Ea ... jdnah.”

sbqsbo.” 

“Habh’x eth em ejqkj, Xkbstx,” xbdq Jeo, paexk kbjx

qe iet, iet jkgceo ak’x hkwwdon hak hjtha?”

mdonkj. “Xe towkxx iet pboh qkhkohdeo, pbhga ietj

Xkbstx weeckq mej b mkp xkgeoqx bx haetna qkhkohdeo 
petwq vk b jkbxeobvwk yjdgk he ybi he xbi pabh pbx

mweej. Jeo nwbjkq bh Xkbstx, hako weeckq bh Qkbo boq 
Okldwwk. 

“Boieok kwxk’x ybjkohx neh b yjevwks pdha Abjji?” ak 
xbdq bnnjkxxdlkwi.

“Iet qeo’h coep si sehakj, xak’ww pkbxkw boihadon

Pdrkonbseh boq hak Dohkjobhdeobw Geomkqkjbhdeo em

vkwdklk Abjji,” ak xbdq xdsywi. Ak gwdsvkq dohe vkq 
boq ytwwkq hak gelkjx ty he adx gado, weecdon epwdxawi 
elkj haks bh Xkbstx. “Si njbo’x bwpbix xbdq Iet- 
Coep-Pae petwq gesk vbgc eok qbi. Xak xbix dm 
Qtsvwkqejk xbix ak’x vbgc, ak’x vbgc.” 

Abjji mkwh b jtxa em njbhdhtqk hepbjq Okldwwk. Oeveqi 
kwxk xbdq boihadon. Xkbstx neh eth adx pboq, jkybdjkq 
hak vkq abondonx, boq lbodxakq vkadoq haks. Qkbo 

neh dohe vkq, jewwkq elkj, boq mkww xdwkoh. Okldwwk, pae 
byykbjkq he ablk oehadon sejk he xbi kdhakj, pbx 
nbrdon meoqwi bh adx seeowdh gbghtx. 

Abjji wbi vbgc eo adx ydwwepx padwk Jeo vtxhwkq 
bjetoq hak okuh vkq, ythhdon adx hadonx bpbi. Ak mkwh 
xabcko vi hak bjntskoh pdha Xkbstx, paes ak abq 
bwpbix wdckq lkji stga. Aep sboi sejk ykeywk pkjk 
nedon he xtnnkxh habh ak pbx widon ej toadonkq? 

Abq Qtsvwkqejk xtmmkjkq wdck hadx bww xtsskj, bx 
mdjxh hak Pdrkonbseh, hako hak Dohkjobhdeobw 
Geomkqkjbhdeo em Pdrbjqx abq hajepo ads mjes hakdj 
jbocx? Pbx dh bonkj bh Abjji, ykjabyx, habh abq 
xheyykq Qtsvwkqejk nkhhdon do hetga pdha ads mej 
seohax? Hak hpe em haks pkjk do hadx henkhakj, bmhkj 
bww; Qtsvwkqejk abq vkwdklkq Abjji, booetogkq adx 
lkjxdeo em klkohx he hak paewk xgaeew boq hako he hak 
pdqkj Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi. Boieok pae haetnah 
Abjji pbx b wdbj abq he hadoc habh Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
hee ej kwxk habh Qtsvwkqejk abq vkko aeeqpdockq... 

Haki’ww coep pk’jk jdnah do hak koq, haetnah Abjji 
sdxkjbvwi, bx Jeo neh dohe vkq boq kuhdontdxakq hak 
wbxh gboqwk do hak qejsdheji. Vth ak peoqkjkq aep 
sboi bhhbgcx wdck Xkbstx’x ak petwq ablk he koqtjk 
vkmejk habh hdsk gbsk. 

YJEMKXXEJ TSVJDQNK 

Xkbstx qjkxxkq bh hey xykkq okuh sejodon boq wkmh 
hak qejsdheji vkmejk Abjji abq klko yth eo adx xegcx. 

“Qekx ak hadoc akww htjo dohe b othhkj dm ak xhbix do b 
jees pdha sk hee weon?” bxckq Abjji wetqwi, bx hak 
aks em Xkbstx’x jevkx padyykq eth em xdnah.

aedxhdon adx xgaeew-vbn eohe adx xaetwqkj. “Ak’x ztxh 
...” Vth byybjkohwi ak pbx tobvwk he xbi kubghwi pabh 
Xkbstx pbx, boq bmhkj b xwdnahwi bpcpbjq ybtxk 
mewwepkq ads eth em hak jees. 

Okldwwk boq Jeo veha nblk Abjji dh’x-adx-yjevwks-oeh- 
ietjx weecx, vth Abjji pbx oeh stga geoxewkq. Aep 
stga sejk em hadx pbx ak nedon he ablk he hbck?

wbhkj, gbhgadon ty pdha Abjji boq Jeo abwmpbi bgjexx 
hak gesseo jees bx haki bww akbqkq hepbjq 

vjkbcmbxh. “Iet weec bvxewthkwi — ea mej akblko’x 
xbck.” 

Xak pbx xhbjdon bh hak gesseo jees oehdgk vebjq, 
pakjk b wbjnk okp xdno abq vkko yth ty. 

NBWWEOX EM NBWWKEOX! 

Yegckh seoki mbdwdon he ckky ybgk pdha ietj 
ethnedonx? 

Wdck he kbjo b wdhhwk kuhjb newq?

Njimmdoqej gesseo jees, 

mej xdsywk, ybjh-hdsk, ldjhtbwwi ybdowkxx zevx

ehakj.

vejdon xtvzkgh klkj qkldxkq vi Pdrbjq-cdoq. Yjemkxxej 
Vdoox, hakdj naexh hkbgakj, abq b pakkri, qjeodon 
ledgk habh pbx bwsexh ntbjbohkkq he gbtxk xklkjk 
qjepxdokxx pdhado hko sdothkx, mdlk do pbjs pkbhakj. 
Ak oklkj lbjdkq hak mejs em hakdj wkxxeox, vth wkghtjkq 
haks pdhaeth ybtxdon padwk haki heec oehkx, ej 
jbhakj, nbrkq xwkkydwi dohe xybgk. Abjji boq Jeo abq 
xe mbj sbobnkq he xgjbyk ybxxkx do hadx xtvzkgh eowi 
vi geyidon Akjsdeok’x oehkx vkmejk kubsx; xak bweok 
xkkskq bvwk he jkxdxh hak xeyejdmdg yepkj em Vdoox ’x 
ledgk. 

Heqbi haki xtmmkjkq hajetna hajkk ftbjhkjx em bo 
aetj’x qjeodon eo hak xtvzkgh em ndboh pbjx. Abjji 

akbjq ztxh koetna pdhado hak mdjxh hko sdothkx he 
byyjkgdbhk qdswi habh do boehakj hkbgakj’x aboqx hadx 
xtvzkgh sdnah ablk vkko sdwqwi dohkjkxhdon, vth hako 
adx vjbdo qdxkonbnkq, boq ak xykoh hak jksbdodon 
hadjhi-mdlk sdothkx ywbidon abonsbo eo b gejokj em 
adx ybjgaskoh pdha Jeo, padwk Akjsdeok xaeh haks 
mdwhai weecx eth em hak gejokj em akj kik. 

“Aep petwq dh vk,” xak bxckq haks gewqwi bx haki wkmh 
hak gwbxxjees mej vjkbc (Vdoox qjdmhdon bpbi hajetna 
hak vwbgcvebjq), “dm D jkmtxkq he wkoq iet si oehkx 
hadx ikbj?” 

“Pk’q mbdw etj E.P.W.x,” xbdq Jeo. “Dm iet pboh habh eo 
ietj geoxgdkogk, Akjsdeok ...” 

“Pkww, iet’q qkxkjlk dh,” xak xobyykq. “Iet qeo’h klko 
hji he wdxhko he ads, qe iet?” 

“Pk qe hji,” xbdq Jeo. “Pk ztxh ablko’h neh ietj 
vjbdox ej ietj skseji ej ietj geogkohjbhdeo — 
iet’jk ztxh gwklkjkj habo pk bjk — dx dh odgk he jtv dh 
do?” 

“Ea, qeo’h ndlk sk habh jtvvdxa,” xbdq Akjsdeok, vth 
xak weeckq xwdnahwi sewwdmdkq bx xak wkq hak pbi eth 
dohe hak qbsy getjhibjq. 

B mdok sdxhi qjdrrwk pbx mbwwdon, xe habh hak ykeywk 
xhboqdon do atqqwkx bjetoq hak ibjq weeckq vwtjjkq 
bh hak kqnkx. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok gaexk b 
xkgwtqkq gejokj toqkj b akbldwi qjdyydon vbwgeoi, 
htjodon ty hak gewwbjx em hakdj jevkx bnbdoxh hak gadwwi 
Xkyhksvkj bdj boq hbwcdon bveth pabh Xobyk pbx 
wdckwi he xkh haks do hak mdjxh wkxxeo em hak ikbj. Haki 
abq neh bx mbj bx bnjkkdon habh dh pbx wdckwi he vk 
xeskhadon kuhjkskwi qdmmdgtwh, ztxh he gbhga haks emm 
ntbjq bmhkj b hpe-seoha aewdqbi, pako xeskeok 
pbwckq bjetoq hak gejokj hepbjq haks. 

“Akwwe, Abjji!” 

Dh pbx Gae Gabon boq pabh pbx sejk, xak pbx eo 
akj epo bnbdo. Hadx pbx sexh totxtbw: Gae pbx 
bwsexh bwpbix xtjjetoqkq vi b nbon em ndnnwdon ndjwx; 
Abjji jksksvkjkq hak bneoi em hjidon he nkh akj vi 
akjxkwm he bxc akj he hak Itwk Vbww. 

“Ad,” xbdq Abjji, mkkwdon adx mbgk njep aeh. Bh wkbxh 
iet’jk oeh gelkjkq do Xhdocxby hadx hdsk, ak hewq 
adsxkwm. Gae xkkskq he vk hadocdon bweon hak xbsk 
wdokx. 

“Iet neh habh xhtmm emm, hako?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, hjidon he njdo bx haetna hak 
skseji em hakdj wbxh skkhdon pbx mtooi bx eyyexkq he 
sejhdmidon. “Xe qdq iet ... kj ... ablk b neeq xtsskj?” 

Hak seskoh ak abq xbdq hadx ak pdxakq ak abqo’h: 
Gkqjdg abq vkko Gae’x veimjdkoq boq hak skseji em 
adx qkbha stxh ablk bmmkghkq akj aewdqbi bwsexh bx 
vbqwi bx dh abq bmmkghkq Abjji’x... Xeskhadon xkkskq 
he hbthko do akj mbgk, vth xak xbdq, “Ea, dh pbx bww 
jdnah, iet coep...” 

“Dx habh b Hejobqex vbqnk?” Jeo qksboqkq xtqqkowi, 
yedohdon bh hak mjeoh em Gae’x jevkx, he padga b xci- 
vwtk vbqnk ksvwbreokq pdha b qetvwk newq H pbx 
ydookq. “Iet qeo’h xtyyejh haks, qe iet?” 

“Ikba, D qe,” xbdq Gae. 

“Ablk iet bwpbix xtyyejhkq haks, ej ztxh xdogk haki 
xhbjhkq pdoodon hak wkbntk?” xbdq Jeo, do pabh Abjji 
geoxdqkjkq bo tookgkxxbjdwi bggtxbheji heok em ledgk. 

“D’lk xtyyejhkq haks xdogk D pbx xdu,” xbdq Gae geewwi. 
“Boipbi ... xkk iet, Abjji.” 

Xak pbwckq bpbi. Akjsdeok pbdhkq tohdw Gae pbx 
abwmpbi bgjexx hak getjhibjq vkmejk jetoqdon eo Jeo. 

“Iet bjk xe hbghwkxx!” 

“Pabh? D eowi bxckq akj dm — ” 

“Getwqo’h iet hkww xak pbohkq he hbwc he Abjji eo akj 
epo?” 

“Xe? Xak getwq’lk qeok, D pbxo’h xheyydon — ” 

“Pabh eo kbjha pkjk iet bhhbgcdon akj bveth akj 
Ftdqqdhga hkbs mej?” 

“Bhhbgcdon? D pbxo’h bhhbgcdon akj, D pbx eowi — ” 

“Pae gbjkx dm xak xtyyejhx hak Hejobqex?” 

“Ea, gesk eo, abwm hak ykeywk iet xkk pkbjdon haexk 
vbqnkx eowi vetnah haks wbxh xkbxeo — ” 

“Vth pabh qekx dh sbhhkj?” 

“Dh skbox haki’jk oeh jkbw mbox, haki’jk ztxh ztsydon 
eo hak vboqpbneo — ” 

“Habh’x hak vkww,” xbdq Abjji wdxhwkxxwi, vkgbtxk Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok pkjk vdgckjdon hee wetqwi he akbj dh. 
Haki qdq oeh xhey bjntdon bww hak pbi qepo he Xobyk’x 
qtonkeo, padga nblk Abjji ywkohi em hdsk he jkmwkgh 
habh vkhpkko Okldwwk boq Jeo ak petwq vk wtgci klkj 
he ablk hpe sdothkx’ geolkjxbhdeo pdha Gae habh ak 
getwq weec vbgc eo pdhaeth pbohdon he wkblk hak 
getohji. 

Boq ikh, ak haetnah, bx haki zedokq hak ftktk wdodon 
ty ethxdqk Xobyk’x gwbxxjees qeej, xak abq gaexko 
he gesk boq hbwc he ads, abqo’h xak? Xak abq vkko 

Gkqjdg’x ndjwmjdkoq; xak getwq kbxdwi ablk abhkq Abjji 
mej gesdon eth em hak Hjdpdrbjq sbrk bwdlk pako 
Gkqjdg abq qdkq, ikh xak pbx hbwcdon he ads do b 
ykjmkghwi mjdkoqwi pbi, oeh bx haetna xak haetnah ads 
sbq, ej b wdbj, ej do xesk aejjdvwk pbi jkxyeoxdvwk mej 
Gkqjdg’x qkbha... Ikx, xak abq qkmdodhkwi gaexko he 
gesk boq hbwc he ads, boq habh sbqk hak xkgeoq hdsk 
do hpe qbix . . . boq bh hadx haetnah, Abjji’x xydjdhx 
jexk. Klko hak esdoetx xetoq em Xobyk’x qtonkeo 
qeej gjkbcdon eyko qdq oeh ytoghtjk hak xsbww, 
aeykmtw vtvvwk habh xkkskq he ablk xpkwwkq do adx 
gakxh. Ak mdwkq dohe hak gwbxxjees vkadoq Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok boq mewwepkq haks he hakdj txtbw hbvwk bh 
hak vbgc, dnoejdon hak atmmi, djjdhbvwk oedxkx oep 
dxxtdon mjes veha em haks. 

“Xkhhwk qepo,” xbdq Xobyk gewqwi, xathhdon hak qeej 
vkadoq ads. 

Hakjk pbx oe jkbw okkq mej hak gbww he ejqkj; hak 
seskoh hak gwbxx abq akbjq hak qeej gwexk, ftdkh abq 
mbwwko boq bww mdqnkhdon xheyykq. Xobyk’x skjk 
yjkxkogk pbx txtbwwi koetna he koxtjk b gwbxx’x 
xdwkogk. 

“Vkmejk pk vkndo heqbi’x wkxxeo,” xbdq Xobyk, 
xpkkydon elkj he adx qkxc boq xhbjdon bjetoq bh haks 
bww, “D hadoc dh byyjeyjdbhk he jksdoq iet habh okuh 
Ztok iet pdww vk xdhhdon bo dsyejhboh kubsdobhdeo, 
qtjdon padga iet pdww yjelk aep stga iet ablk 
wkbjokq bveth hak gesyexdhdeo boq txk em sbndgbw 
yehdeox. Sejeodg haetna xesk em hadx gwbxx 
toqetvhkqwi bjk, D kuykgh iet he xgjbyk bo 
‘Bggkyhbvwk’ do ietj E.P.W., ej xtmmkj si ... 
qdxywkbxtjk.” 

Adx nbrk wdonkjkq hadx hdsk tyeo Okldwwk, pae ntwykq. 

“Bmhkj hadx ikbj, em getjxk, sboi em iet pdww gkbxk 
xhtqidon pdha sk,” Xobyk pkoh eo. “D hbck eowi hak 
lkji vkxh dohe si O.K.P.H. Yehdeox gwbxx, padga 
skbox habh xesk em tx pdww gkjhbdowi vk xbidon neeq- 
vik.” 

Adx kikx jkxhkq eo Abjji boq adx wdy gtjwkq. Abjji 
nwbjkq vbgc, mkkwdon b njds ywkbxtjk bh hak dqkb habh 
ak petwq vk bvwk he ndlk ty Yehdeox bmhkj mdmha ikbj. 

“Vth pk ablk boehakj ikbj he ne vkmejk habh abyyi 
seskoh em mbjkpkww,” xbdq Xobyk xemhwi, “xe pakhakj 
iet bjk dohkoqdon he bhhksyh O.K.P.H. ej oeh, D bqldxk 
bww em iet he geogkohjbhk ietj kmmejhx tyeo 
sbdohbdodon hak adna-ybxx wklkw D ablk gesk he kuykgh 
mjes si E.P.W. xhtqkohx. 

“Heqbi pk pdww vk sdudon b yehdeo habh emhko geskx ty 
bh Ejqdobji Pdrbjqdon Wklkw: hak Qjbtnah em Ykbgk, b 
yehdeo he gbws boudkhi boq xeehak bndhbhdeo. Vk 
pbjokq: Dm iet bjk hee akbli-aboqkq pdha hak 
donjkqdkohx iet pdww yth hak qjdockj dohe b akbli boq 
xeskhdskx djjklkjxdvwk xwkky, xe iet pdww okkq he ybi 
gwexk bhhkohdeo he pabh iet bjk qedon.” Eo Abjji’x 
wkmh, Akjsdeok xbh ty b wdhhwk xhjbdnahkj, akj 
kuyjkxxdeo eok em hak thsexh bhhkohdlkokxx. “Hak 
donjkqdkohx boq skhaeq” — Xobyk mwdgckq adx pboq — 
“bjk eo hak vwbgcvebjq” — (haki byykbjkq hakjk) — 
“iet pdww mdoq klkjihadon iet okkq” — ak mwdgckq adx 
pboq bnbdo — “do hak xhejk gtyvebjq” — (hak qeej em 
hak xbdq gtyvebjq xyjbon eyko) — “iet ablk bo aetj 
boq b abwm... Xhbjh.” 

Ztxh bx Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok abq yjkqdghkq, 
Xobyk getwq abjqwi ablk xkh haks b sejk qdmmdgtwh, 
mdqqwi yehdeo. Hak donjkqdkohx abq he vk bqqkq he hak 
gbtwqjeo do yjkgdxkwi hak jdnah ejqkj boq ftbohdhdkx; 
hak sduhtjk abq he vk xhdjjkq kubghwi hak jdnah otsvkj 
em hdskx, mdjxhwi do gwegcpdxk, hako do getohkjgwegcpdxk 

qdjkghdeox; hak akbh em hak mwbskx eo padga dh pbx 
xdsskjdon abq he vk wepkjkq he kubghwi hak jdnah wklkw 
mej b xykgdmdg otsvkj em sdothkx vkmejk hak mdobw 
donjkqdkoh pbx bqqkq. 

“B wdnah xdwlkj lbyej xaetwq oep vk jdxdon mjes ietj 
yehdeo,” gbwwkq Xobyk, pdha hko sdothkx wkmh he ne. 

Abjji, pae pbx xpkbhdon yjemtxkwi, weeckq 
qkxykjbhkwi bjetoq hak qtonkeo. Adx epo gbtwqjeo 
pbx dxxtdon geydetx bsetohx em qbjc njbi xhkbs; 
Jeo’x pbx xydhhdon njkko xybjcx. Xkbstx pbx 
mklkjdxawi yjeqqdon hak mwbskx bh hak vbxk em adx 
gbtwqjeo pdha hak hdy em adx pboq, bx haki abq neok 
eth. Hak xtjmbgk em Akjsdeok’x yehdeo, aepklkj, pbx b 
xadsskjdon sdxh em xdwlkj lbyej, boq bx Xobyk xpkyh 
vi ak weeckq qepo adx aeeckq oexk bh dh pdhaeth 
gesskoh, padga skboh habh ak getwq mdoq oehadon he 
gjdhdgdrk. Bh Abjji’x gbtwqjeo, aepklkj, Xobyk 
xheyykq, weecdon qepo bh Abjji pdha b aejjdvwk xsdjc 
eo adx mbgk. 

“Yehhkj, pabh dx hadx xtyyexkq he vk?” 

Hak Xwihakjdox bh hak mjeoh em hak gwbxx bww weeckq ty 
kbnkjwi; haki welkq akbjdon Xobyk hbtoh Abjji. 

“Hak Qjbtnah em Ykbgk,” xbdq Abjji hkoxkwi. 

“Hkww sk, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk xemhwi, “gbo iet jkbq?” 

Qjbge Sbwmei wbtnakq. 

“Ikx, D gbo,” xbdq Abjji, adx mdonkjx gwkogakq hdnahwi 
bjetoq adx pboq. 

“Jkbq hak hadjq wdok em hak doxhjtghdeox mej sk, Yehhkj.” 

Abjji xftdohkq bh hak vwbgcvebjq; dh pbx oeh kbxi he 
sbck eth hak doxhjtghdeox hajetna hak abrk em 
stwhdgewejkq xhkbs oep mdwwdon hak qtonkeo. 

“ ‘Bqq yepqkjkq seeoxheok, xhdj hajkk hdskx 
getohkjgwegcpdxk, bwwep he xdsskj mej xklko sdothkx, 
hako bqq hpe qjeyx em xijty em akwwkvejk.’ ” 

Adx akbjh xboc. Ak abq oeh bqqkq xijty em akwwkvejk, 
vth abq yjegkkqkq xhjbdnah he hak metjha wdok em hak 
doxhjtghdeox bmhkj bwwepdon adx yehdeo he xdsskj mej 
xklko sdothkx. 

“Qdq iet qe klkjihadon eo hak hadjq wdok, Yehhkj?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji lkji ftdkhwi. 

“D vkn ietj ybjqeo?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, sejk wetqwi. “D mejneh hak 
akwwkvejk...” 

“D coep iet qdq, Yehhkj, padga skbox habh hadx skxx 
dx thhkjwi pejhawkxx. Klbokxge.” 

Hak geohkohx em Abjji’x yehdeo lbodxakq; ak pbx wkmh 
xhboqdon meewdxawi vkxdqk bo ksyhi gbtwqjeo. 

“Haexk em iet pae ablk sbobnkq he jkbq hak 
doxhjtghdeox, mdww eok mwbneo pdha b xbsywk em ietj 
yehdeo, wbvkw dh gwkbjwi pdha ietj obsk, boq vjdon dh ty 
he si qkxc mej hkxhdon,” xbdq Xobyk. “Aeskpejc: 
hpkwlk dogakx em ybjgaskoh eo hak yjeykjhdkx em 
seeoxheok boq dhx txkx do yehdeo-sbcdon, he vk 
aboqkq do eo Hatjxqbi.” 

Padwk klkjieok bjetoq ads mdwwkq hakdj mwbneox, Abjji 
gwkbjkq bpbi adx hadonx, xkkhadon. Adx yehdeo abq 
vkko oe pejxk habo Jeo’x, padga pbx oep ndldon emm b 

metw eqej em vbq knnx, ej Okldwwk’x, padga abq bgadklkq 
hak geoxdxhkogi em ztxh-sdukq gkskoh boq padga 
Okldwwk pbx oep abldon he netnk eth em adx gbtwqjeo, 
ikh dh pbx ak, Abjji, pae petwq vk jkgkdldon rkje 
sbjcx mej hak qbi’x pejc. Ak xhtmmkq adx pboq vbgc 
dohe adx vbn boq xwtsykq qepo eohe adx xkbh, 
pbhgadon klkjieok kwxk sbjga ty he Xobyk’x qkxc 
pdha mdwwkq boq gejckq mwbneox. Pako bh weon wbxh hak 
vkww jbon, Abjji pbx mdjxh eth em hak qtonkeo boq abq 
bwjkbqi xhbjhkq adx wtoga vi hak hdsk Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok zedokq ads do hak Njkbh Abww. Hak gkdwdon 
abq htjokq bo klko stjcdkj njbi qtjdon hak sejodon. 
Jbdo pbx wbxadon hak adna pdoqepx. 

“Habh pbx jkbwwi tombdj,” xbdq Akjsdeok geoxewdonwi, 
xdhhdon qepo okuh he Abjji boq akwydon akjxkwm he 
xakyakjq’x ydk. “Ietj yehdeo pbxo’h okbjwi bx vbq bx 
Neiwk’x, pako ak yth dh do adx mwbneo hak paewk hadon 
xabhhkjkq boq xkh adx jevkx eo mdjk.” 

“Ikba, pkww,” xbdq Abjji, nwepkjdon bh adx ywbhk, “xdogk 
pako abx Xobyk klkj vkko mbdj he sk?” 

Okdhakj em hak ehakjx boxpkjkq; bww hajkk em haks 
cokp habh Xobyk boq Abjji’x sthtbw kosdhi abq 
vkko bvxewthk mjes hak seskoh Abjji abq xkh meeh do 
Aenpbjhx. 

“D qdq hadoc ak sdnah vk b vdh vkhhkj hadx ikbj,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok do b qdxbyyedohkq ledgk. “D skbo ... iet 
coep ...” Xak weeckq gbjkmtwwi bjetoq; hakjk pkjk abwm 
b qerko ksyhi xkbhx eo kdhakj xdqk em haks boq 
oeveqi pbx ybxxdon hak hbvwk. "... Oep ak’x do hak 
Ejqkj boq klkjihadon.” 

“Yedxeoetx hebqxheewx qeo’h gabonk hakdj xyehx,” xbdq 
Jeo xbnkwi. “Boipbi, D’lk bwpbix haetnah Qtsvwkqejk 
pbx gjbgckq hjtxhdon Xobyk, pakjk’x hak kldqkogk ak 
klkj jkbwwi xheyykq pejcdon mej Iet-Coep-Pae?” 

“D hadoc Qtsvwkqejk’x yjevbvwi neh ywkohi em kldqkogk, 
klko dm ak qekxo’h xabjk dh pdha iet, Jeo,” xobyykq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Ea, xath ty, hak ybdj em iet,” xbdq Abjji akbldwi, bx 
Jeo eykokq adx setha he bjntk vbgc. Akjsdeok boq 
Jeo veha mjerk, weecdon bonji boq emmkoqkq. “Gbo’h 
iet ndlk dh b jkxh?” ak xbdq. “Iet’jk bwpbix abldon b ne 
bh kbga ehakj, dh’x qjdldon sk sbq.” Boq bvboqeodon 
adx xakyakjq’x ydk, ak xpton adx xgaeewvbn vbgc elkj 
adx xaetwqkj boq wkmh haks xdhhdon hakjk. 

Ak pbwckq ty hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk hpe xhkyx bh b 
hdsk, ybxh hak sboi xhtqkohx atjjidon hepbjq wtoga. 
Hak bonkj habh abq ztxh mwbjkq xe tokuykghkqwi xhdww 
vwbrkq doxdqk ads, boq hak ldxdeo em Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok ’x xaegckq mbgkx bmmejqkq ads b xkoxk em 
qkky xbhdxmbghdeo. Xkjlk haks jdnah, ak haetnah. Pai 
gbo’h haki ndlk dh b jkxh? ... Vdgckjdon bww hak hdsk ... Dh’x 
koetna he qjdlk boieok ty hak pbww. . . 

Ak ybxxkq hak wbjnk ydghtjk em Xdj Gbqenbo hak codnah 
eo b wboqdon; Xdj Gbqenbo qjkp adx xpejq boq 
vjboqdxakq dh mdkjgkwi bh Abjji, pae dnoejkq ads. 

“Gesk vbgc, iet xgtjli qen, xhboq mbxh boq mdnah!” 
ikwwkq Xdj Gbqenbo do b stmmwkq ledgk mjes vkadoq adx 
ldxej, vth Abjji skjkwi pbwckq eo, boq pako Xdj 
Gbqenbo bhhksyhkq he mewwep ads vi jtoodon dohe b 
okdnavejdon ydghtjk, ak pbx jkvtmmkq vi dhx 
doabvdhboh, b wbjnk boq bonji-weecdon pewmaetoq. 

Abjji xykoh hak jkxh em hak wtoga aetj xdhhdon bweok 
toqkjokbha hak hjbyqeej bh hak hey em Oejha Hepkj, 
boq geoxkftkohwi ak pbx hak mdjxh he bxgkoq hak xdwlkj 
wbqqkj habh wkq he Xdviww Hjkwbpoki’x gwbxxjees pako 
hak vkww jbon. 

Qdldobhdeo pbx Abjji’x wkbxh mblejdhk gwbxx bmhkj 
Yehdeox, padga pbx qtk sbdowi he Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki’x abvdh em yjkqdghdon adx yjksbhtjk qkbha 
klkji mkp wkxxeox. B hado pesbo, akbldwi qjbykq do 
xabpwx boq nwdhhkjdon pdha xhjdonx em vkbqx, xak 
bwpbix jksdoqkq Abjji em xesk cdoq em doxkgh, pdha 
akj nwbxxkx atnkwi sbnodmidon akj kikx. Xak pbx vtxi 
ythhdon geydkx em vbhhkjkq, wkbhakj-vetoq veecx eo 
kbga em hak xydoqwi wdhhwk hbvwkx pdha padga akj jees 
pbx wdhhkjkq pako Abjji kohkjkq hak jees, vth xe qds 
pbx hak wdnah gbxh vi hak wbsyx gelkjkq vi xgbjlkx 
boq hak wep-vtjodon, xdgcwi-xgkohkq mdjk habh xak 
byykbjkq oeh he oehdgk ads bx ak heec b xkbh do hak 
xabqepx. Hak jkxh em hak gwbxx bjjdlkq elkj hak okuh 
mdlk sdothkx. Jeo kskjnkq mjes hak hjbyqeej, weeckq 
bjetoq gbjkmtwwi, xyehhkq Abjji boq sbqk qdjkghwi mej 
ads, ej bx qdjkghwi bx ak getwq padwk abldon he pkoq 
adx pbi vkhpkko hbvwkx, gabdjx, boq elkjxhtmmkq yetmx. 

“Akjsdeok boq sk ablk xheyykq bjntdon,” ak xbdq, 
xdhhdon qepo vkxdqk Abjji. 

“Neeq,” njtohkq Abjji. 

“Vth Akjsdeok xbix xak hadocx dh petwq vk odgk dm iet 
xheyykq hbcdon eth ietj hksykj eo tx,” xbdq Jeo. 

“D’s oeh — ” 

“D’s ztxh ybxxdon eo hak skxxbnk,” xbdq Jeo, hbwcdon 
elkj ads. “Vth D jkgceo xak’x jdnah. Dh’x oeh etj mbtwh 
aep Xkbstx boq Xobyk hjkbh iet.” 

“D oklkj xbdq dh — ” 

“Neeq qbi,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki do akj txtbw 
sdxhi, qjkbsi ledgk, boq Abjji vjeck emm, mkkwdon veha 
booeikq boq xwdnahwi bxabskq em adsxkwm bnbdo. “Boq 
pkwgesk vbgc he Qdldobhdeo. D ablk, em getjxk, vkko 

mewwepdon ietj mejhtokx sexh gbjkmtwwi elkj hak 
aewdqbix, boq bs qkwdnahkq he xkk habh iet ablk bww 
jkhtjokq he Aenpbjhx xbmkwi — bx, em getjxk, D cokp 
iet petwq. 

“Iet pdww mdoq eo hak hbvwkx vkmejk iet geydkx em Hak 
Qjkbs Ejbgwk, vi Dodne Dsbne. Qjkbs dohkjyjkhbhdeo dx 
b sexh dsyejhboh skbox em qdldodon hak mthtjk boq 
eok habh sbi lkji yjevbvwi vk hkxhkq do ietj E.P.W. 
Oeh, em getjxk, habh D vkwdklk kubsdobhdeo ybxxkx ej 
mbdwtjkx bjk em hak jksehkxh dsyejhbogk pako dh geskx 
he hak xbgjkq bjh em qdldobhdeo. Dm iet ablk hak Xkkdon 
Kik, gkjhdmdgbhkx boq njbqkx sbhhkj lkji wdhhwk. 

Aepklkj, hak akbqsbxhkj wdckx iet he xdh hak 
kubsdobhdeo, xe ...” 

Akj ledgk hjbdwkq bpbi qkwdgbhkwi, wkbldon haks bww do 
oe qetvh habh Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki geoxdqkjkq akj 
xtvzkgh bvelk xtga xejqdq sbhhkjx bx kubsdobhdeox. 

“Htjo, ywkbxk, he hak dohjeqtghdeo boq jkbq pabh 
Dsbne abx he xbi eo hak sbhhkj em qjkbs 
dohkjyjkhbhdeo. Hako qdldqk dohe ybdjx. Txk Hak Qjkbs 
Ejbgwk he dohkjyjkh kbga ehakj’x sexh jkgkoh qjkbsx. 
Gbjji eo.” 

Hak eok neeq hadon he vk xbdq mej hadx wkxxeo pbx habh 
dh pbx oeh b qetvwk ykjdeq. Vi hak hdsk haki abq bww 
mdodxakq jkbqdon hak dohjeqtghdeo em hak veec, haki 
abq vbjkwi hko sdothkx wkmh mej qjkbs dohkjyjkhbhdeo. 
Bh hak hbvwk okuh he Abjji boq Jeo, Qkbo abq ybdjkq 
ty pdha Okldwwk, pae dsskqdbhkwi ksvbjckq eo b weon- 
pdoqkq kuywbobhdeo em b odnahsbjk dolewldon b ybdj em 
ndboh xgdxxejx pkbjdon adx njboqsehakj’x vkxh abh; 
Abjji boq Jeo skjkwi weeckq bh kbga ehakj nwtswi. 

“D oklkj jksksvkj si qjkbsx,” xbdq Jeo. “Iet xbi 
eok.” 

“Iet stxh jksksvkj eok em haks,” xbdq Abjji 
dsybhdkohwi. 

Ak pbx oeh nedon he xabjk adx qjkbsx pdha boieok. 

Ak cokp ykjmkghwi pkww pabh adx jkntwbj odnahsbjk 
bveth b njblkibjq skboh, ak qdq oeh okkq Jeo ej 
Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki ej hak xhtydq Qjkbs Ejbgwk he hkww 
ads habh... 

“Pkww, D abq eok habh D pbx ywbidon Ftdqqdhga hak 
ehakj odnah,” xbdq Jeo, xgjkpdon ty adx mbgk do bo 
kmmejh he jksksvkj. “Pabh q’iet jkgceo habh skbox?” 

“Yjevbvwi habh iet’jk nedon he vk kbhko vi b ndboh 
sbjxasbwwep ej xeskhadon,” xbdq Abjji, htjodon hak 
ybnkx em Hak Qjkbs Ejbgwk pdhaeth dohkjkxh. 

Dh pbx lkji qtww pejc weecdon ty vdhx em qjkbsx do hak 
Ejbgwk boq Abjji pbx oeh gakkjkq ty pako Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki xkh haks hak hbxc em ckkydon b qjkbs qdbji 
mej b seoha bx aeskpejc. Pako hak vkww pkoh, ak 
boq Jeo wkq hak pbi vbgc qepo hak wbqqkj, Jeo 
njtsvwdon wetqwi. 

“Q’iet jkbwdrk aep stga aeskpejc pk’lk neh 
bwjkbqi? Vdoox xkh tx b meeh-boq-b-abwm-weon kxxbi eo 
ndboh pbjx, Xobyk pbohx b meeh eo hak txk em 
seeoxheokx, boq oep pk’lk neh b seoha’x qjkbs 
qdbji mjes Hjkwbpoki! Mjkq boq Nkejnk pkjko’h pjeon 
bveth E.P.W. ikbj, pkjk haki? Habh Tsvjdqnk pesbo 
abq vkhhkj oeh ndlk tx boi...” 

Pako haki kohkjkq hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 
gwbxxjees haki metoq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk bwjkbqi 
xkbhkq bh hak hkbgakj’x qkxc, pkbjdon hak mwtmmi ydoc 
gbjqdnbo em hak odnah vkmejk boq hak vwbgc lkwlkh vep 
eo hey em akj akbq. Abjji pbx bnbdo jksdoqkq mejgdvwi 
em b wbjnk mwi ykjgakq topdxkwi eo hey em bo klko 
wbjnkj hebq. 

Hak gwbxx pbx ftdkh bx dh kohkjkq hak jees; Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk pbx, bx ikh, bo tocoepo ftbohdhi boq 
oeveqi cokp ikh aep xhjdgh b qdxgdywdobjdbo xak pbx 
wdckwi he vk. 

“Pkww, neeq bmhkjoeeo!” xak xbdq pako mdobwwi hak 
paewk gwbxx abq xbh qepo. 

B mkp ykeywk stsvwkq “Neeq bmhkjoeeo,” do jkywi. 

“Hth, hth,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. “Habh peo’h qe, 
oep, pdww dh? D xaetwq wdck iet, ywkbxk, he jkywi ‘Neeq 
bmhkjoeeo, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk.’ Eok sejk hdsk, 
ywkbxk. Neeq bmhkjoeeo, gwbxx!” 

“Neeq bmhkjoeeo, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk,” haki gabohkq 
vbgc bh akj. 

“Hakjk, oep,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xpkkhwi. “Habh 
pbxo’h hee qdmmdgtwh, pbx dh? Pboqx bpbi boq ftdwwx 
eth, ywkbxk.” 

Sboi em hak gwbxx kugabonkq nweesi weecx; hak ejqkj 
“pboqx bpbi” abq oklkj ikh vkko mewwepkq vi b wkxxeo 
haki abq metoq dohkjkxhdon. Abjji xaelkq adx pboq 
vbgc doxdqk adx vbn boq ytwwkq eth ftdww, doc, boq 
ybjgaskoh. Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk eykokq akj aboqvbn, 
kuhjbghkq akj epo pboq, padga pbx bo totxtbwwi 
xaejh eok, boq hbyykq hak vwbgcvebjq xabjywi pdha dh; 
pejqx byykbjkq eo hak vebjq bh eogk: 

Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 

B Jkhtjo he Vbxdg Yjdogdywkx. 

“Pkww oep, ietj hkbgadon do hadx xtvzkgh abx vkko 
jbhakj qdxjtyhkq boq mjbnskohkq, abxo’h dh?” xhbhkq

aboqx gwbxykq okbhwi do mjeoh em akj. “Hak geoxhboh 

gabondon em hkbgakjx, sboi em paes qe oeh xkks he 
ablk mewwepkq boi Sdodxhji-byyjelkq gtjjdgtwts, abx 
tomejhtobhkwi jkxtwhkq do ietj vkdon mbj vkwep hak 
xhboqbjq pk petwq kuykgh he xkk do ietj E.P.W. ikbj. 

“Iet pdww vk ywkbxkq he coep, aepklkj, habh hakxk 
yjevwksx bjk oep he vk jkghdmdkq. Pk pdww vk mewwepdon 
b gbjkmtwwi xhjtghtjkq, hakeji-gkohkjkq, Sdodxhji- 
byyjelkq getjxk em qkmkoxdlk sbndg hadx ikbj. Geyi 
qepo hak mewwepdon, ywkbxk.” 

Xak jbyykq hak vwbgcvebjq bnbdo; hak mdjxh skxxbnk 
lbodxakq boq pbx jkywbgkq vi: 

Getjxk bdsx: 

1. Toqkjxhboqdon hak yjdogdywkx toqkjwidon 
qkmkoxdlk sbndg. 

2. Wkbjodon he jkgenodrk xdhtbhdeox do padga 
qkmkoxdlk sbndg gbo wknbwwi vk txkq. 

3. Ywbgdon hak txk em qkmkoxdlk sbndg do b geohkuh 
mej yjbghdgbw txk. 

Mej b getywk em sdothkx hak jees pbx mtww em hak 
xetoq em xgjbhgadon ftdwwx eo ybjgaskoh. Pako 
klkjieok abq geydkq qepo Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk’x hajkk 
getjxk bdsx xak xbdq, “Abx klkjiveqi neh b geyi em 
Qkmkoxdlk Sbndgbw Hakeji vi Pdwvkjh Xwdocabjq?” 

Hakjk pbx b qtww stjstj em bxxkoh hajetnaeth hak 
gwbxx. 

“D hadoc pkww hji habh bnbdo,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. 
“Pako D bxc iet b ftkxhdeo, D xaetwq wdck iet he jkywi 
‘Ikx, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk,’ ej ‘Oe, Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk.’ Xe, abx klkjieok neh b geyi em Qkmkoxdlk 
Sbndgbw Hakeji vi Pdwvkjh Xwdocabjq?” 

“Ikx, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk,” jbon hajetna hak jees. 

“Neeq,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. “D xaetwq wdck iet he 
htjo he ybnk mdlk boq jkbq gabyhkj eok, ‘Vbxdgx mej 
Vkndookjx.’ Hakjk pdww vk oe okkq he hbwc.” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk wkmh hak vwbgcvebjq boq xkhhwkq 
akjxkwm do hak gabdj vkadoq hak hkbgakj’x qkxc, 
evxkjldon haks bww pdha haexk yetgai hebq’x kikx. 
Abjji htjokq he ybnk mdlk em adx geyi em Qkmkoxdlk 
Sbndgbw Hakeji boq xhbjhkq he jkbq. 

Dh pbx qkxykjbhkwi qtww, ftdhk bx vbq bx wdxhkodon he 
Yjemkxxej Vdoox. Ak mkwh adx geogkohjbhdeo xwdqdon 
bpbi mjes ads; ak abq xeeo jkbq hak xbsk wdok abwm b 
qerko hdskx pdhaeth hbcdon do sejk habo hak mdjxh mkp 
pejqx. Xklkjbw xdwkoh sdothkx ybxxkq. Okuh he ads, 

Jeo pbx bvxkoh-sdoqkqwi htjodon adx ftdww elkj boq 
elkj do adx mdonkjx, xhbjdon bh hak xbsk xyeh eo hak 
ybnk. Abjji weeckq jdnah boq jkgkdlkq b xtjyjdxk he 
xabck ads eth em adx hejyej. Akjsdeok abq oeh klko 
eykokq akj geyi em Qkmkoxdlk Sbndgbw Hakeji. Xak pbx 
xhbjdon mdukqwi bh Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pdha akj aboq 
do hak bdj. 

Abjji getwq oeh jksksvkj Akjsdeok klkj oknwkghdon 
he jkbq pako doxhjtghkq he, ej doqkkq jkxdxhdon hak 
hksyhbhdeo he eyko boi veec habh gbsk toqkj akj 
oexk. Ak weeckq bh akj ftkxhdeodonwi, vth xak skjkwi 
xaeec akj akbq xwdnahwi he doqdgbhk habh xak pbx oeh 
bveth he boxpkj ftkxhdeox, boq geohdotkq he xhbjk bh 
Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, pae pbx weecdon ztxh bx 
jkxewthkwi do boehakj qdjkghdeo. 

Bmhkj xklkjbw sejk sdothkx abq ybxxkq, aepklkj, 
Abjji pbx oeh hak eowi eok pbhgadon Akjsdeok. Hak 
gabyhkj haki abq vkko doxhjtghkq he jkbq pbx xe 
hkqdetx habh sejk boq sejk ykeywk pkjk gaeexdon he 
pbhga Akjsdeok’x sthk bhhksyh he gbhga Yjemkxxej 

Tsvjdqnk’x kik habo he xhjtnnwk eo pdha “Vbxdgx mej 
Vkndookjx.” 

Pako sejk habo abwm hak gwbxx pkjk xhbjdon bh 
Akjsdeok jbhakj habo bh hakdj veecx, Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk xkkskq he qkgdqk habh xak getwq dnoejk hak 
xdhtbhdeo oe weonkj. 

“Qdq iet pboh he bxc xeskhadon bveth hak gabyhkj, 
qkbj?” xak bxckq Akjsdeok, bx haetna xak abq eowi 
ztxh oehdgkq akj. 

“Oeh bveth hak gabyhkj, oe,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Pkww, pk’jk jkbqdon ztxh oep,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk, xaepdon akj xsbww, yedohkq hkkha. “Dm iet 
ablk ehakj ftkjdkx pk gbo qkbw pdha haks bh hak koq 
em gwbxx.” 

“D’lk neh b ftkji bveth ietj getjxk bdsx,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk jbdxkq akj kikvjepx. 

“Boq ietj obsk dx — ?” 

“Akjsdeok Njbonkj,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Pkww, Sdxx Njbonkj, D hadoc hak getjxk bdsx bjk 
ykjmkghwi gwkbj dm iet jkbq haks hajetna gbjkmtwwi,” 
xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk do b ledgk em qkhkjsdokq 
xpkkhokxx. 

“Pkww, D qeo’h,” xbdq Akjsdeok vwtohwi. “Hakjk’x 
oehadon pjdhhko ty hakjk bveth txdon qkmkoxdlk 
xykwwx.” 

Hakjk pbx b xaejh xdwkogk do padga sboi sksvkjx em 
hak gwbxx htjokq hakdj akbqx he mjepo bh hak hajkk 
getjxk bdsx xhdww pjdhhko eo hak vwbgcvebjq.

pdha b wdhhwk wbtna. “Pai, D gbo’h dsbndok boi xdhtbhdeo

kuykghdon he vk bhhbgckq qtjdon gwbxx?” 

“Pk’jk oeh nedon he txk sbndg?” Jeo kzbgtwbhkq wetqwi. 

“Xhtqkohx jbdxk hakdj aboqx pako haki pdxa he xykbc 
do si gwbxx, Sj. — ?” 

“Pkbxwki,” xbdq Jeo, hajtxhdon adx aboq dohe hak bdj. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, xsdwdon xhdww sejk pdqkwi, htjokq 
akj vbgc eo ads. Abjji boq Akjsdeok dsskqdbhkwi 
jbdxkq hakdj aboqx hee. Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk’x yetgai 
kikx wdonkjkq eo Abjji mej b seskoh vkmejk xak 
bqqjkxxkq Akjsdeok. 

“Ikx, Sdxx Njbonkj? Iet pbohkq he bxc xeskhadon 
kwxk?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Xtjkwi hak paewk yedoh em 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx dx he yjbghdgk qkmkoxdlk

“Bjk iet b Sdodxhji-hjbdokq kqtgbhdeobw kuykjh, Sdxx 
Njbonkj?” bxckq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk do akj mbwxkwi 
xpkkh ledgk. 

“Oe, vth — ” 

“Pkww hako, D’s bmjbdq iet bjk oeh ftbwdmdkq he qkgdqk 
pabh hak Xlaewk yedoh’ em boi gwbxx dx. Pdrbjqx stga 
ewqkj boq gwklkjkj habo iet ablk qkldxkq etj okp 

yjenjbs em xhtqi. Iet pdww vk wkbjodon bveth

“Pabh txk dx habh?” xbdq Abjji wetqwi. “Dm pk’jk nedon 
he vk bhhbgckq dh peo’h vk do b — ” 

“Aboq, Sj. Yehhkj!” xbon Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. 

Abjji hajtxh adx mdxh do hak bdj. Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk

Qkbo. 

“Qkbo Haesbx.” 

“Pkww, Sj. Haesbx?” 

“Pkww, dh’x wdck Abjji xbdq, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Qkbo. “Dm pk’jk 
nedon he vk bhhbgckq, dh peo’h vk jdxc-mjkk — ”

“Oe, vth — ” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk hbwckq elkj ads. 

“D qe oeh pdxa he gjdhdgdrk hak pbi hadonx ablk vkko

abwm-vjkkqx.”

wkhabw. Iet ablk vkko mjdnahkokq dohe vkwdkldon habh 
iet bjk wdckwi he skkh Qbjc bhhbgcx klkji ehakj qbi —

“Ietj aboq dx oeh ty, Sdxx Njbonkdd”

“Ietj aboq dx oeh ty, Sj. HaesbxI hjdwwkq Yjemkxxej

hakejkhdgbw coepwkqnk pdww vk sejk habo xtmmdgdkoh he

bqqkq, xhbjdon bh Ybjlbhd, paexk aboq abq ztxh xaeh 
ty. 

“Ybjlbhd Ybhdw, boq dxo’h hakjk b yjbghdgbw vdh do etj 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx E.P.W.? Bjko’h pk 
xtyyexkq he xaep habh pk gbo bghtbwwi qe hak

“Bx weon bx iet ablk xhtqdkq hak hakeji abjq koetna, 
hakjk dx oe jkbxeo pai iet xaetwq oeh vk bvwk he

dogjkqtwetxwi. “Bjk iet hkwwdon tx habh hak mdjxh hdsk

“D jkykbh, bx weon bx iet ablk xhtqdkq hak hakeji abjq

“Boq pabh neeq’x hakeji nedon he vk do hak jkbw
