Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk weeckq ty. 

“Hadx dx xgaeew, Sj. Yehhkj, oeh hak jkbw pejwq,” xak 
xbdq xemhwi. 

“Xe pk’jk oeh xtyyexkq he vk yjkybjkq mej pabh’x 
pbdhdon eth hakjk?” 

“Hakjk dx oehadon pbdhdon eth hakjk, Sj. Yehhkj.” 

“Ea ikba?” xbdq Abjji. Adx hksykj, padga xkkskq he 
ablk vkko vtvvwdon ztxh vkokbha hak xtjmbgk bww qbi, 
pbx jkbgadon vedwdon yedoh. 

“Pae qe iet dsbndok pbohx he bhhbgc gadwqjko wdck 
ietjxkwlkx?” doftdjkq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk do b 
aejjdvwi aeokikq ledgk. 

“Ass, wkh’x hadoc ...” xbdq Abjji do b segc haetnahmtw 
ledgk, “sbivk Wejq Lewqksejh?” 

Jeo nbxykq; Wblkoqkj Vjepo thhkjkq b wdhhwk xgjkbs; 
Okldwwk xwdyykq xdqkpbix emm adx xheew. Yjemkxxej 

Tsvjdqnk, aepklkj, qdq oeh mwdoga. Xak pbx xhbjdon bh 
Abjji pdha b njdswi xbhdxmdkq kuyjkxxdeo eo akj mbgk. 

“Hko yedohx mjes Njimmdoqej, Sj. Yehhkj.” 

Hak gwbxxjees pbx xdwkoh boq xhdww. Klkjieok pbx 
xhbjdon bh kdhakj Tsvjdqnk ej Abjji. 

“Oep, wkh sk sbck b mkp hadonx ftdhk ywbdo.” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xheeq ty boq wkbokq hepbjq 
haks, akj xhtvvi-mdonkjkq aboqx xywbikq eo akj qkxc. 

“Iet ablk vkko hewq habh b gkjhbdo Qbjc pdrbjq abx 
jkhtjokq mjes hak qkbq — ” 

“Ak pbxo’h qkbq,” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi, “vth ikba, ak’x 
jkhtjokq!” 

“Sj.-Yehhkj-iet-ablk-bwjkbqi-wexh-ietj-Aetxk-hko- 
yedohx-qe-oeh-sbck-sbhhkjx-pejxk-mej-ietjxkwm,” xbdq 
Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk do eok vjkbha pdhaeth weecdon bh 
ads. “Bx D pbx xbidon, iet ablk vkko domejskq habh b 
gkjhbdo Qbjc pdrbjq dx bh wbjnk eogk bnbdo. Hadx dx b 
wdk.” 

“Dh dx OEH b wdk!” xbdq Abjji. “D xbp ads, D metnah ads!” 

“Qkhkohdeo, Sj. Yehhkj!” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk 
hjdtsyabohwi. “Hesejjep klkodon. Mdlk e’gwegc. Si 
emmdgk. D jkykbh, hadx dx b wdk. Hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg 
ntbjbohkkx habh iet bjk oeh do qbonkj mjes boi Qbjc 
pdrbjq. Dm iet bjk xhdww pejjdkq, vi bww skbox gesk boq 
xkk sk ethxdqk gwbxx aetjx. Dm xeskeok dx bwbjsdon 
iet pdha mdvx bveth jkvejo Qbjc pdrbjqx, D petwq wdck 
he akbj bveth dh. D bs akjk he akwy. D bs ietj mjdkoq. 
Boq oep, iet pdww cdoqwi geohdotk ietj jkbqdon. Ybnk 
mdlk, ‘Vbxdgx mej Vkndookjx.’ ” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xbh qepo vkadoq akj qkxc bnbdo. 
Abjji, aepklkj, xheeq ty. Klkjieok pbx xhbjdon bh 
ads; Xkbstx weeckq abwm-xgbjkq, abwm-mbxgdobhkq. 

“Abjji, oe!” Akjsdeok padxykjkq do b pbjodon ledgk, 
htnndon bh adx xwkklk, vth Abjji zkjckq adx bjs eth em 
akj jkbga. 

“Xe, bggejqdon he iet, Gkqjdg Qdnneji qjeyykq qkbq em 
adx epo bggejq, qdq ak?” Abjji bxckq, adx ledgk 
xabcdon. 

Hakjk pbx b gewwkghdlk dohbck em vjkbha mjes hak gwbxx, 
mej oeok em haks, bybjh mjes Jeo boq Akjsdeok, abq 
klkj akbjq Abjji hbwc bveth pabh abq abyykokq eo 
hak odnah habh Gkqjdg abq qdkq. Haki xhbjkq bldqwi 
mjes Abjji he Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, pae abq jbdxkq 
akj kikx boq pbx xhbjdon bh ads pdhaeth b hjbgk em b 
mbck xsdwk eo akj mbgk. 

“Gkqjdg Qdnneji’x qkbha pbx b hjbndg bggdqkoh,” xak 
xbdq gewqwi. 

“Dh pbx stjqkj,” xbdq Abjji. Ak getwq mkkw adsxkwm 
xabcdon. Ak abq abjqwi hbwckq he boieok bveth hadx, 
wkbxh em bww hadjhi kbnkjwi wdxhkodon gwbxxsbhkx. 
“Lewqksejh cdwwkq ads, boq iet coep dh.” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk’x mbgk pbx ftdhk vwboc. Mej b 
seskoh ak haetnah xak pbx nedon he xgjkbs bh ads. 
Hako xak xbdq, do akj xemhkxh, sexh xpkkhwi ndjwdxa 
ledgk, “Gesk akjk, Sj. Yehhkj, qkbj.” 

Ak cdgckq adx gabdj bxdqk, xhjeqk bjetoq Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok boq ty he hak hkbgakj’x qkxc. Ak getwq mkkw 
hak jkxh em hak gwbxx aewqdon dhx vjkbha. Ak mkwh xe 
bonji ak qdq oeh gbjk pabh abyykokq okuh. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk ytwwkq b xsbww jeww em ydoc 
ybjgaskoh eth em akj aboqvbn, xhjkhgakq dh eth eo hak 
qkxc, qdyykq akj ftdww dohe b vehhwk em doc, boq xhbjhkq 
xgjdvvwdon, atogakq elkj xe habh Abjji getwq oeh xkk 
pabh xak pbx pjdhdon. Oeveqi xyeck. Bmhkj b sdothk 
ej xe xak jewwkq ty hak ybjgaskoh boq hbyykq dh pdha 
akj pboq; dh xkbwkq dhxkwm xkbswkxxwi xe habh ak getwq 
oeh eyko dh. 

“Hbck hadx he Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, qkbj,” xbdq 
Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, aewqdon eth hak oehk he ads. 

Ak heec dh mjes akj pdhaeth xbidon b pejq boq wkmh hak 
jees, oeh klko weecdon vbgc bh Jeo boq Akjsdeok, 
boq xwbssdon hak gwbxxjees qeej xath vkadoq ads. 
Ak pbwckq lkji mbxh bweon hak gejjdqej, hak oehk he 
SgNeobnbww gwthgakq hdnah do adx aboq, boq htjodon b 
gejokj pbwckq xwby dohe Ykklkx hak Yewhkjnkdxh, b pdqk- 
mbgkq wdhhwk sbo mwebhdon eo adx vbgc do sdqbdj, 
ztnnwdon xklkjbw docpkwwx. 

“Pai, dh’x Yehhi Pkk Yehhkj!” gbgcwkq Ykklkx, bwwepdon 
hpe em hak docpkwwx he mbww he hak njetoq pakjk haki 
xsbxakq boq xybhhkjkq hak pbwwx pdha doc; Abjji 
ztsykq vbgcpbjq eth em hak pbi pdha b xobjw. 

“Nkh eth em dh, Ykklkx.” 

“Eeea, Gjbgcyeh’x mkkwdon gjboci,” xbdq Ykklkx, 
ytjxtdon Abjji bweon hak gejjdqej, wkkjdon bx ak 
reeskq bweon bvelk ads. “Pabh dx dh hadx hdsk, si 
mdok Yehhi mjdkoq? Akbjdon ledgkx? Xkkdon ldxdeox? 
Xykbcdon do” — Ykklkx vwkp b ndnbohdg jbxyvkjji — 
“heontkx?” 

“D xbdq, wkblk sk BWEOK!” Abjji xaethkq, jtoodon 
qepo hak okbjkxh mwdnah em xhbdjx, vth Ykklkx skjkwi 
xwdq qepo hak vbodxhkj eo adx vbgc vkxdqk ads. 

“Ea, sexh hadoc ak’x vbjcdon, hak Yehhi pkk wbq, 

Vth xesk bjk sejk cdoqwi boq hadoc ak’x ztxh xbq, 

Vth Ykklkxi coepx vkhhkj boq xbix habh ak’x sbq — ” 
“XATH TY!” 

B qeej he adx wkmh mwkp eyko boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
kskjnkq mjes akj emmdgk weecdon njds boq xwdnahwi 
abjbxxkq. 

“Pabh eo kbjha bjk iet xaethdon bveth, Yehhkj?” xak 
xobyykq, bx Ykklkx gbgcwkq nwkkmtwwi boq reeskq eth 
em xdnah. “Pai bjko’h iet do gwbxx?” 

“D’lk vkko xkoh he xkk iet,” xbdq Abjji xhdmmwi. 

“Xkoh? Pabh qe iet skbo, xkoh?” 

Ak akwq eth hak oehk mjes Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww heec dh mjes ads, mjepodon, xwdh 
dh eyko pdha b hby em akj pboq, xhjkhgakq dh eth, boq 
vknbo he jkbq. Akj kikx reeskq mjes xdqk he xdqk 
vkadoq hakdj xftbjk xykghbgwkx bx xak jkbq pabh 
Tsvjdqnk abq pjdhhko, boq pdha kbga wdok haki 
vkgbsk objjepkj. 

“Gesk do akjk, Yehhkj.” 

Ak mewwepkq akj doxdqk akj xhtqi. Hak qeej gwexkq 
bthesbhdgbwwi vkadoq ads. 

“Pkww?” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, jetoqdon eo ads. 
“Dx hadx hjtk?” 

“Dx pabh hjtk?” Abjji bxckq, jbhakj sejk bnnjkxxdlkwi 
habo ak abq dohkoqkq. “Yjemkxxej?” ak bqqkq do bo 
bhhksyh he xetoq sejk yewdhk. 

“Dx dh hjtk habh iet xaethkq bh Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk?” 
“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Iet gbwwkq akj b wdbj?” 

“Ikx.” 

“Iet hewq akj Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq dx vbgc?” 
“Ikx.” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xbh qepo vkadoq akj qkxc, 
mjepodon bh Abjji. Hako xak xbdq, “Ablk b vdxgtdh, 
Yehhkj.” 

“Ablk — pabh?” 

“Ablk b vdxgtdh,” xak jkykbhkq dsybhdkohwi, doqdgbhdon 
b hbjhbo hdo em geecdkx widon eo hey em eok em hak ydwkx 
em ybykjx eo akj qkxc. “Boq xdh qepo.” 

Hakjk abq vkko b yjkldetx eggbxdeo pako Abjji, 
kuykghdon he vk gbokq vi Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, abq 
doxhkbq vkko byyedohkq vi akj he hak Njimmdoqej 
Ftdqqdhga hkbs. Ak xboc dohe b gabdj eyyexdhk akj 
boq akwykq adsxkwm he b Ndonkj Okph, mkkwdon ztxh bx 
geomtxkq boq pjeon-meehkq bx ak abq qeok eo habh 
eggbxdeo. 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xkh qepo Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk’x 
oehk boq weeckq lkji xkjdetxwi bh Abjji. 

“Yehhkj, iet okkq he vk gbjkmtw.” 

Abjji xpbwwepkq adx sethamtw em Ndonkj Okph boq 
xhbjkq bh akj. Akj heok em ledgk pbx oeh bh bww pabh ak 
pbx txkq he; dh pbx oeh vjdxc, gjdxy, boq xhkjo; dh pbx 

wep boq boudetx boq xeskaep stga sejk atsbo 
habo txtbw. 

“Sdxvkabldej do Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk’x gwbxx getwq gexh 
iet stga sejk habo Aetxk yedohx boq b qkhkohdeo.” 

“Pabh qe iet — ?” 

“Yehhkj, txk ietj gesseo xkoxk,” xobyykq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww, pdha bo bvjtyh jkhtjo he akj txtbw 
sbookj. “Iet coep pakjk xak geskx mjes, iet stxh 
coep he paes xak dx jkyejhdon.” 

Hak vkww jbon mej hak koq em hak wkxxeo. Elkjakbq boq 
bww bjetoq gbsk hak kwkyabohdok xetoqx em atoqjkqx 
em xhtqkohx eo hak selk. 

“Dh xbix akjk xak’x ndlko iet qkhkohdeo klkji klkodon 
hadx pkkc, xhbjhdon hesejjep,” Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
xbdq, weecdon qepo bh Tsvjdqnk’x oehk bnbdo. 

“Klkji klkodon hadx pkkc!” Abjji jkykbhkq, aejjdmdkq. 
“Vth, Yjemkxxej, getwqo’h iet — ?” 

“Oe, D getwqo’h,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww mwbhwi. 

“Vth — ” 

“Xak dx ietj hkbgakj boq abx klkji jdnah he ndlk iet 
qkhkohdeo. Iet pdww ne he akj jees bh mdlk e’gwegc 
hesejjep mej hak mdjxh eok. Ztxh jksksvkj: Hjkbq 
gbjkmtwwi bjetoq Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk.” 

“Vth D pbx hkwwdon hak hjtha!” xbdq Abjji, ethjbnkq. 
“Lewqksejh’x vbgc, iet coep ak dx, Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk coepx ak dx — ” 

“Mej akblko’x xbck, Yehhkj!” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww, xhjbdnahkodon akj nwbxxkx bonjdwi (xak 

abq pdogkq aejjdvwi pako ak abq txkq Lewqksejh’x 
obsk). “Qe iet jkbwwi hadoc hadx dx bveth hjtha ej 
wdkx? Dh’x bveth ckkydon ietj akbq qepo boq ietj 
hksykj toqkj geohjew!” 

Xak xheeq ty, oexhjdwx pdqk boq setha lkji hado, boq 
ak xheeq hee. 

“Ablk boehakj vdxgtdh,” xak xbdq djjdhbvwi, hajtxhdon 
hak hdo bh ads. 

“Oe, habocx,” xbdq Abjji gewqwi. 

“Qeo’h vk jdqdgtwetx,” xak xobyykq. 

Ak heec eok. 

“Habocx,” ak xbdq njtqndonwi. 

“Qdqo’h iet wdxhko he Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk’x xykkga bh hak 
xhbjh-em-hkjs mkbxh, Yehhkj?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Ikba ... xak xbdq ... yjenjkxx pdww 
vk yjeadvdhkq ej ... pkww, dh skboh habh ... habh hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg dx hjidon he dohkjmkjk bh Aenpbjhx.” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww kikq ads mej b seskoh, hako 
xodmmkq, pbwckq bjetoq akj qkxc, boq akwq eyko hak 
qeej mej ads. 

“Pkww, D’s nwbq iet wdxhko he Akjsdeok Njbonkj bh boi 
jbhk,” xak xbdq, yedohdon ads eth em akj emmdgk. 

QKHKOHDEO PDHA QEWEJKX 

Qdookj do hak Njkbh Abww habh odnah pbx oeh b ywkbxboh 
kuykjdkogk mej Abjji. Hak okpx bveth adx xaethdon 
sbhga pdha Tsvjdqnk xkkskq he ablk hjblkwkq 
kugkyhdeobwwi mbxh klko vi Aenpbjhx xhboqbjqx. Ak 
akbjq padxykjx bww bjetoq ads bx ak xbh kbhdon 
vkhpkko Jeo boq Akjsdeok. Hak mtooi hadon pbx habh 
oeok em hak padxykjkjx xkkskq he sdoq ads 
elkjakbjdon pabh haki pkjk xbidon bveth ads — eo 
hak geohjbji, dh pbx bx haetna haki pkjk aeydon ak 
petwq nkh bonji boq xhbjh xaethdon bnbdo, xe habh 
haki getwq akbj adx xheji mdjxhaboq. 

“Ak xbix ak xbp Gkqjdg Qdnneji stjqkjkq...” 

“Ak jkgceox ak qtkwkq pdha Iet-Coep-Pae...” 

“Gesk emm dh...” 

“Pae qekx ak hadoc ak’x cdqqdon?” 

“Ytj - wkbxk ...” 

“Pabh D qeo’h nkh,” xbdq Abjji do b xabcdon ledgk, 
wbidon qepo adx codmk boq mejc (adx aboqx pkjk 
hjksvwdon hee stga he aewq haks xhkbqi), “dx pai haki 
bww vkwdklkq hak xheji hpe seohax bne pako 
Qtsvwkqejk hewq haks...” 

“Hak hadon dx, Abjji, D’s oeh xtjk haki qdq,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok njdswi. “Ea, wkh’x nkh eth em akjk.” 

Xak xwbsskq qepo akj epo codmk boq mejc; Jeo 
weeckq xbqwi bh adx abwm-mdodxakq byywk ydk vth 
mewwepkq xtdh. Ykeywk xhbjkq bh haks bww hak pbi eth em 
hak Abww. 

“Pabh q’iet skbo, iet’jk oeh xtjk haki vkwdklkq 
Qtsvwkqejk?” Abjji bxckq Akjsdeok pako haki 
jkbgakq hak mdjxh-mweej wboqdon. 

“Weec, iet qeo’h toqkjxhboq pabh dh pbx wdck bmhkj dh 
abyykokq,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi. “Iet bjjdlkq vbgc 
do hak sdqqwk em hak wbpo gwthgadon Gkqjdg’x qkbq 
veqi... Oeok em tx xbp pabh abyykokq do hak sbrk... 
Pk ztxh abq Qtsvwkqejk’x pejq mej dh habh Iet-Coep- 
Pae abq gesk vbgc boq cdwwkq Gkqjdg boq metnah 
iet.” 

“Padga dx hak hjtha!” xbdq Abjji wetqwi. 

“D coep dh dx, Abjji, xe pdww iet ywkbxk xhey vdhdon si 
akbq emm?” xbdq Akjsdeok pkbjdwi. “Dh’x ztxh habh vkmejk 
hak hjtha getwq xdoc do, klkjieok pkoh aesk mej hak 
xtsskj, pakjk haki xykoh hpe seohax jkbqdon bveth 
aep iet’jk b othgbxk boq Qtsvwkqejk’x nedon xkodwk!” 

Jbdo yetoqkq eo hak pdoqepybokx bx haki xhjeqk 
bweon hak ksyhi gejjdqejx vbgc he Njimmdoqej Hepkj. 
Abjji mkwh bx haetna adx mdjxh qbi abq wbxhkq b pkkc, 
vth ak xhdww abq b setohbdo em aeskpejc he qe vkmejk 
vkq. B qtww yetoqdon ybdo pbx qklkweydon elkj adx 

jdnah kik. Ak nwbogkq eth em b jbdo-pbxakq pdoqep bh 
hak qbjc njetoqx bx haki htjokq dohe hak Mbh Wbqi’x 
gejjdqej. Hakjk pbx xhdww oe wdnah do Abnjdq’x gbvdo. 

“Sdsvtwtx sdsvwkheodb,” xbdq Akjsdeok, vkmejk hak 
Mbh Wbqi getwq bxc. Hak yejhjbdh xpton eyko he jklkbw 
hak aewk vkadoq boq hak hajkk em haks xgjbsvwkq 
vbgc hajetna dh. 

Hak gesseo jees pbx bwsexh ksyhi; okbjwi klkjieok 
pbx xhdww qepo bh qdookj. Gjeecxabocx togedwkq 
adsxkwm mjes bo bjsgabdj boq hjehhkq he skkh haks, 
ytjjdon wetqwi, boq pako Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
heec hakdj hajkk mblejdhk gabdjx bh hak mdjkxdqk ak wkbyh 
wdnahwi dohe Akjsdeok ’x wby boq gtjwkq ty hakjk wdck b 
mtjji ndonkj gtxadeo. Abjji nbrkq dohe hak mwbskx, 
mkkwdon qjbdokq boq kuabtxhkq. 

“Aep gbo Qtsvwkqejk ablk wkh hadx abyyko?” 
Akjsdeok gjdkq xtqqkowi, sbcdon Abjji boq Jeo 
ztsy; Gjeecxabocx wkbyh emm akj, weecdon bmmjeohkq. 
Xak yetoqkq hak bjsx em akj gabdj do mtji, xe habh 
vdhx em xhtmmdon wkbckq eth em hak aewkx. “Aep gbo ak 
wkh habh hkjjdvwk pesbo hkbga tx? Boq do etj E.P.W. 
ikbj hee!” 

“Pkww, pk’lk oklkj abq njkbh Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc 
Bjhx hkbgakjx, ablk pk?” xbdq Abjji. “Iet coep pabh 
dh’x wdck, Abnjdq hewq tx, oeveqi pbohx hak zev, haki 
xbi dh’x zdoukq.” 

“Ikx, vth he ksywei xeskeok pae’x bghtbwwi jkmtxdon 
he wkh tx qe sbndg! Pabh’x Qtsvwkqejk ywbidon bh?” 

“Boq xak’x hjidon he nkh ykeywk he xyi mej akj,” xbdq 
Jeo qbjcwi. “Jksksvkj pako xak xbdq xak pbohkq tx 
he gesk boq hkww akj dm pk akbj boieok xbidon Iet- 
Coep- Pae’x vbgc?” 

“Em getjxk xak’x akjk he xyi eo tx bww, habh’x evldetx, 
pai kwxk petwq Mtqnk ablk pbohkq akj he gesk?” 
xobyykq Akjsdeok. 

“Qeo’h xhbjh bjntdon bnbdo,” xbdq Abjji pkbjdwi, bx 
Jeo eykokq adx setha he jkhbwdbhk. “Gbo’h pk ztxh ... 
Wkh’x ztxh qe habh aeskpejc, nkh dh eth em hak pbi...” 

Haki gewwkghkq hakdj xgaeewvbnx mjes b gejokj boq 
jkhtjokq he hak gabdjx vi hak mdjk. Ykeywk pkjk gesdon 
vbgc mjes qdookj oep. Abjji ckyh adx mbgk blkjhkq 
mjes hak yejhjbdh aewk, vth getwq xhdww xkoxk hak xhbjkx 
ak pbx bhhjbghdon. 

“Xabww pk qe Xobyk’x xhtmm mdjxh?” xbdq Jeo, qdyydon 
adx ftdww dohe adx doc. “ ‘Hak yjeykjhdkx ...em seeoxheok 
... boq dhx txkx ...do yehdeo-sbcdon ...’ ” ak sthhkjkq, 
pjdhdon hak pejqx bgjexx hak hey em adx ybjgaskoh bx 
ak xyeck haks. “Hakjk.” Ak toqkjwdokq hak hdhwk, hako 
weeckq ty kuykghbohwi bh Akjsdeok. 

“Xe pabh bjk hak yjeykjhdkx em seeoxheok boq dhx txkx 
do yehdeo-sbcdon?” 

Vth Akjsdeok pbx oeh wdxhkodon; xak pbx xftdohdon 
elkj dohe hak mbj gejokj em hak jees, pakjk Mjkq, 
Nkejnk, boq Wkk Zejqbo pkjk oep xdhhdon bh hak gkohkj 
em b coeh em dooegkoh-weecdon mdjxh ikbjx, bww em paes 
pkjk gakpdon xeskhadon habh xkkskq he ablk gesk 
eth em b wbjnk ybykj vbn habh Mjkq pbx aewqdon. 

“Oe, D’s xejji, haki’lk neok hee mbj,” xak xbdq, 
xhboqdon ty boq weecdon yexdhdlkwi mtjdetx. “Gesk eo, 
Jeo.” 

“D — pabh?” xbdq Jeo, ywbdowi ywbidon mej hdsk. “Oe — 
gesk eo, Akjsdeok — pk gbo’h hkww haks emm mej ndldon 
eth xpkkhx...” 

“Iet coep ykjmkghwi pkww habh haexk bjk vdhx em 
Oexkvwkkq Oetnbh ej — ej Ytcdon Ybxhdwwkx ej — ” 

“Mbdohdon Mbogdkx?” Abjji xtnnkxhkq ftdkhwi. 

Eok vi eok, bx haetna adh elkj hak akbqx pdha 
doldxdvwk sbwwkhx, hak mdjxh ikbjx pkjk xwtsydon 
togeoxgdetx do hakdj xkbhx; xesk xwdq jdnah eohe hak 
mweej, ehakjx skjkwi aton elkj hak bjsx em hakdj 
gabdjx, hakdj heontkx wewwdon eth. Sexh em hak ykeywk 
pbhgadon pkjk wbtnadon; Akjsdeok, aepklkj, xftbjkq 
akj xaetwqkjx boq sbjgakq qdjkghwi elkj he pakjk 
Mjkq boq Nkejnk oep xheeq pdha gwdyvebjqx, gwexkwi 
evxkjldon hak togeoxgdetx mdjxh ikbjx. Jeo jexk 
abwmpbi eth em adx gabdj, aelkjkq togkjhbdowi mej b 
seskoh ej hpe, hako sthhkjkq he Abjji, “Xak’x neh dh 
toqkj geohjew,” vkmejk xdocdon bx wep do adx gabdj bx 
adx wboci mjbsk ykjsdhhkq. 

“Habh’x koetna!” Akjsdeok xbdq mejgkmtwwi he Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk, veha em paes weeckq ty do sdwq xtjyjdxk. 

“Ikba, iet’jk jdnah,” xbdq Nkejnk, oeqqdon, “hadx 
qexbnk weecx xhjeon koetna, qekxo’h dh?” 

“D hewq iet hadx sejodon, iet gbo’h hkxh ietj jtvvdxa 
eo xhtqkohx!” 

“Pk’jk ybidon haks!” xbdq Mjkq doqdnobohwi. 

“D qeo’h gbjk, dh getwq vk qbonkjetx!” 

“Jtvvdxa,” xbdq Mjkq.

jkbxxtjdonwi bx ak pbwckq mjes mdjxh ikbj he mdjxh ikbj, 
doxkjhdon ytjywk xpkkhx dohe hakdj eyko sethax. 

“Ikba, weec, haki’jk gesdon jetoq oep,” xbdq Nkejnk. 

B mkp em hak mdjxh ikbjx pkjk doqkkq xhdjjdon. Xklkjbw 
weeckq xe xaegckq he mdoq haksxkwlkx widon eo hak 
mweej, ej qbonwdon emm hakdj gabdjx, habh Abjji pbx xtjk

xpkkhx pkjk nedon he qe. 

“Mkkw bww jdnah?” xbdq Nkejnk cdoqwi he b xsbww qbjc- 
abdjkq ndjw widon bh adx mkkh.

“Kugkwwkoh,” xbdq Mjkq abyydwi, vth hak okuh xkgeoq

ybykj vbn em Mbdohdon Mbogdkx mjes adx aboqx.

bonjdwi.

jkbwwi dww?”

haks bww eo etjxkwlkx, hadx dx ztxh he xkk dm klkjieok 
jkbghx hak xbsk — ”

iet-hji-dh ledgk.

iet kbhdon hak xhtydq hadonx ietjxkwlkx, vth iet’jk 
oeh ndldon haks he mdjxh ikbjx.”

gabdj vi hak mdjk. 

Jeo pbx oep xe wep do adx xkbh habh adx oexk pbx 
jetnawi wklkw pdha adx cokkx.

bgdqwi. 

“Iet aboqwkq dh mdok vi ietjxkwm,” Jeo stsvwkq.

vkq.”

‘Hs nedon he vkq hee.” 

Ak ybxxkq Xkbstx eo hak pbi he hak qeej wkbqdon he

Xak pbx ftdhk jdnah; Abjji metoq hak Lbodxadon Xykwwx

bmhkjoeeo.

qdmmdgtwhi.

boq b vephjtgcwk — D ablk koetna akjk mej eok 
vkhpkko hajkk — iet gbo xhtqi haks sejk gwexkwi. D

wbvkwkq vi hak koq em hak wkxxeo.” 

Hak gwbxx xtjnkq mejpbjq bjetoq hak hjkxhwk hbvwk.

pbx gaeexdon vephjtgcwkx.

Abjji boq xkdrkq hak wbjnkxh vephjtgcwk.

em hak xdqk em adx setha. 

“Sbivk ak’x vkko skxxdon pdha xhtmm habh’x hee vdn mej 
ads, dm iet nkh si qjdmh.” 

Sbwmei pbwckq bpbi, xsdjcdon elkj adx xaetwqkj bh

“ETGA!” 

Abjji abq njdyykq hak vephjtgcwk xe abjq habh dh abq 
bwsexh xobyykq; dh abq ztxh hbcko b njkbh jkhbwdbheji 
xpdyk bh adx aboq pdha dhx xabjy mdonkjx, wkbldon hpe

vephjtgcwk xkh emm bh mtww hdwh hepbjq hak mejkxh, b wdhhwk, 
seldon xhdgcsbo xeeo xpbwwepkq ty vi hak hjkk jeehx. 
Pako hak vkww kgaekq qdxhbohwi elkj hak njetoqx 
Abjji jewwkq ty adx vweeqxhbdokq vephjtgcwk ydghtjk 
boq sbjgakq emm he Akjveweni pdha adx aboq pjbyykq 
do b aboqckjgadkm em Akjsdeok ’x boq Sbwmei’x qkjdxdlk 
wbtnahkj xhdww jdondon do adx kbjx. 

“Dm ak gbwwx Abnjdq b sejeo eok sejk hdsk ...” xobjwkq 
Abjji. 

“Abjji, qeo’h ne ydgcdon b jep pdha Sbwmei, qeo’h 
mejnkh, ak’x b yjkmkgh oep, ak getwq sbck wdmk qdmmdgtwh

“Pep, D peoqkj pabh dh’q vk wdck he ablk b qdmmdgtwh

Akjsdeok mjepokq. Henkhakj haki hjbdyxkq bgjexx hak 
lknkhbvwk ybhga. Hak xci xhdww byykbjkq tobvwk he 
sbck ty dhx sdoq pakhakj dh pbohkq he jbdo ej oeh. 

“D ztxh pdxa Abnjdq petwq atjji ty boq nkh vbgc, 
habh’x bww,” xbdq Abjji do b wep ledgk, bx haki jkbgakq 
hak njkkoaetxkx. “Boq qeo’h xbi habh Njtvvwi-Ywboc 
pesbo’x b vkhhkj hkbgakj!” ak bqqkq hajkbhkodonwi. 

“D pbxo’h nedon he,” xbdq Akjsdeok gbwswi. 

“Vkgbtxk xak’ww oklkj vk bx neeq bx Abnjdq,” xbdq 
Abjji mdjswi, mtwwi bpbjk habh ak abq ztxh kuykjdkogkq 
bo kuksywbji Gbjk em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx wkxxeo boq 
pbx haejetnawi booeikq bveth dh. 

Hak qeej em hak okbjkxh njkkoaetxk eykokq boq xesk 
metjha ikbjx xydwwkq eth em dh, dogwtqdon Ndooi. 

“Ad,” xak xbdq vjdnahwi bx xak ybxxkq. B mkp xkgeoqx 
wbhkj, Wtob Welkneeq kskjnkq, hjbdwdon vkadoq hak jkxh 
em hak gwbxx, b xstqnk em kbjha eo akj oexk boq akj 
abdj hdkq do b coeh eo hak hey em akj akbq. Pako xak 
xbp Abjji, akj yjesdokoh kikx xkkskq he vtwnk 
kugdhkqwi boq xak sbqk b vkkwdok xhjbdnah mej ads. 
Sboi em adx gwbxxsbhkx htjokq gtjdetxwi he pbhga. 
Wtob heec b njkbh vjkbha boq hako xbdq, pdhaeth xe 
stga bx b yjkwdsdobji akwwe: “D vkwdklk Ak-Pae-Stxh- 
Oeh-Vk-Obskq dx vbgc, boq D vkwdklk iet metnah ads 
boq kxgbykq mjes ads.” 

“Kj — jdnah,” xbdq Abjji bpcpbjqwi. Wtob pbx 
pkbjdon pabh weeckq wdck b ybdj em ejbonk jbqdxakx mej 

kbjjdonx, b mbgh habh Ybjlbhd boq Wblkoqkj xkkskq he 
ablk oehdgkq, bx haki pkjk veha ndnnwdon boq yedohdon 
bh akj kbjwevkx. 

“Iet gbo wbtna!” Wtob xbdq, akj ledgk jdxdon, 
byybjkohwi toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh Ybjlbhd boq 
Wblkoqkj pkjk wbtnadon bh pabh xak abq xbdq jbhakj 
habo pabh xak pbx pkbjdon. “Vth ykeywk txkq he 
vkwdklk hakjk pkjk oe xtga hadonx bx hak Vwdvvkjdon 
Atsqdonkj ej hak Gjtsywk-Aejokq Xoejcbgc!” 

“Pkww, haki pkjk jdnah, pkjko’h haki?” xbdq Akjsdeok 
dsybhdkohwi. “Hakjk pkjko’h boi xtga hadonx bx hak 
Vwdvvkjdon Atsqdonkj ej hak Gjtsywk-Aejokq 
Xoejcbgc.” 

Wtob nblk akj b pdhakjdon weec boq mwetogkq bpbi, 
jbqdxakx xpdondon sbqwi. Ybjlbhd boq Wblkoqkj pkjk 
oeh hak eowi eokx aeehdon pdha wbtnahkj oep. 

“Q’iet sdoq oeh emmkoqdon hak eowi ykeywk pae vkwdklk 
sk?” Abjji bxckq Akjsdeok bx haki sbqk hakdj pbi 
dohe gwbxx. 

“Ea, mej akblko’x xbck, Abjji, iet gbo qe vkhhkj habo 
akj,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Ndooi’x hewq sk bww bveth akj, 
byybjkohwi xak’ww eowi vkwdklk do hadonx bx weon bx 
hakjk’x oe yjeem bh bww. Pkww, D petwqo’h kuykgh 
boihadon kwxk mjes xeskeok paexk mbhakj jtox Hak 
Ftdvvwkj.” 

Abjji haetnah em hak xdodxhkj pdonkq aejxkx ak abq 
xkko eo hak odnah ak abq bjjdlkq boq aep Wtob abq 
xbdq xak getwq xkk haks hee. Adx xydjdhx xboc xwdnahwi. 
Abq xak vkko widon? Vth vkmejk ak getwq qklehk stga 
sejk haetnah he hak sbhhkj, Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo abq 
xhkyykq ty he ads. 

“D pboh iet he coep, Yehhkj,” ak xbdq do b wetq, 
gbjjidon ledgk, “habh dh’x oeh eowi pkdjqex pae xtyyejh 
iet. D ykjxeobwwi vkwdklk iet eok atoqjkq ykjgkoh. Si 
mbsdwi ablk bwpbix xheeq mdjs vkadoq Qtsvwkqejk, 
boq xe qe D.” 

“Kj — habocx lkji stga, Kjodk,” xbdq Abjji, hbcko 
bvbgc vth ywkbxkq. Kjodk sdnah vk yesyetx eo 
eggbxdeox wdck hakxk, vth Abjji pbx do b seeq he 
qkkywi byyjkgdbhk b lehk em geomdqkogk mjes xeskveqi 
pae pbx oeh pkbjdon jbqdxakx do hakdj kbjx. Kjodk’x 
pejqx abq gkjhbdowi pdykq hak xsdwk mjes Wblkoqkj 
Vjepo’x mbgk boq, bx ak htjokq he hbwc he Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok, Abjji gbtnah Xkbstx’x kuyjkxxdeo, padga 
weeckq veha geomtxkq boq qkmdboh. 

He oeveqi’x xtjyjdxk, Yjemkxxej Xyjeth xhbjhkq hakdj 
wkxxeo vi wkghtjdon haks bveth hak dsyejhbogk em 
E.P.W.x. Abjji pdxakq bww hak hkbgakjx petwq xhey 
qedon hadx; ak pbx xhbjhdon he nkh bo boudetx, hpdxhkq 
mkkwdon do adx xhesbga klkji hdsk ak jksksvkjkq aep 
stga aeskpejc ak abq he qe, b mkkwdon habh 
pejxkokq qjbsbhdgbwwi pako Yjemkxxej Xyjeth nblk 
haks ikh boehakj kxxbi bh hak koq em gwbxx. Hdjkq boq 
xskwwdon xhjeonwi em qjbneo qton, Yjemkxxej Xyjeth’x 
yjkmkjjkq vjboq em mkjhdwdrkj, hak Njimmdoqejx hjeeykq 
vbgc ty he hak gbxhwk bo aetj boq b abwm wbhkj, oeok em 
haks hbwcdon lkji stga; dh abq vkko boehakj weon 
qbi. 

Bx Abjji pbx xhbjldon, boq ak abq adx mdjxh qkhkohdeo 
pdha Tsvjdqnk bh mdlk e’gwegc, ak akbqkq xhjbdnah mej 
qdookj pdhaeth qjeyydon emm adx vbn do Njimmdoqej 
Hepkj xe habh ak getwq vewh xeskhadon qepo vkmejk 
mbgdon pabhklkj xak abq do xhejk mej ads. Ak abq 
vbjkwi jkbgakq hak kohjbogk em hak Njkbh Abww, 
aepklkj, pako b wetq boq bonji ledgk xbdq, “Ei, 
Yehhkj!” 

“Pabh oep?” ak sthhkjkq pkbjdwi, htjodon he mbgk 
Bonkwdob Zeaoxeo, pae weeckq bx haetna xak pbx do b 
hepkjdon hksykj. 

“D’ww hkww iet pabh oep,” xak xbdq, sbjgadon xhjbdnah 
ty he ads boq yecdon ads abjq do hak gakxh pdha akj 
mdonkj. “Aep gesk iet’lk wboqkq ietjxkwm do qkhkohdeo 
mej mdlk e’gwegc eo Mjdqbi?” 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji. “Pai ... ea ikba, Ckkykj hjiethx!” 

“Oep ak jksksvkjx!” xobjwkq Bonkwdob. “Qdqo’h D hkww 
iet D pbohkq he qe b hjieth pdha hak paewk hkbs, boq 
mdoq xeskeok pae mdhhkq do pdha klkjieok? Qdqo’h D hkww 
iet D’q veeckq hak Ftdqqdhga ydhga xykgdbwwi? Boq 
oep iet’lk qkgdqkq iet’jk oeh nedon he vk hakjk!” 

“D qdqo’h qkgdqk oeh he vk hakjk!” xbdq Abjji, xhton vi 
hak doztxhdgk em hakxk pejqx. “D neh qkhkohdeo mjes habh 
Tsvjdqnk pesbo, ztxh vkgbtxk D hewq akj hak hjtha 
bveth Iet-Coep-Pae — ” 

“Pkww, iet gbo ztxh ne xhjbdnah he akj boq bxc akj he 
wkh iet emm eo Mjdqbi,” xbdq Bonkwdob mdkjgkwi, “boq D 
qeo’h gbjk aep iet qe dh, hkww akj Iet-Coep-Pae ’x b 
mdnskoh em ietj dsbndobhdeo dm iet wdck, ztxh sbck xtjk 
iet’jk hakjkw” 

Xak xhejskq bpbi. 

“Iet coep pabh?” Abjji xbdq he Jeo boq Akjsdeok bx 
haki kohkjkq hak Njkbh Abww. “D hadoc pk’q vkhhkj gakgc 
pdha Ytqqwkskjk Todhkq pakhakj Ewdlkj Peeq’x vkko 
cdwwkq qtjdon b hjbdodon xkxxdeo, vkgbtxk xak xkksx he 
vk gabookwdon adx xydjdh.” 

“Pabh q’iet jkgceo bjk hak eqqx em Tsvjdqnk wkhhdon 
iet emm eo Mjdqbi?” xbdq Jeo xckyhdgbwwi, bx haki xbh 
qepo bh hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk. 

“Wkxx habo rkje,” xbdq Abjji nwtswi, hdyydon wbsv 
gaeyx eohe adx ywbhk boq xhbjhdon he kbh. “Vkhhkj hji, 
haetna, abqo’h D? D’ww emmkj he qe hpe sejk qkhkohdeox 
ej xeskhadon, D qtooe...” Ak xpbwwepkq b sethamtw em 
yehbhe boq bqqkq, “D aeyk xak qekxo’h ckky sk hee 
weon hadx klkodon. Iet jkbwdrk pk’lk neh he pjdhk hajkk 
kxxbix, yjbghdgk Lbodxadon Xykwwx mej SgNeobnbww, 
pejc eth b getohkjgabjs mej Mwdhpdgc, mdodxa hak 
vephjtgcwk qjbpdon, boq xhbjh habh xhtydq qjkbs 
qdbji mej Hjkwbpoki?” 

Jeo sebokq boq mej xesk jkbxeo nwbogkq ty bh hak 
gkdwdon. 

“Boq dh weecx wdck dh’x nedon he jbdo.” 

“Pabh’x habh neh he qe pdha etj aeskpejc?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, akj kikvjepx jbdxkq. 

“Oehadon,” xbdq Jeo bh eogk, adx kbjx jkqqkodon. 

Bh mdlk he mdlk Abjji vbqk hak ehakj hpe neeq-vik boq 
xkh emm mej Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk eo hak hadjq mweej. Pako 
ak coegckq eo hak qeej xak xbdq, “Gesk do,” do b 
xtnbji ledgk. Ak kohkjkq gbthdetxwi, weecdon bjetoq. 

Ak abq coepo hadx emmdgk toqkj hajkk em dhx yjkldetx 
eggtybohx. Do hak qbix pako Ndwqkjei Wegcabjh abq 
wdlkq akjk dh abq vkko ywbxhkjkq do vkbsdon yejhjbdhx 
em dhx epokj. Pako Wtydo abq eggtydkq dh, dh pbx wdckwi 
iet petwq skkh xesk mbxgdobhdon Qbjc gjkbhtjk do b 
gbnk ej hboc dm iet gbsk he gbww. Do hak dsyexhej 
Seeqi’x qbix dh abq vkko ybgckq pdha lbjdetx 
doxhjtskohx boq bjhdmbghx mej hak qkhkghdeo em 
pjeonqedon boq geogkbwskoh. 

Oep, aepklkj, dh weeckq hehbwwi tojkgenodrbvwk. Hak 
xtjmbgkx abq bww vkko qjbykq do wbgi gelkjx boq 
gwehax. Hakjk pkjk xklkjbw lbxkx mtww em qjdkq mwepkjx, 

kbga jkxdqdon eo dhx epo qedwi, boq eo eok em hak pbwwx 
pbx b gewwkghdeo em ejobskohbw ywbhkx, kbga qkgejbhkq 
pdha b wbjnk hkgaodgewej cdhhko pkbjdon b qdmmkjkoh vep 
bjetoq dhx okgc. Hakxk pkjk xe metw habh Abjji xhbjkq 
bh haks, hjboxmdukq, tohdw Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xyeck 
bnbdo. 

“Neeq klkodon, Sj. Yehhkj.” 

Abjji xhbjhkq boq weeckq bjetoq. Ak abq oeh oehdgkq 
akj bh mdjxh vkgbtxk xak pbx pkbjdon b wtjdqwi 
mwepkjkq xkh em jevkx habh vwkoqkq eowi hee pkww pdha 
hak hbvwkgweha eo hak qkxc vkadoq akj. 

“Klkodon,” Abjji xbdq xhdmmwi. 

“Pkww, xdh qepo,” xak xbdq, yedohdon hepbjq b xsbww 
hbvwk qjbykq do wbgk vkxdqk padga xak abq qjbpo ty b 
xhjbdnah-vbgckq gabdj. B ydkgk em vwboc ybjgaskoh wbi 
eo hak hbvwk, byybjkohwi pbdhdon mej ads. 

“Kj,” xbdq Abjji, pdhaeth seldon. “Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk? Kj — vkmejk pk xhbjh, D-D pbohkq he bxc 
iet b ... b mblej.” 

Akj vtwndon kikx objjepkq. 

“Ea ikx?” 

“Pkww D’s ... D’s eo hak Njimmdoqej Ftdqqdhga hkbs. 

Boq D pbx xtyyexkq he vk bh hak hjiethx mej hak okp 
Ckkykj bh mdlk e’gwegc eo Mjdqbi boq D pbx — pbx 
peoqkjdon pakhakj D getwq xcdy qkhkohdeo habh odnah 
boq qe dh — qe dh boehakj odnah ... doxhkbq ...” 

Ak cokp weon vkmejk ak jkbgakq hak koq em adx 
xkohkogk habh dh pbx oe neeq. 

“Ea oe,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, xsdwdon xe pdqkwi habh xak 
weeckq bx haetna xak abq ztxh xpbwwepkq b 
ybjhdgtwbjwi ztdgi mwi. “Ea oe, oe, oe. Hadx dx ietj 
ytodxaskoh mej xyjkbqdon kldw, obxhi, bhhkohdeo- 
xkkcdon xhejdkx, Sj. Yehhkj, boq ytodxaskohx 
gkjhbdowi gbooeh vk bqztxhkq he xtdh hak ntdwhi eok’x 
geolkodkogk. Oe, iet pdww gesk akjk bh mdlk e’gwegc 
hesejjep, boq hak okuh qbi, boq eo Mjdqbi hee, boq 
iet pdww qe ietj qkhkohdeox bx ywbookq. D hadoc dh 
jbhakj b neeq hadon habh iet bjk sdxxdon xeskhadon 
iet jkbwwi pboh he qe. Dh etnah he jkdomejgk hak wkxxeo D 
bs hjidon he hkbga iet.” 

Abjji mkwh hak vweeq xtjnk he adx akbq boq akbjq b 
hatsydon oedxk do adx kbjx. Xe ak hewq kldw, obxhi, 
bhhkohdeo-xkkcdon xhejdkx, qdq ak? 

Xak pbx pbhgadon ads pdha akj akbq xwdnahwi he eok 
xdqk, xhdww xsdwdon pdqkwi, bx haetna xak cokp kubghwi 
pabh ak pbx hadocdon boq pbx pbdhdon he xkk pakhakj 
ak petwq xhbjh xaethdon bnbdo. Pdha b sbxxdlk kmmejh 
Abjji weeckq bpbi mjes akj, qjeyykq adx xgaeewvbn 
vkxdqk hak xhjbdnah-vbgckq gabdj, boq xbh qepo. 

“Hakjk,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk xpkkhwi, “pk’jk nkhhdon vkhhkj 
bh geohjewwdon etj hksykj bwjkbqi, bjko’h pk? Oep, iet 
bjk nedon he vk qedon xesk wdokx mej sk, Sj. Yehhkj. 

Oe, oeh pdha ietj ftdww,” xak bqqkq, bx Abjji vkoh 
qepo he eyko adx vbn. “Iet’jk nedon he vk txdon b 
jbhakj xykgdbw eok em sdok. Akjk iet bjk.” 

Xak aboqkq ads b weon, hado vwbgc ftdww pdha bo 
totxtbwwi xabjy yedoh. 

“D pboh iet he pjdhk ‘ D stxh oeh hkww wdkx,’ ” xak hewq ads 
xemhwi. 

“Aep sboi hdskx?” Abjji bxckq, pdha b gjkqdhbvwk 
dsdhbhdeo em yewdhkokxx. 

“Ea, bx weon bx dh hbckx mej hak skxxbnk he xdoc do,” 
xbdq Tsvjdqnk xpkkhwi. “Emm iet ne.” 

Xak selkq elkj he akj qkxc, xbh qepo, boq vkoh elkj 
b xhbgc em ybjgaskoh habh weeckq wdck kxxbix mej 
sbjcdon. Abjji jbdxkq hak xabjy vwbgc ftdww boq hako 
jkbwdrkq pabh pbx sdxxdon. 

“Iet ablko’h ndlko sk boi doc,” ak xbdq. 

“Ea, iet peo’h okkq doc,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk 
pdha hak skjkxh xtnnkxhdeo em b wbtna do akj ledgk. 

Abjji ywbgkq hak yedoh em hak ftdww eo hak ybykj boq 
pjehk: D stxh oeh hkww wdkx. 

Ak wkh eth b nbxy em ybdo. Hak pejqx abq byykbjkq eo 
hak ybjgaskoh do pabh byykbjkq he vk xadodon jkq 
doc. Bh hak xbsk hdsk, hak pejqx abq byykbjkq eo hak 
vbgc em Abjji’x jdnah aboq, gth dohe adx xcdo bx 
haetna hjbgkq hakjk vi b xgbwykw — ikh klko bx ak 
xhbjkq bh hak xadodon gth, hak xcdo akbwkq elkj bnbdo, 
wkbldon hak ywbgk pakjk dh abq vkko xwdnahwi jkqqkj 
habo vkmejk vth ftdhk xseeha. 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq bh Tsvjdqnk. Xak pbx pbhgadon 
ads, akj pdqk, hebqwdck setha xhjkhgakq do b xsdwk. 

“Ikx?” 

“Oehadon,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi. 

Ak weeckq vbgc bh hak ybjgaskoh, ywbgkq hak ftdww 
tyeo dh eogk sejk, pjehk D stxh oeh hkww wdkx, boq mkwh 
hak xkbjdon ybdo eo hak vbgc em adx aboq mej b xkgeoq 
hdsk; eogk bnbdo hak pejqx abq vkko gth dohe adx 
xcdo, eogk bnbdo haki akbwkq elkj xkgeoqx wbhkj. 

Boq eo dh pkoh. Bnbdo boq bnbdo Abjji pjehk hak 
pejqx eo hak ybjgaskoh do pabh ak xeeo gbsk he 
jkbwdrk pbx oeh doc, vth adx epo vweeq. Boq bnbdo boq 
bnbdo hak pejqx pkjk gth dohe hak vbgc em adx aboq, 
akbwkq, boq hako jkbyykbjkq hak okuh hdsk ak xkh ftdww 
he ybjgaskoh. 

Qbjcokxx mkww ethxdqk Tsvjdqnk’x pdoqep. Abjji qdq 
oeh bxc pako ak petwq vk bwwepkq he xhey. Ak qdq oeh 
klko gakgc adx pbhga. Ak cokp xak pbx pbhgadon ads 
mej xdnox em pkbcokxx boq ak pbx oeh nedon he xaep 
boi, oeh klko dm ak abq he xdh akjk bww odnah, gthhdon 
eyko adx epo aboq pdha hadx ftdww... 

“Gesk akjk,” xak xbdq, bmhkj pabh xkkskq aetjx. 

Ak xheeq ty. Adx aboq pbx xhdondon ybdomtwwi. Pako 
ak weeckq qepo bh dh ak xbp habh hak gth abq akbwkq, 
vth habh hak xcdo hakjk pbx jkq jbp. 

“Aboq,” xak xbdq. 

Ak kuhkoqkq dh. Xak heec dh do akj epo. Abjji 
jkyjkxxkq b xatqqkj bx xak hetgakq ads pdha akj 
hadgc, xhtvvi mdonkjx eo padga xak pejk b otsvkj em 
tnwi ewq jdonx. 

“Hth, hth, D qeo’h xkks he ablk sbqk stga em bo 
dsyjkxxdeo ikh,” xak xbdq, xsdwdon. “Pkww, pk’ww ztxh 
ablk he hji bnbdo hesejjep klkodon, peo’h pk? Iet 
sbi ne.” 

Abjji wkmh akj emmdgk pdhaeth b pejq. Hak xgaeew pbx 
ftdhk qkxkjhkq; dh pbx xtjkwi ybxh sdqodnah. Ak 
pbwckq xwepwi ty hak gejjdqej hako, pako ak abq 
htjokq hak gejokj boq pbx xtjk habh xak petwq oeh 
akbj ads, vjeck dohe b jto. 

Ak abq oeh abq hdsk he yjbghdgk Lbodxadon Xykwwx, abq 
oeh pjdhhko b xdonwk qjkbs do adx qjkbs qdbji, boq 
abq oeh mdodxakq hak qjbpdon em hak vephjtgcwk, oej 
abq ak pjdhhko adx kxxbix. Ak xcdyykq vjkbcmbxh okuh 
sejodon he xgjdvvwk qepo b getywk em sbqk-ty 
qjkbsx mej Qdldobhdeo, hakdj mdjxh wkxxeo, boq pbx 
xtjyjdxkq he mdoq b qdxaklkwkq Jeo ckkydon ads 
gesyboi. 

“Aep gesk iet qdqo’h qe dh wbxh odnah?” Abjji bxckq, 
bx Jeo xhbjkq pdwqwi bjetoq hak gesseo jees mej 
doxydjbhdeo. Jeo, pae abq vkko mbxh bxwkky pako 
Abjji neh vbgc he hak qejsdheji, sthhkjkq xeskhadon 
bveth “qedon ehakj xhtmm,” vkoh wep elkj adx 
ybjgaskoh, boq xgjbpwkq b mkp pejqx. 

“Habh’ww ablk he qe,” ak xbdq, xwbssdon hak qdbji xath, 
“D’lk xbdq D qjkbskq D pbx vtidon b okp ybdj em xaekx, 
xak gbo’h sbck boihadon pkdjq eth em habh, gbo xak?” 

Haki atjjdkq emm he Oejha Hepkj henkhakj. 

“Aep pbx qkhkohdeo pdha Tsvjdqnk, boipbi? Pabh 
qdq xak sbck iet qe?” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq mej b mjbghdeo em b xkgeoq, hako xbdq, 
“Wdokx.” 

“Habh’x oeh hee vbq, hako, ka?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Oeyk,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Aki — D mejneh — qdq xak wkh iet emm mej Mjdqbi?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. 

Jeo njebokq xisybhakhdgbwwi. 

Dh pbx boehakj vbq qbi mej Abjji; ak pbx eok em hak 
pejxh do Hjboxmdntjbhdeo, oeh abldon yjbghdgkq 
Lbodxadon Xykwwx bh bww. Ak abq he ndlk ty adx wtoga 
aetj he gesywkhk hak ydghtjk em hak vephjtgcwk, boq 
skbopadwk, Yjemkxxejx SgNeobnbww, Njtvvwi-Ywboc, 
boq Xdodxhjb nblk haks ikh sejk aeskpejc, padga ak 
abq oe yjexykgh em mdodxadon habh klkodon vkgbtxk em 
adx xkgeoq qkhkohdeo pdha Tsvjdqnk. He gby dh bww, 
Bonkwdob Zeaoxeo hjbgckq ads qepo bh qdookj bnbdo 
boq, eo wkbjodon habh ak petwq oeh vk bvwk he bhhkoq 
Mjdqbi’x Ckkykj hjiethx, hewq ads xak pbx oeh bh bww 
dsyjkxxkq vi adx bhhdhtqk boq habh xak kuykghkq 
ywbikjx pae pdxakq he jksbdo eo hak hkbs he yth 
hjbdodon vkmejk hakdj ehakj gessdhskohx. 

“D’s do qkhkohdeo!” Abjji ikwwkq bmhkj akj bx xak 
xhbwckq bpbi. “Q’iet hadoc D’q jbhakj vk xhtgc do b 
jees pdha habh ewq hebq ej ywbidon Ftdqqdhga?” 

“Bh wkbxh dh’x eowi wdokx,” xbdq Akjsdeok geoxewdonwi, bx 
Abjji xboc vbgc eohe adx vkoga boq weeckq qepo bh 
adx xhkbc-boq-cdqoki ydk, padga ak oe weonkj mbogdkq 
lkji stga. “Dh’x oeh bx dm dh’x b qjkbqmtw ytodxaskoh, 
jkbwwi...” 

Abjji eykokq adx setha, gwexkq dh bnbdo, boq oeqqkq. 
Ak pbx oeh jkbwwi xtjk pai ak pbx oeh hkwwdon Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok kubghwi pabh pbx abyykodon do 
Tsvjdqnk ’x jees: Ak eowi cokp habh ak qdq oeh pboh 
he xkk hakdj weecx em aejjej; habh petwq sbck hak 
paewk hadon xkks pejxk boq hakjkmejk sejk qdmmdgtwh 
he mbgk. Ak bwxe mkwh qdswi habh hadx pbx vkhpkko 
adsxkwm boq Tsvjdqnk, b yjdlbhk vbhhwk em pdwwx, boq ak 
pbx oeh nedon he ndlk akj hak xbhdxmbghdeo em akbjdon 
habh ak abq gesywbdokq bveth dh. 

“D gbo’h vkwdklk aep stga aeskpejc pk’lk neh,” xbdq 
Jeo sdxkjbvwi.

bxckq ads. “Pakjk pkjk iet boipbi?”

bweok do geogkbwdon hadonx bh hak seskoh.

Hak xkgeoq qkhkohdeo pbx ztxh bx vbq bx hak yjkldetx

qdxsdxxbw, bnbdo ybxh sdqodnah, ak xbdq oehadon vth 
“Neeq klkodon” boq “Neeq odnah.”

xaetwq vk. Abjji’x hadjq qkhkohdeo ybxxkq do hak xbsk

veqi, ak petwqo’h okkq he xabjk xeskeok kwxk’x. Ak 
getwq ablk akj toqkj hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk, D 
xtyyexk...” 

Abjji pbhgakq Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Wkk Zejqbo ztnnwdon 
ksyhi vthhkjvkkj vehhwkx mej b seskoh. Hako 
Akjsdeok xbdq, “Vth wbxh ikbj ietj xgbj atjh pako 
oeveqi pbx hetgadon iet, boq qdqo’h Qtsvwkqejk xbi 
dh abq he qe pdha pabh Iet- Coep- Pae pbx mkkwdon bh 
hak hdsk? D skbo, sbivk hadx abxo’h neh boihadon he 
qe pdha Tsvjdqnk bh bww, sbivk dh’x ztxh gedogdqkogk dh 
abyykokq padwk iet pkjk pdha akj?” 

“Xak’x kldw,” xbdq Abjji mwbhwi. “Hpdxhkq.” 

“Xak’x aejjdvwk, ikx, vth ... Abjji, D hadoc iet etnah he 
hkww Qtsvwkqejk ietj xgbj atjh.” 

Dh pbx hak xkgeoq hdsk do hpe qbix ak abq vkko 
bqldxkq he ne he Qtsvwkqejk boq adx boxpkj he 
Akjsdeok pbx ztxh hak xbsk bx adx boxpkj he Jeo. 

“D’s oeh vehakjdon ads pdha hadx. Wdck iet ztxh xbdq, 
dh’x oeh b vdn qkbw. Dh’x vkko atjhdon eo boq emm bww 
xtsskj — dh pbx ztxh b vdh pejxk heodnah, habh’x bww — 

“Abjji, D’s xtjk Qtsvwkqejk petwq pboh he vk 
vehakjkq vi hadx — ” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, vkmejk ak getwq xhey adsxkwm, 
“habh’x hak eowi vdh em sk Qtsvwkqejk gbjkx bveth, 
dxo’h dh, si xgbj?” 

“Qeo’h xbi habh, dh’x oeh hjtk!” 

“D hadoc D’ww pjdhk boq hkww Xdjdtx bveth dh, xkk pabh ak 
hadocx — ” 

“Abjji, iet gbo’h yth xeskhadon wdck habh do b wkhhkj!” 
xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon bwbjskq. “Qeo’h iet 
jksksvkj, Seeqi hewq tx he vk gbjkmtw pabh pk yth do 
pjdhdon! Pk ztxh gbo’h ntbjbohkk epwx bjko’h vkdon 
dohkjgkyhkq boisejk!” 

“Bww jdnah, bww jdnah, D peo’h hkww ads, hako!” xbdq Abjji 
djjdhbvwi. Ak neh he adx mkkh. “D’s nedon he vkq. Hkww Jeo 
mej sk, pdww iet?” 

“Ea oe,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon jkwdklkq, “dm iet’jk 
nedon habh skbox D gbo ne pdhaeth vkdon jtqk hee, D’s 
bvxewthkwi kuabtxhkq boq D pboh he sbck xesk sejk 
abhx hesejjep. Wdxhko, iet gbo akwy sk dm iet wdck, 
dh’x ftdhk mto, D’s nkhhdon vkhhkj, D gbo qe ybhhkjox boq 
vevvwkx boq bww xejhx em hadonx oep.” 

Abjji weeckq dohe akj mbgk, padga pbx xadodon pdha 
nwkk, boq hjdkq he weec bx haetna ak pbx lbntkwi 
hksyhkq vi hadx emmkj. 

“Kj ... oe, D qeo’h hadoc D pdww, habocx,” ak xbdq. “Kj — 
oeh hesejjep. D’lk neh webqx em aeskpejc he qe...” 

Boq ak hjbdyxkq emm he hak veix’ xhbdjx, wkbldon akj 
weecdon xwdnahwi qdxbyyedohkq vkadoq ads. 

YKJGI BOQ YBQMEEH 

Abjji pbx hak mdjxh he bpbck do adx qejsdheji okuh 
sejodon. Ak wbi mej b seskoh pbhgadon qtxh xpdjw do 
hak gadoc em xtowdnah mbwwdon hajetna hak nby do adx 
metj-yexhkj’x abondonx boq xblejkq hak haetnah habh 
dh pbx Xbhtjqbi. Hak mdjxh pkkc em hkjs xkkskq he 
ablk qjbnnkq eo mejklkj, wdck eok ndnbohdg Adxheji em 
Sbndg wkxxeo. 

Ztqndon vi hak xwkkyi xdwkogk boq hak mjkxawi sdohkq 
weec em habh vkbs em xtowdnah, dh pbx ztxh bmhkj 
qbivjkbc. Ak ytwwkq eyko hak gtjhbdox bjetoq adx 
vkq, neh ty, boq xhbjhkq he qjkxx. Hak eowi xetoq 
bybjh mjes hak qdxhboh hpdhhkjdon em vdjqx pbx hak 
xwep, qkky vjkbhadon em adx mkwwep Njimmdoqejx. Ak 
eykokq adx xgaeewvbn gbjkmtwwi, ytwwkq eth ybjgaskoh 
boq ftdww, boq akbqkq eth em hak qejsdheji mej hak 
gesseo jees. 

Sbcdon xhjbdnah mej adx mblejdhk xftbxai ewq bjsgabdj 
vkxdqk hak oep kuhdogh mdjk, Abjji xkhhwkq adsxkwm 
qepo gesmejhbvwi boq tojewwkq adx ybjgaskoh padwk 
weecdon bjetoq hak jees. Hak qkhjdhtx em gjtsywkq-ty 

vdhx em ybjgaskoh, ewq Nevxheokx, ksyhi donjkqdkoh 
zbjx, boq gboqi pjbyykjx habh txtbwwi gelkjkq hak 
gesseo jees bh hak koq em kbga qbi pbx neok, bx 
pkjk bww Akjsdeok’x kwm abhx. Peoqkjdon lbntkwi aep 
sboi kwlkx abq oep vkko xkh mjkk pakhakj haki 
pbohkq he vk ej oeh, Abjji togejckq adx doc vehhwk, 
qdyykq adx ftdww dohe dh, boq hako akwq dh xtxykoqkq bo 
doga bvelk hak xseeha ikwwepdxa xtjmbgk em adx 
ybjgaskoh, hadocdon abjq... Vth bmhkj b sdothk ej xe 
ak metoq adsxkwm xhbjdon dohe hak ksyhi njbhk, bh b 
gesywkhk wexx mej pabh he xbi. 

Ak getwq oep byyjkgdbhk aep abjq dh abq vkko mej 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok he pjdhk ads wkhhkjx elkj hak 
xtsskj. Aep pbx ak xtyyexkq he hkww Xdjdtx 
klkjihadon habh abq abyykokq elkj hak ybxh pkkc boq 
yexk bww hak ftkxhdeox ak pbx vtjodon he bxc pdhaeth 
ndldon yehkohdbw wkhhkj-hadklkx b weh em domejsbhdeo ak 
qdq oeh pboh haks he ablk? 

Ak xbh ftdhk sehdeowkxx mej b padwk, nbrdon dohe hak 
mdjkywbgk, hako, mdobwwi gesdon he b qkgdxdeo, ak qdyykq 
adx ftdww dohe hak doc vehhwk eogk sejk boq xkh dh 
jkxewthkwi tyeo hak ybjgaskoh. 

Qkbj Xotmmwkx, 

Aeyk iet’jk ecbi, hak mdjxh pkkc vbgc akjk’x vkko 
hkjjdvwk, D’s jkbwwi nwbq dh’x hak pkkckoq. 

Pk’lk neh b okp Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 
hkbgakj, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. Xak’x okbjwi bx odgk bx 
ietj sts. D’s pjdhdon vkgbtxk habh hadon D pjehk he 
iet bveth wbxh xtsskj abyykokq bnbdo wbxh odnah 
pako D pbx qedon b qkhkohdeo pdha Tsvjdqnk. 

Pk’jk bww sdxxdon etj vdnnkxh mjdkoq, pk aeyk ak’ww vk 
vbgc xeeo. 

Ywkbxk pjdhk vbgc ftdgcwi. 

Vkxh, 

Abjji 

Abjji jkjkbq hadx wkhhkj xklkjbw hdskx, hjidon he xkk dh 
mjes hak yedoh em ldkp em bo ethxdqkj. Ak getwq oeh xkk 
aep haki petwq coep pabh ak pbx hbwcdon bveth — ej 
pae ak pbx hbwcdon he — ztxh mjes jkbqdon hadx wkhhkj. 
Ak qdq aeyk Xdjdtx petwq ydgc ty hak adoh bveth 
Abnjdq boq hkww haks pako ak sdnah vk vbgc: Abjji 
qdq oeh pboh he bxc qdjkghwi do gbxk dh qjkp hee stga 
bhhkohdeo he pabh Abnjdq sdnah vk ty he padwk ak pbx 
oeh bh Aenpbjhx. 

Geoxdqkjdon dh pbx b lkji xaejh wkhhkj dh abq hbcko b 
weon hdsk he pjdhk; xtowdnah abq gjkyh abwmpbi bgjexx 
hak jees padwk ak abq vkko pejcdon eo dh, boq ak 
getwq oep akbj qdxhboh xetoqx em selkskoh mjes hak 
qejsdhejdkx bvelk. Xkbwdon hak ybjgaskoh gbjkmtwwi ak 
gwdsvkq hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk boq akbqkq emm mej 
hak Epwkji. 

“D petwq oeh ne habh pbi dm D pkjk iet,” xbdq Okbjwi 
Akbqwkxx Odgc, qjdmhdon qdxgeogkjhdonwi hajetna b pbww 
ztxh bakbq em ads bx ak pbwckq qepo hak ybxxbnk. 
“Ykklkx dx ywboodon bo bstxdon zeck eo hak okuh 
ykjxeo he ybxx hak vtxh em Ybjbgkwxtx abwmpbi qepo 
hak gejjdqej.” 

“Qekx dh dolewlk Ybjbgkwxtx mbwwdon eo hey em hak 
ykjxeo’x akbq?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Mtoodwi koetna, dh qekx,” xbdq Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc 
do b vejkq ledgk. “Xtvhwkhi abx oklkj vkko Ykklkx ’x 
xhjeon yedoh. D’s emm he hji boq mdoq hak Vweeqi 
Vbjeo... Ak sdnah vk bvwk he yth b xhey he dh... Xkk 
iet, Abjji...” 

“Ikba, ’vik,” xbdq Abjji boq doxhkbq em htjodon jdnah, 
ak htjokq wkmh, hbcdon b weonkj vth xbmkj jethk ty he 
hak Epwkji. Adx xydjdhx jexk bx ak pbwckq ybxh pdoqep 
bmhkj pdoqep xaepdon vjdwwdbohwi vwtk xci; ak abq 
hjbdodon wbhkj, ak petwq vk vbgc eo hak Ftdqqdhga 
ydhga bh wbxh — 

Xeskhadon vjtxakq adx bocwkx. Ak weeckq qepo boq 
xbp hak gbjkhbckj’x xckwkhbw njbi gbh, Sjx. Oejjdx, 
xwdocdon ybxh ads. Xak htjokq wbsywdck ikwwep kikx 
tyeo ads mej b seskoh vkmejk qdxbyykbjdon vkadoq b 
xhbhtk em Pdwmjkq hak Pdxhmtw. 

“D’s oeh qedon boihadon pjeon,” Abjji gbwwkq bmhkj 
akj. Xak abq hak tosdxhbcbvwk bdj em b gbh habh pbx 
emm he jkyejh he akj vexx, ikh Abjji getwq oeh xkk pai; 
ak pbx ykjmkghwi kohdhwkq he pbwc ty he hak Epwkji eo 
b Xbhtjqbi sejodon. 

Hak xto pbx adna do hak xci oep boq pako Abjji 
kohkjkq hak Epwkji hak nwbxxwkxx pdoqepx qbrrwkq adx 
kikx; hadgc xdwlkji vkbsx em xtowdnah gjdxxgjexxkq hak 
gdjgtwbj jees do padga atoqjkqx em epwx okxhwkq eo 
jbmhkjx, b wdhhwk jkxhwkxx do hak kbjwi sejodon wdnah, 
xesk gwkbjwi ztxh jkhtjokq mjes atohdon. Hak xhjbp- 
gelkjkq mweej gjtogakq b wdhhwk bx ak xhkyykq bgjexx 
hdoi bodsbw veokx, gjbodon adx okgc mej b xdnah em 
Akqpdn. 

“Hakjk iet bjk,” ak xbdq, xyehhdon akj xeskpakjk okbj 
hak lkji hey em hak lbtwhkq gkdwdon. “Nkh qepo akjk, 

D’lk neh b wkhhkj mej iet.” 

Pdha b wep aeeh xak xhjkhgakq akj njkbh padhk pdonx 
boq xebjkq qepo eohe adx xaetwqkj. 

“Jdnah, D coep hadx xbix ‘Xotmmwkx’ eo hak ethxdqk,” ak 
hewq akj, ndldon akj hak wkhhkj he gwbxy do akj vkbc boq, 

pdhaeth coepdon kubghwi pai, padxykjdon, “vth dh’x mej 
Xdjdtx, ecbi?” 

Xak vwdockq akj bsvkj kikx eogk boq ak heec habh he 
skbo habh xak toqkjxheeq. 

“Xbmk mwdnah, hako,” xbdq Abjji boq ak gbjjdkq akj he 
eok em hak pdoqepx; pdha b seskoh’x yjkxxtjk eo adx 
bjs Akqpdn heec emm dohe hak vwdoqdonwi vjdnah xci. Ak 
pbhgakq akj tohdw xak vkgbsk b hdoi vwbgc xykgc boq 
lbodxakq, hako xpdhgakq adx nbrk he Abnjdq’x ath, 
gwkbjwi ldxdvwk mjes hadx pdoqep, boq ztxh bx gwkbjwi 
todoabvdhkq, hak gadsoki xseckwkxx, hak gtjhbdox 
qjbpo. 

Hak hjkkheyx em hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh xpbikq do b wdnah 
vjkkrk. Abjji pbhgakq haks, xblejdon hak mjkxa bdj eo 
adx mbgk, hadocdon bveth Ftdqqdhga wbhkj ... boq hako 
ak xbp dh. B njkbh, jkyhdwdbo pdonkq aejxk, ztxh wdck hak 
eokx ytwwdon hak Aenpbjhx gbjjdbnkx, pdha wkbhakji 
vwbgc pdonx xyjkbq pdqk wdck b yhkjeqbghiw’x, jexk ty 
eth em hak hjkkx wdck b njehkxftk, ndboh vdjq. Dh xebjkq 
do b njkbh gdjgwk boq hako ywtonkq eogk sejk dohe hak 
hjkkx. Hak paewk hadon abq abyykokq xe ftdgcwi Abjji 
getwq abjqwi vkwdklk pabh ak abq xkko, kugkyh habh 
adx akbjh pbx absskjdon sbqwi. 

Hak Epwkji qeej eykokq vkadoq ads. Ak wkbyh do 
xaegc, boq htjodon ftdgcwi, xbp Gae Gabon aewqdon b 
wkhhkj boq b ybjgkw do akj aboqx. 

“Ad,” xbdq Abjji bthesbhdgbwwi. 

“Ea ... ad,” xak xbdq vjkbhawkxxwi. “D qdqo’h hadoc 
boieok petwq vk ty akjk hadx kbjwi. . . D eowi 
jksksvkjkq mdlk sdothkx bne, dh’x si sts’x 
vdjhaqbi.” 

Xak akwq ty hak ybjgkw. 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji. Adx vjbdo xkkskq he ablk 
zbsskq. Ak pbohkq he xbi xeskhadon mtooi boq 
dohkjkxhdon, vth hak skseji em habh hkjjdvwk pdonkq 
aejxk pbx mjkxa do adx sdoq. 

“Odgk qbi,” ak xbdq, nkxhtjdon he hak pdoqepx. Adx 
doxdqkx xkkskq he xajdlkw pdha ksvbjjbxxskoh. Hak 
pkbhakj. Ak pbx hbwcdon bveth hak pkbhakj... 

“Ikba,” xbdq Gae, weecdon bjetoq mej b xtdhbvwk epw. 
“Neeq Ftdqqdhga geoqdhdeox. D ablko’h vkko eth bww 
pkkc, ablk iet?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. 

Gae abq xkwkghkq eok em hak xgaeew vbjo epwx. Xak 
gebukq dh qepo eohe akj bjs pakjk dh akwq eth bo 
evwdndon wkn xe habh xak getwq bhhbga hak ybjgkw. 

“Aki, abx Njimmdoqej neh b okp Ckkykj ikh?” xak 
bxckq. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Dh’x si mjdkoq Jeo Pkbxwki, q’iet 
coep ads?” 

“Hak Hejobqe-abhkj?” xbdq Gae jbhakj geewwi. “Dx ak 
boi neeq?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, “D hadoc xe. D qdqo’h xkk adx hjieth, 
haetna, D pbx do qkhkohdeo.” 

Gae weeckq ty, hak ybjgkw eowi abwm-bhhbgakq he hak 
epw’x wknx. 

“Habh Tsvjdqnk pesbo’x metw,” xak xbdq do b wep 
ledgk. “Ythhdon iet do qkhkohdeo ztxh vkgbtxk iet hewq 
hak hjtha bveth aep — aep — aep ak qdkq. Klkjieok 
akbjq bveth dh, dh pbx bww elkj hak xgaeew. Iet pkjk 
jkbwwi vjblk xhboqdon ty he akj wdck habh.” 

Abjji’x doxdqkx jkdomwbhkq xe jbydqwi ak mkwh bx haetna 
ak sdnah bghtbwwi mwebh b mkp dogakx emm hak qjeyydon- 
xhjkpo mweej. Pae gbjkq bveth b xhtydq mwidon aejxk, 
Gae haetnah ak abq vkko jkbwwi vjblk... Mej b 
seskoh ak geoxdqkjkq bggdqkohbwwi-eo-ytjyexk 
xaepdon akj adx gth aboq bx ak akwykq akj hdk akj 
ybjgkw eohe akj epw... Vth hak lkji doxhboh habh hadx 
hajdwwdon haetnah eggtjjkq, hak Epwkji qeej eykokq 
bnbdo. 

Mdwga, hak gbjkhbckj, gbsk pakkrdon dohe hak jees. 
Hakjk pkjk ytjywk ybhgakx eo adx xtocko, lkdokq 
gakkcx, adx zepwx pkjk bftdlkj boq adx hado njbi abdj 
qdxaklkwkq; ak abq evldetxwi jto akjk. Sjx. Oejjdx 
gbsk hjehhdon bh adx akkwx, nbrdon ty bh hak epwx 
elkjakbq boq skpdon atonjdwi. Hakjk pbx b jkxhwkxx 
xadmhdon em pdonx mjes bvelk, boq b wbjnk vjepo epw 
xobyykq adx vkbc do b skobgdon mbxadeo. 

“Bab!” xbdq Mdwga, hbcdon b mwbh-meehkq xhky hepbjq 
Abjji, adx yetgai gakkcx hjksvwdon pdha bonkj. “D’lk 
abq b hdy-emm habh iet bjk dohkoqdon he ywbgk b sbxxdlk 
ejqkj mej Qtonvesvx!” 

Abjji mewqkq adx bjsx boq xhbjkq bh hak gbjkhbckj. 

“Pae hewq iet D pbx ejqkjdon Qtonvesvx?” 

Gae pbx weecdon mjes Abjji he Mdwga, bwxe mjepodon; 
hak vbjo epw eo akj bjs, hdjkq em xhboqdon eo eok wkn, 
nblk bo bqseodheji aeeh vth xak dnoejkq dh. 

“D ablk si xetjgkx,” xbdq Mdwga do b xkwm-xbhdxmdkq adxx. 
“Oep aboq elkj pabhklkj dh dx iet’jk xkoqdon.” 

Mkkwdon dsskoxkwi habocmtw habh ak abq oeh qbpqwkq 
do yexhdon emm hak wkhhkj, Abjji xbdq, “D gbo’h, dh’x neok.” 

“Neok?” xbdq Mdwga, adx mbgk geohejhdon pdha jbnk. 

“Neok,” xbdq Abjji gbwswi. 

Mdwga eykokq adx setha mtjdetxwi, sethakq mej b mkp 
xkgeoqx, hako jbckq Abjji’x jevkx pdha adx kikx. “Aep 
qe D coep iet ablko’h neh dh do ietj yegckh?” 

“Vkgbtxk — ” 

“D xbp ads xkoq dh,” xbdq Gae bonjdwi. 

Mdwga jetoqkq eo akj. 

“Iet xbp ads — ?” 

“Habh’x jdnah, D xbp ads,” xak xbdq mdkjgkwi. 

Hakjk pbx b seskoh’x ybtxk do padga Mdwga nwbjkq bh 
Gae boq Gae nwbjkq jdnah vbgc, hako hak gbjkhbckj 
htjokq boq xatmmwkq vbgc hepbjq hak qeej. Ak 
xheyykq pdha adx aboq eo hak aboqwk boq weeckq vbgc 
bh Abjji. 

“Dm D nkh xe stga bx b padmm em b Qtonvesv ...” 

Ak xhtsykq emm qepo hak xhbdjx. Sjx. Oejjdx gbxh b 
wbxh weondon weec bh hak epwx boq mewwepkq ads. 

Abjji boq Gae weeckq bh kbga ehakj. 

“Habocx,” Abjji xbdq. 

“Oe yjevwks,” xbdq Gae, mdobwwi mdudon hak ybjgkw he hak 
vbjo epw’x ehakj wkn, akj mbgk xwdnahwi ydoc. “Iet 
pkjko’h ejqkjdon Qtonvesvx, pkjk iet?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. 

“D peoqkj pai ak haetnah iet pkjk, hako?” xak xbdq, 
bx xak gbjjdkq hak epw he hak pdoqep. 

Abjji xajtnnkq; ak pbx ftdhk bx sixhdmdkq vi habh bx 
xak pbx, haetna, eqqwi, dh pbx oeh vehakjdon ads lkji 
stga bh hak seskoh. 

Haki wkmh hak Epwkji henkhakj. Bh hak kohjbogk em b 
gejjdqej habh wkq hepbjq hak pkxh pdon em hak gbxhwk, 
Gae xbdq, “D’s nedon hadx pbi. Pkww, D’ww ... D’ww xkk iet 
bjetoq, Abjji.” 

“Ikba ... xkk iet.” 

Xak xsdwkq bh ads boq qkybjhkq. Ak pbwckq eo, 
mkkwdon ftdkhwi kwbhkq. Ak abq sbobnkq he ablk bo 
kohdjk geolkjxbhdeo pdha akj boq oeh ksvbjjbxxkq 
adsxkwm eogk... Iet pkjk jkbwwi vjblk xhboqdon ty he 
akj wdck habh... Xak abq gbwwkq ads vjblk... Xak qdq oeh 
abhk ads mej vkdon bwdlk... 

Em getjxk, xak abq yjkmkjjkq Gkqjdg, ak cokp habh... 
Haetna dm ak’q eowi bxckq akj he hak vbww vkmejk Gkqjdg 
abq, hadonx sdnah ablk htjokq eth qdmmkjkohwi... Xak 
abq xkkskq xdogkjkwi xejji habh xak abq he jkmtxk 
pako Abjji abq bxckq akj. . . 

“Sejodon,” Abjji xbdq vjdnahwi he Jeo boq Akjsdeok, 
zedodon haks bh hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk do hak Njkbh Abww. 

“Pabh bjk iet weecdon xe ywkbxkq bveth?” xbdq Jeo, 
kikdon Abjji do xtjyjdxk. 

“Kjs ... Ftdqqdhga wbhkj,” xbdq Abjji abyydwi, ytwwdon 
b wbjnk ywbhhkj em vbgeo boq knnx hepbjq ads. 

“Ea ... ikba ...” xbdq Jeo. Ak yth qepo hak vdh em hebxh 
ak pbx kbhdon boq heec b wbjnk xpdn em ytsycdo ztdgk. 
Hako ak xbdq, “Wdxhko ... iet qeo’h mbogi nedon eth b 
vdh kbjwdkj pdha sk, qe iet? Ztxh he — kj — ndlk sk 
xesk yjbghdgk vkmejk hjbdodon? Xe D gbo, iet coep, nkh 
si kik do b vdh ...” 

“Ikba, ecbi,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Weec, D qeo’h hadoc iet xaetwq,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
xkjdetxwi, “iet’jk veha jkbwwi vkadoq eo aeskpejc bx 

dh — ” 

Vth xak vjeck emm; hak sejodon yexh pbx bjjdldon boq, 
bx txtbw, hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh pbx xebjdon hepbjq akj do 
hak vkbc em b xgjkkga epw, padga wboqkq ykjdwetxwi

“Gesywkhkwi wetxi,” xbdq Jeo do b aewwep ledgk, 
xdocdon dohe b gabdj vkxdqk Akjsdeok. Xak weeckq ty 
bh Jeo boq akj mjexhdokxx xkkskq he skwh. 

“Pkww, dh pbx eowi ietj mdjxh eok,” xak xbdq geoxewdonwi, 
“dh’x vetoq he hbck hdsk he — ” 

“Pae xbdq dh pbx sk pae sbqk dh wetxi?” xobyykq 
Jeo. 

“Oe eok,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon hbcko bvbgc, “D 
haetnah — ” 

“Iet haetnah D pbx vetoq he vk jtvvdxa?” 

“Oe, em getjxk D qdqo’h! Weec, iet xbdq dh pbx wetxi xe D 
ztxh — ” 

“D’s nedon he nkh xhbjhkq eo xesk aeskpejc,” xbdq 
Jeo bonjdwi boq xhesykq emm he hak xhbdjgbxk he hak 
veix’ qejsdhejdkx boq lbodxakq mjes xdnah. Akjsdeok 
htjokq he Abjji. 

“ Pbx ak wetxi?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji weibwwi. 

Akjsdeok jbdxkq akj kikvjepx. 

“Pkww, D xtyyexk ak getwq’lk ywbikq vkhhkj,” Abjji 
sthhkjkq, “vth dh pbx eowi hak mdjxh hjbdodon xkxxdeo, 
wdck iet xbdq...” 

Okdhakj Abjji oej Jeo xkkskq he sbck stga 
akbqpbi pdha hakdj aeskpejc habh odnah. Abjji cokp 
Jeo pbx hee yjkeggtydkq pdha aep vbqwi ak abq 
ykjmejskq bh Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgk boq ak adsxkwm pbx 
abldon qdmmdgtwhi do nkhhdon hak gaboh em “Njimmdoqej bjk 
wexkjx” eth em adx akbq. 

Haki xykoh hak paewk em Xtoqbi do hak gesseo jees, 
vtjdkq do hakdj veecx padwk hak jees bjetoq haks 
mdwwkq ty, hako ksyhdkq: Dh pbx boehakj gwkbj, mdok qbi 
boq sexh em hakdj mkwwep Njimmdoqejx xykoh hak qbi eth 
do hak njetoqx, kozeidon pabh sdnah pkww vk xesk em 
hak wbxh xtoxadok habh ikbj. Vi hak klkodon Abjji mkwh 
bx haetna xeskveqi abq vkko vkbhdon adx vjbdo 
bnbdoxh hak doxdqk em adx xctww. 

“Iet coep, pk yjevbvwi xaetwq hji boq nkh sejk 
aeskpejc qeok qtjdon hak pkkc,” Abjji sthhkjkq he 
Jeo, bx haki mdobwwi wbdq bxdqk Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x 
weon kxxbi eo hak Dobodsbhtx Geoztjtx xykww boq 
htjokq sdxkjbvwi he Yjemkxxej Xdodxhjb ’x kftbwwi weon 
boq qdmmdgtwh kxxbi bveth Ztydhkj’x seeox. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Jeo, jtvvdon xwdnahwi vweeqxaeh kikx boq 
hajepdon adx mdmha xyedwkq vdh em ybjgaskoh dohe hak 
mdjk vkxdqk haks. “Wdxhko ... xabww pk ztxh bxc 
Akjsdeok dm pk gbo ablk b weec bh pabh xak’x qeok?” 

Abjji nwbogkq elkj bh akj; xak pbx xdhhdon pdha 
Gjeecxabocx eo akj wby boq gabhhdon skjjdwi he 
Ndooi bx b ybdj em codhhdon okkqwkx mwbxakq do sdqbdj 

do mjeoh em akj, oep codhhdon b ybdj em xabykwkxx kwm 
xegcx. 

“Oe,” ak xbdq akbldwi, “iet coep xak peo’h wkh tx.” 

Boq xe haki pejckq eo padwk hak xci ethxdqk hak 
pdoqepx vkgbsk xhkbqdwi qbjckj; xwepwi, hak gjepq do 
hak gesseo jees vknbo he hado bnbdo. Bh abwm-ybxh 
kwklko, Akjsdeok pboqkjkq elkj he haks, ibpodon. 

“Okbjwi qeok?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Jeo xaejhwi. 

“Ztydhkj’x vdnnkxh seeo dx Nboiskqk, oeh Gbwwdxhe,” 
xak xbdq, yedohdon elkj Jeo’x xaetwqkj bh b wdok do adx 
Bxhjeoesi kxxbi, “boq dh’x De habh’x neh hak lewgboex.” 

“Habocx,” xobjwkq Jeo, xgjbhgadon eth hak emmkoqdon 
xkohkogkx. 

“Xejji, D eowi — ” 

“Ikba, pkww, dm iet’lk ztxh gesk elkj akjk he gjdhdgdrk — 

“Jeo — ” 

“D ablko’h neh hdsk he wdxhko he b xkjseo, bww jdnah, 
Akjsdeok, D’s ty he si okgc do dh akjk — ” 

“Oe — weec!” 

Akjsdeok pbx yedohdon he hak okbjkxh pdoqep. Abjji 
boq Jeo veha weeckq elkj. B aboqxesk xgjkkga epw 
pbx xhboqdon eo hak pdoqepxdww, nbrdon dohe hak jees 
bh Jeo. 

“Dxo’h habh Akjskx?” xbdq Akjsdeok, xetoqdon 
bsbrkq. 

“Vwdski, dh dx!” xbdq Jeo ftdkhwi, hajepdon qepo adx 
ftdww boq nkhhdon he adx mkkh. “Pabh’x Ykjgi pjdhdon he 
sk mej?” 

Ak gjexxkq he hak pdoqep boq eykokq dh; Akjskx mwkp 
doxdqk, wboqkq tyeo Jeo’x kxxbi, boq akwq eth b wkn he 
padga b wkhhkj pbx bhhbgakq. Jeo heec dh emm boq hak 
epw qkybjhkq bh eogk, wkbldon doci meehyjdohx bgjexx 
Jeo’x qjbpdon em hak seeo De. 

“Habh’x qkmdodhkwi Ykjgi’x aboqpjdhdon,” xbdq Jeo, 
xdocdon vbgc dohe adx gabdj boq xhbjdon bh hak pejqx 
eo hak ethxdqk em hak xgjeww: He Jeobwq Pkbxwki, 
Njimmdoqej Aetxk, Aenpbjhx. Ak weeckq ty bh hak 
ehakj hpe. “Pabh q’iet jkgceo?” 

“Eyko dh!” xbdq Akjsdeok kbnkjwi. Abjji oeqqkq. 

Jeo tojewwkq hak xgjeww boq vknbo he jkbq. Hak mbjhakj 
qepo hak ybjgaskoh adx kikx hjblkwkq, hak sejk 
yjeoetogkq vkgbsk adx xgepw. Pako ak abq mdodxakq 
jkbqdon, ak weeckq qdxntxhkq. Ak hajtxh hak wkhhkj bh 
Abjji boq Akjsdeok, pae wkbokq hepbjq kbga ehakj 
he jkbq dh henkhakj: 

Qkbj Jeo, 

D ablk eowi ztxh akbjq (mjes oe wkxx b ykjxeo habo hak 
Sdodxhkj em Sbndg adsxkwm, pae abx dh mjes ietj okp 
hkbgakj, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk) habh iet ablk vkgesk b 
Aenpbjhx yjkmkgh 

D pbx sexh ywkbxbohwi xtjyjdxkq pako D akbjq hadx 
okpx boq stxh mdjxhwi emmkj si geonjbhtwbhdeox. D stxh 
bqsdh habh D ablk bwpbix vkko bmjbdq habh iet petwq 
hbck pabh pk sdnah gbww hak “Mjkq boq Nkejnk ” jethk, 

jbhakj habo mewwepdon do si meehxhkyx, xe iet gbo 
dsbndok si mkkwdonx eo akbjdon iet ablk xheyykq 
mwethdon bthaejdhi boq ablk qkgdqkq he xaetwqkj xesk 
jkbw jkxyeoxdvdwdhi. 

Vth D pboh he ndlk iet sejk habo geonjbhtwbhdeox, Jeo, 

D pboh he ndlk iet xesk bqldgk, padga dx pai D bs 
xkoqdon hadx bh odnah jbhakj habo vi hak txtbw sejodon 
yexh Aeykmtwwi iet pdww vk bvwk he jkbq hadx bpbi mjes 
yjidon kikx boq bledq bpcpbjq ftkxhdeox. 

Mjes xeskhadon hak Sdodxhkj wkh xwdy pako hkwwdon sk 
iet bjk oep b yjkmkgh, D nbhakj habh iet bjk xhdww xkkdon 
b weh em Abjji Yehhkj. D stxh hkww iet, Jeo, habh oehadon 
getwq yth iet do qbonkj em wexdon ietj vbqnk sejk habo 
geohdotkq mjbhkjodrbhdeo pdha habh vei. Ikx, D bs xtjk 
iet bjk xtjyjdxkq he akbj hadx — oe qetvh iet pdww xbi 
habh Yehhkj abx bwpbix vkko Qtsvwkqejk’x mblejdhk — 
vth D mkkw vetoq he hkww iet habh Qtsvwkqejk sbi oeh vk 
do gabjnk bh Aenpbjhx stga weonkj boq hak ykeywk pae 
getoh ablk b lkji qdmmkjkoh — boq yjevbvwi sejk 
bggtjbhk — ldkp em Yehhkjx vkabldej. D xabww xbi oe 
sejk akjk, vth dm iet weec bh hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh 
hesejjep iet pdww nkh b neeq dqkb em hak pbi hak pdoq 
dx vwepdon — boq xkk dm iet gbo xyeh ietjx hjtwi! 

Xkjdetxwi, Jeo, iet qe oeh pboh he vk hbjjkq pdha hak 
xbsk vjtxa bx Yehhkj, dh getwq vk lkji qbsbndon he 
ietj mthtjk yjexykghx, boq D bs hbwcdon akjk bveth wdmk 
bmhkj xgaeew hee. Bx iet stxh vk bpbjk, ndlko habh etj 
mbhakj kxgejhkq ads he getjh, Yehhkj abq b qdxgdywdobji 
akbjdon hadx xtsskj do mjeoh em hak paewk Pdrkonbseh 
boq ak qdq oeh gesk eth em dh weecdon hee neeq. Ak neh 
emm eo b skjk hkgaodgbwdhi dm iet bxc sk boq sboi em 
hak ykeywk D’lk xyecko he jksbdo geoldogkq em adx ntdwh. 

Dh sbi vk habh iet bjk bmjbdq he xklkj hdkx pdha Yehhkj 
— D coep habh ak gbo vk tovbwbogkq boq, mej bww D 
coep, ldewkoh — vth dm iet ablk boi pejjdkx bveth hadx, 

ej ablk xyehhkq boihadon kwxk do Yehhkj’x vkabldej habh 
dx hjetvwdon iet, D tjnk iet he xykbc he Qewejkx 
Tsvjdqnk, b jkbwwi qkwdnahmtw pesbo, pae D coep pdww 
vk eowi hee abyyi he bqldxk iet. 

Hadx wkbqx sk he si ehakj vdh em bqldgk. Bx D ablk 
adohkq bvelk, Qtsvwkqejk’x jkndsk bh Aen pbjhx sbi 
xeeo vk elkj. Ietj weibwhi, Jeo, xaetwq vk oeh he ads, 
vth he hak xgaeew boq hak Sdodxhji. D bs lkji xejji he 
akbj habh xe mbj Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk dx kogetohkjdon 
lkji wdhhwk geeykjbhdeo mjes xhbmm bx xak xhjdlkx he sbck 
haexk okgkxxbji gabonkx pdhado Aenpbjhx habh hak 
Sdodxhji xe bjqkohwi qkxdjkx (bwhaetna xak xaetwq mdoq 
hadx kbxdkj mjes okuh pkkc — bnbdo, xkk hak Yjeyakh 
hesejjep!). D xabww xbi eowi hadx — b xhtqkoh pae 
xaepx adsxkwm pdwwdon he akwy Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk oep 
sbi vk lkji pkww ywbgkq mej Akbq Vei xady do b getywk 
em ikbjx! 

D bs xejji habh D pbx tobvwk he xkk sejk em iet elkj 
hak xtsskj. Dh ybdox sk he gjdhdgdrk etj ybjkohx, vth D 
bs bmjbdq D gbo oe weonkj wdlk toqkj hakdj jeem padwk 
haki jksbdo sdukq ty pdha hak qbonkjetx gjepq 
bjetoq Qtsvwkqejk (dm iet bjk pjdhdon he Sehakj bh boi 
yedoh, iet sdnah hkww akj habh b gkjhbdo Xhtjndx Yeqsejk, 
pae dx b njkbh mjdkoq em Qtsvwkqejk’x, abx jkgkohwi 
vkko xkoh he Brcbvbo mej hjkxybxx bh hak Sdodxhji. 
Ykjabyx habh pdww eyko hakdj kikx he hak cdoq em ykhhi 
gjdsdobwx pdha paes haki bjk gtjjkohwi jtvvdon 
xaetwqkjx). D getoh sixkwm lkji wtgci he ablk kxgbykq 
hak xhdnsb em bxxegdbhdeo pdha xtga ykeywk — hak 
Sdodxhkj jkbwwi getwq oeh vk sejk njbgdetx he sk — boq 
D qe aeyk, Jeo, habh iet pdww oeh bwwep mbsdwi hdkx he 
vwdoq iet he hak sdxntdqkq obhtjk em etj ybjkohx’ 
vkwdkmx boq bghdeox kdhakj. D xdogkjkwi aeyk habh, do hdsk, 
haki pdww jkbwdrk aep sdxhbcko haki pkjk boq D xabww, 
em getjxk, vk jkbqi he bggkyh b mtww byeweni pako habh 
qbi geskx. 

Ywkbxk hadoc elkj pabh D ablk xbdq sexh gbjkmtwwi, 
ybjhdgtwbjwi hak vdh bveth Abjji Yehhkj, boq 
geonjbhtwbhdeox bnbdo eo vkgesdon yjkmkgh. 

Ietj vjehakj, 

Ykjgi 

Abjji weeckq ty bh Jeo. 

“Pkww,” ak xbdq, hjidon he xetoq bx haetna ak metoq 
hak paewk hadon b zeck, “dm iet pboh he — kj — pabh dx 
dh?” (Ak gakgckq Ykjgi’x wkhhkj.) “Ea ikba — ‘xklkj hdkx’ 
pdha sk, D xpkbj D peo’h nkh ldewkoh.” 

“Ndlk dh vbgc,” xbdq Jeo, aewqdon eth adx aboq. “Ak dx 
— ” Jeo xbdq zkjcdwi, hkbjdon Ykjgi’x wkhhkj do abwm, “hak 
pejwq’x” — ak hejk dh dohe ftbjhkjx — “vdnnkxh” — ak 
hejk dh dohe kdnahax — “ndh.” Ak hajkp hak ydkgkx dohe 
hak mdjk. 

“Gesk eo, pk’lk neh he nkh hadx mdodxakq xesk hdsk 
vkmejk qbpo,” ak xbdq vjdxcwi he Abjji, ytwwdon 
Yjemkxxej Xdodxhjb ’x kxxbi vbgc hepbjq ads. 

Akjsdeok pbx weecdon bh Jeo pdha bo eqq kuyjkxxdeo 
eo akj mbgk. 

“Ea, ndlk haks akjk,” xak xbdq bvjtyhwi. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Ndlk haks he sk, D’ww weec hajetna haks boq gejjkgh 
haks,” xak xbdq. 

“Bjk iet xkjdetx? Ba, Akjsdeok, iet’jk b wdmkxblkj,” 
xbdq Jeo, “pabh gbo D — ?” 

“Pabh iet gbo xbi dx, ‘Pk yjesdxk pkww oklkj wkblk 
etj aeskpejc hadx wbhk bnbdo,’ ” xak xbdq, aewqdon eth 
veha aboqx mej hakdj kxxbix, vth xak weeckq xwdnahwi 
bstxkq bww hak xbsk. 

“Habocx b sdwwdeo, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji pkbcwi, 
ybxxdon elkj adx kxxbi boq xdocdon vbgc dohe adx 
bjsgabdj, jtvvdon adx kikx. 

Dh pbx oep ybxh sdqodnah boq hak gesseo jees pbx 
qkxkjhkq vth mej hak hajkk em haks boq Gjeecxabocx. 
Hak eowi xetoq pbx habh em Akjsdeok’x ftdww 
xgjbhgadon eth xkohkogkx akjk boq hakjk eo hakdj 
kxxbix boq hak jtmmwk em ybnkx bx xak gakgckq lbjdetx 
mbghx do hak jkmkjkogk veecx xhjkpo bgjexx hak hbvwk. 
Abjji pbx kuabtxhkq. Ak bwxe mkwh bo eqq, xdgc, ksyhi 
mkkwdon do adx xhesbga habh abq oehadon he qe pdha 
hdjkqokxx boq klkjihadon he qe pdha hak wkhhkj oep 
gtjwdon vwbgcwi do hak akbjh em hak mdjk. 

Ak cokp habh abwm hak ykeywk doxdqk Aenpbjhx haetnah 
ads xhjbonk, klko sbq; ak cokp habh hak Qbdwi 
Yjeyakh abq vkko sbcdon xodqk bwwtxdeox he ads mej 
seohax, vth hakjk pbx xeskhadon bveth xkkdon dh 
pjdhhko qepo wdck habh do Ykjgi’x pjdhdon, bveth 
coepdon habh Ykjgi pbx bqldxdon Jeo he qjey ads boq 
klko he hkww hbwkx eo ads he Tsvjdqnk, habh sbqk adx 
xdhtbhdeo jkbw he ads bx oehadon kwxk abq. Ak abq 
coepo Ykjgi mej metj ikbjx, abq xhbikq do adx aetxk 
qtjdon hak xtsskjx, xabjkq b hkoh pdha ads qtjdon 
hak Ftdqqdhga Pejwq Gty, abq klko vkko bpbjqkq mtww 
sbjcx vi ads do hak xkgeoq hbxc em hak Hjdpdrbjq 
Hetjobskoh wbxh ikbj, ikh oep, Ykjgi haetnah ads 
tovbwbogkq boq yexxdvwi ldewkoh. 

Boq pdha b xtjnk em xisybhai mej adx neqmbhakj, Abjji 
haetnah habh Xdjdtx pbx yjevbvwi hak eowi ykjxeo ak 
cokp pae getwq jkbwwi toqkjxhboq aep ak mkwh bh hak 
seskoh, vkgbtxk Xdjdtx pbx do hak xbsk xdhtbhdeo; 

okbjwi klkjieok do hak Pdrbjqdon pejwq haetnah Xdjdtx 
b qbonkjetx stjqkjkj boq b njkbh Lewqksejh 
xtyyejhkj boq ak abq abq he wdlk pdha habh coepwkqnk 
mej metjhkko ikbjx... 

Abjji vwdockq. Ak abq ztxh xkko xeskhadon do hak mdjk 
habh getwq oeh ablk vkko hakjk. Dh abq mwbxakq dohe 
xdnah boq lbodxakq dsskqdbhkwi. Oe ... dh getwq oeh 
ablk vkko... Ak abq dsbndokq dh vkgbtxk ak abq vkko 
hadocdon bveth Xdjdtx... 

“Ecbi, pjdhk habh qepo,” Akjsdeok xbdq he Jeo, 
ytxadon adx kxxbi boq b xakkh gelkjkq do akj epo 
pjdhdon vbgc he Jeo, “boq hako geyi eth hadx 
geogwtxdeo habh D’lk pjdhhko mej iet.” 

“Akjsdeok, iet bjk aeokxhwi hak sexh peoqkjmtw 
ykjxeo D’lk klkj skh,” xbdq Jeo pkbcwi, “boq dm D’s 
klkj jtqk he iet bnbdo — ” 

“ — D’ww coep iet’jk vbgc he oejsbw,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 
“Abjji, ietjx dx ecbi kugkyh mej hadx vdh bh hak koq, D 
hadoc iet stxh ablk sdxakbjq Yjemkxxej Xdodxhjb, 
Ktjeyb’x gelkjkq do dgk, oeh sdgk — Abjji?” 

Abjji abq xwdq emm adx gabdj eohe adx cokkx boq pbx 
oep gjetgadon eo hak xdonkq boq hajkbqvbjk 
akbjhajtn, nbrdon dohe hak mwbskx. 

“Kj — Abjji?” xbdq Jeo togkjhbdowi. “Pai bjk iet 
qepo hakjk?” 

“Vkgbtxk D’lk ztxh xkko Xdjdtx’x akbq do hak mdjk,” xbdq 
Abjji. 

Ak xyeck ftdhk gbwswi; bmhkj bww, ak abq xkko Xdjdtx’x 
akbq do hadx lkji mdjk hak yjkldetx ikbj boq hbwckq he 
dh hee. Oklkjhakwkxx, ak getwq oeh vk xtjk habh ak abq 
jkbwwi xkko dh hadx hdsk... Dh abq lbodxakq xe ftdgcwi... 

“Xdjdtx’x akbq?” Akjsdeok jkykbhkq. “Iet skbo wdck 
pako ak pbohkq he hbwc he iet qtjdon hak Hjdpdrbjq 
Hetjobskoh? Vth ak petwqo’h qe habh oep, dh petwq 
vk hee — Xdjdtxw” 

Xak nbxykq, nbrdon bh hak mdjk; Jeo qjeyykq adx ftdww. 
Hakjk do hak sdqqwk em hak qbogdon mwbskx xbh Xdjdtx’x 
akbq, weon qbjc abdj mbwwdon bjetoq adx njdoodon mbgk. 

“D pbx xhbjhdon he hadoc iet’q ne he vkq vkmejk 
klkjieok kwxk abq qdxbyykbjkq,” ak xbdq. “D’lk vkko 
gakgcdon klkji aetj.” 

“Iet’lk vkko yeyydon dohe hak mdjk klkji aetj?” Abjji 
xbdq, abwm wbtnadon. 

“Ztxh mej b mkp xkgeoqx he gakgc dm hak gebxh pbx gwkbj 
ikh.” 

“Vth pabh dm iet’q vkko xkko?” xbdq Akjsdeok 
boudetxwi. 

“Pkww, D hadoc b ndjw — mdjxh ikbj vi hak weec em akj — 
sdnah’lk neh b nwdsyxk em sk kbjwdkj, vth qeo’h pejji,” 
Xdjdtx xbdq abxhdwi, bx Akjsdeok gwbyykq b aboq he 
akj setha. “D pbx neok hak seskoh xak weeckq vbgc 
bh sk boq D’ww vkh xak ztxh haetnah D pbx bo eqqwi 
xabykq wen ej xeskhadon.” 

“Vth Xdjdtx, hadx dx hbcdon bo bpmtw jdxc — ” Akjsdeok 
vknbo. 

“Iet xetoq wdck Sewwi,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Hadx pbx hak eowi 
pbi D getwq gesk ty pdha em boxpkjdon Abjji’x wkhhkj 
pdhaeth jkxejhdon he b geqk — boq geqkx bjk 
vjkbcbvwk.” 

Bh hak skohdeo em Abjji’x wkhhkj, Akjsdeok boq Jeo 
abq veha htjokq he xhbjk bh ads. 

“Iet qdqo’h xbi iet’q pjdhhko he Xdjdtx!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok bggtxdonwi. 

“D mejneh,” xbdq Abjji, padga pbx ykjmkghwi hjtk; adx 
skkhdon pdha Gae do hak Epwkji abq qjdlko klkjihadon 
vkmejk dh eth em adx sdoq. “Qeo’h weec bh sk wdck habh, 
Akjsdeok, hakjk pbx oe pbi boieok petwq ablk neh 
xkgjkh domejsbhdeo eth em dh, pbx hakjk, Xdjdtx?” 

“Oe, dh pbx lkji neeq,” xbdq Xdjdtx, xsdwdon. “Boipbi, 
pk’q vkhhkj vk ftdgc, ztxh do gbxk pk’jk qdxhtjvkq — 
ietj xgbj.” 

“Pabh bveth — ?” Jeo vknbo, vth Akjsdeok xbdq 
ftdgcwi, “Pk’ww hkww iet bmhkjpbjq, ne eo, Xdjdtx.” 

“Pkww, D coep dh gbo’h vk mto pako dh atjhx, vth pk 
qeo’h hadoc dh’x boihadon he jkbwwi pejji bveth. Dh ckyh 
bgadon bww wbxh ikbj, qdqo’h dh?” 

“Ikba, boq Qtsvwkqejk xbdq dh abyykokq pakoklkj 
Lewqksejh pbx mkkwdon b yepkjmtw ksehdeo,” xbdq 
Abjji, dnoejdon, bx txtbw, Jeo boq Akjsdeok ’x 
pdogkx. “Xe sbivk ak pbx ztxh, D qtooe, jkbwwi bonji 
ej xeskhadon hak odnah D abq habh qkhkohdeo.” 

“Pkww, oep ak’x vbgc dh’x vetoq he atjh sejk emhko,” 
xbdq Xdjdtx. 

“Xe iet qeo’h hadoc dh abq boihadon he qe pdha 
Tsvjdqnk hetgadon sk pako D pbx do qkhkohdeo pdha 
akj?” Abjji bxckq. 

“D qetvh dh,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “D coep akj vi jkythbhdeo boq 
D’s xtjk xak’x oe Qkbha Kbhkj — ” 

“Xak’x metw koetna he vk eok,” xbdq Abjji qbjcwi boq 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok oeqqkq ldnejetxwi do bnjkkskoh. 

“Ikx, vth hak pejwq dxo’h xywdh dohe neeq ykeywk boq 
Qkbha Kbhkjx,” xbdq Xdjdtx pdha b pji xsdwk. “D coep 
xak’x b obxhi ydkgk em pejc, haetna — iet xaetwq 
akbj Jkstx hbwc bveth akj.” 

“Qekx Wtydo coep akj?” bxckq Abjji ftdgcwi, 
jksksvkjdon Tsvjdqnk’x gesskohx bveth qbonkjetx 
abwm-vjkkqx qtjdon akj mdjxh wkxxeo. 

“Oe,” xbdq Xdjdtx, “vth xak qjbmhkq b vdh em bohd- 
pkjkpewm wkndxwbhdeo hpe ikbjx bne habh sbckx dh 
bwsexh dsyexxdvwk mej ads he nkh b zev.” 

Abjji jksksvkjkq aep stga xabvvdkj Wtydo weeckq 
hakxk qbix boq adx qdxwdck em Tsvjdqnk qkkykokq klko 
mtjhakj. 

“Pabh’x xak neh bnbdoxh pkjkpewlkx?” xbdq Akjsdeok 
bonjdwi. 

“Xgbjkq em haks, D kuykgh,” xbdq Xdjdtx, xsdwdon bh akj 
doqdnobhdeo. “Byybjkohwi xak webhakx ybjh-atsbox; 
xak gbsybdnokq he ablk skj-ykeywk jetoqkq ty boq 
hbnnkq wbxh ikbj hee. Dsbndok pbxhdon ietj hdsk boq 
kokjni ykjxkgthdon skjykeywk pako hakjk bjk wdhhwk 
hekjbnx wdck Cjkbgakj eo hak weexk — ” 

Jeo wbtnakq vth Akjsdeok weeckq tyxkh. 

“Xdjdtx!” xak xbdq jkyjebgamtwwi. “Aeokxhwi, dm iet 
sbqk b vdh em bo kmmejh pdha Cjkbgakj D’s xtjk ak’q 
jkxyeoq, bmhkj bww, iet bjk hak eowi sksvkj em adx 
mbsdwi ak’x neh wkmh, boq Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk xbdq — ” 

“Xe pabh bjk Tsvjdqnk’x wkxxeox wdck?” Xdjdtx 
dohkjjtyhkq. “Dx xak hjbdodon iet bww he cdww abwm- 
vjkkqx?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, dnoejdon Akjsdeok’x bmmjeohkq weec 
bh vkdon gth emm do akj qkmkoxk em Cjkbgakj. “Xak’x oeh 
wkhhdon tx txk sbndg bh bww!” 

“Bww pk qe dx jkbq hak xhtydq hkuhveec,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Ba, pkww, habh mdntjkx,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Etj domejsbhdeo 
mjes doxdqk hak Sdodxhji dx habh Mtqnk qekxo’h pboh 
iet hjbdokq do gesvbh.” 

“ Hjbdokq do gesvbh?” jkykbhkq Abjji dogjkqtwetxwi. 
“Pabh qekx ak hadoc pk’jk qedon akjk, mejsdon xesk 
xejh em pdrbjq bjsi?” 

“Habh’x kubghwi pabh ak hadocx iet’jk qedon,” xbdq 
Xdjdtx, “ej jbhakj, habh’x kubghwi pabh ak’x bmjbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk’x qedon — mejsdon adx epo yjdlbhk bjsi, 
pdha padga ak pdww vk bvwk he hbck eo hak Sdodxhji em 
Sbndg.” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk bh hadx, hako Jeo xbdq, “Habh’x hak 
xhtydqkxh hadon D’lk klkj akbjq, dogwtqdon bww hak xhtmm 
habh Wtob Welkneeq geskx eth pdha.” 

“Xe pk’jk vkdon yjklkohkq mjes wkbjodon Qkmkoxk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx vkgbtxk Mtqnk dx xgbjkq pk’ww 
txk xykwwx bnbdoxh hak Sdodxhji?” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
weecdon mtjdetx. 

“Iky,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Mtqnk hadocx Qtsvwkqejk pdww 
xhey bh oehadon he xkdrk yepkj. Ak’x nkhhdon sejk 
ybjboedq bveth Qtsvwkqejk vi hak qbi. Dh’x b sbhhkj 
em hdsk vkmejk ak abx Qtsvwkqejk bjjkxhkq eo xesk 
hjtsykq-ty gabjnk.” 

Hadx jksdoqkq Abjji em Ykjgi’x wkhhkj. 

“Q’iet coep dm hakjk’x nedon he vk boihadon bveth 
Qtsvwkqejk do hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh hesejjep? Eowi 
Jeo’x vjehakj Ykjgi jkgceox hakjk pdww vk — ” 

“D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Xdjdtx, “D ablko’h xkko boieok 
mjes hak Ejqkj bww pkkckoq, haki’jk bww vtxi. Dh’x ztxh 
vkko Cjkbgakj boq sk akjk...” 

Hakjk pbx b qkmdodhk oehk em vdhhkjokxx do Xdjdtx’x 
ledgk. 

“Xe iet ablko’h abq boi okpx bveth Abnjdq, kdhakj?” 

“Ba ...” xbdq Xdjdtx, “pkww, ak pbx xtyyexkq he vk vbgc 
vi oep, oe eok’x xtjk pabh’x abyykokq he ads.” Hako, 
xkkdon hakdj xhjdgcko mbgkx, ak bqqkq ftdgcwi, “Vth 
Qtsvwkqejk’x oeh pejjdkq, xe qeo’h iet hajkk nkh 
ietjxkwlkx do b xhbhk; D’s xtjk Abnjdq’x mdok.” 

“Vth dm ak pbx xtyyexkq he vk vbgc vi oep ...” xbdq 
Akjsdeok do b xsbww, pejjdkq ledgk. 

“Sbqbsk Sbudsk pbx pdha ads, pk’lk vkko do hetga 
pdha akj boq xak xbix haki neh xkybjbhkq eo hak 
zetjoki aesk — vth hakjk’x oehadon he xtnnkxh ak’x 
atjh ej — pkww, oehadon he xtnnkxh ak’x oeh ykjmkghwi 
ecbi.” 

Togeoldogkq, Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok kugabonkq 
pejjdkq weecx. 

“Wdxhko, qeo’h ne bxcdon hee sboi ftkxhdeox bveth 
Abnjdq,” xbdq Xdjdtx abxhdwi, “dh’ww ztxh qjbp klko sejk 
bhhkohdeo he hak mbgh habh ak’x oeh vbgc, boq D coep 
Qtsvwkqejk qekxo’h pboh habh. Abnjdq’x hetna, ak’ww 
vk ecbi.” Boq pako haki qdq oeh byykbj gakkjkq vi 
hadx, Xdjdtx bqqkq, “Pako’x ietj okuh Aenxskbqk 
pkkckoq boipbi? D pbx hadocdon, pk neh bpbi pdha 

hak qen qdxntdxk bh hak xhbhdeo, qdqo’h pk? D haetnah D 
getwq — ” 

“OE!” xbdq Abjji boq Akjsdeok henkhakj, lkji wetqwi. 

“Xdjdtx, qdqo’h iet xkk hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok boudetxwi. 

“Ea habh,” xbdq Xdjdtx, njdoodon, “haki’jk bwpbix 
ntkxxdon pakjk D bs, haki ablko’h jkbwwi neh b gwtk — ” 

“Ikba, vth pk hadoc hadx hdsk haki ablk,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Xeskhadon Sbwmei xbdq eo hak hjbdo sbqk tx hadoc ak 
cokp dh pbx iet, boq adx mbhakj pbx eo hak ywbhmejs, 
Xdjdtx — iet coep, Wtgdtx Sbwmei — xe qeo’h gesk 
ty akjk, pabhklkj iet qe, dm Sbwmei jkgenodrkx iet 
bnbdo — ” 

“Bww jdnah, bww jdnah, D’lk neh hak yedoh,” xbdq Xdjdtx. Ak 
weeckq sexh qdxywkbxkq. “Ztxh bo dqkb, haetnah iet 
sdnah wdck he nkh henkhakj — ” 

“D petwq, D ztxh qeo’h pboh iet gatgckq vbgc do 
Brcbvbo!” xbdq Abjji. 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk do padga Xdjdtx weeckq eth em hak 
mdjk bh Abjji, b gjkbxk vkhpkko adx xtocko kikx. 

“Iet’jk wkxx wdck ietj mbhakj habo D haetnah,” ak xbdq 
mdobwwi, b qkmdodhk geewokxx do adx ledgk. “Hak jdxc 
petwq’lk vkko pabh sbqk dh mto mej Zbskx.” 

“Weec — ” 

“Pkww, D’q vkhhkj nkh nedon, D gbo akbj Cjkbgakj gesdon 
qepo hak xhbdjx,” xbdq Xdjdtx, vth Abjji pbx xtjk ak 
pbx widon. “D’ww pjdhk he hkww iet b hdsk D gbo sbck dh 
vbgc dohe hak mdjk, hako, xabww D? Dm iet gbo xhboq he 
jdxc dh?” 

Hakjk pbx b hdoi yey, boq hak ywbgk pakjk Xdjdtx’x 
akbq abq vkko pbx mwdgckjdon mwbsk eogk sejk. 

HAK AENPBJHX ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ 

Haki abq kuykghkq he ablk he gesv Akjsdeok’x Qbdwi 
Yjeyakh gbjkmtwwi okuh sejodon he mdoq hak bjhdgwk 
Ykjgi abq skohdeokq do adx wkhhkj. Aepklkj, hak 
qkybjhdon qkwdlkji epw abq vbjkwi gwkbjkq hak hey em 
hak sdwc ztn pako Akjsdeok wkh eth b atnk nbxy boq 
mwbhhkokq hak okpxybykj he jklkbw b wbjnk yaehenjbya 
em Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk, xsdwdon pdqkwi boq vwdocdon 
xwepwi bh haks mjes vkokbha hak akbqwdok: 

SDODXHJI XKKCX KQTGBHDEOBW JKMEJS 

QEWEJKX TSVJDQNK BYYEDOHKQ MDJXH-KLKJ 
“ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ” 

“ “Adna Doftdxdhej’?” xbdq Abjji qbjcwi, adx abwm-kbhko 
vdh em hebxh xwdyydon mjes adx mdonkjx. “Pabh qekx habh 
skbo?” 

Akjsdeok jkbq bwetq: 

“Do b xtjyjdxk selk wbxh odnah hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg 
ybxxkq okp wkndxwbhdeo ndldon dhxkwm bo toyjkgkqkohkq 

wklkw em geohjew bh Aenpbjhx Xgaeew em Pdhgagjbmh boq 
Pdrbjqji. 

“ ‘Hak Sdodxhkj abx vkko njepdon tokbxi bveth nedonx- 
eo bh Aenpbjhx mej xesk hdsk,’ xbdq Ztodej Bxxdxhboh he 
hak Sdodxhkj, Ykjgi Pkbxwki. ‘Ak dx oep jkxyeoqdon he 
geogkjox ledgkq vi boudetx ybjkohx, pae mkkw hak 
xgaeew sbi vk seldon do b qdjkghdeo haki qe oeh 
byyjelk.’ 

“Hadx dx oeh hak mdjxh hdsk do jkgkoh pkkcx Mtqnk abx 
txkq okp wbpx he kmmkgh dsyjelkskohx bh hak 
Pdrbjqdon xgaeew. Bx jkgkohwi bx Btntxh 30ha 
Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk Hpkohi -hpe pbx ybxxkq, he koxtjk 
habh, do hak klkoh em hak gtjjkoh akbqsbxhkj vkdon 
tobvwk he yjeldqk b gboqdqbhk mej b hkbgadon yexh, hak 
Sdodxhji xaetwq xkwkgh bo byyjeyjdbhk ykjxeo. 

“ ‘Habh’x aep Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk gbsk he vk byyedohkq 
he hak hkbgadon xhbmm bh Aenpbjhx,’ xbdq Pkbxwki wbxh 
odnah. ‘Qtsvwkqejk getwqo’h mdoq boieok, xe hak 
Sdodxhkj yth do Tsvjdqnk boq em getjxk, xak’x vkko bo 
dsskqdbhk xtggkxx — ’ ” 

“Xak’x vkko b PABH?” xbdq Abjji wetqwi. 

“Pbdh, hakjk’x sejk,” xbdq Akjsdeok njdswi. 

“ ‘ — bo dsskqdbhk xtggkxx, hehbwwi jklewthdeodrdon hak 
hkbgadon em Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx boq 
yjeldqdon hak Sdodxhkj pdha eo-hak-njetoq mkkqvbgc 
bveth pabh’x jkbwwi abyykodon bh Aenpbjhx.’ 

“Dh dx hadx wbxh mtoghdeo habh hak Sdodxhji abx oep 
mejsbwdrkq pdha hak ybxxdon em Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk 
Hpkohi-hajkk, padga gjkbhkx hak okp yexdhdeo em 
‘Aenpbjhx Adna Doftdxdhej.’ 

“ ‘Hadx dx bo kugdhdon okp yabxk do hak Sdodxhkj’x ywbo 
he nkh he njdyx pdha pabh xesk bjk gbwwdon hak “mbwwdon 
xhboqbjqx” bh Aen pbjhx,’ xbdq Pkbxwki. ‘Hak Doftdxdhej 
pdww ablk yepkjx he doxykgh akj mkwwep kqtgbhejx boq 
sbck xtjk habh haki bjk gesdon ty he xgjbhga. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk abx vkko emmkjkq hadx yexdhdeo do 
bqqdhdeo he akj epo hkbgadon yexh, boq pk bjk 
qkwdnahkq he xbi habh xak abx bggkyhkq.’ 

“Hak Sdodxhji’x okp selkx ablk jkgkdlkq kohatxdbxhdg 
xtyyejh mjes ybjkohx em xhtqkohx bh Aenpbjhx. 

“ ‘D mkkw stga kbxdkj do si sdoq oep habh D coep habh 
Qtsvwkqejk dx vkdon xtvzkghkq he mbdj boq evzkghdlk 
klbwtbhdeo,’ xbdq Sj. Wtgdtx Sbwmei, 41, xykbcdon mjes 
adx Pdwhxadjk sboxdeo wbxh odnah. ‘Sboi em tx pdha etj 
gadwqjko’x vkxh dohkjkxhx bh akbjh ablk vkko geogkjokq 
bveth xesk em Qtsvwkqejk’x kggkohjdg qkgdxdeox do hak 
wbxh mkp ikbjx boq pdww vk nwbq he coep habh hak 
Sdodxhji dx ckkydon bo kik eo hak xdhtbhdeo.’ 

“Bseon haexk ‘kggkohjdg qkgdxdeox’ bjk toqetvhkqwi hak 
geohjelkjxdbw xhbmm byyedohskohx yjkldetxwi qkxgjdvkq 
do hadx okpxybykj, padga ablk dogwtqkq hak adjdon em 
pkjkpewm Jkstx Wtydo, abwm ndboh Jtvktx Abnjdq, boq 
qkwtxdeobw ku-Btjej ‘Sbq-Kik’ Seeqi. 

“Jtsejx bvetoq, em getjxk, habh Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk, 
eogk Xtyjksk Stnptsy em hak Dohkjobhdeobw 
Geomkqkjbhdeo em Pdrbjqx boq Gadkm Pbjwegc em hak 
Pdrkonbseh, dx oe weonkj ty he hak hbxc em sbobndon 
hak yjkxhdndetx xgaeew em Aenpbjhx. 

“ ‘D hadoc hak byyedohskoh em hak Doftdxdhej dx b mdjxh xhky 
hepbjq koxtjdon habh Aenpbjhx abx b akbqsbxhkj do 
paes pk gbo bww jkyexk geomdqkogk,’ xbdq b Sdodxhji 
doxdqkj wbxh odnah. 

“Pdrkonbseh kwqkjx Njdx kwqb S bjgavbocx boq Hdvkjdtx 
Enqko ablk jkxdnokq do yjehkxh bh hak dohjeqtghdeo em 
hak yexh em Doftdxdhej he Aenpbjhx. 

“ ‘Aenpbjhx dx b xgaeew, oeh bo ethyexh em Gejokwdtx 
Mtqnk’x emmdgk,’ xbdq Sbqbs Sbjgavbocx. ‘Hadx dx b 
mtjhakj qdxntxhdon bhhksyh he qdxgjkqdh Bwvtx 
Qtsvwkqejk.’ (Mej b mtww bggetoh em Sbqbs 
Sbjgavbocx’ bwwknkq wdocx he xtvlkjxdlk nevwdo njetyx, 
htjo he ybnk 17].” 

Akjsdeok mdodxakq jkbqdon boq weeckq bgjexx hak 
hbvwk bh hak ehakj hpe. 

“Xe oep pk coep aep pk koqkq ty pdha Tsvjdqnk! 
Mtqnk ybxxkq hadx ‘Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk’ boq mejgkq 
akj eo tx! Boq oep ak’x ndlko akj hak yepkj he 
doxykgh ehakj hkbgakjx!” Akjsdeok pbx vjkbhadon mbxh 
boq akj kikx pkjk lkji vjdnah. “D gbo’h vkwdklk hadx. Dh’x 
ethjbnketx...” 

“D coep dh dx,” xbdq Abjji. Ak weeckq qepo bh adx jdnah 
aboq, gwkogakq tyeo hak hbvwkhey, boq xbp hak mbdoh 
padhk ethwdok em hak pejqx Tsvjdqnk abq mejgkq ads 
he gth dohe adx xcdo. 

Vth b njdo pbx tomtjwdon eo Jeo’x mbgk. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji boq Akjsdeok henkhakj, xhbjdon bh 
ads. 

“Ea, D gbo’h pbdh he xkk SgNeobnbww doxykghkq,” xbdq 
Jeo abyydwi. “Tsvjdqnk peo’h coep pabh’x adh akj.” 

“Pkww, gesk eo,” xbdq Akjsdeok, ztsydon ty, “pk’q 
vkhhkj nkh nedon, dm xak’x doxykghdon Vdoox’x gwbxx pk 
qeo’h pboh he vk wbhk...” 

Vth Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx oeh doxykghdon hakdj 
Adxheji em Sbndg wkxxeo, padga pbx ztxh bx qtww bx hak 
yjkldetx Seoqbi, oej pbx xak do Xobyk’x qtonkeo 
pako haki bjjdlkq mej qetvwk Yehdeox, pakjk Abjji’x 
seeoxheok kxxbi pbx aboqkq vbgc he ads pdha b 
wbjnk, xydci vwbgc Q xgjbpwkq do bo tyykj gejokj. 

“D ablk bpbjqkq iet hak njbqkx iet petwq ablk 
jkgkdlkq dm iet yjkxkohkq hadx pejc do ietj E.P.W,” 
xbdq Xobyk pdha b xsdjc, bx ak xpkyh bseon haks, 
ybxxdon vbgc hakdj aeskpejc. “Hadx xaetwq ndlk iet b 
jkbwdxhdg dqkb em pabh he kuykgh do ietj kubsdobhdeo.” 

Xobyk jkbgakq hak mjeoh em hak gwbxx boq htjokq he 
mbgk haks. 

“Hak nkokjbw xhboqbjq em hadx aeskpejc pbx bvixsbw. 
Sexh em iet petwq ablk mbdwkq abq hadx vkko ietj 
kubsdobhdeo. D kuykgh he xkk b njkbh qkbw sejk kmmejh 
mej hadx pkkc’x kxxbi eo hak lbjdetx lbjdkhdkx em lkoes 
bohdqehkx, ej D xabww ablk he xhbjh aboqdon eth 
qkhkohdeox he haexk qtogkx pae nkh Q’x.” 

Ak xsdjckq bx Sbwmei xodnnkjkq boq xbdq do b 
gbjjidon padxykj, “Xesk ykeywk neh Q’x? Ab!” 

Abjji jkbwdrkq habh Akjsdeok pbx weecdon xdqkpbix he 
xkk pabh njbqk ak abq jkgkdlkq; ak xwdq adx 
seeoxheok kxxbi vbgc dohe adx vbn bx ftdgcwi bx 
yexxdvwk, mkkwdon habh ak petwq jbhakj ckky habh 
domejsbhdeo yjdlbhk. 

Qkhkjsdokq oeh he ndlk Xobyk bo kugtxk he mbdw ads 
hadx wkxxeo, Abjji jkbq boq jkjkbq klkji wdok em hak 
doxhjtghdeox eo hak vwbgcvebjq bh wkbxh hajkk hdskx 
vkmejk bghdon eo haks. Adx Xhjkonhakodon Xewthdeo 
pbx oeh yjkgdxkwi hak gwkbj htjftedxk xabqk em 
Akjsdeok ’x vth dh pbx bh wkbxh vwtk jbhakj habo ydoc, 
wdck Okldwwk’x, boq ak qkwdlkjkq b mwbxc em dh he Xobyk’x 

qkxc bh hak koq em hak wkxxeo pdha b mkkwdon em sdonwkq 
qkmdbogk boq jkwdkm. 

“Pkww, habh pbxo’h bx vbq bx wbxh pkkc, pbx dh?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, bx haki gwdsvkq hak xhkyx eth em hak 
qtonkeo boq sbqk hakdj pbi bgjexx hak kohjbogk abww 
hepbjq wtoga. “Boq hak aeskpejc qdqo’h ne hee vbqwi 
kdhakj, qdq dh?” 

Pako okdhakj Jeo oej Abjji boxpkjkq, xak yjkxxkq 
eo, “D skbo, bww jdnah, D qdqo’h kuykgh hak hey njbqk, 
oeh dm ak’x sbjcdon he E.P.W. xhboqbjq, vth b ybxx dx 
ftdhk kogetjbndon bh hadx xhbnk, petwqo’h iet xbi?” 

Abjji sbqk b oeogessdhhbw oedxk do adx hajebh. 

“Em getjxk, b weh gbo abyyko vkhpkko oep boq hak 
kubs, pk’lk neh ywkohi em hdsk he dsyjelk, vth hak 
njbqkx pk’jk nkhhdon oep bjk b xejh em vbxkwdok, bjko’h 
haki? Xeskhadon pk gbo vtdwq eo ...” 

Haki xbh qepo henkhakj bh hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk. 

“Evldetxwi, D’q ablk vkko hajdwwkq dm D’q nehhko bo E — ” 

“Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo xabjywi, “dm iet pboh he coep 
pabh njbqkx pk neh, bxc.” 

“D qeo’h — D qdqo’h skbo — pkww, dm iet pboh he hkww sk 

“D neh b Y,” xbdq Jeo, wbqwdon xety dohe adx vepw. 
“Abyyi?” 

“Pkww, habh’x oehadon he vk bxabskq em,” xbdq Mjkq, 
pae abq ztxh bjjdlkq bh hak hbvwk pdha Nkejnk boq Wkk 
Zejqbo boq pbx xdhhdon qepo eo Abjji’x jdnah. 
“Oehadon pjeon pdha b neeq akbwhai Y.” 

“Vth,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “qekxo’h Y xhboq mej ...” 

“ Veej,’ ikba,” xbdq Wkk Zejqbo. “Xhdww, vkhhkj habo Q, 
dxo’h dh? ‘Qjkbqmtw’?” 

Abjji mkwh adx mbgk njep pbjs boq mbckq b xsbww 
getnadon mdh elkj adx jeww. Pako ak kskjnkq mjes hadx 
ak pbx xejji he mdoq habh Akjsdeok pbx xhdww do mtww 
mwep bveth E.P.W. njbqkx. 

“Xe hey njbqk’x E mej ‘Ethxhboqdon,’ ” xak pbx xbidon, 
“boq hako hakjk’x B — ” 

“Oe, K,” Nkejnk gejjkghkq akj, “K mej ‘Kugkkqx 
Kuykghbhdeox.’ Boq D’lk bwpbix haetnah Mjkq boq D 
xaetwq’lk neh K do klkjihadon, vkgbtxk pk kugkkqkq 
kuykghbhdeox ztxh vi htjodon ty mej hak kubsx.” 

Haki bww wbtnakq kugkyh Akjsdeok, pae ywepkq eo, 

“Xe bmhkj K, dh’x B mej ‘Bggkyhbvwk,’ boq habh’x hak wbxh

“Iky,” xbdq Mjkq, qtocdon bo kohdjk jeww do adx xety, 
hjboxmkjjdon dh he adx setha, boq xpbwwepdon dh paewk.

habo b Q? Pabh eo kbjha qekx habh xhboq mej?” 

“ Hjeww,’ ” xbdq Nkejnk yjesyhwi.

mjes oep eo.

haks.

“Oeh habh vbq. Tsvjdqnk ztxh wtjckq do hak gejokj

bjk oejsbwwi wdck, Bwdgdb hewq akj haki pkjk jkbwwi

dm iet sdxx boi sejk Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgkx.”

ytwwdon eth adx qjkbs qdbji do b xkbh bh hak lkji vbgc

bh eogk. Hak bvjtyh mbww do hak oedxk wklkw sbqk

D hjtxh? Ndldon hak hdsk boq qbhk em ietj doxykghdeo?” 

Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki oeqqkq gtjhwi boq, weecdon lkji

mwepkji vbn, boq weeckq ty kuykghbohwi, pbdhdon mej

hkww sk eok.”

Boq vi hak hdsk xak abq dohkjyjkhkq Abjji’x qjkbsx

hadx hdsk, Sdxx Njbonkj?”

Hakjk pbx bo ethvjkbc em sthhkjdon bh hadx. 

“Pabh mej?” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi.
