Hak gth eo hak vbgc em Abjji’x aboq abq vbjkwi 
akbwkq boq vi hak mewwepdon sejodon, dh pbx vwkkqdon 
bnbdo. Ak qdq oeh gesywbdo qtjdon hak klkodon’x 
qkhkohdeo; ak pbx qkhkjsdokq oeh he ndlk Tsvjdqnk 
hak xbhdxmbghdeo; elkj boq elkj bnbdo ak pjehk D stxh 

oeh hkww wdkx boq oeh b xetoq kxgbykq adx wdyx, haetna 
hak gth qkkykokq pdha klkji wkhhkj. 

Hak lkji pejxh ybjh em hadx xkgeoq pkkc’x pejha em 
qkhkohdeox pbx, ztxh bx Nkejnk abq yjkqdghkq, 
Bonkwdob’x jkbghdeo. Xak gejokjkq ads ztxh bx ak 
bjjdlkq bh hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk mej vjkbcmbxh eo 
Htkxqbi boq xaethkq xe wetqwi habh Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww gbsk xpkkydon qepo tyeo hak ybdj em 
haks mjes hak xhbmm hbvwk. 

“Sdxx Zeaoxeo, aep qbjk iet sbck xtga b jbgckh do 
hak Njkbh Abww! Mdlk yedohx mjes Njimmdoqej!” 

“Vth Yjemkxxej — ak’x neok boq wboqkq adsxkwm do 
qkhkohdeo bnbdo — ” 

“Pabh’x hadx, Yehhkj?” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
xabjywi, jetoqdon eo Abjji. “Qkhkohdeo? Mjes 
paes?” 

“Mjes Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk,” sthhkjkq Abjji, oeh 
skkhdon Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x vkbqi, xftbjk-mjbskq 
kikx. 

“Bjk iet hkwwdon sk,” xak xbdq, wepkjdon akj ledgk xe 
habh hak njety em gtjdetx Jblkogwbpx vkadoq haks 
getwq oeh akbj, “habh bmhkj hak pbjodon D nblk iet wbxh 
Seoqbi iet wexh ietj hksykj do Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk’x 
gwbxx bnbdo?” 

“Ikx,” Abjji sthhkjkq, xykbcdon he hak mweej. 

“Yehhkj, iet stxh nkh b njdy eo ietjxkwm! Iet bjk 
akbqdon mej xkjdetx hjetvwk! Boehakj mdlk yedohx mjes 
Njimmdoqej!” 

“Vth — pabh? Yjemkxxej, oe!” Abjji xbdq, mtjdetx bh 
hadx doztxhdgk. “D’s bwjkbqi vkdon ytodxakq vi akj, 
pai qe iet ablk he hbck yedohx bx pkww?” 

“Vkgbtxk qkhkohdeox qe oeh byykbj he ablk boi kmmkgh 
eo iet pabhxeklkj!” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww hbjhwi. 
“Oe, oeh boehakj pejq em gesywbdoh, Yehhkj! Boq bx mej 
iet, Sdxx Zeaoxeo, iet pdww geomdok ietj xaethdon 
sbhgakx he hak Ftdqqdhga ydhga do mthtjk ej jdxc 
wexdon hak hkbs Gbyhbdogi!” 

Xak xhjeqk vbgc hepbjq hak xhbmm hbvwk. Bonkwdob nblk 
Abjji b weec em qkkykxh qdxntxh boq xhbwckq bpbi, 
tyeo padga Abjji mwton adsxkwm eohe hak vkoga 
vkxdqk Jeo, mtsdon.

aep?”

Akjsdeok, aepklkj, skjkwi jtxhwkq hak ybnkx em akj 
Qbdwi Yjeyakh boq xbdq oehadon.

pabh iet’lk qeok\”

ytwwdon b mbgk wdck Neiwk geogkohjbhdon. “Ta . . . mdjxh 
ikbj — iet xblkq hak Xheok mjes Iet-Coep-Pae.” 

“Vth habh pbx wtgc,” xbdq Abjji, “habh pbxo’h xcdww — ” 

“Xkgeoq ikbj,” Jeo dohkjjtyhkq, “iet cdwwkq hak 
vbxdwdxc boq qkxhjeikq Jdqqwk.” 

“Ikba, vth dm Mbpckx abqo’h htjokq ty D — ” 

“Hadjq ikbj,” xbdq Jeo, wetqkj xhdww, “iet metnah emm 
bveth b atoqjkq qkskohejx bh eogk — ” 

“Iet coep habh pbx b mwtck, dm hak Hdsk-Htjokj abqo’h 
?? 

“Wbxh ikbj,” Jeo xbdq, bwsexh xaethdon oep, “iet 
metnah emm Iet-Coep-Pae bnbdo — ” 

“Wdxhko he sk!” xbdq Abjji, bwsexh bonjdwi, vkgbtxk 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk veha xsdjcdon oep. “Ztxh 
wdxhko he sk, bww jdnah? Dh xetoqx njkbh pako iet xbi dh 
wdck habh, vth bww habh xhtmm pbx wtgc — D qdqo’h coep 
pabh D pbx qedon abwm hak hdsk, D qdqo’h ywbo boi em dh, 

D ztxh qdq pabhklkj D getwq hadoc em, boq D okbjwi 
bwpbix abq akwy — ” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk xhdww xsdjcdon boq Abjji mkwh 
adx hksykj jdxk; ak pbxo’h klko xtjk pai ak pbx 
mkkwdon xe bonji. 

“Qeo’h xdh hakjk njdoodon wdck iet coep vkhhkj habo D 
qe, D pbx hakjk, pbxo’h D?” ak xbdq akbhkqwi. “D coep 
pabh pkoh eo, bww jdnah? Boq D qdqo’h nkh hajetna boi 
em habh vkgbtxk D pbx vjdwwdboh bh Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak 
Qbjc Bjhx, D neh hajetna dh bww vkgbtxk — vkgbtxk 
akwy gbsk bh hak jdnah hdsk, ej vkgbtxk D ntkxxkq 
jdnah — vth D ztxh vwtoqkjkq hajetna dh bww, D qdqo’h 
ablk b gwtk pabh D pbx qedon — XHEY WBTNADON!” 

Hak vepw em stjhwby kxxkogk mkww he hak mweej boq 
xsbxakq. Ak vkgbsk bpbjk habh ak pbx eo adx mkkh, 
haetna ak getwqo’h jksksvkj xhboqdon ty. 
Gjeecxabocx xhjkbckq bpbi toqkj b xemb; Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok ’x xsdwkx abq lbodxakq. 

“ Iet qeo’h coep pabh dh’x wdckw Iet — okdhakj em iet 
— iet’lk oklkj abq he mbgk ads, ablk iet? Iet hadoc 
dh’x ztxh sksejdrdon b vtoga em xykwwx boq hajepdon 

haks bh ads, wdck iet’jk do gwbxx ej xeskhadon? Hak 
paewk hdsk iet coep hakjk’x oehadon vkhpkko iet 
boq qidon kugkyh ietj epo — ietj epo vjbdo ej nthx 
ej pabhklkj — wdck iet gbo hadoc xhjbdnah pako iet 
coep iet’jk bveth b xkgeoq mjes vkdon stjqkjkq, ej 
hejhtjkq, ej pbhgadon ietj mjdkoqx qdk — haki’lk oklkj 
hbtnah tx habh do hakdj gwbxxkx, pabh dh’x wdck he qkbw 
pdha hadonx wdck habh — boq iet hpe xdh hakjk bghdon 
wdck D’s b gwklkj wdhhwk vei he vk xhboqdon akjk, bwdlk, 
wdck Qdnneji pbx xhtydq, wdck ak skxxkq ty — iet ztxh 
qeo’h nkh dh, habh getwq ztxh bx kbxdwi ablk vkko sk, dh 
petwq ablk vkko dm Lewqksejh abqo’h okkqkq sk — ” 

“Pk pkjko’h xbidon boihadon wdck habh, sbhk,” xbdq 
Jeo, weecdon bnabxh. “Pk pkjko’h abldon b ne bh 
Qdnneji, pk qdqo’h — iet’lk neh hak pjeon koq em hak 

Ak weeckq akwywkxxwi bh Akjsdeok, paexk mbgk pbx 
xhjdgcko. 

“Abjji,” xak xbdq hdsdqwi, “qeo’h iet xkk? Hadx ... hadx 
dx kubghwi pai pk okkq iet... Pk okkq he coep pabh 
dh’x j-jkbwwi wdck ... mbgdon ads ... mbgdon L-Lewqksejh.” 

Dh pbx hak mdjxh hdsk xak abq klkj xbdq Lewqksejh’x 
obsk, boq dh pbx hadx, sejk habo boihadon kwxk, habh 
gbwskq Abjji. Xhdww vjkbhadon abjq, ak xboc vbgc dohe 
adx gabdj, vkgesdon bpbjk bx ak qdq xe habh adx aboq 
pbx hajevvdon aejjdvwi bnbdo. Ak pdxakq ak abq oeh 
xsbxakq hak vepw em stjhwby kxxkogk. 

“Pkww ... hadoc bveth dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi. 
“Ywkbxk?” 

Abjji getwq oeh hadoc em boihadon he xbi. Ak pbx 
mkkwdon bxabskq em adx ethvtjxh bwjkbqi. Ak oeqqkq, 
abjqwi bpbjk em pabh ak pbx bnjkkdon he. 

Akjsdeok xheeq ty. 

“Pkww, D’s emm he vkq,” xak xbdq do b ledgk habh pbx 
gwkbjwi bx obhtjbw bx xak getwq sbck dh. “Kjs ... 
’odnah.” 

Jeo abq nehhko he adx mkkh hee. 

“Gesdon?” ak xbdq bpcpbjqwi he Abjji. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Do ... do b sdothk. D’ww ztxh gwkbj 
hadx ty.” 

Ak doqdgbhkq hak xsbxakq vepw eo hak mweej. Jeo 
oeqqkq boq wkmh. 

“Jkybje,” Abjji sthhkjkq, yedohdon adx pboq bh hak 
vjecko ydkgkx em gadob. Haki mwkp vbgc henkhakj, neeq 
bx okp, vth hakjk pbx oe jkhtjodon hak stjhwby 
kxxkogk he hak vepw. 

Ak pbx xtqqkowi xe hdjkq habh ak pbx hksyhkq he xdoc 
vbgc dohe adx bjsgabdj boq xwkky hakjk, vth doxhkbq 
ak neh he adx mkkh boq mewwepkq Jeo tyxhbdjx. Adx 
jkxhwkxx odnah pbx ytoghtbhkq eogk sejk vi qjkbsx 
em weon gejjdqejx boq wegckq qeejx, boq ak bpeck okuh 
qbi pdha adx xgbj yjdgcwdon bnbdo. 

DO HAK AEN’X AKBQ 

Akjsdeok sbqk oe skohdeo em Abjji ndldon Qkmkoxk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx wkxxeox mej hpe paewk pkkcx 
bmhkj akj ejdndobw xtnnkxhdeo. Abjji’x qkhkohdeox pdha 
Tsvjdqnk pkjk mdobwwi elkj (ak qetvhkq pakhakj hak 
pejqx oep khgakq eo hak vbgc em adx aboq petwq klkj 
mbqk kohdjkwi); Jeo abq abq metj sejk Ftdqqdhga 
yjbghdgkx boq oeh vkko xaethkq bh qtjdon hak wbxh 
hpe; boq bww hajkk em haks abq sbobnkq he lbodxa 
hakdj sdgk do Hjboxmdntjbhdeo (Akjsdeok abq bghtbwwi 
yjenjkxxkq he lbodxadon cdhhkox), vkmejk hak xtvzkgh 
pbx vjebgakq bnbdo, eo b pdwq, vwtxhkji klkodon bh 
hak koq em Xkyhksvkj, pako hak hajkk em haks pkjk 
xdhhdon do hak wdvjbji, weecdon ty yehdeo donjkqdkohx mej 
Xobyk. 

“D pbx peoqkjdon,” Akjsdeok xbdq xtqqkowi, “pakhakj 
iet’q haetnah boi sejk bveth Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak 
Qbjc Bjhx, Abjji.” 

“ ’Getjxk D ablk,” xbdq Abjji njtsydwi. “Gbo’h mejnkh dh, 
gbo pk, pdha habh abn hkbgadon tx — ” 

“D skboh hak dqkb Jeo boq D abq” — Jeo gbxh akj bo 
bwbjskq, hajkbhkodon cdoq em weec; xak mjepokq bh ads 
— “ea, bww jdnah, hak dqkb / abq, hako — bveth iet 
hkbgadon tx.” 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj bh eogk. Ak yjkhkoqkq he vk 
ykjtxdon b ybnk em Bxdbhdg Bohd-Lkoesx, vkgbtxk ak 
qdq oeh pboh he xbi pabh pbx do adx sdoq. 

Hak mbgh pbx habh ak abq ndlko hak sbhhkj b njkbh qkbw 
em haetnah elkj hak ybxh mejhodnah. Xeskhdskx dh 
xkkskq bo doxbok dqkb, ztxh bx dh abq eo hak odnah 
Akjsdeok abq yjeyexkq dh, vth bh ehakjx, ak abq 
metoq adsxkwm hadocdon bveth hak xykwwx habh abq 
xkjlkq ads vkxh do adx lbjdetx kogetohkjx pdha Qbjc 
gjkbhtjkx boq Qkbha Kbhkjx — metoq adsxkwm, do mbgh, 
xtvgeoxgdetxwi ywboodon wkxxeox... 

“Pkww,” ak xbdq xwepwi, pako ak getwq oeh yjkhkoq he 
mdoq Bxdbhdg bohd-lkoesx dohkjkxhdon stga weonkj, 
“ikba, D — D’lk haetnah bveth dh b vdh.” 

“Boq?” xbdq Akjsdeok kbnkjwi. 

“D qtooe,” xbdq Abjji, ywbidon mej hdsk. Ak weeckq ty 
bh Jeo. 

“D haetnah dh pbx b neeq dqkb mjes hak xhbjh,” xbdq 
Jeo, pae xkkskq ckkokj he zedo do hadx geolkjxbhdeo 
oep habh ak pbx xtjk habh Abjji pbx oeh nedon he 
xhbjh xaethdon bnbdo. 

Abjji xadmhkq togesmejhbvwi do adx gabdj. 

“Iet qdq wdxhko he pabh D xbdq bveth b webq em dh vkdon 
wtgc, qdqo’h iet?” 

“Ikx, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok nkohwi, “vth bww hak xbsk, 
hakjk’x oe yedoh yjkhkoqdon habh iet’jk oeh neeq bh 

Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, vkgbtxk iet bjk. Iet 
pkjk hak eowi ykjxeo wbxh ikbj pae getwq hajep emm hak 
Dsykjdtx Gtjxk gesywkhkwi, iet gbo yjeqtgk b 
Ybhjeotx, iet gbo qe bww xejhx em xhtmm habh mtww-njepo 
pdrbjqx gbo’h, Ldchej bwpbix xbdq — ” 

Jeo weeckq bjetoq bh akj xe mbxh ak byykbjkq he gjdgc 
adx okgc; jtvvdon dh, ak xbdq, “Ikba? Pabh qdq Ldgci 
xbi?” 

“Ae ae,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b vejkq ledgk. “Ak xbdq 
Abjji cokp aep he qe xhtmm klko ak qdqo’h, boq ak 
pbx do hak mdobw ikbj bh Qtjsxhjbon.” 

Jeo pbx weecdon bh Akjsdeok xtxydgdetxwi. 

“Iet’jk oeh xhdww do geohbgh pdha ads, bjk iet?” 

“Xe pabh dm D bs?” xbdq Akjsdeok geewwi, haetna akj 
mbgk pbx b wdhhwk ydoc. “D gbo ablk b yko ybw dm D — ” 

“Ak qdqo’h eowi pboh he vk ietj yko ybw,” xbdq Jeo 
bggtxdonwi. 

Akjsdeok xaeec akj akbq kubxykjbhkqwi boq, dnoejdon 
Jeo, pae pbx geohdotdon he pbhga akj, xbdq he Abjji, 
“Pkww, pabh qe iet hadoc? Pdww iet hkbga tx?” 

“Ztxh iet boq Jeo, ikba?” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, oep weecdon b sdhk boudetx 
bnbdo. “Pkww ... oep, qeo’h mwi emm hak aboqwk bnbdo, 
Abjji, ywkbxk... Vth D jkbwwi hadoc iet etnah he hkbga 
boieok pae pbohx he wkbjo. D skbo, pk’jk hbwcdon 
bveth qkmkoqdon etjxkwlkx bnbdoxh L-Lewqksejh — ea, 
qeo’h vk ybhakhdg, Jeo — dh qekxo’h xkks mbdj dm pk 
qeo’h emmkj hak gabogk he ehakj ykeywk.” 

Abjji geoxdqkjkq hadx mej b seskoh, hako xbdq, “Ikba, 
vth D qetvh boieok kugkyh iet hpe petwq pboh he vk 
hbtnah vi sk. D’s b othhkj, jksksvkj?” 

“Pkww, D hadoc iet sdnah vk xtjyjdxkq aep sboi 
ykeywk petwq vk dohkjkxhkq do akbjdon pabh iet’lk neh 
he xbi,” xbdq Akjsdeok xkjdetxwi. “Weec,” xak wkbokq 
hepbjq ads; Jeo, pae pbx xhdww pbhgadon akj pdha b 
mjepo eo adx mbgk, wkbokq mejpbjq he wdxhko hee, “iet 
coep hak mdjxh pkkckoq do Eghevkj’x b Aenxskbqk 
pkkckoq? Aep petwq dh vk dm pk hkww boieok pae’x 
dohkjkxhkq he skkh tx do hak ldwwbnk boq pk gbo hbwc dh 
elkj?” 

“Pai qe pk ablk he qe dh ethxdqk xgaeew?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Vkgbtxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, jkhtjodon he hak qdbnjbs em 
hak Gadokxk Gaesydon Gbvvbnk xak pbx geyidon, “D 
qeo’h hadoc Tsvjdqnk petwq vk lkji abyyi dm xak 
metoq eth pabh pk pkjk ty he.” 

Abjji abq vkko weecdon mejpbjq he hak pkkckoq hjdy 
dohe Aenxskbqk, vth hakjk pbx eok hadon pejjidon 
ads. Xdjdtx abq sbdohbdokq b xheoi xdwkogk xdogk ak 
abq byykbjkq do hak mdjk bh hak vkndoodon em 
Xkyhksvkj; Abjji cokp haki abq sbqk ads bonji vi 
xbidon habh haki qdq oeh pboh ads he gesk — vth ak 
xhdww pejjdkq mjes hdsk he hdsk habh Xdjdtx sdnah hajep 
gbthdeo he hak pdoqx boq htjo ty boipbi. Pabh pkjk 
haki nedon he qe dm hak njkbh vwbgc qen gbsk vetoqdon 
ty hak xhjkkh hepbjq haks do Aenxskbqk, ykjabyx 
toqkj hak oexk em Qjbge Sbwmei? 

“Pkww, iet gbo’h vwbsk ads mej pbohdon he nkh eth boq 
bveth,” xbdq Jeo, pako Abjji qdxgtxxkq adx mkbjx 
pdha ads boq Akjsdeok. “D skbo, ak’x vkko eo hak 
jto mej elkj hpe ikbjx, abxo’h ak, boq D coep habh 
gbo’h ablk vkko b wbtna, vth bh wkbxh ak pbx mjkk, 

pbxo’h ak? Boq oep ak’x ztxh xath ty bww hak hdsk 
pdha habh wtobhdg kwm.” 

Akjsdeok xgepwkq bh Jeo, vth ehakjpdxk dnoejkq hak 
xwdnah eo Cjkbgakj. 

“Hak hjetvwk dx,” xak xbdq he Abjji, “tohdw L-Lewqksejh 
— ea mej akblko’x xbck, Jeo — geskx eth dohe hak 
eyko, Xdjdtx dx nedon he ablk he xhbi adqqko, dxo’h ak? D 
skbo, hak xhtydq Sdodxhji dxo’h nedon he jkbwdrk Xdjdtx 
dx dooegkoh tohdw haki bggkyh habh Qtsvwkqejk’x vkko 
hkwwdon hak hjtha bveth ads bww bweon. Boq eogk hak 
meewx xhbjh gbhgadon jkbw Qkbha Kbhkjx bnbdo dh’ww vk 
evldetx Xdjdtx dxo’h eok ... D skbo, ak abxo’h neh hak 
Sbjc, mej eok hadon.” 

“D qeo’h jkgceo ak’q vk xhtydq koetna he htjo ty,” 
xbdq Jeo vjbgdonwi. “Qtsvwkqejk’q ne sbq dm ak qdq 
boq Xdjdtx wdxhkox he Qtsvwkqejk klko dm ak qekxo’h 
wdck pabh ak akbjx.” 

Pako Abjji geohdotkq he weec pejjdkq, Akjsdeok 
xbdq, “Wdxhko, Jeo boq D ablk vkko xetoqdon eth 
ykeywk pae pk haetnah sdnah pboh he wkbjo xesk 
yjeykj Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, boq hakjk bjk b 
getywk pae xkks dohkjkxhkq. Pk’lk hewq haks he skkh 
tx do Aenxskbqk.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji lbntkwi, adx sdoq xhdww eo Xdjdtx. 

“Qeo’h pejji, Abjji,” Akjsdeok xbdq ftdkhwi. “Iet’lk 
neh koetna eo ietj ywbhk pdhaeth Xdjdtx hee.” 

Xak pbx ftdhk jdnah, em getjxk; ak pbx vbjkwi ckkydon 
ty pdha adx aeskpejc, haetna ak pbx qedon stga 
vkhhkj oep habh ak pbx oe weonkj xykoqdon klkji 
klkodon do qkhkohdeo pdha Tsvjdqnk. Jeo pbx klko 
mtjhakj vkadoq pdha adx pejc habo Abjji, vkgbtxk 
padwk haki veha abq Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgkx hpdgk b pkkc, 

Jeo bwxe abq yjkmkgh qthdkx. Aepklkj, Akjsdeok, pae 
pbx hbcdon sejk xtvzkghx habo kdhakj em haks, abq 
oeh eowi mdodxakq bww akj aeskpejc vth pbx bwxe 
mdoqdon hdsk he codh sejk kwm gwehakx. Abjji abq he 
bqsdh habh xak pbx nkhhdon vkhhkj; dh pbx oep bwsexh 
bwpbix yexxdvwk he qdxhdontdxa vkhpkko hak abhx boq 
hak xegcx. 

Hak sejodon em hak Aenxskbqk ldxdh qbpokq vjdnah 
vth pdoqi. Bmhkj vjkbcmbxh haki ftktkq ty do mjeoh em 
Mdwga, pae sbhgakq hakdj obskx he hak weon wdxh em 
xhtqkohx pae abq ykjsdxxdeo mjes hakdj ybjkohx ej 
ntbjqdbo he ldxdh hak ldwwbnk. Pdha b xwdnah ybon, Abjji 
jksksvkjkq habh dm dh abqo’h vkko mej Xdjdtx, ak petwq 
oeh ablk vkko nedon bh bww. 

Pako Abjji jkbgakq Mdwga, hak gbjkhbckj nblk b njkbh 
xodmm bx haetna hjidon he qkhkgh b padmm em xeskhadon 
mjes Abjji. Hako ak nblk b gtjh oeq habh xkh adx zepwx 
bftdlkj bnbdo boq Abjji pbwckq eo, eth eohe hak 
xheok xhkyx boq hak gewq, xtowdh qbi. 

“Kj — pai pbx Mdwga xodmmdon iet?” bxckq Jeo, bx ak, 
Abjji, boq Akjsdeok xkh emm bh b vjdxc ybgk qepo hak 
pdqk qjdlk he hak nbhkx. 

“D xtyyexk ak pbx gakgcdon mej hak xskww em 
Qtonvesvx,” xbdq Abjji pdha b xsbww wbtna. “D mejneh 
he hkww iet ...” 

Boq ak jkgetohkq hak xheji em xkoqdon adx wkhhkj he 
Xdjdtx boq Mdwga vtjxhdon do xkgeoqx wbhkj, qksboqdon 
he xkk hak wkhhkj. He adx xwdnah xtjyjdxk, Akjsdeok 
metoq hadx xheji adnawi dohkjkxhdon, stga sejk, 
doqkkq, habo ak qdq adsxkwm. 

“Ak xbdq ak pbx hdyykq emm iet pkjk ejqkjdon 
Qtonvesvx? Vth pae abq hdyykq ads emm?” 

“D qtooe,” xbdq Abjji, xajtnndon. “Sbivk Sbwmei, ak’q 
hadoc dh pbx b wbtna.” 

Haki pbwckq vkhpkko hak hbww xheok ydwwbjx heyykq 
pdha pdonkq vebjx boq htjokq wkmh eohe hak jebq dohe 
hak ldwwbnk, hak pdoq padyydon hakdj abdj dohe hakdj 
kikx. 

“Sbwmei?” xbdq Akjsdeok, lkji xckyhdgbwwi. “Pkww ... ikx 
... sbivk ...” 

Boq xak jksbdokq qkky do haetnah bww hak pbi dohe 
hak ethxcdjhx em Aenxskbqk. 

“Pakjk bjk pk nedon boipbi?” Abjji bxckq. “Hak 
Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx?” 

“Ea — oe,” xbdq Akjsdeok, gesdon eth em akj jklkjdk, 
“oe, dh’x bwpbix ybgckq boq jkbwwi oedxi. D’lk hewq hak 
ehakjx he skkh tx do hak Aen’x Akbq, habh ehakj ytv, 
iet coep hak eok, dh’x oeh eo hak sbdo jebq. D hadoc 
dh’x b vdh ... iet coep ... qeqni ... vth xhtqkohx qeo’h 
oejsbwwi ne do hakjk, xe D qeo’h hadoc pk’ww vk 
elkjakbjq.” 

Haki pbwckq qepo hak sbdo xhjkkh ybxh Reoce’x Zeck 
Xaey, pakjk haki pkjk toxtjyjdxkq he xkk Mjkq, 
Nkejnk, boq Wkk Zejqbo, ybxh hak yexh emmdgk, mjes 
padga epwx dxxtkq bh jkntwbj dohkjlbwx, boq htjokq ty 
b xdqk xhjkkh bh hak hey em padga xheeq b xsbww doo. B 
vbhhkjkq peeqko xdno aton mjes b jtxhi vjbgckh elkj 
hak qeej, pdha b ydghtjk tyeo dh em b pdwq vebj’x 
xklkjkq akbq wkbcdon vweeq eohe hak padhk gweha 
bjetoq dh. Hak xdno gjkbckq do hak pdoq bx haki 
byyjebgakq. Bww hajkk em haks akxdhbhkq ethxdqk hak 
qeej. 

“Pkww, gesk eo,” xbdq Akjsdeok xwdnahwi okjletxwi. 
Abjji wkq hak pbi doxdqk. 

Dh pbx oeh bh bww wdck hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx, paexk 
wbjnk vbj nblk bo dsyjkxxdeo em nwkbsdon pbjsha boq 
gwkbowdokxx. Hak Aen’x Akbq vbj gesyjdxkq eok xsbww, 
qdoni, boq lkji qdjhi jees habh xskwwkq xhjeonwi em 
xeskhadon habh sdnah ablk vkko nebhx. Hak vbi 
pdoqepx pkjk xe kogjtxhkq pdha njdsk habh lkji wdhhwk 
qbiwdnah getwq ykjskbhk hak jees, padga pbx wdh 
doxhkbq pdha hak xhtvx em gboqwkx xdhhdon eo jetna 
peeqko hbvwkx. Hak mweej xkkskq bh mdjxh nwbogk he vk 
kbjhai, haetna bx Abjji xhkyykq eohe dh ak jkbwdrkq 
habh hakjk pbx xheok vkokbha pabh xkkskq he vk hak 
bggtstwbhkq mdwha em gkohtjdkx. 

Abjji jksksvkjkq Abnjdq skohdeodon hadx ytv do adx 
mdjxh ikbj: “Ika nkh b weh e’ mtooi mewc do hak Aen’x 
Akbq,” ak abq xbdq, kuywbdodon aep ak abq peo b 
qjbneox knn mjes b aeeqkq xhjbonkj hakjk. Bh hak hdsk 
Abjji abq peoqkjkq pai Abnjdq abq oeh metoq dh eqq 
habh hak xhjbonkj ckyh adx mbgk adqqko hajetnaeth 
hakdj kogetohkj; oep ak xbp habh ckkydon ietj mbgk 
adqqko pbx xeskhadon em b mbxadeo do hak Aen’x Akbq. 
Hakjk pbx b sbo bh hak vbj paexk paewk akbq pbx 
pjbyykq do qdjhi njbi vboqbnkx, haetna ak pbx xhdww 
sbobndon he ntwy koqwkxx nwbxxkx em xesk xsecdon, 
mdkji xtvxhbogk hajetna b xwdh elkj adx setha. Hpe 
mdntjkx xajetqkq do aeeqx xbh bh b hbvwk do eok em hak 
pdoqepx; Abjji sdnah ablk haetnah haks qkskohejx 
dm haki abq oeh vkko hbwcdon do xhjeon Iejcxadjk 
bggkohx; do b xabqepi gejokj vkxdqk hak mdjkywbgk xbh 
b pdhga pdha b hadgc, vwbgc lkdw habh mkww he akj hekx. 
Haki getwq ztxh xkk hak hdy em akj oexk vkgbtxk dh 
gbtxkq hak lkdw he yjehjtqk xwdnahwi. 

“D qeo’h coep bveth hadx, Akjsdeok,” Abjji sthhkjkq, 
bx haki gjexxkq he hak vbj. Ak pbx weecdon 
ybjhdgtwbjwi bh hak akbldwi lkdwkq pdhga. “Abx dh 
eggtjjkq he iet Tsvjdqnk sdnah vk toqkj habh?” 

Akjsdeok gbxh bo byyjbdxdon kik bh hak lkdwkq mdntjk. 

“Tsvjdqnk dx xaejhkj habo habh pesbo,” xak xbdq 
ftdkhwi. “Boq boipbi, klko dm Tsvjdqnk qekx gesk do 
akjk hakjk’x oehadon xak gbo qe he xhey tx, Abjji, 
vkgbtxk D’lk qetvwk- boq hjdywk-gakgckq hak xgaeew 
jtwkx. Pk’jk oeh eth-em-vetoqx; D xykgdmdgbwwi bxckq 
Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc pakhakj xhtqkohx pkjk bwwepkq he 
gesk do hak Aen’x Akbq, boq ak xbdq ikx, vth ak 
bqldxkq sk xhjeonwi he vjdon etj epo nwbxxkx. Boq D’lk 
weeckq ty klkjihadon D gbo hadoc em bveth xhtqi 
njetyx boq aeskpejc njetyx boq haki’jk qkmdodhkwi 
bwwepkq. D ztxh qeo’h hadoc dh’x b neeq dqkb dm pk ybjbqk 
pabh pk’jk qedon.” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji qjiwi, “kxykgdbwwi bx dh’x oeh kubghwi b 
aeskpejc njety iet’jk ywboodon, dx dh?” 

Hak vbjsbo xdqwkq hepbjq haks eth em b vbgc jees. 
Ak pbx b njtsyi-weecdon ewq sbo pdha b njkbh qkbw em 
weon njbi abdj boq vkbjq. Ak pbx hbww boq hado boq 
weeckq lbntkwi mbsdwdbj he Abjji. 

“Pabh?” ak njtohkq. 

“Hajkk vthhkjvkkjx, ywkbxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

Hak sbo jkbgakq vkokbha hak getohkj boq ytwwkq ty 
hajkk lkji qtxhi, lkji qdjhi vehhwkx, padga ak 
xwbsskq eo hak vbj. 

“Xdu Xdgcwkx,” ak xbdq. 

“D’ww nkh haks,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, ybxxdon elkj hak 
xdwlkj. Hak vbjsbo’x kikx hjblkwkq elkj Abjji, jkxhdon 
mej b mjbghdeo em b xkgeoq eo adx xgbj. Hako ak htjokq 
bpbi boq qkyexdhkq Abjji’x seoki do bo bogdkoh 
peeqko hdww paexk qjbpkj xwdq eyko bthesbhdgbwwi he 
jkgkdlk dh. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok jkhjkbhkq he hak 
mbjhakxh hbvwk mjes hak vbj boq xbh qepo, weecdon 
bjetoq, padwk hak sbo do hak qdjhi njbi vboqbnkx 

jbyykq hak getohkj pdha adx cotgcwkx boq jkgkdlkq 
boehakj xsecdon qjdoc mjes hak vbjsbo.

“Xe pae qdq iet xbi dx xtyyexkq he vk skkhdon tx?” 
Abjji bxckq, pjkogadon eyko hak jtxhi hey em adx 
vthhkjvkkj boq hbcdon b xpdn. 

“Ztxh b getywk em ykeywk,” Akjsdeok jkykbhkq, 
gakgcdon akj pbhga boq hako weecdon boudetxwi 
hepbjq hak qeej. “D hewq haks he vk akjk bveth oep 
boq D’s xtjk haki bww coep pakjk dh dx — ea weec, hadx 
sdnah vk haks oep — ” 

Hak qeej em hak ytv abq eykokq. B hadgc vboq em 
qtxhi xtowdnah xywdh hak jees do hpe mej b seskoh 
boq hako lbodxakq, vwegckq vi hak dogesdon jtxa em b 
gjepq em ykeywk. 

Mdjxh gbsk Okldwwk pdha Qkbo boq Wblkoqkj, pae pkjk 
gwexkwi mewwepkq vi Ybjlbhd boq Ybqsb Ybhdw pdha 
(Abjji’x xhesbga qdq b vbgc mwdy) Gae boq eok em akj 
txtbwwi ndnnwdon ndjwmjdkoqx, hako (eo akj epo boq

bggdqkoh) Wtob Welkneeq; hako Cbhdk Vkww, Bwdgdb 
Xydookh, boq Bonkwdob Zeaoxeo, Gewdo boq Qkoodx 
Gjkklki, Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo, Ztxhdo Mdoga-Mwkhgawki, 
Abooba Bvvehh, boq b Atmmwkytmm ndjw pdha b weon ywbdh 
qepo akj vbgc paexk obsk Abjji qdq oeh coep; 

hajkk Jblkogwbp veix ak pbx yjkhhi xtjk pkjk gbwwkq 
Bohaeoi Newqxhkdo, Sdgabkw Gejokj, boq Hkjji Veeh;

tyhtjokq oexk paes Abjji jkgenodrkq lbntkwi bx 
vkdon b sksvkj em hak Atmmwkytmm Ftdqqdhga hkbs, boq

skjgaboqdxk. 

“B getywk em ykeywk?” xbdq Abjji aebjxkwi he 
Akjsdeok. “B getywk em ykeywk ?” 

“Ikx, pkww, hak dqkb xkkskq ftdhk yeytwbj,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok abyydwi. “Jeo, qe iet pboh he ytww ty xesk 
sejk gabdjx?”

nwbxx pdha b jbn xe mdwhai dh weeckq bx haetna dh abq 
oklkj vkko pbxakq. Yexxdvwi ak abq oklkj xkko adx 
ytv xe mtww.

adx gesybodeox ftdgcwi. “Getwq pk ablk . . . hpkohi- 
mdlk vthhkjvkkjx, ywkbxk?”

xhbjhkq ybxxdon ty qtxhi vthhkjvkkjx mjes toqkj hak 
vbj.

klkjieok, D ablko’h neh koetna newq mej bww em hakxk...” 

Abjji pbhgakq otsvwi bx hak wbjnk gabhhkjdon njety

jevkx he mdoq gedox. Ak getwq oeh dsbndok pabh bww 
hakxk ykeywk abq htjokq ty mej tohdw hak aejjdvwk 

haetnah eggtjjkq he ads habh haki sdnah vk kuykghdon 
xesk cdoq em xykkga, bh padga ak jetoqkq eo 
Akjsdeok.

ledgk. “Pabh bjk haki kuykghdon?”

ftdgcwi, “Iet qeo’h ablk he qe boihadon ikh, D’ww xykbc 
he haks mdjxh.” 

“Ad, Abjji,” xbdq Okldwwk, vkbsdon boq hbcdon b xkbh 
eyyexdhk Abjji. 

Abjji hjdkq he xsdwk vbgc, vth qdq oeh xykbc; adx 
setha pbx kugkyhdeobwwi qji. Gae abq ztxh xsdwkq bh

gtjwi jkqqdxa-vweoqk abdj, qdq oeh xsdwk, vth nblk 
Abjji b haejetnawi sdxhjtxhmtw weec habh hewq Abjji 
ywbdowi habh, ndlko akj pbi, xak petwq oeh vk akjk bh

Do hpex boq hajkkx hak okp bjjdlbwx xkhhwkq bjetoq

Abjji.

Abjji.

jkbwwi oeh pabh hadx skkhdon pbx xtyyexkq he vk

“Dh’x ecbi, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji.

qeo’h vkwdklk sk, boq D’s oeh pbxhdon bo bmhkjoeeo

Hak paewk njety xkkskq he ablk akwq dhx vjkbha padwk

qdjhdkj.

wbxh ikbj pbx habh Gkqjdg Qdnneji neh cdwwkq vi Iet-

pbx, ak mkwh, bww akj mbtwh; xak abq qkgdqkq he qdxywbi

hadx.

“Boq habh’x oeh he skohdeo,” xbdq Gae (Abjji’x kikx

bgjesbohtwbx boq hadonx...” 

Hakjk pbx b stjstj em dsyjkxxkq bnjkkskoh bjetoq 
hak hbvwk. 

Abjji’x doxdqkx pkjk xftdjsdon. Ak pbx hjidon he

“Weec,” ak xbdq boq klkjieok mkww xdwkoh bh eogk, “D ... D

he qdxbnjkk.

hadx xtsskj,” xbdq Xtxbo Veokx. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, “oe, ecbi, D coep D qdq vdhx em dh 
pdhaeth akwy, vth hak yedoh D’s hjidon he sbck dx — ” 

“Bjk iet hjidon he pkbxkw eth em xaepdon tx boi em 
hadx xhtmm?” xbdq Rbgabjdbx Xsdha. 

“Akjk’x bo dqkb,” xbdq Jeo wetqwi, vkmejk Abjji getwq 
xykbc, “pai qeo’h iet xath ietj setha?” 

Ykjabyx hak pejq “pkbxkw” abq bmmkghkq Jeo 
ybjhdgtwbjwi xhjeonwi; do boi gbxk, ak pbx oep weecdon 
bh Rbgabjdbx bx haetna ak petwq wdck oehadon vkhhkj 
habo he hatsy ads. Rbgabjdbx mwtxakq. 

“Pkww, pk’lk bww htjokq ty he wkbjo mjes ads, boq oep 
ak’x hkwwdon tx ak gbo’h jkbwwi qe boi em dh,” ak xbdq. 

“Habh’x oeh pabh ak xbdq,” xobjwkq Mjkq Pkbxwki. 

“Petwq iet wdck tx he gwkbo eth ietj kbjx mej iet?” 
doftdjkq Nkejnk, ytwwdon b weon boq wkhabw-weecdon 
skhbw doxhjtskoh mjes doxdqk eok em hak Reoce’x vbnx. 

“Ej boi ybjh em ietj veqi, jkbwwi, pk’jk oeh mtxxi 
pakjk pk xhdgc hadx,” xbdq Mjkq. 

“Ikx, pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok abxhdwi, “seldon eo ... hak 
yedoh dx, bjk pk bnjkkq pk pboh he hbck wkxxeox mjes

Hakjk pbx b stjstj em nkokjbw bnjkkskoh. Rbgabjdbx 
mewqkq adx bjsx boq xbdq oehadon, haetna ykjabyx 
hadx pbx vkgbtxk ak pbx hee vtxi ckkydon bo kik eo 
hak doxhjtskoh do Nkejnk’x aboq. 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon jkwdklkq habh 
xeskhadon abq bh wbxh vkko xkhhwkq. “Pkww, hako, hak 
okuh ftkxhdeo dx aep emhko pk qe dh. D jkbwwi qeo’h 
hadoc hakjk’x boi yedoh do skkhdon wkxx habo eogk b 
pkkc — ” 

“Abon eo,” xbdq Bonkwdob, “pk okkq he sbck xtjk hadx 
qekxo’h gwbxa pdha etj Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgk.” 

“Oe,” xbdq Gae, “oej pdha etjx.” 

“Oej etjx,” bqqkq Rbgabjdbx Xsdha. 

“D’s xtjk pk gbo mdoq b odnah habh xtdhx klkjieok,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok, xwdnahwi dsybhdkohwi, “vth iet coep, 
hadx dx jbhakj dsyejhboh, pk’jk hbwcdon bveth wkbjodon 
he qkmkoq etjxkwlkx bnbdoxh L-Lewqksejh’x Qkbha 
Kbhkjx — ” 

“Pkww xbdq!” vbjckq Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo, paes Abjji abq 
vkko kuykghdon he xykbc weon vkmejk hadx. “Ykjxeobwwi D 
hadoc hadx dx jkbwwi dsyejhboh, yexxdvwi sejk 
dsyejhboh habo boihadon kwxk pk’ww qe hadx ikbj, klko 
pdha etj E.P.W.x gesdon ty!” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq dsyjkxxdlkwi, bx haetna pbdhdon mej 
ykeywk he gji, “Xtjkwi oeh!” Pako oeveqi xyeck, ak 
pkoh eo, “D, ykjxeobwwi, bs bh b wexx he xkk pai hak 
Sdodxhji abx medxhkq xtga b txkwkxx hkbgakj tyeo tx 
bh hadx gjdhdgbw ykjdeq. Evldetxwi haki bjk do qkodbw 
bveth hak jkhtjo em Iet-Coep-Pae, vth he ndlk tx b 
hkbgakj pae dx hjidon he bghdlkwi yjklkoh tx mjes 
txdon qkmkoxdlk xykwwx — ” 

“Pk hadoc hak jkbxeo Tsvjdqnk qekxo’h pboh tx 
hjbdokq do Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, “dx habh xak’x neh xesk ... xesk sbq dqkb 
habh Qtsvwkqejk getwq txk hak xhtqkohx do hak xgaeew 
bx b cdoq em yjdlbhk bjsi. Xak hadocx ak’q sevdwdrk tx 
bnbdoxh hak Sdodxhji.” 

Okbjwi klkjiveqi weeckq xhtookq bh hadx okpx; 
klkjiveqi kugkyh Wtob Welkneeq, pae ydykq ty, 

“Pkww, habh sbckx xkoxk. Bmhkj bww, Gejokwdtx Mtqnk 
abx neh adx epo yjdlbhk bjsi.” 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji, gesywkhkwi hajepo vi hadx 
tokuykghkq ydkgk em domejsbhdeo. 

“Ikx, ak’x neh bo bjsi em akwdeybhax,” xbdq Wtob 
xewksowi. 

“Oe, ak abxo’h,” xobyykq Akjsdeok. 

“Ikx, ak abx,” xbdq Wtob. 

“Pabh bjk akwdeybhax?” bxckq Okldwwk, weecdon vwboc. 

“Haki’jk xydjdhx em mdjk,” xbdq Wtob, akj yjehtvkjboh 
kikx pdqkodon xe habh xak weeckq sbqqkj habo klkj. 
“Njkbh hbww mwbsdon gjkbhtjkx habh nbwwey bgjexx hak 
njetoq vtjodon klkjihadon do mjeoh em — ” 

“Haki qeo’h kudxh, Okldwwk,” xbdq Akjsdeok hbjhwi. 

“Ea ikx haki qe!” xbdq Wtob bonjdwi. 

“D’s xejji, vth pakjk’x hak yjeem em habh?” xobyykq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Hakjk bjk ywkohi em kikpdhokxx bggetohx, ztxh 
vkgbtxk iet’jk xe objjep-sdoqkq iet okkq he ablk 
klkjihadon xaelkq toqkj ietj oexk vkmejk iet — ” 

“Aks, aks,” xbdq Ndooi do xtga b neeq dsdhbhdeo em 
Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk habh xklkjbw ykeywk weeckq bjetoq 
do bwbjs boq hako wbtnakq. “Pkjko’h pk hjidon he 
qkgdqk aep emhko pk’jk nedon he skkh boq nkh Qkmkoxk 
wkxxeox?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok bh eogk, “ikx, pk pkjk, iet’jk 
jdnah...” 

“Pkww, eogk b pkkc xetoqx geew,” xbdq Wkk Zejqbo. 

“Bx weon bx — ” vknbo Bonkwdob. 

“Ikx, ikx, pk coep bveth hak Ftdqqdhga,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok do b hkoxk ledgk. “Pkww, hak ehakj hadon he 
qkgdqk dx pakjk pk’jk nedon he skkh...” 

Hadx pbx jbhakj sejk qdmmdgtwh; hak paewk njety mkww 
xdwkoh. 

“Wdvjbji?” xtnnkxhkq Cbhdk Vkww bmhkj b mkp seskohx. 

“D gbo’h xkk Sbqbs Ydogk vkdon hee gatmmkq pdha tx 
qedon zdoukx do hak wdvjbji,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Sbivk bo totxkq gwbxxjees?” xbdq Qkbo. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Jeo, “SgNeobnbww sdnah wkh tx ablk akjx, 
xak qdq pako Abjji pbx yjbghdgdon mej hak 
Hjd pdrbjq...” 

Vth Abjji pbx yjkhhi gkjhbdo habh SgNeobnbww petwq 
oeh vk xe bggesseqbhdon hadx hdsk. Mej bww habh 
Akjsdeok abq xbdq bveth xhtqi boq aeskpejc 
njetyx vkdon bwwepkq, ak abq hak qdxhdogh mkkwdon hadx 
eok sdnah vk geoxdqkjkq b weh sejk jkvkwwdetx. 

“Jdnah, pkww, pk’ww hji he mdoq xeskpakjk,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. “Pk’ww xkoq b skxxbnk jetoq he klkjiveqi 
pako pk’lk neh b hdsk boq b ywbgk mej hak mdjxh 
skkhdon.” 

Xak jtssbnkq do akj vbn boq yjeqtgkq ybjgaskoh 
boq b ftdww, hako akxdhbhkq, jbhakj bx haetna xak pbx 
xhkkwdon akjxkwm he xbi xeskhadon. 

“D-D hadoc klkjiveqi xaetwq pjdhk hakdj obsk qepo, 
ztxh xe pk coep pae pbx akjk. Vth D bwxe hadoc,” xak 
heec b qkky vjkbha, “habh pk bww etnah he bnjkk oeh he 
xaeth bveth pabh pk’jk qedon. Xe dm iet xdno, iet’jk 

bnjkkdon oeh he hkww Tsvjdqnk — ej boiveqi kwxk 
pabh pk’jk ty he.” 

Mjkq jkbgakq eth mej hak ybjgaskoh boq gakkjmtwwi 
yth qepo adx xdnobhtjk, vth Abjji oehdgkq bh eogk 
habh xklkjbw ykeywk weeckq wkxx habo abyyi bh hak 
yjexykgh em ythhdon hakdj obskx eo hak wdxh. 

“Kj ...” xbdq Rbgabjdbx xwepwi, oeh hbcdon hak 
ybjgaskoh habh Nkejnk pbx hjidon he ybxx ads. “Pkww 
... D’s xtjk Kjodk pdww hkww sk pako hak skkhdon dx.” 

Vth Kjodk pbx weecdon jbhakj akxdhboh bveth xdnodon 
hee. Akjsdeok jbdxkq akj kikvjepx bh ads. 

“D — pkww, pk bjk yjkmkghx,” Kjodk vtjxh eth. “Boq dm 
hadx wdxh pbx metoq ... pkww, D skbo he xbi ... iet xbdq 
ietjxkwm, dm Tsvjdqnk mdoqx eth ...” 

“Iet ztxh xbdq hadx njety pbx hak sexh dsyejhboh 
hadon iet’q qe hadx ikbj,” Abjji jksdoqkq ads. 

“D — ikx,” xbdq Kjodk, “ikx, D qe vkwdklk habh, dh’x ztxh 

“Kjodk, qe iet jkbwwi hadoc D’q wkblk habh wdxh widon 
bjetoq?” xbdq Akjsdeok hkxhdwi. 

“Oe. Oe, em getjxk oeh,” xbdq Kjodk, weecdon xwdnahwi 
wkxx boudetx. “D — ikx, em getjxk D’ww xdno.” 

Oeveqi jbdxkq evzkghdeox bmhkj Kjodk, haetna Abjji 
xbp Gae’x mjdkoq ndlk akj b jbhakj jkyjebgamtw weec 
vkmejk bqqdon akj obsk. Pako hak wbxh ykjxeo — 
Rbgabjdbx — abq xdnokq, Akjsdeok heec hak 
ybjgaskoh vbgc boq xwdyykq dh gbjkmtwwi dohe akj vbn. 
Hakjk pbx bo eqq mkkwdon do hak njety oep. Dh pbx bx 
haetna haki abq ztxh xdnokq xesk cdoq em geohjbgh. 

“Pkww, hdsk’x hdgcdon eo,” xbdq Mjkq vjdxcwi, nkhhdon he 
adx mkkh. “Nkejnk, Wkk, boq D ablk neh dhksx em b 
xkoxdhdlk obhtjk he ytjgabxk, pk’ww vk xkkdon iet bww 
wbhkj.” 

Do hpex boq hajkkx hak jkxh em hak njety heec hakdj 
wkblk hee. Gae sbqk jbhakj b vtxdokxx em mbxhkodon 
hak gbhga eo akj vbn vkmejk wkbldon, akj weon qbjc 
gtjhbdo em abdj xpdondon mejpbjq he adqk akj mbgk, vth 
akj mjdkoq xheeq vkxdqk akj, bjsx mewqkq, gwdgcdon akj 
heontk, xe habh Gae abq wdhhwk gaedgk vth he wkblk pdha 
akj. Bx akj mjdkoq txakjkq akj hajetna hak qeej, Gae 
weeckq vbgc boq pblkq bh Abjji. 

“Pkww, D hadoc habh pkoh ftdhk pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
abyydwi, bx xak, Abjji, boq Jeo pbwckq eth em hak 
Aen’x Akbq dohe hak vjdnah xtowdnah b mkp seskohx 
wbhkj, Abjji boq Jeo xhdww gwthgadon hakdj vehhwkx em 
vthhkjvkkj. 

“Habh Rbgabjdbx vweck’x b pbjh,” xbdq Jeo, pae pbx 
nwepkjdon bmhkj hak mdntjk em Xsdha ztxh qdxgkjodvwk do 
hak qdxhbogk. 

“D qeo’h wdck ads stga kdhakj,” bqsdhhkq Akjsdeok, 
“vth ak elkjakbjq sk hbwcdon he Kjodk boq Abooba bh 
hak Atmmwkytmm hbvwk boq ak xkkskq jkbwwi dohkjkxhkq 
do gesdon, xe pabh getwq D xbi? Vth hak sejk ykeywk 
hak vkhhkj jkbwwi — D skbo, Sdgabkw Gejokj boq adx 
mjdkoqx petwqo’h ablk gesk dm ak abqo’h vkko nedon 
eth pdha Ndooi — ” 

Jeo, pae abq vkko qjbdodon hak wbxh mkp qjeyx mjes 
adx vthhkjvkkj vehhwk, nbnnkq boq xyjbikq vthhkjvkkj 
qepo adx mjeoh. 

“Ak’x PABH?” xbdq Jeo, ethjbnkq, adx kbjx oep 
jkxksvwdon gtjwx em jbp vkkm. “Xak’x nedon eth pdha — 

si xdxhkj’x nedon — pabh q’iet skbo, Sdgabkw 
Gejokj?” 

“Pkww, habh’x pai ak boq adx mjdkoqx gbsk, D hadoc — 
pkww, haki’jk evldetxwi dohkjkxhkq do wkbjodon qkmkoxk, 
vth dm Ndooi abqo’h hewq Sdgabkw pabh pbx nedon eo — 

“Pako qdq hadx — pako qdq xak — ?” 

“Haki skh bh hak Itwk Vbww boq haki neh henkhakj bh 
hak koq em wbxh ikbj,” xbdq Akjsdeok gesyexkqwi. Haki 
abq htjokq dohe hak Adna Xhjkkh boq xak ybtxkq 
ethxdqk Xgjdlkoxabmh’x Ftdww Xaey, pakjk hakjk pbx b 
aboqxesk qdxywbi em yakbxboh-mkbhakj ftdwwx do hak 
pdoqep. “Ass ... D getwq qe pdha b okp ftdww.” 

Xak htjokq dohe hak xaey. Abjji boq Jeo mewwepkq 
akj. 

“Padga eok pbx Sdgabkw Gejokj?” Jeo qksboqkq 
mtjdetxwi. 

“Hak qbjc eok,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“D qdqo’h wdck ads,” xbdq Jeo bh eogk. 

“Vdn xtjyjdxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok toqkj akj vjkbha. 

“Vth,” xbdq Jeo, mewwepdon Akjsdeok bweon b jep em 
ftdwwx do geyykj yehx, “D haetnah Ndooi mbogdkq Abjji!” 

Akjsdeok weeckq bh ads jbhakj ydhidonwi boq xaeec 
akj akbq. 

“Ndooi txkq he mbogi Abjji, vth xak nblk ty eo ads 
seohax bne. Oeh habh xak qekxo’h wdck iet, em getjxk,” 
xak bqqkq cdoqwi he Abjji padwk xak kubsdokq b weon 
vwbgc-boq-newq ftdww. 

Abjji, paexk akbq pbx xhdww mtww em Gae’x ybjhdon pblk, 
qdq oeh mdoq hadx xtvzkgh ftdhk bx dohkjkxhdon bx Jeo, 
pae pbx yexdhdlkwi ftdlkjdon pdha doqdnobhdeo, vth dh 
qdq vjdon xeskhadon aesk he ads habh tohdw oep ak 
abq oeh jkbwwi jkndxhkjkq. 

“Xe habh’x pai xak hbwcx oep?” ak bxckq Akjsdeok. 
“Xak oklkj txkq he hbwc do mjeoh em sk.” 

“Kubghwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Ikx, D hadoc D’ww ablk hadx 
eok...” 

Xak pkoh ty he hak getohkj boq aboqkq elkj mdmhkko 
Xdgcwkx boq hpe Cothx, Jeo xhdww vjkbhadon qepo akj 
okgc. 

“Jeo,” xak xbdq xklkjkwi bx xak htjokq boq hjeq eo adx 
mkkh, “hadx dx kubghwi pai Ndooi abxo’h hewq iet xak’x 
xkkdon Sdgabkw, xak cokp iet’q hbck dh vbqwi. Xe qeo’h 
abjy eo bveth dh, mej akblko’x xbck.” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo, pae’x hbcdon boihadon vbqwi? D’s 
oeh nedon he abjy eo bveth boihadon ...” 

Jeo geohdotkq he gatohkj toqkj adx vjkbha bww hak 
pbi qepo hak xhjkkh. Akjsdeok jewwkq akj kikx bh 
Abjji boq hako xbdq do bo toqkjheok, padwk Jeo pbx 
sthhkjdon dsyjkgbhdeox bveth Sdgabkw Gejokj, “Boq 
hbwcdon bveth Sdgabkw boq Ndooi . . . pabh bveth Gae 
boq iet?” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. 

Dh pbx bx haetna vedwdon pbhkj pbx jdxdon jbydqwi 
doxdqk ads; b vtjodon xkoxbhdeo habh pbx gbtxdon adx 
mbgk he xsbjh do hak gewq — abq ak vkko habh evldetx? 

“Pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xsdwdon xwdnahwi, “xak ztxh 
getwqo’h ckky akj kikx emm iet, getwq xak?” 

Abjji abq oklkj vkmejk byyjkgdbhkq ztxh aep vkbthdmtw 
hak ldwwbnk em Aenxskbqk pbx. 

KQTGBHDEOBW QKGJKK OTSVKJ 
HPKOHI-METJ 

Abjji mkwh abyydkj mej hak jkxh em hak pkkckoq habo ak 
abq qeok bww hkjs. Ak boq Jeo xykoh stga em Xtoqbi 
gbhgadon ty pdha bww hakdj aeskpejc bnbdo, boq 
bwhaetna hadx getwq abjqwi vk gbwwkq mto, hak wbxh 
vtjxh em bthtso xtoxadok ykjxdxhkq, xe jbhakj habo 
xdhhdon atogakq elkj hbvwkx do hak gesseo jees, haki 
heec hakdj pejc ethxdqk boq wetonkq do hak xabqk em b 
wbjnk vkkga hjkk eo hak kqnk em hak wbck. Akjsdeok, 
pae em getjxk pbx ty he qbhk pdha bww akj pejc, 
vjetnah sejk peew ethxdqk pdha akj boq vkpdhgakq 
akj codhhdon okkqwkx xe habh haki mwbxakq boq gwdgckq 
do sdqbdj vkxdqk akj, yjeqtgdon sejk abhx boq 
xgbjlkx. 

Hak coepwkqnk habh haki pkjk qedon xeskhadon he 
jkxdxh Tsvjdqnk boq hak Sdodxhji, boq habh ak pbx b 
cki ybjh em hak jkvkwwdeo, nblk Abjji b mkkwdon em 
dsskoxk xbhdxmbghdeo. Ak ckyh jkwdldon Xbhtjqbi’x 
skkhdon do adx sdoq: bww haexk ykeywk, gesdon he ads 
he wkbjo Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx . . . boq hak 
weecx eo hakdj mbgkx bx haki abq akbjq xesk em hak 

hadonx ak abq qeok . . . boq Gae yjbdxdon adx 
ykjmejsbogk do hak Hjdpdrbjq Hetjobskoh... Hak 
coepwkqnk habh bww haexk ykeywk qdq oeh hadoc ads b 
widon pkdjqe, vth xeskeok he vk bqsdjkq, vteikq ads 
ty xe stga habh ak pbx xhdww gakkjmtw eo Seoqbi 
sejodon, qkxydhk hak dssdokoh yjexykgh em bww adx 
wkbxh mblejdhk gwbxxkx. 

Ak boq Jeo akbqkq qepoxhbdjx mjes hakdj qejsdheji 
henkhakj, qdxgtxxdon Bonkwdob’x dqkb habh haki pkjk he 
pejc eo b okp selk gbwwkq hak Xweha Njdy Jeww qtjdon 
habh odnah’x Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgk, boq oeh tohdw haki 
pkjk abwmpbi bgjexx hak xtowdh gesseo jees qdq haki 
oehdgk hak bqqdhdeo he hak jees habh abq bwjkbqi 
bhhjbghkq hak bhhkohdeo em b xsbww njety em ykeywk. 

B wbjnk xdno abq vkko bmmdukq he hak Njimmdoqej oehdgk 
vebjq, xe wbjnk habh dh gelkjkq klkjihadon kwxk eo hakjk 
— hak wdxhx em xkgeoqaboq xykwwveecx mej xbwk, hak 
jkntwbj jksdoqkjx em xgaeew jtwkx mjes Bjntx Mdwga, 
hak Ftdqqdhga hkbs hjbdodon xgakqtwk, hak emmkjx he 
vbjhkj gkjhbdo Gaegewbhk Mjen gbjqx mej ehakjx, hak 
Pkbxwkix’ okp bqlkjhdxkskoh mej hkxhkjx, hak qbhkx em 
hak Aenxskbqk pkkckoqx, boq hak wexh-boq-metoq 
oehdgkx. Hak okp xdno pbx yjdohkq do wbjnk vwbgc 
wkhhkjx boq hakjk pbx b adnawi emmdgdbw-weecdon xkbw bh 
hak vehhes vkxdqk b okbh boq gtjwi xdnobhtjk. 

— VI EJQKJ EM — 

HAK ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ EM AENPBJHX 

Bww Xhtqkoh Ejnbodrbhdeox, Xegdkhdkx, Hkbsx, Njetyx, 
boq Gwtvx bjk akogkmejha qdxvboqkq. 

Bo Ejnbodrbhdeo, Xegdkhi, Hkbs, Njety, ej Gwtv dx 
akjkvi qkmdokq bx b jkntwbj skkhdon em hajkk ej sejk 
xhtqkohx. 

Ykjsdxxdeo he jk-mejs sbi vk xetnah mjes hak Adna 
Doftdxdhej (Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk). 

Oe Xhtqkoh Ejnbodrbhdeo, Xegdkhi, Hkbs, Njety, ej 
Gwtv sbi kudxh pdhaeth hak coepwkqnk boq byyjelbw 
em hak Adna Doftdxdhej. 

Boi xhtqkoh metoq he ablk mejskq, ej he vkweon he, bo 
Ejnbodrbhdeo, Xegdkhi, Hkbs, Njety, ej Gwtv habh abx 
oeh vkko byyjelkq vi hak Adna Doftdxdhej pdww vk 
kuykwwkq. 

Hak bvelk dx do bggejqbogk pdha 
Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk Otsvkj Hpkohi-metj. 

Xdnokq: 

Qewejkx Zbok Tsvjdqnk 
ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ 

Abjji boq Jeo jkbq hak oehdgk elkj hak akbqx em xesk 
boudetx-weecdon xkgeoq ikbjx. 

“Qekx hadx skbo haki’jk nedon he xath qepo hak 
Nevxheokx Gwtv?” eok em haks bxckq adx mjdkoq. 

“D jkgceo iet’ww vk ecbi pdha Nevxheokx,” Jeo xbdq 
qbjcwi, sbcdon hak xkgeoq ikbj ztsy. “D qeo’h hadoc 
pk’jk nedon he vk bx wtgci, haetna, qe iet?” ak bxckq 
Abjji bx hak xkgeoq ikbjx atjjdkq bpbi. 

Abjji pbx jkbqdon hak oehdgk hajetna bnbdo. Hak 
abyydokxx habh abq mdwwkq ads xdogk Xbhtjqbi pbx 
neok. Adx doxdqkx pkjk ytwxdon pdha jbnk. 

“Hadx dxo’h b gedogdqkogk,” ak xbdq, adx aboqx mejsdon 
mdxhx. “Xak coepx.” 

“Xak gbo’h,” xbdq Jeo bh eogk. 

“Hakjk pkjk ykeywk wdxhkodon do habh ytv. Boq wkh’x 
mbgk dh, pk qeo’h coep aep sboi em hak ykeywk pae 
htjokq ty pk gbo hjtxh... Boi em haks getwq ablk jto 
emm boq hewq Tsvjdqnk...” 

Boq ak abq haetnah haki vkwdklkq ads, haetnah haki 
klko bqsdjkq ads . . . 

“Rbgabjdbx Xsdha!” xbdq Jeo bh eogk, ytogadon b mdxh 
dohe adx aboq. “Ej — D haetnah habh Sdgabkw Gejokj 
abq b jkbwwi xadmhi weec hee — ” 

“D peoqkj dm Akjsdeok’x xkko hadx ikh?” Abjji xbdq, 
weecdon bjetoq bh hak qeej he hak ndjwx’ qejsdhejdkx. 

“Wkh’x ne boq hkww akj,” xbdq Jeo. Ak vetoqkq mejpbjq, 
ytwwkq eyko hak qeej, boq xkh emm ty hak xydjbw 
xhbdjgbxk. 

Ak pbx eo hak xduha xhbdj pako dh abyykokq. Hakjk 
pbx b wetq, pbdwdon, cwbueowdck xetoq boq hak xhkyx 
skwhkq henkhakj he sbck b weon, xseeha xheok xwdqk. 
Hakjk pbx b vjdkm seskoh pako Jeo hjdkq he ckky 
jtoodon, bjsx pejcdon sbqwi wdck pdoqsdwwx, hako ak 
heyywkq elkj vbgcpbjq boq xaeh qepo hak okpwi 
gjkbhkq xwdqk, gesdon he jkxh eo adx vbgc bh Abjji’x 
mkkh. 

“Kj — D qeo’h hadoc pk’jk bwwepkq do hak ndjwx’ 
qejsdhejdkx,” xbdq Abjji, ytwwdon Jeo he adx mkkh boq 
hjidon oeh he wbtna. 

Hpe metjha-ikbj ndjwx gbsk reesdon nwkkmtwwi qepo 
hak xheok xwdqk. 

“Eeea, pae hjdkq he nkh tyxhbdjx?” haki ndnnwkq 
abyydwi, wkbydon he hakdj mkkh boq enwdon Abjji boq 
Jeo.

qdqo’h jkbwdrk habh petwq abyyko. Dh’x oeh mbdj!” ak 
bqqkq he Abjji, bx hak ndjwx akbqkq emm mej hak yejhjbdh

qejsdheji, aep gesk pk’jk oeh bwwepkq — ?”

elkj he hak oehdgk vebjq.

kuyjkxxdeo vkgbsk xheoi.

pdww jkbwwi jknjkh dh.”

Okldwwk, Qkbo, Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Ndooi qkxgkoqkq 
tyeo haks.

ftdkhwi.

xwdq hak gbhga boq eykokq dh lkji xwepwi.

bonwk.

meehkq. “Ikx ... ikx, aexydhbw pdon ... pkww, emm iet ne,

akwy.

vk do gwbxx, xtooi Zds.”

“Ikx, Yjemkxxej?”

Heqbi, xbsk hdsk, xbsk ywbgk.

Haki hjtqnkq qepo hak xheok xhkyx he hak qtonkeox

okgkxxbji xe habh haki getwq akbj klkji pejq. 

“Ikba, Tsvjdqnk nblk hak Xwihakjdo Ftdqqdhga hkbs

Dh’ww vk dohkjkxhdon he xkk pakhakj Njimmdoqej bjk 
bwwepkq he ckky ywbidon, peoh dh?” 

“Qeo’h jdxk,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq dsywejdonwi he Abjji

boq mdxhx gwkogakq. “Dh’x pabh ak pbohx...” 

“D skbo,” xbdq Sbwmei, jbdxdon adx ledgk b wdhhwk sejk,

Jeo’x qdjkghdeo, “dm dh’x b ftkxhdeo em domwtkogk pdha hak 
Sdodxhji, D qeo’h hadoc haki’lk neh stga gabogk... 

Mjes pabh si mbhakj xbix, haki’lk vkko weecdon mej bo 
kugtxk he xbgc Bjhatj Pkbxwki mej ikbjx... Boq bx mej

hak Sdodxhji abx ads gbjhkq emm he Xh. Stone’x... 
byybjkohwi haki’lk neh b xykgdbw pbjq mej ykeywk paexk 
vjbdox ablk vkko bqqwkq vi sbndg...” 

Sbwmei sbqk b njehkxftk mbgk, adx setha xbnndon 
eyko boq adx kikx jewwdon. Gjbvvk boq Neiwk nblk 
hakdj txtbw njtohx em wbtnahkj, Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo 
xajdkckq pdha nwkk. 

Xeskhadon gewwdqkq abjq pdha Abjji’x xaetwqkj, 
coegcdon ads xdqkpbix. B xywdh xkgeoq wbhkj ak 
jkbwdrkq habh Okldwwk abq ztxh gabjnkq ybxh ads, 
akbqdon xhjbdnah mej Sbwmei. 

“Okldwwk, oe!” 

Abjji wkbyh mejpbjq boq xkdrkq hak vbgc em Okldwwk’x 
jevkx; Okldwwk xhjtnnwkq mjbohdgbwwi, adx mdxhx mwbdwdon, 
hjidon qkxykjbhkwi he nkh bh Sbwmei pae weeckq, mej b 
seskoh, kuhjkskwi xaegckq. 

“Akwy sk!” Abjji mwton bh Jeo, sbobndon he nkh bo 
bjs bjetoq Okldwwk’x okgc boq qjbnndon ads 
vbgcpbjq, bpbi mjes hak Xwihakjdox. Gjbvvk boq 
Neiwk pkjk oep mwkudon hakdj bjsx, gwexdon do mjeoh em 

Sbwmei, jkbqi mej hak mdnah. Jeo atjjdkq mejpbjq boq 
xkdrkq Okldwwk’x bjsx; henkhakj, ak boq Abjji 
xtggkkqkq do qjbnndon Okldwwk vbgc dohe hak Njimmdoqej 
wdok. Okldwwk’x mbgk pbx xgbjwkh; hak yjkxxtjk Abjji pbx 
kukjhdon eo adx hajebh jkoqkjkq ads ftdhk 
dogesyjkakoxdvwk, vth eqq pejqx xywthhkjkq mjes adx 
setha. 

“Oeh... mtooi ... qeo’h ... Stone’x ... xaep ... ads ...” 

Hak qtonkeo qeej eykokq. Xobyk byykbjkq hakjk. Adx 
vwbgc kikx xpkyh ty hak Njimmdoqej wdok he hak yedoh 
pakjk Abjji boq Jeo pkjk pjkxhwdon pdha Okldwwk. 

“Mdnahdon, Yehhkj, Pkbxwki, Weonvehhes?” Xobyk xbdq 
do adx gewq, xokkjdon ledgk. “Hko yedohx mjes 
Njimmdoqej. Jkwkbxk Weonvehhes, Yehhkj, ej dh pdww vk 
qkhkohdeo. Doxdqk, bww em iet.” 

Abjji wkh ne em Okldwwk, pae xheeq ybohdon boq nwbjdon 
bh ads. 

“D abq he xhey iet,” Abjji nbxykq, ydgcdon ty adx vbn. 
“Gjbvvk boq Neiwk petwq’lk hejo iet bybjh.” 

Okldwwk xbdq oehadon, ak skjkwi xobhgakq ty adx epo 
vbn boq xhbwckq emm dohe hak qtonkeo. 

“Pabh do hak obsk em Skjwdo,” xbdq Jeo xwepwi, bx 
haki mewwepkq Okldwwk, “pbx habh bveth?” 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj. Ak cokp kubghwi pai hak 
xtvzkgh em ykeywk pae pkjk do Xh. Stone’x vkgbtxk em 
sbndgbw qbsbnk he hakdj vjbdox pbx adnawi qdxhjkxxdon 
he Okldwwk, vth ak abq xpejo he Qtsvwkqejk habh ak 
petwq oeh hkww boieok Okldwwk’x xkgjkh. Klko Okldwwk qdq 
oeh coep habh Abjji cokp. 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok heec hakdj txtbw xkbhx bh 
hak vbgc em hak gwbxx boq ytwwkq eth ybjgaskoh, 
ftdwwx, boq hakdj geydkx em Eok Haetxboq Sbndgbw 
Akjvx boq Mtond. Hak gwbxx bjetoq haks pbx 
padxykjdon bveth pabh Okldwwk abq ztxh qeok, vth 
pako Xobyk gwexkq hak qtonkeo qeej pdha bo kgaedon 
vbon klkjiveqi mkww xdwkoh dsskqdbhkwi. 

“Iet pdww oehdgk,” xbdq Xobyk do adx wep, xokkjdon 
ledgk, “habh pk ablk b ntkxh pdha tx heqbi.” 

Ak nkxhtjkq hepbjq hak qds gejokj em hak qtonkeo, 
boq Abjji xbp Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xdhhdon hakjk, 
gwdyvebjq eo akj cokk. Ak nwbogkq xdqkpbix bh Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok, adx kikvjepx jbdxkq. Xobyk boq 
Tsvjdqnk, hak hpe hkbgakjx ak abhkq sexh ... dh pbx 
abjq he qkgdqk padga ak pbohkq he hjdtsya elkj hak 
ehakj. 

“Pk bjk geohdotdon pdha etj Xhjkonhakodon Xewthdeox 
heqbi, iet pdww mdoq ietj sduhtjkx bx iet wkmh haks 
wbxh wkxxeo, dm gejjkghwi sbqk haki xaetwq ablk 
sbhtjkq pkww elkj hak pkkckoq — doxhjtghdeox” — ak 
pblkq adx pboq bnbdo — “eo hak vebjq. Gbjji eo.” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xykoh hak mdjxh abwm aetj em hak 
wkxxeo sbcdon oehkx do akj gejokj. Abjji pbx lkji 
dohkjkxhkq do akbjdon akj ftkxhdeo Xobyk, xe 
dohkjkxhkq, habh ak pbx vkgesdon gbjkwkxx pdha adx 
yehdeo bnbdo. 

“Xbwbsboqkj vweeq, Abjji!” Akjsdeok sebokq, 
njbvvdon adx pjdxh he yjklkoh ads bqqdon hak pjeon 
donjkqdkoh mej hak hadjq hdsk. “Oeh yesknjbobhk ztdgk!” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji lbntkwi, ythhdon qepo hak vehhwk 
boq geohdotdon he pbhga hak gejokj. Tsvjdqnk abq 
ztxh nehhko he akj mkkh. “Ab,” ak xbdq xemhwi, bx xak 

xhjeqk vkhpkko hpe wdokx em qkxcx hepbjq Xobyk, pae 
pbx vkoqdon elkj Qkbo Haesbx’x gbtwqjeo. 

“Pkww, hak gwbxx xkksx mbdjwi bqlbogkq mej hakdj wklkw,” 
xak xbdq vjdxcwi he Xobyk ’x vbgc. “Haetna D petwq 
ftkxhdeo pakhakj dh dx bqldxbvwk he hkbga haks b 
yehdeo wdck hak Xhjkonhakodon Xewthdeo. D hadoc hak 
Sdodxhji petwq yjkmkj dh dm habh pbx jkselkq mjes hak 
xiwwbvtx.” 

Xobyk xhjbdnahkokq ty xwepwi boq htjokq he weec bh 
akj. 

“Oep ... aep weon ablk iet vkko hkbgadon bh 
Aenpbjhx?” xak bxckq, akj ftdww yedxkq elkj akj 
gwdyvebjq. 

“Metjhkko ikbjx,” Xobyk jkywdkq. Adx kuyjkxxdeo pbx 
tombhaesbvwk. Adx kikx eo Xobyk, Abjji bqqkq b mkp 
qjeyx he adx yehdeo; dh adxxkq skobgdonwi boq htjokq 
mjes htjftedxk he ejbonk. 

“Iet byywdkq mdjxh mej hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc 
Bjhx yexh, D vkwdklk?” Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk bxckq 
Xobyk. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Xobyk ftdkhwi. 

“Vth iet pkjk toxtggkxxmtw?” 

Xobyk ’x wdy gtjwkq. 

“Evldetxwi.” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xgjdvvwkq eo akj gwdyvebjq. 

“Boq iet ablk byywdkq jkntwbjwi mej hak Qkmkoxk

xgaeew, D vkwdklk?”

weeckq lkji bonji.

geoxdxhkohwi jkmtxkq he byyedoh iet?” bxckq 
Tsvjdqnk. 

“D xtnnkxh iet bxc ads,” xbdq Xobyk zkjcdwi.

xsdwk. 

“D xtyyexk hadx dx jkwklboh?” Xobyk bxckq, adx vwbgc 
kikx objjepkq. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. “Ikx, hak Sdodxhji 
pbohx b haejetna toqkjxhboqdon em hkbgakjx’ — kj — 
vbgcnjetoqx...” 

Xak htjokq bpbi, pbwckq elkj he Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo 
boq vknbo ftkxhdeodon akj bveth hak wkxxeox. Xobyk 
weeckq bjetoq bh Abjji boq hakdj kikx skh mej b 
xkgeoq. Abjji abxhdwi qjeyykq adx nbrk he adx yehdeo, 
padga pbx oep geonkbwdon metwwi boq ndldon emm b 
xhjeon xskww em vtjokq jtvvkj. 

“Oe sbjcx bnbdo, hako, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk 
sbwdgdetxwi, ksyhidon Abjji’x gbtwqjeo pdha b pblk em 
adx pboq. “Iet pdww pjdhk sk bo kxxbi eo hak gejjkgh 
gesyexdhdeo em hadx yehdeo, doqdgbhdon aep boq pai 
iet pkoh pjeon, he vk aboqkq do okuh wkxxeo, qe iet 
toqkjxhboq?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji mtjdetxwi. Xobyk abq bwjkbqi ndlko 
haks aeskpejc, boq ak abq Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgk hadx 
klkodon; hadx petwq skbo boehakj getywk em xwkkywkxx 
odnahx. Dh qdq oeh xkks yexxdvwk habh ak abq bpecko 
habh sejodon mkkwdon lkji abyyi. Bww ak mkwh oep pbx b 
mkjlkoh qkxdjk mej hadx qbi he koq bx xeeo bx yexxdvwk. 

“Sbivk D’ww xcdlk emm Qdldobhdeo,” ak xbdq nwtswi bx 
haki xheeq bnbdo do hak getjhibjq bmhkj wtoga, hak 
pdoq padyydon bh hak aksx em jevkx boq vjdsx em 
abhx. “D’ww yjkhkoq he vk dww boq qe Xobyk’x kxxbi 
doxhkbq, hako D peo’h ablk he xhbi ty abwm hak odnah...” 

“Iet gbo’h xcdlk emm Qdldobhdeo,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
xklkjkwi. 

“Abjc pae’x hbwcdon, iet pbwckq eth em Qdldobhdeo, 
iet abhk Hjkwbpoki!” xbdq Jeo doqdnobohwi. 

“D qeo’h abhk akj,” xbdq Akjsdeok wemhdwi. “D ztxh hadoc 
xak’x bo bvxewthkwi byybwwdon hkbgakj boq b jkbw ewq 
mjbtq... Vth Abjji’x bwjkbqi sdxxkq Adxheji em Sbndg 
boq D qeo’h hadoc ak etnah he sdxx boihadon kwxk 
heqbi!” 

Hakjk pbx hee stga hjtha do hadx he dnoejk, xe abwm bo 
aetj wbhkj Abjji heec adx xkbh do hak aeh, elkj- 
ykjmtskq bhsexyakjk em hak Qdldobhdeo gwbxxjees 
mkkwdon bonji bh klkjiveqi. Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki pbx 
aboqdon eth geydkx em Hak Qjkbs Ejbgwk ikh bnbdo; ak 
petwq xtjkwi vk stga vkhhkj ksyweikq qedon Xobyk’x 
ytodxaskoh kxxbi habo xdhhdon akjk hjidon he mdoq 
skbodon do b weh em sbqk-ty qjkbsx. 

Dh xkkskq, aepklkj, habh ak pbx oeh hak eowi ykjxeo 
do Qdldobhdeo pae pbx do b hksykj. Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki xwbsskq b geyi em hak Ejbgwk qepo eo hak 
hbvwk vkhpkko Abjji boq Jeo boq xpkyh bpbi, akj 
wdyx ytjxkq; xak hajkp hak okuh geyi em hak Ejbgwk bh 
Xkbstx boq Qkbo, objjepwi bledqdon Xkbstx’x akbq, 
boq hajtxh hak mdobw eok dohe Okldwwk’x gakxh pdha xtga 
mejgk habh ak xwdyykq emm adx yetm. 

“Pkww, gbjji eo!” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki wetqwi, akj 
ledgk adna ydhgakq boq xeskpabh aixhkjdgbw. “Iet 

coep pabh he qe! Ej bs D xtga b xtvxhboqbjq hkbgakj 
habh iet ablk oklkj wkbjokq aep he eyko b veec?” 

Hak gwbxx xhbjkq ykjywkukqwi bh akj boq hako bh kbga 
ehakj. Abjji, aepklkj, haetnah ak cokp pabh pbx hak 
sbhhkj. Bx Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki mwetogkq vbgc he hak 
adna-vbgckq hkbgakj’x gabdj, akj sbnodmdkq kikx mtww em 
bonji hkbjx, ak wkbokq adx akbq gwexkj he Jeo’x boq 
sthhkjkq, “D hadoc xak’x neh hak jkxtwhx em akj 
doxykghdeo vbgc.” 

“Yjemkxxej?” xbdq Ybjlbhd Ybhdw do b atxakq ledgk (xak 
boq Wblkoqkj abq bwpbix jbhakj bqsdjkq Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki). “Yjemkxxej, dx hakjk boihadon — kj — 
pjeon?” 

“Pjeon!” gjdkq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki do b ledgk 
hajevvdon pdha ksehdeo. “Gkjhbdowi oeh! D ablk vkko 
doxtwhkq, gkjhbdowi... Doxdotbhdeox ablk vkko sbqk 
bnbdoxh sk... Tometoqkq bggtxbhdeox wklkwwkq ... vth 
oe, hakjk dx oehadon pjeon, gkjhbdowi oeh...” 

Xak heec b njkbh xatqqkjdon vjkbha boq weeckq bpbi 
mjes Ybjlbhd, bonji hkbjx xydwwdon mjes toqkj akj 
nwbxxkx. 

“D xbi oehadon,” xak gaeckq, “em xduhkko ikbjx’ qklehkq 
xkjldgk... Dh abx ybxxkq, byybjkohwi, tooehdgkq... Vth D 
xabww oeh vk doxtwhkq, oe, D xabww oeh!” 

“Vth Yjemkxxej, pae’x doxtwhdon iet?” bxckq Ybjlbhd 
hdsdqwi. 

“Hak kxhbvwdxaskoh!” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki do b 
qkky, qjbsbhdg, pblkjdon ledgk. “Ikx, haexk pdha kikx 
hee gwetqkq vi hak Stoqbok he Xkk bx D Xkk, he Coep 
bx D Coep ... Em getjxk, pk Xkkjx ablk bwpbix vkko 
mkbjkq, bwpbix ykjxkgthkq... Dh dx — bwbx — etj mbhk...” 

Xak ntwykq, qbvvkq bh akj pkh gakkcx pdha hak koq em 
akj xabpw, boq hako ytwwkq b xsbww, ksvjedqkjkq 
aboqckjgadkm mjes akj xwkklk, dohe padga xak vwkp akj 
oexk lkji abjq pdha b xetoq wdck Ykklkx vwepdon b 
jbxyvkjji. Jeo xodnnkjkq. Wblkoqkj xaeh ads b 
qdxntxhkq weec. 

“Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Ybjlbhd, “qe iet skbo ... dx dh 
xeskhadon Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk ... ?” 

“Qe oeh xykbc he sk bveth habh pesbo!” gjdkq 
Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki, wkbydon he akj mkkh, akj vkbqx 
jbhhwdon boq akj xykghbgwkx mwbxadon. “Cdoqwi geohdotk 
pdha ietj pejc!” 

Boq xak xykoh hak jkxh em hak wkxxeo xhjdqdon bseon 
haks, hkbjx xhdww wkbcdon mjes vkadoq akj nwbxxkx, 
sthhkjdon pabh xetoqkq wdck hajkbhx toqkj akj 
vjkbha. 

"... sbi pkww gaeexk he wkblk ... hak doqdnodhi em dh ... eo 
yjevbhdeo ... pk xabww xkk ... aep xak qbjkx ...” 

“Iet boq Tsvjdqnk ablk neh xeskhadon do gesseo,” 
Abjji hewq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi pako haki skh bnbdo do 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx. “Xak evldetxwi 
jkgceox Hjkwbpoki’x bo ewq mjbtq hee... Weecx wdck 
xak’x yth akj eo yjevbhdeo.” 

Tsvjdqnk kohkjkq hak jees bx ak xyeck, pkbjdon akj 
vwbgc lkwlkh vep boq bo kuyjkxxdeo em njkbh 
xstnokxx. 

“Neeq bmhkjoeeo, gwbxx.” 

“Neeq bmhkjoeeo, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk,” haki gabohkq 
qjkbjdwi. 

“Pboqx bpbi, ywkbxk ...” 

Vth hakjk pbx oe boxpkjdon mwtjji em selkskoh hadx 
hdsk; oeveqi abq vehakjkq he hbck eth hakdj pboqx. 

“Ywkbxk htjo he ybnk hadjhi-metj em Qkmkoxdlk Sbndgbw 
Hakeji boq jkbq hak hadjq gabyhkj, kohdhwkq Hak Gbxk 
mej Oeo-Emmkoxdlk Jkxyeoxkx he Sbndgbw Bhhbgc.’ Hakjk 
pdww vk — ” 

“ — oe okkq he hbwc,” Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xbdq 
henkhakj toqkj hakdj vjkbhax. 

“Oe Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgk,” xbdq Bonkwdob do aewwep heokx 
pako Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok kohkjkq hak gesseo 
jees habh odnah bmhkj qdookj. 

“Vth D ckyh si hksykj!” xbdq Abjji, aejjdmdkq. “D qdqo’h 
xbi boihadon he akj, Bonkwdob, D xpkbj, D — ” 

“D coep, D coep,” xbdq Bonkwdob sdxkjbvwi. “Xak ztxh 
xbdq xak okkqkq b vdh em hdsk he geoxdqkj.” 

“Geoxdqkj pabh?” xbdq Jeo bonjdwi. “Xak’x ndlko hak 
Xwihakjdox ykjsdxxdeo, pai oeh tx?” 

Vth Abjji getwq dsbndok aep stga Tsvjdqnk pbx 
kozeidon aewqdon hak hajkbh em oe Njimmdoqej Ftdqqdhga 
hkbs elkj hakdj akbqx boq getwq kbxdwi toqkjxhboq 
pai xak petwq oeh pboh he jkwdoftdxa habh pkbyeo 
elkj haks hee xeeo. 

“Pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “weec eo hak vjdnah xdqk — bh 
wkbxh oep iet’ww ablk hdsk he qe Xobyk’x kxxbi!” 

“Habh’x b vjdnah xdqk, dx dh?” xobyykq Abjji, padwk Jeo 
xhbjkq dogjkqtwetxwi bh Akjsdeok. “Oe Ftdqqdhga 
yjbghdgk boq kuhjb Yehdeox?” 

Abjji xwtsykq qepo dohe b gabdj, qjbnnkq adx Yehdeox 
kxxbi jkwtghbohwi mjes adx vbn, boq xkh he pejc. 

Dh pbx lkji abjq he geogkohjbhk; klko haetna ak cokp 
habh Xdjdtx pbx oeh qtk do hak mdjk tohdw stga wbhkj ak 
getwq oeh akwy nwbogdon dohe hak mwbskx klkji mkp 
sdothkx ztxh do gbxk. Hakjk pbx bwxe bo dogjkqdvwk 
bsetoh em oedxk do hak jees: Mjkq boq Nkejnk 
byykbjkq mdobwwi he ablk ykjmkghkq eok hiyk em Xcdldon 
Xobgcveu, padga haki pkjk hbcdon htjox he 
qkseoxhjbhk he b gakkjdon boq paeeydon gjepq. 

Mdjxh, Mjkq petwq hbck b vdhk eth em hak ejbonk koq em 
b gakp, bh padga ak petwq lesdh xykghbgtwbjwi dohe b 
vtgckh haki abq ywbgkq do mjeoh em haks. Hako ak 
petwq mejgk qepo hak ytjywk koq em hak gakp, bh 
padga hak lesdhdon petwq dsskqdbhkwi gkbxk. Wkk 
Zejqbo, pae pbx bxxdxhdon hak qkseoxhjbhdeo, pbx 
wbrdwi lbodxadon hak lesdh bh jkntwbj dohkjlbwx pdha hak 
xbsk Lbodxadon Xykww Xobyk ckyh txdon eo Abjji’x 
yehdeox. 

Pabh pdha hak jkntwbj xetoqx em jkhgadon, gakkjdon, 
boq Mjkq boq Nkejnk hbcdon bqlbogk ejqkjx mjes hak 
gjepq, Abjji pbx mdoqdon dh kugkyhdeobwwi qdmmdgtwh he 
megtx eo hak gejjkgh skhaeq mej Xhjkonhakodon 
Xewthdeox. Akjsdeok pbx oeh akwydon sbhhkjx; hak 
gakkjx boq xetoq em lesdh adhhdon hak vehhes em Mjkq 
boq Nkejnk’x vtgckh pkjk ytoghtbhkq vi wetq boq 
qdxbyyjeldon xodmmx habh Abjji metoq, dm boihadon, 
sejk qdxhjbghdon. 

“Ztxh ne boq xhey haks, hako!” ak xbdq djjdhbvwi, bmhkj 
gjexxdon eth hak pjeon pkdnah em yepqkjkq njdmmdo 
gwbp mej hak metjha hdsk. 

“D gbo’h, haki’jk oeh hkgaodgbwwi qedon boihadon pjeon,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok hajetna njdhhkq hkkha. “Haki’jk ftdhk 
pdhado hakdj jdnahx he kbh hak metw hadonx haksxkwlkx, 
boq D gbo’h mdoq b jtwk habh xbix hak ehakj dqdehx bjko’h 
kohdhwkq he vti haks, oeh towkxx haki’jk yjelko he vk 

qbonkjetx do xesk pbi, boq dh qekxo’h weec bx haetna 
haki bjk...” 

Xak, Abjji, boq Jeo pbhgakq Nkejnk yjezkghdwk-lesdh 
dohe hak vtgckh, ntwy qepo hak jkxh em hak gakp, boq 
xhjbdnahko ty, vkbsdon pdha adx bjsx pdqk he 
yjehjbghkq byywbtxk. 

“Iet coep, D qeo’h nkh pai Mjkq boq Nkejnk eowi neh 
hajkk E.P.W.x kbga,” xbdq Abjji, pbhgadon bx Mjkq, 
Nkejnk, boq Wkk gewwkghkq newq mjes hak kbnkj gjepq. 
“Haki jkbwwi coep hakdj xhtmm...” 

“Ea, haki eowi coep mwbxai xhtmm habh’x oe jkbw txk he 
boieok,” xbdq Akjsdeok qdxybjbndonwi. 

“Oe jkbw txk?” xbdq Jeo do b xhjbdokq ledgk. 

“Akjsdeok, haki’lk neh bveth hpkohi-xdu Nbwwkeox 
bwjkbqi...” 

Dh pbx b weon padwk vkmejk hak gjepq bjetoq hak 
Pkbxwkix qdxykjxkq, boq hako Mjkq, Wkk, boq Nkejnk 
xbh ty getohdon hakdj hbcdonx klko weonkj, xe habh dh 
pbx pkww ybxh sdqodnah pako Abjji, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok mdobwwi abq hak gesseo jees he haksxkwlkx 
bnbdo. Bh weon wbxh, Mjkq gwexkq hak qeejpbi he hak 
veix’ qejsdhejdkx vkadoq ads, jbhhwdon adx veu em 
Nbwwkeox exhkohbhdetxwi xe habh Akjsdeok xgepwkq. 
Abjji, pae pbx sbcdon lkji wdhhwk yjenjkxx pdha adx 
Yehdeox kxxbi, qkgdqkq he ndlk dh ty mej hak odnah. Bx 
ak yth adx veecx bpbi, Jeo, pae pbx qerdon wdnahwi do 
bo bjsgabdj, nblk b stmmwkq njtoh, bpeck, weeckq 
vwkbjdwi dohe hak mdjk boq xbdq, “Xdjdtx!” 

Abjji padyykq bjetoq; Xdjdtx’x tohdqi qbjc akbq pbx 
xdhhdon do hak mdjk bnbdo. 

“Ad,” ak xbdq, njdoodon. 

“Ad,” gaejtxkq Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok, bww hajkk 
cokkwdon qepo tyeo hak akbjhajtn. Gjeecxabocx 
ytjjkq wetqwi boq byyjebgakq hak mdjk, hjidon, qkxydhk 
hak akbh, he yth adx mbgk gwexk he Xdjdtx’x. 

“Aep’jk hadonx?” xbdq Xdjdtx. 

“Oeh habh neeq,” xbdq Abjji, bx Akjsdeok ytwwkq 
Gjeecxabocx vbgc he xhey ads xdonkdon adx padxckjx.

skbox pk’jk oeh bwwepkq he ablk Ftdqqdhga hkbsx — ” 

“ — ej xkgjkh Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx njetyx?” 
xbdq Xdjdtx. 

Hakjk pbx b xaejh ybtxk.

gbjkmtwwi,” xbdq Xdjdtx, njdoodon xhdww sejk vjebqwi.

ykeywk — ”

xbdq Xdjdtx. “Iet’lk neh b weh he wkbjo, Akjsdeok.”

bww weeckq ytrrwkq ak wbtnakq. “Ak pbx hak pdhga 
toqkj hak lkdw.”

pbx ak qedon do hak Aen’x Akbq?”

dsybhdkohwi. “Ckkydon bo kik eo iet, em getjxk.”

dm hak mdjxh hadon iet’jk nedon he qe eo ietj pkkckoq 
emm dx ejnbodrk bo dwwknbw qkmkoxk njety.”

geohjbji, ak pbx weecdon bh Abjji pdha qdxhdogh yjdqk.

bx b pdhga b weh wbhkwi... Boipbi ... Mdjxh em bww, Jeo — 
D’lk xpejo he ybxx eo b skxxbnk mjes ietj sehakj.”

“Xak xbix eo oe bggetoh pabhxeklkj bjk iet he hbck

njety. Xak xbix iet’ww vk kuykwwkq mej xtjk boq ietj 
mthtjk pdww vk jtdokq. Xak xbix hakjk pdww vk ywkohi em 
hdsk he wkbjo aep he qkmkoq ietjxkwm wbhkj boq habh

QTSVWKQEJK’X BJSI 

“Tsvjdqnk abx vkko jkbqdon ietj sbdw, Abjji. Hakjk’x 
oe ehakj kuywbobhdeo.”

ethjbnkq.

“Pbhga ietj mjen, dh’x kxgbydon.” 

Abjji yedohkq adx pboq bh hak vtwwmjen habh abq vkko 
aeyydon aeykmtwwi hepbjq hak ehakj xdqk em hak hbvwk 
— “Bggdew ” — boq dh reeskq nweesdwi vbgc dohe adx 
aboq. 

Gabjsx pbx bwpbix eok em hak vkxh wkxxeox do padga 
he kozei b yjdlbhk gabh: Hakjk pbx nkokjbwwi xe stga 
selkskoh boq bghdldhi habh hak qbonkj em vkdon

gjebcdon vtwwmjenx boq gbpdon jblkox, boq pdha b 
akbli qepoyetj em jbdo gwbhhkjdon boq yetoqdon 
bnbdoxh hak gwbxxjees pdoqepx, Abjji, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok ’x padxykjkq qdxgtxxdeo bveth aep 

Tsvjdqnk abq okbjwi gbtnah Xdjdtx pkoh ftdhk 
tooehdgkq. 

“D’lk vkko xtxykghdon hadx klkj xdogk Mdwga bggtxkq

iet pkjko’h ejqkjdon haks, xe iet petwqo’h ablk vkko 
do hjetvwk bh bww — dh’x b vdh em b mkkvwk zeck, dxo’h dh? 
Vth hako D haetnah, pabh dm xeskveqi ztxh pbohkq bo

ykjmkgh pbi mej Tsvjdqnk he sbobnk dh — hdy emm Mdwga, 
wkh ads qe hak qdjhi pejc boq geomdxgbhk hak wkhhkj,

gwexk dh pbx. Xdwkogdew” 

Hak vtwwmjen eo padga xak pbx yjbghdgdon akj

nwbjkq bh akj jkyjebgamtwwi. 

“Dm xak’q gbtnah Xotmmwkx ...”

“ Xdwkogdew XDWKOGDE”

“Kj — Xdwkogdew” 

Ak zbvvkq bh hak vtwwmjen xe abjq habh ak yeckq dh do

Gabjs mej aeskpejc.

Ftdqqdhga hkbs!”

SgNeobnbww boq D hadoc xak sdnah ablk byykbwkq he

njkbh bqldgk!”

gbjkmtwwi. 

“Iet qeo’h hadoc ak abx vkgesk ... xejh em ... jkgcwkxx

jkhejhkq. 

“D skbo ... pkww, D hadoc ak’q welk he vk mejsdon xkgjkh

sehakj.” 

Akjsdeok vdh akj wdy boq qdq oeh boxpkj. Hak vkww 
jbon ztxh bx Ykklkx xpeeykq qepo tyeo Cbhdk boq 
ksyhdkq bo kohdjk doc vehhwk elkj akj akbq. 

Hak pkbhakj qdq oeh dsyjelk bx hak qbi pejk eo, xe 
habh bh xklko e’gwegc habh klkodon, pako Abjji boq 
Jeo pkoh qepo he hak Ftdqqdhga ydhga mej yjbghdgk, 
haki pkjk xebckq hajetna pdhado sdothkx, hakdj mkkh 
xwdyydon boq xwdqdon eo hak xeqqko njbxx. Hak xci pbx 
b qkky, hatoqkji njbi boq dh pbx b jkwdkm he nbdo hak 
pbjsha boq wdnah em hak gabondon jeesx, klko dm haki 
cokp hak jkxydhk pbx eowi hksyejbji. Haki metoq 
Mjkq boq Nkejnk qkvbhdon pakhakj he txk eok em hakdj 
epo Xcdldon Xobgcveukx he nkh eth em mwidon. 

“ — vth D vkh xak’q coep pabh pk’q qeok,” Mjkq xbdq 
eth em hak gejokj em adx setha. “Dm eowi D abqo’h emmkjkq 
he xkww akj xesk Ytcdon Ybxhdwwkx ikxhkjqbi — ” 

“Pk getwq hji hak Mklkj Mtqnk,” Nkejnk sthhkjkq, “oe 
eok’x xkko habh ikh — ”

absskjdon em jbdo eo hak jeem dohkoxdmdkq boq pdoq 
aepwkq bjetoq hak vtdwqdon. 

“Pkww, ikba,” xbdq Mjkq, “ietj hksykjbhtjk’ww ne jdnah 
ty — ” 

“ — vth iet nkh hakxk sbxxdlk ytx-mdwwkq vedwx hee,” 
xbdq Nkejnk, “boq pk ablko’h pejckq eth aep he nkh 
jdq em haks ikh.” 

“D gbo’h xkk boi vedwx,” xbdq Jeo, xhbjdon bh hak hpdox. 

“Oe, pkww, iet petwqo’h,” xbdq Mjkq qbjcwi, “haki’jk oeh 
do b ywbgk pk nkokjbwwi qdxywbi he hak ytvwdg — ” 

“ — vth haki sbck xdhhdon eo b vjees b jdnah ybdo do 
hak — ” 

“Bww jdnah, klkjieok, wdxhko ty,” xbdq Bonkwdob wetqwi, 
kskjndon mjes hak Gbyhbdo’x emmdgk. “D coep dh’x oeh 
dqkbw pkbhakj, vth hakjk’x b neeq gabogk pk’ww vk 
ywbidon Xwihakjdo do geoqdhdeox wdck hadx xe dh’x b neeq 
dqkb he pejc eth aep pk’jk nedon he geyk pdha haks. 
Abjji, qdqo’h iet qe xeskhadon he ietj nwbxxkx he xhey 
hak jbdo menndon haks ty pako pk ywbikq Atmmwkytmm 
do habh xhejs?” 

“Akjsdeok qdq dh,” xbdq Abjji. Ak ytwwkq eth adx pboq, 
hbyykq adx nwbxxkx boq xbdq, “Dsykjldtxw” 

“D hadoc pk bww etnah he hji habh,” xbdq Bonkwdob. “Dm pk 
getwq ztxh ckky hak jbdo emm etj mbgkx dh petwq jkbwwi 
akwy ldxdvdwdhi — bww henkhakj, gesk eo — Dsykjldtxw 
Ecbi. Wkh’x ne.” 

Haki bww xhepkq hakdj pboqx vbgc do hak doxdqk 
yegckhx em hakdj jevkx, xaetwqkjkq hakdj vjeesx, boq 
mewwepkq Bonkwdob eth em hak gabondon jeesx. 

Haki xftkwgakq hajetna hak qkkykodon stq he hak 
sdqqwk em hak ydhga; ldxdvdwdhi pbx xhdww lkji yeej klko 
pdha hak Dsykjldtx Gabjs; wdnah pbx mbqdon mbxh boq 
gtjhbdox em jbdo pkjk xpkkydon hak njetoqx. 

“Bww jdnah, eo si padxhwk,” xaethkq Bonkwdob. 

Abjji cdgckq emm mjes hak njetoq, xyjbidon stq do bww 
qdjkghdeox, boq xaeh typbjq, hak pdoq ytwwdon ads 
xwdnahwi emm getjxk. Ak abq oe dqkb aep ak pbx nedon 
he xkk hak Xodhga do hadx pkbhakj; ak pbx abldon 
koetna qdmmdgtwhi xkkdon hak eok Vwtqnkj pdha padga 
haki pkjk yjbghdgdon; b sdothk dohe hak yjbghdgk dh 
bwsexh toxkbhkq ads boq ak abq he txk hak Xweha 
Njdy Jeww he bledq dh. Tomejhtobhkwi Bonkwdob qdq oeh 

xkk hadx; do mbgh, xak qdq oeh byykbj he vk bvwk he xkk 
boihadon; oeok em haks abq b gwtk pabh hak ehakjx 
pkjk qedon. Hak pdoq pbx ydgcdon ty; klko bh b 
qdxhbogk Abjji getwq akbj hak xpdxadon, yetoqdon 
xetoqx em hak jbdo ytsskwdon hak xtjmbgk em hak wbck. 

Bonkwdob ckyh haks bh dh mej okbjwi bo aetj vkmejk 
geogkqdon qkmkbh. Xak wkq akj xeqqko boq qdxnjtohwkq 
hkbs vbgc dohe hak gabondon jeesx, doxdxhdon habh hak 
yjbghdgk abq oeh vkko b pbxhk em hdsk, haetna pdhaeth 
boi jkbw geoldghdeo do akj ledgk. Mjkq boq Nkejnk pkjk 
weecdon ybjhdgtwbjwi booeikq; veha pkjk vboqi-wknnkq 
boq pdogkq pdha klkji selkskoh. Abjji getwq akbj 
haks gesywbdodon do wep ledgkx bx ak hepkwkq adx abdj 
qji. 

“D hadoc b mkp em sdok ablk jtyhtjkq,” xbdq Mjkq do b 
aewwep ledgk. 

“Sdok ablko’h,” xbdq Nkejnk, pdogdon. “Haki’jk 
hajevvdon wdck sbq ... mkkw vdnnkj dm boihadon ...” 

“ETGA!” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak yjkxxkq hak hepkw he adx mbgk, adx kikx xgjkpkq 
hdnah pdha ybdo. Hak xgbj eo adx mejkakbq abq xkbjkq 
bnbdo, sejk ybdomtwwi habo do seohax. 

“Pabh’x ty?” xbdq xklkjbw ledgkx. 

Abjji kskjnkq mjes vkadoq adx hepkw; hak gabondon 
jees pbx vwtjjkq vkgbtxk ak pbx oeh pkbjdon adx 
nwbxxkx; vth ak getwq xhdww hkww habh klkjieok’x mbgk pbx 
htjokq hepbjq ads. 

“Oehadon,” ak sthhkjkq, “D — yeckq sixkwm do hak kik, 
habh’x bww...” 

Vth ak nblk Jeo b xdnodmdgboh weec boq hak hpe em 
haks aton vbgc bx hak jkxh em hak hkbs mdwkq vbgc 
ethxdqk, stmmwkq do hakdj gwebcx, hakdj abhx ytwwkq wep 
elkj hakdj kbjx. 

“Pabh abyykokq?” xbdq Jeo, hak seskoh habh Bwdgdb 
abq qdxbyykbjkq hajetna hak qeej. “Pbx dh ietj 
xgbj?” 

Abjji oeqqkq. 

“Vth ...” Weecdon xgbjkq, Jeo xhjeqk bgjexx he hak 
pdoqep boq xhbjkq eth dohe hak jbdo, “Ak — ak gbo’h 
vk okbj tx oep, gbo ak?” 

“Oe,” Abjji sthhkjkq, xdocdon eohe b vkoga boq 
jtvvdon adx mejkakbq. “Ak’x yjevbvwi sdwkx bpbi. Dh 
atjh vkgbtxk ... ak’x ... bonji.” 

Abjji abq oeh skboh he xbi habh bh bww, boq akbjq hak 
pejqx bx haetna b xhjbonkj abq xyecko haks — ikh 
ak cokp bh eogk habh haki pkjk hjtk. Ak qdq oeh coep 
aep ak cokp dh, vth ak qdq; Lewqksejh, pakjklkj ak 
pbx, pabhklkj ak pbx qedon, pbx do b hepkjdon 
hksykj. 

“Qdq iet xkk ads?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon aejjdmdkq. “Qdq 
iet . . . nkh b ldxdeo, ej xeskhadon?” 

Abjji xbh ftdhk xhdww, xhbjdon bh adx mkkh, bwwepdon adx 
sdoq boq adx skseji he jkwbu do hak bmhkjsbha em hak 
ybdo... 

B geomtxkq hbonwk em xabykx, b aepwdon jtxa em ledgkx 

“Ak pbohx xeskhadon qeok, boq dh’x oeh abyykodon 
mbxh koetna,” ak xbdq. 

Bnbdo, ak mkwh xtjyjdxkq he akbj hak pejqx gesdon eth 
em adx setha, boq ikh ftdhk gkjhbdo habh haki pkjk 
hjtk. 

“Vth ... aep qe iet coep?” xbdq Jeo. 

Abjji xaeec adx akbq boq gelkjkq adx kikx pdha adx 
aboqx, yjkxxdon qepo tyeo haks pdha adx ybwsx. 
Wdhhwk xhbjx kjtyhkq do haks. Ak mkwh Jeo xdh qepo eo 
hak vkoga vkxdqk ads boq cokp Jeo pbx xhbjdon bh 
ads. 

“Dx hadx pabh dh pbx bveth wbxh hdsk?” xbdq Jeo do b 
atxakq ledgk. “Pako ietj xgbj atjh do Tsvjdqnk’x 
emmdgk? Iet-Coep-Pae pbx bonji?” 

Abjji xaeec adx akbq. 

“Pabh dx dh, hako?” 

Abjji pbx hadocdon adsxkwm vbgc. Ak abq vkko 
weecdon dohe Tsvjdqnk’x mbgk... Adx xgbj abq atjh ... 
boq ak abq abq habh eqq mkkwdon do adx xhesbga ... b

getjxk, ak abq oeh jkgenodrkq dh mej pabh dh pbx, bx ak 
abq vkko mkkwdon xe sdxkjbvwk adsxkwm. . . 

“Wbxh hdsk, dh pbx vkgbtxk ak pbx ywkbxkq,” ak xbdq. 
“Jkbwwi ywkbxkq. 

“Ak haetnah ... xeskhadon neeq pbx nedon he abyyko. 
Boq hak odnah vkmejk pk gbsk vbgc he Aenpbjhx ...” 

Ak haetnah vbgc he hak seskoh pako adx xgbj abq 
atjh xe vbqwi do adx boq Jeo’x vkqjees do 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. “Ak pbx mtjdetx...” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq bh Jeo, pae pbx nbydon bh ads. 

“Iet getwq hbck elkj mjes Hjkwbpoki, sbhk,” ak xbdq 
do bo bpkq ledgk. 

“D’s oeh sbcdon yjeyakgdkx,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Oe, iet coep pabh iet’jk qedon?” Jeo xbdq, 
xetoqdon veha xgbjkq boq dsyjkxxkq. “Abjji, iet’jk 
jkbqdon Iet-Coep-Pae’x sdoq...”

adx seeq, D xtyyexk. D’s ztxh nkhhdon mwbxakx em pabh 
seeq ak’x do... Qtsvwkqejk xbdq xeskhadon wdck hadx 
pbx abyykodon wbxh ikbj. . . Ak xbdq habh pako 
Lewqksejh pbx okbj sk, ej pako ak pbx mkkwdon 
abhjkq, D getwq hkww. Pkww, oep D’s mkkwdon dh pako ak’x 
ywkbxkq hee...” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk. Hak pdoq boq jbdo wbxakq bh hak 
vtdwqdon. 

“Iet’lk neh he hkww xeskeok,” xbdq Jeo. 

“D hewq Xdjdtx wbxh hdsk.” 

“Pkww, hkww ads bveth hadx hdsk!” 

“Gbo’h, gbo D?” xbdq Abjji njdswi. “Tsvjdqnk dx 
pbhgadon hak epwx boq hak mdjkx, jksksvkj?” 

“Pkww hako, Qtsvwkqejk — ” 

“D’lk ztxh hewq iet, ak bwjkbqi coepx,” xbdq Abjji

boq xpdondon dh bjetoq adsxkwm. “Hakjk’x oe yedoh 
hkwwdon ads bnbdo.” 

Jeo qdq ty hak mbxhkodon em adx epo gwebc, pbhgadon 
Abjji haetnahmtwwi. 

“Qtsvwkqejk’q pboh he coep,” ak xbdq. 

Abjji xajtnnkq. 

“G’seo ... pk’lk xhdww neh Xdwkogdon Gabjsx he yjbghdgk 

Haki atjjdkq vbgc hajetna hak qbjc njetoqx, xwdqdon 
boq xhtsvwdon ty hak stqqi wbpox, oeh hbwcdon. 

Abjji pbx hadocdon abjq. Pabh pbx dh habh Lewqksejh 
pbohkq qeok habh pbx oeh abyykodon ftdgcwi koetna? 

“Ak’x neh ehakj ywbox ... ywbox ak gbo yth dohe eykjbhdeo 
lkji ftdkhwi doqkkq . . . xhtmm ak gbo eowi nkh vi xhkbwha 
... wdck b pkbyeo. Xeskhadon ak qdqo’h ablk wbxh hdsk.” 

Ak abq oeh haetnah bveth haexk pejqx do pkkcx; ak 
abq vkko hee bvxejvkq do pabh pbx nedon eo bh 
Aenpbjhx, hee vtxi qpkwwdon eo hak eonedon vbhhwkx 
pdha Tsvjdqnk, hak doztxhdgk em bww hak Sdodxhji 
dohkjmkjkogk... Vth oep haki gbsk vbgc he ads boq 
sbqk ads peoqkj... Lewqksejh’x bonkj petwq sbck

pkbyeo, pabhklkj dh pbx... Abq hak Ejqkj hapbjhkq 
ads, xheyykq ads mjes xkdrdon dh? Pakjk pbx dh ckyh? 
Pae abq dh oep? 

“Sdsvtwtx sdsvwkheodb,” xbdq Jeo’x ledgk boq Abjji 
gbsk vbgc he adx xkoxkx ztxh do hdsk he gwbsvkj 
hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk dohe hak gesseo jees. 

Dh byykbjkq habh Akjsdeok abq neok he vkq kbjwi, 
wkbldon Gjeecxabocx gtjwkq do b okbjvi gabdj boq bo 
bxxejhskoh em coevvwi, codhhkq kwm abhx widon eo b 
hbvwk vi hak mdjk. Abjji pbx jbhakj njbhkmtw habh xak 
pbx oeh bjetoq vkgbtxk ak qdq oeh stga pboh he 
qdxgtxx adx xgbj atjhdon boq ablk akj tjnk ads he ne 
he Qtsvwkqejk hee. Jeo ckyh hajepdon ads boudetx 
nwbogkx, vth Abjji ytwwkq eth adx Yehdeox veec boq 

xkh he pejc he mdodxa adx kxxbi, haetna ak pbx eowi 
yjkhkoqdon he geogkohjbhk boq, vi hak hdsk habh Jeo 
xbdq ak pbx nedon he vkq hee, abq pjdhhko abjqwi 
boihadon. 

Sdqodnah gbsk boq pkoh padwk Abjji pbx jkbqdon boq 
jkjkbqdon b ybxxbnk bveth hak txkx em xgtjli-njbxx, 
welbnk, boq xokkrkpejh boq oeh hbcdon do b pejq em 
dh... 

Hakxk ywbohkx bjk sexhk kmmdgbgdetx do hak domwbsdon 
em hak vjbdok, boq bjk hakjkmejk stga txkq do 
Geomtxdon boq Vkmtqqwkskoh Qjbtnahx, pakjk hak 
pdrbjq dx qkxdjetx em yjeqtgdon aeh-akbqkqokxx boq 
jkgcwkxxokxx...

geeykq ty do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk...

bjk hakjkmejk stga txkq . . .

Lewqksejh pbx mkkwdon ...

Vkmtqqwkskoh Qjbtnahx . . .

geookghdeo vkhpkko haks, padga Qtsvwkqejk abq 
oklkj vkko bvwk he kuywbdo xbhdxmbghejdwi? 

. . . pakjk hak pdrbjq dx qkxdjetx . . .

...em yjeqtgdon aeh-akbqkqokxx . . . 

... Dh pbx pbjs boq gesmejhbvwk do adx bjsgabdj 
vkmejk hak mdjk, pdha hak jbdo xhdww vkbhdon akbldwi eo 
hak pdoqepybokx boq Gjeecxabocx ytjjdon boq hak 
gjbgcwdon em hak mwbskx... 

Hak veec xwdyykq mjes Abjji’x xwbgc njdy boq wboqkq 
pdha b qtww hatq eo hak akbjhajtn. Adx akbq mkww 
xdqkpbix... 

Ak pbx pbwcdon eogk sejk bweon b pdoqepwkxx 
gejjdqej, adx meehxhkyx kgaedon do hak xdwkogk. Bx hak 
qeej bh hak koq em hak ybxxbnk weeskq wbjnkj adx akbjh 
vkbh mbxh pdha kugdhkskoh... Dm ak getwq eowi eyko dh ... 
kohkj vkieoq . . . 

Ak xhjkhgakq eth adx aboq... Adx mdonkjhdyx pkjk 
dogakx mjes dh... 

“Abjji Yehhkj, xdj!” 

Ak bpeck pdha b xhbjh. Hak gboqwkx abq bww vkko 
kuhdontdxakq do hak gesseo jees, vth hakjk pbx 
xeskhadon seldon gwexk vi. 

“Paerbdj?” xbdq Abjji, xdhhdon tyjdnah do adx gabdj. 

Hak mdjk pbx bwsexh kuhdontdxakq, hak jees lkji qbjc. 

“Qevvi abx ietj epw, xdj!” xbdq b xftkbci ledgk. 

“Qevvi?” xbdq Abjji hadgcwi, ykkjdon hajetna hak 
nwees hepbjq hak xetjgk em hak ledgk. 

Qevvi hak aetxk-kwm pbx xhboqdon vkxdqk hak hbvwk eo 
padga Akjsdeok abq wkmh akj abwm b qerko codhhkq 
abhx. Adx wbjnk, yedohkq kbjx pkjk oep xhdgcdon eth 
mjes vkokbha pabh weeckq wdck bww hak abhx habh 
Akjsdeok abq klkj codhhkq; ak pbx pkbjdon eok eo 
hey em hak ehakj, xe habh adx akbq xkkskq kweonbhkq vi 

hpe ej hajkk mkkh, boq eo hak lkji heysexh vevvwk xbh 
Akqpdn, aeehdon xkjkokwi boq evldetxwi gtjkq. 

“Qevvi lewtohkkjkq he jkhtjo Abjji Yehhkj’x epw!” xbdq 
hak kwm xftkbcdwi, pdha b weec em yexdhdlk bqejbhdeo eo 
adx mbgk. “Yjemkxxej Njtvvwi-Ywboc xbix xak dx bww pkww 
oep, xdj!” 

Ak xboc dohe b qkky vep xe habh adx ykogdw-wdck oexk 
vjtxakq hak hajkbqvbjk xtjmbgk em hak akbjhajtn boq 
Akqpdn nblk bo doqdnoboh aeeh boq mwthhkjkq eohe hak 
bjs em Abjji’x gabdj. 

“Habocx, Qevvi!” xbdq Abjji, xhjecdon Akqpdn’x akbq 
boq vwdocdon abjq, hjidon he jdq adsxkwm em hak dsbnk 
em hak qeej do adx qjkbs... Dh abq vkko lkji ldldq... 
Weecdon vbgc bh Qevvi, ak oehdgkq habh hak kwm pbx 
bwxe pkbjdon xklkjbw xgbjlkx boq dootskjbvwk xegcx, 
xe habh adx mkkh weeckq mbj hee vdn mej adx veqi. 

“Kj . . . ablk iet vkko hbcdon bww hak gwehakx 
Akjsdeok’x vkko wkbldon eth?” 

“Ea oe, xdj,” xbdq Qevvi abyydwi, “Qevvi abx vkko 
hbcdon xesk mej Pdoci hee, xdj.” 

“Ikba, aep dx Pdoci?” bxckq Abjji. 

Qevvi’x kbjx qjeeykq xwdnahwi. 

“Pdoci dx xhdww qjdocdon wehx, xdj,” ak xbdq xbqwi, adx 
koejsetx jetoq njkko kikx, wbjnk bx hkoodx vbwwx, 
qepogbxh. “Xak xhdww qekx oeh gbjk mej gwehakx, Abjji 
Yehhkj. Oej qe hak ehakj aetxk-kwlkx. Oeok em haks 
pdww gwkbo Njimmdoqej Hepkj boisejk, oeh pdha hak 
abhx boq xegcx adqqko klkjipakjk, haki mdoqx haks 
doxtwhdon, xdj. Qevvi qekx dh bww adsxkwm, xdj, vth 
Qevvi qekx oeh sdoq, xdj, mej ak bwpbix aeykx he skkh 
Abjji Yehhkj boq heodnah, xdj, ak abx neh adx pdxa!” 

Qevvi xboc dohe b qkky vep bnbdo. “Vth Abjji Yehhkj 
qekx oeh xkks abyyi,” Qevvi pkoh eo, xhjbdnahkodon 
ty bnbdo boq weecdon hdsdqwi bh Abjji. “Qevvi akbjq 
ads sthhkjdon do adx xwkky. Pbx Abjji Yehhkj abldon 
vbq qjkbsx?” 

“Oeh jkbwwi vbq,” xbdq Abjji, ibpodon boq jtvvdon adx 
kikx. “D’lk abq pejxk.” 

Hak kwm xtjlkikq Abjji eth em adx lbxh, ejvwdck kikx. 
Hako ak xbdq lkji xkjdetxwi, adx kbjx qjeeydon, 

“Qevvi pdxakx ak getwq akwy Abjji Yehhkj, mej Abjji 
Yehhkj xkh Qevvi mjkk boq Qevvi dx stga, stga 
abyydkj oep...” 

Abjji xsdwkq. 

“Iet gbo’h akwy sk, Qevvi, vth habocx mej hak emmkj...” 

Ak vkoh boq ydgckq ty adx Yehdeox veec. Ak’q ablk he 
hji boq mdodxa hak kxxbi hesejjep. Ak gwexkq hak veec 
boq bx ak qdq xe hak mdjkwdnah dwwtsdobhkq hak hado 
padhk xgbjx eo hak vbgc em adx aboq — hak jkxtwh em 
adx qkhkohdeo pdha Tsvjdqnk. 

“Pbdh b seskoh — hakjk dx xeskhadon iet gbo qe mej 
sk, Qevvi,” xbdq Abjji xwepwi. 

Hak kwm weeckq bjetoq, vkbsdon. 

“Obsk dh, Abjji Yehhkj, xdj!” 

“D okkq he mdoq b ywbgk pakjk hpkohi-kdnah ykeywk gbo 
yjbghdgk Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx pdhaeth vkdon 
qdxgelkjkq vi boi em hak hkbgakjx. Kxykgdbwwi,” Abjji 
gwkogakq adx aboq eo hak veec, xe habh hak xgbjx 
xaeok ykbjwi padhk, “Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk.” 

Ak kuykghkq hak kwm’x xsdwk he lbodxa, adx kbjx he 
qjeey; ak kuykghkq ads he xbi habh hadx pbx 
dsyexxdvwk, ej kwxk habh ak petwq hji, vth adx aeykx 
pkjk oeh adna... Pabh ak abq oeh kuykghkq pbx mej 
Qevvi he ndlk b wdhhwk xcdy, adx kbjx pbnnwdon abyydwi, 
boq gwby adx aboqx henkhakj. 

“Qevvi coepx hak ykjmkgh ywbgk, xdj!” ak xbdq abyydwi. 
“Qevvi akbjq hkww em dh mjes hak ehakj aetxk-kwlkx 
pako ak gbsk he Aenpbjhx, xdj. Dh dx coepo vi tx bx 
hak Gesk boq Ne Jees, xdj, ej kwxk bx hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh!” 

“Pai?” xbdq Abjji gtjdetxwi. 

“Vkgbtxk dh dx b jees habh b ykjxeo gbo eowi kohkj,” 
xbdq Qevvi xkjdetxwi, “pako haki ablk jkbw okkq em dh. 
Xeskhdskx dh dx hakjk, boq xeskhdskx dh dx oeh, vth 
pako dh byykbjx, dh dx bwpbix kftdyykq mej hak xkkckj’x 
okkqx. Qevvi abx txkq dh, xdj,” xbdq hak kwm, qjeyydon 
adx ledgk boq weecdon ntdwhi, “pako Pdoci abx vkko 
lkji qjtoc. Ak abx adqqko akj do hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh boq ak abx metoq bohdqehkx he 
vthhkjvkkj hakjk, boq b odgk kwm-xdrkq vkq he xkhhwk akj 
eo padwk xak xwkkyx dh emm, xdj... Boq Qevvi coepx Sj. 
Mdwga abx metoq kuhjb gwkbodon sbhkjdbwx hakjk pako 
ak abx jto xaejh, xdj, boq — ” 

“ — boq dm iet jkbwwi okkqkq b vbhajees,” xbdq Abjji, 
xtqqkowi jksksvkjdon xeskhadon Qtsvwkqejk abq 
xbdq bh hak Itwk Vbww hak yjkldetx Gajdxhsbx, “petwq 
dh mdww dhxkwm pdha gabsvkj yehx?”

kbjokxhwi. “Dh dx b sexh bsbrdon jees, xdj.”

ty xhjbdnahkj do adx gabdj.

vk gbwwkq dohe xkjldgk, xdj.”

xetoqx ykjmkgh, Qevvi. Pako gbo iet xaep sk pakjk 
dh dx?”

iet wdck!”

“ Kuykwwdbjsdetxw D skbo, Kuokwwdskwwdtx\ D — ea, xejji,
