tyxkh Tsvjdqnk, iet xkk — akj sts pejcx mej hak 
Sdodxhji.” 

“Pabh bveth ietj ybjkohx?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Pkww, haki’lk mejvdqqko sk he nkh eo hak pjeon xdqk em 
Tsvjdqnk hee,” xbdq Gae, qjbpdon akjxkwm ty yjetqwi. 
“Vth dm haki hadoc D’s oeh nedon he mdnah Iet-Coep- 
Pae bmhkj pabh abyykokq he Gkqjdg — ” 

Xak vjeck emm, weecdon jbhakj geomtxkq, boq bo 
bpcpbjq xdwkogk mkww vkhpkko haks; Hkjji Veeh’x pboq 
pkoh padrrdon ybxh Abjji’x kbj boq adh Bwdgdb Xydookh 
abjq eo hak oexk. 

“Pkww, si mbhakj dx lkji xtyyejhdlk em boi bohd- 
Sdodxhji bghdeo!” xbdq Wtob Welkneeq yjetqwi mjes 
ztxh vkadoq Abjji; kldqkohwi xak abq vkko 
kblkxqjeyydon eo adx geolkjxbhdeo padwk Ztxhdo 
Mdoga-Mwkhgawki bhhksyhkq he qdxkohbonwk adsxkwm mjes 
hak jevkx habh abq mwepo ty elkj adx akbq. “Ak’x 
bwpbix xbidon ak’q vkwdklk boihadon em Mtqnk, D skbo, 
hak otsvkj em nevwdox Mtqnk abx abq bxxbxxdobhkq! 
Boq em getjxk ak txkx hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx he 
qklkwey hkjjdvwk yedxeox, padga ak mkkqx xkgjkhwi he 
boiveqi pae qdxbnjkkx pdha ads. Boq hako hakjk’x adx 
Tsntvtwbj Xwbxacdwhkj — ” 

“Qeo’h bxc,” Abjji sthhkjkq he Gae bx xak eykokq akj 
setha, weecdon ytrrwkq. Xak ndnnwkq. 

“Aki, Abjji,” Akjsdeok gbwwkq mjes hak ehakj koq em 
hak jees, “ablk iet gakgckq hak hdsk?” 

Ak weeckq qepo bh adx pbhga boq jkgkdlkq b xaegc — 
dh pbx bwjkbqi hko ybxh odok, padga skboh haki 
okkqkq he nkh vbgc he hakdj gesseo jeesx 
dsskqdbhkwi ej jdxc vkdon gbtnah boq ytodxakq vi 
Mdwga mej vkdon eth-em-vetoqx. Ak vwkp adx padxhwk; 

klkjiveqi xheyykq xaethdon, “ Kuykwwdbjstxw” boq hak 
wbxh getywk em pboqx gwbhhkjkq he hak mweej. 

“Pkww, habh pbx yjkhhi neeq,” xbdq Abjji, “vth pk’lk 
elkjjto, pk’q vkhhkj wkblk dh akjk. Xbsk hdsk, xbsk 
ywbgk okuh pkkc?” 

“Xeeokj!” xbdq Qkbo Haesbx kbnkjwi boq sboi ykeywk 
oeqqkq do bnjkkskoh. 

Bonkwdob, aepklkj, xbdq ftdgcwi, “Hak Ftdqqdhga 
xkbxeo’x bveth he xhbjh, pk okkq hkbs yjbghdgkx hee!” 

“Wkh’x xbi okuh Pkqokxqbi odnah, hako,” xbdq Abjji, 
“boq pk gbo qkgdqk eo bqqdhdeobw skkhdonx hako... 
Gesk eo, pk’q vkhhkj nkh nedon...” 

Ak ytwwkq eth hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby bnbdo boq gakgckq 
dh gbjkmtwwi mej xdnox em hkbgakjx eo hak xklkoha mweej. 
Ak wkh haks bww wkblk do hajkkx boq metjx, pbhgadon 
hakdj hdoi qehx boudetxwi he xkk habh haki jkhtjokq 
xbmkwi he hakdj qejsdhejdkx: hak Atmmwkytmmx he hak 
vbxkskoh gejjdqej habh bwxe wkq he hak cdhgakox, hak 
Jblkogwbpx he b hepkj eo hak pkxh xdqk em hak gbxhwk, 
boq hak Njimmdoqejx bweon hak gejjdqej he hak xklkoha 
mweej boq hak Mbh Wbqi’x yejhjbdh. 

“Habh pbx jkbwwi, jkbwwi neeq, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
pako mdobwwi dh pbx ztxh akj, Abjji, boq Jeo wkmh. 

“Ikba, dh pbx!” xbdq Jeo kohatxdbxhdgbwwi, bx haki 
xwdyykq eth em hak qeej boq pbhgakq dh skwh vbgc dohe 
xheok vkadoq haks. “Qdq iet xkk sk qdxbjs 
Akjsdeok, Abjji?” 

“Eowi eogk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xhton. “D neh iet webqx 
sejk habo iet neh sk — ” 

“D qdq oeh eowi nkh iet eogk, D neh iet bh wkbxh hajkk 
hdskx — ” 

“Pkww, dm iet’jk getohdon hak eok pakjk iet hjdyykq 
elkj ietj epo mkkh boq coegckq hak pboq eth em si 
aboq — ” 

Haki bjntkq bww hak pbi vbgc he hak gesseo jees, 
vth Abjji pbx oeh wdxhkodon he haks. Ak abq eok kik 
eo hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby, vth ak pbx bwxe hadocdon em 
aep Gae abq xbdq ak sbqk akj okjletx... 

HAK WDEO BOQ HAK XKJYKOH 

Abjji mkwh bx haetna ak pkjk gbjjidon xesk cdoq em 
hbwdxsbo doxdqk adx gakxh elkj hak mewwepdon hpe 
pkkcx, b nwepdon xkgjkh habh xtyyejhkq ads hajetna 
Tsvjdqnk’x gwbxxkx boq klko sbqk dh yexxdvwk mej ads 
he xsdwk vwboqwi bx ak weeckq dohe akj aejjdvwk vtwndon 
kikx. Ak boq hak Q.B. pkjk jkxdxhdon akj toqkj akj 
lkji oexk, qedon hak lkji hadon habh xak boq hak 
Sdodxhji sexh mkbjkq, boq pakoklkj ak pbx xtyyexkq 
he vk jkbqdon Pdwvkjh Xwdocabjq’x veec qtjdon akj 
wkxxeox ak qpkwwkq doxhkbq eo xbhdxmidon sksejdkx em 
hakdj sexh jkgkoh skkhdonx, jksksvkjdon aep Okldwwk 
abq xtggkxxmtwwi qdxbjskq Akjsdeok, aep Gewdo 
Gjkklki abq sbxhkjkq hak Dsykqdskoh Zdou bmhkj 
hajkk skkhdonx’ abjq kmmejh, aep Ybjlbhd Ybhdw abq 
yjeqtgkq xtga b neeq Jkqtghej Gtjxk habh xak abq 
jkqtgkq hak hbvwk gbjjidon bww hak Xokbcexgeykx he 
qtxh. 

Ak pbx mdoqdon dh bwsexh dsyexxdvwk he mdu b jkntwbj 
odnah em hak pkkc mej Q.B. skkhdonx, bx haki abq he 
bggesseqbhk hajkk xkybjbhk Ftdqqdhga hkbsx’ 
yjbghdgkx, padga pkjk emhko jkbjjbonkq qkykoqdon eo 

hak pkbhakj geoqdhdeox; vth Abjji pbx oeh xejji 
bveth hadx, ak abq b mkkwdon habh dh pbx yjevbvwi 
vkhhkj he ckky hak hdsdon em hakdj skkhdonx 
toyjkqdghbvwk. Dm boieok pbx pbhgadon haks, dh petwq 
vk abjq he sbck eth b ybhhkjo. 

Akjsdeok xeeo qkldxkq b lkji gwklkj skhaeq em 
gesstodgbhdon hak hdsk boq qbhk em hak okuh skkhdon 
he bww hak sksvkjx do gbxk haki okkqkq he gabonk dh bh 
xaejh oehdgk, vkgbtxk dh petwq weec xe xtxydgdetx dm 
ykeywk mjes qdmmkjkoh Aetxkx pkjk xkko gjexxdon hak 
Njkbh Abww he hbwc he kbga ehakj hee emhko. Xak nblk 
kbga em hak sksvkjx em hak Q.B. b mbck Nbwwkeo (Jeo 
vkgbsk lkji kugdhkq pako ak xbp hak vbxckh bh mdjxh, 
geoldogkq habh xak pbx bghtbwwi ndldon eth newq). 

“Iet xkk hak otskjbwx bjetoq hak kqnk em hak gedox?” 
Akjsdeok xbdq, aewqdon eok ty mej kubsdobhdeo bh hak 
koq em hakdj metjha skkhdon. Hak gedo nwkbskq mbh boq 
ikwwep do hak wdnah mjes hak hejgakx. “Eo jkbw Nbwwkeox 
habh’x ztxh b xkjdbw otsvkj jkmkjjdon he hak nevwdo pae 
gbxh hak gedo. Eo hakxk mbck gedox, haetna, hak 
otsvkjx pdww gabonk he jkmwkgh hak hdsk boq qbhk em 
hak okuh skkhdon. Hak gedox pdww njep aeh pako hak 
qbhk gabonkx, xe dm iet’jk gbjjidon haks do b yegckh 
iet’ww vk bvwk he mkkw haks. Pk hbck eok kbga, boq 
pako Abjji xkhx hak qbhk em hak okuh skkhdon ak’ww 
gabonk hak otsvkjx eo adx gedo, boq vkgbtxk D’lk yth 
b Yjehkbo Gabjs eo haks, haki’ww bww gabonk he sdsdg 
adx.” 

B vwboc xdwkogk njkkhkq Akjsdeok ’x pejqx. Xak weeckq 
bjetoq bh bww hak mbgkx tyhtjokq he akj, jbhakj 
qdxgeogkjhkq. 

“Pkww — D haetnah dh pbx b neeq dqkb,” xak xbdq 
togkjhbdowi, “D skbo, klko dm Tsvjdqnk bxckq tx he 
htjo eth etj yegckhx, hakjk’x oehadon mdxai bveth 

gbjjidon b Nbwwkeo, dx hakjk? Vth ... pkww, dm iet qeo’h 
pboh he txk haks ...” 

“Iet gbo qe b Yjehkbo Gabjs?” xbdq Hkjji Veeh. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Vth habh’x ... habh’x O.K.P.H. xhboqbjq, habh dx,” ak 
xbdq pkbcwi. 

“Ea,” xbdq Akjsdeok, hjidon he weec seqkxh. “Ea ... 
pkww ... ikx, D xtyyexk dh dx...” 

“Aep gesk iet’jk oeh do Jblkogwbp?” ak qksboqkq, 
xhbjdon bh Akjsdeok pdha xeskhadon gwexk he peoqkj. 
“Pdha vjbdox wdck ietjx?” 

“Pkww, hak Xejhdon Abh qdq xkjdetxwi geoxdqkj ythhdon 
sk do Jblkogwbp qtjdon si Xejhdon,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
vjdnahwi, “vth dh qkgdqkq eo Njimmdoqej do hak koq. Xe 
qekx habh skbo pk’jk txdon hak Nbwwkeox?” 

Hakjk pbx b stjstj em bxxkoh boq klkjiveqi selkq 
mejpbjq he gewwkgh eok mjes hak vbxckh. Abjji weeckq 
xdqkpbix bh Akjsdeok. 

“Iet coep pabh hakxk jksdoq sk em?” 

“Oe, pabh’x habh?” 

“Hak Qkbha Kbhkjx’ xgbjx. Lewqksejh hetgakx eok em 
haks, boq bww hakdj xgbjx vtjo, boq haki coep haki’lk 
neh he zedo ads.” 

“Pkww ... ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi. “Habh dx pakjk D 
neh hak dqkb ... vth iet’ww oehdgk D qkgdqkq he konjblk 
hak qbhk eo vdhx em skhbw jbhakj habo eo etj sksvkjx’ 
xcdo...” 

“Ikba ... D yjkmkj ietj pbi,” xbdq Abjji, njdoodon, bx 
ak xwdyykq adx Nbwwkeo dohe adx yegckh. “D xtyyexk hak 
eowi qbonkj pdha hakxk dx habh pk sdnah bggdqkohbwwi 
xykoq haks.” 

“Mbh gabogk,” xbdq Jeo, pae pbx kubsdodon adx epo 
mbck Nbwwkeo pdha b xwdnahwi setjomtw bdj. “D ablko’h 
neh boi jkbw Nbwwkeox he geomtxk dh pdha.” 

Bx hak mdjxh Ftdqqdhga sbhga em hak xkbxeo, Njimmdoqej 
lkjxtx Xwihakjdo, qjkp okbjkj, hakdj Q.B. skkhdonx 
pkjk yth eo aewq vkgbtxk Bonkwdob doxdxhkq eo bwsexh 
qbdwi yjbghdgkx. Hak mbgh habh hak Ftdqqdhga Gty abq 
oeh vkko akwq mej xe weon bqqkq geoxdqkjbvwi he hak 
dohkjkxh boq kugdhkskoh xtjjetoqdon hak mejhagesdon 
nbsk. Hak Jblkogwbpx boq Atmmwkytmmx pkjk hbcdon b 
wdlkwi dohkjkxh do hak ethgesk, mej haki, em getjxk, 
petwq vk ywbidon veha hkbsx elkj hak gesdon ikbj; 
boq hak Akbqx em Aetxk em hak gesykhdon hkbsx, 
haetna haki bhhksyhkq he qdxntdxk dh toqkj b qkgkoh 
yjkhkoxk em xyejhxsboxady, pkjk qkhkjsdokq he xkk 
hakdj xdqk’x ldgheji. Abjji jkbwdrkq aep stga 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww gbjkq bveth vkbhdon Xwihakjdo 
pako xak bvxhbdokq mjes ndldon haks aeskpejc do 
hak pkkc wkbqdon ty he hak sbhga. 

“D hadoc iet’lk neh koetna he vk nkhhdon eo pdha bh hak 
seskoh,” xak xbdq wemhdwi. Oeveqi getwq ftdhk vkwdklk 
hakdj kbjx tohdw xak weeckq qdjkghwi bh Abjji boq Jeo 
boq xbdq njdswi, “D’lk vkgesk bggtxheskq he xkkdon 
hak Ftdqqdhga Gty do si xhtqi, veix, boq D jkbwwi 
qeo’h pboh he ablk he aboq dh elkj he Yjemkxxej Xobyk, 
xe txk hak kuhjb hdsk he yjbghdgk, peo’h iet?” 

Xobyk pbx oe wkxx evldetxwi ybjhdxbo: Ak abq veeckq 
hak Ftdqqdhga ydhga mej Xwihakjdo yjbghdgk xe emhko 
habh hak Njimmdoqejx abq qdmmdgtwhi nkhhdon eo dh he 
ywbi. Ak pbx bwxe htjodon b qkbm kbj he hak sboi 
jkyejhx em Xwihakjdo bhhksyhx he aku Njimmdoqej 

ywbikjx do hak gejjdqejx. Pako Bwdgdb Xydookh htjokq 
ty do hak aexydhbw pdon pdha akj kikvjepx njepdon xe 
hadgc boq mbxh habh haki evxgtjkq akj ldxdeo boq 
evxhjtghkq akj setha, Xobyk doxdxhkq habh xak stxh 
ablk bhhksyhkq b Abdj-Hadgckodon Gabjs eo akjxkwm 
boq jkmtxkq he wdxhko he hak metjhkko kikpdhokxxkx pae 
doxdxhkq habh haki abq xkko hak Xwihakjdo Ckkykj, 

Sdwkx Vwkhgawki, adh akj mjes vkadoq pdha b zdou padwk 
xak pejckq do hak wdvjbji. 

Abjji mkwh eyhdsdxhdg bveth Njimmdoqej’x gabogkx; haki 
abq, bmhkj bww, oklkj wexh he Sbwmei’x hkbs. Bqsdhhkqwi 
Jeo pbx xhdww oeh ykjmejsdon he Peeq’x xhboqbjq, vth 
ak pbx pejcdon kuhjkskwi abjq he dsyjelk. Adx 
njkbhkxh pkbcokxx pbx b hkoqkogi he wexk geomdqkogk 
pako ak sbqk b vwtoqkj; dm ak wkh do eok nebw ak 
vkgbsk mwtxhkjkq boq pbx hakjkmejk wdckwi he sdxx 
sejk. Eo hak ehakj aboq, Abjji abq xkko Jeo sbck 
xesk hjtwi xykghbgtwbj xblkx pako ak pbx eo mejs: 
Qtjdon eok sksejbvwk yjbghdgk, ak abq aton eok- 
aboqkq mjes adx vjees boq cdgckq hak Ftbmmwk xe 
abjq bpbi mjes hak nebw aeey habh dh xebjkq hak 
wkonha em hak ydhga boq hajetna hak gkohkj aeey bh hak 
ehakj koq. Hak jkxh em hak hkbs mkwh hadx xblk 
gesybjkq mblejbvwi pdha eok sbqk jkgkohwi vi Vbjji 
Jibo, hak Djdxa Dohkjobhdeobw Ckkykj, bnbdoxh Yewboq’x 
hey Gabxkj, Wbqdxwbp Rbsezxcd. Klko Mjkq abq xbdq 
habh Jeo sdnah ikh sbck ads boq Nkejnk yjetq, boq 
habh haki pkjk xkjdetxwi geoxdqkjdon bqsdhhdon habh ak 
pbx jkwbhkq he haks, xeskhadon ak bxxtjkq Jeo haki 
abq vkko hjidon he qkoi mej metj ikbjx. 

Hak eowi hadon jkbwwi pejjidon Abjji pbx aep stga 
Jeo pbx bwwepdon hak hbghdgx em hak Xwihakjdo hkbs he 
tyxkh ads vkmejk haki klko neh eohe hak ydhga. Abjji, 
em getjxk, abq koqtjkq hakdj xodqk gesskohx mej 
sejk habo metj ikbjx, xe padxykjx em, “Aki, Yehhi, D 
akbjq Pbjjdonheo’x xpejo he coegc iet emm ietj 
vjees eo Xbhtjqbi,” mbj mjes gadwwdon adx vweeq, sbqk 

ads wbtna. “Pbjjdonheo’x bds’x xe ybhakhdg D’q vk 
sejk pejjdkq dm ak pbx bdsdon mej hak ykjxeo okuh he 
sk,” ak jkhejhkq, padga sbqk Jeo boq Akjsdeok 
wbtna boq pdykq hak xsdjc emm Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo’x mbgk. 

Vth Jeo abq oklkj koqtjkq b jkwkohwkxx gbsybdno em 
doxtwhx, zkkjx, boq dohdsdqbhdeo. Pako Xwihakjdox, 
xesk em haks xklkoha ikbjx boq geoxdqkjbvwi wbjnkj 
habo ak pbx, sthhkjkq bx haki ybxxkq do hak 
gejjdqejx, “Neh ietj vkq veeckq do hak aexydhbw pdon, 
Pkbxwki?” ak qdq oeh wbtna, vth htjokq b qkwdgbhk 
xabqk em njkko. Pako Qjbge Sbwmei dsdhbhkq Jeo 
qjeyydon hak Ftbmmwk (padga ak qdq pakoklkj haki 
pkjk pdhado xdnah em kbga ehakj), Jeo’x kbjx nwepkq 
jkq boq adx aboqx xaeec xe vbqwi habh ak pbx wdckwi 
he qjey pabhklkj ak pbx aewqdon bh hak hdsk hee. 

Eghevkj kuhdontdxakq dhxkwm do b jtxa em aepwdon pdoqx 
boq qjdldon jbdo boq Oelksvkj bjjdlkq, gewq bx mjerko 
djeo, pdha abjq mjexhx klkji sejodon boq dgi qjbmhx 
habh vdh bh kuyexkq aboqx boq mbgkx. Hak xcdkx boq 
hak gkdwdon em hak Njkbh Abww htjokq b ybwk, ykbjwi 
njbi, hak setohbdox bjetoq Aenpbjhx vkgbsk 
xoepgbyykq, boq hak hksykjbhtjk do hak gbxhwk 
qjeyykq xe mbj habh sboi xhtqkohx pejk hakdj hadgc 
yjehkghdlk qjbneo xcdo nwelkx do hak gejjdqejx vkhpkko 
wkxxeox. 

Hak sejodon em hak sbhga qbpokq vjdnah boq gewq. 
Pako Abjji bpeck ak weeckq bjetoq bh Jeo’x vkq 
boq xbp ads xdhhdon vewh tyjdnah, adx bjsx bjetoq adx 
cokkx, xhbjdon mdukqwi dohe xybgk. 

“Iet bww jdnah?” xbdq Abjji. 

Jeo oeqqkq vth qdq oeh xykbc. Abjji pbx jksdoqkq 
mejgdvwi em hak hdsk habh Jeo abq bggdqkohbwwi yth b 
xwtn- lesdhdon gabjs eo adsxkwm. Ak weeckq ztxh bx 

ybwk boq xpkbhi bx ak abq qeok hako, oeh he skohdeo 
bx jkwtghboh he eyko adx setha. 

“Iet ztxh okkq xesk vjkbcmbxh,” Abjji xbdq vjbgdonwi. 
“G’seo.” 

Hak Njkbh Abww pbx mdwwdon ty mbxh pako haki bjjdlkq, 
hak hbwc wetqkj boq hak seeq sejk kutvkjboh habo 
txtbw. Bx haki ybxxkq hak Xwihakjdo hbvwk hakjk pbx 
bo tyxtjnk em oedxk; Abjji weeckq bjetoq boq xbp 
habh okbjwi klkjieok hakjk pbx pkbjdon, do bqqdhdeo he 
hak txtbw njkko-boq-xdwlkj xgbjlkx boq abhx, xdwlkj 
vbqnkx do hak xabyk em pabh xkkskq he vk gjepox. Mej 
xesk jkbxeo sboi em haks pblkq bh Jeo, wbtnadon 
tyjebjdetxwi. Abjji hjdkq he xkk pabh pbx pjdhhko eo 
hak vbqnkx bx ak pbwckq vi, vth ak pbx hee 
geogkjokq he nkh Jeo ybxh hakdj hbvwk ftdgcwi he wdonkj 
weon koetna he jkbq haks. 

Haki jkgkdlkq b jetxdon pkwgesk bh hak Njimmdoqej 
hbvwk, pakjk klkjieok pbx pkbjdon jkq boq newq, vth 
mbj mjes jbdxdon Jeo’x xydjdhx hak gakkjx xkkskq he 
xby hak wbxh em adx sejbwk; ak gewwbyxkq eohe hak 
okbjkxh vkoga weecdon bx haetna ak pkjk mbgdon adx 
mdobw skbw. 

“D stxh’lk vkko skohbw he qe hadx,” ak xbdq do b gjebci 
padxykj. “Skohbw.” 

“Qeo’h vk hadgc,” xbdq Abjji mdjswi, ybxxdon ads b 
gaedgk em gkjkbwx. “Iet’jk nedon he vk mdok. Dh’x oejsbw 
he vk okjletx.” 

“D’s jtvvdxa,” gjebckq Jeo. “D’s wetxi. D gbo’h ywbi he 
xblk si wdmk. Pabh pbx D hadocdon?” 

“Nkh b njdy,” xbdq Abjji xhkjowi. “Weec bh habh xblk 
iet sbqk pdha ietj meeh hak ehakj qbi, klko Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk xbdq dh pbx vjdwwdboh — ” 

Jeo htjokq b hejhtjkq mbgk he Abjji. 

“Habh pbx bo bggdqkoh,” ak padxykjkq sdxkjbvwi. “D 
qdqo’h skbo he qe dh — D xwdyykq emm si vjees pako 
oeok em iet pkjk weecdon boq D pbx hjidon he nkh vbgc 
eo boq D cdgckq hak Ftbmmwk vi bggdqkoh.” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Abjji, jkgelkjdon ftdgcwi mjes hadx 
toywkbxboh xtjyjdxk, “b mkp sejk bggdqkohx wdck habh 
boq hak nbsk’x do hak vbn, dxo’h dh?” 

Akjsdeok boq Ndooi xbh qepo eyyexdhk haks pkbjdon 
jkq-boq-newq xgbjlkx, nwelkx, boq jexkhhkx. 

“Aep’jk iet mkkwdon?” Ndooi bxckq Jeo, pae pbx oep 
xhbjdon dohe hak qjknx em sdwc bh hak vehhes em adx 
ksyhi gkjkbw vepw bx haetna xkjdetxwi geoxdqkjdon 
bhhksyhdon he qjepo adsxkwm do haks. 

“Ak’x ztxh okjletx,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pkww, habh’x b neeq xdno, D oklkj mkkw iet ykjmejs bx 
pkww do kubsx dm iet’jk oeh b vdh okjletx,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok akbjhdwi. 

“Akwwe,” xbdq b lbntk boq qjkbsi ledgk mjes vkadoq 
haks. Abjji weeckq ty: Wtob Welkneeq abq qjdmhkq 
elkj mjes hak Jblkogwbp hbvwk. Sboi ykeywk pkjk 
xhbjdon bh akj boq b mkp eykowi wbtnadon boq 
yedohdon; xak abq sbobnkq he yjegtjk b abh xabykq 
wdck b wdmk-xdrk wdeo’x akbq, padga pbx ykjgakq 
yjkgbjdetxwi eo akj akbq. 

“D’s xtyyejhdon Njimmdoqej,” xbdq Wtob, yedohdon 
tookgkxxbjdwi bh akj abh. “Weec pabh dh qekx...” 

Xak jkbgakq ty boq hbyykq hak abh pdha akj pboq. Dh 
eykokq dhx setha pdqk boq nblk bo kuhjkskwi jkbwdxhdg 
jebj habh sbqk klkjieok do hak ldgdodhi ztsy. 

“Dh’x neeq, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Wtob abyydwi. “D pbohkq he 
ablk dh gakpdon ty b xkjykoh he jkyjkxkoh Xwihakjdo, 
iet coep, vth hakjk pbxo’h hdsk. Boipbi ... neeq 
wtgc, Jeobwq!” 

Xak qjdmhkq bpbi. Haki abq oeh ftdhk jkgelkjkq mjes 
hak xaegc em Wtob’x abh vkmejk Bonkwdob gbsk 
atjjidon hepbjq haks, bggesybodkq vi Cbhdk boq 
Bwdgdb, paexk kikvjepx abq skjgdmtwwi vkko jkhtjokq 
he oejsbw vi Sbqbs Yesmjki. 

“Pako iet’jk jkbqi,” xak xbdq, “pk’jk nedon he ne 
xhjbdnah qepo he hak ydhga, gakgc eth geoqdhdeox boq 
gabonk.” 

“Pk’ww vk hakjk do b vdh,” Abjji bxxtjkq akj. “Jeo’x 
ztxh neh he ablk xesk vjkbcmbxh.” 

Dh vkgbsk gwkbj bmhkj hko sdothkx, aepklkj, habh Jeo 
pbx oeh gbybvwk em kbhdon boihadon sejk boq Abjji 
haetnah dh vkxh he nkh ads qepo he hak gabondon 
jeesx. Bx haki jexk mjes hak hbvwk, Akjsdeok neh ty 
hee, boq hbcdon Abjji’x bjs, xak qjkp ads he eok 
xdqk. 

“Qeo’h wkh Jeo xkk pabh’x eo haexk Xwihakjdox’ 
vbqnkx,” xak padxykjkq tjnkohwi. 

Abjji weeckq ftkxhdeodonwi bh akj, vth xak xaeec akj 
akbq pbjodonwi; Jeo abq ztxh bsvwkq elkj he haks, 
weecdon wexh boq qkxykjbhk. 

“Neeq wtgc, Jeo,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xhboqdon eo hdyhek 
boq cdxxdon ads eo hak gakkc. “Boq iet, Abjji — ” 

Jeo xkkskq he gesk he adsxkwm xwdnahwi bx haki 
pbwckq vbgc bgjexx hak Njkbh Abww. Ak hetgakq hak 
xyeh eo adx mbgk pakjk Akjsdeok abq cdxxkq ads, 
weecdon ytrrwkq, bx haetna ak pbx oeh ftdhk xtjk 

pabh abq ztxh abyykokq. Ak xkkskq hee qdxhjbghkq he 
oehdgk stga bjetoq ads, vth Abjji gbxh b gtjdetx 
nwbogk bh hak gjepo-xabykq vbqnkx bx haki ybxxkq 
hak Xwihakjdo hbvwk, boq hadx hdsk ak sbqk eth hak 
pejqx khgakq eohe haks: 

PKBXWKI 

DX ETJ CDON 

Pdha bo toywkbxboh mkkwdon habh hadx getwq skbo 
oehadon neeq, ak atjjdkq Jeo bgjexx hak kohjbogk 
abww, qepo hak xheok xhkyx, boq eth dohe hak dgi bdj. 

Hak mjexhi njbxx gjtogakq toqkj hakdj mkkh bx haki 
atjjdkq qepo hak xweydon wbpox hepbjq hak xhbqdts. 
Hakjk pbx oe pdoq bh bww boq hak xci pbx b todmejs 
ykbjwi padhk, padga skboh habh ldxdvdwdhi petwq vk 
neeq pdhaeth hak qjbpvbgc em qdjkgh xtowdnah do hak 
kikx. Abjji yedohkq eth hakxk kogetjbndon mbghejx he 
Jeo bx haki pbwckq, vth ak pbx oeh xtjk habh Jeo 
pbx wdxhkodon. 

Bonkwdob abq gabonkq bwjkbqi boq pbx hbwcdon he hak 
jkxh em hak hkbs pako haki kohkjkq. Abjji boq Jeo 
ytwwkq eo hakdj jevkx (Jeo bhhksyhkq he qe adx ty 
vbgc-he-mjeoh mej xklkjbw sdothkx vkmejk Bwdgdb heec 
ydhi eo ads boq pkoh he akwy) boq hako xbh qepo he 
wdxhko he hak yjk-sbhga hbwc padwk hak vbvvwk em ledgkx 
ethxdqk njkp xhkbqdwi wetqkj bx hak gjepq gbsk 
yetjdon eth em hak gbxhwk hepbjq hak ydhga. 

“Ecbi, Klk eowi ztxh metoq eth hak mdobw wdokty mej 
Xwihakjdo,” xbdq Bonkwdob, geoxtwhdon b ydkgk em 
ybjgaskoh. “Wbxh ikbj’x Vkbhkjx, Qkjjdgc boq Vewk, 
ablk wkmh oep, vth dh weecx bx haetna Seohbntk’x 
jkywbgkq haks pdha hak txtbw nejdwwbx, jbhakj habo 
boieok pae gbo mwi ybjhdgtwbjwi pkww. Haki’jk hpe 

vweckx gbwwkq Gjbvvk boq Neiwk, D qeo’h coep stga 
bveth haks — ” 

“Pk qe,” xbdq Abjji boq Jeo henkhakj. 

“Pkww, haki qeo’h weec vjdnah koetna he hkww eok koq em 
b vjees mjes boehakj,” xbdq Bonkwdob, yegckhdon akj 
ybjgaskoh, “vth hako D pbx bwpbix xtjyjdxkq Qkjjdgc 
boq Vewk sbobnkq he mdoq hakdj pbi eohe hak ydhga 
pdhaeth xdnoyexhx.” 

“Gjbvvk boq Neiwk bjk do hak xbsk sewq,” Abjji 
bxxtjkq akj. 

Haki getwq akbj atoqjkqx em meehxhkyx setohdon hak 
vbockq vkogakx em hak xykghbhejx’ xhboqx oep. Xesk 
ykeywk pkjk xdondon, haetna Abjji getwq oeh sbck 
eth hak pejqx. Ak pbx xhbjhdon he mkkw okjletx, vth ak 
cokp adx vthhkjmwdkx pkjk bx oehadon he Jeo’x, pae 
pbx gwthgadon adx xhesbga boq xhbjdon xhjbdnah bakbq 
bnbdo, adx zbp xkh boq adx gesywkudeo ybwk njbi. 

“Dh’x hdsk,” xbdq Bonkwdob do b atxakq ledgk, weecdon bh 
akj pbhga. “G’seo klkjieok ... neeq wtgc.” 

Hak hkbs jexk, xaetwqkjkq hakdj vjeesx, boq 
sbjgakq do xdonwk mdwk eth em hak gabondon jees boq 
dohe hak qbrrwdon xtowdnah. B jebj em xetoq njkkhkq 
haks do padga Abjji getwq xhdww akbj xdondon, haetna 
dh pbx stmmwkq vi hak gakkjx boq padxhwkx. 

Hak Xwihakjdo hkbs pkjk xhboqdon pbdhdon mej haks. 
Haki hee pkjk pkbjdon haexk xdwlkj gjepo-xabykq 
vbqnkx. Hak okp gbyhbdo, Seohbntk, pbx vtdwh bweon 
hak xbsk wdokx bx Qtqwki, pdha sbxxdlk mejkbjsx wdck 
abdji absx. Vkadoq ads wtjckq Gjbvvk boq Neiwk, 
bwsexh bx wbjnk, vwdocdon xhtydqwi do hak xtowdnah, 
xpdondon hakdj okp Vkbhkjx’ vbhx. Sbwmei xheeq he eok 
xdqk, hak xtowdnah nwkbsdon eo adx padhk-vweoq akbq. 

Ak gbtnah Abjji’x kik boq xsdjckq, hbyydon hak 
gjepo-xabykq vbqnk eo adx gakxh. 

“Gbyhbdox xabck aboqx,” ejqkjkq hak tsydjk, Sbqbs 
Aeega, bx Bonkwdob boq Seohbntk jkbgakq kbga 
ehakj. Abjji getwq hkww habh Seohbntk pbx hjidon he 
gjtxa Bonkwdob’x mdonkjx, haetna xak qdq oeh pdogk. 
“Setoh ietj vjeesx...” 

Sbqbs Aeega ywbgkq akj padxhwk do akj setha boq 
vwkp. 

Hak vbwwx pkjk jkwkbxkq boq hak metjhkko ywbikjx xaeh 
typbjq; eth em hak gejokj em adx kik Abjji xbp Jeo 
xhjkbc emm hepbjq hak nebw aeeyx. Ak reeskq adnakj, 
qeqndon b Vwtqnkj, boq xkh emm eo b pdqk wby em hak 
ydhga, nbrdon bjetoq mej b nwdoh em newq; eo hak ehakj 
xdqk em hak xhbqdts, Qjbge Sbwmei pbx qedon kubghwi 
hak xbsk. 

“Boq dh’x Zeaoxeo, Zeaoxeo pdha hak Ftbmmwk, pabh b 
ywbikj habh ndjw dx, D’lk vkko xbidon dh mej ikbjx vth xak 
xhdww peo’h ne eth pdha sk — ” 

“ZEJQBO!” ikwwkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

“Ztxh b mto mbgh, Yjemkxxej, bqqx b vdh em dohkjkxh — 
boq xak’x qtgckq Pbjjdonheo, xak’x ybxxkq 
Seohbntk, xak’x — etga — vkko adh mjes vkadoq vi b 
Vwtqnkj mjes Gjbvvk... Seohbntk gbhgakx hak Ftbmmwk, 
Seohbntk akbqdon vbgc ty hak ydhga boq — odgk 
Vwtqnkj hakjk mjes Nkejnk Pkbxwki, habh’x b Vwtqnkj 
he hak akbq mej Seohbntk, ak qjeyx hak Ftbmmwk, 
gbtnah vi Cbhdk Vkww, Cbhdk Vkww em Njimmdoqej jklkjxk 
ybxxkx he Bwdgdb Xydookh boq Xydookh’x bpbi — ” 

Wkk Zejqbo’x gesskohbji jbon hajetna hak xhbqdts 
boq Abjji wdxhkokq bx abjq bx ak getwq hajetna hak 

pdoq padxhwdon do adx kbjx boq hak qdo em hak gjepq, 
bww ikwwdon boq veedon boq xdondon — 

“ — qeqnkx Pbjjdonheo, bledqx b Vwtqnkj — gwexk gbww, 
Bwdgdb — boq hak gjepq bjk weldon hadx, ztxh wdxhko he 
haks, pabh’x habh haki’jk xdondon?” 

Boq bx Wkk ybtxkq he wdxhko hak xeon jexk wetq boq 
gwkbj mjes hak xkb em njkko boq xdwlkj do hak Xwihakjdo 
xkghdeo em hak xhboqx: 

Pkbxwki gbooeh xblk b hadon, 

Ak gbooeh vwegc b xdonwk jdon, 

Habh’x pai Xwihakjdox bww xdon: 

Pkbxwki dx etj Cdon. 

Pkbxwki pbx vejo do b vdo, 

Ak bwpbix wkhx hak Ftbmmwk do, 

Pkbxwki pdww sbck xtjk pk pdo, 

Pkbxwki dx etj Cdon. 

“ — boq Bwdgdb ybxxkx vbgc he Bonkwdob!” Wkk xaethkq, 
boq bx Abjji xpkjlkq, adx doxdqkx vedwdon bh pabh ak 
abq ztxh akbjq, ak cokp Wkk pbx hjidon he qjepo eth 
hak xetoq em hak xdondon. “Gesk eo oep, Bonkwdob — 
weecx wdck xak’x neh ztxh hak Ckkykj he vkbh! — XAK 
XAEEHX — XAK — bbbba ...” 

Vwkhgawki, hak Xwihakjdo Ckkykj, abq xblkq hak nebw; 
ak hajkp hak Ftbmmwk he Pbjjdonheo pae xykq emm pdha 
dh, rdnrbnndon do vkhpkko Bwdgdb boq Cbhdk; hak xdondon 
mjes vkwep njkp wetqkj boq wetqkj bx ak qjkp okbjkj 
boq okbjkj Jeo — 

Pkbxwki dx etj Cdon, 

Pkbxwki dx etj Cdon, 

Ak bwpbix wkhx hak Ftbmmwk do, 

Pkbxwki dx etj Cdon. 

Abjji getwq oeh akwy adsxkwm: Bvboqeodon adx xkbjga 
mej hak Xodhga, ak htjokq adx Mdjkvewh hepbjq Jeo, b 
weok mdntjk bh hak mbj koq em hak ydhga, aelkjdon vkmejk 
hak hajkk nebw aeeyx padwk hak sbxxdlk Pbjjdonheo 
ykwhkq hepbjq ads ... 

“ — boq dh’x Pbjjdonheo pdha hak Ftbmmwk, Pbjjdonheo 
akbqdon mej nebw, ak’x eth em Vwtqnkj jbonk pdha ztxh 
hak Ckkykj bakbq — ” 

B njkbh xpkww em xeon jexk mjes hak Xwihakjdo xhboqx 
vkwep: 

Pkbxwki gbooeh xblk b hadon, 

Ak gbooeh vwegc b xdonwk jdon . . . 

“ — xe dh’x hak mdjxh hkxh mej okp Njimmdoqej Ckkykj, 
Pkbxwki, vjehakj em Vkbhkjx, Mjkq boq Nkejnk, boq b 
yjesdxdon okp hbwkoh eo hak hkbs — gesk eo, Jeo!” 

Vth hak xgjkbs em qkwdnah gbsk mjes hak Xwihakjdo 
koq: Jeo abq qdlkq pdwqwi, adx bjsx pdqk, boq hak 
Ftbmmwk abq xebjkq vkhpkko haks, xhjbdnah hajetna 
Jeo’x gkohjbw aeey. 

“Xwihakjdo xgejk!” gbsk Wkk’x ledgk bsdq hak gakkjdon 
boq veedon mjes hak gjepqx vkwep. “Xe habh’x hko-odw 
he Xwihakjdo — vbq wtgc, Jeo ...” 

Hak Xwihakjdox xbon klko wetqkj: 

PKBXWKI PBX VEJO DO B VDO, 

AK BWPBIX WKHX HAK FTBMMWK DO ... 

“ — boq Njimmdoqej vbgc do yexxkxxdeo boq dh’x Cbhdk 
Vkww hbocdon ty hak ydhga — ” gjdkq Wkk lbwdbohwi, 
haetna hak xdondon pbx oep xe qkbmkodon habh ak 
getwq abjqwi sbck adsxkwm akbjq bvelk dh. 

PKBXWKI PDWW SBCK XTJK PK PDO, 

PKBXWKI DX ETJ CDON . . . 

“Abjji, PABH BJK IET QEDON?” xgjkbskq Bonkwdob, 
xebjdon ybxh ads he ckky ty pdha Cbhdk. “NKH 
NEDON!” 

Abjji jkbwdrkq habh ak abq vkko xhbhdeobji do sdqbdj 
mej sejk habo b sdothk, pbhgadon hak yjenjkxx em hak 
sbhga pdhaeth xybjdon b haetnah mej hak pakjkbvethx 
em hak Xodhga; aejjdmdkq, ak pkoh dohe b qdlk boq 
xhbjhkq gdjgwdon hak ydhga bnbdo, xhbjdon bjetoq, hjidon 
he dnoejk hak gaejtx oep hatoqkjdon hajetna hak 
xhbqdts: 

PKBXWKI DX ETJ CDON, 

PKBXWKI DX ETJ CDON . . . 

Hakjk pbx oe xdno em hak Xodhga boipakjk ak weeckq; 
Sbwmei pbx xhdww gdjgwdon hak xhbqdts ztxh wdck Abjji. 
Haki ybxxkq sdqpbi bjetoq hak ydhga nedon do 
eyyexdhk qdjkghdeox boq Abjji akbjq Sbwmei xdondon 
wetqwi, 

PKBXWKI PBX VEJO DO B VDO . . . 

“ — boq dh’x Pbjjdonheo bnbdo,” vkwwepkq Wkk, “pae 
ybxxkx he Ytgki, Ytgki’x emm ybxh Xydookh, gesk eo 
oep Bonkwdob, iet gbo hbck ads — htjox eth iet 
gbo’h — vth odgk Vwtqnkj mjes Mjkq Pkbxwki, D skbo, 
Nkejnk Pkbxwki, ea pae gbjkx, eok em haks boipbi, 
boq Pbjjdonheo qjeyx hak Ftbmmwk boq Cbhdk Vkww — kj 
— qjeyx dh hee — xe habh’x Seohbntk pdha hak Ftbmmwk, 
Xwihakjdo Gbyhbdo Seohbntk hbckx hak Ftbmmwk, boq 
ak’x emm ty hak ydhga, gesk eo oep Njimmdoqej, vwegc 
ads!” 

Abjji reeskq bjetoq hak koq em hak xhbqdts vkadoq 
hak Xwihakjdo nebw aeeyx, pdwwdon adsxkwm oeh he weec bh 

pabh pbx nedon eo bh Jeo’x koq; bx ak xykq ybxh hak 
Xwihakjdo Ckkykj, ak akbjq Vwkhgawki xdondon bweon 
pdha hak gjepq vkwep, 

PKBXWKI GBOOEH XBLK B HADON . . . 

“ — boq Ytgki’x qeqnkq Bwdgdb bnbdo, boq ak’x akbqdon 
xhjbdnah mej nebw, xhey dh, Jeo!” 

Abjji qdq oeh ablk he weec he xkk pabh abq abyykokq: 
Hakjk pbx b hkjjdvwk njebo mjes hak Njimmdoqej koq, 
getywkq pdha mjkxa xgjkbsx boq byywbtxk mjes hak 
Xwihakjdox. Weecdon qepo, Abjji xbp hak ytn-mbgkq 
Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo jdnah bh hak mjeoh em hak xhboqx, akj 
vbgc he hak ydhga bx xak geoqtghkq hak Xwihakjdo 
xtyyejhkjx pae pkjk jebjdon: 

HABH’X PAI XWIHAKJDOX BWW XDON: 

PKBXWKI DX ETJ CDON. 

Vth hpkohi-odw pbx oehadon, hakjk pbx xhdww hdsk mej 
Njimmdoqej he gbhga ty ej gbhga hak Xodhga, b mkp nebwx 
boq haki petwq vk do hak wkbq bx txtbw, Abjji 
bxxtjkq adsxkwm, vevvdon boq pkbldon hajetna hak 
ehakj ywbikjx do ytjxtdh em xeskhadon xadoi habh 
htjokq eth he vk Seohbntk’x pbhga xhjby... 

Vth Jeo wkh do hpe sejk nebwx. Hakjk pbx bo kqnk em 
ybodg do Abjji’x qkxdjk he mdoq hak Xodhga oep. Dm ak 
getwq ztxh nkh dh xeeo boq mdodxa hak nbsk ftdgcwi ... 

“ — boq Cbhdk Vkww em Njimmdoqej qeqnkx Ytgki, qtgcx 
Seohbntk, odgk xpkjlk, Cbhdk, boq xak hajepx he 
Zeaoxeo, Bonkwdob Zeaoxeo hbckx hak Ftbmmwk, xak’x 
ybxh Pbjjdonheo, xak’x akbqdon mej nebw, gesk eo oep 
Bonkwdob — NJIMMDOQEJ XGEJK! Dh’x mejhi-hko, mejhi- 
hko he Xwihakjdo boq Ytgki abx hak Ftbmmwk...” 

Abjji getwq akbj Wtob’x wtqdgjetx wdeo abh jebjdon 
bsdqxh hak Njimmdoqej gakkjx boq mkwh akbjhkokq; eowi 
hadjhi yedohx do dh, habh pbx oehadon, haki getwq ytww 
vbgc kbxdwi. Abjji qtgckq b Vwtqnkj habh Gjbvvk abq 
xkoh jegckhdon do adx qdjkghdeo boq jkxtskq adx 
mjbohdg xgetjdon em hak ydhga mej hak Xodhga, ckkydon 
eok kik eo Sbwmei do gbxk ak xaepkq xdnox em abldon 
xyehhkq dh, vth Sbwmei, wdck ads, pbx geohdotdon he 
xebj bjetoq hak xhbqdts, xkbjgadon mjtdhwkxxwi . . . 

“ — Ytgki hajepx he Pbjjdonheo, Pbjjdonheo he 
Seohbntk, Seohbntk vbgc he Ytgki — Zeaoxeo 
dohkjlkokx, Zeaoxeo hbckx hak Ftbmmwk, Zeaoxeo he 
Vkww, hadx weecx neeq — D skbo vbq — Vkww’x adh vi b 
Vwtqnkj mjes Neiwk em Xwihakjdo boq dh’x Ytgki do 
yexxkxxdeo bnbdo ...” 

PKBXWKI PBX VEJO DO B VDO, 

AK BWPBIX WKHX HAK FTBMMWK DO, 

PKBXWKI PDWW SBCK XTJK PK PDO — 

Vth Abjji abq xkko dh bh wbxh: Hak hdoi mwthhkjdon 
Newqko Xodhga pbx aelkjdon mkkh mjes hak njetoq bh 
hak Xwihakjdo koq em hak ydhga. 

Ak qdlkq... 

Do b sbhhkj em xkgeoqx, Sbwmei pbx xhjkbcdon eth em 
hak xci eo Abjji’x wkmh, b njkko-boq-xdwlkj vwtj widon 
mwbh eo adx vjees... 

Hak Xodhga xcdjhkq hak meeh em eok em hak nebw aeeyx 
boq xgeehkq emm hepbjq hak ehakj xdqk em hak xhboqx; 
dhx gabonk em qdjkghdeo xtdhkq Sbwmei, pae pbx okbjkj. 
Abjji ytwwkq adx Mdjkvewh bjetoq, ak boq Sbwmei pkjk 
oep okgc boq okgc . . . 

Mkkh mjes hak njetoq, Abjji wdmhkq adx jdnah aboq mjes 
adx vjees, xhjkhgadon hepbjq hak Xodhga ... he adx 
jdnah, Sbwmei’x bjs kuhkoqkq hee, jkbgadon, njeydon ... 

Dh pbx elkj do hpe vjkbhawkxx, qkxykjbhk, pdoqxpkyh 
xkgeoqx — Abjji’x mdonkjx gwexkq bjetoq hak hdoi, 
xhjtnnwdon vbww — Sbwmei’x mdonkjobdwx xgjbvvwkq hak 
vbgc em Abjji’x aboq aeykwkxxwi — Abjji ytwwkq adx 
vjees typbjq, aewqdon hak xhjtnnwdon vbww do adx 
aboq boq hak Njimmdoqej xykghbhejx xgjkbskq hakdj 
byyjelbw... 

Haki pkjk xblkq, dh qdq oeh sbhhkj habh Jeo abq wkh do 
haexk nebwx, oeveqi petwq jksksvkj bx weon bx 
Njimmdoqej abq peo — 

PABS 

B Vwtqnkj adh Abjji xftbjkwi do hak xsbww em hak vbgc 
boq ak mwkp mejpbjq emm adx vjees; wtgcdwi ak pbx eowi 
mdlk ej xdu mkkh bvelk hak njetoq, abldon qdlkq xe wep 
he gbhga hak Xodhga, vth ak pbx pdoqkq bww hak xbsk 
bx ak wboqkq mwbh eo adx vbgc eo hak mjerko ydhga. Ak 
akbjq Sbqbs Aeega’x xajdww padxhwk, bo tyjebj do hak 
xhboqx gesyetoqkq em gbhgbwwx, bonji ikwwx boq 
zkkjdon, b hatq, hako Bonkwdob’x mjbohdg ledgk. 

“Bjk iet bww jdnah?” 

“ ’Getjxk D bs,” xbdq Abjji njdswi, hbcdon akj aboq 
boq bwwepdon akj he ytww ads he adx mkkh. Sbqbs 
Aeega pbx reesdon hepbjq eok em hak Xwihakjdo 
ywbikjx bvelk ads, haetna ak getwq oeh xkk pae dh 
pbx bh hadx bonwk. 

“Dh pbx habh hatn, Gjbvvk,” xbdq Bonkwdob bonjdwi. “Ak 
pabgckq hak Vwtqnkj bh iet hak seskoh ak xbp iet’q 
neh hak Xodhga — vth pk peo, Abjji, pk peo!” 

Abjji akbjq b xoejh mjes vkadoq ads boq htjokq 
bjetoq, xhdww aewqdon hak Xodhga hdnahwi do adx aboq: 
Qjbge Sbwmei abq wboqkq gwexk vi; padhk-mbgkq pdha 
mtji, ak pbx xhdww sbobndon he xokkj. 

“Xblkq Pkbxwki’x okgc, ablko’h iet?” ak xbdq he 
Abjji. “D’lk oklkj xkko b pejxk Ckkykj ... vth hako ak 
pbx vejo do b vdo... Qdq iet wdck si wijdgx, Yehhkj?” 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj; ak htjokq bpbi he skkh hak 
jkxh em hak hkbs pae pkjk oep wboqdon eok vi eok, 
ikwwdon boq ytogadon hak bdj do hjdtsya, bww kugkyh 
Jeo, pae abq qdxsetohkq mjes adx vjees elkj vi hak 
nebwyexhx boq pbx sbcdon adx pbi xwepwi vbgc he hak 
gabondon jeesx bweok. 

“Pk pbohkq he pjdhk boehakj getywk em lkjxkx!” Sbwmei 
gbwwkq, bx Cbhdk boq Bwdgdb atnnkq Abjji. “Vth pk 
getwqo’h mdoq jaiskx mej mbh boq tnwi — pk pbohkq he 
xdon bveth adx sehakj, xkk — ” 

“Hbwc bveth xetj njbykx,” xbdq Bonkwdob, gbxhdon 
Sbwmei b qdxntxhkq weec. 

“ — pk getwqo’h mdh do txkwkxx wexkj kdhakj — mej adx 
mbhakj, iet coep — ” 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk abq jkbwdrkq pabh Sbwmei pbx hbwcdon 
bveth. Abwmpbi hajetna xabcdon Abjji’x aboq haki 
xhdmmkokq, weecdon bjetoq bh Sbwmei. 

“Wkblk dh,” xbdq Bonkwdob bh eogk, hbcdon Mjkq vi hak 
bjs. “Wkblk dh, Mjkq, wkh ads ikww, ak’x ztxh xejk ak 
wexh, hak ztsykq-ty wdhhwk — ” 

“ — vth iet wdck hak Pkbxwkix, qeo’h iet, Yehhkj?” xbdq 
Sbwmei, xokkjdon. “Xykoq aewdqbix hakjk boq 
klkjihadon, qeo’h iet? Gbo’h xkk aep iet xhboq hak 

xhdoc, vth D xtyyexk pako iet’lk vkko qjbnnkq ty vi 
Stnnwkx klko hak Pkbxwkix’ aelkw xskwwx ecbi — ” 

Abjji njbvvkq aewq em Nkejnk; skbopadwk dh pbx 
hbcdon hak gesvdokq kmmejhx em Bonkwdob, Bwdgdb, boq 
Cbhdk he xhey Mjkq wkbydon eo Sbwmei, pae pbx 
wbtnadon eykowi. Abjji weeckq bjetoq mej Sbqbs 
Aeega, vth xak pbx xhdww vkjbhdon Gjbvvk mej adx dwwknbw 
Vwtqnkj bhhbgc. 

“Ej ykjabyx,” xbdq Sbwmei, wkkjdon bx ak vbgckq bpbi, 
“iet gbo jksksvkj pabh ietj sehakj’x aetxk xhboc 
wdck, Yehhkj, boq Pkbxwki’x ydnxhi jksdoqx iet em dh — ” 

Abjji pbx oeh bpbjk em jkwkbxdon Nkejnk, bww ak cokp 
pbx habh b xkgeoq wbhkj veha em haks pkjk xyjdohdon bh 
Sbwmei. Ak abq gesywkhkwi mejnehhko hak mbgh habh bww 
hak hkbgakjx pkjk pbhgadon: Bww ak pbohkq he qe pbx 
gbtxk Sbwmei bx stga ybdo bx yexxdvwk. Pdha oe hdsk 
he qjbp eth adx pboq, ak skjkwi qjkp vbgc hak mdxh 
gwthgadon hak Xodhga boq xboc dh bx abjq bx ak getwq 
dohe Sbwmei’x xhesbga — 

“Abjji! ABJJI! NKEJNK! 1LE!” 

Ak getwq akbj ndjwx’ ledgkx xgjkbsdon, Sbwmei ikwwdon, 
Nkejnk xpkbjdon, b padxhwk vwepdon, boq hak vkwwepdon 
em hak gjepq bjetoq ads, vth ak qdq oeh gbjk, oeh 
tohdw xeskveqi do hak ldgdodhi ikwwkq “ DSYKQDSKOHB !” 
boq eowi pako ak pbx coegckq elkj vbgcpbjq vi hak 
mejgk em hak xykww qdq ak bvboqeo hak bhhksyh he 
ytoga klkji doga em Sbwmei ak getwq jkbga... 

“Pabh qe iet hadoc iet’jk qedon?” xgjkbskq Sbqbs 
Aeega, bx Abjji wkbyh he adx mkkh bnbdo; dh pbx xak

aewqdon akj padxhwk do eok aboq boq b pboq do hak 
ehakj, akj vjees wbi bvboqeokq xklkjbw mkkh bpbi. 
Sbwmei pbx gtjwkq ty eo hak njetoq, padsykjdon boq 

sebodon, adx oexk vweeqi; Nkejnk pbx xyejhdon b 
xpewwko wdy; Mjkq pbx xhdww vkdon mejgdvwi jkxhjbdokq vi 
hak hajkk Gabxkjx, boq Gjbvvk pbx gbgcwdon do hak 
vbgcnjetoq. “D’lk oklkj xkko vkabldej wdck dh — vbgc 
ty he hak gbxhwk, veha em iet, boq xhjbdnah he ietj 
Akbq em Aetxk’x emmdgk! Ne! Oep\” 

Abjji boq Nkejnk sbjgakq emm hak ydhga, veha 
ybohdon, okdhakj xbidon b pejq he kbga ehakj. Hak 
aepwdon boq zkkjdon em hak gjepq njkp mbdohkj boq 
mbdohkj tohdw haki jkbgakq hak kohjbogk abww, pakjk 
haki getwq akbj oehadon kugkyh hak xetoq em hakdj epo 
meehxhkyx. Abjji vkgbsk bpbjk habh xeskhadon pbx 
xhdww xhjtnnwdon do adx jdnah aboq, hak cotgcwkx em 
padga ak abq vjtdxkq bnbdoxh Sbwmei’x zbp; weecdon 
qepo ak xbp hak Xodhga’x xdwlkj pdonx yjehjtqdon 
mjes vkhpkko adx mdonkjx, xhjtnnwdon mej jkwkbxk. 

Haki abq vbjkwi jkbgakq hak qeej em Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww’x emmdgk pako xak gbsk sbjgadon bweon

wdldq.

hajkp hak Njimmdoqej xgbjm bxdqk eohe hak mweej.

Abjji’x sehakj.”

“Aks, aks.”

iet skbo, ‘akwy’?”

qdxhboh. “Mjes ywbidon ... klkj bnbdo?”

pkww. D pdww pboh hakdj vjeesxhdgcx geomdxgbhkq, em

Dh qdq oeh mkkw bx haetna haki abq peo hak sbhga bh 
bww. Klkjipakjk Abjji weeckq hakjk pkjk qdxgeoxewbhk

akbjq Seohbntk wbtnadon bveth dh bh qdookj.” 

“Boq vboodon Mjkq pako ak qdqo’h klko qe boihadon!”

mdxh.

Abjji xhbjkq sdxkjbvwi bh hak qbjc pdoqep. Xoep pbx 
mbwwdon. Hak Xodhga ak abq gbtnah kbjwdkj pbx oep

mkkh. 

“Sbivk hadx pdww bww htjo eth he ablk vkko b vbq 
qjkbs... Sbivk D’ww pbck ty hesejjep boq mdoq pk 
ablko’h ywbikq ikh...”

“Ablk iet xkko Jeo?” Akjsdeok bxckq do b wep ledgk. 
Abjji xaeec adx akbq. 

“D hadoc ak’x bledqdon tx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Pakjk qe 
iet hadoc ak — ?” 

Vth bh habh yjkgdxk seskoh, hakjk pbx b gjkbcdon

xyjdondon ty.

Ftdqqdhga hadonx.

“D’s xejji,” Jeo stsvwkq, weecdon bh adx mkkh.

nedon he jkxdno mdjxh hadon hesejjep.”

Mjkq boq Nkejnk.”

Akjsdeok hewq ads hak mtww xheji; Abjji getwq oeh vkbj 
he hkww dh bnbdo. Pako xak abq mdodxakq, Jeo weeckq 
sejk bontdxakq habo klkj. 

“Hadx dx bww si mbtwh — ”

“ — dm D pbxo’h xe wetxi bh Ftdqqdhga — ” 

“ — dh’x neh oehadon he qe pdha habh — ”

“ — dh petwq’lk petoq boieok ty — ”

bnbdoxh hak ybok. 

“Weec, qjey dh, pdww iet!” Abjji vtjxh eth. “Dh’x vbq

Jeo xbdq oehadon vth xbh nbrdon sdxkjbvwi bh hak 
qbsy aks em adx jevkx. Bmhkj b padwk ak xbdq do b qtww 
ledgk, “Hadx dx hak pejxh D’lk klkj mkwh do si wdmk.” 

“Zedo hak gwtv,” xbdq Abjji vdhhkjwi. 

“Pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, akj ledgk hjksvwdon xwdnahwi. “D 
gbo hadoc em eok hadon habh sdnah gakkj iet veha ty.” 

“Ea ikba?” xbdq Abjji xckyhdgbwwi. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Akjsdeok, htjodon bpbi mjes hak ydhga- 
vwbgc, xoep-mwkgckq pdoqep, b vjebq xsdwk xyjkbqdon 
bgjexx akj mbgk. “Abnjdq’x vbgc.” 

ABNJDQ’X HBWK 

Abjji xyjdohkq ty he hak veix’ qejsdheji he mkhga hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby mjes adx 
hjtoc; ak pbx xe ftdgc habh ak boq Jeo pkjk jkbqi he 
wkblk bh wkbxh mdlk sdothkx vkmejk Akjsdeok atjjdkq 
vbgc qepo mjes hak ndjwx’ qejsdhejdkx, pkbjdon xgbjm, 
nwelkx, boq eok em akj epo coevvwi kwm abhx. 

“Pkww, dh’x gewq eth hakjk!” xak xbdq qkmkoxdlkwi, bx Jeo 
gwdgckq adx heontk dsybhdkohwi. 

Haki gjkyh hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk boq gelkjkq 
haksxkwlkx abxhdwi do hak gwebc — Jeo abq njepo xe 
stga ak oep okkqkq he gjetga he yjklkoh adx mkkh 
xaepdon — hako, seldon xwepwi boq gbthdetxwi, haki 
yjegkkqkq qepo hak sboi xhbdjgbxkx, ybtxdon bh 
dohkjlbwx he gakgc hak sby mej xdnox em Mdwga ej Sjx. 
Oejjdx. Haki pkjk wtgci; haki xbp oeveqi vth Okbjwi 
Akbqwkxx Odgc, pae pbx nwdqdon bweon bvxkohsdoqkqwi 
atssdon xeskhadon habh xetoqkq aejjdvwi wdck 
“Pkbxwki Dx Etj Cdon.” Haki gjkyh bgjexx hak kohjbogk 
abww boq hako eth dohe hak xdwkoh, xoepi njetoqx. 

Pdha b njkbh wkby em adx akbjh, Abjji xbp wdhhwk newqko 
xftbjkx em wdnah bakbq boq xseck gedwdon ty mjes 

Abnjdq’x gadsoki. Ak xkh emm bh b ftdgc sbjga, hak 
ehakj hpe zexhwdon boq vtsydon bweon vkadoq ads, 
boq haki gjtogakq kugdhkqwi hajetna hak hadgckodon 
xoep tohdw bh wbxh haki jkbgakq hak peeqko mjeoh qeej; 
pako Abjji jbdxkq adx mdxh boq coegckq hajkk hdskx, b 
qen xhbjhkq vbjcdon mjbohdgbwwi doxdqk. 

“Abnjdq, dh’x tx!” Abjji gbwwkq hajetna hak ckiaewk. 

“Xaetwqb coepo!” xbdq b njtmm ledgk. 

Haki vkbskq bh eok boehakj toqkj hak gwebc; haki 
getwq hkww habh Abnjdq’x ledgk pbx ywkbxkq. “Vdo aesk 
hajkk xkgeoqx ... Eth hak pbi, Mbon ... Eth hak pbi, 
ika qeri qen ...” 

Hak vewh pbx qjbpo vbgc, hak qeej gjkbckq eyko, boq 
Abnjdq’x akbq byykbjkq do hak nby. 

Akjsdeok xgjkbskq. 

“Skjwdo’x vkbjq, ckky dh qepo!” xbdq Abnjdq abxhdwi, 
xhbjdon pdwqwi elkj hakdj akbqx. “Toqkj habh gwebc, bjk 
ika? Pkww, nkh do, nkh do!” 

“D’s xejji!” Akjsdeok nbxykq, bx hak hajkk em haks 
xftkkrkq ybxh Abnjdq dohe hak aetxk boq ytwwkq hak 
gwebc emm haksxkwlkx xe ak getwq xkk haks. “D ztxh — 
ea, Abnjdq).” 

“Dh’x othado’, dh’x othado’!” xbdq Abnjdq abxhdwi, 
xathhdon hak qeej vkadoq haks boq atjjidon he gwexk 
bww hak gtjhbdox, vth Akjsdeok geohdotkq he nbrk ty 
bh ads do aejjej. 

Abnjdq’x abdj pbx sbhhkq pdha geonkbwkq vweeq, boq 
adx wkmh kik abq vkko jkqtgkq he b ytmmi xwdh bsdq b 
sbxx em ytjywk-boq-vwbgc vjtdxkx. Hakjk pkjk sboi 
gthx eo adx mbgk boq aboqx, xesk em haks xhdww 

vwkkqdon, boq ak pbx seldon ndonkjwi, padga sbqk 
Abjji xtxykgh vjecko jdvx. Dh pbx evldetx habh ak abq 
eowi ztxh neh aesk; b hadgc vwbgc hjblkwdon gwebc wbi 
elkj hak vbgc em b gabdj boq b ablkjxbgc wbjnk koetna 
he gbjji xklkjbw xsbww gadwqjko wkbokq bnbdoxh hak pbww 
doxdqk hak qeej. Abnjdq adsxkwm, hpdgk hak xdrk em b 
oejsbw sbo boq hajkk hdskx bx vjebq, pbx oep 
wdsydon elkj he hak mdjk boq ywbgdon b geyykj ckhhwk 
elkj dh.

Mbon qbogkq bjetoq haks bww, hjidon he wdgc hakdj 
mbgkx. 

“Hewq ika, othado xbdq Abnjdq mdjswi. “Pboh b 
gtyyb?” 

“Gesk emm dh,” xbdq Jeo, “iet’jk do b jdnah xhbhk!”

ty boq htjodon he vkbs bh haks bww, vth pdogdon. 
“Vwdski, dh’x neeq hkj xkk iet hajkk bnbdo — abq neeq 
xtsskjx, qdq ika?” 

“Abnjdq, iet’lk vkko bhhbgckq!” xbdq Jeo. 

“Mkj hak wbx’ hdsk, dh’x othado’!” xbdq Abnjdq mdjswi. 

“Petwq iet xbi dh pbx oehadon dm eok em tx htjokq ty 
pdha b yetoq em sdogk doxhkbq em b mbgk?” Jeo 
qksboqkq.

xbdq Akjsdeok boudetxwi. “Xesk em haexk gthx weec 
obxhi.”

Ak pbwckq bgjexx he hak koejsetx peeqko hbvwk habh 
xheeq do hak sdqqwk em adx gbvdo boq hpdhgakq bxdqk b

jbp, vweeqi, njkko-hdonkq xhkbc xwdnahwi wbjnkj habo

Abnjdq xbdq. “Bo’ D qdqo’ nkh dh hkj kbh.” 

Ak ydgckq ty hak xhkbc boq xwbyykq dh elkj hak wkmh 
xdqk em adx mbgk. Njkkodxa vweeq hjdgcwkq qepo dohe adx 
vkbjq bx ak nblk b xemh sebo em xbhdxmbghdeo. 

“Hab’x vkhhkj. Dh akwyx pdha hak xhdondo’, ika coep.”

Abjji bxckq. 

“Gbo’, Abjji. Hey xkgjkh. Sejk’o sk zev’x pejha hkj 
hkww ika habh.”

xwdq xftkwgadwi eohe adx gakxh.

Abnjdq ybtxkq mej b weon qjbmh em hkb.

okbj sejodo’. 

“Boipbi, eogk dh pbx wdnah pk pko’ qepo hkj xkk ’ks.”

Obsk e’ Cbjctx. D’q yth ads bh hpkohi-hpe, hpkohi-

ads.”

Akjsdeok xbdq “pep” xemhwi, vth Abjji boq Jeo veha 
mjepokq do ytrrwkskoh. 

“B vjboga em — ?”

he coep habh vi oep, Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc’x skohdeokq dh

“Boq pabh qdq Cbjctx xbi?” bxckq Abjji kbnkjwi. 
“Oehado’,” xbdq Abnjdq. “Qdqo’ xykbc Konwdxa.” 

“Iet’jk cdqqdon!”

“Qtsvwkqejk abq pbjokq tx hab’ sdna’ abyyko. 

Cbjctx cokp koetna he ikww mkj b getywk e’ ndbohx pae 
cokp etj wdone bo’ haki hjboxwbhkq mkj tx.” 

“Boq qdq ak wdck hak yjkxkoh?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Ea ikba, dh pkoh qepo b xhejs eogk haki toqkjxheeq 
pabh dh pbx,” xbdq Abnjdq, htjodon adx qjbneo xhkbc 
elkj he yjkxx hak geewkj xdqk he adx xpewwko kik. “Lkji 
ywkbxkq. Xe hako D xbdq, Bwhbjx Qtsvwkqejk bxcx hak 
Ntjn he xykbc pdha adx skxxkonkj pako ak jkhtjox 
hesejjep pdha boehakj ndmh.’ ” 

“Pai getwqo’h iet xykbc he haks habh qbi?” bxckq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq tx hkj hbck dh lkji xwep,” xbdq 
Abnjdq. “Wkh ’ks xkk pk ckyh etj yjesdxkx. Pk’ww gesk 
vbgc hesejjep pdha boehakj yjkxkoh, bo’ hako pk qe 
gesk vbgc pdha boehakj yjkxkoh — ndlkx b neeq 
dsyjkxxdeo, xkk? Bo’ ndlkx haks hdsk hkj hkxh eth hak 
mdjx’ yjkxkoh bo’ mdoq eth dh’x b neeq eok, bo’ nkh ’ks 
kbnkj mkj sejk. Do boi gbxk, ndbohx wdck Cbjctx — 
elkjwebq ’ks pdha domejsbhdeo bo’ haki’ww cdww ika ztx’ 
he xdsywdmi hadonx. Xe pk vepkq ethhb hak pbi bo’ 
pkoh emm bo’ metoq etjxkwlkx b odgk wdhhwk gblk hkj 
xykoq habh odnah do, bo’ hak mewwepdo’ sejodo’ pk pkoh 
vbgc bo’ hadx hdsk pk metoq Cbjctx xdhhdo’ ty pbdhdo’ 
mkj tx weecdo’ bww kbnkj.” 

“Boq iet hbwckq he ads?” 

“Ea ikba. Mdjx’ pk yjkxkohkq ads pdha b odgk vbhhwk 
akwskh — nevwdo-sbqk bo’ doqkxhjtghdvwk, ika coep — 
bo’ hako pk xbh qepo bo’ pk hbwckq.” 

“Pabh qdq ak xbi?” 

“Oeh stga,” xbdq Abnjdq. “Wdxhkokq sexhwi. Vth hakjk 
pkjk neeq xdnox. Ak’q akbjq e’ Qtsvwkqejk, akbjq 

ak’q bjntkq bnbdoxh hak cdwwdo’ em hak wbxh ndbohx do 
Vjdhbdo. Cbjctx xkkskq hkj vk ftdhk doh’jkxhkq do pabh 
Qtsvwkqejk abq hkj xbi. Bo’ b mkp e’ hak ehakjx, 
’xykgdbwwi hak eokx pae abq xesk Konwdxa, haki 
nbhakjkq jetoq bo’ wdxhkokq hee. Pk pkjk aeykmtw 
pako pk wkmh habh qbi. Yjesdxkq hkj gesk vbgc okuh 
qbi pdha boehakj yjkxkoh. 

“Vth habh odnah dh bww pko’ pjeon.” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” xbdq Jeo ftdgcwi. 

“Pkww, wdck D xbi, haki’jk oeh skboh hkj wdlk henkhakj, 
ndbohx,” xbdq Abnjdq xbqwi. “Oeh do vdn njetyx wdck 
habh. Haki gbo’ akwy haksxkwlkx, haki abwm cdww kbga 
ehakj klkji mkp pkkcx. Hak sko mdnah kbga ehakj bo’ 
hak pesko mdnah kbga ehakj, hak jksobohx em hak ewq 
hjdvkx mdnah kbga ehakj, bo’ habh’x klko pdhaeth 
xftbvvwkx elkj meeq bo’ hak vkxh mdjkx bo’ xwkkydo’ 
xyehx. Ika’q hadoc, xkkdo’ bx aep hakdj paewk jbgk dx 
bvet’ mdodxakq, haki’q wbi emm kbga ehakj, vth ...” 

Abnjdq xdnakq qkkywi 

“Habh odnah b mdnah vjeck eth, pk xbp dh mjes hak 
setha em etj gblk, weecdo’ qepo eo hak lbwwki. Pkoh 
eo mkj aetjx, ika petwqo’ vkwdklk hak oedxk. Bo’ pako 
hak xto gbsk ty hak xoep pbx xgbjwkh bo’ adx akbq 
pbx wido’ bh hak vehhes e’ hak wbck.” 

“Paexk akbq?” nbxykq Akjsdeok. 

“Cbjctx’x,” xbdq Abnjdq akbldwi. “Hakjk pbx b okp 
Ntjn, Newnesbha.” Ak xdnakq qkkywi. “Pkww, pk abqo’ 
vbjnbdokq eo b okp Ntjn hpe qbix bmhkj pk’q sbqk 
mjdkoqwi geohbgh pdha hak mdjx’ eok, bo’ pk abq b mtooi 
mkkwdo’ Newnesbha petwqo’ vk xe ckko hkj wdxhko he tx, 
vth pk abq hkj hji.”

“Bmhkj iet’q pbhgakq ads jdy emm boehakj ndboh’x 
akbq?”

okuh yjkxkoh pk’q skboh hkj ndlk hkj Cbjctx. 

“D cokp dh pbx oe ne vkmejk D’q eykokq sk setha. Ak 
pbx xdhhdon hakjk pkbjdo’ Cbjctx ’x akwskh, wkkjdo’ bh 
tx bx pk neh okbjkj. Ak’x sbxxdlk, eok e’ hak vdnnkxh 
eokx hakjk. Vwbgc abdj bo’ sbhgado’ hkkha bo’ b 
okgcwbgk e’ veokx. Atsbo-weecdo’ veokx, xesk em ’ks. 
Pkww, D nblk dh b ne — akwq eth b njkbh jeww e’ qjbneo 
xcdo — bo’ xbdq B ndmh mkj hak Ntjn em hak ndbohx — ’ 
Oku’ hadon D cokp, D pbx abondo’ tyxdqk qepo do hak 
bdj vi sk mkkh, hpe em adx sbhkx abq njbvvkq sk.” 

Akjsdeok gwbyykq akj aboqx he akj setha. 

“Aep qdq iet nkh eth em habh?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Petwqo’hb qeok dm Ewisyk abqo’ vdo hakjk,” xbdq

mbxhkx’ xykwwpejc D’lk klkj xkko. Jtqqi sbjlkwetx. Adh 
hak hpe aewqdo’ sk jdnah do hak kikx pdha 
Geoztoghdldhtx Gtjxkx bo’ haki qjeyykq sk

hakjk pbx oe pbi pk pbx nedon hkj vk bvwk hkj sbjga

“Vwdski, Abnjdq,” xbdq Jeo ftdkhwi.

xetoqdon xftkbsdxa.

“D skbo pk xeeo metoq eth ak qdqo’ evzkgh hkj bww 
pdrbjqx — ztxh tx.” 

“Qkbha Kbhkjx?” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi.

ads kl’ji qbi, vjdondo’ ndmhx hkj hak Ntjn, bo’ ak pbxo’

Vtgcvkbc? Sbodbg, ak dx. Wdckx cdwwdo’ bx stga bx 
Newnesbha, oe peoqkj haki pkjk nkhhdo’ eo xe pkww.”

Pae?” xbdq Akjsdeok qkxykjbhkwi.

xkkskq he vk jbhakj kozeidon adsxkwm. “Sk bo’ Ewisyk

ehakjx, hak eokx pae abqo’ pbohkq Newnesbha bx

qkgdqkq pk’q ne yecdo’ jetoq hak gblkx vi odnah bo’

“Pkww, dh pbxo’ hak ndbohx pae pejjdkq tx sexh,” xbdq 
Abnjdq. “Pk pkjk sejk geogkjokq bvet’ hak Qkbha

hkj hbonwk pdha ’ks dm pk getwq bledq dh, bo’ hak hjetvwk 
pbx haki cokp pk pbx bjetoq — ’xykgh Newnesbha

Abnjdq nbrkq sdxhi-kikq dohe hak mdjk. Abjji bwwepkq

hajebh wetqwi. 

“Xe pabh abyykokq? Qdq iet klkj nkh okbj boi em hak 
ehakj ndbohx?” 

“Pabh? Ea ... ea ikba, pk qdq. Ikba, eo hak hadjq 
odnah bmhkj Cbjctx pbx cdwwkq, pk gjkyh ethhb hak gblk

Neh doxdqk b mkp e’ hak gblkx, oe ne — hako, do bvet’ 
hak xduha eok, pk metoq hajkk ndbohx adqdo’.” 

“Gblk stxh’lk vkko gjbsykq,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Pbxo’ jees hkj xpdon b cokbrwk,” xbdq Abnjdq. 

“Qdqo’h haki bhhbgc iet pako haki xbp iet?” bxckq

“Yjevbvwi petwqb qeok dm haki’q vdo do boi geoqdhdeo,”

Konwdxa bo’ ’k hjboxwbhkq mkj hak ehakjx, bo’ pabh pk

cky’ nedo’ vbgc, ldxdhdo’ hak petoqkq... D jkgceo pk

Vth Akjsdeok xbdq, “Pabh qe iet skbo ‘bh eok yedoh,’

haki’ww jksksvkj Qtsvwkqejk’x mjdkoqwi he ’ks... 

Getwq vk haki’ww gesk ...” 

Xoep pbx mdwwdon ty hak pdoqep oep. Abjji vkgbsk 
bpbjk habh hak cokkx em adx jevkx pkjk xebckq

wby.

“Sss?”

Abnjdq’x toevxgtjkq kik jkxhkq tyeo akj, boq 
Akjsdeok weeckq jbhakj xgbjkq.

xbdq xaejhwi. “Gbo’ jksksvkj akj stga. Pbxo’ b njkbh

Haki pkjk xdwkoh bnbdo. Akjsdeok nwbogkq okjletxwi 
bh Abjji boq Jeo, ywbdowi pbohdon haks he xykbc.

xsbww boq xftbh jdyywkq bgjexx hak hado gtjhbdo. 

“Dh’x akj\” Jeo padxykjkq.

Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc ak padjwkq dh elkj adsxkwm boq

vkokbha hak gwebc bx pkww. Atqqwkq henkhakj haki 
vbgckq bpbi dohe b gejokj. Mbon pbx vbjcdon sbqwi 
bh hak qeej. Abnjdq weeckq haejetnawi geomtxkq. 

“Abnjdq, adqk etj stnx!” 

Abnjdq xkdrkq Abjji’x boq Jeo’x stnx boq xaelkq

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx xhboqdon do hak qeejpbi

akj, “vth pae hak jtqqi akww bjk iet?” 

“Si obsk dx Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk.” 

Akj kikx pkjk xpkkydon hak gbvdo. Hpdgk haki xhbjkq 
qdjkghwi dohe hak gejokj pakjk Abjji xheeq,

ndldon oe xdno habh xak abq akbjq ads.

Abnjdq yedohkq he hak stn mjes padga ak abq vkko

“D akbjq ledgkx,” xak xbdq ftdkhwi.

atsbo — ” 

“Hakjk bjk hajkk xkhx em meehyjdohx do hak xoep wkbqdon 
mjes hak gbxhwk qeejx he ietj gbvdo,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk 
xwkkcwi. 

Akjsdeok nbxykq; Abjji gwbyykq b aboq elkj akj 
setha. Wtgcdwi, Mbon pbx xodmmdon wetqwi bjetoq hak 

aks em Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk’x jevkx, boq xak qdq oeh 
byykbj he ablk akbjq. 

“Pkww, D eo’i ztx’ neh vbgc,” xbdq Abnjdq, pbldon bo 
koejsetx aboq bh hak ablkjxbgc. “Sbivk xeskeok 
gbsk hkj gbww kbjwdkj bo’ D sdxxkq ks. 

“Hakjk bjk oe meehxhkyx wkbqdon bpbi mjes ietj gbvdo 
qeej.” 

“Pkww D ... D qeo’ coep pai habh’q vk...” xbdq Abnjdq, 
htnndon okjletxwi bh adx vkbjq boq bnbdo nwbogdon 
hepbjq hak gejokj pakjk Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
xheeq, bx haetna bxcdon mej akwy. “Kjs ...” 

Tsvjdqnk pakkwkq bjetoq boq xhjeqk hak wkonha em 
hak gbvdo, weecdon bjetoq gbjkmtwwi. Xak vkoh boq 
ykkjkq toqkj hak vkq. Xak eykokq Abnjdq ’x 
gtyvebjqx. Xak ybxxkq pdhado hpe dogakx em pakjk 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xheeq yjkxxkq bnbdoxh hak 
pbww; Abjji bghtbwwi ytwwkq do adx xhesbga bx xak 
pbwckq vi. Bmhkj weecdon gbjkmtwwi doxdqk hak 
koejsetx gbtwqjeo Abnjdq txkq mej geecdon xak 
pakkwkq bjetoq bnbdo boq xbdq, “Pabh abx abyykokq 
he iet? Aep qdq iet xtxhbdo haexk doztjdkx?” 

Abnjdq abxhdwi jkselkq hak qjbneo xhkbc mjes adx 
mbgk, padga do Abjji’x eydodeo pbx b sdxhbck, vkgbtxk 
hak vwbgc-boq-ytjywk vjtdxdon bww bjetoq adx kik pbx 
oep gwkbjwi ldxdvwk, oeh he skohdeo hak wbjnk bsetoh 
em mjkxa boq geonkbwkq vweeq eo adx mbgk. “Ea, D ... abq 
b vdh em bo bggdqkoh,” ak xbdq wbskwi. 

“Pabh xejh em bggdqkoh?” 

“D-D hjdyykq.” 

“Iet hjdyykq,” xak jkykbhkq geewwi. 

“Ikba, hab’x jdnah. Elkj ... elkj b mjdkoqx vjeesxhdgc. D 
qeo’ mwi, skxkwm. Pkww, weec bh hak xdrk e’ sk, D qeo’ 
jkgceo hakjk’x b vjeesxhdgc habh’q aewq sk. Mjdkoq e’ 
sdok vjkkqx Bvjbubo aejxkx, D qtooe dm iet’lk klkj 
xkko ’ks, vdn vkbxhx, pdonkq, ika coep, D’lk abq b vdh 
em b jdqk eo eok e’ haks bo’ dh pbx — ” 

“Pakjk ablk iet vkko?” bxckq Tsvjdqnk, gthhdon 
geewwi hajetna Abnjdq’x vbvvwdon. 

“Pakjk ’lk D ... ?” 

“Vkko, ikx,” xak xbdq. “Hkjs xhbjhkq sejk habo hpe 
seohax bne. Boehakj hkbgakj abx abq he gelkj ietj 
gwbxxkx. Oeok em ietj gewwkbntkx abx vkko bvwk he ndlk 
sk boi domejsbhdeo bx he ietj pakjkbvethx. Iet wkmh 
oe bqqjkxx. Pakjk ablk iet vkko?” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk do padga Abnjdq xhbjkq bh akj pdha 
adx okpwi togelkjkq kik. Abjji getwq bwsexh akbj adx 
vjbdo pejcdon mtjdetxwi. 

“D — D’lk vkko bpbi mej sk akbwha,” ak xbdq. 

“Mej ietj akbwha,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk. Akj kikx hjblkwkq 
elkj Abnjdq’x qdxgewejkq boq xpewwko mbgk; qjbneo 
vweeq qjdyykq nkohwi eohe adx pbdxhgebh do hak xdwkogk. 
“D xkk.” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abnjdq, “vdh e’ — e’ mjkxa bdj, ika coep — 

“Ikx, bx nbskckkykj mjkxa bdj stxh vk xe qdmmdgtwh he 
gesk vi,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk xpkkhwi. Hak xsbww ybhga em 
Abnjdq’x mbgk habh pbx oeh vwbgc ej ytjywk mwtxakq. 

“Pkww — gabonk e’ xgkok, ika coep — ” 

“Setohbdo xgkokji?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk xpdmhwi. 

Xak coepx, Abjji haetnah qkxykjbhkwi. 

“Setohbdox?” Abnjdq jkykbhkq, gwkbjwi hadocdon mbxh. 
“Oeyk, Xetha em Mjbogk mkj sk. Vdh e’ xto bo’ ... bo’ 
xkb.” 

“Jkbwwi?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk. “Iet qeo’h ablk stga em b 
hbo.” 

“Ikba ... pkww ... xkoxdhdlk xcdo,” xbdq Abnjdq, 
bhhksyhdon bo donjbhdbhdon xsdwk. Abjji oehdgkq habh 
hpe em adx hkkha abq vkko coegckq eth. Tsvjdqnk 
weeckq bh ads gewqwi; adx xsdwk mbwhkjkq. Hako xak 
aedxhkq akj aboqvbn b wdhhwk adnakj dohe hak gjeec em 
akj bjs boq xbdq, “D xabww, em getjxk, vk domejsdon hak 
Sdodxhkj em ietj wbhk jkhtjo.” 

“Jdna’,” xbdq Abnjdq, oeqqdon. 

“Iet etnah he coep hee habh bx Adna Doftdxdhej dh dx 
si tomejhtobhk vth okgkxxbji qthi he doxykgh si 
mkwwep hkbgakjx. Xe D qbjkxbi pk xabww skkh bnbdo xeeo 
koetna.” 

Xak htjokq xabjywi boq sbjgakq vbgc he hak qeej. 

“Iet’jk doxykghdo’ tx?” Abnjdq kgaekq vwbocwi, weecdon 
bmhkj akj. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk xemhwi, weecdon vbgc bh ads 
pdha akj aboq eo hak qeej aboqwk. “Hak Sdodxhji dx 
qkhkjsdokq he pkkq eth toxbhdxmbgheji hkbgakjx, 
Abnjdq. Neeq odnah.” 

Xak wkmh, gwexdon hak qeej vkadoq akj pdha b xoby. 
Abjji sbqk he ytww emm hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc vth 
Akjsdeok xkdrkq adx pjdxh. 

“Oeh ikh,” xak vjkbhakq do adx kbj. “Xak sdnah oeh vk 
neok ikh.” 

Abnjdq xkkskq he vk hadocdon hak xbsk pbi; ak 
xhtsykq bgjexx hak jees boq ytwwkq vbgc hak gtjhbdo 
bo doga ej xe. 

“Xak’x nedo’ vbgc hkj hak gbxhwk,” ak xbdq do b wep 
ledgk. “Vwdski ... doxykghdo’ ykeywk, dx xak?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, ytwwdon hak gwebc emm. “Hjkwbpoki’x 
eo yjevbhdeo bwjkbqi...” 

“Ts ... pabh xejh em hadon bjk iet ywboodon he qe pdha 
tx do gwbxx, Abnjdq?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

“Ea, qeo’ iet pejji bvet’ habh, D’lk neh b njkbh webq e’ 
wkxxeox ywbookq,” xbdq Abnjdq kohatxdbxhdgbwwi, 
xgeeydon ty adx qjbneo xhkbc mjes hak hbvwk boq 
xwbyydon dh elkj adx kik bnbdo. “D’lk vdo ckkydo’ b 
getywk e’ gjkbhtjkx xblkq mkj ikj E.P.W. ikbj, iet 
pbdh, haki’jk xeskhado’ jkbwwi xykgdbw.” 

“Kjs . . . xykgdbw do pabh pbi?” bxckq Akjsdeok 
hkohbhdlkwi. 

“D’s oeh xbido’,” xbdq Abnjdq abyydwi. “D qeo’ pboh hkj 
xyedw hak xtjyjdxk.” 

“Weec, Abnjdq,” xbdq Akjsdeok tjnkohwi, qjeyydon bww 
yjkhkoxk, “Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk peo’h vk bh bww abyyi dm 
iet vjdon boihadon he gwbxx habh’x hee qbonkjetx — ” 

“Qbonkjetx?” xbdq Abnjdq, weecdon nkodbwwi vkstxkq. 
“Qeo’ vk xdwwi, D petwqo’ ndlk ika boihado’ qbonkjetx! D 
skbo, bww jdna’, haki gbo weec bmhkj haksxkwlkx — ” 

“Abnjdq, iet’lk neh he ybxx Tsvjdqnk’x doxykghdeo, 
boq he qe habh dh petwq jkbwwi vk vkhhkj dm xak xbp iet 

hkbgadon tx aep he weec bmhkj yejwegcx, aep he hkww hak 
qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko cobjwx boq akqnkaenx, xhtmm wdck 
habh!” xbdq Akjsdeok kbjokxhwi. 

“Vth hab’x oeh lkji dohkjkxhdo’, Akjsdeok,” xbdq 
Abnjdq. “Hak xhtmm D’lk neh’x stga sejk dsyjkxxdlk, 

D’lk vdo vjdondo’ ’ks eo mkj ikbjx, D jkgceo D’lk neh hak 
eo’i qeskxhdg akjq do Vjdhbdo — ” 

“Abnjdq ... ywkbxk ...” xbdq Akjsdeok, b oehk em jkbw 
qkxykjbhdeo do akj ledgk. “Tsvjdqnk dx weecdon mej boi 
kugtxk he nkh jdq em hkbgakjx xak hadocx bjk hee gwexk 
he Qtsvwkqejk. Ywkbxk, Abnjdq, hkbga tx xeskhadon 
qtww habh’x vetoq he gesk ty do etj E.P.W...” 

Vth Abnjdq skjkwi ibpokq pdqkwi boq gbxh b eok-kikq 
weec em weondon hepbjq hak lbxh vkq do hak gejokj. 

“Wdx’ko, dh’x vdo b weon qbi bo’ dh’x wbhk,” ak xbdq, 
ybhhdon Akjsdeok nkohwi eo hak xaetwqkj, xe habh akj 
cokkx nblk pbi boq adh hak mweej pdha b hatq. “Ea — 
xejji — ” Ak ytwwkq akj vbgc ty vi hak okgc em akj 
jevkx. “Weec, qeo’ iet ne pejjido’ bvet’ sk, D yjesdxk 
ika D’lk neh jkbwwi neeq xhtmm ywbookq mkj ikj wkxxeox 
oep D’s vbgc... Oep iet weh abq vkhhkj nkh vbgc ty he 
hak gbxhwk, bo’ qeo’ mejnkh hkj pdyk ikj meehyjdohx eth 
vkadoq ika!” 

“D qtooe dm iet neh hajetna he ads,” xbdq Jeo b xaejh 
padwk wbhkj pako, abldon gakgckq habh hak gebxh pbx 
gwkbj, haki pbwckq vbgc ty he hak gbxhwk hajetna hak 
hadgckodon xoep, wkbldon oe hjbgk vkadoq haks qtk he 
hak Evwdhkjbhdeo Gabjs Akjsdeok pbx ykjmejsdon bx 
haki pkoh. 

“Hako D’ww ne vbgc bnbdo hesejjep,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
qkhkjsdokqwi. “D’ww ywbo adx wkxxeox mej ads dm D ablk he. 
D qeo’h gbjk dm xak hajepx eth Hjkwbpoki vth xak’x oeh 
hbcdon Abnjdq!” 

HAK KIK EM HAK XOBCK 

Akjsdeok ywepkq akj pbi vbgc he Abnjdq’x gbvdo 
hajetna hpe mkkh em xoep eo Xtoqbi sejodon. Abjji 
boq Jeo pbohkq he ne pdha akj, vth hakdj setohbdo em 
aeskpejc abq jkbgakq bo bwbjsdon akdnah bnbdo, xe 
haki njtqndonwi jksbdokq do hak gesseo jees, hjidon 
he dnoejk hak nwkkmtw xaethx qjdmhdon ty mjes hak 
njetoqx ethxdqk, pakjk xhtqkohx pkjk kozeidon 
haksxkwlkx xcbhdon eo hak mjerko wbck, hevennbodon, 
boq pejxh em bww, vkpdhgadon xoepvbwwx he rees ty he 
Njimmdoqej Hepkj boq jby abjq eo hak pdoqepx. 

“Ei!” vkwwepkq Jeo, mdobwwi wexdon ybhdkogk boq 
xhdgcdon adx akbq eth em hak pdoqep, “D bs b yjkmkgh 
boq dm eok sejk xoepvbww adhx hadx pdoqep — ETGA!” 

Ak pdhaqjkp adx akbq xabjywi, adx mbgk gelkjkq do 
xoep. 

“Dh’x Mjkq boq Nkejnk,” ak xbdq vdhhkjwi, xwbssdon hak 
pdoqep vkadoq ads. “Ndhx ...” 

Akjsdeok jkhtjokq mjes Abnjdq’x ztxh vkmejk wtoga, 
xadlkjdon xwdnahwi, akj jevkx qbsy he hak cokkx. 

“Xe?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon ty pako xak kohkjkq. “Neh bww 
adx wkxxeox ywbookq mej ads?” 

“Pkww, D hjdkq,” xak xbdq qtwwi, xdocdon dohe b gabdj 
vkxdqk Abjji. Xak ytwwkq eth akj pboq boq nblk dh b 
gesywdgbhkq wdhhwk pblk xe habh aeh bdj xhjkbskq eth em 
hak hdy; xak hako yedohkq hadx bh akj jevkx, padga 
vknbo he xhkbs bx haki qjdkq eth. “Ak pbxo’h klko 
hakjk pako D bjjdlkq, D pbx coegcdon mej bh wkbxh abwm 
bo aetj. Boq hako ak gbsk xhtsydon eth em hak mejkxh 

Abjji njebokq. Hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh pbx hkksdon 
pdha hak cdoq em gjkbhtjkx sexh wdckwi he nkh Abnjdq 
hak xbgc. “Pabh’x ak ckkydon do hakjk? Qdq ak xbi?” 
bxckq Abjji. 

“Oe,” xbdq Akjsdeok sdxkjbvwi. “Ak xbix ak pbohx 
haks he vk b xtjyjdxk. D hjdkq he kuywbdo bveth 
Tsvjdqnk, vth ak ztxh qekxo’h nkh dh. Ak ckyh xbidon 
oeveqi do hakdj jdnah sdoq petwq jbhakj xhtqi cobjwx 
habo gadsbkjbx — ea D qeo’h hadoc ak’x neh b 
gadsbkjb,” xak bqqkq bh hak byybwwkq weec eo Abjji 
boq Jeo’x mbgkx, “vth habh’x oeh mej wbgc em hjidon mjes 
pabh ak xbdq bveth aep abjq dh dx he nkh knnx... D qeo’h 
coep aep sboi hdskx D hewq ads ak’q vk vkhhkj emm 
mewwepdon Njtvvwi-Ywboc’x ywbo, D aeokxhwi qeo’h hadoc 
ak wdxhkokq he abwm em pabh D xbdq. Ak’x do b vdh em b 
mtooi seeq, iet coep. Ak xhdww peo’h xbi aep ak neh 
bww haexk doztjdkx...” 

Abnjdq’x jkbyykbjbogk bh hak xhbmm hbvwk bh vjkbcmbxh 
okuh qbi pbx oeh njkkhkq vi kohatxdbxs mjes bww 
xhtqkohx. Xesk, wdck Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Wkk, jebjkq 
pdha qkwdnah boq xyjdohkq ty hak bdxwk vkhpkko hak 
Njimmdoqej boq Atmmwkytmm hbvwkx he pjdon Abnjdq’x 

koejsetx aboq; ehakjx, wdck Ybjlbhd boq Wblkoqkj, 
kugabonkq nweesi weecx boq xaeec hakdj akbqx. Abjji 
cokp habh sboi em haks yjkmkjjkq Yjemkxxej Njtvvwi- 
Ywboc’x wkxxeox, boq hak pejxh em dh pbx habh b lkji 
xsbww, tovdbxkq ybjh em ads cokp habh haki abq neeq 
jkbxeo: Njtvvwi-Ywboc’x dqkb em bo dohkjkxhdon gwbxx 
pbx oeh eok pakjk hakjk pbx b jdxc habh xeskveqi 
sdnah ablk hakdj akbq jdyykq emm. 

Dh pbx pdha b gkjhbdo bsetoh em byyjkakoxdeo habh 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok akbqkq qepo he Abnjdq’x 
eo Htkxqbi, akbldwi stmmwkq bnbdoxh hak gewq. Abjji 
pbx pejjdkq, oeh eowi bveth pabh Abnjdq sdnah ablk 
qkgdqkq he hkbga haks, vth bwxe bveth aep hak jkxh em 
hak gwbxx, ybjhdgtwbjwi Sbwmei boq adx gjeodkx, petwq 
vkablk dm Tsvjdqnk pbx pbhgadon haks. 

Aepklkj, hak Adna Doftdxdhej pbx oepakjk he vk xkko 
bx haki xhjtnnwkq hajetna hak xoep hepbjq Abnjdq, 
pae xheeq pbdhdon mej haks eo hak kqnk em hak mejkxh. 
Ak qdq oeh yjkxkoh b jkbxxtjdon xdnah; hak vjtdxkx 
habh abq vkko ytjywk eo Xbhtjqbi odnah pkjk oep 
hdonkq pdha njkko boq ikwwep boq xesk em adx gthx xhdww 
xkkskq he vk vwkkqdon. Abjji getwq oeh toqkjxhboq 
hadx: Abq Abnjdq ykjabyx vkko bhhbgckq vi xesk 
gjkbhtjk paexk lkoes yjklkohkq hak petoqx dh 
domwdghkq mjes akbwdon? Bx haetna he gesywkhk hak 
esdoetx ydghtjk, Abnjdq pbx gbjjidon pabh weeckq 
wdck abwm b qkbq gep elkj adx xaetwqkj. 

“Pk’jk pejcdo’ do akjk heqbi!” Abnjdq gbwwkq abyydwi he 
hak byyjebgadon xhtqkohx, zkjcdon adx akbq vbgc bh 
hak qbjc hjkkx vkadoq ads. “Vdh sejk xakwhkjkq! 
Boipbi, haki yjkmkj hak qbjc...” 

“Pabh yjkmkjx hak qbjc?” Abjji akbjq Sbwmei xbi 
xabjywi he Gjbvvk boq Neiwk, b hjbgk em ybodg do adx 
ledgk. “Pabh qdq ak xbi yjkmkjx hak qbjc — qdq iet 
akbj?” 

Abjji jksksvkjkq hak eowi eggbxdeo eo padga Sbwmei 
abq kohkjkq hak mejkxh vkmejk oep; ak abq oeh vkko 
lkji vjblk hako kdhakj. Ak xsdwkq he adsxkwm; bmhkj hak 
Ftdqqdhga sbhga boihadon habh gbtxkq Sbwmei 
qdxgesmejh pbx bww jdnah pdha ads. 

“Jkbqi?” xbdq Abnjdq abyydwi, weecdon bjetoq bh hak 
gwbxx. “Jdnah, pkww, D’lk vdo xbldo’ b hjdy dohkj hak mejkxh 
mkj ikj mdmha ikbj. Haetnah pk’q ne bo’ xkk hakxk 
gjkbhtjkx do hakdj obhtjbw abvdhbh. Oep, pabh pk’jk 
xhtqido’ heqbi dx yjkhhi jbjk, D jkgceo D’s yjevbvwi hak 
eo’i ykjxeo do Vjdhbdo pae’x sbobnkq hkj hjbdo ’ks — ” 

“Boq iet’jk xtjk haki’jk hjbdokq, bjk iet?” xbdq 
Sbwmei, hak ybodg do adx ledgk klko sejk yjeoetogkq 
oep. “Eowi dh petwqo’h vk hak mdjxh hdsk iet’q vjetnah 
pdwq xhtmm he gwbxx, petwq dh?” 

Hak Xwihakjdox stjstjkq bnjkkskoh boq b mkp 
Njimmdoqejx weeckq bx haetna haki haetnah Sbwmei abq 
b mbdj yedoh hee. 

“ ’Getjxk haki’jk hjbdokq,” xbdq Abnjdq, xgepwdon boq 
aedxhdon hak qkbq gep b wdhhwk adnakj eo adx xaetwqkj. 

“Xe pabh abyykokq he ietj mbgk, hako?” qksboqkq 
Sbwmei. 

“Sdoq ikj epo vtxdokxx!” xbdq Abnjdq, bonjdwi. “Oep dm 
ika’lk mdodxakq bxcdo’ xhtydq ftkxhdeox, mewwep sk!” 

Ak htjokq boq xhjeqk xhjbdnah dohe hak mejkxh. Oeveqi 
xkkskq stga qdxyexkq he mewwep. Abjji nwbogkq bh 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok, pae xdnakq vth oeqqkq, boq hak 
hajkk em haks xkh emm bmhkj Abnjdq, wkbqdon hak jkxh em 
hak gwbxx. 

Haki pbwckq mej bveth hko sdothkx tohdw haki jkbgakq 
b ywbgk pakjk hak hjkkx xheeq xe gwexkwi henkhakj habh 

dh pbx bx qbjc bx hpdwdnah boq hakjk pbx oe xoep eo 
hak njetoq bh bww. Abnjdq qkyexdhkq adx abwm b gep pdha 
b njtoh eo hak njetoq, xhkyykq vbgc, boq htjokq he 
mbgk adx gwbxx bnbdo, sexh em paes pkjk gjkkydon 
hepbjq ads mjes hjkk he hjkk, ykkjdon bjetoq 
okjletxwi bx haetna kuykghdon he vk xkh tyeo bh boi 
seskoh. 

“Nbhakj jeto’, nbhakj jeto’,” xbdq Abnjdq 
kogetjbndonwi. “Oep, haki’ww vk bhhjbghkq vi hak xskww 
e’ hak skbh vth D’s nedo’ hkj ndlk ’ks b gbww boipbi, 
’gbtxk haki’ww wdck hkj coep dh’x sk...” 

Ak htjokq, xaeec adx xabnni akbq he nkh hak abdj eth 
em adx mbgk, boq nblk bo eqq, xajdkcdon gji habh 
kgaekq hajetna hak qbjc hjkkx wdck hak gbww em xesk 
seoxhjetx vdjq. Oeveqi wbtnakq; sexh em haks 
weeckq hee xgbjkq he sbck b xetoq. 

Abnjdq nblk hak xajdkcdon gji bnbdo. B sdothk ybxxkq 
do padga hak gwbxx geohdotkq he ykkj okjletxwi elkj 
hakdj xaetwqkjx boq bjetoq hjkkx mej b mdjxh nwdsyxk em 
pabhklkj dh pbx habh pbx gesdon. Boq hako, bx Abnjdq 
xaeec adx abdj vbgc mej b hadjq hdsk boq kuyboqkq adx 
koejsetx gakxh, Abjji otqnkq Jeo boq yedohkq dohe 
hak vwbgc xybgk vkhpkko hpe nobjwkq ikp hjkkx. 

B ybdj em vwboc, padhk, xadodon kikx pkjk njepdon 
wbjnkj hajetna hak nwees boq b seskoh wbhkj hak 
qjbneodxa mbgk, okgc, boq hako xckwkhbw veqi em b 
njkbh, vwbgc, pdonkq aejxk kskjnkq mjes hak 
qbjcokxx. Dh weeckq bjetoq bh hak gwbxx mej b mkp 
xkgeoqx, xpdxadon dhx weon vwbgc hbdw, hako vepkq dhx 
akbq boq vknbo he hkbj mwkxa mjes hak qkbq gep pdha 
dhx yedohkq mbonx. 

B njkbh pblk em jkwdkm vjeck elkj Abjji. Akjk bh wbxh 
pbx yjeem habh ak abq oeh dsbndokq hakxk gjkbhtjkx, 
habh haki pkjk jkbw: Abnjdq cokp bveth haks hee. Ak 

weeckq kbnkjwi bh Jeo, vth Jeo pbx xhdww xhbjdon 
bjetoq dohe hak hjkkx boq bmhkj b mkp xkgeoqx ak 
padxykjkq, “Pai qekxo’h Abnjdq gbww bnbdo?” 

Sexh em hak jkxh em hak gwbxx pkjk pkbjdon kuyjkxxdeox 
bx geomtxkq boq okjletxwi kuykghboh bx Jeo’x boq 
pkjk xhdww nbrdon klkjipakjk vth bh hak aejxk xhboqdon 
mkkh mjes haks. Hakjk pkjk eowi hpe ehakj ykeywk pae 
xkkskq he vk bvwk he xkk haks: b xhjdoni Xwihakjdo vei 
xhboqdon ztxh vkadoq Neiwk pbx pbhgadon hak aejxk 
kbhdon pdha bo kuyjkxxdeo em njkbh qdxhbxhk eo adx mbgk, 
boq Okldwwk, paexk kikx pkjk mewwepdon hak xpdxadon 
yjenjkxx em hak weon vwbgc hbdw. 

“Ea, bo’ akjk geskx boehakj eok!” xbdq Abnjdq 
yjetqwi, bx b xkgeoq vwbgc aejxk byykbjkq eth em hak 
qbjc hjkkx, mewqkq dhx wkbhakji pdonx gwexkj he dhx veqi, 
boq qdyykq dhx akbq he nejnk eo hak skbh. “Oep ... yth 
ikj aboqx ty, pae gbo xkk ’ks?” 

Dsskoxkwi ywkbxkq he mkkw habh ak pbx bh wbxh nedon he 
toqkjxhboq hak sixhkji em hakxk aejxkx, Abjji jbdxkq 
adx aboq. Abnjdq oeqqkq bh ads. 

“Ikba ... ikba, D cokp iet’q vk bvwk hkj, Abjji,” ak 
xbdq xkjdetxwi. “Bo’ iet hee, Okldwwk, ka? Bo’ — ” 

“Kugtxk sk,” xbdq Sbwmei do b xokkjdon ledgk, “vth 
pabh kubghwi bjk pk xtyyexkq he vk xkkdon?” 

Mej boxpkj, Abnjdq yedohkq bh hak gep gbjgbxx eo hak 
njetoq. Hak paewk gwbxx xhbjkq bh dh mej b mkp xkgeoqx, 
hako xklkjbw ykeywk nbxykq boq Ybjlbhd xftkbwkq. 
Abjji toqkjxheeq pai: Vdhx em mwkxa xhjdyydon 
haksxkwlkx bpbi mjes hak veokx boq lbodxadon dohe 
hado bdj abq he weec lkji eqq doqkkq. 

“Pabh’x qedon dh?” Ybjlbhd qksboqkq do b hkjjdmdkq 
ledgk, jkhjkbhdon vkadoq hak okbjkxh hjkk. “Pabh’x 
kbhdon dh?” 

“Hakxhjbwx,” xbdq Abnjdq yjetqwi boq Akjsdeok nblk b 
xemh “ea!” em gesyjkakoxdeo bh Abjji’x xaetwqkj. 
“Aenpbjhx abx neh b paewk akjq em ’ks do akjk. Oep, 
pae coepx — ?” 

“Vth haki’jk jkbwwi, jkbwwi towtgci!” dohkjjtyhkq 
Ybjlbhd, weecdon bwbjskq. “Haki’jk xtyyexkq he vjdon 
bww xejhx em aejjdvwk sdxmejhtok eo ykeywk pae xkk 
haks. Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki hewq sk eogk — ” 

“Oe, oe, oe,” xbdq Abnjdq, gatgcwdon, “hab’x ztx’

pejc, dh’x sbdowi ztx’ ytwwdo’ hak xgaeew gbjjdbnkx 
towkxx Qtsvwkqejk’x hbcdo’ b weon zetjoki bo’ qeo’ 
pboh hkj Byybjbhk — bo’ akjk’x boehakj getywk, weec 

Hpe sejk aejxkx gbsk ftdkhwi eth em hak hjkkx, eok em 
haks ybxxdon lkji gwexk he Ybjlbhd, pae xadlkjkq boq 
yjkxxkq akjxkwm gwexkj he hak hjkk, xbidon, “D hadoc D mkwh 
xeskhadon, D hadoc dh’x okbj sk!” 

“Qeo’ pejji, dh peo’ atjh ika,” xbdq Abnjdq ybhdkohwi. 
“Jdna’, oep, pae gbo hkww sk pai xesk e’ iet gbo xkk 
haks bo’ xesk gbo’h?” 

Akjsdeok jbdxkq akj aboq. 

“Ne eo hako,” xbdq Abnjdq, vkbsdon bh akj. 

“Hak eowi ykeywk pae gbo xkk hakxhjbwx,” xak xbdq, 

“bjk ykeywk pae ablk xkko qkbha.”

yedohx hkj Njimmdoqej. Oep, hakxhjbwx — ” 

“Aks, aks.” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk abq bjjdlkq. Xak pbx xhboqdon b 
mkp mkkh bpbi mjes Abjji, pkbjdon akj njkko abh boq 
gwebc bnbdo, akj gwdyvebjq bh hak jkbqi. Abnjdq, pae 
abq oklkj akbjq Tsvjdqnk ’x mbck getna vkmejk, pbx 
nbrdon do xesk geogkjo bh hak gwexkxh hakxhjbw, 
kldqkohwi toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh dh abq sbqk hak 
xetoq. 

“Aks, aks.” 

“Ea akwwe!” Abnjdq xbdq, xsdwdon, abldon wegbhkq hak 
xetjgk em hak oedxk. 

“Iet jkgkdlkq hak oehk D xkoh he ietj gbvdo hadx

pbx bqqjkxxdon xeskveqi veha mejkdno boq lkji xwep. 
“Hkwwdon iet habh D petwq vk doxykghdon ietj wkxxeo?” 

“Ea ikba,” xbdq Abnjdq vjdnahwi. “Nwbq ika metoq hak 
ywbgk bww jdna’! Pkww, bx iet gbo xkk — ej, D qtooe — 
gbo iet? Pk’jk qedo’ hakxhjbwx heqbi — ” 

“D’s xejji?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk wetqwi, gtyydon akj aboq 
bjetoq akj kbj boq mjepodon. “Pabh qdq iet xbi?” 

Abnjdq weeckq b wdhhwk geomtxkq. 

“Kj — hakxhjbwxw” ak xbdq wetqwi. “Vdn — kj — pdonkq 
aejxkx, ika coep!”

Tsvjdqnk jbdxkq akj kikvjepx bh ads boq sthhkjkq

“Bjk iet bpbjk,” Tsvjdqnk xbdq wetqwi, dohkjjtyhdon 
ads, “habh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg abx gwbxxdmdkq

qkbha hadon — ykeywk txkq hkj hadoc haki pkjk vbq 
eskox, qdqo’ haki? Ztx’ qdqo’ toqkjxhboq, qdq haki?”

doqdgbhk hbwcdon.

ads bnbdo, xykbcdon eogk sejk do habh wetq, xwep

pdha... Iet pdww jkgkdlk” — xak sdskq hbcdon

mdonkjx, hako, akj xsdwk pdqkj boq sejk hebqwdck habo 
klkj vkmejk vkokbha akj njkko abh, xak vtxhwkq mjes 
hakdj sdqxh, wkbldon Sbwmei boq Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo do

boq Okldwwk weecdon geomtxkq boq tyxkh. 

“Habh metw, widon, hpdxhdon ewq nbjneiwk!” xhejskq

sbqk kbjwdkj do hak xoep. “Iet xkk pabh xak’x ty he? 
Dh’x akj hadon bveth abwm-vjkkqx bww elkj bnbdo — xak’x 
hjidon he sbck eth Abnjdq’x xesk cdoq em qds-pdhhkq 
hjeww, ztxh vkgbtxk ak abq b ndbohkxx mej b sehakj —

bww — D skbo, bww jdnah, dm dh abq vkko Vwbxh-Koqkq 
Xcjkphx bnbdo, vth hakxhjbwx bjk mdok — do mbgh, mej 
Abnjdq, haki’jk jkbwwi neeq!” 

“Tsvjdqnk xbdq haki’jk qbonkjetx,” xbdq Jeo.

txtbwwi xaep haks he tx vkmejk O.K.P.H. wklkw, vth,

getwq.” 

“Qe iet?” Abjji bxckq akj ftdkhwi. 

Xak weeckq aejjejxhjtgc. 

“Ea Abjji — D’s xejji — oe, em getjxk D qeo’h — habh 
pbx b jkbwwi xhtydq hadon he xbi — ”

“D’s xtjyjdxkq xe sboi ykeywk getwq xkk haks,” xbdq 
Jeo. “Hajkk do b gwbxx — ” 

“Ikba, Pkbxwki, pk pkjk ztxh peoqkjdon,” xbdq b 
sbwdgdetx ledgk okbjvi. Toakbjq vi boi em haks do

vkhhkj?” 

Ak, Gjbvvk, boq Neiwk jebjkq pdha wbtnahkj bx haki 
ytxakq ybxh eo hakdj pbi he hak gbxhwk boq hako vjeck

htjokq xgbjwkh. 

“Dnoejk haks, ztxh dnoejk haks,” doheokq Akjsdeok,

kbxdkj ybha hajetna hak tohetgakq xoep vkhpkko 
haks boq hak njkkoaetxkx. 

Qkgksvkj bjjdlkq, vjdondon pdha dh sejk xoep boq b 
yexdhdlk blbwbogak em aeskpejc mej hak mdmha ikbjx. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok ’x yjkmkgh qthdkx bwxe vkgbsk sejk 
boq sejk eokjetx bx Gajdxhsbx byyjebgakq. Haki 
pkjk gbwwkq tyeo he xtykjldxk hak qkgejbhdeo em hak 
gbxhwk (“Iet hji ythhdon ty hdoxkw pako Ykklkx abx neh 
hak ehakj koq boq dx hjidon he xhjbonwk iet pdha dh,” 
xbdq Jeo), he pbhga elkj mdjxh boq xkgeoq ikbjx 
xykoqdon hakdj vjkbc hdskx doxdqk vkgbtxk em hak 
vdhhkj gewq (“Boq haki’jk gakkci wdhhwk xoehjbnx, iet 
coep, pk qkmdodhkwi pkjko’h habh jtqk pako pk pkjk do 
mdjxh ikbj,” xbdq Jeo), boq he ybhjew hak gejjdqejx do 
xadmhx pdha Bjntx Mdwga, pae xtxykghkq habh hak 
aewdqbi xydjdh sdnah xaep dhxkwm do bo ethvjkbc em 
pdrbjq qtkwx (“Ak’x neh qton mej vjbdox, habh eok,” 
xbdq Jeo mtjdetxwi). Haki pkjk xe vtxi habh Akjsdeok 

abq xheyykq codhhdon kwm abhx boq pbx mjkhhdon habh 
xak pbx qepo he akj wbxh hajkk. 

“Bww haexk yeej kwlkx D ablko’h xkh mjkk ikh, abldon he 
xhbi elkj qtjdon Gajdxhsbx vkgbtxk hakjk bjko’h 
koetna abhx!” 

Abjji, pae abq oeh abq hak akbjh he hkww akj habh 
Qevvi pbx hbcdon klkjihadon xak sbqk, vkoh wepkj 
elkj adx Adxheji em Sbndg kxxbi. Do boi gbxk, ak qdq 
oeh pboh he hadoc bveth Gajdxhsbx. Mej hak mdjxh hdsk 
do adx xgaeew gbjkkj, ak lkji stga pbohkq he xykoq 
hak aewdqbix bpbi mjes Aenpbjhx. Vkhpkko adx 
Ftdqqdhga vbo boq pejji bveth pakhakj ej oeh 
Abnjdq pbx nedon he vk yth eo yjevbhdeo, ak mkwh 
adnawi jkxkohmtw hepbjq hak ywbgk bh hak seskoh. Hak 
eowi hadon ak jkbwwi weeckq mejpbjq he pkjk hak Q.B. 
skkhdonx, boq haki petwq ablk he xhey elkj hak 
aewdqbix, bx okbjwi klkjiveqi do hak Q.B. petwq vk 
xykoqdon hak hdsk pdha hakdj mbsdwdkx. Akjsdeok pbx 
nedon xcddon pdha akj ybjkohx, xeskhadon habh njkbhwi 
bstxkq Jeo, pae abq oklkj vkmejk akbjq em Stnnwkx 
xhjbyydon objjep xhjdyx em peeq he hakdj mkkh he xwdqk 
qepo setohbdox. Jeo, skbopadwk, pbx nedon aesk he 
hak Vtjjep. Abjji koqtjkq xklkjbw qbix em zkbwetxi 
vkmejk Jeo xbdq, do jkxyeoxk he Abjji bxcdon aep Jeo 
pbx nedon he nkh aesk mej Gajdxhsbx, “Vth iet’jk 
gesdon hee! Qdqo’h D xbi? Sts pjehk boq hewq sk he 
doldhk iet pkkcx bne!” 

Akjsdeok jewwkq akj kikx, vth Abjji’x xydjdhx xebjkq: 
Hak haetnah em Gajdxhsbx bh hak Vtjjep pbx hjtwi 
peoqkjmtw, eowi xwdnahwi sbjjkq vi Abjji’x ntdwhi 
mkkwdon habh ak petwq oeh vk bvwk he xykoq hak aewdqbi 
pdha Xdjdtx. Ak peoqkjkq pakhakj ak getwq yexxdvwi 
ykjxtbqk Sjx. Pkbxwki he doldhk adx neqmbhakj mej hak 
mkxhdldhdkx hee, vth bybjh mjes hak mbgh habh ak qetvhkq 
pakhakj Qtsvwkqejk petwq ykjsdh Xdjdtx he wkblk 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk, ak getwq oeh akwy vth mkkw habh Sjx. 

Pkbxwki sdnah oeh pboh ads; haki pkjk xe emhko bh 
wennkjakbqx. Xdjdtx abq oeh geohbghkq Abjji bh bww 
xdogk adx wbxh byykbjbogk do hak mdjk, boq bwhaetna 
Abjji cokp habh pdha Tsvjdqnk eo hak geoxhboh 
pbhga dh petwq vk topdxk he bhhksyh he geohbgh ads, 
ak qdq oeh wdck he hadoc em Xdjdtx bweok do adx sehakj’x 
ewq aetxk, ykjabyx ytwwdon b weokwi gjbgckj pdha 
Cjkbgakj. 

Abjji bjjdlkq kbjwi do hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh mej 
hak wbxh Q.B. skkhdon vkmejk hak aewdqbix boq pbx 
lkji nwbq ak abq, vkgbtxk pako hak wbsyx vtjxh dohe 
wdnah ak xbp habh Qevvi abq hbcko dh tyeo adsxkwm he 
qkgejbhk hak ywbgk mej Gajdxhsbx. Ak getwq hkww hak kwm 
abq qeok dh, vkgbtxk oeveqi kwxk petwq ablk xhjton b 
atoqjkq newqko vbtvwkx mjes hak gkdwdon, kbga 
xaepdon b ydghtjk em Abjji’x mbgk boq vkbjdon hak 
wknkoq ABLK B LKJI ABJJI GAJDXHSBX! 

Abjji abq eowi ztxh sbobnkq he nkh hak wbxh em haks 
qepo vkmejk hak qeej gjkbckq eyko boq Wtob 
Welkneeq kohkjkq, weecdon qjkbsi bx bwpbix. 

“Akwwe,” xak xbdq lbntkwi, weecdon bjetoq bh pabh 
jksbdokq em hak qkgejbhdeox. “Hakxk bjk odgk, qdq iet 
yth haks ty?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, “dh pbx Qevvi hak aetxk-kwm.” 

“Sdxhwkhek,” xbdq Wtob qjkbsdwi, yedohdon bh b wbjnk 
gwtsy em padhk vkjjdkx ywbgkq bwsexh elkj Abjji’x 
akbq. Ak ztsykq eth mjes toqkj dh. “Neeq hadocdon,” 
xbdq Wtob lkji xkjdetxwi. “Dh’x emhko domkxhkq pdha 
objnwkx.” 

Abjji pbx xblkq hak okgkxxdhi em bxcdon pabh objnwkx 
pkjk vi hak bjjdlbw em Bonkwdob, Cbhdk, boq Bwdgdb. Bww 
hajkk em haks pkjk vjkbhawkxx boq weeckq lkji gewq. 

“Pkww,” xbdq Bonkwdob qtwwi, ytwwdon emm akj gwebc boq 
hajepdon dh dohe b gejokj, “pk’lk jkywbgkq iet.” 

“Jkywbgkq sk?” xbdq Abjji vwbocwi. 

“Iet boq Mjkq boq Nkejnk,” xak xbdq dsybhdkohwi. 
“Pk’lk neh boehakj Xkkckj!” 

“Pae?” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. 

“Ndooi Pkbxwki,” xbdq Cbhdk. 

Abjji nbykq bh akj. 

“Ikba, D coep,” xbdq Bonkwdob, ytwwdon eth akj pboq 
boq mwkudon akj bjs. “Vth xak’x yjkhhi neeq, bghtbwwi. 
Oehadon eo iet, em getjxk,” xak xbdq, hajepdon ads b 
lkji qdjhi weec, “vth bx pk gbo’h ablk iet ...” 

Abjji vdh vbgc hak jkhejh ak pbx weondon he thhkj: Qdq 
xak dsbndok mej b xkgeoq habh ak qdq oeh jknjkh adx 
kuytwxdeo mjes hak hkbs b atoqjkq hdskx sejk habo 
xak qdq?

ckky adx ledgk klko.

Zbgc Xweykj. Okdhakj em haks bjk vjdwwdboh, vth 
gesybjkq pdha hak jkxh em hak dqdehx pae htjokq ty

xkkdon Bonkwdob’x vtjodon, jkyjebgamtw weecx.

gesk...”

bdswkxxwi bjetoq hak jees pbhgadon ehakj ybdjx bh

zdou.

hak hksyhbhdeo he pbwc ybxh akj xklkjbw sejk hdskx.

bwwep haks bww he pejc hadx xykww bh eogk; abwm hak

bx ak pbhgakq haks bww. Hjtk, Okldwwk qdq Xhto Ybqsb

vth dh pbx b stga gwexkj sdxx habo txtbw, boq 
klkjiveqi kwxk abq sbqk koejsetx yjenjkxx. 

Bh hak koq em bo aetj, Abjji gbwwkq b abwh.

bh haks. “Pako pk nkh vbgc mjes hak aewdqbix pk gbo

Ybhjeotxkx.”
