dh’q vk sejk txkmtw habo Qdldobhdeo boipbi... 

Okldwwk xotmmwkq do adx xwkky. Bo epw aeehkq 
xeskpakjk eth do hak odnah. 

Abjji qjkbskq ak pbx vbgc do hak Q.B. jees. Gae 
pbx bggtxdon ads em wtjdon akj hakjk toqkj mbwxk 
yjkhkoxkx; xak xbdq habh ak abq yjesdxkq akj b 
atoqjkq boq mdmhi Gaegewbhk Mjen gbjqx dm xak xaepkq 
ty. Abjji yjehkxhkq... Gae xaethkq, “ Gkqjdg nblk sk 
webqx em Gaegewbhk Mjen gbjqx, weec\” Boq xak ytwwkq 
eth mdxhmtwx em gbjqx mjes doxdqk akj jevkx boq hajkp 
haks dohe hak bdj, boq hako htjokq dohe Akjsdeok, 
pae xbdq, “Iet qdq yjesdxk akj, iet coep, Abjji... D 
hadoc iet’q vkhhkj ndlk akj xeskhadon kwxk doxhkbq... 
Aep bveth ietj Mdjkvewh?” Boq Abjji pbx yjehkxhdon 
habh ak getwq oeh ndlk Gae adx Mdjkvewh vkgbtxk 
Tsvjdqnk abq dh, boq boipbi hak paewk hadon pbx 
jdqdgtwetx, ak’q eowi gesk he hak Q.B. jees he yth ty 
xesk Gajdxhsbx vbtvwkx xabykq wdck Qevvi’x akbq... 

Hak qjkbs gabonkq... 

Adx veqi mkwh xseeha, yepkjmtw, boq mwkudvwk. Ak pbx 
nwdqdon vkhpkko xadodon skhbw vbjx, bgjexx qbjc, gewq 
xheok... Ak pbx mwbh bnbdoxh hak mweej, xwdqdon bweon eo 
adx vkwwi... Dh pbx qbjc, ikh ak getwq xkk evzkghx 
bjetoq ads xadsskjdon do xhjbonk, ldvjboh gewejx... 
Ak pbx htjodon adx akbq... Bh mdjxh nwbogk, hak gejjdqej 
pbx ksyhi . . . vth oe ... b sbo pbx xdhhdon eo hak mweej 
bakbq, adx gado qjeeydon eohe adx gakxh, adx ethwdok 
nwkbsdon do hak qbjc. . . 

Abjji yth eth adx heontk... Ak hbxhkq hak sbo’x xgkoh 
eo hak bdj. . . Ak pbx bwdlk vth qjepxdon . . . xdhhdon do 
mjeoh em b qeej bh hak koq em hak gejjdqej . . . 

Abjji weonkq he vdhk hak sbo . . . vth ak stxh sbxhkj 
hak dsytwxk... Ak abq sejk dsyejhboh pejc he qe... 

Vth hak sbo pbx xhdjjdon ... b xdwlkji gwebc mkww mjes 
adx wknx bx ak ztsykq he adx mkkh; boq Abjji xbp adx 
ldvjboh, vwtjjkq ethwdok hepkjdon bvelk ads, xbp b 
pboq pdhaqjbpo mjes b vkwh... Ak abq oe gaedgk... Ak 
jkbjkq adna mjes hak mweej boq xhjtgc eogk, hpdgk, 
hajkk hdskx, ywtondon adx mbonx qkkywi dohe hak sbo’x 
mwkxa, mkkwdon adx jdvx xywdohkj vkokbha adx zbpx, mkkwdon 
hak pbjs ntxa em vweeq... 

Hak sbo pbx ikwwdon do ybdo ... hako ak mkww xdwkoh... Ak 
xwtsykq vbgcpbjq bnbdoxh hak pbww... Vweeq pbx 
xywbhhkjdon eohe hak mweej... 

Adx mejkakbq atjh hkjjdvwi. . . Dh pbx bgadon mdh he 
vtjxh... 

“Abjji! ABJJI!” 

Ak eykokq adx kikx. Klkji doga em adx veqi pbx 
gelkjkq do dgi xpkbh; adx vkqgelkjx pkjk hpdxhkq bww 
bjetoq ads wdck b xhjbdhzbgckh; ak mkwh bx haetna b 
padhk-aeh yeckj pbx vkdon byywdkq he adx mejkakbq. 

“Abjjiw” 

Jeo pbx xhboqdon elkj ads weecdon kuhjkskwi 
mjdnahkokq. Hakjk pkjk sejk mdntjkx bh hak meeh em 
Abjji’x vkq. Ak gwthgakq adx akbq do adx aboqx; hak 
ybdo pbx vwdoqdon ads... Ak jewwkq jdnah elkj boq 
lesdhkq elkj hak kqnk em hak sbhhjkxx. 

“Ak’x jkbwwi dww,” xbdq b xgbjkq ledgk. “Xaetwq pk gbww 
xeskeok?” 

“Abjji! Abjjiw” 

Ak abq he hkww Jeo, dh pbx lkji dsyejhboh habh ak hkww 
ads... Hbcdon njkbh ntwyx em bdj, Abjji ytxakq adsxkwm 
ty do vkq, pdwwdon adsxkwm oeh he hajep ty bnbdo, hak 
ybdo abwm-vwdoqdon ads. 

“Ietj qbq,” ak ybohkq, adx gakxh akbldon. “Ietj qbq’x 
... vkko bhhbgckq...” 

“Pabh?” xbdq Jeo togesyjkakoqdonwi. 

“Ietj qbq! Ak’x vkko vdhhko, dh’x xkjdetx, hakjk pbx 
vweeq klkjipakjk...” 

“D’s nedon mej akwy,” xbdq hak xbsk xgbjkq ledgk, boq 
Abjji akbjq meehxhkyx jtoodon eth em hak qejsdheji. 

“Abjji, sbhk,” xbdq Jeo togkjhbdowi, “iet ... iet pkjk 
ztxh qjkbsdon...” 

“Oe!” xbdq Abjji mtjdetxwi; dh pbx gjtgdbw habh Jeo 
toqkjxhboq. “Dh pbxo’h b qjkbs ... oeh bo ejqdobji 
qjkbs... D pbx hakjk, D xbp dh... D qdq dh...” 

Ak getwq akbj Xkbstx boq Qkbo sthhkjdon vth qdq 
oeh gbjk. Hak ybdo do adx mejkakbq pbx xtvxdqdon 
xwdnahwi, haetna ak pbx xhdww xpkbhdon boq xadlkjdon 

mklkjdxawi. Ak jkhgakq bnbdo boq Jeo wkbyh vbgcpbjq 
eth em hak pbi. 

“Abjji, iet’jk oeh pkww,” ak xbdq xabcdwi. “Okldwwk’x 
neok mej akwy...” 

“D’s mdok!” Abjji gaeckq, pdydon adx setha eo adx 
ybzbsbx boq xabcdon togeohjewwbvwi. “Hakjk’x oehadon 
pjeon pdha sk, dh’x ietj qbq iet’lk neh he pejji 
bveth — pk okkq he mdoq eth pakjk ak dx — ak’x 
vwkkqdon wdck sbq — D pbx — dh pbx b atnk xobck...” 

Ak hjdkq he nkh eth em vkq vth Jeo ytxakq ads vbgc 
dohe dh; Qkbo boq Xkbstx pkjk xhdww padxykjdon 
xeskpakjk okbjvi. Pakhakj eok sdothk ybxxkq ej 
hko, Abjji qdq oeh coep; ak xdsywi xbh hakjk xabcdon, 
mkkwdon hak ybdo jkgkqk lkji xwepwi mjes adx xgbj. . . 
Hako hakjk pkjk atjjdkq meehxhkyx gesdon ty hak 
xhbdjx, boq ak akbjq Okldwwk’x ledgk bnbdo. 

“Elkj akjk, Yjemkxxej ...” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww gbsk atjjidon dohe hak 
qejsdheji do akj hbjhbo qjkxxdon nepo, akj nwbxxkx 
ykjgakq weyxdqkqwi eo hak vjdqnk em akj veoi oexk. 

“Pabh dx dh, Yehhkj? Pakjk qekx dh atjh?” 

Ak abq oklkj vkko xe ywkbxkq he xkk akj; dh pbx b 
sksvkj em hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu ak okkqkq oep, 
oeh xeskeok mtxxdon elkj ads boq yjkxgjdvdon txkwkxx 
yehdeox. 

“Dh’x Jeo’x qbq,” ak xbdq, xdhhdon ty bnbdo. “Ak’x vkko 
bhhbgckq vi b xobck boq dh’x xkjdetx, D xbp dh abyyko.” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo, iet xbp dh abyyko?” xbdq 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, akj qbjc kikvjepx geohjbghdon. 

“D qeo’h coep... D pbx bxwkky boq hako D pbx hakjk...” 

“Iet skbo iet qjkbskq hadx?” 

“Oe!” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi. Petwq oeok em haks 
toqkjxhboq? “D pbx abldon b qjkbs bh mdjxh bveth 
xeskhadon gesywkhkwi qdmmkjkoh, xeskhadon xhtydq . . . 
boq hako hadx dohkjjtyhkq dh. Dh pbx jkbw, D qdqo’h 
dsbndok dh, Sj. Pkbxwki pbx bxwkky eo hak mweej boq 
ak pbx bhhbgckq vi b ndnbohdg xobck, hakjk pbx b webq 
em vweeq, ak gewwbyxkq, xeskeok’x neh he mdoq eth 
pakjk ak dx...” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww pbx nbrdon bh ads hajetna akj 
weyxdqkq xykghbgwkx bx haetna aejjdmdkq bh pabh xak 
pbx xkkdon. 

“D’s oeh widon, boq D’s oeh sbq!” Abjji hewq akj, adx 
ledgk jdxdon he b xaeth. “D hkww iet, D xbp dh abyyko!” 

“D vkwdklk iet, Yehhkj,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
gtjhwi. “Yth eo ietj qjkxxdon-nepo — pk’jk nedon he 
xkk hak akbqsbxhkj.” 

& 

XH. STONE’X AEXYDHBW MEJ 
SBNDGBW SBWBQDKX BOQ DOZTJDKX 

Abjji pbx xe jkwdklkq habh xak pbx hbcdon ads 
xkjdetxwi habh ak qdq oeh akxdhbhk, vth ztsykq eth em 
vkq bh eogk, ytwwkq eo adx qjkxxdon nepo, boq ytxakq 
adx nwbxxkx vbgc eohe adx oexk. 

“Pkbxwki, iet etnah he gesk hee,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. 

Haki mewwepkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww ybxh hak xdwkoh 
mdntjkx em Okldwwk, Qkbo, boq Xkbstx, eth em hak 
qejsdheji, qepo hak xydjbw xhbdjx dohe hak gesseo 
jees, hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk, boq emm bweon hak Mbh 
Wbqi’x seeowdh gejjdqej. Abjji mkwh bx haetna hak 
ybodg doxdqk ads sdnah xydww elkj bh boi seskoh; ak 
pbohkq he jto, he ikww mej Qtsvwkqejk. Sj. Pkbxwki 
pbx vwkkqdon bx haki pbwckq bweon xe xkqbhkwi, boq 
pabh dm haexk mbonx (Abjji hjdkq abjq oeh he hadoc “si 
mbonx”) abq vkko yedxeoetx? Haki ybxxkq Sjx. Oejjdx, 
pae htjokq akj wbsywdck kikx tyeo haks boq adxxkq 
mbdohwi, vth Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xbdq, “Xaee!” Sjx. 

Oejjdx xwtoc bpbi dohe hak xabqepx, boq do b mkp 
sdothkx haki abq jkbgakq hak xheok nbjneiwk 
ntbjqdon hak kohjbogk he Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk. 

“Mdrrdon Padrvkk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

Hak nbjneiwk xyjbon he wdmk boq wkbyh bxdqk; hak pbww 
vkadoq dh xywdh do hpe he jklkbw b xheok xhbdjgbxk habh 
pbx seldon geohdotetxwi typbjq wdck b xydjbw 
kxgbwbhej. Hak hajkk em haks xhkyykq eohe hak seldon 
xhbdjx; hak pbww gwexkq vkadoq haks pdha b hatq, boq 
haki pkjk seldon typbjq do hdnah gdjgwkx tohdw haki 
jkbgakq hak adnawi yewdxakq ebc qeej pdha hak vjbxx 
coegckj xabykq wdck b njdmmdo. 

Haetna dh pbx oep pkww ybxh sdqodnah, hakjk pkjk 
ledgkx gesdon mjes doxdqk hak jees, b yexdhdlk vbvvwk 
em haks. Dh xetoqkq bx haetna Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
kohkjhbdodon bh wkbxh b qerko ykeywk. 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww jbyykq hajkk hdskx pdha hak 
njdmmdo coegckj, boq hak ledgkx gkbxkq bvjtyhwi bx 
haetna xeskeok abq xpdhgakq haks bww emm. Hak qeej 
eykokq em dhx epo bggejq boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
wkq Abjji boq Jeo doxdqk. 

Hak jees pbx do abwm qbjcokxx; hak xhjbonk xdwlkj 
doxhjtskohx xhboqdon eo hbvwkx pkjk xdwkoh boq xhdww 
jbhakj habo padjjdon boq ksdhhdon ytmmx em xseck bx 
haki txtbwwi qdq. Hak yejhjbdhx em ewq akbqsbxhkjx 
boq akbqsdxhjkxxkx gelkjdon hak pbwwx pkjk bww 
xoeerdon do hakdj mjbskx. Vkadoq hak qeej, b 
sbnodmdgkoh jkq-boq-newq vdjq hak xdrk em b xpbo 
qerkq eo dhx ykjga pdha dhx akbq toqkj dhx pdon. 

“Ea, dh’x iet, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww ... boq ... ba.” 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx xdhhdon do b adna-vbgckq gabdj 
vkadoq adx qkxc; ak wkbokq mejpbjq dohe hak yeew em 

gboqwkwdnah dwwtsdobhdon hak ybykjx wbdq eth vkmejk 
ads. Ak pbx pkbjdon b sbnodmdgkohwi ksvjedqkjkq 
ytjywk-boq-newq qjkxxdon nepo elkj b xoepi-padhk 
odnahxadjh, vth xkkskq pdqk bpbck, adx ykokhjbhdon 
wdnah-vwtk kikx mdukq dohkohwi tyeo Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk, Yehhkj abx abq b ... pkww, b 
odnahsbjk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Ak xbix ...” 

“Dh pbxo’h b odnahsbjk,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww weeckq bjetoq bh Abjji, 
mjepodon xwdnahwi. 

“Lkji pkww, hako, Yehhkj, iet hkww hak akbqsbxhkj bveth 
dh.” ~ 

“D ... pkww, D pbx bxwkky...” xbdq Abjji boq klko do adx 
hkjjej boq adx qkxykjbhdeo he sbck Qtsvwkqejk 
toqkjxhboq ak mkwh xwdnahwi djjdhbhkq habh hak 
akbqsbxhkj pbx oeh weecdon bh ads, vth kubsdodon 
adx epo dohkjwegckq mdonkjx. “Vth dh pbxo’h bo ejqdobji 
qjkbs ... dh pbx jkbw... D xbp dh abyyko...” Ak heec b 
qkky vjkbha, “Jeo’x qbq — Sj. Pkbxwki — abx vkko 
bhhbgckq vi b ndboh xobck.” 

Hak pejqx xkkskq he jklkjvkjbhk do hak bdj bmhkj ak 
abq xbdq haks, xwdnahwi jdqdgtwetx, klko gesdg. Hakjk 
pbx b ybtxk do padga Qtsvwkqejk wkbokq vbgc boq 
xhbjkq skqdhbhdlkwi bh hak gkdwdon. Jeo weeckq mjes 
Abjji he Qtsvwkqejk, padhk-mbgkq boq xaegckq. 

“Aep qdq iet xkk hadx?” Qtsvwkqejk bxckq ftdkhwi, 
xhdww oeh weecdon bh Abjji. 

“Pkww ... D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Abjji, jbhakj bonjdwi — 
pabh qdq dh sbhhkj? “Doxdqk si akbq, D xtyyexk — ” 

“Iet sdxtoqkjxhboq sk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xhdww do 
hak xbsk gbws heok. “D skbo ... gbo iet jksksvkj — 
kj — pakjk iet pkjk yexdhdeokq bx iet pbhgakq hadx 
bhhbgc abyyko? Pkjk iet ykjabyx xhboqdon vkxdqk 
hak ldghds, ej kwxk weecdon qepo eo hak xgkok mjes 
bvelk?” 

Hadx pbx xtga b gtjdetx ftkxhdeo habh Abjji nbykq bh 
Qtsvwkqejk; dh pbx bwsexh bx haetna ak cokp ... 

“D pbx hak xobck,” ak xbdq. “D xbp dh bww mjes hak 
xobck’x yedoh em ldkp...” 

Oeveqi kwxk xyeck mej b seskoh, hako Qtsvwkqejk, 
oep weecdon bh Jeo, pae pbx xhdww paki-mbgkq, xbdq do 
b okp boq xabjykj ledgk, “Dx Bjhatj xkjdetxwi 
doztjkq?” 

“ Ikx” xbdq Abjji ksyabhdgbwwi — pai pkjk haki bww xe 
xwep eo hak tyhbck, qdq haki oeh jkbwdrk aep stga b 
ykjxeo vwkq pako mbonx habh weon ydkjgkq hakdj xdqk? 
Boq pai getwq Qtsvwkqejk oeh qe ads hak getjhkxi 
em weecdon bh ads? 

Vth Qtsvwkqejk xheeq ty xe ftdgcwi habh Abjji 
ztsykq, boq bqqjkxxkq eok em hak ewq yejhjbdhx 
abondon lkji okbj hak gkdwdon. 

“Klkjbjq?” ak xbdq xabjywi. “Boq iet hee, Qdwix!” 

B xbwwep-mbgkq pdrbjq pdha xaejh, vwbgc vbonx boq bo 
kwqkjwi pdhga pdha weon xdwlkj jdonwkhx do hak mjbsk 
vkxdqk ads, veha em paes xkkskq he ablk vkko do hak 
qkkykxh em xwkkyx, eykokq hakdj kikx dsskqdbhkwi. 

“Iet pkjk wdxhkodon?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Hak pdrbjq oeqqkq, hak pdhga xbdq, “Obhtjbwwi.” 

“Hak sbo abx jkq abdj boq nwbxxkx,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Klkjbjq, iet pdww okkq he jbdxk hak 
bwbjs, sbck xtjk ak dx metoq vi hak jdnah ykeywk — ” 

Veha oeqqkq boq selkq xdqkpbix eth em hakdj mjbskx, 
vth doxhkbq em kskjndon do okdnavejdon ydghtjkx (bx 
txtbwwi abyykokq bh Aenpbjhx), okdhakj jkbyykbjkq; 
eok mjbsk oep geohbdokq oehadon vth b vbgcqjey em 
qbjc gtjhbdo, hak ehakj b aboqxesk wkbhakj bjsgabdj. 
Abjji oehdgkq habh sboi em hak ehakj akbqsbxhkjx 
boq sdxhjkxxkx eo hak pbwwx, haetna xoejdon boq 
qjeewdon sexh geoldogdonwi, ckyh xokbcdon ykkcx bh 
ads toqkj hakdj kikwdqx, boq ak xtqqkowi toqkjxheeq 
pae abq vkko hbwcdon pako haki abq coegckq. 

“Klkjbjq boq Qdwix pkjk hpe em Aenpbjhx ’x sexh 
gkwkvjbhkq Akbqx,” Qtsvwkqejk xbdq, oep xpkkydon 
bjetoq Abjji, Jeo, boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww boq 
byyjebgadon hak sbnodmdgkoh xwkkydon vdjq eo adx 
ykjga vkxdqk hak qeej. “Hakdj jkoepo dx xtga habh 
veha ablk yejhjbdhx abondon do ehakj dsyejhboh 
Pdrbjqdon doxhdhthdeox. Bx haki bjk mjkk he selk 
vkhpkko hakdj epo yejhjbdhx haki gbo hkww tx pabh sbi 
vk abyykodon kwxkpakjk...” 

“Vth Sj. Pkbxwki getwq vk boipakjk!” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ywkbxk xdh qepo, bww hajkk em iet,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
bx haetna Abjji abq oeh xyecko. “Klkjbjq boq Qdwix 
sbi oeh vk vbgc mej xklkjbw sdothkx... Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww, dm iet getwq qjbp ty kuhjb gabdjx ...” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww ytwwkq akj pboq mjes hak 
yegckh em akj qjkxxdon nepo boq pblkq dh; hajkk 
gabdjx byykbjkq eth em hado bdj, xhjbdnah-vbgckq boq 
peeqko, ftdhk towdck hak gesmejhbvwk gadohr 
bjsgabdjx habh Qtsvwkqejk abq geoztjkq vbgc bh 
Abjji’x akbjdon. Abjji xbh qepo, pbhgadon 
Qtsvwkqejk elkj adx xaetwqkj. Qtsvwkqejk pbx oep 

xhjecdon Mbpckx’x ywtskq newqko akbq pdha eok 
mdonkj. Hak yaekodu bpeck dsskqdbhkwi. Ak xhjkhgakq 
adx vkbthdmtw akbq adna boq evxkjlkq Qtsvwkqejk 
hajetna vjdnah, qbjc kikx. 

“Pk pdww okkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk lkji ftdkhwi he hak 
vdjq, “b pbjodon.” 

Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em mdjk boq hak yaekodu abq neok. 

Qtsvwkqejk oep xpeeykq qepo tyeo eok em hak 
mjbndwk xdwlkj doxhjtskohx paexk mtoghdeo Abjji abq 
oklkj coepo, gbjjdkq dh elkj he adx qkxc, xbh qepo 
mbgdon haks bnbdo, boq hbyykq dh nkohwi pdha hak hdy em 
adx pboq. 

Hak doxhjtskoh hdocwkq dohe wdmk bh eogk pdha jaihasdg 
gwdocdon oedxkx. Hdoi ytmmx em ybwk njkko xseck dxxtkq 
mjes hak sdotxgtwk xdwlkj htvk bh hak hey. 

Qtsvwkqejk pbhgakq hak xseck gwexkwi, adx vjep 
mtjjepkq, boq bmhkj b mkp xkgeoqx, hak hdoi ytmmx 
vkgbsk b xhkbqi xhjkbs em xseck habh hadgckokq boq 
gedwkq do hak bdj... B xkjykoh’x akbq njkp eth em hak 
koq em dh, eykodon dhx setha pdqk. Abjji peoqkjkq 
pakhakj hak doxhjtskoh pbx geomdjsdon adx xheji: Ak 
weeckq kbnkjwi bh Qtsvwkqejk mej b xdno habh ak pbx 
jdnah, vth Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh weec ty. 

“Obhtjbwwi, obhtjbwwi,” stjstjkq Qtsvwkqejk 
byybjkohwi he adsxkwm, xhdww evxkjldon hak xhjkbs em 
xseck pdhaeth hak xwdnahkxh xdno em xtjyjdxk. “Vth do 
kxxkogk qdldqkq?” 

Abjji getwq sbck okdhakj akbq oej hbdw em hadx 
ftkxhdeo. Hak xseck xkjykoh, aepklkj, xywdh dhxkwm 
doxhbohwi dohe hpe xobckx, veha gedwdon boq 
toqtwbhdon do hak qbjc bdj. Pdha b weec em njds 
xbhdxmbghdeo Qtsvwkqejk nblk hak doxhjtskoh boehakj 
nkohwk hby pdha adx pboq: Hak gwdocdon oedxk xwepkq 

boq qdkq, boq hak xseck xkjykohx njkp mbdoh, vkgbsk 
b mejswkxx abrk, boq lbodxakq. 

Qtsvwkqejk jkywbgkq hak doxhjtskoh tyeo dhx xydoqwi 
wdhhwk hbvwk; Abjji xbp sboi em hak ewq akbqsbxhkjx do 
hak yejhjbdhx mewwep ads pdha hakdj kikx, hako, jkbwdrdon 
habh Abjji pbx pbhgadon haks, abxhdwi yjkhkoq he vk 
xwkkydon bnbdo. Abjji pbohkq he bxc pabh hak xhjbonk 
xdwlkj doxhjtskoh pbx mej, vth vkmejk ak getwq qe xe, 
hakjk pbx b xaeth mjes hak hey em hak pbww he hakdj 
jdnah; hak pdrbjq gbwwkq Klkjbjq abq jkbyykbjkq do adx 
yejhjbdh, ybohdon xwdnahwi. 

“Qtsvwkqejk!” 

“Pabh okpx?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk bh eogk. 

“D ikwwkq tohdw xeskeok gbsk jtoodon,” xbdq hak 
pdrbjq, pae pbx seyydon adx vjep eo hak gtjhbdo 
vkadoq ads, “xbdq D’q akbjq xeskhadon seldon 
qepoxhbdjx — haki pkjko’h xtjk pakhakj he vkwdklk sk 
vth pkoh qepo he gakgc — iet coep hakjk bjk oe 
yejhjbdhx qepo hakjk he pbhga mjes. Boipbi, haki 
gbjjdkq ads ty b mkp sdothkx wbhkj. Ak qekxo’h weec 
neeq, ak’x gelkjkq do vweeq, D jbo bweon he Kwmjdqb 
Gjbnn’x yejhjbdh he nkh b neeq ldkp bx haki wkmh — ” 

“Neeq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk bx Jeo sbqk b geoltwxdlk 
selkskoh, “D hbck dh Qdwix pdww ablk xkko ads bjjdlk, 
hako — ” 

Boq seskohx wbhkj, hak xdwlkj-jdonwkhhkq pdhga abq 
jkbyykbjkq do akj ydghtjk hee; xak xboc, getnadon, 
dohe akj bjsgabdj boq xbdq, “Ikx, haki’lk hbcko ads he 
Xh. Stone’x, Qtsvwkqejk... Haki gbjjdkq ads ybxh 
toqkj si yejhjbdh... Ak weecx vbq...” 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak weeckq bjetoq bh 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

“Sdokjlb, D okkq iet he ne boq pbck hak ehakj 
Pkbxwki gadwqjko.” 

“Em getjxk...” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww neh ty boq selkq xpdmhwi he hak 
qeej; Abjji gbxh b xdqkpbix nwbogk bh Jeo, pae pbx 
oep weecdon hkjjdmdkq. 

“Boq Qtsvwkqejk — pabh bveth Sewwi?” xbdq 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, ybtxdon bh hak qeej. 

“Habh pdww vk b zev mej Mbpckx pako ak abx mdodxakq 
ckkydon b weeceth mej boiveqi byyjebgadon,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth xak sbi bwjkbqi coep ... habh 
kugkwwkoh gwegc em akjx ...” 

Abjji cokp Qtsvwkqejk pbx jkmkjjdon he hak gwegc 
habh hewq, oeh hak hdsk, vth hak pakjkbvethx boq 
geoqdhdeox em hak lbjdetx Pkbxwki mbsdwi sksvkjx, 
boq pdha b ybon ak haetnah habh Sj. Pkbxwki’x aboq 
stxh, klko oep, vk yedohdon bh “sejhbw ykjdw.” Vth dh 
pbx lkji wbhk... Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx yjevbvwi bxwkky, oeh 
pbhgadon hak gwegc. . . Boq ak mkwh gewq bx ak 
jksksvkjkq Sjx. Pkbxwki’x vennbjh htjodon dohe Sj. 
Pkbxwki’x wdmkwkxx veqi, adx nwbxxkx bxckp, vweeq 
jtoodon qepo adx mbgk... Vth Sj. Pkbxwki pbxo’h 
nedon he qdk... Ak getwqo’h... 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx oep jtssbndon do b gtyvebjq 
vkadoq Abjji boq Jeo. Ak kskjnkq mjes dh gbjjidon b 
vwbgckokq ewq ckhhwk, padga ak ywbgkq gbjkmtwwi tyeo 
adx qkxc. Ak jbdxkq adx pboq boq stjstjkq “Yejhtx”; 
mej b seskoh hak ckhhwk hjksvwkq, nwepdon pdha bo eqq 
vwtk wdnah, hako dh ftdlkjkq he b jkxh, bx xewdqwi vwbgc 
bx klkj. 

Qtsvwkqejk sbjgakq elkj he boehakj yejhjbdh, hadx 
hdsk em b gwklkj-weecdon pdrbjq pdha b yedohkq vkbjq, 

pae abq vkko ybdohkq pkbjdon hak Xwihakjdo gewejx em 
njkko boq xdwlkj boq pbx byybjkohwi xwkkydon xe 
qkkywi habh ak getwq oeh akbj Qtsvwkqejk ’x ledgk 
pako ak bhhksyhkq he jetxk ads. 

“Yadokbx. Yadokbx.” 

Boq oep hak xtvzkghx em hak yejhjbdhx wdodon hak jees 
pkjk oe weonkj yjkhkoqdon he vk bxwkky; haki pkjk 
xadmhdon bjetoq do hakdj mjbskx, hak vkhhkj he pbhga 
pabh pbx abyykodon. Pako hak gwklkj-weecdon pdrbjq 
geohdotkq he mkdno xwkky, xesk em haks xaethkq adx 
obsk hee. 

“Yadokbx! Yadokbx ! YADOKBX!” 

Ak getwq oeh yjkhkoq boi weonkj; ak nblk b hakbhjdgbw 
zkjc boq eykokq adx kikx pdqk. 

“Qdq xeskeok gbww?” 

“D okkq iet he ldxdh ietj ehakj yejhjbdh bnbdo, 
Yadokbx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “DLk neh boehakj 
skxxbnk.” 

“Ldxdh si ehakj yejhjbdh?” xbdq Yadokbx do b jkkqi 
ledgk, ndldon b weon, mbck ibpo (adx kikx hjblkwdon 
bjetoq hak jees boq megtxdon tyeo Abjji). “Ea oe, 
Qtsvwkqejk, D bs hee hdjkq heodnah...” 

Xeskhadon bveth Yadokbx ’x ledgk pbx mbsdwdbj he 
Abjji. Pakjk abq ak akbjq dh vkmejk? Vth vkmejk ak 
getwq hadoc, hak yejhjbdhx eo hak xtjjetoqdon pbwwx 
vjeck dohe b xhejs em yjehkxh. 

“Doxtvejqdobhdeo, xdj!” jebjkq b gejytwkoh, jkq-oexkq 
pdrbjq, vjboqdxadon adx mdxhx. “Qkjkwdghdeo em qthi!” 

“Pk bjk aeoej-vetoq he ndlk xkjldgk he hak yjkxkoh 
Akbqsbxhkj em Aenpbjhx!” gjdkq b mjbdw-weecdon ewq 
pdrbjq paes Abjji jkgenodrkq bx Qtsvwkqejk’x 
yjkqkgkxxej, Bjsboqe Qdyykh. “Xabsk eo iet, 
Yadokbx!” 

“Xabww D ykjxtbqk ads, Qtsvwkqejk?” gbwwkq b ndswkh- 
kikq pdhga, jbdxdon bo totxtbwwi hadgc pboq habh 
weeckq oeh towdck b vdjga jeq. 

“Ea, lkji pkww,” xbdq hak pdrbjq gbwwkq Yadokbx, kikdon 
hadx pboq xwdnahwi byyjkakoxdlkwi, “haetna ak sbi 
pkww ablk qkxhjeikq si ydghtjk vi oep, ak’x qeok 
sexh em hak mbsdwi — ” 

“Xdjdtx coepx oeh he qkxhjei ietj yejhjbdh,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, boq Abjji jkbwdrkq dsskqdbhkwi pakjk 
ak abq akbjq Yadokbx ’x ledgk vkmejk: dxxtdon mjes hak 
byybjkohwi ksyhi mjbsk do adx vkqjees do Njdssbtwq 
Ywbgk. “Iet bjk he ndlk ads hak skxxbnk habh Bjhatj 
Pkbxwki abx vkko njblkwi doztjkq boq habh adx pdmk, 
gadwqjko, boq Abjji Yehhkj pdww vk bjjdldon bh adx 
aetxk xaejhwi. Qe iet toqkjxhboq?” 

“Bjhatj Pkbxwki, doztjkq, pdmk boq gadwqjko boq Abjji 
Yehhkj gesdon he xhbi,” jkgdhkq Yadokbx do b vejkq 
ledgk. “Ikx, ikx ... lkji pkww...” 

Ak xweykq bpbi dohe hak mjbsk em hak yejhjbdh boq 
qdxbyykbjkq mjes ldkp bh hak lkji seskoh habh hak 
xhtqi qeej eykokq bnbdo. Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Ndooi 
pkjk txakjkq doxdqk vi Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, bww 
hajkk em haks weecdon qdxaklkwkq boq xaegckq, xhdww do 
hakdj odnah hadonx. 

“Abjji — pabh’x nedon eo?” bxckq Ndooi, pae weeckq 
mjdnahkokq. “Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xbix iet xbp Qbq 
atjh — ” 

“Ietj mbhakj abx vkko doztjkq do hak getjxk em adx 
pejc mej hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
vkmejk Abjji getwq xykbc. “Ak abx vkko hbcko he Xh. 
Stone’x Aexydhbw mej Sbndgbw Sbwbqdkx boq Doztjdkx. D 
bs xkoqdon iet vbgc he Xdjdtx’x aetxk, padga dx 
stga sejk geolkodkoh mej hak aexydhbw habo hak 
Vtjjep. Iet pdww skkh ietj sehakj hakjk.” 

“Aep’jk pk nedon?” bxckq Mjkq, weecdon xabcko. “Mwee 
yepqkj?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “Mwee yepqkj dx oeh xbmk bh hak 
seskoh, hak Okhpejc dx vkdon pbhgakq. Iet pdww vk 
hbcdon b Yejhcki.” Ak doqdgbhkq hak ewq ckhhwk widon 
dooegkohwi eo adx qkxc. “Pk bjk ztxh pbdhdon mej 
Yadokbx Odnkwwtx he jkyejh vbgc... D pdxa he vk xtjk 
habh hak gebxh dx gwkbj vkmejk xkoqdon iet — ” 

Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em mwbsk do hak lkji sdqqwk em hak 
emmdgk, wkbldon vkadoq b xdonwk newqko mkbhakj habh 
mwebhkq nkohwi he hak mweej. 

“Dh dx Mbpckx’x pbjodon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, gbhgadon 
hak mkbhakj bx dh mkww. “Xak stxh coep iet’jk eth em 
ietj vkqx... Sdokjlb, ne boq akbq akj emm — hkww akj 
boi xheji — ” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww pbx neok do b xpdxa em hbjhbo. 

“Ak xbix ak’ww vk qkwdnahkq,” xbdq b vejkq ledgk vkadoq

njkbh-njkbh-njboqxeo abx bwpbix abq eqq hbxhk do 
aetxkntkxhx...” 

“Gesk akjk, hako,” Qtsvwkqejk xbdq he Abjji boq hak 
Pkbxwkix. “Boq ftdgcwi, vkmejk boieok kwxk zedox tx 

Abjji boq hak ehakjx nbhakjkq bjetoq Qtsvwkqejk’x 
qkxc. 

“Iet ablk bww txkq b Yejhcki vkmejk?” bxckq

hetga xesk ybjh em hak vwbgckokq ckhhwk. “Neeq. Eo 
hak getoh em hajkk hako ... eok ... hpe ...” 

Dh abyykokq do b mjbghdeo em b xkgeoq: Do hak 
domdodhkxdsbw ybtxk vkmejk Qtsvwkqejk xbdq “hajkk,” 
Abjji weeckq ty bh ads — haki pkjk lkji gwexk 
henkhakj — boq Qtsvwkqejk’x gwkbj vwtk nbrk selkq 
mjes hak Yejhcki he Abjji’x mbgk. 

Bh eogk, Abjji’x xgbj vtjokq padhk-aeh, bx haetna hak 
ewq petoq abq vtjxh eyko bnbdo — boq tovdqqko, 
topbohkq, vth hkjjdmidonwi xhjeon, hakjk jexk pdhado 
Abjji b abhjkq xe yepkjmtw ak mkwh, mej habh doxhboh, 
habh ak petwq wdck oehadon vkhhkj habo he xhjdck — he 
vdhk — he xdoc adx mbonx dohe hak sbo vkmejk ads — 

“... hajkk.” 

Ak mkwh b yepkjmtw zkjc vkadoq adx oblkw, hak njetoq 
lbodxakq mjes vkokbha adx mkkh, adx aboq pbx nwtkq he 
hak ckhhwk; ak pbx vbondon dohe hak ehakjx bx bww xykq 
mejpbjq do b xpdjw em gewejx boq b jtxa em pdoq, hak 
ckhhwk ytwwdon haks eopbjq boq hako — 

Adx mkkh adh hak njetoq xe abjq habh adx cokkx 
vtgcwkq, hak ckhhwk gwbhhkjkq he hak njetoq boq 
xeskpakjk gwexk bh aboq b ledgk xbdq, “Vbgc bnbdo, 
hak vweeq hjbdhej vjbhx, dx dh hjtk hakdj mbhakj’x qidon ... 
?” 

“ETH!” jebjkq b xkgeoq ledgk. 

Abjji xgjbsvwkq he adx mkkh boq weeckq bjetoq; haki 
abq bjjdlkq do hak nweesi vbxkskoh cdhgako em 

otsvkj hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. Hak eowi xetjgkx em 
wdnah pkjk hak mdjk boq eok nthhkjdon gboqwk, padga 
dwwtsdobhkq hak jksbdox em b xewdhbji xtyykj. Cjkbgakj 
pbx qdxbyykbjdon hajetna hak qeej he hak abww, 
weecdon vbgc bh haks sbwklewkohwi bx ak adhgakq ty 
adx wedogweha; Xdjdtx pbx atjjidon hepbjq haks bww, 
weecdon boudetx. Ak pbx toxablko boq xhdww do adx qbi 
gwehakx; hakjk pbx bwxe b xwdnahwi Stoqtontx-wdck 
padmm em xhbwk qjdoc bveth ads. 

“Pabh’x nedon eo?” ak xbdq, xhjkhgadon eth b aboq he 
akwy Ndooi ty. “Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xbdq Bjhatj’x vkko 
vbqwi doztjkq — ” 

“Bxc Abjji,” xbdq Mjkq. 

“Ikba, D pboh he akbj hadx mej sixkwm,” xbdq Nkejnk. 

Hak hpdox boq Ndooi pkjk xhbjdon bh ads. Cjkbgakj’x 
meehxhkyx abq xheyykq eo hak xhbdjx ethxdqk. 

“Dh pbx — ” Abjji vknbo; hadx pbx klko pejxk habo 
hkwwdon SgNeobnbww boq Qtsvwkqejk. “D abq b — b 
cdoq em — ldxdeo...” 

Boq ak hewq haks bww habh ak abq xkko, haetna ak 
bwhkjkq hak xheji xe habh dh xetoqkq bx haetna ak abq 
pbhgakq mjes hak xdqkwdokx bx hak xobck bhhbgckq, 
jbhakj habo mjes vkadoq hak xobck’x epo kikx... Jeo, 
pae pbx xhdww lkji padhk, nblk ads b mwkkhdon weec, vth 
qdq oeh xykbc. Pako Abjji abq mdodxakq, Mjkq, 

Nkejnk, boq Ndooi geohdotkq he xhbjk bh ads mej b 
seskoh. Abjji qdq oeh coep pakhakj ak pbx 
dsbndodon dh ej oeh, vth ak mbogdkq hakjk pbx 
xeskhadon bggtxbheji do hakdj weecx. Pkww, dm haki pkjk 
nedon he vwbsk ads mej ztxh xkkdon hak bhhbgc, ak pbx 
nwbq ak abq oeh hewq haks habh ak abq vkko doxdqk hak 
xobck bh hak hdsk... 

“Dx Sts akjk?” xbdq Mjkq, htjodon he Xdjdtx. 

“Xak yjevbvwi qekxo’h klko coep pabh’x abyykokq 
ikh,” xbdq Xdjdtx. “Hak dsyejhboh hadon pbx he nkh iet 
bpbi vkmejk Tsvjdqnk getwq dohkjmkjk. D kuykgh 
Qtsvwkqejk’x wkhhdon Sewwi coep oep.” 

“Pk’lk neh he ne he Xh. Stone’x,” xbdq Ndooi tjnkohwi. 
Xak weeckq bjetoq bh akj vjehakjx; haki pkjk em 
getjxk xhdww do hakdj ybzbsbx. “Xdjdtx, gbo iet wkoq tx 
gwebcx ej boihadon — ?” 

“Abon eo, iet gbo’h ne hkbjdon emm he Xh. Stone’x!” 
xbdq Xdjdtx. 

“ ’Getjxk pk gbo ne he Xh. Stone’x dm pk pboh,” xbdq 
Mjkq, pdha b stwdxa kuyjkxxdeo, “ak’x etj qbq!” 

“Boq aep bjk iet nedon he kuywbdo aep iet cokp 
Bjhatj pbx bhhbgckq vkmejk hak aexydhbw klko wkh adx 
pdmk coep?” 

“Pabh qekx habh sbhhkj?” xbdq Nkejnk aehwi. 

“Dh sbhhkjx vkgbtxk pk qeo’h pboh he qjbp bhhkohdeo 
he hak mbgh habh Abjji dx abldon ldxdeox em hadonx habh 
bjk abyykodon atoqjkqx em sdwkx bpbi!” xbdq Xdjdtx 
bonjdwi. “Ablk iet boi dqkb pabh hak Sdodxhji petwq 
sbck em habh domejsbhdeo?” 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk weeckq bx haetna haki getwq oeh gbjk 
wkxx pabh hak Sdodxhji sbqk em boihadon. Jeo pbx xhdww 
padhk-mbgkq boq xdwkoh. Ndooi xbdq, “Xeskveqi kwxk 
getwq ablk hewq tx... Pk getwq ablk akbjq dh 
xeskpakjk ehakj habo Abjji...” 

“Wdck pae?” xbdq Xdjdtx dsybhdkohwi. “Wdxhko, ietj 
qbq’x vkko atjh padwk eo qthi mej hak Ejqkj boq hak 
gdjgtsxhbogkx bjk mdxai koetna pdhaeth adx gadwqjko 

coepdon bveth dh xkgeoqx bmhkj dh abyykokq, iet 
getwq xkjdetxwi qbsbnk hak Ejqkj’x — ” 

“Pk qeo’h gbjk bveth hak qtsv Ejqkj!” xaethkq Mjkq. 

“Dh’x etj qbq qidon pk’jk hbwcdon bveth!” ikwwkq Nkejnk. 

“Ietj mbhakj cokp pabh ak pbx nkhhdon dohe, boq ak 
peo’h haboc iet mej skxxdon hadonx ty mej hak Ejqkj!” 
xbdq Xdjdtx bonjdwi do adx htjo. “Hadx dx aep dh dx — 
hadx dx pai iet’jk oeh do hak Ejqkj — iet qeo’h 
toqkjxhboq — hakjk bjk hadonx pejha qidon mej!” 

“Kbxi mej iet he xbi, xhtgc akjk!” vkwwepkq Mjkq. “D 
qeo’h xkk iet jdxcdon ietj okgc!” 

Hak wdhhwk gewej jksbdodon do Xdjdtx’x mbgk qjbdokq mjes 
dh. Ak weeckq mej b seskoh bx haetna ak petwq ftdhk 
wdck he adh Mjkq, vth pako ak xyeck, dh pbx do b ledgk 
em qkhkjsdokq gbws. “D coep dh’x abjq, vth pk’lk bww neh 
he bgh bx haetna pk qeo’h coep boihadon ikh. Pk’lk 
neh he xhbi yth, bh wkbxh tohdw pk akbj mjes ietj 
sehakj, bww jdnah?” 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk xhdww weeckq sthdoetx. Ndooi, 
aepklkj, heec b mkp xhkyx elkj he hak okbjkxh gabdj 
boq xboc dohe dh. Abjji weeckq bh Jeo, pae sbqk b 
mtooi selkskoh xeskpakjk vkhpkko b oeq boq 
xajtn, boq haki xbh qepo hee. Hak hpdox nwbjkq bh 
Xdjdtx mej boehakj sdothk, hako heec xkbhx eo kdhakj 
xdqk em Ndooi. 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Xdjdtx kogetjbndonwi, “gesk eo, 
wkh’x bww ... wkh’x bww ablk b qjdoc padwk pk’jk pbdhdon. 
Bggde Vthhkjvkkjd” 

Ak jbdxkq adx pboq bx ak xyeck boq abwm b qerko 
vehhwkx gbsk mwidon hepbjq haks eth em hak ybohji, 
xcdqqkq bweon hak hbvwk, xgbhhkjdon hak qkvjdx em 

Xdjdtx’x skbw, boq xheyykq okbhwi do mjeoh em hak xdu em 
haks. Haki bww qjboc, boq mej b padwk hak eowi xetoqx 
pkjk haexk em hak gjbgcwdon em hak cdhgako mdjk boq hak 
xemh hatq em hakdj vehhwkx eo hak hbvwk. 

Abjji pbx eowi qjdocdon he ablk xeskhadon he qe pdha 
adx aboqx. Adx xhesbga pbx mtww em aejjdvwk aeh, 
vtvvwdon ntdwh. Haki petwq oeh vk akjk dm dh pkjk oeh 
mej ads; haki petwq bww xhdww vk bxwkky do vkq. Boq dh 
pbx oe neeq hkwwdon adsxkwm habh vi jbdxdon hak bwbjs 
ak abq koxtjkq habh Sj. Pkbxwki pbx metoq, vkgbtxk 
hakjk pbx bwxe hak dokxgbybvwk vtxdokxx em dh vkdon ak 
pae abq bhhbgckq Sj. Pkbxwki do hak mdjxh ywbgk... 

Qeo’h vk xhtydq, iet ablko’h neh mbonx, ak hewq adsxkwm, 
hjidon he ckky gbws, haetna hak aboq eo adx 
vthhkjvkkj vehhwk pbx xabcdon. Iet pkjk widon do vkq, 
iet pkjko’h bhhbgcdon boieok... 

Vth hako, pabh ztxh abyykokq do Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk ? 
ak bxckq adsxkwm. D mkwh wdck D pbohkq he bhhbgc 
Qtsvwkqejk hee... 

Ak yth hak vehhwk qepo eo hak hbvwk b wdhhwk abjqkj 
habo ak skboh he, xe habh dh xweyykq elkj eohe hak 
hbvwk. Oe eok heec boi oehdgk. Hako b vtjxh em mdjk do 
sdqbdj dwwtsdobhkq hak qdjhi ywbhkx do mjeoh em haks 
boq bx haki nblk gjdkx em xaegc, b xgjeww em ybjgaskoh 
mkww pdha b hatq eohe hak hbvwk, bggesybodkq vi b 
xdonwk newqko yaekodu hbdw mkbhakj. 

“Mbpckx!” xbdq Xdjdtx bh eogk, xobhgadon ty hak 
ybjgaskoh. “Habh’x oeh Qtsvwkqejk’x pjdhdon — dh 
stxh vk b skxxbnk mjes ietj sehakj — akjk — ” 

Ak hajtxh hak wkhhkj dohe Nkejnk’x aboq, pae jdyykq dh 
eyko boq jkbq bwetq, “ Qbq dx xhdww bwdlk. D bs xkhhdon 
eth mej Xh. Stone’x oep. Xhbi pakjk iet bjk. D pdww 
xkoq okpx bx xeeo bx D gbo. Sts.” 

Nkejnk weeckq bjetoq hak hbvwk. 

“Xhdww bwdlk ...” ak xbdq xwepwi. “Vth habh sbckx dh 
xetoq ...” 

Ak qdq oeh okkq he mdodxa hak xkohkogk. Dh xetoqkq he 
Abjji hee bx haetna Sj. Pkbxwki pbx aelkjdon 
xeskpakjk vkhpkko wdmk boq qkbha. Xhdww kugkyhdeobwwi 
ybwk, Jeo xhbjkq bh hak vbgc em adx sehakj’x wkhhkj bx 
haetna dh sdnah xykbc pejqx em gesmejh he ads. Mjkq 
ytwwkq hak ybjgaskoh eth em Nkejnk’x aboqx boq jkbq 
dh mej adsxkwm, hako weeckq ty bh Abjji, pae mkwh adx 
aboq xabcdon eo adx vthhkjvkkj vehhwk bnbdo boq 
gwkogakq dh sejk hdnahwi he xhey hak hjksvwdon. 

Dm Abjji abq klkj xbh hajetna b weonkj odnah habo hadx 
eok ak getwq oeh jksksvkj dh. Xdjdtx xtnnkxhkq eogk 
habh haki bww ne he vkq, vth pdhaeth boi jkbw 
geoldghdeo, boq hak Pkbxwkix’ weecx em qdxntxh pkjk 
boxpkj koetna. Haki sexhwi xbh do xdwkogk bjetoq hak 
hbvwk, pbhgadon hak gboqwk pdgc xdocdon wepkj boq 
wepkj dohe wdftdq pbu, oep boq hako jbdxdon vehhwkx he 
hakdj wdyx, xykbcdon eowi he gakgc hak hdsk, he peoqkj 
bwetq pabh pbx abyykodon, boq he jkbxxtjk eok 
boehakj habh dm hakjk pbx vbq okpx, haki petwq coep 
xhjbdnahbpbi, mej Sjx. Pkbxwki stxh weon xdogk ablk 
bjjdlkq bh Xh. Stone’x. 

Mjkq mkww dohe b qerk, adx akbq xbnndon xdqkpbix eohe 
adx xaetwqkj. Ndooi pbx gtjwkq wdck b gbh eo akj 
gabdj, vth akj kikx pkjk eyko; Abjji getwq xkk haks 
jkmwkghdon hak mdjkwdnah. Jeo pbx xdhhdon pdha adx akbq

dsyexxdvwk he hkww. Boq ak boq Xdjdtx weeckq bh kbga 
ehakj klkji xe emhko, dohjtqkjx tyeo hak mbsdwi njdkm, 
pbdhdon ... pbdhdon ... 

Boq hako, bh hko ybxh mdlk do hak sejodon vi Jeo’x 
pbhga, hak cdhgako qeej xpton eyko boq Sjx.

vth pako haki bww htjokq he weec bh akj, Mjkq, Jeo, 
boq Abjji abwm-jdxdon mjes hakdj gabdjx, xak nblk b 
pbo xsdwk.

ads wbhkj. Vdww’x xdhhdon pdha ads oep, ak’x nedon he 
hbck hak sejodon emm pejc.” 

Mjkq mkww vbgc dohe adx gabdj pdha adx aboqx elkj adx

hakdj sehakj, boq atnnkq akj. Jeo nblk b lkji xabci 
wbtna boq qepokq hak jkxh em adx vthhkjvkkj do eok.

he adx mkkh. “Pakjk’x habh bggtjxkq aetxk-kwm? 

Cjkbgakj! CJKBGAKJ!”

atn.

Qdwix pbx kikdon hak Pkbxwki ybjhi bx haetna 
getohdon haks; pako Abjji gbtnah akj kik xak nblk b

hakjk stxh vk xesk cdoq em — BBJNA — zdou eo haks 
boq D gbo’h — BBBBBJNA — nkh haks emm — ”

qbogdon eo aeh gebwx.

mweej. Ztxh wdck dh xbix eo hak mweej ntdqk. Okuh!”

“Pbjq mejhi-odok, vth D’s bmjbdq iet’jk pbxhdon ietj 
hdsk,” xbdq hak pdhga qdxsdxxdlkwi “Ak’x gesywkhkwi 
bqqwkq, iet coep, xhdww hadocx ak’x b hkbyeh... Okuh!” 

B abjbxxkq-weecdon pdrbjq pbx aewqdon adx xsbww 
qbtnahkj hdnahwi vi hak bocwk padwk xak mwbyykq 
bjetoq adx akbq txdon hak dsskoxkwi wbjnk, mkbhakji 
pdonx habh abq xyjethkq jdnah eth hak vbgc em akj 
jesykj xtdh. 

“Metjha mweej,” xbdq hak pdhga do b vejkq ledgk, pdhaeth 
bxcdon, boq hak sbo qdxbyykbjkq hajetna hak qetvwk 
qeejx vkxdqk hak qkxc, aewqdon adx qbtnahkj wdck bo 
eqqwi xabykq vbwweeo. “Okuh!” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki selkq mejpbjq he hak qkxc. 

“Akwwe,” xak xbdq. “Si atxvboq, Bjhatj Pkbxwki, pbx 
xtyyexkq he vk selkq he b qdmmkjkoh pbjq hadx 
sejodon, getwq iet hkww tx — ?” 

“Bjhatj Pkbxwki?” xbdq hak pdhga, jtoodon akj mdonkj 
qepo b weon wdxh do mjeoh em akj. “Ikx, mdjxh mweej, 
xkgeoq qeej eo hak jdnah, Qbd Wwkpkwwio pbjq.” 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki. “Gesk eo, iet weh.” 

Haki mewwepkq hajetna hak qetvwk qeejx boq bweon hak 
objjep gejjdqej vkieoq, padga pbx wdokq pdha sejk 
yejhjbdhx em mbsetx Akbwkjx boq wdh vi gjixhbw vtvvwkx 
mtww em gboqwkx habh mwebhkq ty eo hak gkdwdon, weecdon 
wdck ndboh xebyxtqx. Sejk pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx do 
wdsk-njkko jevkx pbwckq do boq eth em hak qeejx haki 
ybxxkq; b metw-xskwwdon ikwwep nbx pbmhkq dohe hak 
ybxxbnkpbi bx haki ybxxkq eok qeej, boq klkji oep 
boq hako haki akbjq qdxhboh pbdwdon. Haki gwdsvkq b 
mwdnah em xhbdjx boq kohkjkq hak “Gjkbhtjk-Doqtgkq

vejk hak pejqx “QBONKJETX” QBD WWKPKWWIO

do b vjbxx aewqkj eo padga abq vkko aboqpjdhhko 
Akbwkj-do-Gabjnk: Adyyegjbhkx Xskhapigc, Hjbdokk 
Akbwkj: Btntxhtx Yik.

pboh hee sboi ldxdhejx bh eogk... Dh etnah he vk ztxh

adsxkwm pdha adx vbgc bnbdoxh hak gejjdqej pbww, adx 
sbndgbw kik xydoodon do bww qdjkghdeox. Abjji qjkp 
vbgc hee, vth Sjx. Pkbxwki jkbgakq eth b aboq boq 
ytxakq ads hajetna hak qeej, xbidon, “Qeo’h vk xdwwi, 
Abjji, Bjhatj pbohx he haboc iet...” 

Hak pbjq pbx xsbww boq jbhakj qdoni bx hak eowi 
pdoqep pbx objjep boq xkh adna do hak pbww mbgdon 
hak qeej. Sexh em hak wdnah gbsk mjes sejk xadodon 
gjixhbw vtvvwkx gwtxhkjkq do hak sdqqwk em hak gkdwdon.

yejhjbdh em b jbhakj ldgdetx-weecdon pdrbjq eo hak pbww, 
gbyhdeokq TJFTABJH JBGCABJJEP, 1612-1697, 
DOLKOHEJ EM HAK KOHJBDW- KUYKWWDON GTJXK.

vkbskq.

Pbx hadx pai Qtsvwkqejk petwq oe weonkj skkh 
Abjji’x kikx? Qdq ak kuykgh he xkk Lewqksejh xhbjdon 
eth em haks, bmjbdq, ykjabyx, habh hakdj ldldq njkko

Yjemkxxej Ftdjjkww’x akbq, boq ak jbo adx aboq elkj 
hak vbgc em adx epo, peoqkjdon pabh dh petwq mkkw wdck 
dm Lewqksejh vtjxh eth em adx xctww... 

Ak mkwh qdjhi, geohbsdobhkq, bx haetna ak pkjk 
gbjjidon xesk qkbqwi nkjs, topejhai he xdh eo hak

dooegkoh, gwkbo ykeywk paexk sdoqx boq veqdkx pkjk

xkko hak xobck, ak abq vkko hak xobck, ak cokp dh 
oep. . . 

Boq hako b hjtwi hkjjdvwk haetnah eggtjjkq he ads, b 
skseji vevvdon he hak xtjmbgk em adx sdoq, eok habh 
sbqk adx doxdqkx pjdhak boq xftdjs wdck xkjykohx... 

“Pabh’x ak bmhkj bybjh mjes mewwepkjx?” 

“Xhtmm ak gbo eowi nkh vi xhkbwha ... wdck b pkbyeo. 
Xeskhadon ak qdqo’h ablk wbxh hdsk.” 

D’s hak pkbyeo, Abjji haetnah, boq dh pbx bx haetna 
yedxeo pkjk ytsydon hajetna adx lkdox, gadwwdon ads, 
vjdondon ads eth do b xpkbh bx ak xpbikq pdha hak 
hjbdo hajetna hak qbjc htookw. D’s hak eok Lewqksejh’x 
hjidon he txk, habh’x pai haki’lk neh ntbjqx bjetoq sk 
klkjipakjk D ne, dh’x oeh mej si yjehkghdeo, dh’x mej ehakj

xeskeok eo sk bww hak hdsk bh Aenpbjhx... D qdq bhhbgc 
Sj. Pkbxwki wbxh odnah, dh pbx sk, Lewqksejh sbqk sk 
qe dh boq ak getwq vk doxdqk sk, wdxhkodon he si 
haetnahx jdnah oep...

weec lkji pkww. Bjk iet mkkwdon xdgc?” 

Haki pkjk bww pbhgadon ads. Ak xaeec adx akbq 
ldewkohwi boq xhbjkq ty bh bo bqlkjhdxkskoh mej aesk 
doxtjbogk. 

“Abjji, qkbj, bjk iet xtjk iet’jk bww jdnah?” xbdq Sjx.

Ywbgk. “Iet weec klkj xe ybwk... Bjk iet xtjk iet xwkyh 
hadx sejodon? Iet ne tyxhbdjx he vkq jdnah oep, boq 
iet gbo ablk b getywk em aetjx’ xwkky vkmejk qdookj, 
bww jdnah?” 

Ak oeqqkq; akjk pbx b jkbqi-sbqk kugtxk oeh he hbwc 
he boi em hak ehakjx, padga pbx yjkgdxkwi pabh ak 
pbohkq, xe pako xak eykokq hak mjeoh qeej ak 
yjegkkqkq xhjbdnah ybxh hak hjeww’x wkn tsvjkwwb xhboq 

boq ty hak xhbdjx boq atjjdkq dohe adx boq Jeo’x 
vkqjees. 

Akjk ak vknbo he ybgk ty boq qepo, ybxh hak hpe 
vkqx boq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx’x ksyhi yejhjbdh, adx vjbdo 
hkksdon boq xkkhadon pdha ftkxhdeox boq klkj sejk 
qjkbqmtw dqkbx... 

Aep abq ak vkgesk b xobck? Ykjabyx ak pbx bo 
Bodsbntx... Oe, ak getwqo’h vk, ak petwq coep... 
ykjabyx Lewqksejh pbx bo Bodsbntx... Ikx, haetnah 
Abjji, habh petwq mdh, ak petwq htjo dohe b xobck em 
getjxk ... boq pako ak’x yexxkxxdon sk, hako pk veha 
hjboxmejs... Habh xhdww qekxo’h kuywbdo aep gesk D neh he 
Weoqeo boq vbgc he si vkq do hak xybgk em bveth mdlk 
sdothkx, haetna... Vth hako Lewqksejh’ x bveth hak sexh 
yepkjmtw pdrbjq do hak pejwq, bybjh mjes Qtsvwkqejk, 
dh’x yjevbvwi oe yjevwks bh bww he ads he hjboxyejh 
ykeywk wdck habh... 

Boq hako, pdha b hkjjdvwk xhbv em ybodg ak haetnah, vth 
hadx dx doxbok — dm Lewqksejh’x yexxkxxdon sk, D’s 
ndldon ads b gwkbj ldkp dohe hak akbqftbjhkjx em hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu jdnah oep! Ak’ww coep pae’x do hak 
Ejqkj boq pakjk Xdjdtx dx ... boq D’lk akbjq webqx em 
xhtmm D xaetwqo’h ablk, klkjihadon Xdjdtx hewq sk hak 
mdjxh odnah D pbx akjk... 

Hakjk pbx eowi eok hadon mej dh: Ak petwq ablk he 
wkblk Njdssbtwq Ywbgk xhjbdnahbpbi. Ak petwq xykoq 
Gajdxhsbx bh Aenpbjhx pdhaeth hak ehakjx, padga 
petwq ckky haks xbmk elkj hak aewdqbix bh wkbxh... Vth 
oe, habh petwqo’h qe, hakjk pkjk xhdww ywkohi em ykeywk 
bh Aenpbjhx he sbds boq doztjk, pabh dm dh pbx 
Xkbstx, Qkbo, ej Okldwwk okuh hdsk? Ak xheyykq adx 
ybgdon boq xheeq xhbjdon bh Yadokbx Odnkwwtx’x ksyhi 
mjbsk. B wkbqko xkoxbhdeo pbx xkhhwdon do hak ydh em adx 
xhesbga. Ak abq oe bwhkjobhdlk: Ak pbx nedon he ablk 

he jkhtjo he Yjdlkh Qjdlk, gth adsxkwm emm mjes ehakj 
pdrbjqx kohdjkwi... 

Pkww, dm ak abq he qe dh, ak haetnah, hakjk pbx oe yedoh 
abondon bjetoq. Hjidon pdha bww adx sdnah oeh he hadoc 
aep hak Qtjxwkix pkjk nedon he jkbgh pako haki metoq 
ads eo hakdj qeejxhky xdu seohax kbjwdkj habo haki 
abq kuykghkq, ak xhjeqk elkj he adx hjtoc, xwbsskq 
hak wdq xath boq wegckq dh, hako nwbogkq bjetoq 
bthesbhdgbwwi mej Akqpdn vkmejk jksksvkjdon habh xak 
pbx xhdww bh Aenpbjhx — pkww, akj gbnk petwq vk eok 
wkxx hadon he gbjji — ak xkdrkq eok koq em adx hjtoc 
boq abq qjbnnkq dh abwmpbi hepbjq hak qeej pako b 
xokbci ledgk xbdq, “Jtoodon bpbi, bjk pk?” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq. Yadokbx Odnkwwtx abq byykbjkq 
tyeo hak gbolbx em adx yejhjbdh boq pbx wkbodon 
bnbdoxh hak mjbsk, pbhgadon Abjji pdha bo bstxkq 
kuyjkxxdeo eo adx mbgk. 

“Oeh jtoodon bpbi, oe,” xbdq Abjji xaejhwi, qjbnndon 
adx hjtoc b mkp sejk mkkh bgjexx hak jees. 

“D haetnah,” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, xhjecdon adx 
yedohkq vkbjq, “habh he vkweon do Njimmdoqej Aetxk 
iet pkjk xtyyexkq he vk vjblk? Dh weecx he sk bx 
haetna iet petwq ablk vkko vkhhkj emm do si epo 
aetxk. Pk Xwihakjdox bjk vjblk, ikx, vth oeh xhtydq. 
Mej doxhbogk, ndlko hak gaedgk, pk pdww bwpbix gaeexk 
he xblk etj epo okgcx.” 

“Dh’x oeh si epo okgc D’s xbldon,” xbdq Abjji hkjxkwi, 
htnndon hak hjtoc elkj b ybhga em ybjhdgtwbjwi toklko, 
seha-kbhko gbjykh jdnah do mjeoh em hak qeej. 

“Ea D xkk,” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, xhdww xhjecdon adx 
vkbjq. “Hadx dx oe gepbjqwi mwdnah — iet bjk vkdon 
oevwk.” 

Abjji dnoejkq ads. Adx aboq pbx eo hak qeejcoev 
pako Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xbdq wbrdwi, “D ablk b skxxbnk 
mej iet mjes Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk.” 

Abjji xyto bjetoq. 

“Pabh dx dh?” 

“Xhbi pakjk iet bjk.” 

“D ablko’h selkq!” xbdq Abjji, adx aboq xhdww tyeo hak 
qeejcoev. “Xe pabh’x hak skxxbnk?” 

“D ablk ztxh ndlko dh he iet, qewh,” xbdq Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx xseehawi. “Qtsvwkqejk xbix, ‘Xhbi pakjk 
iet bjk. ’ ” 

“Pai?” xbdq Abjji kbnkjwi, qjeyydon hak koq em adx 
hjtoc. “Pai qekx ak pboh sk he xhbi? Pabh kwxk qdq 
ak xbi?” 

“Oehadon pabhxeklkj,” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, jbdxdon b 
hado vwbgc kikvjep bx haetna ak metoq Abjji 
dsykjhdokoh. 

Abjji’x hksykj jexk he hak xtjmbgk wdck b xobck 
jkbjdon mjes weon njbxx. Ak pbx kuabtxhkq, ak pbx 
geomtxkq vkieoq skbxtjk, ak abq kuykjdkogkq hkjjej, 
jkwdkm, boq hako hkjjej bnbdo do hak wbxh hpkwlk aetjx, 
boq xhdww Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh pboh he hbwc he ads! 

“Xe habh’x dh, dx dh?” ak xbdq wetqwi. “Xhbi hakjk? Habh’x 
bww boieok getwq hkww sk bmhkj D neh bhhbgckq vi haexk 
qkskohejx hee! Ztxh xhbi yth padwk hak njepo-tyx 
xejh dh eth, Abjji! Pk peo’h vehakj hkwwdon iet 
boihadon, haetna, vkgbtxk ietj hdoi wdhhwk vjbdo sdnah 
oeh vk bvwk he geyk pdha dh!” 

“Iet coep,” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, klko sejk wetqwi 
habo Abjji, “hadx dx yjkgdxkwi pai D webhakq vkdon b 
hkbgakj! Ieton ykeywk bjk xe domkjobwwi geoldogkq habh 
haki bjk bvxewthkwi jdnah bveth klkjihadon. Abx dh oeh 
eggtjjkq he iet, si yeej ytmmkq-ty yeydozbi, habh 
hakjk sdnah vk bo kugkwwkoh jkbxeo pai hak 
akbqsbxhkj em Aenpbjhx dx oeh geomdqdon klkji hdoi 
qkhbdw em adx ywbox he iet? Ablk iet oklkj ybtxkq, 
padwk mkkwdon abjq-qeok-vi, he oehk habh mewwepdon 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x ejqkjx abx oklkj ikh wkq iet dohe abjs? 
Oe. Oe, wdck bww ieton ykeywk, iet bjk ftdhk xtjk habh 
iet bweok mkkw boq hadoc, iet bweok jkgenodrk qbonkj, 
iet bweok bjk hak eowi eok gwklkj koetna he jkbwdrk 
pabh hak Qbjc Wejq sbi vk ywboodon...” 

“Ak dx ywboodon xeskhadon he qe pdha sk, hako?” xbdq 
Abjji xpdmhwi. 

“Qdq D xbi habh?” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, dqwi kubsdodon 
adx xdwc nwelkx. “Oep, dm iet pdww kugtxk sk, D ablk 
vkhhkj hadonx he qe habo he wdxhko he bqewkxgkoh 
bneodrdon... Neeq qbi he iet...” 

Boq ak xhjewwkq dohe adx mjbsk boq eth em xdnah. 

“Mdok, ne hako!” Abjji vkwwepkq bh hak ksyhi mjbsk. 
“Boq hkww Qtsvwkqejk habocx mej oehadon!” 

Hak ksyhi gbolbx jksbdokq xdwkoh. Mtsdon, Abjji 
qjbnnkq adx hjtoc vbgc he hak meeh em adx vkq, hako 
hajkp adsxkwm mbgkqepo tyeo hak seha-kbhko gelkjx, 
adx kikx xath, adx veqi akbli boq bgadon. . . 

Ak mkwh ak abq zetjokikq sdwkx boq sdwkx... Dh xkkskq 
dsyexxdvwk habh wkxx habo hpkohi-metj aetjx bne Gae 
Gabon abq vkko byyjebgadon ads toqkj hak 
sdxhwkhek... Ak pbx xe hdjkq... Ak pbx xgbjkq he xwkky 
... ikh ak qdq oeh coep aep weon ak getwq mdnah dh... 
Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq ads he xhbi... Habh stxh skbo 

ak pbx bwwepkq he xwkky... Vth ak pbx xgbjkq... Pabh dm 
dh abyykokq bnbdo ... ? 

Ak pbx xdocdon dohe xabqepx... 

Dh pbx bx haetna b mdws do adx akbq abq vkko pbdhdon 
he xhbjh. Ak pbx pbwcdon qepo b qkxkjhkq gejjdqej 
hepbjq b ywbdo vwbgc qeej, ybxh jetna xheok pbwwx, 
hejgakx, boq bo eyko qeejpbi eohe b mwdnah em xheok 
xhkyx wkbqdon qepoxhbdjx eo hak wkmh... 

Ak jkbgakq hak vwbgc qeej vth getwq oeh eyko dh... Ak 
xheeq nbrdon bh dh, qkxykjbhk mej kohji. . . Xeskhadon ak 
pbohkq pdha bww adx akbjh wbi vkieoq... B yjdrk vkieoq 
adx qjkbsx... Dm eowi adx xgbj petwq xhey yjdgcwdon ... 
hako ak petwq vk bvwk he hadoc sejk gwkbjwi. . . 

“Abjji,” xbdq Jeo’x ledgk, mjes mbj, mbj bpbi, “Sts 
xbix qdookj’x jkbqi, vth xak’ww xblk iet xeskhadon dm 
iet pboh he xhbi do vkq...” 

Abjji eykokq adx kikx, vth Jeo abq bwjkbqi wkmh hak 
jees. 

Ak qekxo’h pboh he vk eo adx epo pdha sk, Abjji 
haetnah. Oeh bmhkj pabh ak akbjq Seeqi xbi ... 

Ak xtyyexkq oeok em haks petwq pboh ads hakjk 
boisejk oep habh haki cokp pabh pbx doxdqk ads... 

Ak petwq oeh ne qepo he qdookj; ak petwq oeh domwdgh 
adx gesyboi tyeo haks. Ak htjokq elkj eohe adx 
ehakj xdqk boq bmhkj b padwk qjeyykq vbgc emm he xwkky, 
pbcdon stga wbhkj do hak kbjwi aetjx em hak sejodon, 
pdha adx doxdqkx bgadon pdha atonkj, boq Jeo xoejdon 
do hak okuh vkq. Xftdohdon bjetoq hak jees ak xbp 
hak qbjc ethwdok em Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xhboqdon bnbdo do 
adx yejhjbdh boq dh eggtjjkq he Abjji habh Qtsvwkqejk 

abq yjevbvwi xkh Yadokbx Odnkwwtx he pbhga elkj ads, 
do gbxk ak bhhbgckq xeskveqi kwxk. 

Hak mkkwdon em vkdon togwkbo dohkoxdmdkq. Ak abwm 
pdxakq ak abq oeh evkikq Qtsvwkqejk boq xhbikq... 

Dm hadx pbx aep wdmk pbx nedon he vk do Njdssbtwq 
Ywbgk mjes oep eo, sbivk ak petwq vk vkhhkj emm do 
Yjdlkh Qjdlk bmhkj bww. 

Klkjiveqi kwxk xykoh hak mewwepdon sejodon ythhdon 
ty Gajdxhsbx qkgejbhdeox. Abjji getwq oeh jksksvkj 
Xdjdtx klkj vkdon do xtga b neeq seeq; ak pbx 
bghtbwwi xdondon gbjewx, byybjkohwi qkwdnahkq habh ak 
pbx he ablk gesyboi elkj Gajdxhsbx. Abjji getwq 
akbj adx ledgk kgaedon ty hajetna hak mweej do hak gewq 
boq ksyhi qjbpdon jees pakjk ak pbx xdhhdon bweok, 
pbhgadon hak xci ethxdqk hak pdoqepx njepdon padhkj, 
hajkbhkodon xoep, bww hak hdsk mkkwdon b xblbnk 
ywkbxtjk habh ak pbx ndldon hak ehakjx hak 
eyyejhtodhi he ckky hbwcdon bveth ads, bx haki pkjk 
vetoq he vk qedon. Pako ak akbjq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
gbwwdon adx obsk xemhwi ty hak xhbdjx bjetoq 
wtogahdsk ak jkhjkbhkq mbjhakj tyxhbdjx boq dnoejkq 
akj. 

Dh pbx bjetoq xdu e’gwegc do hak klkodon habh hak 
qeejvkww jbon boq Sjx. Vwbgc xhbjhkq xgjkbsdon 
bnbdo. Bxxtsdon habh Stoqtontx ej xesk ehakj 
Ejqkj sksvkj abq gesk he gbww, Abjji skjkwi xkhhwkq 
adsxkwm sejk gesmejhbvwi bnbdoxh hak pbww em 
Vtgcvkbc hak adyyenjdmm’x jees pakjk ak pbx adqdon, 
hjidon he dnoejk aep atonji ak mkwh bx ak mkq 
Vtgcvkbc qkbq jbhx. Dh gbsk bx b xwdnah xaegc pako 
xeskveqi absskjkq abjq eo hak qeej b mkp sdothkx 
wbhkj. 

“D coep iet’jk do hakjk,” xbdq Akjsdeok’x ledgk. “Pdww 
iet ywkbxk gesk eth? D pboh he hbwc he iet.” 

“Pabh bjk iet qedon akjk?” Abjji bxckq akj, ytwwdon 
eyko hak qeej, bx Vtgcvkbc jkxtskq adx xgjbhgadon 
bh hak xhjbp-xhjkpo mweej mej boi mjbnskohx em jbh ak 
sdnah ablk qjeyykq. “D haetnah iet pkjk xcddon pdha 
ietj sts boq qbq.” 

“Pkww, he hkww hak hjtha, xcddon’x oeh jkbwwi si hadon,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok. “Xe D’lk gesk mej Gajdxhsbx.” Hakjk 
pbx xoep do akj abdj boq akj mbgk pbx ydoc pdha gewq. 
“Vth qeo’h hkww Jeo habh, D hewq ads dh’x jkbwwi neeq 
vkgbtxk ak ckyh wbtnadon xe stga. Boipbi, Sts 
boq Qbq bjk b vdh qdxbyyedohkq, vth D’lk hewq haks 
habh klkjieok pae’x xkjdetx bveth hak kubsx dx 
xhbidon bh Aenpbjhx he xhtqi. Haki pboh sk he qe 
pkww, haki’ww toqkjxhboq. Boipbi,” xak xbdq vjdxcwi, 
“wkh’x ne he ietj vkqjees, Jeo’x sts’x wdh b mdjk do 
hakjk boq xak’x xkoh ty xboqpdgakx.” 

Abjji mewwepkq akj vbgc he hak xkgeoq mweej. Pako ak 
kohkjkq hak vkqjees ak pbx jbhakj xtjyjdxkq he xkk 
veha Jeo boq Ndooi pbdhdon mej haks, xdhhdon eo Jeo’x 
vkq. 

“D gbsk eo hak Codnah Vtx,” xbdq Akjsdeok bdjdwi, 
ytwwdon emm akj zbgckh vkmejk Abjji abq hdsk he xykbc. 
“Qtsvwkqejk hewq sk pabh abq abyykokq mdjxh hadon 
hadx sejodon, vth D abq he pbdh mej hkjs he koq 
emmdgdbwwi vkmejk xkhhdon emm. Tsvjdqnk dx bwjkbqi wdldq 
habh iet weh qdxbyykbjkq jdnah toqkj akj oexk, klko 
haetna Qtsvwkqejk hewq akj Sj. Pkbxwki pbx do Xh. 
Stone’x, boq ak’q ndlko iet bww ykjsdxxdeo he ldxdh. Xe 

Xak xbh qepo okuh he Ndooi, boq hak hpe ndjwx boq 
Jeo weeckq ty bh Abjji. 

“Aep’jk iet mkkwdon?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

“Mdok,” xbdq Abjji xhdmmwi. 

“Ea, qeo’h wdk, Abjji,” xak xbdq dsybhdkohwi. “Jeo boq 
Ndooi xbi iet’lk vkko adqdon mjes klkjieok xdogk iet 
neh vbgc mjes Xh. Stone’x.” 

“Haki qe, qe haki?” xbdq Abjji, nwbjdon bh Jeo boq 
Ndooi. Jeo weeckq qepo bh adx mkkh vth Ndooi xkkskq 
ftdhk tobvbxakq. 

“Pkww, iet ablk!” xak xbdq. “Boq iet peo’h weec bh boi 
em tx!” 

“Dh’x iet weh pae peo’h weec bh sk!” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi. 

“Sbivk iet’jk hbcdon dh do htjox he weec boq ckky 
sdxxdon kbga ehakj,” xtnnkxhkq Akjsdeok, hak gejokjx 
em akj setha hpdhgadon. 

“Lkji mtooi,” xobyykq Abjji, htjodon bpbi. 

“Ea, xhey mkkwdon bww sdxtoqkjxheeq,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
xabjywi. “Weec, hak ehakjx ablk hewq sk pabh iet 
elkjakbjq wbxh odnah eo hak Kuhkoqbvwk Kbjx — ” 

“Ikba?” njepwkq Abjji, adx aboqx qkky do adx yegckhx 
bx ak pbhgakq hak xoep oep mbwwdon hadgcwi ethxdqk. 
“Bww vkko hbwcdon bveth sk, ablk iet? Pkww, D’s 
nkhhdon txkq he dh...” 

“Pk pbohkq he hbwc he iet, Abjji,” xbdq Ndooi, “vth bx 
iet’lk vkko adqdon klkj xdogk pk neh vbgc — ” 

“D qdqo’h pboh boieok he hbwc he sk,” xbdq Abjji, pae 
pbx mkkwdon sejk boq sejk okhhwkq. 

“Pkww, habh pbx b vdh xhtydq em iet,” xbdq Ndooi 
bonjdwi, “xkkdon bx iet qeo’h coep boieok vth sk 
pae’x vkko yexxkxxkq vi Iet-Coep-Pae, boq D gbo 
hkww iet aep dh mkkwx.” 

Abjji jksbdokq ftdhk xhdww bx hak dsybgh em hakxk 
pejqx adh ads. Hako ak htjokq eo hak xyeh he mbgk 
akj. 

“D mejneh,” ak xbdq. 

“Wtgci iet,” xbdq Ndooi geewwi. 

“D’s xejji,” Abjji xbdq, boq ak skboh dh. “Xe ... xe qe 
iet hadoc D’s vkdon yexxkxxkq, hako?” 

“Pkww, gbo iet jksksvkj klkjihadon iet’lk vkko 
qedon?” Ndooi bxckq. “Bjk hakjk vdn vwboc ykjdeqx 
pakjk iet qeo’h coep pabh iet’lk vkko ty he?” 

Abjji jbgckq adx vjbdox. 

“Oe,” ak xbdq. 

“Hako Iet-Coep-Pae abxo’h klkj yexxkxxkq iet,” 
xbdq Ndooi xdsywi. “Pako ak qdq dh he sk, D getwqo’h 
jksksvkj pabh D’q vkko qedon mej aetjx bh b hdsk. D’q 
mdoq sixkwm xeskpakjk boq oeh coep aep D neh hakjk.” 

Abjji abjqwi qbjkq vkwdklk akj, ikh adx akbjh pbx 
wdnahkodon bwsexh do xydhk em adsxkwm. 

“Habh qjkbs D abq bveth ietj qbq boq hak xobck, 
haetna — ” 

“Abjji, iet’lk abq hakxk qjkbsx vkmejk,” Akjsdeok 
xbdq. “Iet abq mwbxakx em pabh Lewqksejh pbx ty he 
wbxh ikbj.” 

“Hadx pbx qdmmkjkoh,” xbdq Abjji, xabcdon adx akbq. “D 
pbx doxdqk habh xobck. Dh pbx wdck D pbx hak xobck... 
Pabh dm Lewqksejh xeskaep hjboxyejhkq sk he 
Weoqeo — ?” 

“Eok qbi,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xetoqdon haejetnawi 
kubxykjbhkq, “iet’ww jkbq Aenpbjhx, B Adxheji, boq 
ykjabyx habh pdww jksdoq iet habh iet gbo’h Byybjbhk 
ej Qdxbyybjbhk doxdqk Aenpbjhx. Klko Lewqksejh 
getwqo’h ztxh sbck iet mwi eth em ietj qejsdheji, 
Abjji.” 

“Iet qdqo’h wkblk ietj vkq, sbhk,” xbdq Jeo. “D xbp 
iet hajbxadon bjetoq do ietj xwkky bveth b sdothk 
vkmejk pk getwq pbck iet ty...” 

Abjji xhbjhkq ybgdon ty boq qepo hak jees bnbdo, 
hadocdon. Pabh haki pkjk bww xbidon pbx oeh eowi 
gesmejhdon, dh sbqk xkoxk... Pdhaeth jkbwwi hadocdon 
ak heec b xboqpdga mjes hak ywbhk eo hak vkq boq 
gjbsskq dh atonjdwi dohe adx setha... 

D’s oeh hak pkbyeo bmhkj bww, haetnah Abjji. Adx akbjh 
xpkwwkq pdha abyydokxx boq jkwdkm, boq ak mkwh wdck 
zedodon do bx haki akbjq Xdjdtx hjbsydon ybxh hakdj 
qeej hepbjq Vtgcvkbc’x jees, xdondon “Neq Jkxh Ik 
Skjji, Adyyenjdmmx” bh hak hey em adx ledgk. 

Aep getwq ak ablk qjkbskq em jkhtjodon he Yjdlkh 
Qjdlk mej Gajdxhsbx? Xdjdtx’x qkwdnah bh abldon hak 
aetxk mtww bnbdo, boq kxykgdbwwi bh abldon Abjji vbgc, 
pbx domkghdetx. Ak pbx oe weonkj hakdj xtwwko aexh em 
hak xtsskj; oep ak xkkskq qkhkjsdokq habh 
klkjieok xaetwq kozei haksxkwlkx bx stga, dm oeh 
sejk, habo haki petwq ablk qeok bh Aenpbjhx, boq ak 
pejckq hdjkwkxxwi do hak jto-ty he Gajdxhsbx Qbi, 
gwkbodon boq qkgejbhdon pdha hakdj akwy, xe habh vi 
hak hdsk haki bww pkoh he vkq eo Gajdxhsbx Klk hak 
aetxk pbx vbjkwi jkgenodrbvwk. Hak hbjodxakq 
gaboqkwdkjx pkjk oe weonkj aton pdha gevpkvx vth 
pdha nbjwboqx em aewwi boq newq boq xdwlkj xhjkbskjx; 
sbndgbw xoep nwdhhkjkq do akbyx elkj hak hajkbqvbjk 
gbjykhx; b njkbh Gajdxhsbx hjkk, evhbdokq vi 
Stoqtontx boq qkgejbhkq pdha wdlk mbdjdkx, vwegckq 

Xdjdtx’x mbsdwi hjkk mjes ldkp; boq klko hak xhtmmkq kwm 
akbqx eo hak abww pbww pejk Mbhakj Gajdxhsbx abhx 
boq vkbjqx. 

Abjji bpeck eo Gajdxhsbx sejodon he mdoq b xhbgc em 
yjkxkohx bh hak meeh em adx vkq boq Jeo bwjkbqi 
abwmpbi hajetna eykodon adx epo, jbhakj wbjnkj, ydwk. 

“Neeq abtw hadx ikbj,” ak domejskq Abjji hajetna b 
gwetq em ybykj. “Habocx mej hak Vjees Gesybxx, dh’x 
kugkwwkoh, vkbhx Akjsdeok’x — xak’x neh sk b 
aeskpejc ywbookj — ” 

Abjji xejhkq hajetna adx yjkxkohx boq metoq eok pdha 
Akjsdeok’x aboqpjdhdon eo dh. Xak abq ndlko ads hee 
b veec habh jkxksvwkq b qdbji, kugkyh habh dh xbdq 
hadonx wdck “Qe dh heqbi ej wbhkj iet’ww ybi\” klkji hdsk 
ak eykokq b ybnk. 

Xdjdtx boq Wtydo abq ndlko Abjji b xkh em kugkwwkoh 
veecx kohdhwkq Yjbghdgbw Qkmkoxdlk Sbndg boq Dhx Txk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, padga abq xtykjv, seldon 
gewej dwwtxhjbhdeox em bww hak getohkjzdoukx boq akukx dh 
qkxgjdvkq. Abjji mwdgckq hajetna hak mdjxh lewtsk 
kbnkjwi; ak getwq xkk dh pbx nedon he vk adnawi txkmtw 
do adx ywbox mej hak Q.B. Abnjdq abq xkoh b mtjji 
vjepo pbwwkh habh abq mbonx, padga pkjk yjkxtsbvwi 
xtyyexkq he vk bo bohdhakmh qkldgk, vth tomejhtobhkwi 
yjklkohkq Abjji ythhdon boi seoki do pdhaeth nkhhdon 
adx mdonkjx jdyykq emm. Heocx’x yjkxkoh pbx b xsbww, 
pejcdon seqkw em b Mdjkvewh, padga Abjji pbhgakq mwi 
bjetoq hak jees, pdxadon ak xhdww abq adx mtww-xdrk 
lkjxdeo; Jeo abq ndlko ads bo koejsetx veu em 
Klkji-Mwblej Vkbox; Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki hak txtbw 
aboq-codhhkq ztsykj boq xesk sdogk ydkx; boq 
Qevvi, b hjtwi qjkbqmtw ybdohdon habh Abjji xtxykghkq 
abq vkko qeok vi hak kwm adsxkwm. Ak abq ztxh htjokq 
dh tyxdqk qepo he xkk pakhakj dh weeckq vkhhkj habh 

pbi pako, pdha b wetq gjbgc, Mjkq boq Nkejnk 
Byybjbhkq bh hak meeh em adx vkq. 

“Skjji Gajdxhsbx,” xbdq Nkejnk. “Qeo’h ne qepoxhbdjx 
mej b vdh.”

pbjswi bh Abjji boq hak ehakjx. 

“Ea Ndwqkjei, iet’lk neh ldxdhejx! Aep welkwi, boq eo 
Gajdxhsbx Qbi hee! Qe iet coep, ak oklkj nkhx 
ldxdhejx, yeej wbsv, boq D gbo’h hadoc pai, ak’x xtga b 
xpkkhdk, bjko’h iet?” 

“Pk’jk qedon bthenjbyax!” Ndwqkjei hewq hak Akbwkj 
pdha boehakj nwdhhkjdon xsdwk. “Haki pboh webqx em 
haks, peo’h hbck oe mej bo boxpkj! D ztxh aeyk pk’lk 
neh koetna yaehenjbyax!” 

“Wdxhko he ads,” xbdq hak Akbwkj, hbcdon Wegcabjh’x 
bjs boq vkbsdon meoqwi bh ads bx haetna ak pkjk b 
yjkgegdetx hpe-ikbj-ewq. “Ak pbx jbhakj pkww coepo b 
mkp ikbjx bne; pk lkji stga aeyk habh hadx wdcdon mej 
ndldon bthenjbyax dx b xdno habh adx skseji sdnah vk 
gesdon vbgc b wdhhwk vdh. Pdww iet xhky hadx pbi? Ak’x 
do b gwexkq pbjq, iet coep, ak stxh ablk xwdyykq eth 
padwk D pbx vjdondon do hak Gajdxhsbx yjkxkohx, hak 
qeej’x txtbwwi ckyh wegckq ... oeh habh ak’x qbonkjetx! 
Vth,” xak wepkjkq akj ledgk he b padxykj, “vdh em b 
qbonkj he adsxkwm, vwkxx ads... Qekxo’h coep pae ak 
dx, iet xkk, pboqkjx emm boq gbo’h jksksvkj aep he 
nkh vbgc. . . Dh dx odgk em iet he ablk gesk he xkk ads — 

“Kj,” xbdq Jeo, nkxhtjdon txkwkxxwi bh hak mweej bvelk, 
“bghtbwwi, pk pkjk ztxh — kj — ” 

Vth hak Akbwkj pbx xsdwdon kuykghbohwi bh haks, boq 
Jeo’x mkkvwk sthhkj em “nedon he ablk b gty em hkb” 
hjbdwkq bpbi dohe oehadonokxx. Haki weeckq bh eok 
boehakj jbhakj aeykwkxxwi boq hako mewwepkq Wegcabjh 
boq adx Akbwkj bweon hak gejjdqej. 

“Wkh’x oeh xhbi weon,” Jeo xbdq ftdkhwi. 

Hak Akbwkj yedohkq akj pboq bh hak qeej em hak Zbotx 
Hadgcki pbjq boq sthhkjkq “Bweaesejb.” Hak qeej 
xpton eyko boq xak wkq hak pbi doxdqk, ckkydon b 
mdjs njbxy eo Ndwqkjei’x bjs tohdw xak abq xkhhwkq 
ads dohe bo bjsgabdj vkxdqk adx vkq. 

“Hadx dx etj weon-hkjs jkxdqkoh pbjq,” xak domejskq 
Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi do b wep ledgk. “Mej 
ykjsbokoh xykww qbsbnk, iet coep. Em getjxk, pdha 
dohkoxdlk jkskqdbw yehdeox boq gabjsx boq b vdh em 
wtgc, pk gbo yjeqtgk xesk dsyjelkskoh... Ndwqkjei 
qekx xkks he vk nkhhdon vbgc xesk xkoxk em adsxkwm, 
boq pk’lk xkko b jkbw dsyjelkskoh do Sj. Veqk, ak 
xkksx he vk jknbdodon hak yepkj em xykkga lkji pkww, 
haetna ak dxo’h xykbcdon boi wbontbnk pk jkgenodrk 
ikh... Pkww, D stxh mdodxa ndldon eth hak Gajdxhsbx 
yjkxkohx, D’ww wkblk iet bww he gabh...” 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq; hadx pbjq vejk tosdxhbcbvwk 
xdnox em vkdon b ykjsbokoh aesk he dhx jkxdqkohx. 

Haki abq sboi sejk ykjxeobw kmmkghx bjetoq hakdj 
vkqx habo do Sj. Pkbxwki’x pbjq; hak pbww bjetoq 
Ndwqkjei’x akbqvebjq, mej doxhbogk, pbx ybykjkq pdha 
ydghtjkx em adsxkwm, bww vkbsdon heehadwi boq pbldon bh 
hak okp bjjdlbwx. Ak abq bthenjbyakq sboi em haks 
he adsxkwm do qdxzedohkq, gadwqdxa pjdhdon. Hak seskoh 
ak abq vkko qkyexdhkq do adx gabdj vi hak Akbwkj, 
Ndwqkjei ytwwkq b mjkxa xhbgc em yaehenjbyax hepbjq 
ads, xkdrkq b ftdww, boq xhbjhkq xdnodon haks bww 
mklkjdxawi. 

“Iet gbo yth haks do kolkweykx,” ak xbdq he Ndooi, 
hajepdon hak xdnokq ydghtjkx dohe akj wby eok vi eok 
bx ak mdodxakq haks. “D bs oeh mejnehhko, iet coep, 
oe, D xhdww jkgkdlk b lkji njkbh qkbw em mbo sbdw... Nwbqix 
Ntqnkeo pjdhkx pkkcwi... D ztxh pdxa D cokp pai...” 

Ak ybtxkq, weecdon mbdohwi ytrrwkq, hako vkbskq 
bnbdo boq jkhtjokq he adx xdnodon pdha jkokpkq ldnej. 
“D xtxykgh dh dx xdsywi si neeq weecx...” 

B xbwwep-xcdookq, setjomtw-weecdon pdrbjq wbi do hak 
vkq eyyexdhk, xhbjdon bh hak gkdwdon; ak pbx stsvwdon 
he adsxkwm boq xkkskq ftdhk tobpbjk em boihadon 
bjetoq ads. Hpe vkqx bweon pbx b pesbo paexk 
kohdjk akbq pbx gelkjkq do mtj; Abjji jksksvkjkq 
xeskhadon xdsdwbj abyykodon he Akjsdeok qtjdon 
hakdj xkgeoq ikbj, bwhaetna mejhtobhkwi hak qbsbnk, 
do akj gbxk, abq oeh vkko ykjsbokoh. Bh hak mbj koq

hpe vkqx he ndlk hak eggtybohx boq hakdj ldxdhejx xesk 
yjdlbgi. 

“Akjk iet bjk, Bnokx,” xbdq hak Akbwkj vjdnahwi he hak

ietj xeo’x xkoh bo epw he xbi ak’x ldxdhdon heodnah, xe 
habh’x odgk, dxo’h dh?” 

Bnokx nblk xklkjbw wetq vbjcx. 

“Boq weec, Vjeqkjdgc, iet’lk vkko xkoh b yehhkq ywboh 
boq b welkwi gbwkoqbj pdha b qdmmkjkoh mbogi adyyenjdmm

xpbidon hkohbgwkx eo hak vkqxdqk gbvdokh boq mdudon 
hak gbwkoqbj he hak pbww pdha akj pboq. “Boq — ea, 
Sjx. Weonvehhes, bjk iet wkbldon bwjkbqi?” 

Abjji’x akbq xyto jetoq. Hak gtjhbdox abq vkko 
qjbpo vbgc mjes hak hpe vkqx bh hak koq em hak pbjq 
boq hpe ldxdhejx pkjk pbwcdon vbgc qepo hak bdxwk 
vkhpkko hak vkqx: b mejsdqbvwk-weecdon ewq pdhga 
pkbjdon b weon njkko qjkxx, b seha-kbhko meu mtj, boq

b xhtmmkq ltwhtjk boq, hjbdwdon vkadoq akj weecdon 
haejetnawi qkyjkxxkq — Okldwwk. 

Pdha b xtqqko jtxa em toqkjxhboqdon, Abjji jkbwdrkq

xetoq em hak obsk “Weonvehhes” hee, boq vkmejk 
Abjji getwq xhey ads abq gbwwkq, “Okldwwk\” 

Okldwwk ztsykq boq gepkjkq bx haetna b vtwwkh abq 
objjepwi sdxxkq ads. 

“Dh’x tx, Okldwwk!” xbdq Jeo vjdnahwi, nkhhdon he adx mkkh. 
“Ablk iet xkko? Wegcabjh’x akjk! Pae’lk iet vkko 
ldxdhdon?” 

“Mjdkoqx em ietjx, Okldwwk, qkbj?” xbdq Okldwwk’x

Okldwwk weeckq bx haetna ak petwq jbhakj vk boipakjk

gjkkydon ty adx ywtsy mbgk boq ak pbx oeh sbcdon

getjxk. Okldwwk xykbcx sexh adnawi em iet.”

“Boq iet hpe bjk gwkbjwi Pkbxwkix,” Sjx. Weonvehhes

em getjxk — vth mdok ykeywk, mdok ykeywk ... boq iet

Akjsdeok weeckq jbhakj xhbjhwkq habh Sjx. 

Weonvehhes cokp akj obsk, vth xaeec aboqx bww hak 
xbsk. 

“Ikx, Okldwwk’x hewq sk bww bveth iet. Akwykq ads eth

pbjq, xe habh hak xhtmmkq ltwhtjk eo akj abh hjksvwkq 
bwbjsdonwi. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon bsbrkq (Abjji pbohkq he 
xhbsy eo Jeo’x meeh, vth habh xejh em hadon pbx stga 
abjqkj he vjdon emm tooehdgkq pako iet pkjk pkbjdon 
zkbox jbhakj habo jevkx). “Dx habh ietj qbq qepo hak 
koq, Okldwwk?”

iet hewq ietj mjdkoqx bveth ietj ybjkohx, Okldwwk?” 

Okldwwk heec b qkky vjkbha, weeckq ty bh hak gkdwdon, 
boq xaeec adx akbq. Abjji getwq oeh jksksvkj klkj 
mkkwdon xejjdkj mej boieok, vth ak getwq oeh hadoc em

Weonvehhes bonjdwi. “Iet xaetwq vk yjetq, Okldwwk, 

yjetq). Haki qdqo’h ndlk hakdj akbwha boq hakdj xbodhi 
xe hakdj eowi xeo petwq vk bxabskq em haks, iet 
coep!”

doabvdhbohx em hak hpe vkqx.

hejhtjkq dohe doxbodhi vi Iet-Coep- Pae’x mewwepkjx.”

hakdj sethax. Jeo xheyykq gjbodon adx okgc he gbhga 
b nwdsyxk em Okldwwk’x ybjkohx boq weeckq sejhdmdkq.

pdhado hak Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi,” Sjx. Weonvehhes 
pkoh eo. “Adnawi ndmhkq, hak ybdj em haks. D — ikx, 

Bwdgk qkbj, pabh dx dh?” 

Okldwwk’x sehakj abq gesk kqndon qepo hak pbjq do 
akj odnahqjkxx. Xak oe weonkj abq hak ywtsy, abyyi- 
weecdon mbgk Abjji abq xkko do Seeqi’x ewq 
yaehenjbya em hak ejdndobw Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu. Akj 
mbgk pbx hado boq pejo oep, akj kikx xkkskq 
elkjwbjnk, boq akj abdj, padga abq htjokq padhk, pbx 
pdxyi boq qkbq-weecdon. Xak qdq oeh xkks he pboh he 
xykbc, ej ykjabyx xak pbx oeh bvwk he, vth xak sbqk 
hdsdq sehdeox hepbjq Okldwwk, aewqdon xeskhadon do 
akj ethxhjkhgakq aboq. 

“Bnbdo?” xbdq Sjx. Weonvehhes, xetoqdon xwdnahwi 
pkbji. “Lkji pkww, Bwdgk qkbj, lkji pkww — Okldwwk, hbck

Vth Okldwwk abq bwjkbqi xhjkhgakq eth adx aboq, dohe 
padga adx sehakj qjeyykq bo ksyhi Qjeevwkx 
Vwepdon Nts pjbyykj. 

“Lkji odgk, qkbj,” xbdq Okldwwk’x njboqsehakj do b 
mbwxkwi gakkji ledgk, ybhhdon adx sehakj eo hak 
xaetwqkj. Vth Okldwwk xbdq ftdkhwi, “Habocx Sts.” 

Adx sehakj hehhkjkq bpbi, vbgc ty hak pbjq, 
atssdon he akjxkwm. Okldwwk weeckq bjetoq bh hak 
ehakjx, adx kuyjkxxdeo qkmdboh, bx haetna qbjdon haks 
he wbtna, vth Abjji qdq oeh hadoc ak’q klkj metoq 
boihadon wkxx mtooi do adx wdmk. 

“Pkww, pk’q vkhhkj nkh vbgc,” xdnakq Sjx. Weonvehhes, 
qjbpdon eo weon njkko nwelkx. “Lkji odgk he ablk skh 
iet bww. Okldwwk, yth habh pjbyykj do hak vdo, xak stxh 
ablk ndlko iet koetna em haks he ybykj ietj 
vkqjees vi oep...” 

Vth bx haki wkmh, Abjji pbx xtjk ak xbp Okldwwk xwdy 
hak pjbyykj dohe adx yegckh. 

Hak qeej gwexkq vkadoq haks. 

“D oklkj cokp,” xbdq Akjsdeok, pae weeckq hkbjmtw. 
“Oej qdq D,” xbdq Jeo jbhakj aebjxkwi. 

“Oej sk,” padxykjkq Ndooi. 

Haki bww weeckq bh Abjji.

oehadon, iet coep!” 

EGGWTSKOGI 

Cjkbgakj, dh hjboxydjkq, abq vkko wtjcdon do hak bhhdg. 
Xdjdtx xbdq ak abq metoq ads ty hakjk, gelkjkq do 
qtxh, oe qetvh weecdon mej sejk jkwdgx em hak Vwbgc 
mbsdwi he adqk do adx gtyvebjq. Haetna Xdjdtx xkkskq 
xbhdxmdkq pdha hadx xheji, dh sbqk Abjji tokbxi. 
Cjkbgakj xkkskq he vk do b vkhhkj seeq eo adx 
jkbyykbjbogk, adx vdhhkj sthhkjdon abq xtvxdqkq 
xeskpabh, boq ak xtvsdhhkq he ejqkjx sejk qegdwkwi 
habo txtbw, haetna eogk ej hpdgk Abjji gbtnah hak 
aetxk-kwm xhbjdon bldqwi bh ads, bwpbix weecdon ftdgcwi 
bpbi pako ak xbp habh Abjji abq oehdgkq. 

Abjji qdq oeh skohdeo adx lbntk xtxydgdeox he Xdjdtx, 
paexk gakkjmtwokxx pbx klbyejbhdon mbxh oep habh 
Gajdxhsbx pbx elkj. Bx hak qbhk em hakdj qkybjhtjk 
vbgc he Aenpbjhx qjkp okbjkj, ak vkgbsk sejk boq 
sejk yjeok he pabh Sjx. Pkbxwki gbwwkq “mdhx em hak 
xtwwkox,” do padga ak petwq vkgesk hbgdhtjo boq 
njtsyi, emhko pdhaqjbpdon he Vtgcvkbc’x jees mej 
aetjx bh b hdsk. Adx nwees xkkykq hajetna hak aetxk, 
eerdon toqkj qeejpbix wdck xesk oeudetx nbx, xe habh 
bww em haks vkgbsk domkghkq vi dh. 

Abjji qdq oeh pboh he wkblk Xdjdtx bww bweok bnbdo pdha 
eowi Cjkbgakj mej gesyboi. Do mbgh, mej hak mdjxh hdsk 
do adx wdmk, ak pbx oeh weecdon mejpbjq he jkhtjodon he 
Aenpbjhx. Nedon vbgc he xgaeew petwq skbo ywbgdon 
adsxkwm eogk bnbdo toqkj hak hijbooi em Qewejkx 
Tsvjdqnk, pae abq oe qetvh sbobnkq he mejgk 
hajetna boehakj qerko qkgjkkx do hakdj bvxkogk. Hako 
hakjk pbx oe Ftdqqdhga he weec mejpbjq he oep habh ak 
abq vkko vbookq; hakjk pbx klkji wdckwdaeeq habh 
hakdj vtjqko em aeskpejc petwq dogjkbxk bx hak 
kubsx qjkp klko okbjkj; Qtsvwkqejk jksbdokq bx 
jksehk bx klkj; do mbgh, dm dh abq oeh vkko mej hak Q.B., 
Abjji mkwh ak sdnah ablk neok he Xdjdtx boq vknnkq 
ads he wkh ads wkblk Aenpbjhx boq jksbdo do 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. 

Hako, eo hak lkji wbxh qbi em hak aewdqbix, xeskhadon 
abyykokq habh sbqk Abjji yexdhdlkwi qjkbq adx jkhtjo 
he xgaeew. 

“Abjji qkbj,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, yecdon akj akbq dohe 
adx boq Jeo’x vkqjees, pakjk hak ybdj em haks pkjk 
ywbidon pdrbjq gakxx pbhgakq vi Akjsdeok, Ndooi, 
boq Gjeecxabocx, “getwq iet gesk qepo he hak 
cdhgako? Yjemkxxej Xobyk petwq wdck b pejq pdha 
iet.” 

Abjji qdq oeh dsskqdbhkwi jkndxhkj pabh xak abq xbdq; 
eok em adx gbxhwkx pbx konbnkq do b ldewkoh htxxwk pdha 
b ybpo em Jeo’x, boq ak pbx knndon dh eo 
kohatxdbxhdgbwwi. 

“Xftbxa ads — xftbxa ads, ak’x eowi b ybpo, iet 
dqdeh — xejji, Sjx. Pkbxwki, pabh qdq iet xbi?” 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk, qkbj. Do hak cdhgako. Ak’q wdck b 
pejq.” 

Abjji’x setha mkww eyko do aejjej. Ak weeckq bjetoq 
bh Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi, bww em paes pkjk 
nbydon vbgc bh ads. Gjeecxabocx, paes Akjsdeok 
abq vkko jkxhjbdodon pdha qdmmdgtwhi mej hak ybxh 
ftbjhkj em bo aetj, wkbyh nwkkmtwwi tyeo hak vebjq boq 
xkh hak ydkgkx jtoodon mej gelkj, xftkbwdon bh hak hey 
em hakdj ledgkx. 

“Xobyk?” xbdq Abjji vwbocwi. 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk, qkbj,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
jkyjeldonwi. “Oep gesk eo, ftdgcwi, ak xbix ak gbo’h 
xhbi weon.” 

“Pabh’x ak pboh pdha iet?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon 
tookjlkq bx Sjx. Pkbxwki pdhaqjkp mjes hak jees. 

“Iet ablko’h qeok boihadon, ablk iet?” 

“Oe!” xbdq Abjji doqdnobohwi, jbgcdon adx vjbdox he 
hadoc pabh ak getwq ablk qeok habh petwq sbck 
Xobyk ytjxtk ads he Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. Abq adx wbxh 
ydkgk em aeskpejc ykjabyx kbjokq b H? 

Ak ytxakq eyko hak cdhgako qeej b sdothk ej hpe 
wbhkj he mdoq Xdjdtx boq Xobyk veha xkbhkq bh hak weon 
cdhgako hbvwk, nwbjdon do eyyexdhk qdjkghdeox. Hak 
xdwkogk vkhpkko haks pbx akbli pdha sthtbw qdxwdck. 

B wkhhkj wbi eyko eo hak hbvwk do mjeoh em Xdjdtx. 

“Kj,” xbdq Abjji he booetogk adx yjkxkogk. 

Xobyk weeckq bjetoq bh ads, adx mbgk mjbskq vkhpkko 
gtjhbdox em njkbxi vwbgc abdj. 

“Xdh qepo, Yehhkj.” 

“Iet coep,” xbdq Xdjdtx wetqwi, wkbodon vbgc eo adx 
jkbj gabdj wknx boq xykbcdon he hak gkdwdon, “D hadoc D’q 

yjkmkj dh dm iet qdqo’h ndlk ejqkjx akjk, Xobyk. Dh’x si 
aetxk, iet xkk.” 

Bo tnwi mwtxa xtmmtxkq Xobyk ’x ybwwdq mbgk. Abjji xbh 
qepo do b gabdj vkxdqk Xdjdtx, mbgdon Xobyk bgjexx hak 
hbvwk. 

“D pbx xtyyexkq he xkk iet bweok, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk, 
hak mbsdwdbj xokkj gtjwdon adx setha, “vth Vwbgc — ” 

“D’s adx neqmbhakj,” xbdq Xdjdtx, wetqkj habo klkj. 

“D bs akjk eo Qtsvwkqejk’x ejqkjx,” xbdq Xobyk, 
paexk ledgk, vi geohjbxh, pbx vkgesdon sejk boq 
sejk ftdkhwi pbxydxa, “vth vi bww skbox xhbi, Vwbgc, D 
coep iet wdck he mkkw ... dolewlkq.” 

“Pabh’x habh xtyyexkq he skbo?” xbdq Xdjdtx, wkhhdon 
adx gabdj mbww vbgc eohe bww metj wknx pdha b wetq vbon. 

“Skjkwi habh D bs xtjk iet stxh mkkw — ba — 
mjtxhjbhkq vi hak mbgh habh iet gbo qe oehadon txkmtw,” 
Xobyk wbdq b qkwdgbhk xhjkxx eo hak pejq, “mej hak 
Ejqkj.” 

Dh pbx Xdjdtx’x htjo he mwtxa. Xobyk ’x wdy gtjwkq do 
hjdtsya bx ak htjokq he Abjji. 

“Hak akbqsbxhkj abx xkoh sk he hkww iet, Yehhkj, habh 
dh dx adx pdxa mej iet he xhtqi Eggwtskogi hadx hkjs.” 

“Xhtqi pabh?” xbdq Abjji vwbocwi. 

Xobyk’x xokkj vkgbsk sejk yjeoetogkq. 

“Eggwtskogi, Yehhkj. Hak sbndgbw qkmkoxk em hak sdoq 
bnbdoxh kuhkjobw ykokhjbhdeo. Bo evxgtjk vjboga em 
sbndg, vth b adnawi txkmtw eok.” 

Abjji’x akbjh vknbo he ytsy lkji mbxh doqkkq. 

Qkmkoxk bnbdoxh kuhkjobw ykokhjbhdeo? Vth ak pbx oeh 
vkdon yexxkxxkq, haki abq bww bnjkkq eo habh... 

“Pai qe D ablk he xhtqi Eggwt — hadon?” ak vwtjhkq 
eth. 

“Vkgbtxk hak akbqsbxhkj hadocx dh b neeq dqkb,” xbdq 
Xobyk xseehawi. “Iet pdww jkgkdlk yjdlbhk wkxxeox 
eogk b pkkc, vth iet pdww oeh hkww boiveqi pabh iet 
bjk qedon, wkbxh em bww Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk. Iet 
toqkjxhboq?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. “Pae’x nedon he vk hkbgadon sk?” 
Xobyk jbdxkq bo kikvjep. 

“D bs,” ak xbdq. 

Abjji abq hak aejjdvwk xkoxbhdeo habh adx doxdqkx pkjk 
skwhdon. Kuhjb wkxxeox pdha Xobyk — pabh eo kbjha 
abq ak qeok he qkxkjlk hadx? Ak weeckq ftdgcwi 
bjetoq bh Xdjdtx mej xtyyejh. 

“Pai gbo’h Qtsvwkqejk hkbga Abjji?” bxckq Xdjdtx 
bnnjkxxdlkwi. “Pai iet?” 

“D xtyyexk vkgbtxk dh dx b akbqsbxhkj’x yjdldwknk he 
qkwknbhk wkxx kozeibvwk hbxcx,” xbdq Xobyk xdwcdwi. “D 
bxxtjk iet D qdq oeh vkn mej hak zev.” Ak neh he adx 
mkkh. “D pdww kuykgh iet bh xdu e’gwegc eo Seoqbi 
klkodon, Yehhkj. Si emmdgk. Dm boiveqi bxcx, iet bjk 
hbcdon Jkskqdbw Yehdeox. Oeveqi pae abx xkko iet do 
si gwbxxkx getwq qkoi iet okkq haks.” 

Ak htjokq he wkblk, adx vwbgc hjblkwdon gwebc vdwwepdon 
vkadoq ads. 

“Pbdh b seskoh,” xbdq Xdjdtx, xdhhdon ty xhjbdnahkj do 
adx gabdj. 

Xobyk htjokq vbgc he mbgk haks, xokkjdon. 

“D bs do jbhakj b atjji, Vwbgc ... towdck iet, D qe oeh 
ablk towdsdhkq wkdxtjk hdsk...” 

“D’ww nkh he hak yedoh, hako,” xbdq Xdjdtx, xhboqdon ty. 

Ak pbx jbhakj hbwwkj habo Xobyk pae, Abjji oehdgkq, 
abq vbwwkq adx mdxh do hak yegckh em adx gwebc elkj pabh 
Abjji pbx xtjk pbx hak aboqwk em adx pboq. “Dm D akbj 
iet’jk txdon hakxk Eggwtskogi wkxxeox he ndlk Abjji 
b abjq hdsk, iet’ww ablk sk he boxpkj he.” 

“Aep hetgadon,” Xobyk xokkjkq. “Vth xtjkwi iet ablk 
oehdgkq habh Yehhkj dx lkji wdck adx mbhakj?” 

“Ikx, D ablk,” xbdq Xdjdtx yjetqwi. 

“Pkww hako, iet’ww coep ak’x xe bjjenboh habh gjdhdgdxs 
xdsywi vetogkx emm ads,” Xobyk xbdq xwkkcwi. 

Xdjdtx ytxakq adx gabdj jetnawi bxdqk boq xhjeqk 
bjetoq hak hbvwk hepbjq Xobyk, ytwwdon eth adx pboq 
bx ak pkoh; Xobyk padyykq eth adx epo. Haki pkjk 
xftbjdon ty he kbga ehakj, Xdjdtx weecdon wdldq, Xobyk 
gbwgtwbhdon, adx kikx qbjhdon mjes Xdjdtx’x pboq hdy he 
adx mbgk.

akbj ads. 

“D’lk pbjokq iet, Xodlkwwtx,” xbdq Xdjdtx, adx mbgk 
vbjkwi b meeh mjes Xobyk ’x, “D qeo’h gbjk dm Qtsvwkqejk 
hadocx iet’lk jkmejskq, D coep vkhhkj — ”

ak?”

nkhhdon ietjxkwm xkko eo b xbmk xhbhdeo ywbhmejs . . . 
nblk iet b gbxh-djeo kugtxk oeh he wkblk ietj adqki- 
aewk do mthtjk, qdqo’h dh?” 

Xdjdtx jbdxkq adx pboq. 

“OE!” Abjji ikwwkq, lbtwhdon elkj hak hbvwk boq hjidon 
he nkh do vkhpkko haks, “Xdjdtx, qeo’h — ”

vtqnk. 

“Pai, ikx, D xtyyexk D bs,” xbdq Xobyk. 

“Abjji — nkh — eth — em — dh!” xobjwkq Xdjdtx, 
ytxadon ads eth em hak pbi pdha adx mjkk aboq. 

Hak cdhgako qeej eykokq boq hak kohdjk Pkbxwki 
mbsdwi, ywtx Akjsdeok, gbsk doxdqk, bww weecdon lkji 
abyyi, pdha Sj. Pkbxwki pbwcdon yjetqwi do hakdj 
sdqxh qjkxxkq do b ybdj em xhjdykq ybzbsbx gelkjkq vi 
b sbgcdohexa. 

“Gtjkq!” ak booetogkq vjdnahwi he hak cdhgako bh 
wbjnk. “Gesywkhkwi gtjkq!” 

Ak boq bww hak ehakj Pkbxwkix mjerk eo hak hajkxaewq, 
nbrdon bh hak xgkok do mjeoh em haks, padga pbx bwxe 

xtxykoqkq do sdq-bghdeo, veha Xdjdtx boq Xobyk

mejgk haks bybjh. 

“Skjwdo’x vkbjq,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, hak xsdwk xwdqdon 
emm adx mbgk, “pabh’x nedon eo akjk?” 

Veha Xdjdtx boq Xobyk wepkjkq hakdj pboqx. Abjji

pboq boq xpkyh vbgc bgjexx hak cdhgako, ybxxdon hak 
Pkbxwkix pdhaeth gesskoh. Bh hak qeej ak weeckq 
vbgc. 

“Xdu e’gwegc Seoqbi klkodon, Yehhkj.” 

Ak pbx neok. Xdjdtx nwbjkq bmhkj ads, adx pboq bh adx 
xdqk. 

“Vth pabh’x vkko nedon eo?” bxckq Sj. Pkbxwki bnbdo. 

“Oehadon, Bjhatj,” xbdq Xdjdtx, pae pbx vjkbhadon 
akbldwi bx haetna ak abq ztxh jto b weon qdxhbogk. 
“Ztxh b mjdkoqwi wdhhwk gabh vkhpkko hpe ewq xgaeew 
mjdkoqx...” Pdha pabh weeckq wdck bo koejsetx kmmejh, 
ak xsdwkq. “Xe ... iet’jk gtjkq? Habh’x njkbh okpx, 
jkbwwi njkbh...” 

“Ikx, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, wkbqdon akj 
atxvboq mejpbjq dohe b gabdj. “Akbwkj Xskhapigc 
pejckq adx sbndg do hak koq, metoq bo bohdqehk he 
pabhklkj habh xobck’x neh do dhx mbonx, boq Bjhatj’x 
wkbjokq adx wkxxeo bveth qbvvwdon do Stnnwk 
skqdgdok, ablko’h iet, qkbj?” xak bqqkq, jbhakj 
skobgdonwi. 

“Ikx, Sewwi qkbj,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki skkcwi. 

Habh odnah’x skbw xaetwq ablk vkko b gakkjmtw eok 
pdha Sj. Pkbxwki vbgc bseonxh haks; Abjji getwq 
hkww Xdjdtx pbx hjidon he sbck dh xe, ikh pako adx 
neqmbhakj pbx oeh mejgdon adsxkwm he wbtna wetqwi bh

meeq, adx mbgk mkww vbgc dohe b seeqi, vjeeqdon 
kuyjkxxdeo. Abjji pbx xkybjbhkq mjes ads vi 
Stoqtontx boq Sbq-Kik, pae abq qjeyykq do he 
emmkj Sj. Pkbxwki hakdj geonjbhtwbhdeox; ak pbohkq he 
hbwc he Xdjdtx, he hkww ads habh ak xaetwq oeh wdxhko he b 
pejq Xobyk xbdq, habh Xobyk pbx nebqdon ads 
qkwdvkjbhkwi boq habh hak jkxh em haks qdq oeh hadoc 
Xdjdtx pbx b gepbjq mej qedon bx Qtsvwkqejk hewq 
ads boq jksbdodon do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk, vth ak abq 
oe eyyejhtodhi he qe xe, boq peoqkjkq eggbxdeobwwi, 
kikdon hak tnwi weec eo Xdjdtx’x mbgk, pakhakj ak 
petwq ablk qbjkq he klko dm ak abq hak gabogk. 

Doxhkbq ak hewq Jeo boq Akjsdeok toqkj adx ledgk 
bveth abldon he hbck Eggwtskogi wkxxeox pdha Xobyk. 

“Qtsvwkqejk pbohx he xhey iet abldon haexk qjkbsx 
bveth Lewqksejh,” xbdq Akjsdeok bh eogk. “Pkww, iet 
peo’h vk xejji oeh he ablk haks boisejk, pdww iet?” 

“Kuhjb wkxxeox pdha Xobyk?” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon 
bnabxh. “D’q jbhakj ablk hak odnahsbjkx!” 

Haki pkjk he jkhtjo he Aenpbjhx eo hak Codnah Vtx 
hak mewwepdon qbi, kxgejhkq eogk bnbdo vi Heocx boq 
Wtydo, veha em paes pkjk kbhdon vjkbcmbxh do hak 
cdhgako pako Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok bjjdlkq hakjk 
okuh sejodon. Hak bqtwhx xkkskq he ablk vkko 
sdqpbi hajetna b padxykjkq geolkjxbhdeo pako hak 
qeej eykokq; bww em haks weeckq bjetoq abxhdwi boq 
mkww xdwkoh. 

Bmhkj b atjjdkq vjkbcmbxh haki ytwwkq eo zbgckhx boq 
xgbjlkx bnbdoxh hak gadwwi njbi Zbotbji sejodon. 

Abjji abq bo toywkbxboh geoxhjdghkq xkoxbhdeo do adx 
gakxh; ak qdq oeh pboh he xbi neeq-vik he Xdjdtx. Ak 
abq b vbq mkkwdon bveth hadx ybjhdon; ak qdq oeh coep 
pako haki petwq okuh xkk kbga ehakj boq mkwh habh dh 
pbx dogtsvkoh tyeo ads he xbi xeskhadon he Xdjdtx 
he xhey ads qedon boihadon xhtydq — Abjji pbx 
pejjdkq habh Xobyk’x bggtxbhdeo em gepbjqdgk abq 
xhton Xdjdtx xe vbqwi ak sdnah klko oep vk ywboodon 
xesk meewabjqi hjdy vkieoq Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. Vkmejk 
ak getwq hadoc em pabh he xbi, aepklkj, Xdjdtx abq 
vkgceokq ads he adx xdqk. 

“D pboh iet he hbck hadx,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi, hajtxhdon b 
vbqwi pjbyykq ybgcbnk jetnawi hak xdrk em b 
ybykjvbgc veec dohe Abjji’x aboqx. 

“Pabh dx dh?” Abjji bxckq. 

“B pbi em wkhhdon sk coep dm Xobyk’x ndldon iet b abjq 
hdsk. Oe, qeo’h eyko dh do akjk!” xbdq Xdjdtx, pdha b 
pbji weec bh Sjx. Pkbxwki, pae pbx hjidon he 
ykjxtbqk hak hpdox he pkbj aboq-codhhkq sdhhkox. “D 
qetvh Sewwi petwq byyjelk — vth D pboh iet he txk dh 
dm iet okkq sk, bww jdnah?” 

“Ecbi,” xbdq Abjji, xhepdon hak ybgcbnk bpbi do hak 
doxdqk yegckh em adx zbgckh, vth ak cokp ak petwq 
oklkj txk pabhklkj dh pbx. Dh petwq oeh vk ak, Abjji, 
pae wtjkq Xdjdtx mjes adx ywbgk em xbmkhi, oe sbhhkj 
aep metwwi Xobyk hjkbhkq ads do hakdj mejhagesdon 
Eggwtskogi gwbxxkx. 

“Wkh’x ne, hako,” xbdq Xdjdtx, gwbyydon Abjji eo hak 
xaetwqkj boq xsdwdon njdswi, boq vkmejk Abjji getwq 
xbi boihadon kwxk, haki pkjk akbqdon tyxhbdjx, 
xheyydon vkmejk hak akbldwi gabdokq boq vewhkq mjeoh 
qeej, xtjjetoqkq vi Pkbxwkix. 

“Neeq-vik, Abjji, hbck gbjk,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
atnndon ads. 

“Xkk iet Abjji, boq ckky bo kik eth mej xobckx mej 
sk!” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki nkodbwwi, xabcdon adx aboq. 

“Jdnah — ikba,” xbdq Abjji qdxhjbghkqwi. Dh pbx adx 
wbxh gabogk he hkww Xdjdtx he vk gbjkmtw; ak htjokq, 
weeckq dohe adx neqmbhakj’x mbgk boq eykokq adx setha 
he xykbc, vth vkmejk ak getwq qe xe Xdjdtx pbx ndldon 
ads b vjdkm, eok-bjskq atn. Ak xbdq njtmmwi, “Weec 
bmhkj ietjxkwm, Abjji,” boq okuh seskoh Abjji metoq 
adsxkwm vkdon xatohkq eth dohe hak dgi pdohkj bdj, pdha 
Heocx (heqbi akbldwi qdxntdxkq bx b hbww, hpkkqi 
pesbo pdha djeo-njbi abdj) gadllidon ads qepo hak 
xhkyx. 

Hak qeej em otsvkj hpkwlk xwbsskq xath vkadoq 
haks. Haki mewwepkq Wtydo qepo hak mjeoh xhkyx. Bx 
ak jkbgakq hak yblkskoh, Abjji weeckq bjetoq. 
Otsvkj hpkwlk pbx xajdocdon jbydqwi bx haexk eo 
kdhakj xdqk em dh xhjkhgakq xdqkpbix, xftkkrdon dh eth em 
xdnah; eok vwdoc wbhkj, dh abq neok. 

“Gesk eo, hak ftdgckj pk nkh eo hak vtx hak vkhhkj,”

okjletxokxx do hak nwbogk xak hajkp bjetoq hak 
xftbjk. Wtydo mwton eth adx jdnah bjs. 

VBON. 

B ldewkohwi ytjywk, hjdywk-qkgckj vtx abq byykbjkq eth 
em hado bdj do mjeoh em haks, objjepwi bledqdon hak
