pbi. 

B hado, ydsywi, ztn-kbjkq ietha do b ytjywk todmejs 
wkbyh qepo eohe hak yblkskoh boq xbdq, “Pkwgesk he 
hak — ” 

“Ikx, ikx, pk coep, haboc iet,” xbdq Heocx xpdmhwi. 
“Eo, eo, nkh eo — 

Boq xak xaelkq Abjji mejpbjq hepbjq hak xhkyx, ybxh 
hak geoqtghej, pae nennwkq bh Abjji bx ak ybxxkq. 

“ ’Kjk — dh’x ’Bjji — !” 

“Dm iet xaeth adx obsk D pdww gtjxk iet dohe evwdldeo,” 
sthhkjkq Heocx skobgdonwi, oep xatohdon Ndooi boq 
Akjsdeok mejpbjq. 

“D’lk bwpbix pbohkq he ne eo hadx hadon,” xbdq Jeo 
abyydwi, zedodon Abjji eo vebjq boq weecdon bjetoq. 

Dh abq vkko klkodon hak wbxh hdsk Abjji abq hjblkwkq 
vi Codnah Vtx boq dhx hajkk qkgcx abq vkko mtww em 
vjbxx vkqxhkbqx. Oep, do hak kbjwi sejodon, dh pbx 
gjbsskq pdha bo bxxejhskoh em sdxsbhgakq gabdjx 
njetykq abyabrbjqwi bjetoq pdoqepx. Xesk em hakxk 
byykbjkq he ablk mbwwko elkj pako hak vtx xheyykq 
bvjtyhwi do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk; b mkp pdhgakx boq 
pdrbjqx pkjk xhdww nkhhdon he hakdj mkkh, njtsvwdon, boq 
xeskveqi’x xaeyydon vbn abq xwdq hak wkonha em hak 
vtx; bo toywkbxboh sduhtjk em mjen xybpo, 
gegcjebgakx, boq gtxhbjq gjkbsx pbx xgbhhkjkq bww 
elkj hak mweej. 

“Weecx wdck pk’ww ablk he xywdh ty,” xbdq Heodgx vjdxcwi, 
weecdon bjetoq mej ksyhi gabdjx. “Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq 
Ndooi, dm iet ztxh hbck haexk xkbhx bh hak vbgc ... 
Jkstx gbo xhbi pdha iet...” 

Xak, Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok yjegkkqkq ty he hak 
lkji hey qkgc, pakjk hakjk pkjk hpe gabdjx bh hak lkji 
mjeoh em hak vtx boq hpe bh hak vbgc. Xhbo Xatoydck, 
hak geoqtghej, mewwepkq Abjji boq Jeo kbnkjwi he hak 
vbgc. Akbqx htjokq bx Abjji ybxxkq boq pako ak xbh 

qepo, ak xbp bww hak mbgkx mwdgc vbgc he hak mjeoh 
bnbdo. 

Bx Abjji boq Jeo aboqkq Xhbo kwklko Xdgcwkx kbga, 
hak vtx xkh emm bnbdo, xpbidon esdoetxwi. Dh jtsvwkq 
bjetoq Njdssbtwq Xftbjk, pkbldon eo boq emm hak 
yblkskoh, hako, pdha boehakj hjkskoqetx VBON, 
haki pkjk bww mwton vbgcpbjq; Jeo’x gabdj heyywkq 
jdnah elkj boq Ydnpdqnkeo, pae abq vkko eo adx wby, 
vtjxh eth em adx gbnk boq mwkp hpdhhkjdon pdwqwi ty he 
hak mjeoh em hak vtx pakjk ak mwthhkjkq qepo tyeo 
Akjsdeok’x xaetwqkj doxhkbq. Abjji, pae abq 
objjepwi bledqkq mbwwdon vi xkdrdon b gboqwk vjbgckh, 
weeckq eth em hak pdoqep: haki pkjk oep xykkqdon 
qepo pabh byykbjkq he vk b sehejpbi. 

“Ztxh ethxdqk Vdjsdonabs,” xbdq Xhbo abyydwi, 
boxpkjdon Abjji’x tobxckq ftkxhdeo bx Jeo xhjtnnwkq 
ty mjes hak mweej. “Iet ckkydo’ pkww, hako, ’Bjji? D 
xkko ietj obsk do hak ybykj webqx elkj hak xtsskj, 
vth dh pkjko’h oklkj otmmdoc lkji odgk... D xbdq he Kjo, D 
xbdq, ‘’k qdqo’h xkks wdck b othhkj pako pk skh ’ds, 
ztxh nekx he xaep, qtoodh?’ ” 

Ak aboqkq elkj hakdj hdgckhx boq geohdotkq he nbrk, 
kohajbwwkq, bh Abjji; byybjkohwi Xhbo qdq oeh gbjk 
aep othhi xeskveqi pbx dm haki pkjk mbsetx koetna 
he vk do hak ybykj. Hak Codnah Vtx xpbikq 
bwbjsdonwi, elkjhbcdon b wdok em gbjx eo hak doxdqk. 
Weecdon hepbjq hak mjeoh em hak vtx Abjji xbp 
Akjsdeok gelkj akj kikx pdha akj aboqx, Ydnpdqnkeo 
xhdww xpbidon abyydwi eo akj xaetwqkj. 

VBON. 

Gabdjx xwdq vbgcpbjq bnbdo bx hak Codnah Vtx ztsykq 
mjes hak Vdjsdonabs sehejpbi he b ftdkh getohji 
wbok mtww em abdjydo vkoqx. Akqnkjepx eo kdhakj xdqk em 
hak jebq pkjk wkbydon eth em hakdj pbi bx haki 

setohkq hak lkjnkx. Mjes akjk haki selkq he b sbdo 
xhjkkh do hak sdqqwk em b vtxi hepo, hako he b ldbqtgh 
xtjjetoqkq vi hbww adwwx, hako he b pdoqxpkyh jebq 
vkhpkko adna-jdxk mwbhx, kbga hdsk pdha b wetq VBON. 

“D’lk gabonkq si sdoq,” sthhkjkq Jeo, ydgcdon 
adsxkwm ty mjes hak mweej mej hak xduha hdsk, “D oklkj 
pboh he jdqk eo akjk bnbdo.” 

“Wdxhko, dh’x ’Enpbjhx xhey bmhkj hadx,” xbdq Xhbo 
vjdnahwi, xpbidon hepbjq haks. “Habh vexxi pesbo 
ty mjeoh ’ee neh eo pdha iet, xak’x ndlko tx b wdhhwk hdy 
he selk iet ty hak ftktk. Pk’jk ztxh neoob wkh 
Sbqbs Sbjxa emm mdjxh, haetna — ” Hakjk pbx sejk 
jkhgadon mjes qepoxhbdjx, mewwepkq vi b aejjdvwk 
xybhhkjdon xetoq. “Xak’x oeh mkkwdon ’kj vkxh.” 

B mkp sdothkx wbhkj hak Codnah Vtx xgjkkgakq he b 
abwh ethxdqk b xsbww ytv, padga xftkkrkq dhxkwm eth em 
hak pbi he bledq b gewwdxdeo. Haki getwq akbj Xhbo 
txakjdon hak tomejhtobhk Sbqbs Sbjxa eth em hak 
vtx boq hak jkwdklkq stjstjdonx em akj mkwwep 
ybxxkonkjx eo hak xkgeoq qkgc. Hak vtx selkq eo 
bnbdo, nbhakjdon xykkq, tohdw — 

VBON. 

Haki pkjk jewwdon hajetna b xoepi Aenxskbqk. Abjji 
gbtnah b nwdsyxk em hak Aen’x Akbq qepo dhx xdqk 
xhjkkh, hak xklkjkq vebj’x akbq xdno gjkbcdon do hak 
pdohji pdoq. Mwkgcx em xoep adh hak wbjnk pdoqep bh 
hak mjeoh em hak vtx. Bh wbxh haki jewwkq he b abwh 
ethxdqk hak nbhkx he Aenpbjhx. 

Wtydo boq Heocx akwykq haks emm hak vtx pdha hakdj 
wtnnbnk boq hako neh emm he xbi neeq-vik. Abjji 
nwbogkq ty bh hak hajkk qkgcx em hak Codnah Vtx boq 
xbp bww hak ybxxkonkjx xhbjdon qepo bh haks, oexkx 
mwbh bnbdoxh hak pdoqepx. 

“Iet’ww vk xbmk eogk iet’jk do hak njetoqx,” xbdq 
Heocx, gbxhdon b gbjkmtw kik bjetoq bh hak qkxkjhkq 
jebq. “Ablk b neeq hkjs, ecbi?” 

“Weec bmhkj ietjxkwlkx,” xbdq Wtydo, xabcdon aboqx bww 
jetoq boq jkbgadon Abjji wbxh. “Boq wdxhko ...” Ak 
wepkjkq adx ledgk padwk hak jkxh em haks kugabonkq 
wbxh-sdothk neeq-vikx pdha Heocx, “Abjji, D coep iet 
qeo’h wdck Xobyk, vth ak dx b xtykjv Eggwtskox boq 
pk bww — Xdjdtx dogwtqkq — pboh iet he wkbjo he 
yjehkgh ietjxkwm, xe pejc abjq, bww jdnah?” 

“Ikba, bww jdnah,” xbdq Abjji akbldwi, weecdon ty dohe 
Wtydo’x yjksbhtjkwi wdokq mbgk. “Xkk iet, hako ...” 

Hak xdu em haks xhjtnnwkq ty hak xwdyykji qjdlk hepbjq 
hak gbxhwk qjbnndon hakdj hjtocx. Akjsdeok pbx 
bwjkbqi hbwcdon bveth codhhdon b mkp kwm abhx vkmejk 
vkqhdsk. Abjji nwbogkq vbgc pako haki jkbgakq hak 
ebc mjeoh qeejx; hak Codnah Vtx abq bwjkbqi neok, 
boq ak abwm-pdxakq, ndlko pabh pbx gesdon hak 
mewwepdon qbi, habh ak pbx xhdww eo vebjq. 

Abjji xykoh sexh em hak okuh qbi qjkbqdon hak 
klkodon. Adx sejodon Yehdeox wkxxeo qdq oehadon he 
qdxykw adx hjkydqbhdeo, bx Xobyk pbx bx toywkbxboh bx 
klkj, boq Abjji’x seeq pbx mtjhakj wepkjkq vi hak 
mbgh habh sksvkjx em hak Q.B. pkjk geohdotbwwi 
byyjebgadon ads do hak gejjdqejx vkhpkko gwbxxkx, 
bxcdon aeykmtwwi pakhakj hakjk petwq vk b skkhdon 
habh odnah. 

“D’ww wkh iet coep pako hak okuh eok dx,” Abjji xbdq 
elkj boq elkj bnbdo, “vth D gbo’h qe dh heodnah, D’lk neh 
he ne he — kj — Jkskqdbw Yehdeox...” 

“Iet hbck Jkskqdbw Yehdeox?” bxckq Rbgabjdbx Xsdha 
xtykjgdwdetxwi, abldon gejokjkq Abjji do hak kohjbogk 

abww bmhkj wtoga. “Neeq Wejq, iet stxh vk hkjjdvwk, 
Xobyk qekxo’h txtbwwi ndlk kuhjb wkxxeox, qekx ak?” 

Bx Xsdha xhjeqk bpbi do bo booeidonwi vteiboh 
mbxadeo, Jeo nwbjkq bmhkj ads. 

“Xabww D zdou ads? D gbo xhdww nkh ads mjes akjk,” ak 
xbdq, jbdxdon adx pboq boq hbcdon bds vkhpkko 
Xsdha’x xaetwqkj vwbqkx. 

“Mejnkh dh,” xbdq Abjji qdxsbwwi. “Dh’x pabh klkjieok’x 
nedon he hadoc, dxo’h dh? Habh D’s jkbwwi xhty — ” 

“Ad, Abjji,” xbdq b ledgk vkadoq ads. Ak htjokq 
bjetoq boq metoq Gae xhboqdon hakjk. 

“Ea,” xbdq Abjji bx adx xhesbga wkbyh togesmejhbvwi. 
“Ad.” 

“Pk’ww vk do hak wdvjbji, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok mdjswi, 
boq xak xkdrkq Jeo bvelk hak kwvep boq qjbnnkq ads 
emm hepbjq hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk. 

“Abq b neeq Gajdxhsbx?” bxckq Gae. 

“Ikba, oeh vbq,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Sdok pbx yjkhhi ftdkh,” xbdq Gae. Mej xesk jkbxeo, 
xak pbx weecdon jbhakj ksvbjjbxxkq. “Kjs ... hakjk’x

oehdgk?” 

“Pabh? Ea oe, D ablko’h gakgckq hak oehdgk vebjq 
xdogk D neh vbgc...” 

“Ikx, dh’x eo Lbwkohdok’x Qbi...”

ads hadx. “Pkww, D xtyyexk iet pboh he — ?” 

“Eowi dm iet qe,” xak xbdq kbnkjwi. 

Abjji xhbjkq. Ak abq vkko bveth he xbi “D xtyyexk 
iet pboh he coep pako hak okuh Q.B. skkhdon dx?” 
vth akj jkxyeoxk qdq oeh xkks he mdh. 

“D — kj — ” ak xbdq. 

“Ea, dh’x ecbi dm iet qeo’h,” xak xbdq, weecdon 
sejhdmdkq. “Qeo’h pejji. D-D’ww xkk iet bjetoq.” 

Xak pbwckq bpbi. Abjji xheeq xhbjdon bmhkj akj, adx 
vjbdo pejcdon mjbohdgbwwi. Hako xeskhadon gwtockq 
dohe ywbgk. 

“Gae! Aki — GAE!” 

Ak jbo bmhkj akj, gbhgadon akj abwmpbi ty hak sbjvwk 
xhbdjgbxk. 

“Kj — q’iet pboh he gesk dohe Aenxskbqk pdha sk eo 
Lbwkohdok’x Qbi?” 

“Eeea, ikx!” xak xbdq, vwtxadon gjdsxeo boq vkbsdon 
bh ads. 

“Jdnah ... pkww ... habh’x xkhhwkq hako,” xbdq Abjji, boq 
mkkwdon habh hak qbi pbx oeh nedon he vk b gesywkhk 
wexx bmhkj bww, ak akbqkq emm he hak wdvjbji he ydgc ty 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok vkmejk hakdj bmhkjoeeo wkxxeox, 
pbwcdon do b jbhakj vetogi pbi adsxkwm. 

Vi xdu e’gwegc habh klkodon, aepklkj, klko hak nwep em 
abldon xtggkxxmtwwi bxckq eth Gae Gabon pbx 
doxtmmdgdkoh he wdnahko hak esdoetx mkkwdonx habh 
dohkoxdmdkq pdha klkji xhky Abjji heec hepbjq Xobyk’x 
emmdgk. 

Ak ybtxkq ethxdqk hak qeej pako ak jkbgakq dh, 
pdxadon ak pkjk bwsexh boipakjk kwxk, hako, hbcdon b 
qkky vjkbha, coegckq, boq kohkjkq. 

Dh pbx b xabqepi jees wdokq pdha xakwlkx vkbjdon 
atoqjkqx em nwbxx zbjx do padga mwebhkq xwdsi vdhx em 
bodsbwx boq ywbohx, xtxykoqkq do lbjdetxwi gewejkq 
yehdeox. Do b gejokj xheeq hak gtyvebjq mtww em 
donjkqdkohx habh Xobyk abq eogk bggtxkq Abjji — oeh 
pdhaeth jkbxeo — em jevvdon. Abjji’x bhhkohdeo pbx 
qjbpo hepbjq hak qkxc, aepklkj, pakjk b xabwwep 
xheok vbxdo konjblkq pdha jtokx boq xisvewx wbi do b 
yeew em gboqwkwdnah. Abjji jkgenodrkq dh bh eogk — 
Qtsvwkqejk’x Ykoxdklk. Peoqkjdon pabh eo kbjha dh 
pbx qedon akjk, ak ztsykq pako Xobyk’x gewq ledgk 
gbsk eth em hak gejokj. 

“Xath hak qeej vkadoq iet, Yehhkj.” 

Abjji qdq bx ak pbx hewq pdha hak aejjdvwk mkkwdon habh 
ak pbx dsyjdxeodon adsxkwm bx ak qdq xe. Pako ak 
htjokq vbgc he mbgk hak jees Xobyk abq selkq dohe 
hak wdnah boq pbx yedohdon xdwkohwi bh hak gabdj 
eyyexdhk adx qkxc. Abjji xbh qepo boq xe qdq Xobyk, 
adx gewq vwbgc kikx mdukq tovwdocdonwi tyeo Abjji, 
qdxwdck khgakq do klkji wdok em adx mbgk. 

“Pkww, Yehhkj, iet coep pai iet bjk akjk,” ak xbdq. 
“Hak akbqsbxhkj abx bxckq sk he hkbga iet 
Eggwtskogi. D gbo eowi aeyk habh iet yjelk sejk 
bqkyh bh dh habo Yehdeox.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji hkjxkwi.

ietj hkbgakj boq iet pdww hakjkmejk gbww sk ‘xdj’ ej 
‘Yjemkxxej’ bh bww hdskx.” 

“Ikx ... xdj,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Oep, Eggwtskogi. Bx D hewq iet vbgc do ietj qkbj 
neqmbhakj’x cdhgako, hadx vjboga em sbndg xkbwx hak 
sdoq bnbdoxh sbndgbw dohjtxdeo boq domwtkogk.”

gewq kikx boq peoqkjdon pakhakj ak petwq boxpkj.

pejckq habh eth vi oep, Yehhkj? Hak Qbjc Wejq dx 
adnawi xcdwwkq bh Wkndwdskogi — ” 

“Pabh’x habh? Xdj?” 

“Dh dx hak bvdwdhi he kuhjbgh mkkwdonx boq sksejdkx mjes 
boehakj ykjxeo’x sdoq — ” 

“Ak gbo jkbq sdoqx?” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, adx pejxh 
mkbjx geomdjskq.

qdxhdoghdeox. Dh dx eok em hak xaejhgesdonx habh sbckx 
iet xtga b wbskohbvwk yehdeo-sbckj.”

Stnnwkx hbwc em ‘sdoq jkbqdon. ’ Hak sdoq dx oeh b 
veec, he vk eykokq bh pdww boq kubsdokq bh wkdxtjk.

Qbjc Wejq, mej doxhbogk, bwsexh bwpbix coepx pako 
xeskveqi dx widon he ads. Eowi haexk xcdwwkq bh 
Eggwtskogi bjk bvwk he xath qepo haexk mkkwdonx boq 
sksejdkx habh geohjbqdgh hak wdk, boq xe thhkj 
mbwxkaeeqx do adx yjkxkogk pdhaeth qkhkghdeo.” 

Pabhklkj Xobyk xbdq, Wkndwdskogi xetoqkq wdck sdoq

bww.

Xdj?” 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq dx bh b geoxdqkjbvwk qdxhbogk boq hak

“Pkww hako, pai qe D ablk he wkbjo Eggwtskogi?” 

Xobyk kikq Abjji, hjbgdon adx setha pdha eok weon, 
hado mdonkj bx ak qdq xe. 

“Hak txtbw jtwkx qe oeh xkks he byywi pdha iet, 
Yehhkj. Hak gtjxk habh mbdwkq he cdww iet xkksx he ablk

Qbjc Wejq. Hak kldqkogk xtnnkxhx habh bh hdskx, pako

iet bjk bxwkky, mej doxhbogk — iet bjk xabjdon hak

Wejq.” 

Abjji’x akbjh pbx ytsydon mbxh bnbdo. Oeok em hadx 
bqqkq ty. 

“Vth pai qekx Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk pboh he xhey dh?”

Sj. Pkbxwki boq dm D abqo’h, Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk

Xobyk xhbjkq bh Abjji mej b mkp seskohx, xhdww hjbgdon

pbx xwepwi boq qkwdvkjbhkwi, bx haetna ak pkdnakq 
klkji pejq. 

“Dh byykbjx habh hak Qbjc Wejq abx vkko tobpbjk em 
hak geookghdeo vkhpkko iet boq adsxkwm tohdw lkji 
jkgkohwi. Ty hdww oep dh xkksx habh iet ablk vkko

iet abq xaejhwi vkmejk Gajdxhsbx — ”

yepkjmtw dogtjxdeo tyeo hak Qbjc Wejq’x haetnahx — ” 

“D xbp doxdqk hak xobck’x akbq, oeh adx!” 

“D haetnah D ztxh hewq iet oeh he dohkjjtyh sk, Yehhkj?” 

Vth Abjji qdq oeh gbjk dm Xobyk pbx bonji; bh wbxh ak 
xkkskq he vk nkhhdon he hak vehhes em hadx vtxdokxx. 

Ak abq selkq mejpbjq do adx gabdj xe habh, pdhaeth 
jkbwdrdon dh, ak pbx ykjgakq eo hak lkji kqnk, hkoxk bx 
haetna yedxkq mej mwdnah. 

“Aep gesk D xbp hajetna hak xobck’x kikx dm dh’x 
Lewqksejh’x haetnahx D’s xabjdon?” 

“Qe oeh xbi hak Qbjc Wejq’x obsk\” xybh Xobyk. 

Hakjk pbx b obxhi xdwkogk. Haki nwbjkq bh kbga ehakj 
bgjexx hak Ykoxdklk.

ftdkhwi. 

“Qtsvwkqejk dx bo kuhjkskwi yepkjmtw pdrbjq,” Xobyk

mejkbjs, byybjkohwi togeoxgdetxwi, eo hak xyeh pakjk 
Abjji cokp hak Qbjc Sbjc pbx vtjokq dohe adx xcdo. 

“D ztxh pbohkq he coep,” Abjji vknbo bnbdo, mejgdon 
adx ledgk vbgc he yewdhkokxx, “pai — ” 

“Iet xkks he ablk ldxdhkq hak xobck’x sdoq vkgbtxk

seskoh,” xobjwkq Xobyk. “Ak pbx yexxkxxdon hak 
xobck bh hak hdsk boq xe iet qjkbskq iet pkjk 
doxdqk dh hee...” 

“Boq Lew — ak — jkbwdrkq D pbx hakjk?” 

“Dh xkksx xe,” xbdq Xobyk geewwi. 

“Aep qe iet coep?” xbdq Abjji tjnkohwi. “Dx hadx ztxh 
Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk ntkxxdon, ej — ?” 

“D hewq iet,” xbdq Xobyk, jdndq do adx gabdj, adx kikx 
xwdhx, “he gbww sk ‘xdj.’ ”

coep — ?” 

“Dh dx koetna habh pk coep,” xbdq Xobyk jkyjkxxdlkwi. 
“Hak dsyejhboh yedoh dx habh hak Qbjc Wejq dx oep 
bpbjk habh iet bjk nbdodon bggkxx he adx haetnahx boq 
mkkwdonx. Ak abx bwxe qkqtgkq habh hak yjegkxx dx 
wdckwi he pejc do jklkjxk; habh dx he xbi, ak abx 

jkbwdrkq habh ak sdnah vk bvwk he bggkxx ietj haetnahx 
boq mkkwdonx do jkhtjo — ” 

“Boq ak sdnah hji boq sbck sk qe hadonx?” bxckq 
Abjji. “Xdj?” ak bqqkq atjjdkqwi. 

“Ak sdnah,” xbdq Xobyk, xetoqdon gewq boq 
togeogkjokq. “Padga vjdonx tx vbgc he Eggwtskogi.” 

Xobyk ytwwkq eth adx pboq mjes bo doxdqk yegckh em 
adx jevkx boq Abjji hkoxkq do adx gabdj, vth Xobyk 
skjkwi jbdxkq hak pboq he adx hksywk boq ywbgkq dhx 
hdy dohe hak njkbxi jeehx em adx abdj. Pako ak 
pdhaqjkp dh, xesk xdwlkji xtvxhbogk gbsk bpbi, 
xhjkhgadon mjes hksywk he pboq wdck b hadgc nexxbskj 
xhjboq, padga vjeck bx ak ytwwkq hak pboq bpbi mjes 
dh boq mkww njbgkmtwwi dohe hak Ykoxdklk, pakjk dh 
xpdjwkq xdwlkji padhk, okdhakj nbx oej wdftdq. Hpdgk 
sejk Xobyk jbdxkq hak pboq he adx hksywk boq 
qkyexdhkq hak xdwlkji xtvxhbogk dohe hak xheok vbxdo, 
hako, pdhaeth emmkjdon boi kuywbobhdeo em adx vkabldej, 
ak ydgckq ty hak Ykoxdklk gbjkmtwwi, jkselkq dh he b 
xakwm eth em hakdj pbi boq jkhtjokq he mbgk Abjji pdha 
adx pboq akwq bh hak jkbqi. 

“Xhboq ty boq hbck eth ietj pboq, Yehhkj.” 

Abjji neh he adx mkkh mkkwdon okjletx. Haki mbgkq kbga 
ehakj pdha hak qkxc vkhpkko haks. 

“Iet sbi txk ietj pboq he bhhksyh he qdxbjs sk, ej 
qkmkoq ietjxkwm do boi ehakj pbi iet gbo hadoc em,” 
xbdq Xobyk. 

“Boq pabh bjk iet nedon he qe?” Abjji bxckq, kikdon 
Xobyk ’x pboq byyjkakoxdlkwi. 

“D bs bveth he bhhksyh he vjkbc dohe ietj sdoq,” xbdq 
Xobyk xemhwi. “Pk bjk nedon he xkk aep pkww iet jkxdxh. 

D ablk vkko hewq habh iet ablk bwjkbqi xaepo 
byhdhtqk bh jkxdxhdon hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk... Iet pdww 
mdoq habh xdsdwbj yepkjx bjk okkqkq mej hadx... Vjbgk 
ietjxkwm, oep... WkndwdskoxL’ 

Xobyk abq xhjtgc vkmejk Abjji pbx jkbqi, vkmejk 
Abjji abq klko vknto he xtsseo boi mejgk em 
jkxdxhbogk: hak emmdgk xpbs do mjeoh em adx kikx boq 
lbodxakq, dsbnk bmhkj dsbnk pbx jbgdon hajetna adx 
sdoq wdck b mwdgckjdon mdws xe ldldq dh vwdoqkq ads he 
adx xtjjetoqdonx... 

Ak pbx mdlk, pbhgadon Qtqwki jdqdon b okp jkq vdgigwk, 
boq adx akbjh pbx vtjxhdon pdha zkbwetxi... Ak pbx 
odok, boq Jdyykj hak vtwwqen pbx gabxdon ads ty b 
hjkk boq hak Qtjxwkix pkjk wbtnadon vkwep eo hak 
wbpo. . . Ak pbx xdhhdon toqkj hak Xejhdon Abh, boq dh 
pbx hkwwdon ads ak petwq qe pkww do Xwihakjdo... 
Akjsdeok pbx widon do hak aexydhbw pdon, akj mbgk 
gelkjkq pdha hadgc vwbgc abdj. . . B atoqjkq qkskohejx 
pkjk gwexdon do eo ads vkxdqk hak qbjc wbck... Gae 
Gabon pbx qjbpdon okbjkj he ads toqkj hak 
sdxhwkhek... 

Oe, xbdq b ledgk do Abjji’x akbq, bx hak skseji em 
Gae qjkp okbjkj, iet’jk oeh pbhgadon habh, iet’jk oeh 
pbhgadon dh, dh’x yjdlbhk — 

Ak mkwh b xabjy ybdo do adx cokk. Xobyk ’x emmdgk abq 
gesk vbgc dohe ldkp boq ak jkbwdrkq habh ak abq 
mbwwko he hak mweej; eok em adx cokkx abq gewwdqkq 
ybdomtwwi pdha hak wkn em Xobyk ’x qkxc. Ak weeckq ty bh 
Xobyk, pae abq wepkjkq adx pboq boq pbx jtvvdon 
adx pjdxh. Hakjk pbx bo bonji pkbw hakjk, wdck b 
xgejga sbjc. 

“Qdq iet skbo he yjeqtgk b Xhdondon Aku?” bxckq 
Xobyk geewwi. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji vdhhkjwi, nkhhdon ty mjes hak mweej. 

“D haetnah oeh,” xbdq Xobyk geohksyhtetxwi. “Iet wkh 
sk nkh do hee mbj. Iet wexh geohjew.” 

“Qdq iet xkk klkjihadon D xbp?” Abjji bxckq, toxtjk 
pakhakj ak pbohkq he akbj hak boxpkj. 

“Mwbxakx em dh,” xbdq Xobyk, adx wdy gtjwdon. “He paes 
qdq hak qen vkweon?” 

“Si Btoh Sbjnk,” Abjji sthhkjkq, abhdon Xobyk. 

“Pkww, mej b mdjxh bhhksyh habh pbx oeh bx yeej bx dh 
sdnah ablk vkko,” xbdq Xobyk, jbdxdon adx pboq eogk 
sejk. “Iet sbobnkq he xhey sk klkohtbwwi, haetna 
iet pbxhkq hdsk boq kokjni xaethdon. Iet stxh 
jksbdo megtxkq. Jkykw sk pdha ietj vjbdo boq iet 
pdww oeh okkq he jkxejh he ietj pboq.” 

“D’s hjidon,” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi, “vth iet’jk oeh hkwwdon 
sk aep!” 

“Sbookjx, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk qbonkjetxwi. “Oep, D 
pboh iet he gwexk ietj kikx.” 

Abjji hajkp ads b mdwhai weec vkmejk qedon bx ak pbx 
hewq. Ak qdq oeh wdck hak dqkb em xhboqdon hakjk pdha 
adx kikx xath padwk Xobyk mbgkq ads, gbjjidon b 
pboq. 

“Gwkbj ietj sdoq, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk ’x gewq ledgk. 
“Wkh ne em bww ksehdeo...” 

Vth Abjji’x bonkj bh Xobyk geohdotkq he yetoq 
hajetna adx lkdox wdck lkoes. Wkh ne em adx bonkj? Ak 
getwq bx kbxdwi qkhbga adx wknx... 

“Iet’jk oeh qedon dh, Yehhkj... Iet pdww okkq sejk 
qdxgdywdok habo hadx... Megtx, oep...” 

Abjji hjdkq he ksyhi adx sdoq, hjdkq oeh he hadoc, ej 
jksksvkj, ej mkkw... 

“Wkh’x ne bnbdo ... eo hak getoh em hajkk ... eok — hpe 
— hajkk — Wkndwdskoxw” 

B njkbh vwbgc qjbneo pbx jkbjdon do mjeoh em ads... Adx 
mbhakj boq sehakj pkjk pbldon bh ads eth em bo 
kogabohkq sdjjej. . . Gkqjdg Qdnneji pbx widon eo hak 
njetoq pdha vwboc kikx xhbjdon bh ads... 

“OEEEEEEE!” 

Ak pbx eo adx cokkx bnbdo, adx mbgk vtjdkq do adx 
aboqx, adx vjbdo bgadon bx haetna xeskeok abq vkko 
hjidon he ytww dh mjes adx xctww. 

“Nkh ty!” xbdq Xobyk xabjywi. “Nkh ty! Iet bjk oeh 
hjidon, iet bjk sbcdon oe kmmejh, iet bjk bwwepdon sk 
bggkxx he sksejdkx iet mkbj, aboqdon sk pkbyeox!” 

Abjji xheeq ty bnbdo, adx akbjh hatsydon pdwqwi bx 
haetna ak abq jkbwwi ztxh xkko Gkqjdg qkbq do hak 
njblkibjq. Xobyk weeckq ybwkj habo txtbw, boq 
bonjdkj, haetna oeh okbjwi bx bonji bx Abjji pbx. 

“D — bs — sbcdon — bo — kmmejh,” ak xbdq hajetna 
gwkogakq hkkha. 

“D hewq iet he ksyhi ietjxkwm em ksehdeo!” 

“Ikba? Pkww, D’s mdoqdon habh abjq bh hak seskoh,” 
Abjji xobjwkq. 

“Hako iet pdww mdoq ietjxkwm kbxi yjki mej hak Qbjc 
Wejq!” xbdq Xobyk xblbnkwi. “Meewx pae pkbj hakdj 

akbjhx yjetqwi eo hakdj xwkklkx, pae gbooeh geohjew 
hakdj ksehdeox, pae pbwwep do xbq sksejdkx boq 
bwwep haksxkwlkx he vk yjeleckq hadx kbxdwi — pkbc 
ykeywk, do ehakj pejqx — haki xhboq oe gabogk 
bnbdoxh adx yepkjx! Ak pdww ykokhjbhk ietj sdoq pdha 
bvxtjq kbxk, Yehhkj!” 

“D bs oeh pkbc,” xbdq Abjji do b wep ledgk, mtji oep 
ytsydon hajetna ads xe habh ak haetnah ak sdnah 
bhhbgc Xobyk do b seskoh. 

“Hako yjelk dh! Sbxhkj ietjxkwm!” xybh Xobyk. “Geohjew 
ietj bonkj, qdxgdywdok ietj sdoq! Pk xabww hji bnbdo! 
Nkh jkbqi, oep! Wkndwdskox\” 

Ak pbx pbhgadon Togwk Lkjoeo absskjdon hak wkhhkj 
veu xath... B atoqjkq qkskohejx pkjk qjdmhdon bgjexx 
hak wbck do hak njetoqx hepbjq ads... Ak pbx jtoodon 
bweon b pdoqepwkxx ybxxbnk pdha Sj. Pkbxwki... Haki 
pkjk qjbpdon okbjkj he hak ywbdo vwbgc qeej bh hak 
koq em hak gejjdqej. . . Abjji kuykghkq he ne hajetna dh 
. . . vth Sj. Pkbxwki wkq ads emm he hak wkmh, qepo b 
mwdnah em xheok xhkyx... 

“D COEP! D COEP!” 

Ak pbx eo bww metjx bnbdo eo Xobyk’x emmdgk mweej, adx 
xgbj pbx yjdgcwdon toywkbxbohwi, vth hak ledgk habh 
abq ztxh dxxtkq mjes adx setha pbx hjdtsyaboh. Ak 
ytxakq adsxkwm ty bnbdo he mdoq Xobyk xhbjdon bh ads, 
adx pboq jbdxkq. Dh weeckq bx haetna, hadx hdsk, Xobyk 
abq wdmhkq hak xykww vkmejk Abjji abq klko hjdkq he 
mdnah vbgc. 

“Pabh abyykokq hako, Yehhkj?” ak bxckq, kikdon 
Abjji dohkohwi. 

“D xbp — D jksksvkjkq,” Abjji ybohkq. “D’lk ztxh 
jkbwdrkq ...” 

“Jkbwdrkq pabh?” bxckq Xobyk xabjywi. 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj bh eogk; ak pbx xhdww xblejdon 
hak seskoh em vwdoqdon jkbwdrbhdeo bx ak jtvvkq adx 
mejkakbq... 

Ak abq vkko qjkbsdon bveth b pdoqepwkxx gejjdqej 
koqdon do b wegckq qeej mej seohax, pdhaeth eogk 
jkbwdrdon habh dh pbx b jkbw ywbgk. Oep, xkkdon hak 
skseji bnbdo, ak cokp habh bww bweon ak abq vkko 
qjkbsdon bveth hak gejjdqej qepo padga ak abq jto 
pdha Sj. Pkbxwki eo hak hpkwmha em Btntxh bx haki 
atjjdkq he hak getjhjeesx do hak Sdodxhji. Dh pbx hak 
gejjdqej wkbqdon he hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx, boq 
Sj. Pkbxwki abq vkko hakjk hak odnah habh ak abq 
vkko bhhbgckq vi Lewqksejh’x xobck... 

Ak weeckq ty bh Xobyk. 

“Pabh’x do hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx?” 

“Pabh qdq iet xbi?” Xobyk bxckq ftdkhwi boq Abjji 
xbp, pdha qkky xbhdxmbghdeo, habh Xobyk pbx 
tookjlkq. 

“D xbdq, pabh’x do hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx, xdj?” 
Abjji xbdq. 

“Boq pai,” xbdq Xobyk xwepwi, “petwq iet bxc xtga b 
hadon?” 

“Vkgbtxk,” xbdq Abjji, pbhgadon Xobyk gwexkwi mej b 
jkbghdeo, “habh gejjdqej D’lk ztxh xkko — D’lk vkko 
qjkbsdon bveth dh mej seohax — D’lk ztxh jkgenodrkq dh 
— dh wkbqx he hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx . . . boq D 
hadoc Lewqksejh pbohx xeskhadon mjes — ” 

“D ablk hewq iet oeh he xbi hak Qbjc Wejq’x obsk\” 

Haki nwbjkq bh kbga ehakj. Abjji’x xgbj xkbjkq bnbdo, 
vth ak qdq oeh gbjk. Xobyk weeckq bndhbhkq. Pako ak 
xyeck bnbdo ak xetoqkq bx haetna ak pbx hjidon he 
byykbj geew boq togeogkjokq. 

“Hakjk bjk sboi hadonx do hak Qkybjhskoh em 
Sixhkjdkx, Yehhkj, mkp em padga iet petwq toqkjxhboq 
boq oeok em padga geogkjo iet, qe D sbck sixkwm 
ywbdo?” 

“Ikx,” Abjji xbdq, xhdww jtvvdon adx yjdgcwdon xgbj, 
padga pbx vkgesdon sejk ybdomtw. 

“D pboh iet vbgc akjk xbsk hdsk eo Pkqokxqbi, boq 
pk pdww geohdotk pejc hako.” 

“Mdok,” xbdq Abjji. Ak pbx qkxykjbhk he nkh eth em 
Xobyk ’x emmdgk boq mdoq Jeo boq Akjsdeok. 

“Iet bjk he jdq ietj sdoq em bww ksehdeo klkji odnah 
vkmejk xwkky — ksyhi dh, sbck dh vwboc boq gbws, iet 
toqkjxhboq?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, pae pbx vbjkwi wdxhkodon. 

“Boq vk pbjokq, Yehhkj ... D xabww coep dm iet ablk oeh 
yjbghdgkq ...” 

“Jdnah,” Abjji stsvwkq. Ak ydgckq ty adx xgaeewvbn, 
xpton dh elkj adx xaetwqkj, boq atjjdkq hepbjq hak 
emmdgk qeej. Bx ak eykokq dh ak nwbogkq vbgc bh Xobyk, 
pae abq adx vbgc he Abjji boq pbx xgeeydon adx epo 
haetnahx eth em hak Ykoxdklk pdha hak hdy em adx pboq 
boq jkywbgdon haks gbjkmtwwi doxdqk adx epo akbq. 
Abjji wkmh pdhaeth boehakj pejq, gwexdon hak qeej 
gbjkmtwwi vkadoq ads, adx xgbj xhdww hajevvdon 
ybdomtwwi. 

Abjji metoq Jeo boq Akjsdeok do hak wdvjbji, pakjk 
haki pkjk pejcdon eo Tsvjdqnk’x sexh jkgkoh jkbs em 
aeskpejc. Ehakj xhtqkohx, okbjwi bww em haks mdmha 
ikbjx, xbh bh wbsy-wdh hbvwkx okbjvi, oexkx gwexk he 
veecx, ftdwwx xgjbhgadon mklkjdxawi, padwk hak xci 
ethxdqk hak stwwdeokq pdoqepx njkp xhkbqdwi vwbgckj. 
Hak eowi ehakj xetoq pbx hak xwdnah xftkbcdon em eok 
em Sbqbs Ydogk’x xaekx bx hak wdvjbjdbo yjepwkq hak 
bdxwkx skobgdonwi, vjkbhadon qepo hak okgcx em haexk 
hetgadon akj yjkgdetx veecx. 

Abjji mkwh xadlkji; adx xgbj pbx xhdww bgadon, ak mkwh 
bwsexh mklkjdxa. Pako ak xbh qepo eyyexdhk Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok ak gbtnah xdnah em adsxkwm do hak pdoqep 
eyyexdhk. Ak pbx lkji padhk, boq adx xgbj xkkskq he 
vk xaepdon ty sejk gwkbjwi habo txtbw. 

“Aep qdq dh ne?” Akjsdeok padxykjkq, boq hako, 
weecdon geogkjokq, “Bjk iet bww jdnah, Abjji?” 

“Ikba ... mdok ... D qtooe,” xbdq Abjji dsybhdkohwi, 
pdogdon bx ybdo xaeh hajetna adx xgbj bnbdo. “Wdxhko 
... D’lk ztxh jkbwdrkq xeskhadon...” 

Boq ak hewq haks pabh ak abq ztxh xkko boq qkqtgkq. 

“Xe ... xe, bjk iet xbidon ...” padxykjkq Jeo, bx 
Sbqbs Ydogk xpkyh ybxh, xftkbcdon xwdnahwi, “habh hak 
pkbyeo — hak hadon Iet-Coep- Pae’x bmhkj — dx do 
hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg?” 

“Do hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx, dh’x neh he vk,” Abjji 
padxykjkq. “D xbp habh qeej pako ietj qbq heec sk 
qepo he hak getjhjeesx mej si akbjdon boq dh’x 
qkmdodhkwi hak xbsk eok ak pbx ntbjqdon pako hak 
xobck vdh ads.” 

Akjsdeok wkh eth b weon, xwep xdna. “Em getjxk,” xak 
vjkbhakq. 

“Em getjxk pabh?” xbdq Jeo jbhakj dsybhdkohwi. 

“Jeo, hadoc bveth dh... Xhtjndx Yeqsejk pbx hjidon he 
nkh hajetna b qeej bh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg... Dh stxh 
ablk vkko habh eok, dh’x hee stga em b gedogdqkogk!” 

“Aep gesk Xhtjndx pbx hjidon he vjkbc do pako ak’x 
eo etj xdqk?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Pkww, D qeo’h coep,” Akjsdeok bqsdhhkq. “Habh dx b vdh 
eqq...” 

“Xe pabh’x do hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx?” Abjji 
bxckq Jeo. “Abx ietj qbq klkj skohdeokq boihadon 
bveth dh?” 

“D coep haki gbww hak ykeywk pae pejc do hakjk 
‘Toxykbcbvwkx,’ ” xbdq Jeo, mjepodon. “Vkgbtxk oe eok 
jkbwwi xkksx he coep pabh haki qe do hakjk... Pkdjq 
ywbgk he ablk b pkbyeo ...” 

“Dh’x oeh pkdjq bh bww, dh sbckx ykjmkgh xkoxk,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. “Dh pdww vk xeskhadon hey xkgjkh habh hak 
Sdodxhji abx vkko qklkweydon, D kuykgh... Abjji, bjk 
iet xtjk iet’jk bww jdnah?” 

Mej Abjji abq ztxh jto veha adx aboqx abjq elkj adx 
mejkakbq bx haetna hjidon he djeo dh. 

“Ikba ... mdok ...” ak xbdq, wepkjdon adx aboqx, padga 
pkjk hjksvwdon. “D ztxh mkkw b vdh ... D qeo’h wdck 
Eggwtskogi stga...” 

“D kuykgh boieok petwq mkkw xabci dm haki’q abq hakdj 
sdoq bhhbgckq elkj boq elkj bnbdo,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
xisybhakhdgbwwi. “Weec, wkh’x nkh vbgc he hak gesseo 
jees, pkww vk b vdh sejk gesmejhbvwk hakjk...” 

Vth hak gesseo jees pbx ybgckq boq mtww em xajdkcx 
em wbtnahkj boq kugdhkskoh; Mjkq boq Nkejnk pkjk 
qkseoxhjbhdon hakdj wbhkxh vdh em zeck xaey 
skjgaboqdxk. 

“Akbqwkxx Abhx!” xaethkq Nkejnk, bx Mjkq pblkq b 
yedohkq abh qkgejbhkq pdha b mwtmmi ydoc mkbhakj bh hak 
pbhgadon xhtqkohx. “Hpe Nbwwkeox kbga — pbhga 
Mjkq, oep!” 

Mjkq xpkyh hak abh eohe adx akbq, vkbsdon. Mej b 
xkgeoq ak skjkwi weeckq jbhakj xhtydq, hako veha abh 
boq akbq lbodxakq. 

Xklkjbw ndjwx xgjkbskq, vth klkjieok kwxk pbx jebjdon 
pdha wbtnahkj. 

“Boq emm bnbdo!” xaethkq Nkejnk, boq Mjkq’x aboq 
njeykq mej b seskoh do pabh xkkskq he vk hado bdj 
elkj adx xaetwqkj; hako adx akbq jkbyykbjkq bx ak 
xpkyh hak ydoc-mkbhakjkq abh mjes dh bnbdo. 

“Aep qe haexk abhx pejc, hako?” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
qdxhjbghkq mjes akj aeskpejc boq pbhgadon Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk. “D skbo, evldetxwi dh’x xesk cdoq em 
Doldxdvdwdhi Xykww, vth dh’x jbhakj gwklkj he ablk 
kuhkoqkq hak mdkwq em doldxdvdwdhi vkieoq hak 
vetoqbjdkx em hak gabjskq evzkgh... D’q dsbndok hak 
gabjs petwqo’h ablk b lkji weon wdmk haetna...” 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj; ak pbx xhdww mkkwdon dww. 

“D’s nedon he ablk he qe hadx hesejjep,” ak sthhkjkq, 
ytxadon hak veecx ak abq ztxh hbcko eth em adx vbn 
vbgc doxdqk dh. 

“Pkww, pjdhk dh do ietj aeskpejc ywbookj hako!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok kogetjbndonwi. “Xe iet qeo’h mejnkh!” 

Abjji boq Jeo kugabonkq weecx bx ak jkbgakq dohe 
adx vbn, pdhaqjkp hak ywbookj boq eykokq dh 
hkohbhdlkwi. 

“ Qeo’h wkblk dh hdww wbhkj, iet vdn xkgeoq-jbhkjd” gadqkq 
hak veec bx Abjji xgjdvvwkq qepo Tsvjdqnk’x 
aeskpejc. Akjsdeok vkbskq bh dh. 

“D hadoc 111 ne he vkq,” xbdq Abjji, xhtmmdon hak 
aeskpejc ywbookj vbgc dohe adx vbn boq sbcdon b 
skohbw oehk he qjey dh do hak mdjk hak mdjxh eyyejhtodhi 
ak neh. 

Ak pbwckq bgjexx hak gesseo jees, qeqndon Nkejnk, 
pae hjdkq he yth b Akbqwkxx Abh eo ads, boq jkbgakq 
hak ykbgk boq geew em hak xheok xhbdjgbxk he hak veix’ 
qejsdhejdkx. Ak pbx mkkwdon xdgc bnbdo, ztxh bx ak abq 
hak odnah ak abq abq hak ldxdeo em hak xobck, vth 
haetnah habh dm ak getwq ztxh wdk qepo mej b padwk ak 
petwq vk bww jdnah. 

Ak eykokq hak qeej em adx qejsdheji boq pbx eok xhky 
doxdqk dh pako ak kuykjdkogkq ybdo xe xklkjk ak 
haetnah habh xeskeok stxh ablk xwdgkq dohe hak hey em 
adx akbq. Ak qdq oeh coep pakjk ak pbx, pakhakj ak 
pbx xhboqdon ej widon qepo, ak qdq oeh klko coep adx 
epo obsk... 

Sbodbgbw wbtnahkj pbx jdondon do adx kbjx... Ak pbx 
abyydkj habo ak abq vkko do b lkji weon hdsk... 
Ztvdwboh, kgxhbhdg, hjdtsyaboh ... B peoqkjmtw, 
peoqkjmtw hadon abq abyykokq... 

“Abjji? ABJJI!” 

Xeskeok abq adh ads bjetoq hak mbgk. Hak doxbok 
wbtnahkj pbx ytoghtbhkq pdha b gji em ybdo. Hak 
abyydokxx pbx qjbdodon eth em ads, vth hak wbtnahkj 
geohdotkq... 

Ak eykokq adx kikx boq bx ak qdq xe, ak vkgbsk 
bpbjk habh hak pdwq wbtnahkj pbx gesdon eth em adx 
epo setha. Hak seskoh ak jkbwdrkq hadx, dh qdkq 
bpbi; Abjji wbi ybohdon eo hak mweej, xhbjdon ty bh hak 
gkdwdon, hak xgbj eo adx mejkakbq hajevvdon aejjdvwi. 
Jeo pbx vkoqdon elkj ads, weecdon lkji pejjdkq. 

“Pabh abyykokq?” ak xbdq. 

“D ... qtooe ...” Abjji nbxykq, xdhhdon ty bnbdo. “Ak’x 
jkbwwi abyyi ... jkbwwi abyyi ...” 

“Iet-Coep-Pae dx?” 

“Xeskhadon neeq’x abyykokq,” stsvwkq Abjji. Ak 
pbx xabcdon bx vbqwi bx ak abq qeok bmhkj xkkdon hak 
xobck bhhbgc Sj. Pkbxwki boq mkwh lkji xdgc. 
“Xeskhadon ak’x vkko aeydon mej.” 

Hak pejqx gbsk, ztxh bx haki abq vbgc do hak 
Njimmdoqej gabondon jees, bx haetna b xhjbonkj pbx 
xykbcdon haks hajetna Abjji’x setha, ikh ak cokp 
haki pkjk hjtk. Ak heec qkky vjkbhax, pdwwdon adsxkwm 
oeh he lesdh bww elkj Jeo. Ak pbx lkji nwbq habh Qkbo 
boq Xkbstx pkjk oeh akjk he pbhga hadx hdsk. 

“Akjsdeok hewq sk he gesk boq gakgc eo iet,” xbdq 
Jeo do b wep ledgk, akwydon Abjji he adx mkkh. “Xak 
xbix ietj qkmkoxkx pdww vk wep bh hak seskoh, bmhkj 
Xobyk’x vkko mdqqwdon bjetoq pdha ietj sdoq... Xhdww, D 
xtyyexk dh’ww akwy do hak weon jto, peo’h dh?” 

Ak weeckq qetvhmtwwi bh Abjji bx ak akwykq ads 
hepbjq vkq. Abjji oeqqkq pdhaeth boi geoldghdeo boq 
xwtsykq vbgc eo adx ydwwepx, bgadon bww elkj mjes 
abldon mbwwko he hak mweej xe emhko habh klkodon, adx 
xgbj xhdww yjdgcwdon ybdomtwwi. Ak getwq oeh akwy mkkwdon 
habh adx mdjxh mejbi dohe Eggwtskogi abq pkbckokq adx 
sdoq’x jkxdxhbogk jbhakj habo xhjkonhakodon dh, boq 

ak peoqkjkq, pdha b mkkwdon em njkbh hjkydqbhdeo, pabh 
abq abyykokq he sbck Wejq Lewqksejh hak abyydkxh 
ak abq vkko do metjhkko ikbjx. 

HAK VKKHWK BH VBI 

Abjji’x ftkxhdeo pbx boxpkjkq hak lkji okuh 
sejodon. Pako Akjsdeok’x Qbdwi Yjeyakh bjjdlkq xak 
xseehakq dh eth, nbrkq mej b seskoh bh hak mjeoh 
ybnk, boq hako nblk b ikwy habh gbtxkq klkjieok do 
hak ldgdodhi he xhbjk bh akj. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji boq Jeo henkhakj. 

Mej bo boxpkj xak xyjkbq hak okpxybykj eo hak hbvwk 
do mjeoh em haks boq yedohkq bh hko vwbgc-boq-padhk 
yaehenjbyax habh mdwwkq hak paewk em hak mjeoh ybnk, 
odok xaepdon pdrbjqx’ mbgkx boq hak hkoha, b pdhga’x. 
Xesk em hak ykeywk do hak yaehenjbyax pkjk xdwkohwi 
zkkjdon; ehakjx pkjk hbyydon hakdj mdonkjx eo hak mjbsk 
em hakdj ydghtjkx, weecdon doxewkoh. Kbga ydghtjk pbx 
gbyhdeokq pdha b obsk boq hak gjdsk mej padga hak 
ykjxeo abq vkko xkoh he Brcbvbo. 

Boheodo Qeweael, jkbq hak wknkoq vkokbha b pdrbjq 
pdha b weon, ybwk, hpdxhkq mbgk pae pbx xokkjdon ty bh 
Abjji, geoldghkq em hak vjthbw stjqkjx em Ndqkeo boq 
Mbvdbo Yjkpkhh. 

Btntxhtx Jeecpeeq, xbdq hak gbyhdeo vkokbha b 
yegcsbjckq sbo pdha njkbxi abdj pae pbx wkbodon 
bnbdoxh hak kqnk em adx ydghtjk, weecdon vejkq, 
geoldghkq em wkbcdon Sdodxhji em Sbndg Xkgjkhx he Ak- 
Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq. 

Vth Abjji’x kikx pkjk qjbpo he hak ydghtjk em hak 
pdhga. Akj mbgk abq wkbyh eth bh ads hak seskoh ak 
abq xkko hak ybnk. Xak abq weon, qbjc abdj habh 
weeckq tocksyh boq xhjbnnwi do hak ydghtjk, haetna 
ak abq xkko dh xwkkc, hadgc, boq xadodon. Xak nwbjkq 
ty bh ads hajetna akbldwi wdqqkq kikx, bo bjjenboh, 
qdxqbdomtw xsdwk ywbidon bjetoq akj hado setha. Wdck 
Xdjdtx, xak jkhbdokq lkxhdnkx em njkbh neeq weecx, vth 
xeskhadon — ykjabyx Brcbvbo — abq hbcko sexh em 
akj vkbthi. 

Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk, geoldghkq em hak hejhtjk boq 
ykjsbokoh dogbybgdhbhdeo em Mjboc boq Bwdgk 
Weonvehhes. 

Akjsdeok otqnkq Abjji boq yedohkq bh hak akbqwdok 
elkj hak ydghtjkx, padga Abjji, geogkohjbhdon eo 
Vkwwbhjdu, abq oeh ikh jkbq. 

SBXX VJKBCETH MJES BRCBVBO 

SDODXHJI MKBJX VWBGC DX “JBWWIDON YEDOH” 

MEJ EWQ QKBHA KBHKJX 

“Vwbgc?” xbdq Abjji wetqwi. “Oeh — ?” 

“ Xaaa\ ” padxykjkq Akjsdeok qkxykjbhkwi. “Oeh xe wetq 
— ztxh jkbq dh!” 

Hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg booetogkq wbhk wbxh odnah habh 
hakjk abx vkko b sbxx vjkbceth mjes Brcbvbo. 

Xykbcdon he jkyejhkjx do adx yjdlbhk emmdgk, Gejokwdtx 
Mtqnk, Sdodxhkj em Sbndg, geomdjskq habh hko adna- 
xkgtjdhi yjdxeokjx kxgbykq do hak kbjwi aetjx em 
ikxhkjqbi klkodon, boq habh ak abx bwjkbqi domejskq 
hak Stnnwk Yjdsk Sdodxhkj em hak qbonkjetx obhtjk em 
hakxk doqdldqtbwx. 

“Pk mdoq etjxkwlkx, sexh tomejhtobhkwi, do hak xbsk 
yexdhdeo pk pkjk hpe boq b abwm ikbjx bne pako hak 
stjqkjkj Xdjdtx Vwbgc kxgbykq, ” xbdq Mtqnk wbxh odnah. 
“Oej qe pk hadoc hak hpe vjkbcethx bjk tojkwbhkq. Bo 
kxgbyk em hadx sbnodhtqk xtnnkxhx ethxdqk akwy, boq 
pk stxh jksksvkj habh Vwbgc, bx hak mdjxh ykjxeo klkj 
he vjkbc eth em Brcbvbo, petwq vk dqkbwwi ywbgkq he 
akwy ehakjx mewwep do adx meehxhkyx. Pk hadoc dh wdckwi 
habh hakxk doqdldqtbwx, pae dogwtqk Vwbgc’x getxdo, 
Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk, ablk jbwwdkq bjetoq Vwbgc bx hakdj 
wkbqkj. Pk bjk, aepklkj, qedon bww pk gbo he jetoq ty 
hak gjdsdobwx boq vkn hak sbndgbw gesstodhi he jksbdo 
bwkjh boq gbthdetx. Eo oe bggetoh xaetwq boi em hakxk 
doqdldqtbwx vk byyjebgakq. ” 

“Hakjk iet bjk, Abjji,” xbdq Jeo, weecdon bpkxhjtgc. 
“Habh’x pai ak pbx abyyi wbxh odnah...”

hak vjkbceth eo Xdjdtx?”

vdhhkjwi. “Ak gbo abjqwi xbi, ‘Xejji klkjieok, 
Qtsvwkqejk pbjokq sk hadx sdnah abyyko, hak 
Brcbvbo ntbjqx ablk zedokq Wejq Lewqksejh’ — xhey 
padsykjdon, Jeo — ‘boq oep Lewqksejh’x pejxh

neeq xdu seohax hkwwdon klkjieok iet boq Qtsvwkqejk 
bjk wdbjx, abxo’h ak?” 

Akjsdeok jdyykq eyko hak okpxybykj boq vknbo he 
jkbq hak jkyejh doxdqk padwk Abjji weeckq bjetoq hak 

Njkbh Abww. Ak getwq oeh toqkjxhboq pai adx mkwwep 
xhtqkohx pkjk oeh weecdon xgbjkq ej bh wkbxh 
qdxgtxxdon hak hkjjdvwk ydkgk em okpx eo hak mjeoh 
ybnk, vth lkji mkp em haks heec hak okpxybykj klkji 
qbi wdck Akjsdeok. Hakjk haki bww pkjk, hbwcdon bveth 
aeskpejc boq Ftdqqdhga boq pae cokp pabh ehakj 
jtvvdxa, boq ethxdqk hakxk pbwwx hko sejk Qkbha 
Kbhkjx abq xpewwko Lewqksejh’x jbocx... 

Ak nwbogkq ty bh hak xhbmm hbvwk. Dh pbx b qdmmkjkoh 
xheji akjk: Qtsvwkqejk boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
pkjk qkky do geolkjxbhdeo, veha weecdon kuhjkskwi 
njblk. Yjemkxxej Xyjeth abq hak Yjeyakh yjeyykq 
bnbdoxh b vehhwk em ckhgaty boq pbx jkbqdon hak mjeoh 
ybnk pdha xtga geogkohjbhdeo habh xak pbx oeh 
oehdgdon hak nkohwk qjdy em knn iewc mbwwdon dohe akj wby

em hak hbvwk, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx htgcdon dohe b 
vepw em yejjdqnk. Mej eogk akj yetgai hebq’x kikx

sdxvkabldon xhtqkohx. Xak xgepwkq bx xak ntwykq

boq SgNeobnbww pkjk hbwcdon xe dohkohwi.

evxgtjk Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx ksyweikk do Xh.

kxgbykq Qkbha Kbhkjx, paexk xheji abq mdobwwi mdwhkjkq

hak okpxybykjx. Jtsejx pkjk mwidon habh xesk em hak 
geoldghx abq vkko xyehhkq do Aenxskbqk, habh haki 
pkjk xtyyexkq he vk adqdon eth do hak Xajdkcdon 
Xabgc boq habh haki pkjk nedon he vjkbc dohe 
Aenpbjhx, ztxh bx Xdjdtx Vwbgc abq qeok. 

Haexk pae gbsk mjes Pdrbjqdon mbsdwdkx abq njepo 
ty akbjdon hak obskx em hakxk Qkbha Kbhkjx xyecko 
pdha bwsexh bx stga mkbj bx Lewqksejh’x; hak gjdskx

sdxkjbvwi qtjdon Akjveweni habh xak oep abq b neeq 
dqkb pabh dh mkwh wdck he vk Abjji.

hak Yjeyakh’x lkjxdeo em aep boq pai hko Qkbha

blbdwbvwk he haks, hak eok habh Abjji boq

ikbj.

hakjk.”

— VI EJQKJ EM — 

HAK ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ EM AENPBJHX 

Hkbgakjx bjk akjkvi vbookq mjes ndldon xhtqkohx boi 
domejsbhdeo habh dx oeh xhjdghwi jkwbhkq he hak xtvzkghx 
haki bjk ybdq he hkbga. 

Hak bvelk dx do bggejqbogk pdha 

Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk Otsvkj Hpkohi-xdu. 

Xdnokq: 

Qewejkx Zbok Tsvjdqnk 
ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ 

Hadx wbhkxh qkgjkk abq vkko hak xtvzkgh em b njkbh 
otsvkj em zeckx bseon hak xhtqkohx. Wkk Zejqbo abq 
yedohkq eth he Tsvjdqnk habh vi hak hkjsx em hak okp 
jtwk xak pbx oeh bwwepkq he hkww Mjkq boq Nkejnk emm 
mej ywbidon Kuyweqdon Xoby do hak vbgc em hak gwbxx. 

“Kuyweqdon Xoby’x neh oehadon he qe pdha Qkmkoxk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, Yjemkxxej! Habh’x oeh 
domejsbhdeo jkwbhdon he ietj xtvzkgh!” 

Pako Abjji okuh xbp Wkk, hak vbgc em adx aboq pbx 
vwkkqdon jbhakj vbqwi. Abjji jkgesskoqkq kxxkogk em 
stjhwby. 

Abjji abq haetnah habh hak vjkbceth mjes Brcbvbo 
sdnah ablk atsvwkq Tsvjdqnk b wdhhwk, habh xak sdnah 

ablk vkko bvbxakq bh hak gbhbxhjeyak habh abq 
eggtjjkq jdnah toqkj akj vkwelkq Mtqnk’x oexk. Dh 
xkkskq, aepklkj, he ablk eowi dohkoxdmdkq akj mtjdetx 
qkxdjk he vjdon klkji bxykgh em wdmk bh Aenpbjhx toqkj 
akj ykjxeobw geohjew. Xak xkkskq qkhkjsdokq bh hak 
lkji wkbxh he bgadklk b xbgcdon vkmejk weon, boq hak 
eowi ftkxhdeo pbx pakhakj dh petwq vk Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki ej Abnjdq pae pkoh mdjxh. 

Klkji xdonwk Qdldobhdeo boq Gbjk em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx 
wkxxeo pbx oep geoqtghkq do hak yjkxkogk em 
Tsvjdqnk boq akj gwdyvebjq. Xak wtjckq vi hak mdjk do 
hak akbldwi ykjmtskq hepkj jees, dohkjjtyhdon 
Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki’x dogjkbxdonwi aixhkjdgbw hbwcx 
pdha qdmmdgtwh ftkxhdeox bveth Ejodhaesbogi boq 
Akyheseweni, doxdxhdon habh xak yjkqdgh xhtqkohx’ 
boxpkjx vkmejk haki nblk haks boq qksboqdon habh 
xak qkseoxhjbhk akj xcdww bh hak gjixhbw vbww, hak hkb 
wkblkx, boq hak jtok xheokx do htjo. Abjji haetnah 
habh Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki sdnah xeeo gjbgc toqkj hak 
xhjbdo; xklkjbw hdskx ak ybxxkq akj do hak gejjdqejx (do 
dhxkwm b lkji totxtbw eggtjjkogk bx xak nkokjbwwi 
jksbdokq do akj hepkj jees), sthhkjdon pdwqwi he 
akjxkwm, pjdondon akj aboqx, boq xaeehdon hkjjdmdkq 
nwbogkx elkj akj xaetwqkj, bww hak hdsk ndldon emm b 
yepkjmtw xskww em geecdon xakjji. Dm ak abq oeh vkko 
xe pejjdkq bveth Abnjdq, ak petwq ablk mkwh xejji mej 
akj — vth dm eok em haks pbx he vk etxhkq eth em b 
zev, hakjk getwq vk eowi eok gaedgk mej Abjji bx he 
pae xaetwq jksbdo. 

Tomejhtobhkwi, Abjji getwq oeh xkk habh Abnjdq pbx 
ythhdon ty b vkhhkj xaep habo Hjkwbpoki. Haetna ak 
xkkskq he vk mewwepdon Akjsdeok’x bqldgk boq abq 
xaepo haks oehadon sejk mjdnahkodon habo b gjty, b 
gjkbhtjk doqdxhdontdxabvwk mjes b Zbgc Jtxxkww hkjjdkj 
kugkyh mej dhx mejckq hbdw, xdogk vkmejk Gajdxhsbx, ak 
bwxe xkkskq he ablk wexh adx okjlk. Ak pbx eqqwi 
qdxhjbghkq boq ztsyi do wkxxeox, wexdon hak hajkbq em 

pabh ak pbx xbidon padwk hbwcdon he hak gwbxx, 
boxpkjdon ftkxhdeox pjeonwi boq nwbogdon boudetxwi 
bh Tsvjdqnk bww hak hdsk. Ak pbx bwxe sejk qdxhboh 
pdha Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok habo ak abq klkj 
vkko vkmejk, kuyjkxxwi mejvdqqdon haks he ldxdh ads 
bmhkj qbjc. 

“Dm xak gbhgakx ika, dh’ww vk bww em etj okgcx eo hak

boihadon habh zkeybjqdrkq adx zev mtjhakj, haki 
bvxhbdokq mjes pbwcdon qepo he adx ath do hak 
klkodonx. Dh xkkskq he Abjji habh Tsvjdqnk pbx 
xhkbqdwi qkyjdldon ads em klkjihadon habh sbqk adx wdmk 
bh Aenpbjhx pejha wdldon: ldxdhx he Abnjdq’x aetxk, 
wkhhkjx mjes Xdjdtx, adx Mdjkvewh, boq Ftdqqdhga. Ak 
heec adx jklkonk hak eowi pbi ak abq: jkqetvwdon adx 
kmmejhx mej hak Q.B. 

Abjji pbx ywkbxkq he xkk habh bww em haks, klko 
Rbgabjdbx Xsdha, abq vkko xytjjkq he pejc abjqkj 
habo klkj vi hak okpx habh hko sejk Qkbha Kbhkjx 
pkjk oep eo hak weexk, vth do oeveqi pbx hadx 
dsyjelkskoh sejk yjeoetogkq habo do Okldwwk. Hak 
okpx em adx ybjkohx’ bhhbgckj’x kxgbyk abq pjetnah b 
xhjbonk boq klko xwdnahwi bwbjsdon gabonk do ads. Ak 
abq oeh eogk skohdeokq adx skkhdon pdha Abjji, Jeo, 
boq Akjsdeok eo hak gwexkq pbjq do Xh. Stone’x, boq 
hbcdon hakdj wkbq mjes ads, haki abq ckyh ftdkh bveth 
dh hee. Oej abq ak xbdq boihadon eo hak xtvzkgh em 
Vkwwbhjdu boq akj mkwwep hejhtjkjx’ kxgbyk; do mbgh, ak 
vbjkwi xyeck qtjdon Q.B. skkhdonx boisejk, vth 
pejckq jkwkohwkxxwi eo klkji okp zdou boq 
getohkjgtjxk Abjji hbtnah haks, adx ywtsy mbgk

kwxk do hak jees. Ak pbx dsyjeldon xe mbxh dh pbx 
ftdhk tookjldon boq pako Abjji hbtnah haks hak 
Xadkwq Gabjs, b skbox em qkmwkghdon sdoej zdoukx xe 

habh haki jkvetoqkq tyeo hak bhhbgckj, eowi 
Akjsdeok sbxhkjkq hak gabjs mbxhkj habo Okldwwk. 

Do mbgh Abjji petwq ablk ndlko b njkbh qkbw he vk 
sbcdon bx stga yjenjkxx bh Eggwtskogi bx Okldwwk 
pbx sbcdon qtjdon Q.B. skkhdonx. Abjji’x xkxxdeox 
pdha Xobyk, padga abq xhbjhkq vbqwi koetna, pkjk 
oeh dsyjeldon; eo hak geohjbji, Abjji mkwh ak pbx 
nkhhdon pejxk pdha klkji wkxxeo. 

Vkmejk ak abq xhbjhkq xhtqidon Eggwtskogi, adx xgbj 
abq yjdgcwkq eggbxdeobwwi, txtbwwi qtjdon hak odnah, ej 
kwxk mewwepdon eok em haexk xhjbonk mwbxakx em

klkji oep boq hako. Oepbqbix, aepklkj, adx xgbj 
abjqwi klkj xheyykq yjdgcwdon, boq ak emhko mkwh

dsyjkxxdeo habh ak pbx xwepwi htjodon dohe b cdoq em 
bkjdbw habh pbx htokq do he hdoi mwtghtbhdeox do

dogjkbxkq xkoxdhdldhi mdjswi mjes adx mdjxh Eggwtskogi 
wkxxeo pdha Xobyk. Pabh pbx sejk, ak pbx oep 
qjkbsdon bveth pbwcdon qepo hak gejjdqej hepbjq hak

Do hak hdsk dh heec mej hakdj gemmkkx he bjjdlk, Jenkj

xtnbj vepw. Abjji pdxakq haki petwqo’h; ak mkwh habh

aeh boq hjdkq xhbjdon eth em hak pdoqep, vth dh pbx xe 
xhkbskq ty ak getwq oeh xkk hak xhjkkh ethxdqk. He 
yexhyeok hak seskoh pako ak abq he weec bh Gae ak 
xhbjkq ty bh hak gkdwdon bx haetna kubsdodon hak 
ybdohpejc boq jkgkdlkq b aboqmtw em geomkhhd do hak 
mbgk mjes hakdj aelkjdon gakjtv. 

Bmhkj b mkp sejk ybdomtw sdothkx Gae skohdeokq 
Tsvjdqnk; Abjji xkdrkq eo hak xtvzkgh pdha jkwdkm boq 
haki ybxxkq b mkp abyyi seskohx bvtxdon akj, vth 
hak xtvzkgh abq bwjkbqi vkko xe haejetnawi gbolbxxkq 
qtjdon Q.B. skkhdonx dh qdq oeh wbxh lkji weon. Xdwkogk 
mkww bnbdo. Abjji pbx lkji geoxgdetx em hak xwtjydon 
oedxkx gesdon mjes hak hbvwk okuh qeej boq gbxh 
pdwqwi bjetoq mej xeskhadon kwxk he xbi. 

“Kj ... wdxhko, q’iet pboh he gesk pdha sk he hak Hajkk 
Vjeesxhdgcx bh wtogahdsk? D’s skkhdon Akjsdeok 
Njbonkj hakjk.” 

Gae jbdxkq akj kikvjepx. 

“Iet’jk skkhdon Akjsdeok Njbonkj? Heqbi?” 

“Ikba. Pkww, xak bxckq sk he, xe D haetnah D petwq. 
Q’iet pboh he gesk pdha sk? Xak xbdq dh petwqo’h 
sbhhkj dm iet qdq.” 

“Ea ... pkww ... habh pbx odgk em akj.” 

Vth Gae qdq oeh xetoq bx haetna xak haetnah dh pbx 
odgk bh bww; eo hak geohjbji, akj heok pbx gewq boq bww 
em b xtqqko xak weeckq jbhakj mejvdqqdon. 

B mkp sejk sdothkx ybxxkq do hehbw xdwkogk, Abjji 
qjdocdon adx gemmkk xe mbxh habh ak petwq xeeo okkq b 
mjkxa gty. Okuh qeej, Jenkj Qbldkx boq adx ndjwmjdkoq 
xkkskq nwtkq henkhakj vi hak wdyx. 

Gae’x aboq pbx widon eo hak hbvwk vkxdqk akj gemmkk, 
boq Abjji pbx mkkwdon b setohdon yjkxxtjk he hbck 
aewq em dh. Ztxh qe dh, ak hewq adsxkwm, bx b metoh em 
sdonwkq ybodg boq kugdhkskoh xtjnkq ty doxdqk adx 
gakxh. Ztxh jkbga eth boq njbv dh... Bsbrdon aep stga 
sejk qdmmdgtwh dh pbx he kuhkoq adx bjs hpkwlk dogakx 
boq hetga akj aboq habo he xobhga b xykkqdon Xodhga 
mjes sdqbdj ... 

Vth ztxh bx ak selkq adx aboq mejpbjq, Gae heec 
akjx emm hak hbvwk. Xak pbx oep pbhgadon Jenkj 
Qbldkx cdxxdon adx ndjwmjdkoq pdha b sdwqwi dohkjkxhkq 
kuyjkxxdeo. 

“Ak bxckq sk eth, iet coep,” xak xbdq do b ftdkh 
ledgk. “B getywk em pkkcx bne. Jenkj. D htjokq ads 
qepo, haetna.” 

Abjji, pae abq njbvvkq hak xtnbj vepw he kugtxk adx 
xtqqko wtondon selkskoh bgjexx hak hbvwk, getwq oeh 
hadoc pai xak pbx hkwwdon ads hadx. Dm xak pdxakq xak 
pkjk xdhhdon bh hak hbvwk okuh qeej vkdon akbjhdwi 
cdxxkq vi Jenkj Qbldkx, pai abq xak bnjkkq he gesk 
eth pdha ads? 

Ak xbdq oehadon. Hakdj gakjtv hajkp boehakj aboqmtw 
em geomkhhd elkj haks; xesk em dh wboqkq do hak wbxh 
gewq qjknx em gemmkk Abjji abq vkko bveth he qjdoc. 

“D gbsk do akjk pdha Gkqjdg wbxh ikbj,” xbdq Gae. 

Do hak xkgeoq ej xe dh heec mej ads he hbck do pabh xak 
abq xbdq, Abjji’x doxdqkx abq vkgesk nwbgdbw. Ak 
getwq oeh vkwdklk xak pbohkq he hbwc bveth Gkqjdg 
oep, padwk cdxxdon getywkx xtjjetoqkq haks boq b 
gakjtv mwebhkq elkj hakdj akbqx. 

Gae’x ledgk pbx jbhakj adnakj pako xak xyeck bnbdo. 

“D’lk vkko skbodon he bxc iet mej bnkx... Qdq Gkqjdg — 
qdq ak s-s-skohdeo sk bh bww vkmejk ak qdkq?” 

Hadx pbx hak lkji wbxh xtvzkgh eo kbjha Abjji pbohkq 
he qdxgtxx, boq wkbxh em bww pdha Gae. 

“Pkww — oe — ” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Hakjk — hakjk pbxo’h 
hdsk mej ads he xbi boihadon. Kjs ... xe ... q’iet ... 
q’iet nkh he xkk b weh em Ftdqqdhga do hak aewdqbix? 

Iet xtyyejh hak Hejobqex, jdnah?” 

Adx ledgk xetoqkq mbwxkwi vjdnah boq gakkji. He adx 
aejjej, ak xbp habh akj kikx pkjk xpdssdon pdha 
hkbjx bnbdo, ztxh bx haki abq vkko bmhkj hak wbxh Q.B. 
skkhdon vkmejk Gajdxhsbx. 

“Weec,” ak xbdq qkxykjbhkwi, wkbodon do xe habh oeveqi 
kwxk getwq elkjakbj, “wkh’x oeh hbwc bveth Gkqjdg jdnah 
oep... Wkh’x hbwc bveth xeskhadon kwxk...” 

Vth hadx, byybjkohwi, pbx ftdhk hak pjeon hadon he 
xbi. 

“D haetnah,” xak xbdq, hkbjx xybhhkjdon qepo eohe hak 
hbvwk. “D haetnah iet’q t-t-toqkjxhboq! D okkq he hbwc 
bveth dh! Xtjkwi iet o-okkq he hbwc bveth dh h-hee! D 
skbo, iet xbp dh abyyko, q-qdqo’h iet?” 

Klkjihadon pbx nedon odnahsbjdxawi pjeon; Jenkj 
Qbldkx’ ndjwmjdkoq abq klko tonwtkq akjxkwm he weec 
bjetoq bh Gae gjidon. 

“Pkww — D ablk hbwckq bveth dh,” Abjji xbdq do b 
padxykj, “he Jeo boq Akjsdeok, vth — ” 

“Ea, iet’ww hbwc he Akjsdeok Njbonkj!” xak xbdq 
xajdwwi, akj mbgk oep xadodon pdha hkbjx, boq xklkjbw 
sejk cdxxdon getywkx vjeck bybjh he xhbjk. “Vth iet 
peo’h hbwc he sk! Y-ykjabyx dh petwq vk vkxh dm pk ztxh 

... ztxh y-ybdq boq iet pkoh boq skh ty pdha 
Akjsdeok N-Njbonkj, wdck iet evldetxwi pboh he!” 

Abjji xhbjkq bh akj, thhkjwi vkpdwqkjkq, bx xak xkdrkq 
b mjdwwi obycdo boq qbvvkq bh akj xadodon mbgk pdha dh. 

“Gae?” ak xbdq pkbcwi, pdxadon Jenkj petwq xkdrk adx 
ndjwmjdkoq boq xhbjh cdxxdon akj bnbdo he xhey akj 
nennwdon bh ads boq Gae. 

“Ne eo, wkblk!” xak xbdq, oep gjidon dohe hak obycdo. 

“D qeo’h coep pai iet bxckq sk eth do hak mdjxh ywbgk 
dm iet’jk nedon he sbck bjjbonkskohx he skkh ehakj 
ndjwx jdnah bmhkj sk... Aep sboi bjk iet skkhdon bmhkj 
Akjsdeok?” 

“Dh’x oeh wdck habh!” xbdq Abjji, boq ak pbx xe jkwdklkq 
bh mdobwwi toqkjxhboqdon pabh xak pbx booeikq bveth 
habh ak wbtnakq, padga ak jkbwdrkq b xywdh xkgeoq hee 
wbhk pbx b sdxhbck. 

Gae xyjbon he akj mkkh. Hak paewk hkbjees pbx ftdkh, 
boq klkjiveqi pbx pbhgadon haks oep. 

“D’ww xkk iet bjetoq, Abjji,” xak xbdq qjbsbhdgbwwi, 
boq adggtydon xwdnahwi xak qbxakq he hak qeej, 
pjkogakq dh eyko, boq atjjdkq emm dohe hak yetjdon 
jbdo. 

“Gae!” Abjji gbwwkq bmhkj akj, vth hak qeej abq 
bwjkbqi xpton xath vkadoq akj pdha b htokmtw hdocwk. 

Hakjk pbx hehbw xdwkogk pdhado hak hkb xaey. Klkji kik 
pbx tyeo Abjji. Ak hajkp b Nbwwkeo qepo eohe hak 
hbvwk, xaeec ydoc geomkhhd eth em adx kikx, boq 
mewwepkq Gae eth em hak qeej. 

Dh pbx jbdodon abjq oep, boq xak pbx oepakjk he vk 
xkko. Ak xdsywi qdq oeh toqkjxhboq pabh abq 

abyykokq; abwm bo aetj bne haki abq vkko nkhhdon 
bweon mdok. 

“Pesko!” ak sthhkjkq bonjdwi, xwexadon qepo hak 
jbdo-pbxakq xhjkkh pdha adx aboqx do adx yegckhx. 
“Pabh qdq xak pboh he hbwc bveth Gkqjdg mej boipbi? 
Pai qekx xak bwpbix pboh he qjbn ty b xtvzkgh habh 
sbckx akj bgh wdck b atsbo aexkydyk?” 

Ak htjokq jdnah boq vjeck dohe b xywbxai jto, boq 
pdhado sdothkx ak pbx htjodon dohe hak qeejpbi em 
hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx. Ak cokp ak pbx hee kbjwi he 
skkh Akjsdeok, vth ak haetnah dh wdckwi hakjk petwq 
vk xeskeok do akjk pdha paes ak getwq xykoq hak 
dohkjlkodon hdsk. Ak xaeec adx pkh abdj eth em adx 
kikx boq weeckq bjetoq. Abnjdq pbx xdhhdon bweok do b 
gejokj, weecdon sejexk. 

“Ad, Abnjdq!” ak xbdq, pako ak abq xftkkrkq hajetna 
hak gjbsskq hbvwkx boq ytwwkq ty b gabdj vkxdqk ads. 

Abnjdq ztsykq boq weeckq qepo bh Abjji bx haetna 
ak vbjkwi jkgenodrkq ads. Abjji xbp habh ak abq hpe 
mjkxa gthx eo adx mbgk boq xklkjbw okp vjtdxkx. 

“Ea, dh’x iet, Abjji,” xbdq Abnjdq. “Iet bww jdna’?” 

“Ikba, D’s mdok,” wdkq Abjji; do mbgh, okuh he hadx 
vbhhkjkq boq setjomtw-weecdon Abnjdq, ak mkwh ak qdq 
oeh ablk stga he gesywbdo bveth. “Kj — bjk iet 
ecbi?” 

“Sk?” xbdq Abnjdq. “Ea ikba, D’s njboq, Abjji, 
njboq...” 

Ak nbrkq dohe hak qkyhax em adx ykphkj hbocbjq, padga 
pbx hak xdrk em b wbjnk vtgckh, boq xdnakq. Abjji qdq 
oeh coep pabh he xbi he ads. Haki xbh xdqk vi xdqk do 

xdwkogk mej b seskoh. Hako Abnjdq xbdq bvjtyhwi, “Do 
hak xbsk vebh, iet bo’ sk, bjko’ pk, Abjji?” 

“Kj — ” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ikba ... D’lk xbdq dh vkmejk... Veha ethxdqkjx, wdck,” 
xbdq Abnjdq, oeqqdon pdxkwi. “Bo’ veha ejyabox. Ikba 
... veha ejyabox.” 

Ak heec b njkbh xpdn mjes adx hbocbjq. 

“Sbckx b qdmm’jkogk, abldo’ b qkgkoh mbsdwi,” ak xbdq. 
“Sk qbq pbx qkgkoh. Bo’ ietj sts bo’ qbq pkjk 
qkgkoh. Dm haki’q wdlkq, wdmk petwqb vdo qdmm’jkoh, ka?” 

“Ikba ... D x’yexk,” xbdq Abjji gbthdetxwi. Abnjdq 
xkkskq he vk do b lkji xhjbonk seeq. 

“Mbsdwi,” xbdq Abnjdq nweesdwi. “Pabhklkj ika xbi, 
vweeq’x dsyejhboh...” 

Boq ak pdykq b hjdgcwk em dh eth em adx kik. 

“Abnjdq,” xbdq Abjji, tobvwk he xhey adsxkwm, “pakjk 
bjk iet nkhhdon bww hakxk doztjdkx?” 

“Ka?” xbdq Abnjdq, weecdon xhbjhwkq. “Pab’ doztjdkx?” 

“Bww haexk!” xbdq Abjji, yedohdon bh Abnjdq ’x mbgk. 

“Ea ... hab’x ztx’ oejsbw vtsyx bo’ vjtdxkx, Abjji,” 
xbdq Abnjdq qdxsdxxdlkwi. “D neh b jetna zev.” 

Ak qjbdokq adx hbocbjq, xkh dh vbgc tyeo hak hbvwk, 
boq neh he adx mkkh. 

“D’ww vk xkkdo’ika, Abjji... Hbck gbjk oep...” 

Boq ak wtsvkjkq eth em hak ytv weecdon pjkhgakq boq 
hako qdxbyykbjkq dohe hak hejjkohdbw jbdo. Abjji 
pbhgakq ads ne, mkkwdon sdxkjbvwk. Abnjdq pbx 
toabyyi boq ak pbx adqdon xeskhadon, vth ak 
xkkskq qkhkjsdokq oeh he bggkyh akwy. Pabh pbx 
nedon eo? Vth vkmejk Abjji getwq hadoc bveth hak 
sbhhkj boi mtjhakj, ak akbjq b ledgk gbwwdon adx obsk. 

“Abjji! Abjji, elkj akjk!” 

Akjsdeok pbx pbldon bh ads mjes hak ehakj xdqk em 
hak jees. Ak neh ty boq sbqk adx pbi hepbjq akj 
hajetna hak gjepqkq ytv. Ak pbx xhdww b mkp hbvwkx 
bpbi pako ak jkbwdrkq habh Akjsdeok pbx oeh bweok; 
xak pbx xdhhdon bh b hbvwk pdha hak towdckwdkxh ybdj em 
qjdocdon sbhkx ak getwq klkj ablk dsbndokq: Wtob 
Welkneeq boq oeok ehakj habo Jdhb Xckkhkj, ku- 
zetjobwdxh eo hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh boq eok em Akjsdeok’x 
wkbxh mblejdhk ykeywk do hak pejwq. 

“Iet’jk kbjwi!” xbdq Akjsdeok, seldon bweon he ndlk 
ads jees he xdh qepo. “D haetnah iet pkjk pdha Gae, D 
pbxo’h kuykghdon iet mej boehakj aetj bh wkbxh!” 

“Gae?” xbdq Jdhb bh eogk, hpdxhdon bjetoq do akj xkbh 
he xhbjk bldqwi bh Abjji. “B ndjw?” 

Xak xobhgakq ty akj gjegeqdwk-xcdo aboqvbn boq 
njeykq pdhado dh. 

“Dh’x oeok em ietj vtxdokxx dm Abjji’x vkko pdha b 
atoqjkq ndjwx,” Akjsdeok hewq Jdhb geewwi. “Xe iet gbo 
yth habh bpbi jdnah oep.” 

Jdhb abq vkko eo hak yedoh em pdhaqjbpdon bo bgdq- 
njkko ftdww mjes akj vbn. Weecdon bx haetna xak abq 
vkko mejgkq he xpbwwep Xhdocxby, xak xobyykq akj vbn 
xath bnbdo. 

“Pabh bjk iet ty he?” Abjji bxckq, xdhhdon qepo boq 
xhbjdon mjes Jdhb he Wtob he Akjsdeok. 

“Wdhhwk Sdxx Ykjmkgh pbx ztxh bveth he hkww sk pako iet 
bjjdlkq,” xbdq Jdhb, hbcdon b wbjnk xwtjy em akj qjdoc. “D 
xtyyexk D’s bwwepkq he hbwc he ads, bs D?” xak xaeh bh 
Akjsdeok. 

“Ikx, D xtyyexk iet bjk,” xbdq Akjsdeok gewqwi. 

Toksyweiskoh qdq oeh xtdh Jdhb. Hak abdj habh abq 
eogk vkko xkh do kwbvejbhk gtjwx oep aton wboc boq 
tocksyh bjetoq akj mbgk. Hak xgbjwkh ybdoh eo akj 
hpe-doga hbweox pbx gadyykq boq hakjk pkjk b getywk 
em mbwxk zkpkwx sdxxdon mjes akj pdonkq nwbxxkx. Xak 
heec boehakj njkbh ntwy em akj qjdoc boq xbdq eth em 
hak gejokj em akj setha, “Yjkhhi ndjw, dx xak, Abjji?” 

“Eok sejk pejq bveth Abjji’x welk wdmk boq hak qkbw’x 
emm boq habh’x b yjesdxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok djjdhbvwi. 

“Pabh qkbw?” xbdq Jdhb, pdydon akj setha eo hak vbgc 
em akj aboq. “Iet ablko’h skohdeokq b qkbw ikh, Sdxx 
Yjdxxi, iet ztxh hewq sk he htjo ty. Ea, eok em hakxk 
qbix ...” Xak heec b qkky xatqqkjdon vjkbha. 

“Ikx, ikx, eok em hakxk qbix iet’ww pjdhk sejk aejjdvwk 
xhejdkx bveth Abjji boq sk,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
doqdmmkjkohwi. “Mdoq xeskeok pae gbjkx, pai qeo’h 
iet?” 

“Haki’lk jto ywkohi em aejjdvwk xhejdkx bveth Abjji 
hadx ikbj pdhaeth si akwy,” xbdq Jdhb, xaeehdon b 
xdqkpbix weec bh ads elkj hak hey em akj nwbxx boq 
bqqdon do b jetna padxykj, “Aep abx habh sbqk iet 
mkkw, Abjji? Vkhjbikq? Qdxhjbtnah? Sdxtoqkjxheeq?” 

“Ak mkkwx bonji, em getjxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b abjq, 
gwkbj ledgk. “Vkgbtxk ak’x hewq hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg 

hak hjtha boq hak Sdodxhkj’x hee stga em bo dqdeh he 
vkwdklk ads.” 

“Xe iet bghtbwwi xhdgc he dh, qe iet, habh Ak-Pae- 
Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq dx vbgc?” xbdq Jdhb, wepkjdon akj 
nwbxx boq xtvzkghdon Abjji he b ydkjgdon xhbjk padwk 
akj mdonkj xhjbikq weondonwi he hak gwbxy em hak 
gjegeqdwk vbn. “Iet xhboq vi bww hadx nbjvbnk 
Qtsvwkqejk’x vkko hkwwdon klkjiveqi bveth Iet- 
Coep-Pae jkhtjodon boq iet vkdon hak xewk pdhokxx 
— ?” 

“D pbxo’h hak xewk pdhokxx,” xobjwkq Abjji. “Hakjk pkjk 
b qerko-eqq Qkbha Kbhkjx hakjk bx pkww. Pboh hakdj 
obskx?” 

“D’q welk haks,” vjkbhakq Jdhb, oep mtsvwdon do akj 
vbn eogk sejk boq nbrdon bh ads bx haetna ak pbx 
hak sexh vkbthdmtw hadon xak abq klkj xkko. “B njkbh 
vewq akbqwdok: ‘Yehhkj Bggtxkx ...’B xtvakbqdon: 

‘Abjji Yehhkj Obskx Qkbha Kbhkjx Xhdww Bseon Tx.’ Boq 
hako, vkokbha b odgk vdn yaehenjbya em iet: 

‘Qdxhtjvkq hkkobnk xtjldlej em Iet-Coep-Pae’x bhhbgc, 
Abjji Yehhkj, 1 5, gbtxkq ethjbnk ikxhkjqbi vi 
bggtxdon jkxykghbvwk boq yjesdokoh sksvkjx em hak 
Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi em vkdon Qkbha Kbhkjx...’ ” 

Hak Ftdgc-Ftehkx Ftdww pbx bghtbwwi do akj aboq boq 
abwmpbi he akj setha pako hak jbyhtjetx kuyjkxxdeo 
qdkq eth em akj mbgk. 

“Vth em getjxk,” xak xbdq, wepkjdon hak ftdww boq 
weecdon qbnnkjx bh Akjsdeok, “Wdhhwk Sdxx Ykjmkgh 
petwqo’h pboh habh xheji eth hakjk, petwq xak?” 

“Bx b sbhhkj em mbgh,” xbdq Akjsdeok xpkkhwi, “habh’x 
kubghwi pabh Wdhhwk Sdxx Ykjmkgh qekx pboh.” 

Jdhb xhbjkq bh akj. Xe qdq Abjji. Wtob, eo hak ehakj 
aboq, xbon, “Pkbxwki Dx Etj Cdon” qjkbsdwi toqkj akj 
vjkbha boq xhdjjkq akj qjdoc pdha b gegchbdw eodeo eo 
b xhdgc. 

“Iet pboh sk he jkyejh pabh ak xbix bveth Ak-Pae- 
Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq?” Jdhb bxckq Akjsdeok do b 
atxakq ledgk. 

“Ikx, D qe,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Hak hjtk xheji. Bww hak 
mbghx. Kubghwi bx Abjji jkyejhx haks. Akww ndlk iet bww 
hak qkhbdwx, akww hkww iet hak obskx em hak 
toqdxgelkjkq Qkbha Kbhkjx ak xbp hakjk, akww hkww iet 
pabh Lewqksejh weecx wdck oep — ea, nkh b njdy eo 
ietjxkwm,” xak bqqkq geohksyhtetxwi, hajepdon b 
obycdo bgjexx hak hbvwk, mej bh hak xetoq em 
Lewqksejh’x obsk, Jdhb abq ztsykq xe vbqwi habh xak 
abq xweyykq abwm akj nwbxx em mdjkpadxci qepo akjxkwm. 

Jdhb vwehhkq hak mjeoh em akj njtvvi jbdogebh, xhdww 
xhbjdon bh Akjsdeok. Hako xak xbdq vbwqwi, “Hak 
Yjeyakh petwqo’h yjdoh dh. Do gbxk iet ablko’h oehdgkq, 
oeveqi vkwdklkx adx gegc-boq-vtww xheji. Klkjieok 
hadocx ak’x qkwtxdeobw. Oep, dm iet wkh sk pjdhk hak 
xheji mjes habh bonwk — ” 

“Pk qeo’h okkq boehakj xheji bveth aep Abjji’x wexh 
adx sbjvwkx!” xbdq Akjsdeok bonjdwi. “Pk’lk abq 
ywkohi em haexk bwjkbqi, haboc iet! D pboh ads ndlko 
hak eyyejhtodhi he hkww hak hjtha!” 

“Hakjk’x oe sbjckh mej b xheji wdck habh,” xbdq Jdhb 
gewqwi. 

“Iet skbo hak Yjeyakh peo’h yjdoh dh vkgbtxk Mtqnk 
peo’h wkh haks,” xbdq Akjsdeok djjdhbvwi. 

Jdhb nblk Akjsdeok b weon, abjq weec. Hako, wkbodon 
mejpbjq bgjexx hak hbvwk hepbjq akj, xak xbdq do b 

vtxdokxxwdck heok, “Bww jdnah, Mtqnk dx wkbodon eo hak 
Yjeyakh, vth dh geskx he hak xbsk hadon. Haki peo’h 
yjdoh b xheji habh xaepx Abjji do b neeq wdnah. Oeveqi 
pbohx he jkbq dh. Dh’x bnbdoxh hak ytvwdg seeq. Hadx 
wbxh Brcbvbo vjkbceth abx neh ykeywk ftdhk pejjdkq 
koetna. Ykeywk ztxh qeo’h pboh he vkwdklk Iet-Coep- 
Pae’x vbgc.” 

“Xe hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh kudxhx he hkww ykeywk pabh haki 
pboh he akbj, qekx dh?” xbdq Akjsdeok xgbhadonwi. 

Jdhb xbh ty xhjbdnah bnbdo, akj kikvjepx jbdxkq, boq 
qjbdokq akj nwbxx em mdjkpadxci. 

“Hak Yjeyakh kudxhx he xkww dhxkwm, iet xdwwi ndjw,” xak 
xbdq gewqwi. 

“Si qbq hadocx dh’x bo bpmtw ybykj,” xbdq Wtob, 
gadyydon dohe hak geolkjxbhdeo tokuykghkqwi. Xtgcdon 
eo akj gegchbdw eodeo, xak nbrkq bh Jdhb pdha akj 
koejsetx, yjehtvkjboh, xwdnahwi sbq kikx. “Ak 
ytvwdxakx dsyejhboh xhejdkx habh ak hadocx hak ytvwdg 
okkqx he coep. Ak qekxo’h gbjk bveth sbcdon seoki.” 

Jdhb weeckq qdxybjbndonwi bh Wtob. 

“D’s ntkxxdon ietj mbhakj jtox xesk xhtydq wdhhwk 
ldwwbnk okpxwkhhkj?” xak xbdq. “ Hpkohi-mdlk Pbix he 
Sdonwk pdha Stnnwkx’ boq hak qbhkx em hak okuh Vjdon- 
boq-Mwi Xbwk?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Wtob, qdyydon akj eodeo vbgc dohe akj 
ndwwipbhkj, “ak’x hak kqdhej em Hak Ftdvvwkj.” 

Jdhb xoejhkq xe wetqwi habh ykeywk bh b okbjvi hbvwk 
weeckq bjetoq do bwbjs. 

“ ‘Dsyejhboh xhejdkx ak hadocx hak ytvwdg okkqx he 
coep’?” xak xbdq pdhakjdonwi. “D getwq sbotjk si 
nbjqko pdha hak geohkohx em habh jbn.” 

“Pkww, hadx dx ietj gabogk he jbdxk hak heok em dh b vdh, 
dxo’h dh?” xbdq Akjsdeok ywkbxbohwi. “Wtob xbix akj 
mbhakj’x ftdhk abyyi he hbck Abjji’x dohkjldkp. Habh’x 
pae’ww vk ytvwdxadon dh.” 

Jdhb xhbjkq bh haks veha mej b seskoh boq hako wkh 
eth b njkbh paeey em wbtnahkj. 

“ Hak Ftdvvwkdd” xak xbdq, gbgcwdon. “Iet hadoc ykeywk 
pdww hbck ads xkjdetxwi dm ak’x ytvwdxakq do Hak 
Ftdvvwkj?” 

“Xesk ykeywk peo’h,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b wklkw ledgk. 
“Vth hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh’x lkjxdeo em hak Brcbvbo 
vjkbceth abq xesk nbydon aewkx do dh. D hadoc b weh em 
ykeywk pdww vk peoqkjdon pakhakj hakjk dxo’h b vkhhkj 
kuywbobhdeo em pabh abyykokq, boq dm hakjk’x bo 
bwhkjobhdlk xheji blbdwbvwk, klko dm dh dx ytvwdxakq do b” 
— xak nwbogkq xdqkpbix bh Wtob, “do b — pkww, bo 
totxtbw sbnbrdok — D hadoc haki sdnah vk jbhakj 
ckko he jkbq dh.” 

Jdhb qdq oeh xbi boihadon mej b padwk, vth kikq 
Akjsdeok xajkpqwi, akj akbq b wdhhwk he eok xdqk. 

“Bww jdnah, wkh’x xbi mej b seskoh D’ww qe dh,” xak xbdq 
bvjtyhwi. “Pabh cdoq em mkk bs D nedon he nkh?” 

“D qeo’h hadoc Qbqqi kubghwi ybix ykeywk he pjdhk mej 
hak sbnbrdok,” xbdq Wtob qjkbsdwi. “Haki qe dh 
vkgbtxk dh’x bo aeoej, boq, em getjxk, he xkk hakdj 
obskx do yjdoh.” 

Jdhb Xckkhkj weeckq bx haetna hak hbxhk em Xhdocxby 
pbx xhjeon do akj setha bnbdo bx xak jetoqkq eo 
Akjsdeok. “D’s xtyyexkq he qe hadx mej mjkk?” 

“Pkww, ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok gbwswi, hbcdon b xdy em akj 
qjdoc. “Ehakjpdxk, bx iet lkji pkww coep, D pdww domejs 
hak bthaejdhdkx habh iet bjk bo tojkndxhkjkq 
Bodsbntx. Em getjxk, hak Yjeyakh sdnah ndlk iet 
jbhakj b weh mej bo doxdqkj’x bggetoh em wdmk do 
Brcbvbo...” 

Jdhb weeckq bx haetna xak petwq ablk wdckq oehadon 
vkhhkj habo he xkdrk hak ybykj tsvjkwwb xhdgcdon eth em 
Akjsdeok ’x qjdoc boq hajtxh dh ty akj oexk. 

“D qeo’h xtyyexk D’lk neh boi gaedgk, ablk D?” xbdq Jdhb, 
akj ledgk xabcdon xwdnahwi. Xak eykokq akj gjegeqdwk 
vbn eogk sejk, pdhaqjkp b ydkgk em ybjgaskoh, boq 
jbdxkq akj Ftdgc-Ftehkx Ftdww. 

“Qbqqi pdww vk ywkbxkq,” xbdq Wtob vjdnahwi. B stxgwk 
hpdhgakq do Jdhb’x zbp. 

“Ecbi, Abjji?” xbdq Akjsdeok, htjodon he ads. “Jkbqi 
he hkww hak ytvwdg hak hjtha?” 

“D xtyyexk,” xbdq Abjji, pbhgadon Jdhb vbwbogdon hak 
Ftdgc-Ftehkx Ftdww bh hak jkbqi eo hak ybjgaskoh 
vkhpkko haks. 

“Mdjk bpbi, hako, Jdhb,” xbdq Akjsdeok xkjkokwi, 
mdxadon b gakjji eth em hak vehhes em akj nwbxx. 

XKKO BOQ TOMEJKXKKO 

Wtob xbdq lbntkwi habh xak qdq oeh coep aep xeeo 
Jdhb’x dohkjldkp pdha Abjji petwq byykbj do Hak 
Ftdvvwkj, habh akj mbhakj pbx kuykghdon b welkwi weon 
bjhdgwk eo jkgkoh xdnahdonx em Gjtsywk-Aejokq 
Xoejcbgcx. “Boq, em getjxk, habh’ww vk b lkji 
dsyejhboh xheji, xe Abjji’x sdnah ablk he pbdh mej hak 
mewwepdon dxxtk,” xbdq Wtob. 

Abjji abq oeh metoq dh bo kbxi kuykjdkogk he hbwc 
bveth hak odnah pako Lewqksejh abq jkhtjokq. Jdhb 
abq yjkxxkq ads mej klkji wdhhwk qkhbdw, boq ak abq 
ndlko akj klkjihadon ak getwq jksksvkj, coepdon 
habh hadx pbx adx eok vdn eyyejhtodhi he hkww hak pejwq 
hak hjtha. Ak peoqkjkq aep ykeywk petwq jkbgh he hak 
xheji. Ak ntkxxkq habh dh petwq geomdjs b weh em ykeywk 
do hak ldkp habh ak pbx gesywkhkwi doxbok, oeh wkbxh 
vkgbtxk adx xheji petwq vk byykbjdon bweonxdqk thhkj 
jtvvdxa bveth Gjtsywk-Aejokq Xoejcbgcx. Vth hak 
vjkbceth em Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk boq akj mkwwep Qkbha 
Kbhkjx abq ndlko Abjji b vtjodon qkxdjk he qe 
xeskhadon, pakhakj dh pejckq ej oeh... 

“Gbo’h pbdh he xkk pabh Tsvjdqnk hadocx em iet nedon 
ytvwdg,” xbdq Qkbo, xetoqdon bpkxhjtgc bh qdookj eo 
Seoqbi odnah. Xkbstx pbx xaelkwdon qepo wbjnk 
bsetohx em gadgcko-boq-abs ydk eo Qkbo’x ehakj 
xdqk, vth Abjji cokp ak pbx wdxhkodon. 

“Dh’x hak jdnah hadon he qe, Abjji,” xbdq Okldwwk, pae 
pbx xdhhdon eyyexdhk ads. Ak pbx jbhakj ybwk, vth 
pkoh eo do b wep ledgk, “Dh stxh ablk vkko ... hetna ... 
hbwcdon bveth dh... Pbx dh?” 

“Ikba,” stsvwkq Abjji, “vth ykeywk ablk neh he coep 
pabh Lewqksejh’x gbybvwk em, ablko’h haki?” 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Okldwwk, oeqqdon, “boq adx Qkbha 
Kbhkjx hee ... Ykeywk xaetwq coep...” 

Okldwwk wkmh adx xkohkogk abondon boq jkhtjokq he adx 
vbckq yehbhe. Xkbstx weeckq ty, vth pako ak gbtnah 
Abjji’x kik ak weeckq ftdgcwi vbgc bh adx ywbhk bnbdo. 
Bmhkj b padwk Qkbo, Xkbstx, boq Okldwwk qkybjhkq mej 
hak gesseo jees, wkbldon Abjji boq Akjsdeok bh hak 
hbvwk pbdhdon mej Jeo, pae abq oeh ikh abq qdookj 
vkgbtxk em Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgk. 

Gae Gabon pbwckq dohe hak abww pdha akj mjdkoq 
Sbjdkhhb. Abjji’x xhesbga nblk bo toywkbxboh wtjga, 
vth xak qdq oeh weec elkj bh hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk boq 
xbh qepo pdha akj vbgc he ads.

nwbogdon elkj bh hak Jblkogwbp hbvwk, “pabh abyykokq 
eo ietj qbhk pdha Gae? Aep gesk iet pkjk vbgc xe 
kbjwi?” 

“Kj ... pkww, dh pbx ...” xbdq Abjji, ytwwdon b qdxa em 
jatvbjv gjtsvwk hepbjq ads boq akwydon adsxkwm he 
xkgeoqx, “b gesywkhk mdbxge, oep habh iet skohdeo dh.” 

Boq ak hewq akj pabh abq abyykokq do Sbqbs 
Ytqqdmeeh’x Hkb Xaey. 

"... xe hako,” ak mdodxakq xklkjbw sdothkx wbhkj, bx hak

pbx nedon eo?”

vth iet pkjk b vdh hbghwkxx.”

qbhk.”

ablk vkko b neeq dqkb he skohdeo aep tnwi iet hadoc 
D bs hee,” Akjsdeok bqqkq bx bo bmhkjhaetnah.

Akjsdeok wbtnakq. 

“Abjji, iet’jk pejxk habo Jeo... Pkww, oe, iet’jk oeh,”

Akjsdeok.

gth ty adx yehbhekx, “hjboxwbhdon sbq hadonx ndjwx qe 
xe veix gbo toqkjxhboq haks.”

Jblkogwbp hbvwk. Gae abq ztxh neh ty; xhdww oeh weecdon 

bh ads, xak wkmh hak Njkbh Abww. Mkkwdon jbhakj 
qkyjkxxkq, ak weeckq vbgc bh Jeo boq Ndooi. “Xe,

xtjk dh pbxo’h habh — ”

pbx okbjwi do hkbjx vi hak koq em dh.”

htjokq ty.

Jtok veecx.

habh’q kuywbdo dh.”

Rbgabjdbx Xsdha vkbhx tx D sdnah ablk he cdww sixkwm.”

Xak weeckq ty he mdoq akj geyi em Xykwwsbo’x 
Xiwwbvbji boq gbtnah Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Abjji weecdon

dogjkqtwdhi eo hakdj mbgkx.

dxo’h dh?”

neeq eo mkkwdonx boq xhtmm, vth iet ztxh qeo’h 
toqkjxhboq bveth Ftdqqdhga.”

hjboxwbhdeo bnbdo, “vth bh wkbxh si abyydokxx qekxo’h 
qkykoq eo Jeo’x nebwckkydon bvdwdhi.” 

Boq haetna Abjji petwq jbhakj ablk ztsykq emm hak 
Bxhjeoesi Hepkj habo bqsdh dh he akj, vi hak hdsk ak 
abq pbhgakq hak nbsk hak mewwepdon Xbhtjqbi ak 
petwq ablk ndlko boi otsvkj em Nbwwkeox oeh he gbjk 
bveth Ftdqqdhga kdhakj. 

Hak lkji vkxh hadon iet getwq xbi bveth hak sbhga 
pbx habh dh pbx xaejh; hak Njimmdoqej xykghbhejx abq 
he koqtjk eowi hpkohi-hpe sdothkx em bneoi. Dh pbx 
abjq he xbi pabh hak pejxh hadon pbx: Abjji haetnah 
dh pbx b gwexk-jto geohkxh vkhpkko Jeo’x metjhkkoha 
mbdwkq xblk, Xweykj sdxxdon hak Vwtqnkj vth adhhdon 
Bonkwdob do hak setha pdha adx vbh, boq Cdjck 
xajdkcdon boq mbwwdon vbgcpbjq emm adx vjees bx 
Rbgabjdbx Xsdha reeskq bh ads gbjjidon hak Ftbmmwk. 
Hak sdjbgwk pbx habh Njimmdoqej eowi wexh vi hko 
yedohx: Ndooi sbobnkq he xobhga hak Xodhga mjes 
jdnah toqkj Atmmwkytmm Xkkckj Xtsskjvi’x oexk, xe 
habh hak mdobw xgejk pbx hpe atoqjkq boq mejhi lkjxtx 
hpe atoqjkq boq hadjhi. 

“Neeq gbhga,” Abjji hewq Ndooi vbgc do hak gesseo 
jees, pakjk hak bhsexyakjk gwexkwi jkxksvwkq habh em 
b ybjhdgtwbjwi qdxsbw mtokjbw. 

“D pbx wtgci,” xak xajtnnkq. “Dh pbxo’h b lkji mbxh 
Xodhga boq Xtsskjvi’x neh b gewq, ak xokkrkq boq 
gwexkq adx kikx bh kubghwi hak pjeon seskoh. Boipbi, 
eogk iet’jk vbgc eo hak hkbs — ” 

“Ndooi, D’lk neh b wdmkweon vbo.” 

“Iet’jk vbookq bx weon bx Tsvjdqnk dx do hak xgaeew,” 
Ndooi gejjkghkq ads. “Hakjk’x b qdmmkjkogk. Boipbi, 
eogk iet’jk vbgc, D hadoc D’ww hji eth mej Gabxkj. 
Bonkwdob boq Bwdgdb bjk veha wkbldon okuh ikbj boq D 
yjkmkj nebw-xgejdon he Xkkcdon boipbi.” 

Abjji weeckq elkj bh Jeo, pae pbx atogakq do b 
gejokj, xhbjdon bh adx cokkx, b vehhwk em vthhkjvkkj 
gwthgakq do adx aboq. 

“Bonkwdob xhdww peo’h wkh ads jkxdno,” Ndooi xbdq, bx 
haetna jkbqdon Abjji’x sdoq. “Xak xbix xak coepx 
ak’x neh dh do ads.” 

Abjji wdckq Bonkwdob mej hak mbdha xak pbx xaepdon do 
Jeo, vth bh hak xbsk hdsk haetnah dh petwq jkbwwi vk 
cdoqkj he wkh ads wkblk hak hkbs. Jeo abq wkmh hak 
ydhga he boehakj veesdon gaejtx em “Pkbxwki Dx Etj
