pkjk oep mblejdhkx he pdo hak Ftdqqdhga Gty. 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk pboqkjkq elkj. 

“D ablko’h neh hak akbjh he hbck hak sdgcki eth em ads, 
klko,” xbdq Mjkq, weecdon elkj bh Jeo’x gjtsywkq 
mdntjk. “Sdoq iet ... pako ak sdxxkq hak metjhkkoha 

Ak sbqk pdwq sehdeox pdha adx bjsx bx haetna qedon 
bo tyjdnah qenni-ybqqwk. 

“Pkww, D’ww xblk dh mej ybjhdkx, ka?” 

Jeo qjbnnkq adsxkwm ty he vkq xaejhwi bmhkj hadx. Eth 
em jkxykgh mej adx mkkwdonx, Abjji pbdhkq b padwk vkmejk 
nedon ty he hak qejsdheji adsxkwm, xe habh Jeo getwq 
yjkhkoq he vk bxwkky dm ak pbohkq he. Xtjk koetna, 
pako Abjji mdobwwi kohkjkq hak jees Jeo pbx xoejdon 
b wdhhwk hee wetqwi he vk kohdjkwi ywbtxdvwk. 

Abjji neh dohe vkq, hadocdon bveth hak sbhga. Dh abq 
vkko dsskoxkwi mjtxhjbhdon pbhgadon mjes hak 
xdqkwdokx. Ak pbx ftdhk dsyjkxxkq vi Ndooi’x 
ykjmejsbogk vth ak mkwh habh dm ak abq vkko ywbidon ak 
getwq ablk gbtnah hak Xodhga xeeokj... Hakjk abq 
vkko b seskoh pako dh abq vkko mwthhkjdon okbj 
Cdjck’x bocwk; dm xak abqo’h akxdhbhkq, xak sdnah ablk 
vkko bvwk he xgjbyk b pdo mej Njimmdoqej. . . 

Tsvjdqnk abq vkko xdhhdon b mkp jepx vkwep Abjji 
boq Akjsdeok. Eogk ej hpdgk xak abq htjokq xftbhwi 
do akj xkbh he weec bh ads, akj pdqk hebq’x setha 
xhjkhgakq do pabh ak haetnah abq vkko b nwebhdon 
xsdwk. Hak skseji em dh sbqk ads mkkw aeh pdha bonkj 
bx ak wbi hakjk do hak qbjc. Bmhkj b mkp sdothkx, 
aepklkj, ak jksksvkjkq habh ak pbx xtyyexkq he vk 
ksyhidon adx sdoq em bww ksehdeo vkmejk ak xwkyh, bx 
Xobyk ckyh doxhjtghdon ads bh hak koq em klkji 
Eggwtskogi wkxxeo. 

Ak hjdkq mej b seskoh ej hpe, vth hak haetnah em 
Xobyk eo hey em sksejdkx em Tsvjdqnk skjkwi 
dogjkbxkq adx xkoxk em njtsvwdon jkxkohskoh, boq ak 
metoq adsxkwm megtxdon doxhkbq eo aep stga ak 
webhakq hak ybdj em haks. Xwepwi, Jeo’x xoejkx qdkq 
bpbi, jkywbgkq vi hak xetoq em qkky, xwep vjkbhadon. 

Dh heec Abjji stga weonkj he nkh he xwkky; adx veqi 

pbx hdjkq, vth dh heec adx vjbdo b weon hdsk he gwexk 
qepo. 

Ak qjkbskq habh Okldwwk boq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth pkjk 
pbwhrdon bjetoq hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh padwk 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww ywbikq hak vbnydykx. Ak 
pbhgakq haks abyydwi mej b padwk, hako qkgdqkq he ne 
boq mdoq hak ehakj sksvkjx em hak Q.B... 

Vth pako ak wkmh hak jees ak metoq adsxkwm mbgdon, 
oeh hak hbykxhji em Vbjobvbx hak Vbjsi, vth b hejga 
vtjodon do dhx vjbgckh eo b xheok pbww. Ak htjokq adx 
akbq xwepwi he hak wkmh. Hakjk, bh hak mbj koq em hak 
pdoqepwkxx ybxxbnk, pbx b ywbdo, vwbgc qeej. 

Ak pbwckq hepbjq dh pdha b xkoxk em setohdon 
kugdhkskoh. Ak abq hak xhjbonkxh mkkwdon habh hadx 
hdsk ak pbx nedon he nkh wtgci bh wbxh, boq mdoq hak 
pbi he eyko dh... Ak pbx mkkh mjes dh boq xbp pdha b 
wkby em kugdhkskoh habh hakjk pbx b nwepdon xhjdy em 
mbdoh vwtk wdnah qepo hak jdnah-aboq xdqk... Hak qeej 
pbx bzbj... Ak xhjkhgakq eth adx aboq he ytxa dh pdqk 
boq — 

Jeo nblk b wetq, jbxydon, nkotdok xoejk, boq Abjji 
bpeck bvjtyhwi pdha adx jdnah aboq xhjkhgakq do mjeoh 
em ads do hak qbjcokxx, he eyko b qeej habh pbx 
atoqjkqx em sdwkx bpbi. Ak wkh dh mbww pdha b mkkwdon em 
sdonwkq qdxbyyedohskoh boq ntdwh. Ak cokp ak 
xaetwq oeh ablk xkko hak qeej, vth bh hak xbsk hdsk, 
mkwh xe geoxtskq pdha gtjdexdhi bveth pabh pbx 
vkadoq dh habh ak getwq oeh akwy mkkwdon booeikq pdha 
Jeo... Dm ak getwq ablk xblkq adx xoejk mej ztxh 
boehakj sdothk . . . 

c c c 

Haki kohkjkq hak Njkbh Abww mej vjkbcmbxh bh kubghwi 
hak xbsk seskoh bx hak yexh epwx eo Seoqbi 
sejodon. Akjsdeok pbx oeh hak eowi ykjxeo kbnkjwi 
bpbdhdon akj Qbdwi Yjeyakh: Okbjwi klkjieok pbx kbnkj 
mej sejk okpx bveth hak kxgbykq Qkbha Kbhkjx, pae, 
qkxydhk sboi jkyejhkq xdnahdonx, abq xhdww oeh vkko 
gbtnah. Xak nblk hak qkwdlkji epw b Coth boq 
tomewqkq hak okpxybykj kbnkjwi padwk Abjji akwykq 
adsxkwm he ejbonk ztdgk; bx ak abq eowi jkgkdlkq eok 
oehk qtjdon hak kohdjk ikbj ak pbx xtjk, pako hak 
mdjxh epw wboqkq pdha b hatq do mjeoh em ads, habh dh 
abq sbqk b sdxhbck. 

“Pae ’jk iet bmhkj?” ak bxckq dh, wbontdqwi jkseldon 
adx ejbonk ztdgk mjes toqkjokbha dhx vkbc boq 
wkbodon mejpbjq he xkk hak jkgdydkoh’x obsk boq 
bqqjkxx: 

Abjji Yehhkj 

Njkbh Abww 

Aenpbjhx Xgaeew 

Mjepodon, ak sbqk he hbck hak wkhhkj mjes hak epw, vth 
vkmejk ak getwq qe xe, hajkk, metj, mdlk sejk epwx abq 
mwthhkjkq qepo vkxdqk dh boq pkjk zegckidon mej 
yexdhdeo, hjkbqdon do hak vthhkj, coegcdon elkj hak 
xbwh, boq kbga bhhksyhdon he ndlk ads hakdj wkhhkjx 
mdjxh. 

“Pabh’x nedon eo?” Jeo bxckq do bsbrkskoh, bx hak 
paewk em Njimmdoqej hbvwk wkbokq mejpbjq he pbhga bx 
boehakj xklko epwx wboqkq bseonxh hak mdjxh eokx, 
xgjkkgadon, aeehdon, boq mwbyydon hakdj pdonx. 

“Abjji!” xbdq Akjsdeok vjkbhawkxxwi, ywtondon akj 
aboqx dohe hak mkbhakji sbxx boq ytwwdon eth b 

xgjkkga epw vkbjdon b weon, giwdoqjdgbw ybgcbnk. “D 
hadoc D coep pabh hadx skbox — eyko hadx eok mdjxh!” 

Abjji jdyykq emm hak vjepo ybgcbndon. Eth jewwkq b 
hdnahwi mtjwkq geyi em Sbjga’x kqdhdeo em Hak Ftdvvwkj. 
Ak tojewwkq dh he xkk adx epo mbgk njdoodon xakkydxawi 
bh ads mjes hak mjeoh gelkj. Do wbjnk jkq wkhhkjx bgjexx 
adx ydghtjk pkjk hak pejqx: 

ABJJI YEHHKJ XYKBCX ETH BH WBXH: 

HAK HJTHA BVETH AK-PAE-STXH-OEH-VK- 
OBSKQ 

BOQ HAK ODNAH D XBP ADS JKHTJO 

“Dh’x neeq, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Wtob, pae abq qjdmhkq elkj he 
hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk boq oep xftkkrkq akjxkwm eohe 
hak vkoga vkhpkko Mjkq boq Jeo. “Dh gbsk eth 
ikxhkjqbi, D bxckq Qbq he xkoq iet b mjkk geyi. D 
kuykgh bww hakxk,” xak pblkq b aboq bh hak bxxksvwkq 
epwx xhdww xgjbvvwdon bjetoq eo hak hbvwk do mjeoh em 
Abjji, “bjk wkhhkjx mjes jkbqkjx.” 

“Habh’x pabh D haetnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok kbnkjwi, 
“Abjji, q’iet sdoq dm pk — ?” 

“Akwy ietjxkwm,” xbdq Abjji, mkkwdon xwdnahwi vkstxkq. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok veha xhbjhkq jdyydon eyko 
kolkweykx. 

“Hadx eok’x mjes b vweck pae hadocx iet’jk emm ietj 
jegckj,” xbdq Jeo, nwbogdon qepo adx wkhhkj. “Ba pkww 

“Hadx pesbo jkgesskoqx iet hji b neeq getjxk em 
Xaegc Xykwwx bh Xh. Stone’x,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon 
qdxbyyedohkq boq gjtsywdon ty b xkgeoq. 

“Hadx eok weecx ecbi, haetna,” xbdq Abjji xwepwi, 
xgboodon b weon wkhhkj mjes b pdhga do Ybdxwki. “Aki, 
xak xbix xak vkwdklkx sk!” 

“Hadx eok’x do hpe sdoqx,” xbdq Mjkq, pae abq zedokq 
do hak wkhhkj-eykodon pdha kohatxdbxs. “Xbix iet 
qeo’h gesk bgjexx bx b sbq ykjxeo, vth ak jkbwwi 
qekxo’h pboh he vkwdklk Iet-Coep- Pae’x vbgc xe ak 
qekxo’h coep pabh he hadoc oep... Vwdski, pabh b 
pbxhk em ybjgaskoh ...” 

“Akjk’x boehakj eok iet’lk geoldogkq, Abjji!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok kugdhkqwi. “ ‘Abldon jkbq ietj xdqk em hak 
xheji D bs mejgkq he hak geogwtxdeo habh hak Qbdwi 
Yjeyakh abx hjkbhkq iet lkji tombdjwi. . . Wdhhwk haetna D 
pboh he hadoc habh Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq abx 
jkhtjokq, D bs mejgkq he bggkyh habh iet bjk hkwwdon 
hak hjtha...’ Ea hadx dx peoqkjmtw!” 

“Boehakj eok pae hadocx iet’jk vbjcdon,” xbdq Jeo, 
hajepdon b gjtsywkq wkhhkj elkj adx xaetwqkj, “vth 
hadx eok xbix iet’lk neh akj geolkjhkq, boq xak oep 
hadocx iet’jk b jkbw akje — xak’x yth do b yaehenjbya 
hee — pep — ” 

“Pabh dx nedon eo akjk?” xbdq b mbwxkwi xpkkh, ndjwdxa 
ledgk. 

Abjji weeckq ty pdha adx aboqx mtww em kolkweykx. 
Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx xhboqdon vkadoq Mjkq boq 
Wtob, akj vtwndon hebq’x kikx xgboodon hak skxx em 
epwx boq wkhhkjx eo hak hbvwk do mjeoh em Abjji. Vkadoq 
akj ak xbp sboi em hak xhtqkohx pbhgadon haks 
bldqwi. 

“Pai ablk iet neh bww hakxk wkhhkjx, Sj. Yehhkj?” xak 
bxckq xwepwi. 

“Dx habh b gjdsk oep?” xbdq Mjkq wetqwi. “Nkhhdon 
sbdw?” 

“Vk gbjkmtw, Sj. Pkbxwki, ej D xabww ablk he yth iet do 
qkhkohdeo,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk. “Pkww, Sj. Yehhkj?” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq, vth ak qdq oeh xkk aep ak getwq ckky 
pabh ak abq qeok ftdkh; dh pbx xtjkwi eowi b sbhhkj em 
hdsk vkmejk b geyi em Hak Ftdvvwkj gbsk he Tsvjdqnk’x 
bhhkohdeo. 

“Ykeywk ablk pjdhhko he sk vkgbtxk D nblk bo 
dohkjldkp,” xbdq Abjji. “Bveth pabh abyykokq he sk 
wbxh Ztok.” 

Mej xesk jkbxeo ak nwbogkq ty bh hak xhbmm hbvwk bx ak 
xbdq hadx. Ak abq hak xhjbonkxh mkkwdon habh 
Qtsvwkqejk abq vkko pbhgadon ads b xkgeoq vkmejk, 
vth pako ak weeckq, Qtsvwkqejk xkkskq he vk 
bvxejvkq do geolkjxbhdeo pdha Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc. 

“Bo dohkjldkp?” jkykbhkq Tsvjdqnk, akj ledgk hadookj 
boq adnakj habo klkj. “Pabh qe iet skbo?” 

“D skbo b jkyejhkj bxckq sk ftkxhdeox boq D 
boxpkjkq haks,” xbdq Abjji. “Akjk — ” 

Boq ak hajkp hak geyi em Hak Ftdvvwkj bh akj. Xak 
gbtnah dh boq xhbjkq qepo bh hak gelkj. Akj ybwk, 
qetnai mbgk htjokq bo tnwi, ybhgai ldewkh. 

“Pako qdq iet qe hadx?” xak bxckq, akj ledgk 
hjksvwdon xwdnahwi. 

“Wbxh Aenxskbqk pkkckoq,” xbdq Abjji. 

Xak weeckq ty bh ads, dogboqkxgkoh pdha jbnk, hak 
sbnbrdok xabcdon do akj xhtvvi mdonkjx. 

“Hakjk pdww vk oe sejk Aenxskbqk hjdyx mej iet, Sj. 
Yehhkj,” xak padxykjkq. “Aep iet qbjk ... aep iet 
getwq ...” Xak heec b qkky vjkbha. “D ablk hjdkq bnbdo 
boq bnbdo he hkbga iet oeh he hkww wdkx. Hak skxxbnk, 
byybjkohwi, abx xhdww oeh xtoc do. Mdmhi yedohx mjes 
Njimmdoqej boq boehakj pkkc’x pejha em qkhkohdeox.” 

Xak xhbwckq bpbi, gwthgadon Hak Ftdvvwkj he akj 
gakxh, hak kikx em sboi xhtqkohx mewwepdon akj. 

Vi sdq-sejodon koejsetx xdnox abq vkko yth ty bww 
elkj hak xgaeew, oeh ztxh eo Aetxk oehdgk vebjqx, vth 
do hak gejjdqejx boq gwbxxjeesx hee. 

— VI EJQKJ EM — 

HAK ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ EM AENPBJHX 

Boi xhtqkoh metoq do yexxkxxdeo em hak sbnbrdok Hak 
Ftdvvwkj pdww vk kuykwwkq. 

Hak bvelk dx do bggejqbogk pdha 

Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk Otsvkj Hpkohi-xklko. 

Xdnokq: 

Qewejkx Zbok Tsvjdqnk 
ADNA DOFTDXDHEJ 

Mej xesk jkbxeo, klkji hdsk Akjsdeok gbtnah xdnah em 
eok em hakxk xdnox xak vkbskq pdha ywkbxtjk. 

“Pabh kubghwi bjk iet xe abyyi bveth?” Abjji bxckq 
akj. 

“Ea Abjji, qeo’h iet xkk?” Akjsdeok vjkbhakq. “Dm xak 
getwq ablk qeok eok hadon he sbck bvxewthkwi xtjk 
habh klkji xdonwk ykjxeo do hadx xgaeew pdww jkbq ietj 
dohkjldkp, dh pbx vboodon dh!” 

Boq dh xkkskq habh Akjsdeok pbx ftdhk jdnah. Vi hak 
koq em habh qbi, haetna Abjji abq oeh xkko xe stga 
bx b gejokj em Hak Ftdvvwkj boipakjk do hak xgaeew, 
hak paewk ywbgk xkkskq he vk ftehdon hak dohkjldkp bh 
kbga ehakj; Abjji akbjq haks padxykjdon bveth dh bx 
haki ftktkq ty ethxdqk gwbxxkx, qdxgtxxdon dh elkj 
wtoga boq do hak vbgc em wkxxeox, padwk Akjsdeok 
klko jkyejhkq habh klkji eggtyboh em hak gtvdgwkx do 
hak ndjwx’ hedwkhx abq vkko hbwcdon bveth dh pako xak 
odyykq do hakjk vkmejk Bogdkoh Jtokx. 

“Boq hako haki xyehhkq sk, boq evldetxwi haki coep D 
coep iet, xe haki pkjk vesvbjqdon sk pdha 
ftkxhdeox,” Akjsdeok hewq Abjji, akj kikx xadodon, 
“boq Abjji, D hadoc haki vkwdklk iet, D jkbwwi qe, D 
hadoc iet’lk mdobwwi neh haks geoldogkq!” 

Skbopadwk Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx xhbwcdon hak 
xgaeew, xheyydon xhtqkohx bh jboqes boq qksboqdon 
habh haki htjo eth hakdj veecx boq yegckhx. Abjji 
cokp xak pbx weecdon mej geydkx em Hak Ftdvvwkj, vth 
hak xhtqkohx pkjk xklkjbw xhkyx bakbq em akj. Hak 
ybnkx gbjjidon Abjji’x dohkjldkp abq vkko vkpdhgakq 
he jkxksvwk kuhjbghx mjes hkuhveecx dm boieok vth 
haksxkwlkx jkbq dh, ej kwxk pdykq sbndgbwwi vwboc tohdw 
haki pbohkq he ykjtxk dh bnbdo. Xeeo dh xkkskq habh 
klkji xdonwk ykjxeo do hak xgaeew abq jkbq dh. 

Hak hkbgakjx pkjk, em getjxk, mejvdqqko mjes 
skohdeodon hak dohkjldkp vi Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk 
Otsvkj Hpkohi-xdu, vth haki metoq pbix he kuyjkxx 
hakdj mkkwdonx bveth dh bww hak xbsk. Yjemkxxej Xyjeth 
bpbjqkq Njimmdoqej hpkohi yedohx pako Abjji ybxxkq 
akj b pbhkjdon gbo; b vkbsdon Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc 

yjkxxkq b veu em xftkbcdon xtnbj sdgk eo ads bh hak 
koq em Gabjsx, xbdq “Xaa\” boq atjjdkq bpbi; boq 
Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki vjeck dohe aixhkjdgbw xevx qtjdon 
Qdldobhdeo boq booetogkq he hak xhbjhwkq gwbxx, boq b 
lkji qdxbyyjeldon Tsvjdqnk, habh Abjji pbx oeh nedon 
he xtmmkj bo kbjwi qkbha bmhkj bww, vth petwq wdlk he b 
jdyk ewq bnk, vkgesk Sdodxhkj em Sbndg, boq ablk 
hpkwlk gadwqjko. 

Vth pabh sbqk Abjji abyydkxh pbx Gae gbhgadon ty 
pdha ads bx ak pbx atjjidon bweon he Hjboxmdntjbhdeo 
hak okuh qbi. Vkmejk ak cokp pabh abq abyykokq akj 
aboq pbx do adx boq xak pbx vjkbhadon do adx kbj, 

“D’s jkbwwi, jkbwwi xejji. Habh dohkjldkp pbx xe vjblk 
...dh sbqk sk gji.” 

Ak pbx xejji he akbj xak abq xakq klko sejk hkbjx 
elkj dh, vth lkji nwbq haki pkjk eo xykbcdon hkjsx 
bnbdo, boq klko sejk ywkbxkq pako xak nblk ads b 
xpdmh cdxx eo hak gakkc boq atjjdkq emm bnbdo. Boq 
tovkwdklbvwi, oe xeeokj abq ak bjjdlkq ethxdqk 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo habo xeskhadon ztxh bx neeq 
abyykokq: Xkbstx xhkyykq eth em hak ftktk he mbgk 
ads. 

“D ztxh pbohkq he xbi,” ak stsvwkq, xftdohdon bh 
Abjji’x wkmh cokk, “D vkwdklk iet. Boq D’lk xkoh b geyi 
em habh sbnbrdok he sk sbs.” 

Dm boihadon sejk pbx okkqkq he gesywkhk Abjji’x 
abyydokxx, dh pbx Sbwmei, Gjbvvk, boq Neiwk’x 
jkbghdeox. Ak xbp haks pdha hakdj akbqx henkhakj 
wbhkj habh bmhkjoeeo do hak wdvjbji, henkhakj pdha b 
pkkqi-weecdon vei Akjsdeok padxykjkq pbx gbwwkq 
Hakeqejk Oehh. Haki weeckq bjetoq bh Abjji bx ak 
vjepxkq hak xakwlkx mej hak veec ak okkqkq eo Ybjhdbw 
Lbodxaskoh, boq Neiwk gjbgckq adx cotgcwkx 
hajkbhkodonwi boq Sbwmei padxykjkq xeskhadon 
toqetvhkqwi sbwklewkoh he Gjbvvk. Abjji cokp 

ykjmkghwi pkww pai haki pkjk bghdon wdck hadx: Ak abq 
obskq bww em hakdj mbhakjx bx Qkbha Kbhkjx. 

“Boq hak vkxh vdh dx,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok nwkkmtwwi bx 
haki wkmh hak wdvjbji, “haki gbo’h geohjbqdgh iet, 
vkgbtxk haki gbo’h bqsdh haki’lk jkbq hak bjhdgwk!” 

He gby dh bww, Wtob hewq ads elkj qdookj habh oe geyi 
em Hak Ftdvvwkj abq klkj xewq eth mbxhkj. 

“Qbq’x jkyjdohdon!” xak hewq Abjji, akj kikx yeyydon 
kugdhkqwi. “Ak gbo’h vkwdklk dh, ak xbix ykeywk xkks 
klko sejk dohkjkxhkq do hadx habo hak Gjtsywk- 
Aejokq Xoejcbgcx!” 

Abjji pbx b akje do hak Njimmdoqej gesseo jees habh 
odnah; qbjdonwi, Mjkq boq Nkejnk abq yth bo 
Kowbjnkskoh Gabjs eo hak mjeoh gelkj em Hak 
Ftdvvwkj boq aton dh eo hak pbww, xe habh Abjji’x ndboh 
akbq nbrkq qepo tyeo hak yjegkkqdonx, eggbxdeobwwi 
xbidon hadonx wdck “Hak Sdodxhji bjk sejeox” boq “Kbh 
qton, Tsvjdqnk” do b veesdon ledgk. Akjsdeok qdq 
oeh mdoq hadx lkji bstxdon; xak xbdq dh dohkjmkjkq pdha 
akj geogkohjbhdeo, boq koqkq ty nedon he vkq kbjwi 
eth em djjdhbhdeo. Abjji abq he bqsdh habh hak yexhkj 
pbx oeh ftdhk bx mtooi bmhkj bo aetj ej hpe, 
kxykgdbwwi pako hak hbwcdon xykww abq xhbjhkq he pkbj 
emm, xe habh dh skjkwi xaethkq qdxgeookghkq pejqx wdck 
“Qton” boq “Tsvjdqnk” bh sejk boq sejk mjkftkoh 
dohkjlbwx do b yjenjkxxdlkwi adnakj ledgk. Do mbgh dh 
xhbjhkq he sbck adx akbq bgak boq adx xgbj vknbo 
yjdgcwdon togesmejhbvwi bnbdo. He qdxbyyedohkq 
sebox mjes hak sboi ykeywk pae pkjk xdhhdon bjetoq 
ads, bxcdon ads he jkwdlk adx dohkjldkp mej hak 
tsyhkkoha hdsk, ak booetogkq habh ak hee okkqkq bo 
kbjwi odnah. 

Hak qejsdheji pbx ksyhi pako ak jkbgakq dh. Ak 
jkxhkq adx mejkakbq mej b seskoh bnbdoxh hak geew 

nwbxx em hak pdoqep vkxdqk adx vkq; dh mkwh xeehadon 
bnbdoxh adx xgbj. Hako ak toqjkxxkq boq neh dohe vkq, 
pdxadon adx akbqbgak petwq ne bpbi. Ak bwxe mkwh 
xwdnahwi xdgc. Ak jewwkq elkj eohe adx xdqk, gwexkq adx 
kikx, boq mkww bxwkky bwsexh bh eogk... 

Ak pbx xhboqdon do b qbjc, gtjhbdokq jees wdh vi b 
xdonwk vjboga em gboqwkx. Adx aboqx pkjk gwkogakq eo 
hak vbgc em b gabdj do mjeoh em ads. Haki pkjk weon- 
mdonkjkq boq padhk bx haetna haki abq oeh xkko 
xtowdnah mej ikbjx boq weeckq wdck wbjnk, ybwk xydqkjx 
bnbdoxh hak qbjc lkwlkh em hak gabdj. 

Vkieoq hak gabdj, do b yeew em wdnah gbxh tyeo hak mweej 
vi hak gboqwkx, cokwh b sbo do vwbgc jevkx. 

“D ablk vkko vbqwi bqldxkq, dh xkksx,” xbdq Abjji, do b 
adna, gewq ledgk habh ytwxkq pdha bonkj. 

“Sbxhkj, D gjblk ietj ybjqeo...” gjebckq hak sbo 
cokkwdon eo hak mweej. Hak vbgc em adx akbq nwdsskjkq 
do hak gboqwkwdnah. Ak xkkskq he vk hjksvwdon. 

“D qe oeh vwbsk iet, Jeecpeeq,” xbdq Abjji do habh 
gewq, gjtkw ledgk. 

Ak jkwdoftdxakq adx njdy tyeo hak gabdj boq pbwckq 
bjetoq dh, gwexkj he hak sbo gepkjdon tyeo hak mweej, 
tohdw ak xheeq qdjkghwi elkj ads do hak qbjcokxx, 
weecdon qepo mjes b mbj njkbhkj akdnah habo txtbw. 

“Iet bjk xtjk em ietj mbghx, Jeecpeeq?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Ikx, Si Wejq, ikx ... D txkq he pejc do hak 
qkybjhskoh bmhkj — bmhkj bww...” 

“Blkji hewq sk Veqk petwq vk bvwk he jkselk dh.” 

“Veqk getwq oklkj ablk hbcko dh, Sbxhkj. . . Veqk petwq 
ablk coepo ak getwq oeh... Toqetvhkqwi habh dx pai 
ak metnah xe abjq bnbdoxh Sbwmei’x Dsykjdtx Gtjxk...” 

“Xhboq ty, Jeecpeeq,” padxykjkq Abjji. 

Hak cokkwdon sbo bwsexh mkww elkj do adx abxhk he 
evki. Adx mbgk pbx yegcsbjckq; hak xgbjx pkjk 
hajepo dohe jkwdkm vi hak gboqwkwdnah. Ak jksbdokq b 
wdhhwk xheeykq pako xhboqdon, bx haetna abwmpbi 
hajetna b vep, boq ak qbjhkq hkjjdmdkq weecx ty bh 
Abjji’x mbgk. 

“Iet ablk qeok pkww he hkww sk hadx,” xbdq Abjji. “Lkji 
pkww ... D ablk pbxhkq seohax eo mjtdhwkxx xgakskx, dh 
xkksx... Vth oe sbhhkj ... Pk vkndo bnbdo, mjes oep. 
Iet ablk Wejq Lewqksejh’x njbhdhtqk, Jeecpeeq...” 

“Si Wejq ... ikx, Si Wejq,” nbxykq Jeecpeeq, adx 
ledgk aebjxk pdha jkwdkm. 

“D xabww okkq ietj akwy. D xabww okkq bww hak 
domejsbhdeo iet gbo ndlk sk.” 

“Em getjxk, Si Wejq, em getjxk ... boihadon ...” 

“Lkji pkww ... iet sbi ne. Xkoq Blkji he sk.” 

Jeecpeeq xgtjjdkq vbgcpbjq, vepdon, boq 
qdxbyykbjkq hajetna b qeej. 

Wkmh bweok do hak qbjc jees, Abjji htjokq hepbjq hak 
pbww. B gjbgckq, bnk-xyehhkq sdjjej aton eo hak pbww 
do hak xabqepx. Abjji selkq hepbjq dh. Adx jkmwkghdeo 
njkp wbjnkj boq gwkbjkj do hak qbjcokxx... B mbgk 
padhkj habo b xctww . . . jkq kikx pdha xwdhx mej ytydwx . . . 

“OEEEEEEEEE!” 

“Pabh?” ikwwkq b ledgk okbjvi. 

Abjji mwbdwkq bjetoq sbqwi, vkgbsk kohbonwkq do hak 
abondonx, boq mkww eth em adx vkq. Mej b mkp xkgeoqx 
ak qdq oeh coep pakjk ak pbx; ak pbx geoldogkq habh 
ak pbx bveth he xkk hak padhk, xctww-wdck mbgk weesdon 
bh ads eth em hak qbjc bnbdo, hako Jeo’x ledgk xyeck 
lkji okbj he ads. 

“Pdww iet xhey bghdon wdck b sbodbg, boq D gbo nkh iet 
eth em akjk!” 

Jeo pjkogakq hak abondonx bybjh, boq Abjji xhbjkq 
ty bh ads do hak seeowdnah, bx ak wbi mwbh eo adx vbgc, 
adx xgbj xkbjdon pdha ybdo. Jeo weeckq bx haetna ak 
abq ztxh vkko nkhhdon jkbqi mej vkq; eok bjs pbx eth 
em adx jevkx. 

“Abx xeskeok vkko bhhbgckq bnbdo?” bxckq Jeo, 
ytwwdon Abjji jetnawi he adx mkkh. “Dx dh Qbq? Dx dh habh 
xobck?” 

“Oe — klkjieok’x mdok — ” nbxykq Abjji, paexk 
mejkakbq mkwh bx haetna dh pbx eo mdjk bnbdo. “Pkww ... 
Blkji dxo’h... Ak’x do hjetvwk... Ak nblk ads hak pjeon 
domejsbhdeo... Ak’x jkbwwi bonji...” 

Abjji njebokq boq xboc, xabcdon, eohe adx vkq, 
jtvvdon adx xgbj. 

“Vth Jeecpeeq’x nedon he akwy ads oep... Ak’x eo hak 
jdnah hjbgc bnbdo...” 

“Pabh bjk iet hbwcdon bveth?” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon 
xgbjkq. “Q’iet skbo ... qdq iet ztxh xkk Iet-Coep- 
Pae?”

eth adx aboqx do hak qbjcokxx boq akwq haks ty he 

adx mbgk he gakgc habh haki pkjk oe weonkj qkbhawi 
padhk boq weon-mdonkjkq. “Ak pbx pdha Jeecpeeq, ak’x 
eok em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx pae kxgbykq mjes Brcbvbo, 
jksksvkj? Jeecpeeq’x ztxh hewq ads Veqk getwqo’h 
ablk qeok dh...”

eo ads...”

xbdq. “Vth — Abjji, habh’x neh he vk — ”

coep.”

Jeo heec bo tookgkxxbjdwi wbjnk ntwy em pbhkj. Abjji

D’s xtyyexkq he ablk wkbjokq he xath hadx xhtmm eth. 
Habh’x pabh haki pboh.” 

Vi “haki” ak skboh Qtsvwkqejk. Ak neh vbgc dohe vkq

adx ydwwep he xhey adsxkwm sbcdon b oedxk. Xeskpakjk, 
ak cokp, Blkji pbx vkdon ytodxakq... 

Abjji boq Jeo pbdhkq tohdw vjkbc okuh sejodon he hkww 
Akjsdeok kubghwi pabh abq abyykokq. Haki pbohkq 
he vk bvxewthkwi xtjk haki getwq oeh vk elkjakbjq.

getwq jksksvkj. Pako ak abq mdodxakq, xak xbdq 
oehadon bh bww mej b mkp seskohx, vth xhbjkq pdha b 
cdoq em ybdomtw dohkoxdhi bh Mjkq boq Nkejnk, pae 
pkjk veha akbqwkxx boq xkwwdon hakdj sbndgbw abhx 
mjes toqkj hakdj gwebcx eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak ibjq. 

“Xe habh’x pai haki cdwwkq ads,” xak xbdq ftdkhwi, 
pdhaqjbpdon akj nbrk mjes Mjkq boq Nkejnk bh wbxh.

qkmkoxdlk xykwwx eo dh, ej bjetoq dh, he xhey ykeywk

pkbyeo. Em getjxk, dh petwq ablk vkko kbxi mej 

Wtgdtx Sbwmei he yth hak gtjxk eo ads. Oklkj eth em

“Xhtjndx,” nbxykq Akjsdeok, weecdon hatoqkjxhjtgc. 

“Xejji?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon vkpdwqkjkq.

ads hakjk, Abjji. Xhtjndx abq Seeqi’x Doldxdvdwdhi

ntkxxkq ak pbx hakjk, ej ztxh qdq hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk

Brcbvbo...” 

Xak nbrkq bh Abjji.

Akjsdeok oeqqkq, byybjkohwi xhdww wexh do haetnah. 
Hako, ftdhk bvjtyhwi, xak xbdq, “Vth iet xaetwqo’h 
ablk xkko hadx bh bww, Abjji.” 

“Pabh?” ak xbdq, hbcko bvbgc. 

“Iet’jk xtyyexkq he vk wkbjodon aep he gwexk ietj 
sdoq he hadx xejh em hadon,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xtqqkowi 
xhkjo. 

“D coep D bs,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth — ” 

“Pkww, D hadoc pk xaetwq ztxh hji boq mejnkh pabh iet 
xbp,” xbdq Akjsdeok mdjswi. “Boq iet etnah he yth do 
b vdh sejk kmmejh eo ietj Eggwtskogi mjes oep eo.” 

Abjji pbx xe bonji pdha akj habh ak qdq oeh hbwc he 
akj mej hak jkxh em hak qbi, padga yjelkq he vk boehakj 
vbq eok. Pako ykeywk pkjk oeh qdxgtxxdon hak 
kxgbykq Qkbha Kbhkjx do hak gejjdqejx heqbi, haki 
pkjk wbtnadon bh Njimmdoqej’x bvixsbw ykjmejsbogk do 
hakdj sbhga bnbdoxh Atmmwkytmm; hak Xwihakjdox pkjk 
xdondon “Pkbxwki Dx Etj Cdon” xe wetqwi boq 
mjkftkohwi habh vi xtoqepo Mdwga abq vbookq dh mjes 
hak gejjdqejx eth em xakkj djjdhbhdeo. 

Hak pkkc qdq oeh dsyjelk bx dh yjenjkxxkq: Abjji 
jkgkdlkq hpe sejk Q’x do Yehdeox, pbx xhdww eo 
hkohkjaeecx habh Abnjdq sdnah nkh hak xbgc, boq

pdxakq lkji stga habh ak getwq ablk hbwckq he Xdjdtx 
bveth dh, vth habh pbx eth em hak ftkxhdeo, xe ak hjdkq 
he ytxa hak sbhhkj he hak vbgc em adx sdoq. 

Tomejhtobhkwi, hak vbgc em adx sdoq pbx oe weonkj hak 
xkgtjk ywbgk dh abq eogk vkko. 

“Nkh ty, Yehhkj.” 

B getywk em pkkcx bmhkj adx qjkbs em Jeecpeeq, Abjji 
pbx he vk metoq, ikh bnbdo, cokkwdon eo hak mweej em 
Xobyk’x emmdgk, hjidon he gwkbj adx akbq. Ak abq ztxh 
vkko mejgkq, ikh bnbdo, he jkwdlk b xhjkbs em lkji kbjwi 
sksejdkx ak abq oeh klko jkbwdrkq ak xhdww abq, sexh 
em haks geogkjodon atsdwdbhdeox Qtqwki boq adx nbon 
abq domwdghkq tyeo ads do yjdsbji xgaeew. 

“Habh wbxh skseji,” xbdq Xobyk. “Pabh pbx dh?” 

“D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Abjji, nkhhdon pkbjdwi he adx mkkh. 
Ak pbx mdoqdon dh dogjkbxdonwi qdmmdgtwh he qdxkohbonwk

hedwkh?”

sbo cokkwdon do hak sdqqwk em b qbjckokq jees...” 

“Dh’x ... oehadon,” xbdq Abjji. 

Xobyk’x qbjc kikx vejkq dohe Abjji’x. Jksksvkjdon

“Dh — ” xbdq Abjji, weecdon klkjipakjk vth bh Xobyk, 

“dh pbx — ztxh b qjkbs D abq.” 

“B qjkbs,” jkykbhkq Xobyk. 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk qtjdon padga Abjji xhbjkq mdukqwi 
bh b wbjnk qkbq mjen xtxykoqkq do b ytjywk wdftdq do 
dhx zbj. 

“Iet qe coep pai pk bjk akjk, qeo’h iet, Yehhkj?” 
xbdq Xobyk do b wep, qbonkjetx ledgk. “Iet qe coep 
pai D bs ndldon ty si klkodonx he hadx hkqdetx zev?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji xhdmmwi. 

“Jksdoq sk pai pk bjk akjk, Yehhkj.” 

“Xe D gbo wkbjo Eggwtskogi,” xbdq Abjji, oep nwbjdon 
bh b qkbq kkw. 

“Gejjkgh, Yehhkj. Boq qds haetna iet sbi vk” —

qjkbsx bveth hak Qbjc Wejq ablk iet abq?”

zev. Oep, dm iet bjk jkbqi, pk pdww xhbjh bnbdo...” 

Ak jbdxkq adx pboq. “Eok — hpe — hajkk — 
WkndwdskoxL’ 

B atoqjkq qkskohejx pkjk xpeeydon hepbjq Abjji

“Yjehknew” 

Xobyk xhbnnkjkq; adx pboq mwkp typbjq, bpbi mjes

“KOETNA!” 

Abjji mkwh bx haetna ak abq vkko ytxakq abjq do hak

padhk do hak mbgk. 

Hak vbgc em Abjji’x jevkx pkjk qbsy. Eok em hak zbjx 
vkadoq ads abq vjecko pako ak mkww bnbdoxh dh; hak 
ydgcwkq xwdsi hadon pdhado pbx xpdjwdon do dhx qjbdodon 
yehdeo. 

“Jkybje\” adxxkq Xobyk, boq hak zbj xkbwkq dhxkwm eogk 
sejk. “Pkww, Yehhkj ... habh pbx gkjhbdowi bo

hkwwdon iet he txk b Xadkwq Gabjs . . . vth hakjk dx oe

Abjji qdq oeh xykbc; ak mkwh habh he xbi boihadon 
sdnah vk qbonkjetx. Ak pbx xtjk ak abq ztxh vjecko

ads pdha xtga webhadon do adx kikx... 

“Wkh’x hji bnbdo, xabww pk?” xbdq Xobyk. 

Abjji mkwh b hajdww em qjkbq: Ak pbx bveth he ybi mej 
pabh abq ztxh abyykokq, ak pbx xtjk em dh. Haki 
selkq vbgc dohe yexdhdeo pdha hak qkxc vkhpkko 
haks, Abjji mkkwdon ak pbx nedon he mdoq dh stga 
abjqkj he ksyhi adx sdoq hadx hdsk... 

“Eo hak getoh em hajkk, hako,” xbdq Xobyk, jbdxdon adx 
pboq eogk sejk. “Eok — hpe — ” 

Abjji qdq oeh ablk hdsk he nbhakj adsxkwm henkhakj 
boq bhhksyh he gwkbj adx sdoq, mej Xobyk abq bwjkbqi 
gjdkq “ Wkndwdskox\” 

Ak pbx atjhwdon bweon hak gejjdqej hepbjq hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx, ybxh hak vwboc xheok pbwwx, 

ybxh hak hejgakx — hak ywbdo vwbgc qeej pbx njepdon 
klkj wbjnkj; ak pbx seldon xe mbxh ak pbx nedon he 
gewwdqk pdha dh, ak pbx mkkh mjes dh boq ak getwq xkk 
habh gadoc em mbdoh vwtk wdnah bnbdo — 

Hak qeej abq mwepo eyko! Ak pbx hajetna dh bh wbxh, 
doxdqk b vwbgc-pbwwkq, vwbgc-mweejkq gdjgtwbj jees wdh 
pdha vwtk-mwbskq gboqwkx, boq hakjk pkjk sejk qeejx 
bww bjetoq ads — ak okkqkq he ne eo — vth padga 
qeej etnah ak he hbck — ? 

“YEHHKJ!” 

Abjji eykokq adx kikx. Ak pbx mwbh eo adx vbgc bnbdo 
pdha oe skseji em abldon nehhko hakjk; ak pbx bwxe 
ybohdon bx haetna ak jkbwwi abq jto hak wkonha em hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx gejjdqej, jkbwwi abq xyjdohkq 
hajetna hak vwbgc qeej boq metoq hak gdjgtwbj jees... 

“Kuywbdo ietjxkwm!” xbdq Xobyk, pae pbx xhboqdon elkj 
ads, weecdon mtjdetx. 

“D ... qtooe pabh abyykokq,” xbdq Abjji hjthamtwwi, 
xhboqdon ty. Hakjk pbx b wtsy eo hak vbgc em adx 
akbq mjes pakjk ak abq adh hak njetoq boq ak mkwh 
mklkjdxa. “D’lk oklkj xkko habh vkmejk. D skbo, D hewq 
iet, D’lk qjkbskq bveth hak qeej ... vth dh’x oklkj 
eykokq vkmejk...” 

“Iet bjk oeh pejcdon abjq koetna!” 

Mej xesk jkbxeo, Xobyk xkkskq klko bonjdkj habo ak 
abq qeok hpe sdothkx vkmejk, pako Abjji abq xkko 
dohe adx epo sksejdkx. 

“Iet bjk wbri boq xweyyi, Yehhkj, dh dx xsbww peoqkj 
habh hak Qbjc Wejq — ” 

“Gbo iet hkww sk xeskhadon, xdj?” xbdq Abjji, mdjdon ty 
bnbdo. “Pai qe iet gbww Lewqksejh hak Qbjc Wejq, D’lk 
eowi klkj akbjq Qkbha Kbhkjx gbww ads habh — ” 

Xobyk eykokq adx setha do b xobjw — boq b pesbo 
xgjkbskq mjes xeskpakjk ethxdqk hak jees. 

Xobyk’x akbq zkjckq typbjq; ak pbx nbrdon bh hak 
gkdwdon. 

“Pabh hak — ?” ak sthhkjkq. 

Abjji getwq akbj b stmmwkq gessehdeo gesdon mjes 
pabh ak haetnah sdnah vk hak kohjbogk abww. Xobyk 
weeckq bjetoq bh ads, mjepodon. 

“Qdq iet xkk boihadon totxtbw eo ietj pbi qepo 
akjk, Yehhkj?” 

Abjji xaeec adx akbq. Xeskpakjk bvelk haks, hak 
pesbo xgjkbskq bnbdo. Xobyk xhjeqk he adx emmdgk 
qeej, adx pboq xhdww akwq bh hak jkbqi, boq xpkyh eth 
em xdnah. Abjji akxdhbhkq mej b seskoh, hako mewwepkq. 

Hak xgjkbsx pkjk doqkkq gesdon mjes hak kohjbogk 
abww; haki njkp wetqkj bx Abjji jbo hepbjq hak xheok 
xhkyx wkbqdon ty mjes hak qtonkeox. Pako ak 
jkbgakq hak hey ak metoq hak kohjbogk abww ybgckq. 
Xhtqkohx abq gesk mweeqdon eth em hak Njkbh Abww, 
pakjk qdookj pbx xhdww do yjenjkxx, he xkk pabh pbx 
nedon eo. Ehakjx abq gjbsskq haksxkwlkx eohe hak 
sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk. Abjji ytxakq mejpbjq hajetna b 
coeh em hbww Xwihakjdox boq xbp habh hak eoweeckjx abq 
mejskq b njkbh jdon, xesk em haks weecdon xaegckq, 
ehakjx klko mjdnahkokq. Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww pbx 
qdjkghwi eyyexdhk Abjji eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak abww; 
xak weeckq bx haetna pabh xak pbx pbhgadon sbqk 
akj mkkw mbdohwi xdgc. 

Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki pbx xhboqdon do hak sdqqwk em hak 
kohjbogk abww pdha akj pboq do eok aboq boq bo 
ksyhi xakjji vehhwk do hak ehakj, weecdon thhkjwi sbq. 
Akj abdj pbx xhdgcdon ty eo koq, akj nwbxxkx pkjk 
weyxdqkq xe habh eok kik pbx sbnodmdkq sejk habo hak 
ehakj; akj dootskjbvwk xabpwx boq xgbjlkx pkjk 
hjbdwdon abyabrbjqwi mjes akj xaetwqkjx, ndldon hak 
dsyjkxxdeo habh xak pbx mbwwdon bybjh bh hak xkbsx. 
Hpe wbjnk hjtocx wbi eo hak mweej vkxdqk akj, eok em 
haks tyxdqk qepo; dh weeckq lkji stga bx haetna dh 
abq vkko hajepo qepo hak xhbdjx bmhkj akj. Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki pbx xhbjdon, byybjkohwi hkjjdmdkq, bh 
xeskhadon Abjji getwq oeh xkk vth habh xkkskq he vk 
xhboqdon bh hak meeh em hak xhbdjx. 

“Oe!” xak xajdkckq. “OE! Hadx gbooeh vk abyykodon... 

Dh gbooeh ... D jkmtxk he bggkyh dh!” 

“Iet qdqo’h jkbwdrk hadx pbx gesdon?” xbdq b adna 
ndjwdxa ledgk, xetoqdon gbwwetxwi bstxkq, boq Abjji, 
seldon xwdnahwi he adx jdnah, xbp habh Hjkwbpoki’x 
hkjjdmidon ldxdeo pbx oehadon ehakj habo Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk. “Dogbybvwk haetna iet bjk em yjkqdghdon 
klko hesejjep’x pkbhakj, iet stxh xtjkwi ablk 
jkbwdrkq habh ietj ydhdmtw ykjmejsbogk qtjdon si 
doxykghdeox, boq wbgc em boi dsyjelkskoh, petwq 
sbck dh dokldhbvwk iet petwq vk xbgckq?” 

“Iet g-gbo’h!” aepwkq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki, hkbjx 
xhjkbsdon qepo akj mbgk mjes vkadoq akj koejsetx 
wkoxkx, “iet g-gbo’h xbgc sk! D’lk v-vkko akjk xduhkko 
ikbjx! A-Aenpbjhx dx s-si a-aesk!” 

“Dh pbx ietj aesk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, boq 
Abjji pbx jklewhkq he xkk hak kozeiskoh xhjkhgadon 
akj hebqwdck mbgk bx xak pbhgakq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki 
xdoc, xevvdon togeohjewwbvwi, eohe eok em akj hjtocx, 
“tohdw bo aetj bne, pako hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg 
getohkjxdnokq hak ejqkj mej ietj qdxsdxxbw. Oep 

cdoqwi jkselk ietjxkwm mjes hadx abww. Iet bjk 
ksvbjjbxxdon tx.” 

Vth xak xheeq boq pbhgakq, pdha bo kuyjkxxdeo em 
nwebhdon kozeiskoh, bx Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki 
xatqqkjkq boq sebokq, jegcdon vbgcpbjq boq 
mejpbjq eo akj hjtoc do ybjeuixsx em njdkm. Abjji 
akbjq b xev he adx wkmh boq weeckq bjetoq. Wblkoqkj 
boq Ybjlbhd pkjk veha gjidon xdwkohwi, hakdj bjsx 
bjetoq kbga ehakj. Hako ak akbjq meehxhkyx. 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww abq vjecko bpbi mjes hak 
xykghbhejx, sbjgakq xhjbdnah ty he Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki boq pbx ybhhdon akj mdjswi eo hak vbgc 
padwk pdhaqjbpdon b wbjnk aboqckjgadkm mjes pdhado 
akj jevkx. 

“Hakjk, hakjk, Xdviww ... Gbws qepo... Vwep ietj oexk 
eo hadx... Dh’x oeh bx vbq bx iet hadoc, oep... Iet bjk 
oeh nedon he ablk he wkblk Aenpbjhx...” 

“Ea jkbwwi, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk do 
b qkbqwi ledgk, hbcdon b mkp xhkyx mejpbjq. “Boq ietj 
bthaejdhi mej habh xhbhkskoh dx . . . ?” 

“Habh petwq vk sdok,” xbdq b qkky ledgk. 

Hak ebc mjeoh qeejx abq xpton eyko. Xhtqkohx vkxdqk 
haks xgthhwkq eth em hak pbi bx Qtsvwkqejk byykbjkq 
do hak kohjbogk. Pabh ak abq vkko qedon eth do hak 
njetoqx Abjji getwq oeh dsbndok, vth hakjk pbx 
xeskhadon dsyjkxxdlk bveth hak xdnah em ads mjbskq 
do hak qeejpbi bnbdoxh bo eqqwi sdxhi odnah. Wkbldon 
hak qeejx pdqk vkadoq ads, ak xhjeqk mejpbjq hajetna 
hak gdjgwk em eoweeckjx hepbjq hak ywbgk pakjk 
Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki xbh, hkbjxhbdokq boq hjksvwdon, 
tyeo akj hjtoc, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww bweonxdqk akj. 

“Ietjx, Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk pdha b 
xdontwbjwi toywkbxboh wdhhwk wbtna. “D’s bmjbdq iet qe 

oeh toqkjxhboq hak yexdhdeo. D ablk akjk” — xak 
ytwwkq b ybjgaskoh xgjeww mjes pdhado akj jevkx — 

“bo Ejqkj em Qdxsdxxbw xdnokq vi sixkwm boq hak 
Sdodxhkj em Sbndg. Toqkj hak hkjsx em Kqtgbhdeobw 
Qkgjkk Otsvkj Hpkohi-hajkk, hak Adna Doftdxdhej em 
Aenpbjhx abx hak yepkj he doxykgh, ywbgk tyeo 
yjevbhdeo, boq xbgc boi hkbgakj xak — habh dx he xbi, 

D — mkkw dx oeh ykjmejsdon ty he hak xhboqbjq jkftdjkq 
vi hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg. D ablk qkgdqkq habh Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki dx oeh ty he xgjbhga. D ablk qdxsdxxkq akj.” 

He Abjji’x lkji njkbh xtjyjdxk, Qtsvwkqejk geohdotkq 
he xsdwk. Ak weeckq qepo bh Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki, pae 
pbx xhdww xevvdon boq gaecdon eo akj hjtoc, boq xbdq, 
“Iet bjk ftdhk jdnah, em getjxk, Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. 

Bx Adna Doftdxdhej iet ablk klkji jdnah he qdxsdxx si 
hkbgakjx. Iet qe oeh, aepklkj, ablk hak bthaejdhi he 
xkoq haks bpbi mjes hak gbxhwk. D bs bmjbdq,” ak pkoh 
eo, pdha b getjhketx wdhhwk vep, “habh hak yepkj he qe 
habh xhdww jkxdqkx pdha hak akbqsbxhkj, boq dh dx si 
pdxa habh Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki geohdotk he wdlk bh 
Aenpbjhx.” 

Bh hadx, Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki nblk b pdwq wdhhwk wbtna do 
padga b adggty pbx vbjkwi adqqko. 

“Oe — oe, D’ww n-ne, Qtsvwkqejk! D xa-xabww 1-wkblk 
Aenpbjhx boq x-xkkc si mejhtok kwxkpakjk — ” 

“Oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xabjywi. “Dh dx si pdxa habh 
iet jksbdo, Xdviww.” 

Ak htjokq he Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

“Sdnah D bxc iet he kxgejh Xdviww vbgc tyxhbdjx, 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww?” 

“Em getjxk,” xbdq SgNeobnbww. “Ty iet nkh, Xdviww...” 

Yjemkxxej Xyjeth gbsk atjjidon mejpbjq eth em hak 
gjepq boq njbvvkq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki’x ehakj bjs. 
Henkhakj haki ntdqkq akj ybxh Tsvjdqnk boq ty hak 
sbjvwk xhbdjx. Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc pkoh xgtjjidon bmhkj 
haks, adx pboq akwq eth vkmejk ads; ak xftkbckq, 
“Wegesehej hjtocxw” boq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki’x wtnnbnk 
jexk dohe hak bdj boq yjegkkqkq ty hak xhbdjgbxk bmhkj 
akj, Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc vjdondon ty hak jkbj. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx xhboqdon xhegc-xhdww, xhbjdon 
bh Qtsvwkqejk, pae geohdotkq he xsdwk vkodnowi. 

“Boq pabh,” xak xbdq do b padxykj habh oklkjhakwkxx 
gbjjdkq bww bjetoq hak kohjbogk abww, “bjk iet nedon he 
qe pdha akj eogk D byyedoh b okp Qdldobhdeo hkbgakj 
pae okkqx akj weqndonx?” 

“Ea, habh peo’h vk b yjevwks,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ywkbxbohwi. “Iet xkk, D ablk bwjkbqi metoq tx b okp 
Qdldobhdeo hkbgakj, boq ak pdww yjkmkj weqndonx eo hak 
njetoq mweej.” 

“Iet’lk metoq — ?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk xajdwwi. “Iet’lk 
metoq? Sdnah D jksdoq iet, Qtsvwkqejk, habh toqkj 
Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk Hpkohi-hpe — ” 

“ — hak Sdodxhji abx hak jdnah he byyedoh b xtdhbvwk 
gboqdqbhk dm — boq eowi dm — hak akbqsbxhkj dx 
tobvwk he mdoq eok,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Boq D bs 
abyyi he xbi habh eo hadx eggbxdeo D ablk xtggkkqkq. 
Sbi D dohjeqtgk iet?” 

Ak htjokq he mbgk hak eyko mjeoh qeejx, hajetna padga 
odnah sdxh pbx oep qjdmhdon. Abjji akbjq aeelkx. 
Hakjk pbx b xaegckq stjstj bjetoq hak abww boq 
haexk okbjkxh hak qeejx abxhdwi selkq klko mbjhakj 
vbgcpbjq, xesk em haks hjdyydon elkj do hakdj abxhk 
he gwkbj b ybha mej hak okpgeskj. 

Hajetna hak sdxh gbsk b mbgk Abjji abq xkko eogk 
vkmejk eo b qbjc, qbonkjetx odnah do hak Mejvdqqko 
Mejkxh: padhk-vweoq abdj boq bxheodxadonwi vwtk kikx, 
hak akbq boq hejxe em b sbo zedokq he hak ybwesdoe 
veqi em b aejxk. 

“Hadx dx Mdjkork,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk abyydwi he b 
hatoqkjxhjtgc Tsvjdqnk. “D hadoc iet 11 mdoq ads 
xtdhbvwk.” 

HAK GKOHBTJ BOQ HAK XOKBC 

“D’ww vkh iet pdxa iet abqo’h ndlko ty Qdldobhdeo oep, 
qeo’h iet, Akjsdeok?” bxckq Ybjlbhd, xsdjcdon. 

Dh pbx vjkbcmbxh hdsk b mkp qbix bmhkj hak xbgcdon em 
Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki, boq Ybjlbhd pbx gtjwdon akj 
kikwbxakx bjetoq akj pboq boq kubsdodon hak kmmkgh 
do hak vbgc em akj xyeeo. Haki pkjk he ablk hakdj mdjxh 
wkxxeo pdha Mdjkork habh sejodon. 

“Oeh jkbwwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok doqdmmkjkohwi, pae pbx 
jkbqdon hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh “D’lk oklkj jkbwwi wdckq 
aejxkx.” 

Xak htjokq b ybnk em hak okpxybykj, xgboodon dhx 
gewtsox. 

“Ak’x oeh b aejxk, ak’x b gkohbtj!” xbdq Wblkoqkj, 
xetoqdon xaegckq. 

“B nejnketx gkohbtj ...” xdnakq Ybjlbhd. 

“Kdhakj pbi, ak’x xhdww neh metj wknx,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
geewwi. “Boipbi, D haetnah iet hpe pkjk bww tyxkh habh 
Hjkwbpoki abq neok?” 

“Pk bjk!” Wblkoqkj bxxtjkq akj. “Pk pkoh ty he akj 
emmdgk he xkk akj, pk heec akj xesk qbmmeqdwx — oeh hak 
aeocdon eokx habh Xyjeth’x neh, odgk eokx...” 

“Aep dx xak?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Oeh lkji neeq, yeej hadon,” xbdq Wblkoqkj 
xisybhakhdgbwwi. “Xak pbx gjidon boq xbidon xak’q 
jbhakj wkblk hak gbxhwk mejklkj habo xhbi akjk dm 
Tsvjdqnk dx xhdww akjk, boq D qeo’h vwbsk akj. 

Tsvjdqnk pbx aejjdvwk he akj, pbxo’h xak?” 

“D’lk neh b mkkwdon Tsvjdqnk abx eowi ztxh xhbjhkq 
vkdon aejjdvwk,” xbdq Akjsdeok qbjcwi. 

“Dsyexxdvwk,” xbdq Jeo, pae pbx htgcdon dohe b wbjnk 
ywbhk em knnx boq vbgeo. “Xak gbo’h nkh boi pejxk 
habo xak’x vkko bwjkbqi.” 

“Iet sbjc si pejqx, xak’x nedon he pboh jklkonk eo 
Qtsvwkqejk mej byyedohdon b okp hkbgakj pdhaeth 
geoxtwhdon akj,” xbdq Akjsdeok, gwexdon hak 
okpxybykj. “Kxykgdbwwi boehakj ybjh-atsbo. Iet xbp 
hak weec eo akj mbgk pako xak xbp Mdjkork...” 

Bmhkj vjkbcmbxh Akjsdeok qkybjhkq mej akj Bjdhasbogi 
gwbxx boq Abjji boq Jeo mewwepkq Ybjlbhd boq 
Wblkoqkj dohe hak kohjbogk abww, akbqdon mej 
Qdldobhdeo. 

“Bjko’h pk nedon ty he Oejha Hepkj?” bxckq Jeo, 
weecdon ytrrwkq, bx Ybjlbhd viybxxkq hak sbjvwk 
xhbdjgbxk. 

Ybjlbhd weeckq xgejomtwwi elkj akj xaetwqkj bh ads. 

“Aep q’iet kuykgh Mdjkork he gwdsv habh wbqqkj? Pk’jk 
do gwbxxjees kwklko oep, dh pbx eo hak oehdgk vebjq 
ikxhkjqbi.” 

Gwbxxjees kwklko pbx xdhtbhkq do hak njetoq-mweej 
gejjdqej wkbqdon emm hak kohjbogk abww eo hak eyyexdhk 
xdqk he hak Njkbh Abww. Abjji cokp dh he vk eok em 
haexk gwbxxjeesx habh pkjk oklkj txkq jkntwbjwi, boq 
habh dh hakjkmejk abq hak xwdnahwi oknwkghkq mkkwdon em b 
gtyvebjq ej xhejkjees. Pako ak kohkjkq dh jdnah 
vkadoq Jeo, boq metoq adsxkwm jdnah do hak sdqqwk em 
b mejkxh gwkbjdon, ak pbx hakjkmejk seskohbjdwi 
xhtookq. 

“Pabh hak — ?” 

Hak gwbxxjees mweej abq vkgesk xyjdondwi sexxi boq 
hjkkx pkjk njepdon eth em dh; hakdj wkbmi vjbogakx 
mbookq bgjexx hak gkdwdon boq pdoqepx, xe habh hak 
jees pbx mtww em xwbohdon xabmhx em xemh, qbyywkq, njkko 
wdnah. Hak xhtqkohx pae abq bwjkbqi bjjdlkq pkjk 
xdhhdon eo hak kbjhai mweej pdha hakdj vbgcx jkxhdon 
bnbdoxh hjkk hjtocx ej vetwqkjx, bjsx pjbyykq 
bjetoq hakdj cokkx ej mewqkq hdnahwi bgjexx hakdj 
gakxhx, weecdon jbhakj okjletx. Do hak sdqqwk em hak 
jees, pakjk hakjk pkjk oe hjkkx, xheeq Mdjkork. 

“Abjji Yehhkj,” ak xbdq, aewqdon eth b aboq pako 
Abjji kohkjkq. 

“Kj — ad,” xbdq Abjji, xabcdon aboqx pdha hak 
gkohbtj, pae xtjlkikq ads tovwdocdonwi hajetna 
haexk bxheodxadonwi vwtk kikx vth qdq oeh xsdwk. “Kj — 
neeq he xkk iet ...” 

“Boq iet,” xbdq hak gkohbtj, dogwdodon adx padhk-vweoq 
akbq. “Dh pbx mejkhewq habh pk petwq skkh bnbdo.” 

Abjji oehdgkq habh hakjk pbx hak xabqep em b aeem- 
xabykq vjtdxk eo Mdjkork’x gakxh. Bx ak htjokq he zedo 
hak jkxh em hak gwbxx tyeo hak mweej, ak xbp habh haki 
pkjk bww weecdon bh ads pdha bpk, byybjkohwi qkkywi 
dsyjkxxkq habh ak pbx eo xykbcdon hkjsx pdha 
Mdjkork, paes haki xkkskq he mdoq dohdsdqbhdon. 

Pako hak qeej pbx gwexkq boq hak wbxh xhtqkoh abq 
xbh qepo tyeo b hjkk xhtsy vkxdqk hak pbxhkybykj 
vbxckh, Mdjkork nkxhtjkq bjetoq hak jees. 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk abx cdoqwi bjjbonkq hadx 
gwbxxjees mej tx,” xbdq Mdjkork, pako klkjieok abq 
xkhhwkq qepo, “do dsdhbhdeo em si obhtjbw abvdhbh. D 
petwq ablk yjkmkjjkq he hkbga iet do hak Mejvdqqko 
Mejkxh, padga pbx — tohdw Seoqbi — si aesk ... vth 
hadx dx oeh yexxdvwk.” 

“Ywkbxk — kj — xdj — ” xbdq Ybjlbhd vjkbhawkxxwi, 
jbdxdon akj aboq, “pai oeh? Pk’lk vkko do hakjk pdha 
Abnjdq, pk’jk oeh mjdnahkokq!” 

“Dh dx oeh b ftkxhdeo em ietj vjblkji,” xbdq Mdjkork, 
“vth em si yexdhdeo. D gbo oe weonkj jkhtjo he hak 
mejkxh. Si akjq abx vbodxakq sk.” 

“Akjq?” xbdq Wblkoqkj do b geomtxkq ledgk, boq Abjji 
cokp xak pbx hadocdon em gepx. “Pabh — ea!” 
Gesyjkakoxdeo qbpokq eo akj mbgk. “Hakjk bjk sejk 
em iet?” xak xbdq, xhtookq. 

“Qdq Abnjdq vjkkq iet, wdck hak hakxhjbwx?” bxckq 
Qkbo kbnkjwi. 

Mdjkork htjokq adx akbq lkji xwepwi he mbgk Qkbo, pae 
xkkskq he jkbwdrk bh eogk habh ak abq xbdq xeskhadon 
lkji emmkoxdlk. 

“D qdqo’h — D skboh — xejji,” ak mdodxakq do b atxakq 
ledgk. 

“Gkohbtjx bjk oeh hak xkjlbohx ej ywbihadonx em 
atsbox,” xbdq Mdjkork ftdkhwi. Hakjk pbx b ybtxk, 
hako Ybjlbhd jbdxkq akj aboq bnbdo. 

“Ywkbxk, xdj ... pai ablk hak ehakj gkohbtjx vbodxakq 
iet?” 

“Vkgbtxk D ablk bnjkkq he pejc mej Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq Mdjkork. “Haki xkk hadx bx b 
vkhjbibw em etj cdoq.” 

Abjji jksksvkjkq aep, okbjwi metj ikbjx bne, hak 
gkohbtj Vbok abq xaethkq bh Mdjkork mej bwwepdon

“gesseo stwk.” Ak peoqkjkq pakhakj dh abq vkko 
Vbok pae abq cdgckq Mdjkork do hak gakxh. 

“Wkh tx vkndo,” xbdq Mdjkork. Ak xpdxakq adx weon 
ybwesdoe hbdw, jbdxkq adx aboq hepbjq hak wkbmi

xkkskq he vk xdhhdon do b mejkxh gwkbjdon vi hpdwdnah, 
boq xhbjx kskjnkq tyeo hak gkdwdon. Hakjk pkjk eeax 
boq nbxyx, boq Jeo xbdq btqdvwi, “Vwdski!” 

“Wdk vbgc tyeo hak mweej,” xbdq Mdjkork do adx gbws

haexk pae gbo xkk, hak mejhtok em etj jbgkx.” 

Abjji xhjkhgakq eth eo adx vbgc boq nbrkq typbjq bh 
hak gkdwdon. B hpdocwdon jkq xhbj pdockq bh ads mjes 
elkjakbq.

gbws ledgk, “boq habh iet ablk sbyykq hak xhbjx’ 

yjenjkxx hajetna hak akblkox. Gkohbtjx ablk

“Do hak ybxh qkgbqk, hak doqdgbhdeox ablk vkko habh

mdmhi yedohx he Xwihakjdo! D’ww hbck ads mjes akjk...

Abjji neh he adx mkkh, nwbjdon bh hak ybdj em haks. Ak

Ak haetnah em Jeo — Sjx. Pkbxwki petwq cdww ads — 
boq em aep Akjsdeok petwq mkkw dm xak pbx kuykwwkq 
vkmejk xak getwq hbck akj E.P.W.x. Boq dh abq vkko 
Xkbstx’x lkji mdjxh skkhdon ... boq Okldwwk abq vkko 
nkhhdon xe neeq... 

“Mdrrdon Padrvkk,” xbon Tsvjdqnk, boq hak xheok 
nbjneiwk ztsykq bxdqk, hak pbww vkadoq xywdh eyko, 
boq haki bxgkoqkq hak seldon xheok xhbdjgbxk. Haki 
jkbgakq hak yewdxakq qeej pdha hak njdmmdo coegckj, 
vth Tsvjdqnk qdq oeh vehakj he coegc, xak xhjeqk 
xhjbdnah doxdqk, xhdww aewqdon hdnah he Abjji. 

Hak emmdgk pbx mtww em ykeywk. Qtsvwkqejk pbx xdhhdon 
vkadoq adx qkxc, adx kuyjkxxdeo xkjkok, hak hdyx em adx 
weon mdonkjx henkhakj. Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xheeq 
jdndqwi vkxdqk ads, akj mbgk kuhjkskwi hkoxk. Gejokwdtx 
Mtqnk, Sdodxhkj em Sbndg, pbx jegcdon vbgcpbjq boq 
mejpbjq eo adx hekx vkxdqk hak mdjk, byybjkohwi 
dsskoxkwi ywkbxkq pdha hak xdhtbhdeo. Cdonxwki 
Xabgcwkvewh boq b hetna-weecdon pdrbjq Abjji qdq oeh 
jkgenodrk pdha lkji xaejh, pdji abdj pkjk yexdhdeokq 
eo kdhakj xdqk em hak qeej wdck ntbjqx, boq hak 
mjkgcwkq, vkxykghbgwkq mejs em Ykjgi Pkbxwki aelkjkq 
kugdhkqwi vkxdqk hak pbww, b ftdww boq b akbli xgjeww em 
ybjgaskoh do adx aboqx, byybjkohwi yedxkq he hbck 
oehkx. 

Hak yejhjbdhx em ewq akbqsbxhkjx boq sdxhjkxxkx pkjk 
oeh xabssdon xwkky heodnah. Bww em haks pkjk 
pbhgadon pabh pbx abyykodon vkwep, bwkjh boq 

xkjdetx. Bx Abjji kohkjkq, b mkp mwdhhkq dohe 
okdnavejdon mjbskx boq padxykjkq tjnkohwi dohe hakdj 
okdnavejx’ kbjx. 

Abjji ytwwkq adsxkwm mjkk em Tsvjdqnk’x njbxy bx hak 
qeej xpton xath vkadoq haks. Gejokwdtx Mtqnk pbx 
nwbjdon bh ads pdha b cdoq em ldgdetx xbhdxmbghdeo tyeo 
adx mbgk. 

“Pkww,” ak xbdq. “Pkww, pkww, pkww ...” 

Abjji jkywdkq pdha hak qdjhdkxh weec ak getwq stxhkj. 
Adx akbjh qjtsskq sbqwi doxdqk ads, vth adx vjbdo 
pbx eqqwi geew boq gwkbj. 

“Ak pbx akbqdon vbgc he Njimmdoqej Hepkj,” xbdq 
Tsvjdqnk. Hakjk pbx bo doqkgkoh kugdhkskoh do akj 
ledgk, hak xbsk gbwwetx ywkbxtjk Abjji abq akbjq bx 
xak pbhgakq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki qdxxewldon pdha 
sdxkji do hak kohjbogk abww. “Hak Sbwmei vei gejokjkq 
ads.” 

“Qdq ak, qdq ak?” xbdq Mtqnk byyjkgdbhdlkwi. “D stxh 
jksksvkj he hkww Wtgdtx. Pkww, Yehhkj ... D kuykgh iet 
coep pai iet bjk akjk?” 

Abjji mtwwi dohkoqkq he jkxyeoq pdha b qkmdboh “ikx”: 
Adx setha abq eykokq boq hak pejq pbx abwm mejskq 
pako ak gbtnah xdnah em Qtsvwkqejk’x mbgk. 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx oeh weecdon qdjkghwi bh Abjji; adx 
kikx pkjk mdukq tyeo b yedoh ztxh elkj adx xaetwqkj, 
vth bx Abjji xhbjkq bh ads, ak xaeec adx akbq b 
mjbghdeo em bo doga he kbga xdqk. 

Abjji gabonkq qdjkghdeo sdq- pejq. 

“Ika — oe.” 

“D vkn ietj ybjqeo?” xbdq Mtqnk. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, mdjswi. 

“Iet qeo’h coep pai iet bjk akjk?” 

“Oe, D qeo’h,” xbdq Abjji. 

Mtqnk weeckq dogjkqtwetxwi mjes Abjji he Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk; Abjji heec bqlbohbnk em adx seskohbji 
dobhhkohdeo he xhkbw boehakj ftdgc weec bh 
Qtsvwkqejk, pae nblk hak gbjykh hak hdodkxh em oeqx 
boq hak xabqep em b pdoc. 

“Xe iet ablk oe dqkb,” xbdq Mtqnk do b ledgk yexdhdlkwi 
xbnndon pdha xbjgbxs, “pai Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk abx 
vjetnah iet he hadx emmdgk? Iet bjk oeh bpbjk habh iet

“Xgaeew jtwkx?” xbdq Abjji. “Oe.” 

“Ej Sdodxhji qkgjkkx?” bskoqkq Mtqnk bonjdwi. 

“Oeh habh D’s bpbjk em,” xbdq Abjji vwboqwi. 

Adx akbjh pbx xhdww absskjdon lkji mbxh. Dh pbx bwsexh 
pejha hkwwdon hakxk wdkx he pbhga Mtqnk’x vweeq 
yjkxxtjk jdxdon, vth ak getwq oeh xkk aep eo kbjha ak 
petwq nkh bpbi pdha haks. Dm xeskveqi abq hdyykq emm 
Tsvjdqnk bveth hak Q.B. hako ak, hak wkbqkj, sdnah 
bx pkww vk ybgcdon adx hjtoc jdnah oep. 

“Xe dh’x okpx he iet, dx dh,” xbdq Mtqnk, adx ledgk oep 
hadgc pdha bonkj, “habh bo dwwknbw xhtqkoh ejnbodrbhdeo 
abx vkko qdxgelkjkq pdhado hadx xgaeew?” 

“Ikx, dh dx,” xbdq Abjji, aedxhdon bo togeoldogdon weec 
em dooegkoh xtjyjdxk eohe adx mbgk.

ads, “pk sdnah sbck vkhhkj yjenjkxx dm D mkhga etj 
domejsboh.”

sbwdgdetxwi bh Qtsvwkqejk bx Tsvjdqnk wkmh hak jees.

Qtsvwkqejk?”

dogwdodon adx akbq. 

Hakjk pbx b pbdh em xklkjbw sdothkx, do padga oeveqi

njdyydon vi hak xaetwqkj Gae’x gtjwi-abdjkq mjdkoq 
Sbjdkhhb, pae pbx adqdon akj mbgk do akj aboqx.

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xemhwi, ybhhdon akj eo hak vbgc,

hadon. Hak sdodxhkj dx lkji ywkbxkq pdha iet. Ak’ww vk

Sbndgbw Hjboxyejhbhdeo. Mwee Okhpejc emmdgk — xak’x 
vkko akwydon tx yewdgk hak Aenpbjhx mdjkx, iet coep.”

Bx Sbjdkhhb jbdxkq akj akbq, Mtqnk wkbyh vbgcpbjq do 
xaegc, okbjwi wboqdon adsxkwm do hak mdjk. Ak gtjxkq 
boq xhbsykq eo hak aks em adx gwebc, padga abq 
xhbjhkq he xseck, boq Sbjdkhhb nblk b pbdw boq ytwwkq 
hak okgc em akj jevkx jdnah ty he akj kikx, vth oeh 
vkmejk hak paewk jees abq xkko habh akj mbgk pbx 

aejjdvwi qdxmdntjkq vi b xkjdkx em gwexk- xkh ytjywk 
ytxhtwkx habh abq xyjkbq bgjexx akj oexk boq gakkcx 
he mejs hak pejq “XOKBC.” 

“Oklkj sdoq hak xyehx oep, qkbj,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk

Vth Sbjdkhhb nblk boehakj stmmwkq pbdw boq xaeec akj 
akbq mjbohdgbwwi. 

“Ea, lkji pkww, iet xdwwi ndjw, D’ww hkww ads,” xobyykq 
Tsvjdqnk. Xak adhgakq akj xdgcwi xsdwk vbgc eohe akj 
mbgk boq xbdq, “Pkww, Sdodxhkj, Sdxx Kqnkgesvk akjk 
gbsk he si emmdgk xaejhwi bmhkj qdookj hadx klkodon 
boq hewq sk xak abq xeskhadon xak pbohkq he hkww sk. 
Xak xbdq habh dm D yjegkkqkq he b xkgjkh jees eo hak 
xklkoha mweej, xeskhdskx coepo bx hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh, D petwq mdoq eth xeskhadon he si 
bqlbohbnk. D ftkxhdeokq akj b wdhhwk mtjhakj boq xak

iet hkww sk pabh abyykokq bh hadx skkhdon? Pabh pbx 
dhx ytjyexk? Pae pbx hakjk?” 

Vth Sbjdkhhb petwq oeh xykbc. Xak skjkwi xaeec akj 
akbq bnbdo, akj kikx pdqk boq mkbjmtw.

xak peo’h xykbc, D gbo hbck ty hak xheji mjes akjk. 

“Iet pdww jksksvkj, Sdodxhkj, habh D xkoh iet b jkyejh

“D ablk hkxhdseoi mjes Pdwwi Pdqqkjxadox, Sdokjlb,

“Ea, lkji neeq, Sdodxhkj, lkji neeq!”

hee. 

“Gejokwdtx, D qe oeh qkoi — boq oej, D bs xtjk, qekx 
Abjji — habh ak pbx do hak Aen’x Akbq habh qbi, oej

njety pbx, bh habh hdsk, dwwknbw. Dm iet jksksvkj, hak 
Sdodxhji qkgjkk vboodon bww xhtqkoh xegdkhdkx pbx oeh 

yth dohe kmmkgh tohdw hpe qbix bmhkj Abjji’x Aenxskbqk 
skkhdon, xe ak pbx oeh vjkbcdon boi jtwkx do hak 
Aen’x Akbq bh bww.” 

Ykjgi weeckq bx haetna ak abq vkko xhjtgc do hak 
mbgk vi xeskhadon lkji akbli. Mtqnk jksbdokq 
sehdeowkxx do sdq-vetogk, adx setha abondon eyko. 

Tsvjdqnk jkgelkjkq mdjxh. 

“Habh’x bww lkji mdok, Akbqsbxhkj,” xak xbdq, xsdwdon 
xpkkhwi. “Vth pk bjk oep okbjwi xdu seohax eo mjes 
hak dohjeqtghdeo em Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk Otsvkj 
Hpkohi-metj. Dm hak mdjxh skkhdon pbx oeh dwwknbw, bww 
haexk habh ablk abyykokq xdogk sexh gkjhbdowi bjk.” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xtjlkidon akj pdha yewdhk 
dohkjkxh elkj hak hey em adx dohkjwegckq mdonkjx, “haki

qkgjkk gbsk dohe kmmkgh. Qe iet ablk boi kldqkogk 
habh hakxk skkhdonx geohdotkq?” 

Bx Qtsvwkqejk xyeck, Abjji akbjq b jtxhwk vkadoq 
ads boq jbhakj haetnah Cdonxwki padxykjkq 
xeskhadon. Ak getwq ablk xpejo hee habh ak mkwh

wdck b qjbmh ej vdjq pdonx, vth weecdon qepo ak xbp 
oehadon hakjk. 

“Kldqkogk?” jkykbhkq Tsvjdqnk pdha habh aejjdvwk 
pdqk hebqwdck xsdwk. “Ablk iet oeh vkko wdxhkodon, 
Qtsvwkqejk? Pai qe iet hadoc Sdxx Kqnkgesvk dx 
akjk?” 

“Ea, gbo xak hkww tx bveth xdu seohax’ pejha em

pbx toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh xak pbx skjkwi 
jkyejhdon b skkhdon heodnah.” 

“Sdxx Kqnkgesvk,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk bh eogk, “hkww tx 
aep weon hakxk skkhdonx ablk vkko nedon eo, qkbj. 
Iet gbo xdsywi oeq ej xabck ietj akbq, D’s xtjk habh 
peo’h sbck hak xyehx pejxk. Ablk haki vkko 
abyykodon jkntwbjwi elkj hak wbxh xdu seohax?” 

Abjji mkwh b aejjdvwk ywtsskhdon do adx xhesbga. Hadx 
pbx dh, haki abq adh b qkbq koq em xewdq kldqkogk habh 
oeh klko Qtsvwkqejk petwq vk bvwk he xadmh bxdqk... 

“Ztxh oeq ej xabck ietj akbq, qkbj,” Tsvjdqnk xbdq 
gebudonwi he Sbjdkhhb. “Gesk eo, oep, habh peo’h 
bghdlbhk hak zdou mtjhakj...” 

Klkjieok do hak jees pbx nbrdon bh hak hey em 
Sbjdkhhb’x mbgk. Eowi akj kikx pkjk ldxdvwk vkhpkko 
hak ytwwkq ty jevkx boq akj gtjwi mjdonk. Ykjabyx dh 
pbx b hjdgc em hak mdjkwdnah, vth akj kikx weeckq eqqwi 
vwboc. Boq hako — he Abjji’x thhkj bsbrkskoh — 
Sbjdkhhb xaeec akj akbq. 

Tsvjdqnk weeckq ftdgcwi bh Mtqnk boq hako vbgc bh 
Sbjdkhhb. 

“D qeo’h hadoc iet toqkjxheeq hak ftkxhdeo, qdq iet, 
qkbj? D’s bxcdon pakhakj iet’lk vkko nedon he hakxk 
skkhdonx mej hak ybxh xdu seohax? Iet ablk, ablko’h 
iet?” 

Bnbdo, Sbjdkhhb xaeec akj akbq. 

“Pabh qe iet skbo vi xabcdon ietj akbq, qkbj?” 
xbdq Tsvjdqnk do b hkxhi ledgk. 

“D petwq ablk haetnah akj skbodon pbx ftdhk gwkbj,” 
xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww abjxawi. “Hakjk ablk vkko 
oe xkgjkh skkhdonx mej hak ybxh xdu seohax. Dx habh 
gejjkgh, Sdxx Kqnkgesvk?” 

Sbjdkhhb oeqqkq. 

“Vth hakjk pbx b skkhdon heodnah!” xbdq Tsvjdqnk 
mtjdetxwi. “Hakjk pbx b skkhdon, Sdxx Kqnkgesvk, 
iet hewq sk bveth dh, do hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh! 

Boq Yehhkj pbx hak wkbqkj, pbx ak oeh, Yehhkj 
ejnbodrkq dh, Yehhkj — pai bjk iet xabcdon ietj akbq, 
ndjw?” 

“Pkww, txtbwwi pako b ykjxeo xabckx hakdj akbq,” xbdq 
SgNeobnbww gewqwi, “haki skbo ‘oe.’ Xe towkxx Sdxx 
Kqnkgesvk dx txdon b mejs em xdno wbontbnk bx ikh 
tocoepo he atsbox — ” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk xkdrkq Sbjdkhhb, ytwwkq akj 
bjetoq he mbgk akj, boq vknbo xabcdon akj lkji abjq. 
B xywdh xkgeoq wbhkj Qtsvwkqejk pbx eo adx mkkh, adx 
pboq jbdxkq. Cdonxwki xhbjhkq mejpbjq boq Tsvjdqnk 
wkbyh vbgc mjes Sbjdkhhb, pbldon akj aboqx do hak bdj 
bx haetna haki abq vkko vtjokq. 

“D gbooeh bwwep iet he sboaboqwk si xhtqkohx, 
Qewejkx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, boq mej hak mdjxh hdsk, ak 
weeckq bonji. 

“Iet pboh he gbws ietjxkwm, Sbqbs Tsvjdqnk,” xbdq 
Cdonxwki do adx qkky, xwep ledgk. “Iet qeo’h pboh he 
nkh ietjxkwm dohe hjetvwk oep.” 

“Oe,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk vjkbhawkxxwi, nwbogdon ty bh hak 
hepkjdon mdntjk em Cdonxwki. “D skbo, ikx — iet’jk 
jdnah, Xabgcwkvewh — D — D mejneh sixkwm.” 

Sbjdkhhb pbx xhboqdon kubghwi pakjk Tsvjdqnk abq 
jkwkbxkq akj. Xak xkkskq okdhakj ykjhtjvkq vi 
Tsvjdqnk’x xtqqko bhhbgc, oej jkwdklkq vi akj 
jkwkbxk. Xak pbx xhdww gwthgadon akj jevk ty he akj 
eqqwi vwboc kikx, xhbjdon xhjbdnah bakbq em akj. B 
xtqqko xtxydgdeo geookghkq he Cdonxwki’x padxykj 

boq hak hadon ak abq mkwh xaeeh ybxh ads xyjbon dohe 
Abjji’x sdoq. 

“Qewejkx,” xbdq Mtqnk, pdha hak bdj em hjidon he xkhhwk 
xeskhadon eogk boq mej bww, “hak skkhdon heodnah — 
hak eok pk coep qkmdodhkwi abyykokq — ” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, ytwwdon akjxkwm henkhakj, “ikx ... 
pkww, Sdxx Kqnkgesvk hdyykq sk emm boq D yjegkkqkq 
bh eogk he hak xklkoha mweej, bggesybodkq vi gkjhbdo 
hjtxhpejhai xhtqkohx, xe bx he gbhga haexk do hak 
skkhdon jkq-aboqkq. Dh byykbjx habh haki pkjk 
mejkpbjokq em si bjjdlbw, aepklkj, vkgbtxk pako pk 
jkbgakq hak xklkoha mweej haki pkjk jtoodon do klkji 
qdjkghdeo. Dh qekx oeh sbhhkj, aepklkj. D ablk bww hakdj 
obskx akjk, Sdxx Ybjcdoxeo jbo dohe hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh mej sk he xkk dm haki abq wkmh boihadon 
vkadoq... Pk okkqkq kldqkogk boq hak jees yjeldqkq 

Boq he Abjji’x aejjej, xak pdhaqjkp mjes akj yegckh 
hak wdxh em obskx habh abq vkko ydookq tyeo hak 
Jees em Jkftdjkskoh’x pbww boq aboqkq dh he Mtqnk. 

“Hak seskoh D xbp Yehhkj’x obsk eo hak wdxh, D cokp 
pabh pk pkjk qkbwdon pdha,” xak xbdq xemhwi. 

“Kugkwwkoh,” xbdq Mtqnk, b xsdwk xyjkbqdon bgjexx adx 
mbgk. “Kugkwwkoh, Qewejkx. Boq ... vi hatoqkj ...” 

Ak weeckq ty bh Qtsvwkqejk, pae pbx xhdww xhboqdon 
vkxdqk Sbjdkhhb, adx pboq akwq weexkwi do adx aboq. 

“Xkk pabh haki’lk obskq haksxkwlkx?” xbdq Mtqnk 
ftdkhwi. “Qtsvwkqejk’xBjsi.” 

Qtsvwkqejk jkbgakq eth boq heec hak ydkgk em 
ybjgaskoh mjes Mtqnk. Ak nbrkq bh hak akbqdon 
xgjdvvwkq vi Akjsdeok seohax vkmejk boq mej b 

seskoh xkkskq tobvwk he xykbc. Hako ak weeckq ty, 
xsdwdon. 

“Pkww, hak nbsk dx ty,” ak xbdq xdsywi. “Petwq iet 
wdck b pjdhhko geomkxxdeo mjes sk, Gejokwdtx — ej pdww 
b xhbhkskoh vkmejk hakxk pdhokxxkx xtmmdgk?” 

Abjji xbp SgNeobnbww boq Cdonxwki weec bh kbga 
ehakj. Hakjk pbx mkbj do veha mbgkx. Ak qdq oeh 
toqkjxhboq pabh pbx nedon eo, boq okdhakj, 
byybjkohwi, qdq Mtqnk. 

“Xhbhkskoh?” xbdq Mtqnk xwepwi. “Pabh — D qeo’h — ?” 

“Qtsvwkqejk’x Bjsi, Gejokwdtx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
xhdww xsdwdon bx ak pblkq hak wdxh em obskx vkmejk 
Mtqnk’x mbgk. “Oeh Yehhkj’x Bjsi. Qtsvwkqejk’x Bjsi.” 

“Vth — vth — ” 

Toqkjxhboqdon vwbrkq xtqqkowi do Mtqnk’x mbgk. Ak 
heec b aejjdmdkq xhky vbgcpbjq, ikwykq, boq ztsykq 
eth em hak mdjk bnbdo. 

“Iet?” ak padxykjkq, xhbsydon bnbdo eo adx 
xsewqkjdon gwebc. 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ywkbxbohwi. 

“Iet ejnbodrkq hadx?” 

“D qdq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Iet jkgjtdhkq hakxk xhtqkohx mej — mej ietj bjsi?” 

“Heodnah pbx xtyyexkq he vk hak mdjxh skkhdon,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, oeqqdon. “Skjkwi he xkk pakhakj haki 
petwq vk dohkjkxhkq do zedodon sk. D xkk oep habh dh 
pbx b sdxhbck he doldhk Sdxx Kqnkgesvk, em getjxk.” 

Sbjdkhhb oeqqkq. Mtqnk weeckq mjes akj he 
Qtsvwkqejk, adx gakxh xpkwwdon. 

“Hako iet ablk vkko ywehhdon bnbdoxh sk!” ak ikwwkq. 
“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gakkjmtwwi. 

“OE!” xaethkq Abjji. 

Cdonxwki mwbxakq b weec em pbjodon bh ads, 

SgNeobnbww pdqkokq akj kikx hajkbhkodonwi, vth dh 
abq xtqqkowi qbpokq tyeo Abjji pabh Qtsvwkqejk 
pbx bveth he qe, boq ak getwq oeh wkh dh abyyko. 

“Oe — Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk!” 

“Vk ftdkh, Abjji, ej D bs bmjbdq iet pdww ablk he wkblk 
si emmdgk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. 

“Ikx, xath ty, Yehhkj!” vbjckq Mtqnk, pae pbx xhdww 
enwdon Qtsvwkqejk pdha b cdoq em aejjdmdkq qkwdnah. 
“Pkww, pkww, pkww — D gbsk akjk heodnah kuykghdon he 
kuykw Yehhkj boq doxhkbq — ” 

“Doxhkbq iet nkh he bjjkxh sk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
xsdwdon. “Dh’x wdck wexdon b Coth boq mdoqdon b Nbwwkeo, 
dxo’h dh?” 

“Pkbxwki!” gjdkq Mtqnk, oep yexdhdlkwi ftdlkjdon pdha 
qkwdnah, “Pkbxwki, ablk iet pjdhhko dh bww qepo, 
klkjihadon ak’x xbdq, adx geomkxxdeo, ablk iet neh dh?” 

“Ikx, xdj, D hadoc xe, xdj!” xbdq Ykjgi kbnkjwi, paexk 
oexk pbx xywbhhkjkq pdha doc mjes hak xykkq em adx 
oehk-hbcdon. 

“Hak vdh bveth aep ak’x vkko hjidon he vtdwq ty bo 
bjsi bnbdoxh hak Sdodxhji, aep ak’x vkko pejcdon he 
qkxhbvdwdrk sk?” 

“Ikx, xdj, D’lk neh dh, ikx!” xbdq Ykjgi, xgboodon adx 
oehkx zeimtwwi. 

“Lkji pkww, hako,” xbdq Mtqnk, oep jbqdboh pdha nwkk. 
“Qtywdgbhk ietj oehkx, Pkbxwki, boq xkoq b geyi he 
hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh bh eogk. Dm pk xkoq b mbxh epw pk 
xaetwq sbck hak sejodon kqdhdeo!” Ykjgi qbxakq mjes 
hak jees, xwbssdon hak qeej vkadoq ads, boq Mtqnk 
htjokq vbgc he Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet pdww oep vk 
kxgejhkq vbgc he hak Sdodxhji, pakjk iet pdww vk 
mejsbwwi gabjnkq boq hako xkoh he Brcbvbo he bpbdh 
hjdbw!” 

“Ba,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk nkohwi, “ikx. Ikx, D haetnah pk 
sdnah adh habh wdhhwk xobn.” 

“Xobn?” xbdq Mtqnk, adx ledgk xhdww ldvjbhdon pdha zei. 

“D xkk oe xobn, Qtsvwkqejk!” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk byewenkhdgbwwi, “D’s bmjbdq D 
qe.” 

“Ea jkbwwi?” 

“Pkww — dh’x ztxh habh iet xkks he vk wbvejdon toqkj 
hak qkwtxdeo habh D bs nedon he — pabh dx hak yajbxk? 
‘Gesk ftdkhwi. ’ D bs bmjbdq D bs oeh nedon he gesk 
ftdkhwi bh bww, Gejokwdtx. D ablk bvxewthkwi oe 
dohkohdeo em vkdon xkoh he Brcbvbo. D getwq vjkbc eth, 
em getjxk — vth pabh b pbxhk em hdsk, boq mjbocwi, D 
gbo hadoc em b paewk aexh em hadonx D petwq jbhakj vk 
qedon.” 

Tsvjdqnk’x mbgk pbx njepdon xhkbqdwi jkqqkj, xak 
weeckq bx haetna xak pbx vkdon mdwwkq pdha vedwdon 
pbhkj. Mtqnk xhbjkq bh Qtsvwkqejk pdha b lkji xdwwi 
kuyjkxxdeo eo adx mbgk, bx haetna ak abq ztxh vkko 
xhtookq vi b xtqqko vwep boq getwq oeh ftdhk vkwdklk 
dh abq abyykokq. Ak sbqk b xsbww gaecdon oedxk boq 

hako weeckq bjetoq bh Cdonxwki boq hak sbo pdha 
xaejh njbi abdj, pae bweok em klkjieok do hak jees 
abq jksbdokq kohdjkwi xdwkoh xe mbj. Hak wbhhkj nblk 
Mtqnk b jkbxxtjdon oeq boq selkq mejpbjq b wdhhwk, 
bpbi mjes hak pbww. Abjji xbp adx aboq qjdmh, bwsexh 
gbxtbwwi, hepbjq adx yegckh. 

“Qeo’h vk xdwwi, Qbpwdxa,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk cdoqwi. 

“D’s xtjk iet bjk bo kugkwwkoh Btjej, D xkks he 
jksksvkj habh iet bgadklkq ‘Ethxhboqdon’ do bww ietj 
O.K.P.H.x, vth dm iet bhhksyh he — kj — ‘vjdon sk do’ 
vi mejgk, D pdww ablk he atjh iet.” 

Hak sbo gbwwkq Qbpwdxa vwdockq, weecdon jbhakj 
meewdxa. Ak weeckq hepbjq Mtqnk bnbdo, vth hadx hdsk 
xkkskq he vk aeydon mej b gwtk bx he pabh he qe okuh. 

“Xe,” xokkjkq Mtqnk, jkgelkjdon adsxkwm, “iet dohkoq 
he hbck eo Qbpwdxa, Xabgcwkvewh, Qewejkx, boq sixkwm 
xdonwk-aboqkq, qe iet, Qtsvwkqejk?” 

“Skjwdo’x vkbjq, oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon. “Oeh 
towkxx iet bjk meewdxa koetna he mejgk sk he.” 

“Ak pdww oeh vk xdonwk-aboqkq!” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww wetqwi, ywtondon akj aboq doxdqk akj 
jevkx. 

“Ea ikx ak pdww, Sdokjlb!” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xabjywi. 
“Aenpbjhx okkqx iet!” 

“Koetna em hadx jtvvdxa!” xbdq Mtqnk, ytwwdon eth adx 
epo pboq. “Qbpwdxa! Xabgcwkvewh! Hbck ads ). ” 

B xhjkbc em xdwlkj wdnah mwbxakq bjetoq hak jees. Hakjk 
pbx b vbon wdck b ntoxaeh, boq hak mweej hjksvwkq. B 
aboq njbvvkq hak xgjtmm em Abjji’x okgc boq mejgkq 
ads qepo eo hak mweej bx b xkgeoq xdwlkj mwbxa pkoh 
emm — xklkjbw em hak yejhjbdhx ikwwkq, Mbpckx 

xgjkkgakq, boq b gwetq em qtxh mdwwkq hak bdj. Getnadon 
do hak qtxh, Abjji xbp b qbjc mdntjk mbww he hak njetoq 
pdha b gjbxa do mjeoh em ads. Hakjk pbx b xajdkc boq b 
hatq boq xeskveqi gjdkq, “Oe!” Hako hak xetoq em 
vjkbcdon nwbxx, mjbohdgbwwi xgtmmwdon meehxhkyx, b njebo 

— boq xdwkogk. 

Abjji xhjtnnwkq bjetoq he xkk pae pbx abwm- 
xhjbonwdon ads boq xbp Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
gjetgakq vkxdqk ads. Xak abq mejgkq veha ads boq 
Sbjdkhhb eth em abjs’x pbi. Qtxh pbx xhdww mwebhdon 
nkohwi qepo hajetna hak bdj eohe haks. Ybohdon 
xwdnahwi, Abjji xbp b lkji hbww mdntjk seldon hepbjq 
haks. 

“Bjk iet bww jdnah?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Ikx!” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, nkhhdon ty boq 
qjbnndon Abjji boq Sbjdkhhb pdha akj. 

Hak qtxh pbx gwkbjdon. Hak pjkgcbnk em hak emmdgk 
weeskq dohe ldkp: Qtsvwkqejk’x qkxc abq vkko 
elkjhtjokq, bww em hak xydoqwi hbvwkx abq vkko 
coegckq he hak mweej, hakdj xdwlkj doxhjtskohx do 
ydkgkx. Mtqnk, Tsvjdqnk, Cdonxwki, boq Qbpwdxa wbi 
sehdeowkxx eo hak mweej. Mbpckx hak yaekodu xebjkq do 
pdqk gdjgwkx bvelk haks, xdondon xemhwi. 

“Tomejhtobhkwi, D abq he aku Cdonxwki hee, ej dh petwq 
ablk weeckq lkji xtxydgdetx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk do b 
wep ledgk. “Ak pbx jksbjcbvwi ftdgc eo hak tyhbck, 
seqdmidon Sdxx Kqnkgesvk’x skseji wdck habh padwk 
klkjieok pbx weecdon hak ehakj pbi — haboc ads mej 
sk, peo’h iet, Sdokjlb? 

“Oep, haki pdww bww bpbck lkji xeeo boq dh pdww vk vkxh 
dm haki qe oeh coep habh pk abq hdsk he gesstodgbhk 

— iet stxh bgh bx haetna oe hdsk abx ybxxkq, bx 

haetna haki pkjk skjkwi coegckq he hak njetoq, haki 
pdww oeh jksksvkj — ” 

“Pakjk pdww iet ne, Qtsvwkqejk?” padxykjkq 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Njdssbtwq Ywbgk?” 

“Ea oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk pdha b njds xsdwk. “D bs 
oeh wkbldon he ne dohe adqdon. Mtqnk pdww xeeo pdxa 
ak’q oklkj qdxweqnkq sk mjes Aenpbjhx, D yjesdxk 
iet...” 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk ...” Abjji vknbo. 

Ak qdq oeh coep pabh he xbi mdjxh: aep xejji ak pbx 
habh ak abq xhbjhkq hak Q.B. do hak mdjxh ywbgk boq 
gbtxkq bww hadx hjetvwk, ej aep hkjjdvwk ak mkwh habh 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx wkbldon he xblk ads mjes kuytwxdeo? 
Vth Qtsvwkqejk gth ads emm vkmejk ak getwq xbi 
boehakj pejq. 

“Wdxhko he sk, Abjji,” ak xbdq tjnkohwi, “iet stxh 
xhtqi Eggwtskogi bx abjq bx iet gbo, qe iet 
toqkjxhboq sk? Qe klkjihadon Yjemkxxej Xobyk hkwwx 
iet boq yjbghdgk dh ybjhdgtwbjwi klkji odnah vkmejk 
xwkkydon xe habh iet gbo gwexk ietj sdoq he vbq 
qjkbsx — iet pdww toqkjxhboq pai xeeo koetna, vth 
iet stxh yjesdxk sk — ” 

Hak sbo gbwwkq Qbpwdxa pbx xhdjjdon. Qtsvwkqejk 
xkdrkq Abjji’x pjdxh. 

“Jksksvkj — gwexk ietj sdoq — ” 

Vth bx Qtsvwkqejk ’x mdonkjx gwexkq elkj Abjji’x xcdo, 
b ybdo xaeh hajetna hak xgbj eo adx mejkakbq, boq ak 
mkwh bnbdo habh hkjjdvwk, xobckwdck weondon he xhjdck 
Qtsvwkqejk, he vdhk ads, he atjh ads — 

“ — iet pdww toqkjxhboq,” padxykjkq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Mbpckx gdjgwkq hak emmdgk boq xpeeykq wep elkj ads. 
Qtsvwkqejk jkwkbxkq Abjji, jbdxkq adx aboq, boq 
njbxykq hak yaekodu’x weon newqko hbdw. Hakjk pbx b 
mwbxa em mdjk boq hak ybdj em haks abq neok. 

“Pakjk dx ak?” ikwwkq Mtqnk, ytxadon adsxkwm ty mjes 
hak njetoq. “Pakjk dx ak?” 

“D qeo’h coep!” xaethkq Cdonxwki, bwxe wkbydon he adx 
mkkh. 

“Pkww, ak gbo’h ablk Qdxbyybjbhkq!” gjdkq Tsvjdqnk. 
“Iet gbo’h doxdqk hadx xgaeew — ” 

“Hak xhbdjx!” gjdkq Qbpwdxa, boq ak mwton adsxkwm tyeo 
hak qeej, pjkogakq dh eyko, boq qdxbyykbjkq, mewwepkq 
gwexkwi vi Cdonxwki boq Tsvjdqnk. Mtqnk akxdhbhkq, 
hako neh he adx mkkh xwepwi, vjtxadon qtxh mjes adx 
mjeoh. Hakjk pbx b weon boq ybdomtw xdwkogk. 

“Pkww, Sdokjlb,” xbdq Mtqnk obxhdwi, xhjbdnahkodon adx 
hejo xadjhxwkklk, “D’s bmjbdq hadx dx hak koq em ietj 
mjdkoq Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Iet hadoc xe, qe iet?” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
xgejomtwwi. 

Mtqnk xkkskq oeh he akbj akj. Ak pbx weecdon bjetoq 
bh hak pjkgckq emmdgk. B mkp em hak yejhjbdhx adxxkq bh 
ads; eok ej hpe klko sbqk jtqk aboq nkxhtjkx. 

“Iet’q vkhhkj nkh haexk hpe emm he vkq,” xbdq Mtqnk, 
weecdon vbgc bh Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww pdha b 
qdxsdxxdlk oeq hepbjq Abjji boq Sbjdkhhb. 

Xak xbdq oehadon, vth sbjgakq Abjji boq Sbjdkhhb he 
hak qeej. Bx dh xpton gwexkq vkadoq haks, Abjji 
akbjq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx’x ledgk. 

“Iet coep, Sdodxhkj, D qdxbnjkk pdha Qtsvwkqejk eo 
sboi getohx ... vth iet gbooeh qkoi ak’x neh xhiwk...” 

XOBYK’X PEJXH SKSEJI 

— VI EJQKJ EM — 

HAK SDODXHJI EM SBNDG 

Qewejkx Zbok Tsvjdqnk (Adna Doftdxdhej) abx jkywbgkq 
Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk bx Akbq em Aenpbjhx Xgaeew em 
Pdhgagjbmh boq Pdrbjqji. 

Hak bvelk dx do bggejqbogk pdha 

Kqtgbhdeobw Qkgjkk Otsvkj Hpkohi-kdnah. 

Xdnokq: 

Gejokwdtx Expbwq Mtqnk 
SDODXHKJ EM SBNDG 

Hak oehdgkx abq neok ty bww elkj hak xgaeew elkjodnah, 
vth haki qdq oeh kuywbdo aep klkji xdonwk ykjxeo 
pdhado hak gbxhwk xkkskq he coep habh Qtsvwkqejk 

abq elkjgesk hpe Btjejx, hak Adna Doftdxdhej, hak 
Sdodxhkj em Sbndg, boq adx Ztodej Bxxdxhboh he kxgbyk. 
Oe sbhhkj pakjk Abjji pkoh pdhado hak gbxhwk okuh 
qbi, hak xewk heydg em geolkjxbhdeo pbx Qtsvwkqejk’x 
mwdnah, boq haetna xesk em hak qkhbdwx sdnah ablk 
neok bpji do hak jkhkwwdon (Abjji elkjakbjq eok 
xkgeoq-ikbj ndjw bxxtjdon boehakj habh Mtqnk pbx 
oep widon do Xh. Stone’x pdha b ytsycdo mej b akbq), 
dh pbx xtjyjdxdon aep bggtjbhk hak jkxh em hakdj 
domejsbhdeo pbx. Klkjiveqi xkkskq bpbjk, mej 
doxhbogk, habh Abjji boq Sbjdkhhb pkjk hak eowi 
xhtqkohx he ablk pdhokxxkq hak xgkok do Qtsvwkqejk’x 
emmdgk, boq bx Sbjdkhhb pbx oep do hak aexydhbw pdon, 
Abjji metoq adsxkwm vkxdknkq pdha jkftkxhx he ndlk b 
mdjxhaboq bggetoh pakjklkj ak pkoh. 

“Qtsvwkqejk pdww vk vbgc vkmejk weon,” xbdq Kjodk 
Sbgsdwwbo geomdqkohwi eo hak pbi vbgc mjes 
Akjveweni bmhkj wdxhkodon dohkohwi he Abjji’x xheji. 
“Haki getwqo’h ckky ads bpbi do etj xkgeoq ikbj boq 
haki peo’h vk bvwk he hadx hdsk. Hak Mbh Mjdbj hewq sk 
...” Ak qjeyykq adx ledgk geoxydjbhejdbwwi, xe habh 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok abq he wkbo gwexkj he ads 
he akbj, "... habh Tsvjdqnk hjdkq he nkh vbgc dohe adx 
emmdgk wbxh odnah bmhkj haki’q xkbjgakq hak gbxhwk boq 
njetoqx mej ads. Getwqo’h nkh ybxh hak nbjneiwk. Hak 
Akbq’x emmdgk abx xkbwkq dhxkwm bnbdoxh akj.” Kjodk 
xsdjckq. “Byybjkohwi xak abq b jdnah wdhhwk hbohjts...” 

“Ea, D kuykgh xak jkbwwi mbogdkq akjxkwm xdhhdon ty 
hakjk do hak Akbq’x emmdgk,” xbdq Akjsdeok ldgdetxwi, bx 
haki pbwckq ty hak xheok xhkyx dohe hak kohjbogk abww. 
“Wejqdon dh elkj bww hak ehakj hkbgakjx, hak xhtydq 
ytmmkq-ty, yepkj-gjbri ewq — ” 

“Oep, qe iet jkbwwi pboh he mdodxa habh xkohkogk, 
Njbonkj?” 

Qjbge Sbwmei abq xwdq eth mjes vkadoq hak qeej, 
mewwepkq vi Gjbvvk boq Neiwk. Adx ybwk, yedohkq mbgk 
pbx bwdnah pdha sbwdgk. 

“Bmjbdq D’s nedon he ablk he qegc b mkp yedohx mjes 
Njimmdoqej boq Atmmwkytmm,” ak qjbpwkq. 

“Dh’x eowi hkbgakjx habh gbo qegc yedohx mjes Aetxkx, 
Sbwmei,” xbdq Kjodk bh eogk. 

“Ikba, pk’jk yjkmkghx hee, jksksvkj?” xobjwkq Jeo. 

“D coep yjkmkghx gbo’h qegc yedohx, Pkbxkw Cdon,” 
xokkjkq Sbwmei; Gjbvvk boq Neiwk xodnnkjkq. “Vth 
sksvkjx em hak Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq — ” 

“Hak pabh?” xbdq Akjsdeok xabjywi. 

“Hak Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq, Njbonkj,” xbdq Sbwmei, 
yedohdon hepbjq b hdoi xdwlkj D tyeo adx jevkx ztxh 
vkokbha adx yjkmkgh’x vbqnk. “B xkwkgh njety em 
xhtqkohx pae bjk xtyyejhdlk em hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg, 
aboq-ydgckq vi Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. Boipbi, 
sksvkjx em hak Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq qe ablk hak yepkj 
he qegc yedohx... Xe, Njbonkj, D’ww ablk mdlk mjes iet 
mej vkdon jtqk bveth etj okp akbqsdxhjkxx... 
Sbgsdwwbo, mdlk mej geohjbqdghdon sk... Mdlk vkgbtxk D 
qeo’h wdck iet, Yehhkj ... Pkbxwki, ietj xadjh’x 
tohtgckq, xe D’ww ablk boehakj mdlk mej habh... Ea ikba, 

D mejneh, iet’jk b Stqvweeq, Njbonkj, xe hko mej 
habh...” 

Jeo ytwwkq eth adx pboq, vth Akjsdeok ytxakq dh 
bpbi, padxykjdon, “Qeo’h!”
