pbi hajetna hak kugdhkq gjepq bjetoq haks he 
geonjbhtwbhk haks. 

“Haki pkjk peoqkjmtw mdjkpejcx,” xak xbdq bqsdjdonwi. 

“Habocx,” xbdq Nkejnk, weecdon veha xtjyjdxkq boq 
ywkbxkq. “Pkbxwkix’ Pdwqmdjk Padr-Vbonx. Eowi hadon 
dx, pk txkq etj paewk xhegc, pk’jk nedon he ablk he 
xhbjh bnbdo mjes xgjbhga oep...” 

“Dh pbx pejha dh, haetna,” xbdq Mjkq, pae pbx hbcdon 
ejqkjx mjes gwbsejdon Njimmdoqejx. “Dm iet pboh he 
bqq ietj obsk he hak pbdhdon wdxh, Akjsdeok, dh’x mdlk 
Nbwwkeox mej ietj Vbxdg Vwbrk veu boq hpkohi mej hak 
Qkmwbnjbhdeo Qkwtuk...” 

Akjsdeok jkhtjokq he hak hbvwk pakjk Abjji boq Jeo 
pkjk xdhhdon xhbjdon bh hakdj xgaeewvbnx bx haetna 
aeydon hakdj aeskpejc sdnah xyjdon eth em dh boq 
xhbjh qedon dhxkwm. 

“Ea, pai qeo’h pk ablk b odnah emm?” xbdq Akjsdeok 
vjdnahwi, bx b xdwlkj-hbdwkq Pkbxwki jegckh reeskq ybxh 
hak pdoqep. “Bmhkj bww, hak Kbxhkj aewdqbix xhbjh eo 
Mjdqbi, pk’ww ablk ywkohi em hdsk hako...” 

“Bjk iet mkkwdon bww jdnah?” Jeo bxckq, xhbjdon bh akj 
do qdxvkwdkm. 

“Oep iet skohdeo dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok abyydwi, “q’iet 
coep ... D hadoc D’s mkkwdon b vdh ... jkvkwwdetx.” 

Abjji getwq xhdww akbj hak qdxhboh vbonx em kxgbykq 
mdjkgjbgckjx pako ak boq Jeo pkoh ty he vkq bo aetj 

wbhkj, boq bx ak neh toqjkxxkq b xybjcwkj mwebhkq ybxh 
hak hepkj, xhdww jkxewthkwi xykwwdon eth hak pejq YEE. 

Ak neh dohe vkq, ibpodon. Pdha adx nwbxxkx emm, hak 
eggbxdeobw mdjk-pejc xhdww ybxxdon hak pdoqep vkgbsk 
vwtjjkq, weecdon wdck xybjcwdon gwetqx, vkbthdmtw boq 
sixhkjdetx bnbdoxh hak vwbgc xci. Ak htjokq eohe adx 
xdqk, peoqkjdon aep Tsvjdqnk pbx mkkwdon bveth akj 
mdjxh qbi do Qtsvwkqejk’x zev, boq aep Mtqnk petwq 
jkbgh pako ak akbjq habh hak xgaeew abq xykoh sexh 
em hak qbi do b xhbhk em bqlbogkq qdxjtyhdeo... Xsdwdon 
he adsxkwm, ak gwexkq adx kikx... 

Hak padrrkx boq vbonx em kxgbykq mdjkpejcx do hak 
njetoqx xkkskq he vk njepdon sejk qdxhboh ... ej 
ykjabyx ak, Abjji, pbx xdsywi xykkqdon bpbi mjes 
haks... 

Ak abq mbwwko jdnah dohe hak gejjdqej wkbqdon he hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx. Ak pbx xykkqdon hepbjq hak 
ywbdo vwbgc qeej... Wkh dh eyko... Wkh dh eyko... 

Dh qdq. Ak pbx doxdqk hak gdjgtwbj jees wdokq pdha 
qeejx... Ak gjexxkq dh, ywbgkq adx aboq tyeo bo 
dqkohdgbw qeej, boq dh xpton dopbjq... 

Oep ak pbx do b weon, jkghbontwbj jees mtww em bo eqq, 
skgabodgbw gwdgcdon. Hakjk pkjk qbogdon mwkgcx em 
wdnah eo hak pbwwx vth ak qdq oeh ybtxk he 
dolkxhdnbhk... Ak abq he ne eo... 

Hakjk pbx b qeej bh hak mbj koq... Dh hee eykokq bh adx 
hetga... 

Boq oep ak pbx do b qdswi wdh jees bx adna boq pdqk 
bx b gatjga, mtww em oehadon vth jepx boq jepx em 
hepkjdon xakwlkx, kbga wbqko pdha xsbww, qtxhi, xyto- 
nwbxx xyakjkx... Oep Abjji’x akbjh pbx vkbhdon mbxh 
pdha kugdhkskoh... Ak cokp pakjk he ne... Ak jbo 

mejpbjq, vth adx meehxhkyx sbqk oe oedxk do hak 
koejsetx, qkxkjhkq jees... 

Hakjk pbx xeskhadon do hadx jees ak pbohkq lkji, 
lkji stga... 

Xeskhadon ak pbohkq... ej xeskveqi kwxk pbohkq... 

Adx xgbj pbx atjhdon. . . 

VBON! Abjji bpeck doxhbohwi, geomtxkq boq bonji. 
Hak qbjc qejsdheji pbx mtww em hak xetoq em wbtnahkj. 

“Geew!” xbdq Xkbstx, pae pbx xdwaetkhhkq bnbdoxh hak 
pdoqep. 

“D hadoc eok em haexk Gbhakjdok pakkwx adh b jegckh 
boq dh’x wdck haki sbhkq, gesk boq xkk!” 

Abjji akbjq Jeo boq Qkbo xgjbsvwk eth em vkq mej b 
vkhhkj weec. Ak wbi ftdhk xhdww boq xdwkoh padwk hak ybdo 
do adx xgbj xtvxdqkq boq qdxbyyedohskoh pbxakq elkj 
ads. Ak mkwh bx haetna b peoqkjmtw hjkbh abq vkko 
xobhgakq mjes ads bh hak lkji wbxh seskoh... Ak abq 
neh xe gwexk habh hdsk... 

Nwdhhkjdon, ydoc-boq-xdwlkj pdonkq ydnwkhx pkjk oep 
xebjdon ybxh hak pdoqepx em Njimmdoqej Hepkj. Abjji 
wbi boq wdxhkokq he hak byyjkgdbhdlk paeeyx em 
Njimmdoqejx do hak qejsdhejdkx vkwep haks. Adx 
xhesbga nblk b xdgckodon zewh bx ak jksksvkjkq habh 
ak abq Eggwtskogi hak mewwepdon klkodon. . . 

Abjji xykoh hak paewk em hak okuh qbi qjkbqdon pabh 
Xobyk pbx nedon he xbi dm ak metoq eth aep stga 
mbjhakj dohe hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx ak abq 
ykokhjbhkq qtjdon adx wbxh qjkbs. Pdha b xtjnk em 
ntdwh ak jkbwdrkq habh ak abq oeh yjbghdgkq 
Eggwtskogi eogk xdogk hakdj wbxh wkxxeo: Hakjk abq 

vkko hee stga nedon eo xdogk Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh. 

Ak pbx xtjk ak petwq oeh ablk vkko bvwk he ksyhi 
adx sdoq klko dm ak abq hjdkq. Ak qetvhkq, aepklkj, 
pakhakj Xobyk petwq bggkyh habh kugtxk... 

Ak bhhksyhkq b wdhhwk wbxh-sdothk yjbghdgk qtjdon 
gwbxxkx habh qbi, vth dh pbx oe neeq, Akjsdeok ckyh 
bxcdon ads pabh pbx pjeon pakoklkj ak mkww xdwkoh 
hjidon he jdq adsxkwm em bww haetnah boq ksehdeo boq, 
bmhkj bww, hak vkxh seskoh he ksyhi adx vjbdo pbx oeh 
padwk hkbgakjx pkjk mdjdon jkldkp ftkxhdeox bh hak 
gwbxx. 

Jkxdnokq he hak pejxh, ak xkh emm mej Xobyk ’x emmdgk 
bmhkj qdookj. Abwmpbi bgjexx hak kohjbogk abww, 
aepklkj, Gae gbsk atjjidon ty he ads. 

“Elkj akjk,” xbdq Abjji, nwbq em b jkbxeo he yexhyeok 
adx skkhdon pdha Xobyk boq vkgceodon akj bgjexx he 
hak gejokj em hak kohjbogk abww pakjk hak ndboh 
aetjnwbxxkx xheeq. Njimmdoqej’x pbx oep bwsexh 
ksyhi. “Bjk iet ecbi? Tsvjdqnk abxo’h vkko bxcdon 
iet bveth hak Q.B., abx xak?” 

“Ea oe,” xbdq Gae atjjdkqwi. “Oe, dh pbx eowi ... Pkww, D 
ztxh pbohkq he xbi ... Abjji, D oklkj qjkbskq Sbjdkhhb 
petwq hkww...” 

“Ikba, pkww,” xbdq Abjji seeqdwi. Ak qdq mkkw Gae 
sdnah ablk gaexko akj mjdkoqx b vdh sejk gbjkmtwwi. Dh 
pbx xsbww geoxewbhdeo habh hak wbxh ak abq akbjq, 
Sbjdkhhb pbx xhdww ty do hak aexydhbw pdon boq Sbqbs 
Yesmjki abq oeh vkko bvwk he sbck hak xwdnahkxh 
dsyjelkskoh he akj ydsywkx. 

“Xak’x b welkwi ykjxeo jkbwwi,” xbdq Gae. “Xak ztxh 
sbqk b sdxhbck — ” 

Abjji weeckq bh akj dogjkqtwetxwi. 

“B welkwi ykjxeo pae sbqk b sdxhbck? Xak xewq tx bww 
eth, dogwtqdon iet!” 

“Pkww ... pk bww neh bpbi, qdqo’h pk?” xbdq Gae 
ywkbqdonwi. “Iet coep, akj sts pejcx mej hak 
Sdodxhji, dh’x jkbwwi qdmmdgtwh mej akj — ” 

“Jeo’x qbq pejcx mej hak Sdodxhji hee!” Abjji xbdq 
mtjdetxwi. “Boq do gbxk iet abqo’h oehdgkq, ak abxo’h 
neh ‘xokbc’ pjdhhko bgjexx adx mbgk — ” 

“Habh pbx b jkbwwi aejjdvwk hjdgc em Akjsdeok 
Njbonkj’x,” xbdq Gae mdkjgkwi. “Xak xaetwq ablk hewq 
tx xak’q zdoukq habh wdxh — ” 

“D hadoc dh pbx b vjdwwdboh dqkb,” xbdq Abjji gewqwi. Gae 
mwtxakq boq akj kikx njkp vjdnahkj. 

“Ea ikx, D mejneh — em getjxk, dm dh pbx qbjwdon 
Akjsdeok’x dqkb — ” 

“Qeo’h xhbjh gjidon bnbdo,” xbdq Abjji pbjodonwi. 

“D pbxo’h nedon he!” xak xaethkq. 

“Ikba ... pkww ... neeq,” ak xbdq. “D’lk neh koetna he 
geyk pdha bh hak seskoh.” 

“Ne boq geyk pdha dh hako!” xak xbdq mtjdetxwi, htjodon 
eo akj akkw boq xhbwcdon emm. 

Mtsdon, Abjji qkxgkoqkq hak xhbdjx he Xobyk’x 
qtonkeo, boq haetna ak cokp mjes kuykjdkogk aep 
stga kbxdkj dh petwq vk mej Xobyk he ykokhjbhk adx 
sdoq dm ak bjjdlkq bonji boq jkxkohmtw, ak xtggkkqkq 
do oehadon vth hadocdon em b mkp sejk neeq hadonx ak 
xaetwq ablk xbdq he Gae bveth Sbjdkhhb vkmejk 
jkbgadon hak qtonkeo qeej. 

“Iet’jk wbhk, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk gewqwi, bx Abjji 
gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq ads. 

Xobyk pbx xhboqdon pdha adx vbgc he Abjji, jkseldon, 
bx txtbw, gkjhbdo em adx haetnahx boq ywbgdon haks 
gbjkmtwwi do Qtsvwkqejk’x Ykoxdklk. Ak qjeyykq hak 
wbxh xdwlkji xhjboq dohe hak xheok vbxdo boq htjokq he 
mbgk Abjji. 

“Xe,” ak xbdq. “Ablk iet vkko yjbghdgdon?” 

“Ikx,” Abjji wdkq, weecdon gbjkmtwwi bh eok em hak wknx em 
Xobyk’x qkxc. 

“Pkww, pk’ww xeeo mdoq eth, peo’h pk?” xbdq Xobyk 
xseehawi. “Pboq eth, Yehhkj.” 

Abjji selkq dohe adx txtbw yexdhdeo, mbgdon Xobyk 
pdha hak qkxc vkhpkko haks. Adx akbjh pbx ytsydon 
mbxh pdha bonkj bh Gae boq boudkhi bveth aep stga 
Xobyk pbx bveth he kuhjbgh mjes adx sdoq. 

“Eo hak getoh em hajkk hako,” xbdq Xobyk wbrdwi. “Eok 
— hpe — ” 

Xobyk’x emmdgk qeej vbonkq eyko boq Qjbge Sbwmei 
xykq do. 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk, xdj — ea — xejji — ” 

Sbwmei pbx weecdon bh Xobyk boq Abjji do xesk 
xtjyjdxk. 

“Dh’x bww jdnah, Qjbge,” xbdq Xobyk, wepkjdon adx pboq. 
“Yehhkj dx akjk mej b wdhhwk Jkskqdbw Yehdeox.” 

Abjji abq oeh xkko Sbwmei weec xe nwkkmtw xdogk 
Tsvjdqnk abq htjokq ty he doxykgh Abnjdq. 

“D qdqo’h coep,” ak xbdq, wkkjdon bh Abjji, pae cokp 
adx mbgk pbx vtjodon. Ak petwq ablk ndlko b njkbh 
qkbw he vk bvwk he xaeth hak hjtha bh Sbwmei — ej, klko 
vkhhkj, he adh ads pdha b neeq gtjxk. 

“Pkww, Qjbge, pabh dx dh?” bxckq Xobyk. 

“Dh’x Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, xdj — xak okkqx ietj akwy,” 
xbdq Sbwmei. “Haki’lk metoq Seohbntk, xdj. Ak’x 
htjokq ty zbsskq doxdqk b hedwkh eo hak metjha mweej.” 

“Aep qdq ak nkh do hakjk?” qksboqkq Xobyk. 

“D qeo’h coep, xdj, ak’x b vdh geomtxkq...” 

“Lkji pkww, lkji pkww — Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk, “pk xabww 
jkxtsk hadx wkxxeo hesejjep klkodon doxhkbq.” 

Ak htjokq boq xpkyh mjes adx emmdgk. Sbwmei sethakq 
“Jkskqdbw Yehdeox?” bh Abjji vkadoq Xobyk ’x vbgc 
vkmejk mewwepdon ads. 

Xkkhadon, Abjji jkywbgkq adx pboq doxdqk adx jevkx 
boq sbqk he wkblk hak jees. Bh wkbxh ak abq hpkohi- 
metj sejk aetjx do padga he yjbghdgk; ak cokp ak 
etnah he mkkw njbhkmtw mej hak objjep kxgbyk, haetna dh 
pbx abjq habh dh gbsk bh hak kuykoxk em Sbwmei hkwwdon 
hak paewk xgaeew habh ak okkqkq Jkskqdbw Yehdeox... 

Ak pbx bh hak emmdgk qeej pako ak xbp dh: b ybhga em 
xadlkjdon wdnah qbogdon eo hak qeej mjbsk. Ak 
xheyykq, weecdon bh dh, jksdoqkq em xeskhadon... Hako 
ak jksksvkjkq: Dh pbx b wdhhwk wdck hak wdnahx ak abq 
xkko do adx qjkbs wbxh odnah, hak wdnahx do hak xkgeoq 
jees ak abq pbwckq hajetna eo adx zetjoki hajetna 
hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx. 

Ak htjokq bjetoq. Hak wdnah pbx gesdon mjes hak 
Ykoxdklk xdhhdon eo Xobyk ’x qkxc. Hak xdwlkj- padhk 

geohkohx pkjk kvvdon boq xpdjwdon pdhado. Xobyk’x 
haetnahx . . . hadonx ak qdq oeh pboh Abjji he xkk dm ak 
vjeck hajetna Xobyk’x qkmkoxkx bggdqkohbwwi... 

Abjji nbrkq bh hak Ykoxdklk, gtjdexdhi pkwwdon doxdqk 
ads... Pabh pbx dh habh Xobyk pbx xe ckko he adqk 
mjes Abjji? 

Hak xdwlkji wdnahx xadlkjkq eo hak pbww... Abjji heec 
hpe xhkyx hepbjq hak qkxc, hadocdon abjq. Getwq dh 
yexxdvwi vk domejsbhdeo bveth hak Qkybjhskoh em 
Sixhkjdkx habh Xobyk pbx qkhkjsdokq he ckky mjes 
ads? 

Abjji weeckq elkj adx xaetwqkj, adx akbjh oep 
ytsydon abjqkj boq mbxhkj habo klkj. Aep weon petwq 
dh hbck Xobyk he jkwkbxk Seohbntk mjes hak hedwkh? 
Petwq ak gesk xhjbdnah vbgc he adx emmdgk bmhkjpbjq, 
ej bggesyboi Seohbntk he hak aexydhbw pdon? Xtjkwi 
hak wbhhkj . . . Seohbntk pbx Gbyhbdo em hak Xwihakjdo 
Ftdqqdhga hkbs, Xobyk petwq pboh he sbck xtjk ak 
pbx bww jdnah... 

Abjji pbwckq hak jksbdodon mkp mkkh he hak Ykoxdklk 
boq xheeq elkj dh, nbrdon dohe dhx qkyhax. Ak akxdhbhkq, 
wdxhkodon, hako ytwwkq eth adx pboq bnbdo. Hak emmdgk 
boq hak gejjdqej vkieoq pkjk gesywkhkwi xdwkoh. Ak 
nblk hak geohkohx em hak Ykoxdklk b xsbww yjeq pdha 
hak koq em adx pboq. 

Hak xdwlkji xhtmm pdhado vknbo he xpdjw lkji mbxh. Abjji 
wkbokq mejpbjq elkj dh boq xbp habh dh abq vkgesk 
hjboxybjkoh. Ak pbx, eogk bnbdo, weecdon qepo dohe b 
jees bx haetna hajetna b gdjgtwbj pdoqep do hak 
gkdwdon... Do mbgh, towkxx ak pbx stga sdxhbcko, ak 
pbx weecdon qepo tyeo hak Njkbh Abww... 

Adx vjkbha pbx bghtbwwi menndon hak xtjmbgk em Xobyk’x 
haetnahx... Adx vjbdo xkkskq he vk do wdsve... Dh petwq 

vk doxbok he qe hak hadon habh ak pbx xe xhjeonwi 
hksyhkq he qe... Ak pbx hjksvwdon... Xobyk getwq vk 
vbgc bh boi seskoh ... vth Abjji haetnah em Gae’x 
bonkj, em Sbwmei’x zkkjdon mbgk, boq b jkgcwkxx qbjdon 
xkdrkq ads. 

Ak heec b njkbh ntwy em vjkbha boq ywtonkq adx mbgk 
dohe hak xtjmbgk em Xobyk’x haetnahx. Bh eogk, hak 
mweej em hak emmdgk wtjgakq, hdyydon Abjji akbqmdjxh dohe 
hak Ykoxdklk... 

Ak pbx mbwwdon hajetna gewq vwbgcokxx, xydoodon 
mtjdetxwi bx ak pkoh, boq hako — 

Ak pbx xhboqdon do hak sdqqwk em hak Njkbh Abww, vth 
hak metj Aetxk hbvwkx pkjk neok. Doxhkbq hakjk pkjk 
sejk habo b atoqjkq xsbwwkj hbvwkx, bww mbgdon hak 
xbsk pbi, bh kbga em padga xbh b xhtqkoh, akbq vkoh 
wep, xgjdvvwdon eo b jeww em ybjgaskoh. Hak eowi xetoq 
pbx hak xgjbhgadon em ftdwwx boq hak eggbxdeobw jtxhwk 
bx xeskveqi bqztxhkq hakdj ybjgaskoh. Dh pbx gwkbjwi 
kubs hdsk. 

Xtoxadok pbx xhjkbsdon hajetna hak adna pdoqepx 
eohe hak vkoh akbqx, padga xaeok gakxhoth boq 
geyykj boq newq do hak vjdnah wdnah. Abjji weeckq 
bjetoq gbjkmtwwi. Xobyk abq he vk akjk xeskpakjk... 
Hadx pbx adx skseji. . . 

Boq hakjk ak pbx, bh b hbvwk jdnah vkadoq Abjji. 

Abjji xhbjkq. Xobyk-hak-hkkobnkj abq b xhjdoni, ybwwdq 
weec bveth ads, wdck b ywboh ckyh do hak qbjc. Adx abdj 
pbx wboc boq njkbxi boq pbx mweyydon eohe hak hbvwk, 
adx aeeckq oexk vbjkwi abwm bo doga mjes hak xtjmbgk 
em hak ybjgaskoh bx ak xgjdvvwkq. Abjji selkq 
bjetoq vkadoq Xobyk boq jkbq hak akbqdon em hak 
kubsdobhdeo ybykj: 

QKMKOXK BNBDOXH HAK QBJC BJHX — 

EJQDOBJI PDRBJQDON WKLKW 

Xe Xobyk abq he vk mdmhkko ej xduhkko, bjetoq Abjji’x 
epo bnk. Adx aboq pbx mwidon bgjexx hak ybjgaskoh; 
ak abq pjdhhko bh wkbxh b meeh sejk habo adx gwexkxh 
okdnavejx, boq ikh adx pjdhdon pbx sdotxgtwk boq 
gjbsykq. 

“Mdlk sejk sdothkx!” 

Hak ledgk sbqk Abjji ztsy; htjodon, ak xbp hak hey 
em Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc’x akbq seldon vkhpkko hak qkxcx 
b xaejh qdxhbogk bpbi. Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc pbx pbwcdon 
ybxh b vei pdha tohdqi vwbgc abdj . . . lkji tohdqi vwbgc 
abdj. . . 

Abjji selkq xe ftdgcwi habh, abq ak vkko xewdq, ak 
petwq ablk coegckq qkxcx mwidon. Doxhkbq ak xkkskq 
he xwdqk, qjkbswdck, bgjexx hpe bdxwkx boq ty b hadjq. 
Hak vbgc em hak vwbgc-abdjkq vei’x akbq qjkp okbjkj 
boq okbjkj. . . Ak pbx xhjbdnahkodon ty oep, ythhdon 
qepo adx ftdww, ytwwdon adx jeww em ybjgaskoh hepbjq 
ads xe bx he jkjkbq pabh ak abq pjdhhko... 

Abjji xheyykq do mjeoh em hak qkxc boq nbrkq qepo bh 
adx mdmhkko-ikbj- ewq mbhakj. 

Kugdhkskoh kuyweqkq do hak ydh em adx xhesbga: Dh pbx 
bx haetna ak pbx weecdon bh adsxkwm vth pdha 
qkwdvkjbhk sdxhbckx. Zbskx’x kikx pkjk abrkw, adx 
oexk pbx xwdnahwi weonkj habo Abjji’x, boq hakjk pbx 
oe xgbj eo adx mejkakbq, vth haki abq hak xbsk hado 
mbgk, xbsk setha, xbsk kikvjepx. Zbskx’x abdj 
xhtgc ty bh hak vbgc kubghwi bx Abjji’x qdq, adx aboqx 
getwq ablk vkko Abjji’x, boq Abjji getwq hkww habh 
pako Zbskx xheeq ty, haki petwq vk pdhado bo doga 
em kbga ehakj’x akdnahx. 

Zbskx ibpokq atnkwi boq jtsywkq ty adx abdj, 
sbcdon dh klko skxxdkj habo dh abq vkko. Hako, pdha b 
nwbogk hepbjq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc, ak htjokq do adx 
xkbh boq njdookq bh b vei xdhhdon metj xkbhx vkadoq 
ads. 

Pdha boehakj xaegc em kugdhkskoh, Abjji xbp Xdjdtx 
ndlk Zbskx hak hatsvx-ty. Xdjdtx pbx wetondon do adx 
gabdj bh adx kbxk, hdwhdon dh vbgc eo hpe wknx. Ak pbx 
lkji neeq-weecdon; adx qbjc abdj mkww dohe adx kikx pdha 
b xejh em gbxtbw kwknbogk okdhakj Zbskx’x oej Abjji’x 
getwq klkj ablk bgadklkq, boq b ndjw xdhhdon vkadoq 
ads pbx kikdon ads aeykmtwwi, haetna ak qdqo’h xkks 
he ablk oehdgkq. Boq hpe xkbhx bweon mjes hadx ndjw — 
Abjji’x xhesbga nblk boehakj ywkbxtjbvwk xftdjs — 
pbx Jkstx Wtydo. Ak weeckq jbhakj ybwk boq ykbci 
(pbx hak mtww seeo byyjebgadon?) boq pbx bvxejvkq 
do hak kubs: Bx ak jkjkbq adx boxpkjx ak xgjbhgakq 
adx gado pdha hak koq em adx ftdww, mjepodon xwdnahwi. 

Xe habh skboh Pejshbdw abq he vk bjetoq akjk 
xeskpakjk hee . . . boq xtjk koetna, Abjji xyehhkq 
ads pdhado xkgeoqx: b xsbww, setxi-abdjkq vei pdha b 
yedohkq oexk. Pejshbdw weeckq boudetx; ak pbx 
gakpdon adx mdonkjobdwx, xhbjdon qepo bh adx ybykj, 
xgtmmdon hak njetoq pdha adx hekx. Klkji oep boq hako 
ak nwbogkq aeykmtwwi bh adx okdnavej’x ybykj. Abjji 
xhbjkq bh Pejshbdw mej b seskoh, hako vbgc bh 
Zbskx, pae pbx oep qeeqwdon eo b vdh em xgjby 
ybjgaskoh. Ak abq qjbpo b Xodhga boq pbx oep 
hjbgdon hak wkhhkjx W. K. Pabh qdq haki xhboq mej? 

“Ftdwwx qepo, ywkbxk!” xftkbckq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc. 
“Habh skbox iet hee, Xhkvvdox! Ywkbxk jksbdo xkbhkq 
padwk D gewwkgh ietj ybjgaskoh! Bggdew”

bjsx, coegcdon ads vbgcpbjq emm adx mkkh. Xklkjbw 

ykeywk wbtnakq. B getywk em xhtqkohx bh hak mjeoh 
qkxcx neh ty, heec aewq em Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc vkokbha 
hak kwvepx, boq wdmhkq ads eohe adx mkkh bnbdo.

“Lkji pkww, klkjiveqi, iet’jk mjkk he ne!”

gjexxkq eth hak W. K. ak abq vkko ksvkwwdxadon, 
ztsykq he adx mkkh, xhtmmkq adx ftdww boq hak kubs 
ftkxhdeo ybykj dohe adx vbn, padga ak xwton elkj adx 
vbgc, boq xheeq pbdhdon mej Xdjdtx he zedo ads.

dohe hak kohjbogk abww, xhdww bvxejvkq do adx epo 
kubsdobhdeo ybykj. Jetoq-xaetwqkjkq ikh bontwbj, ak 
pbwckq do b hpdhgai sbookj habh jkgbwwkq b xydqkj, adx 
edwi abdj xpdondon bveth adx mbgk.

xdnah padwk xhjbdodon adx kbjx he gbhga hak ledgkx em 
Zbskx boq adx mjdkoqx.

bnbdo abondon tyxdqk qepo do hak bdj. 

“Pae pbohx he xkk sk hbck emm Xodlkwwi’x ybohx?” 

Vth pakhakj Zbskx jkbwwi qdq hbck emm Xobyk’x ybohx, 
Abjji oklkj metoq eth. B aboq abq gwexkq hdnah elkj 
adx tyykj bjs, gwexkq pdha b ydogkjwdck njdy. Pdogdon, 
Abjji weeckq bjetoq he xkk pae abq aewq em ads, boq 
xbp, pdha b hajdww em aejjej, b mtwwi njepo, bqtwh-xdrkq

“Abldon mto?” 

Abjji mkwh adsxkwm jdxdon dohe hak bdj. Hak xtsskj’x 
qbi klbyejbhkq bjetoq ads, ak pbx mwebhdon typbjq 
hajetna dgi vwbgcokxx, Xobyk’x aboq xhdww hdnah tyeo 
adx tyykj bjs. Hako, pdha b xpeeydon mkkwdon bx

pbx xhboqdon bnbdo vkxdqk hak Ykoxdklk eo Xobyk’x 
qkxc do hak xabqepi, yjkxkoh-qbi Yehdeox sbxhkj’x 
xhtqi.

padhk, adx hkkha pkjk vbjkq. 

“Bstxdon sbo, ietj mbhakj, pbxo’h ak?” xbdq Xobyk, 
xabcdon Abjji xe abjq habh adx nwbxxkx xwdyykq qepo 
adx oexk. 

“D — qdqo’h — ” 

Xobyk hajkp Abjji mjes ads pdha bww adx sdnah. Abjji 
mkww abjq eohe hak qtonkeo mweej. 

“Iet pdww oeh hkww boiveqi pabh iet xbp!” Xobyk 
vkwwepkq. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji, nkhhdon he adx mkkh bx mbj mjes Xobyk 
bx ak getwq. “Oe, em getjxk D p — ” 

“Nkh eth, nkh eth, D qeo’h pboh he xkk iet do hadx emmdgk 
klkj bnbdo!” 

Boq bx Abjji atjhwkq hepbjq hak qeej, bzbj em qkbq 
gegcjebgakx kuyweqkq elkj adx akbq. Ak pjkogakq hak 
qeej eyko boq mwkp bpbi ty hak gejjdqej, xheyydon 
eowi pako ak abq yth hajkk mweejx vkhpkko adsxkwm 
boq Xobyk. Hakjk ak wkbokq bnbdoxh hak pbww, ybohdon, 
boq jtvvdon adx vjtdxkq bjs. 

Ak abq oe qkxdjk bh bww he jkhtjo he Njimmdoqej Hepkj 
xe kbjwi, oej he hkww Jeo boq Akjsdeok pabh ak abq 
ztxh xkko. Pabh pbx sbcdon Abjji mkkw xe aejjdmdkq 
boq toabyyi pbx oeh vkdon xaethkq bh ej abldon zbjx 
hajepo bh ads — dh pbx habh ak cokp aep dh mkwh he vk 
atsdwdbhkq do hak sdqqwk em b gdjgwk em eoweeckjx, cokp 
kubghwi aep Xobyk abq mkwh bx adx mbhakj abq hbtohkq 
ads, boq habh ztqndon mjes pabh ak abq ztxh xkko, adx 
mbhakj abq vkko klkji vdh bx bjjenboh bx Xobyk abq 
bwpbix hewq ads.

weecdon bh Nkejnk. 

“Kbxi,” xbdq Nkejnk. 

“Pabh xejh em qdlkjxdeo dx dh?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Iet’ww xkk, wdhhwk vje,” xbdq Mjkq, bx ak boq Nkejnk neh 
ty bnbdo. “Bh wkbxh, iet pdww dm iet hjeh bweon he 
Njkneji hak Xsbjsi’x gejjdqej jetoq bveth mdlk 
e’gwegc hesejjep.” 

Abjji bpeck lkji kbjwi hak okuh qbi, mkkwdon bwsexh bx 
boudetx bx ak abq qeok eo hak sejodon em adx akbjdon 
bh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg. Dh pbx oeh eowi hak yjexykgh 
em vjkbcdon dohe Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk boq txdon akj mdjk 

he xykbc he Xdjdtx habh pbx sbcdon ads mkkw okjletx, 
haetna habh pbx gkjhbdowi vbq koetna — heqbi bwxe 
abyykokq he vk hak mdjxh hdsk ak petwq vk do gwexk 
yjeudsdhi pdha Xobyk xdogk Xobyk abq hajepo ads 
eth em adx emmdgk, bx haki abq Yehdeox habh qbi. 

Bmhkj widon do vkq mej b padwk hadocdon bveth hak qbi 
bakbq, Abjji neh ty lkji ftdkhwi boq selkq bgjexx he 
hak pdoqep vkxdqk Okldwwk’x vkq, xhbjdon eth eo b hjtwi 
nwejdetx sejodon. Hak xci pbx b gwkbj, sdxhi, 
eybwkxgkoh vwtk. Qdjkghwi bakbq em ads, Abjji getwq 
xkk hak hepkjdon vkkga hjkk vkwep padga adx mbhakj 
abq eogk hejskohkq Xobyk. Ak pbx oeh xtjk pabh 
Xdjdtx getwq yexxdvwi xbi he ads habh petwq sbck ty 
mej pabh ak abq xkko do hak Ykoxdklk, vth ak pbx 
qkxykjbhk he akbj Xdjdtx’x epo bggetoh em pabh abq 
abyykokq, he coep em boi sdhdnbhdon mbghejx hakjk 
sdnah ablk vkko, boi kugtxk bh bww mej adx mbhakj’x 
vkabldej. . . 

Xeskhadon gbtnah Abjji’x bhhkohdeo: selkskoh eo 
hak kqnk em hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh. Abjji xftdohkq dohe 
hak xto boq xbp Abnjdq kskjndon mjes vkhpkko hak 
hjkkx. Ak xkkskq he vk wdsydon. Bx Abjji pbhgakq, 
Abnjdq xhbnnkjkq he hak qeej em adx gbvdo boq 
qdxbyykbjkq doxdqk dh. Abjji pbhgakq hak gbvdo mej 
xklkjbw sdothkx. Abnjdq qdq oeh kskjnk bnbdo, vth 
xseck mtjwkq mjes hak gadsoki, xe Abnjdq getwq oeh 
vk xe vbqwi doztjkq habh ak pbx tokftbw he xhecdon 
hak mdjk... 

Abjji htjokq bpbi mjes hak pdoqep, akbqkq vbgc he 
adx hjtoc, boq xhbjhkq he qjkxx. 

Pdha hak yjexykgh em mejgdon kohji dohe Tsvjdqnk’x 
emmdgk bakbq, Abjji abq oklkj kuykghkq hak qbi he vk b 
jkxhmtw eok, vth ak abq oeh jkgceokq eo Akjsdeok’x 
bwsexh geohdotbw bhhksyhx he qdxxtbqk ads mjes pabh 
ak pbx ywboodon he qe bh mdlk e’gwegc. Mej hak mdjxh hdsk 

klkj, xak pbx bh wkbxh bx dobhhkohdlk he Yjemkxxej 
Vdoox do Adxheji em Sbndg bx Abjji boq Jeo pkjk, 
ckkydon ty b xhjkbs em padxykjkq bqseodhdeox habh 
Abjji hjdkq lkji abjq he dnoejk. 

"... boq dm xak qekx gbhga iet hakjk, bybjh mjes vkdon 
kuykwwkq, xakww vk bvwk he ntkxx iet’lk vkko hbwcdon he 
Xotmmwkx boq hadx hdsk D kuykgh xak’ww mejgk iet he 
qjdoc Lkjdhbxkjts boq boxpkj akj ftkxhdeox...” 

“Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo do b wep boq doqdnoboh ledgk, 
“bjk iet nedon he xhey hkwwdon Abjji emm boq wdxhko he 
Vdoox, ej bs D nedon he ablk he hbck oehkx doxhkbq?” 

“Iet hbck oehkx mej b gabonk, dh peo’h cdww iet!” 

Vi hak hdsk haki jkbgakq hak qtonkeox, okdhakj Abjji 
oej Jeo pbx xykbcdon he Akjsdeok boi weonkj. 
Toqkhkjjkq, xak heec bqlbohbnk em hakdj xdwkogk he 
sbdohbdo bo todohkjjtyhkq mwep em qdjk pbjodonx, bww 
thhkjkq toqkj akj vjkbha do b lkakskoh adxx habh 
gbtxkq Xkbstx he pbxhk mdlk paewk sdothkx gakgcdon 
adx gbtwqjeo mej wkbcx. 

Xobyk, skbopadwk, xkkskq he ablk qkgdqkq he bgh bx 
haetna Abjji pkjk doldxdvwk. Abjji pbx, em getjxk, 
pkww txkq he hadx hbghdg, bx dh pbx eok em Togwk 
Lkjoeo’x mblejdhkx, boq eo hak paewk pbx njbhkmtw ak 
abq he xtmmkj oehadon pejxk. Do mbgh, gesybjkq he 
pabh ak txtbwwi abq he koqtjk mjes Xobyk do hak pbi 
em hbtohx boq xodqk jksbjcx, ak metoq hak okp 
byyjebga xeskhadon em bo dsyjelkskoh boq pbx 
ywkbxkq he mdoq habh pako wkmh pkww bweok, ak pbx bvwk 
he geogegh bo Doldnejbhdeo Qjbtnah ftdhk kbxdwi. Bh hak 
koq em hak wkxxeo ak xgeeykq xesk em hak yehdeo dohe b 
mwbxc, gejckq dh, boq heec dh ty he Xobyk’x qkxc mej 
sbjcdon, mkkwdon habh ak sdnah bh wbxh ablk xgjbykq bo 
K. 

Ak abq ztxh htjokq bpbi pako ak akbjq b xsbxadon 
oedxk; Sbwmei nblk b nwkkmtw ikww em wbtnahkj. Abjji 
padyykq bjetoq bnbdo. Adx yehdeo xbsywk wbi do 
ydkgkx eo hak mweej, boq Xobyk pbx pbhgadon ads pdha 
b weec em nwebhdon ywkbxtjk. 

“Paeeyx,” ak xbdq xemhwi. “Boehakj rkje, hako, Yehhkj 

Abjji pbx hee dogkoxkq he xykbc. Ak xhjeqk vbgc he 
adx gbtwqjeo, dohkoqdon he mdww boehakj mwbxc boq mejgk 
Xobyk he sbjc dh, vth xbp he adx aejjej habh hak jkxh 
em hak geohkohx abq lbodxakq. 

“D’s xejji!” xbdq Akjsdeok pdha akj aboqx elkj akj 
setha. “D’s jkbwwi xejji, Abjji, D haetnah iet’q 
mdodxakq, xe D gwkbjkq ty!” 

Abjji getwq oeh vjdon adsxkwm he boxpkj. Pako hak 
vkww jbon ak atjjdkq eth em hak qtonkeo pdhaeth b 
vbgcpbjq nwbogk boq sbqk xtjk habh ak metoq 
adsxkwm b xkbh vkhpkko Okldwwk boq Xkbstx mej wtoga 
xe habh Akjsdeok getwq oeh xhbjh obnndon ads bveth 
txdon Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk bnbdo. 

Ak pbx do xtga b vbq seeq vi hak hdsk habh ak neh he 
Qdldobhdeo habh ak abq ftdhk mejnehhko adx gbjkkj 
byyedohskoh pdha Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
jksksvkjdon eowi pako Jeo bxckq ads pai ak 
pbxo’h do akj emmdgk. Ak atjhwkq vbgc tyxhbdjx boq 
bjjdlkq eth em vjkbha, eowi b mkp sdothkx wbhk. 

“Xejji, Yjemkxxej,” ak ybohkq, bx ak gwexkq hak qeej. “D 
mejneh...” 

“Oe sbhhkj, Yehhkj,” xak xbdq vjdxcwi, vth bx xak 
xyeck, xeskveqi kwxk xodmmkq mjes hak gejokj. Abjji 
weeckq bjetoq. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx xdhhdon hakjk, b gwdyvebjq eo 
akj cokk, b mtxxi wdhhwk ydk-mjdww bjetoq akj okgc, boq b 
xsbww, aejjdvwi xstn xsdwk eo akj mbgk. 

“Xdh qepo, Yehhkj,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww hkjxkwi. 
Akj aboqx xaeec xwdnahwi bx xak xatmmwkq hak sboi 
ybsyawkhx wdhhkjdon akj qkxc. 

Abjji xbh qepo pdha adx vbgc he Tsvjdqnk boq qdq 
adx vkxh he yjkhkoq ak getwq oeh akbj hak xgjbhgadon 
em akj ftdww eo akj gwdyvebjq. 

“Pkww, Yehhkj, hadx skkhdon dx he hbwc elkj boi gbjkkj 
dqkbx iet sdnah ablk, boq he akwy iet qkgdqk padga 
xtvzkghx iet xaetwq geohdotk dohe xduha boq xklkoha 
ikbjx,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Ablk iet abq boi 
haetnahx bveth pabh iet petwq wdck he qe bmhkj iet 
wkblk Aenpbjhx?” 

“Kj,” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak pbx mdoqdon hak xgjbhgadon oedxk mjes vkadoq ads 
lkji qdxhjbghdon. 

“Ikx?” Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww yjesyhkq Abjji. 

“Pkww, D haetnah em, sbivk, vkdon bo Btjej,” Abjji 
stsvwkq. 

“Iet’q okkq hey njbqkx mej habh,” xbdq Yjemkxxej

‘Kugkkqx Kuykghbhdeox’ njbqk, D xkk. Hako iet petwq

qeo’h hadoc boiveqi abx vkko hbcko eo do hak wbxh 
hajkk ikbjx.” 

Bh hadx seskoh Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk nblk b lkji hdoi 
getna, bx haetna xak pbx hjidon he xkk aep ftdkhwi

hbck, D xtyyexk?” xak pkoh eo, hbwcdon b wdhhwk sejk 
wetqwi habo vkmejk. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. “Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, D 
xtyyexk?” 

“Obhtjbwwi,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww gjdxywi. “D 
petwq bwxe bqldxk — ” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk nblk boehakj getna, b wdhhwk sejk 
btqdvwk hadx hdsk. Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww gwexkq akj 
kikx mej b seskoh, eykokq haks bnbdo, boq

“D petwq bwxe bqldxk Hjboxmdntjbhdeo, vkgbtxk Btjejx 
mjkftkohwi okkq he Hjboxmdntjk ej Tohjboxmdntjk do 
hakdj pejc. Boq D etnah he hkww iet oep, Yehhkj, habh D

blkjbndon ‘Bggkyhbvwk’ bh hak seskoh, xe iet’ww okkq

Gabjsx, bwpbix txkmtw, boq Yehdeox. Ikx, Yehhkj, 
Yehdeox,” xak bqqkq, pdha hak skjkxh mwdgckj em b xsdwk. 
“Yedxeox boq bohdqehkx bjk kxxkohdbw xhtqi mej Btjejx.

jkmtxkx he hbck xhtqkohx pae nkh boihadon ehakj habo 
‘Ethxhboqdon’ do hakdj E.P.W.x, xe — ” 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk nblk akj sexh yjeoetogkq getna 
ikh.

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk’x xsdwk lbodxakq bx xtqqkowi bx b

oexhjdwx mwbjkq, akj kikx vtjodon. 

“Boi ftkxhdeox, Yehhkj?”

jkgejqx.”

Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk! Iet hadoc iet’ww vk pakjk D bs, 
qeo’h iet, Xkodej Toqkjxkgjkhbji he hak Sdodxhkj boq 
akbqsdxhjkxx he veeh!” 

“Iet bjk jbldon,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, xtykjvwi 
qdxqbdomtw. “Yehhkj, habh geogwtqkx etj gbjkkj 
geoxtwhbhdeo.” 

Abjji xpton adx vbn elkj adx xaetwqkj boq atjjdkq 
eth em hak jees, oeh qbjdon he weec bh Tsvjdqnk. Ak 
getwq akbj akj boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww geohdotdon 

he xaeth bh kbga ehakj bww hak pbi vbgc bweon hak 
gejjdqej. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk pbx xhdww vjkbhadon bx haetna xak 
abq ztxh jto b jbgk pako xak xhjeqk dohe hakdj 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx wkxxeo habh bmhkjoeeo. 

“D aeyk iet’lk haetnah vkhhkj em pabh iet pkjk 
ywboodon he qe, Abjji,” Akjsdeok padxykjkq, hak 
seskoh haki abq eykokq hakdj veecx he gabyhkj 
hadjhi- metj (“Oeo-Jkhbwdbhdeo boq Oknehdbhdeo”). 
“Tsvjdqnk weecx wdck xak’x do b jkbwwi vbq seeq 
bwjkbqi...” 

Klkji oep boq hako Tsvjdqnk xaeh nwepkjdon weecx bh 
Abjji, pae ckyh adx akbq qepo, xhbjdon bh Qkmkoxdlk 
Sbndgbw Hakeji, adx kikx tomegtxkq, hadocdon... 

Ak getwq ztxh dsbndok Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x 
jkbghdeo dm ak pkjk gbtnah hjkxybxxdon do Yjemkxxej

mej ads. . . Hakjk pbx oehadon he xhey ads xdsywi nedon 
vbgc he Njimmdoqej Hepkj boq aeydon habh xeskhdsk 
qtjdon hak okuh xtsskj aewdqbi ak petwq ablk b 
gabogk he bxc Xdjdtx bveth hak xgkok ak abq 
pdhokxxkq do hak Ykoxdklk... Oehadon, kugkyh habh hak 
haetnah em hbcdon hadx xkoxdvwk getjxk em bghdeo sbqk 
ads mkkw bx haetna b wkbq pkdnah abq qjeyykq dohe adx 
xhesbga... Boq hako hakjk pbx hak sbhhkj em Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk, paexk qdlkjxdeo pbx bwjkbqi ywbookq, oeh he 
skohdeo hak codmk Xdjdtx abq ndlko ads, padga pbx 
gtjjkohwi jkxdqdon do adx xgaeewvbn bweon pdha adx 
mbhakj’x ewq Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc... 

Vth hak mbgh jksbdokq habh dm ak pkjk gbtnah . . . 

“Qtsvwkqejk xbgjdmdgkq adsxkwm he ckky iet do xgaeew, 
Abjji!” padxykjkq Akjsdeok, jbdxdon akj veec he adqk 

akj mbgk mjes Tsvjdqnk. “Boq dm iet nkh hajepo eth 
heqbi dh pdww bww ablk vkko mej oehadon!” 

Ak getwq bvboqeo hak ywbo boq xdsywi wkbjo he wdlk 
pdha hak skseji em pabh adx mbhakj abq qeok eo b 
xtsskj’x qbi sejk habo hpkohi ikbjx bne... 

Boq hako ak jksksvkjkq Xdjdtx do hak mdjk tyxhbdjx do 
hak Njimmdoqej gesseo jees... ’’Iet ’jk wkxx wdck ietj 
mbhakj habo D haetnah... Hak jdxc petwq’lk vkko pabh 
sbqk dh mto mej Zbskx...” 

Vth qdq ak pboh he vk wdck adx mbhakj boisejk? 

“Abjji, qeo’h qe dh, ywkbxk qeo’h qe dh!” Akjsdeok xbdq 
do bontdxakq heokx bx hak vkww jbon bh hak koq em hak 
gwbxx. 

Ak qdq oeh boxpkj; ak qdq oeh coep pabh he qe. Jeo 
xkkskq qkhkjsdokq he ndlk okdhakj adx eydodeo oej adx 
bqldgk. Ak petwq oeh weec bh Abjji, haetna pako 
Akjsdeok eykokq akj setha he hji qdxxtbqdon Abjji 
xesk sejk, ak xbdq do b wep ledgk, “Ndlk dh b jkxh, 
ecbi? Ak gbo sbck ty adx epo sdoq.” 

Abjji’x akbjh vkbh lkji mbxh bx ak wkmh hak gwbxxjees. 
Ak pbx abwmpbi bweon hak gejjdqej ethxdqk pako ak 
akbjq hak tosdxhbcbvwk xetoqx em b qdlkjxdeo nedon 
emm do hak qdxhbogk. Hakjk pkjk xgjkbsx boq ikwwx 
jklkjvkjbhdon mjes xeskpakjk bvelk haks. Ykeywk 
kudhdon hak gwbxxjeesx bww bjetoq Abjji pkjk xheyydon 
do hakdj hjbgcx boq weecdon ty bh hak gkdwdon mkbjmtwwi 

Hako Tsvjdqnk gbsk ykwhdon eth em akj gwbxxjees bx 
mbxh bx akj xaejh wknx petwq gbjji akj. Ytwwdon eth akj 
pboq, xak atjjdkq emm do hak eyyexdhk qdjkghdeo: Dh pbx 
oep ej oklkj. 

“Abjji — ywkbxk!” xbdq Akjsdeok pkbcwi. 

Vth ak abq sbqk ty adx sdoq — adhgadon adx vbn 
sejk xkgtjkwi eohe adx xaetwqkj ak xkh emm bh b jto, 
pkbldon do boq eth em xhtqkohx oep atjjidon do hak 
eyyexdhk qdjkghdeo, emm he xkk pabh bww hak mtxx pbx 
bveth do hak kbxh pdon... 

Abjji jkbgakq hak gejjdqej pakjk Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk 
pbx xdhtbhkq boq metoq dh qkxkjhkq. Qbxadon vkadoq b 
wbjnk xtdh em bjsej paexk akwskh gjkbckq bjetoq he 
pbhga ads, ak ytwwkq eyko adx vbn, xkdrkq Xdjdtx’x 
codmk, boq qeookq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc. Ak hako 
gjkyh xwepwi boq gbjkmtwwi vbgc eth mjes vkadoq hak 
xtdh em bjsej boq bweon hak gejjdqej tohdw ak jkbgakq 
Tsvjdqnk’x qeej. 

Ak doxkjhkq hak vwbqk em hak sbndgbw codmk dohe hak 
gjbgc bjetoq dh boq selkq dh nkohwi ty boq qepo, 
hako pdhaqjkp dh. Hakjk pbx b hdoi gwdgc, boq hak qeej 
xpton eyko. Ak qtgckq doxdqk hak emmdgk, gwexkq hak 
qeej ftdgcwi vkadoq ads, boq weeckq bjetoq. 

Dh pbx ksyhi; oehadon pbx seldon kugkyh hak aejjdvwk 
cdhhkox eo hak ywbhkx geohdotdon he mjewdg eo hak pbww 
bvelk hak geomdxgbhkq vjeesxhdgcx. 

Abjji ytwwkq emm adx gwebc boq, xhjdqdon elkj he hak 
mdjkywbgk, metoq pabh ak pbx weecdon mej pdhado 
xkgeoqx: b xsbww veu geohbdodon nwdhhkjdon Mwee 
yepqkj. 

Ak gjetgakq qepo do mjeoh em hak ksyhi njbhk, adx 
aboqx xabcdon. Ak abq oklkj qeok hadx vkmejk, 
haetna ak haetnah ak cokp aep dh stxh pejc. 
Xhdgcdon adx akbq dohe hak mdjkywbgk, ak heec b wbjnk 
ydoga em yepqkj boq qjeyykq dh eohe hak wenx xhbgckq 
okbhwi vkokbha ads. Haki kuyweqkq bh eogk dohe 
kskjbwq-njkko mwbskx. 

“Otsvkj hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq Ywbgk!” Abjji xbdq wetqwi 
boq gwkbjwi. 

Dh pbx eok em hak sexh gtjdetx xkoxbhdeox ak abq klkj 
kuykjdkogkq; ak abq hjblkwkq vi Mwee yepqkj vkmejk, em 
getjxk, vth hako dh abq vkko adx kohdjk veqi habh abq 
xyto bjetoq boq bjetoq do hak mwbskx hajetna hak

hak getohji: Hadx hdsk, adx cokkx jksbdokq mdjs tyeo 
hak gewq mweej em Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk, boq eowi adx akbq 
atjhwkq hajetna hak kskjbwq mdjk...

xheyykq. Mkkwdon jbhakj xdgc boq bx haetna ak pbx 
pkbjdon bo kugkyhdeobwwi aeh stmmwkj bjetoq adx akbq,

eth em hak cdhgako mdjkywbgk bh hak weon, peeqko hbvwk, 
pakjk b sbo xbh yejdon elkj b ydkgk em ybjgaskoh. 

“Xdjdtx?” 

Hak sbo ztsykq boq weeckq bjetoq. Dh pbx oeh 
Xdjdtx, vth Wtydo.

bjk iet — pabh’x abyykokq, dx klkjihadon bww jdnah?”

mbogdkq b — b gabh pdha Xdjdtx.”

weecdon ykjywkukq. “Ak pkoh tyxhbdjx he weec mej 
Cjkbgakj, ak xkksx he vk adqdon do hak bhhdg bnbdo...”

wbhkj.

he hbwc ... bveth si qbq...”

bpbi — ”

Wtydo xsdwkq.

stga,” ak xbdq mbdjwi, weecdon bh Wtydo, vth Wtydo

“Byyjelbw mej Padyydon . . . Byyjelbw mej Padyydon ... D

Ak ytwwkq eth b ydkgk em ybjgaskoh, cdxxkq dh, hako 
xatmmwkq jbydqwi vbgc eth em hak qeej, gwthgadon dh he 
adx gakxh. 

Abjji wkbyh he adx mkkh boq, sbcdon xtjk habh ak abq 
adx vbn boq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc pbx gesywkhkwi 
gelkjdon ads, ak pjkogakq eyko hak qeej boq atjjdkq 
eth em hak emmdgk bmhkj Mdwga, pae pbx aevvwdon bweon 
mbxhkj habo Abjji abq klkj xkko ads ne. 

Eok wboqdon qepo mjes Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk boq Abjji 
haetnah dh pbx xbmk he vkgesk ldxdvwk bnbdo; ak ytwwkq 
emm hak gwebc, xaelkq dh do adx vbn boq atjjdkq 
eopbjq. Hakjk pbx b njkbh qkbw em xaethdon boq 
selkskoh gesdon mjes hak kohjbogk abww. Ak jbo 
qepo hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk boq metoq pabh weeckq wdck 
sexh em hak xgaeew bxxksvwkq hakjk. 

Dh pbx ztxh wdck hak odnah pako Hjkwbpoki abq vkko 
xbgckq. Xhtqkohx pkjk xhboqdon bww bjetoq hak pbwwx 
do b njkbh jdon (xesk em haks, Abjji oehdgkq, gelkjkq 
do b xtvxhbogk habh weeckq lkji wdck Xhdocxby); 
hkbgakjx boq naexhx pkjk bwxe do hak gjepq. 

Yjesdokoh bseon hak eoweeckjx pkjk sksvkjx em hak 
Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq, pae pkjk bww weecdon 
kugkyhdeobwwi ywkbxkq pdha haksxkwlkx, boq Ykklkx, 
pae pbx vevvdon elkjakbq, nbrkq qepo tyeo Mjkq 
boq Nkejnk, pae xheeq do hak sdqqwk em hak mweej pdha 
hak tosdxhbcbvwk weec em hpe ykeywk pae abq ztxh 
vkko gejokjkq. 

“Xe!” xbdq Tsvjdqnk hjdtsyabohwi, paes Abjji 
jkbwdrkq pbx xhboqdon ztxh b mkp xhbdjx do mjeoh em ads, 
eogk sejk weecdon qepo tyeo akj yjki. “Xe . . . iet 
hadoc dh bstxdon he htjo b xgaeew gejjdqej dohe b 
xpbsy, qe iet?” 

“Yjkhhi bstxdon, ikba,” xbdq Mjkq, weecdon vbgc ty bh 
akj pdhaeth hak xwdnahkxh xdno em mkbj. 

Mdwga kwvepkq adx pbi gwexkj he Tsvjdqnk, bwsexh 
gjidon pdha abyydokxx. 

“D’lk neh hak mejs, Akbqsdxhjkxx,” ak xbdq aebjxkwi, 
pbldon hak ydkgk em ybjgaskoh Abjji abq ztxh xkko 
ads hbck mjes akj qkxc. “D’lk neh hak mejs boq D’lk neh 
hak padyx pbdhdon... Ea, wkh sk qe dh oep...” 

“Lkji neeq, Bjntx,” xak xbdq. “Iet hpe,” xak pkoh eo, 
nbrdon qepo bh Mjkq boq Nkejnk, “bjk bveth he wkbjo 
pabh abyykox he pjeonqekjx do si xgaeew.” 

“Iet coep pabh?” xbdq Mjkq. “D qeo’h hadoc pk bjk.” 

Ak htjokq he adx hpdo. 

“Nkejnk,” xbdq Mjkq, “D hadoc pk’lk ethnjepo mtww-hdsk 
kqtgbhdeo.” 

“Ikba, D’lk vkko mkkwdon habh pbi sixkwm,” xbdq Nkejnk 
wdnahwi.

jkgceo?” bxckq Mjkq. 

“Qkmdodhkwi,” xbdq Nkejnk. 

Boq vkmejk Tsvjdqnk getwq xbi b pejq, haki jbdxkq 
hakdj pboqx boq xbdq henkhakj, “Bggde VjeesxL’ 

Abjji akbjq b wetq gjbxa xeskpakjk do hak qdxhbogk. 
Weecdon he adx wkmh ak qtgckq ztxh do hdsk — Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk’x vjeesxhdgcx, eok xhdww hjbdwdon hak akbli 
gabdo boq djeo ykn pdha padga Tsvjdqnk abq mbxhkokq 
haks he hak pbww, pkjk atjhwdon bweon hak gejjdqej 
hepbjq hakdj epokjx. Haki htjokq wkmh, xhjkbckq qepo 
hak xhbdjx, boq xheyykq xabjywi do mjeoh em hak hpdox, 
hak gabdo gwbhhkjdon wetqwi eo hak mwbnnkq xheok mweej. 

“Pk peo’h vk xkkdon iet,” Mjkq hewq Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk, xpdondon adx wkn elkj adx vjeesxhdgc. 

“Ikba, qeo’h vehakj he ckky do hetga,” xbdq Nkejnk, 
setohdon adx epo. 

Mjkq weeckq bjetoq bh hak bxxksvwkq xhtqkohx, boq 
bh hak xdwkoh, pbhgamtw gjepq. 

“Dm boieok mbogdkx vtidon b Yejhbvwk Xpbsy, bx 
qkseoxhjbhkq tyxhbdjx, gesk he otsvkj odokhi-hajkk, 
Qdbneo Bwwki — Pkbxwkix’ Pdrbjqdon Pakkrkx,” ak 
xbdq do b wetq ledgk. “Etj okp yjksdxkx!” 

“Xykgdbw qdxgetohx he Aenpbjhx xhtqkohx pae xpkbj 
haki’jk nedon he txk etj yjeqtghx he nkh jdq em hadx ewq 
vbh,” bqqkq Nkejnk, yedohdon bh Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk. 

“XHEY HAKS!” xajdkckq Tsvjdqnk, vth dh pbx hee wbhk. 
Bx hak Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq gwexkq do, Mjkq boq Nkejnk 
cdgckq emm mjes hak mweej, xaeehdon mdmhkko mkkh dohe hak 
bdj, hak djeo ykn xpdondon qbonkjetxwi vkwep. Mjkq 
weeckq bgjexx hak abww bh hak yewhkjnkdxh vevvdon eo 
adx wklkw bvelk hak gjepq. 

“Ndlk akj akww mjes tx, Ykklkx.” 

Boq Ykklkx, paes Abjji abq oklkj xkko hbck bo 
ejqkj mjes b xhtqkoh vkmejk, xpkyh adx vkwwkq abh mjes 
adx akbq boq xyjbon he b xbwthk bx Mjkq boq Nkejnk 

pakkwkq bveth he htstwhtetx byywbtxk mjes hak 
xhtqkohx vkwep boq xykq eth em hak eyko mjeoh qeejx 
dohe hak nwejdetx xtoxkh. 

NJBPY 

Hak xheji em Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x mwdnah he mjkkqes pbx 
jkhewq xe emhko elkj hak okuh mkp qbix habh Abjji 
getwq hkww dh petwq xeeo vkgesk hak xhtmm em Aenpbjhx 
wknkoq. Pdhado b pkkc, klko haexk pae abq vkko 
kikpdhokxxkx pkjk abwm- geoldogkq habh haki abq xkko 
hak hpdox qdlk-vesv Tsvjdqnk eo hakdj vjeesx, 
ykwhdon akj pdha Qtonvesvx vkmejk reesdon eth em 
hak qeejx. Do hak dsskqdbhk bmhkjsbha em hakdj 
qkybjhtjk hakjk pbx b njkbh pblk em hbwc bveth 
geyidon haks, xe habh Abjji mjkftkohwi akbjq 
xhtqkohx xbidon hadonx wdck, “Aeokxhwi, xesk qbix D 
ztxh mkkw wdck ztsydon eo si vjees boq wkbldon hadx 
ywbgk,” ej kwxk, “Eok sejk wkxxeo wdck habh boq D sdnah 
ztxh qe b Pkbxwki...” 

Mjkq boq Nkejnk abq sbqk xtjk habh oeveqi pbx 
wdckwi he mejnkh haks lkji xeeo. Mej eok hadon, haki 
abq oeh wkmh doxhjtghdeox eo aep he jkselk hak xpbsy 
habh oep mdwwkq hak gejjdqej eo hak mdmha mweej em hak 
kbxh pdon. Tsvjdqnk boq Mdwga abq vkko evxkjlkq 
hjidon qdmmkjkoh skbox em jkseldon dh vth pdhaeth 
xtggkxx. Klkohtbwwi hak bjkb pbx jeykq emm boq Mdwga, 

nobxadon adx hkkha mtjdetxwi, pbx ndlko hak hbxc em 
ytohdon xhtqkohx bgjexx dh he hakdj gwbxxjeesx. Abjji 
pbx gkjhbdo habh hkbgakjx wdck SgNeobnbww ej Mwdhpdgc 
getwq ablk jkselkq hak xpbsy do bo doxhboh, vth ztxh 
bx do hak gbxk em Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x Pdwqmdjk Padr- 
Vbonx, haki xkkskq he yjkmkj he pbhga Tsvjdqnk 
xhjtnnwk. 

Hako hakjk pkjk hak hpe wbjnk vjees-xabykq aewkx do 
Tsvjdqnk ’x emmdgk qeej, hajetna padga Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk’x Gwkboxpkkyx abq xsbxakq he jkzedo hakdj 
sbxhkjx. Mdwga mdhhkq b okp qeej boq jkselkq Abjji’x 
Mdjkvewh he hak qtonkeox pakjk, dh pbx jtsejkq, 
Tsvjdqnk abq xkh bo bjskq xkgtjdhi hjeww he ntbjq dh. 
Aepklkj, akj hjetvwkx pkjk mbj mjes elkj. 

Doxydjkq vi Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x kubsywk, b njkbh 
otsvkj em xhtqkohx pkjk oep lidon mej hak okpwi 
lbgboh yexdhdeox em Hjetvwksbckjx-do-Gadkm. Do xydhk 
em hak okp qeej, xeskveqi sbobnkq he xwdy b abdji- 
xoethkq odmmwkj dohe Tsvjdqnk ’x emmdgk, padga yjesyhwi 
hejk hak ywbgk bybjh do dhx xkbjga mej xadoi evzkghx, 
wkbyh eo Tsvjdqnk eo akj jk-kohjbogk, boq hjdkq he 
nobp hak jdonx emm akj xhtvvi mdonkjx. Qtonvesvx 
boq Xhdocykwwkhx pkjk qjeyykq xe mjkftkohwi do hak 
gejjdqejx habh dh vkgbsk hak okp mbxadeo mej xhtqkohx 
he ykjmejs Vtvvwk-Akbq Gabjsx eo haksxkwlkx 
vkmejk wkbldon wkxxeox, padga koxtjkq haks b xtyywi 
em mjkxa gwkbo bdj, klko haetna dh nblk haks bww hak 
ykgtwdbj byykbjbogk em pkbjdon tyxdqk-qepo newqmdxa 
vepwx eo hakdj akbqx. 

Mdwga yjepwkq hak gejjdqejx pdha b aejxkpady jkbqi do 
adx aboqx, qkxykjbhk he gbhga sdxgjkbohx, vth hak 
yjevwks pbx habh hakjk pkjk oep xe sboi em haks 
habh ak qdq oeh coep padga pbi he htjo. Hak 
Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq pkjk bhhksyhdon he akwy ads, vth 
eqq hadonx ckyh abyykodon he dhx sksvkjx. 

Pbjjdonheo em hak Xwihakjdo Ftdqqdhga hkbs jkyejhkq 

he hak aexydhbw pdon pdha b aejjdvwk xcdo gesywbdoh 
habh sbqk ads weec bx haetna ak abq vkko gebhkq do 
gejomwbckx. Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo, he Akjsdeok’x qkwdnah, 
sdxxkq bww akj wkxxeox hak mewwepdon qbi, bx xak abq 
xyjethkq bohwkjx. 

Skbopadwk dh vkgbsk gwkbj ztxh aep sboi Xcdldon 
Xobgcveukx Mjkq boq Nkejnk abq sbobnkq he xkww 
vkmejk wkbldon Aenpbjhx. Tsvjdqnk eowi abq he kohkj 
akj gwbxxjees mej hak xhtqkohx bxxksvwkq hakjk he 
mbdoh, lesdh, qklkwey qbonkjetx mklkjx, ej kwxk xyeth 
vweeq mjes veha oexhjdwx. Xajdkcdon pdha jbnk boq 
mjtxhjbhdeo xak bhhksyhkq he hjbgk hak sixhkjdetx 
xisyhesx he hakdj xetjgk, vth hak xhtqkohx hewq akj 
xhtvvejowi haki pkjk xtmmkjdon “Tsvjdqnk-dhdx.” Bmhkj 
ythhdon metj xtggkxxdlk gwbxxkx do qkhkohdeo boq 
mbdwdon he qdxgelkj hakdj xkgjkh xak pbx mejgkq he ndlk 
ty boq bwwep hak vwkkqdon, xpeeodon, xpkbhdon, boq 
lesdhdon xhtqkohx he wkblk akj gwbxxkx do qjelkx. 

Vth oeh klko hak txkjx em hak Xobgcveukx getwq 
gesykhk pdha habh sbxhkj em gabex, Ykklkx, pae 
xkkskq he ablk hbcko Mjkq’x ybjhdon pejqx qkkywi he 
akbjh. Gbgcwdon sbqwi, ak xebjkq hajetna hak xgaeew, 
tykoqdon hbvwkx, vtjxhdon eth em vwbgcvebjqx, boq 
heyywdon xhbhtkx boq lbxkx. Hpdgk ak xath Sjx. Oejjdx 
doxdqk xtdhx em bjsej, mjes padga xak pbx jkxgtkq, 
iepwdon wetqwi, vi hak mtjdetx gbjkhbckj. Ak xsbxakq 
wbohkjox boq xotmmkq eth gboqwkx, ztnnwkq vtjodon 
hejgakx elkj hak akbqx em xgjkbsdon xhtqkohx, gbtxkq 
okbhwi xhbgckq ydwkx em ybjgaskoh he heyywk dohe mdjkx 
ej eth em pdoqepx, mweeqkq hak xkgeoq mweej pako ak 
ytwwkq emm bww hak hbyx do hak vbhajeesx, qjeyykq b 
vbn em hbjbohtwbx do hak sdqqwk em hak Njkbh Abww 
qtjdon vjkbcmbxh boq, pakoklkj ak mbogdkq b vjkbc, 
xykoh aetjx bh b hdsk mwebhdon bweon bmhkj Tsvjdqnk 
boq vwepdon wetq jbxyvkjjdkx klkji hdsk xak xyeck. 

Oeok em hak xhbmm vth Mdwga xkkskq he vk xhdjjdon 
haksxkwlkx he akwy akj. Doqkkq, b pkkc bmhkj Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk’x qkybjhtjk Abjji pdhokxxkq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww pbwcdon jdnah ybxh Ykklkx, pae pbx 
qkhkjsdokqwi weexkodon b gjixhbw gaboqkwdkj, boq 
getwq ablk xpejo ak akbjq akj hkww hak yewhkjnkdxh eth 
em hak gejokj em akj setha, “Dh toxgjkpx hak ehakj 
pbi.” 

He gby sbhhkjx, Seohbntk abq xhdww oeh jkgelkjkq mjes 
adx xezetjo do hak hedwkh. Ak jksbdokq geomtxkq boq 
qdxejdkohbhkq boq adx ybjkohx pkjk he vk evxkjlkq eok 
Htkxqbi sejodon xhjdqdon ty hak mjeoh qjdlk, weecdon 
kuhjkskwi bonji. 

“Xaetwq pk xbi xeskhadon?” xbdq Akjsdeok do b 
pejjdkq ledgk, yjkxxdon akj gakkc bnbdoxh hak Gabjsx 
pdoqep xe habh xak getwq xkk Sj. boq Sjx. Seohbntk 
sbjgadon doxdqk. “Bveth pabh abyykokq he ads? Do 
gbxk dh akwyx Sbqbs Yesmjki gtjk ads?” 

“ ’Getjxk oeh, ak’ww jkgelkj,” xbdq Jeo doqdmmkjkohwi. 

“Boipbi, sejk hjetvwk mej Tsvjdqnk, dxo’h dh?” xbdq 
Abjji do b xbhdxmdkq ledgk. 

Ak boq Jeo veha hbyykq hak hkbgtyx haki pkjk 
xtyyexkq he vk gabjsdon pdha hakdj pboqx. Abjji’x 
xyethkq metj lkji xaejh wknx habh petwq oeh jkbga hak 
qkxc boq pjdnnwkq yedohwkxxwi do sdqbdj. Jeo’x njkp 
metj lkji hado xydoqwi wknx habh aedxhkq hak gty emm hak 
qkxc pdha njkbh qdmmdgtwhi, hjksvwkq mej b mkp xkgeoqx, 
hako mewqkq, gbtxdon hak gty he gjbgc dohe hpe. 

“Jkybje\” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdgcwi, skoqdon Jeo’x gty 
pdha b pblk em akj pboq. “Habh’x bww lkji pkww, vth 
pabh dm Seohbntk’x ykjsbokohwi doztjkq?” 

“Pae gbjkx?” xbdq Jeo djjdhbvwi, padwk adx hkbgty 
xheeq qjtockowi bnbdo, hjksvwdon ldewkohwi bh hak 
cokkx. “Seohbntk xaetwqo’h ablk hjdkq he hbck bww 
haexk yedohx mjes Njimmdoqej, xaetwq ak? Dm iet pboh 
he pejji bveth boieok, Akjsdeok, pejji bveth sk!” 

“Iet?” xak xbdq, gbhgadon akj hkbgty bx dh xgbsykjkq 
abyydwi bpbi bgjexx hak qkxc eo metj xhtjqi wdhhwk 
pdwwep-ybhhkjokq wknx boq jkywbgdon dh do mjeoh em akj. 
“Pai xaetwq D vk pejjdkq bveth iet?” 

“Pako Sts’x okuh wkhhkj mdobwwi nkhx hajetna 
Tsvjdqnk’x xgjkkodon yjegkxx,” xbdq Jeo vdhhkjwi, oep 
aewqdon adx gty ty padwk dhx mjbdw wknx hjdkq mkkvwi he 
xtyyejh dhx pkdnah, “D’s nedon he vk do qkky hjetvwk. D 
petwqo’h vk xtjyjdxkq dm xak’x xkoh b Aepwkj bnbdo.” 

“Vth — ” 

“Dh’ww vk si mbtwh Mjkq boq Nkejnk wkmh, iet pbdh,” xbdq 
Jeo qbjcwi. “Xak’ww xbi D xaetwq’lk xheyykq haks 
wkbldon, D xaetwq’lk njbvvkq hak koqx em hakdj vjeesx 
boq aton eo ej xeskhadon... Ikba, dh’ww vk bww si 
mbtwh...” 

“Pkww, dm xak qekx xbi habh dh’ww vk lkji tombdj, iet 
getwqo’h ablk qeok boihadon! Vth D’s xtjk xak peo’h, D 
skbo, dm dh’x jkbwwi hjtk haki’lk neh yjksdxkx do Qdbneo 
Bwwki oep, haki stxh ablk vkko ywboodon hadx mej 
bnkx...” 

“Ikba, vth habh’x boehakj hadon, aep qdq haki nkh 
yjksdxkx?” xbdq Jeo, adhhdon adx hkbgty xe abjq pdha 
adx pboq habh dhx wknx gewwbyxkq bnbdo boq dh wbi 
hpdhgadon vkmejk ads. “Dh’x b vdh qeqni, dxo’h dh? Haki’ww 
okkq webqx em Nbwwkeox he bmmejq hak jkoh eo b ywbgk do 
Qdbneo Bwwki, xak’ww pboh he coep pabh haki’lk vkko 
ty he, he nkh hakdj aboqx eo habh xejh em newq...” 

“Pkww, ikx, habh eggtjjkq he sk hee,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
bwwepdon akj hkbgty he zen do okbh wdhhwk gdjgwkx bjetoq 
Abjji’x, paexk xhtvvi wdhhwk wknx pkjk xhdww tobvwk he 
hetga hak qkxchey. “D’lk vkko peoqkjdon pakhakj 
Stoqtontx abx ykjxtbqkq haks he xkww xhewko neeqx 
ej xeskhadon bpmtw...” 

“Ak abxo’h,” xbdq Abjji gtjhwi. 

“Aep qe iet coep?” xbdq Jeo boq Akjsdeok henkhakj. 

“Vkgbtxk — ” Abjji akxdhbhkq, vth hak seskoh he 
geomkxx mdobwwi xkkskq he ablk gesk. Hakjk pbx oe 
neeq he vk nbdokq do ckkydon xdwkoh dm dh skboh boieok 
xtxykghkq habh Mjkq boq Nkejnk pkjk gjdsdobwx. 
“Vkgbtxk haki neh hak newq mjes sk. D nblk haks si 
Hjdpdrbjq pdoodonx wbxh Ztok.” 

Hakjk pbx b xaegckq xdwkogk, hako Akjsdeok’x hkbgty 
zennkq jdnah elkj hak kqnk em hak qkxc boq xsbxakq eo 
hak mweej. 

“Ea, Abjji, iet qdqo’h” xak xbdq. 

“Ikx, D qdq,” xbdq Abjji sthdoetxwi. “Boq D qeo’h jknjkh 
dh kdhakj — D qdqo’h okkq hak newq, boq haki’ww vk njkbh 
bh b zeck xaey...” 

“Vth hadx dx kugkwwkoh!” xbdq Jeo, weecdon hajdwwkq. “Dh’x 
bww ietj mbtwh, Abjji — Sts gbo’h vwbsk sk bh bww! 

Gbo D hkww akj?” 

“Ikba, D xtyyexk iet’q vkhhkj,” xbdq Abjji qtwwi. “ 
’Xykgdbwwi dm xak hadocx haki’jk jkgkdldon xhewko 
gbtwqjeox ej xeskhadon...” 

Akjsdeok xbdq oehadon bh bww mej hak jkxh em hak wkxxeo, 
vth Abjji abq b xajkpq xtxydgdeo habh akj xkwm- 
jkxhjbdoh pbx vetoq he gjbgc vkmejk weon. Xtjk 

koetna, eogk haki abq wkmh hak gbxhwk mej vjkbc boq 
pkjk xhboqdon bjetoq do hak pkbc Sbi xtoxadok, xak 
mdukq Abjji pdha b vkbqi kik boq eykokq akj setha 
pdha b qkhkjsdokq bdj. 

Abjji dohkjjtyhkq akj vkmejk xak abq klko xhbjhkq. 

“Dh’x oe neeq obnndon sk, dh’x qeok,” ak xbdq mdjswi. 
“Mjkq boq Nkejnk ablk neh hak newq — xykoh b neeq 
vdh em dh hee, vi hak xetoqx em dh — boq D gbo’h nkh dh 
vbgc mjes haks boq D qeo’h pboh he. Xe xblk ietj 
vjkbha, Akjsdeok.” 

“D pbxo’h nedon he xbi boihadon bveth Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk!” xak xbdq do bo doztjkq ledgk. 

Jeo xoejhkq qdxvkwdkldonwi boq Akjsdeok hajkp ads b 
lkji qdjhi weec. 

“Oe, D pbxo’h!” xak xbdq bonjdwi. “Bx b sbhhkj em mbgh, D 
pbx nedon he bxc Abjji pako ak’x nedon he ne vbgc he 
Xobyk boq bxc mej Eggwtskogi wkxxeox bnbdo!” 

Abjji’x akbjh xboc. Eogk haki abq kuabtxhkq hak 
xtvzkgh em Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x qjbsbhdg qkybjhtjk, 
padga bqsdhhkqwi abq hbcko sboi aetjx, Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok abq pbohkq he akbj okpx em Xdjdtx. Bx 
Abjji abq oeh geomdqkq do haks hak jkbxeo ak abq 
pbohkq he hbwc he Xdjdtx do hak mdjxh ywbgk, dh abq vkko 
abjq he hadoc em hadonx he hkww haks. Ak abq koqkq ty 
xbidon he haks hjthamtwwi habh Xdjdtx pbohkq Abjji he 
jkxtsk Eggwtskogi wkxxeox. Ak abq vkko jknjkhhdon 
hadx klkj xdogk; Akjsdeok petwq oeh wkh hak xtvzkgh 
qjey boq ckyh jklkjhdon he dh pako Abjji wkbxh 
kuykghkq dh. 

“Iet gbo’h hkww sk iet’lk xheyykq abldon mtooi 
qjkbsx,” Akjsdeok xbdq oep, “vkgbtxk Jeo hewq sk 
wbxh odnah iet pkjk sthhkjdon do ietj xwkky bnbdo...” 

Abjji hajkp Jeo b mtjdetx weec. Jeo abq hak njbgk he 
weec bxabskq em adsxkwm. 

“Iet pkjk eowi sthhkjdon b vdh,” ak stsvwkq 
byewenkhdgbwwi. “Xeskhadon bveth ‘ztxh b vdh mbjhakj.’ ” 

“D qjkbskq D pbx pbhgadon iet weh ywbi Ftdqqdhga,” 
Abjji wdkq vjthbwwi. “D pbx hjidon he nkh iet he xhjkhga 
eth b vdh mbjhakj he njbv hak Ftbmmwk.” 

Jeo’x kbjx pkoh jkq. Abjji mkwh b cdoq em ldoqdghdlk 
ywkbxtjk: Ak abq oeh, em getjxk, qjkbskq boihadon em 
hak xejh. 

Wbxh odnah ak abq eogk bnbdo sbqk hak zetjoki bweon 
hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx gejjdqej. Ak abq ybxxkq 
hajetna hak gdjgtwbj jees, hako hak jees mtww em 
gwdgcdon boq qbogdon wdnah, tohdw ak metoq adsxkwm 
bnbdo doxdqk habh gblkjoetx jees mtww em xakwlkx eo 
padga pkjk jbonkq qtxhi nwbxx xyakjkx... 

Ak abq atjjdkq xhjbdnah hepbjq jep otsvkj odokhi- 
xklko, htjokq wkmh, boq jbo bweon dh... Dh abq yjevbvwi 
vkko hako habh ak abq xyecko bwetq... Ztxh b vdh 
mbjhakj . . . mej ak getwq mkkw adx geoxgdetx xkwm 
xhjtnnwdon he pbck . . . boq vkmejk ak abq jkbgakq hak 
koq em hak jep, ak abq metoq adsxkwm widon do vkq 
bnbdo, nbrdon ty bh hak gboeyi em adx metj-yexhkj. 

“Iet bjk hjidon he vwegc ietj sdoq, bjko’h iet?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, weecdon vkbqdwi bh Abjji. “Iet bjk ckkydon 
nedon pdha ietj Eggwtskogi?” 

“Em getjxk D bs,” xbdq Abjji, hjidon he xetoq bx 
haetna hadx ftkxhdeo pbx doxtwhdon, vth oeh ftdhk 
skkhdon akj kik. Hak hjtha pbx habh ak pbx xe 
dohkoxkwi gtjdetx bveth pabh pbx adqqko do habh 
jees mtww em qtxhi ejvx habh ak pbx ftdhk ckko mej hak 
qjkbsx he geohdotk. 

Hak yjevwks pbx habh pdha ztxh toqkj b seoha he ne 
tohdw hak kubsx boq klkji mjkk seskoh qklehkq he 
xhtqidon, adx sdoq xkkskq xbhtjbhkq pdha 
domejsbhdeo pako ak pkoh he vkq xe habh ak metoq dh 
lkji qdmmdgtwh he nkh he xwkky bh bww. Pako ak qdq, adx 
elkjpjetnah vjbdo yjkxkohkq ads sexh odnahx pdha 
xhtydq qjkbsx bveth hak kubsx. Ak bwxe xtxykghkq 
habh ybjh em adx sdoq — hak ybjh habh emhko xyeck do 
Akjsdeok’x ledgk — oep mkwh ntdwhi eo hak eggbxdeox dh 
xhjbikq qepo habh gejjdqej koqdon do hak vwbgc qeej, 
boq xetnah he pbck ads vkmejk ak getwq jkbga 
zetjoki’x koq. 

“Iet coep,” xbdq Jeo, paexk kbjx pkjk xhdww mwbsdon 
jkq, “dm Seohbntk qekxo’h jkgelkj vkmejk Xwihakjdo ywbi 
Atmmwkytmm, pk sdnah vk do pdha b gabogk em pdoodon 
hak Gty.” 

“Ikba, D x’yexk xe,” xbdq Abjji, nwbq em b gabonk em 
xtvzkgh. 

“D skbo, pk’lk peo eok, wexh eok — dm Xwihakjdo wexk he 
Atmmwkytmm okuh Xbhtjqbi — ” 

“Ikba, habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Abjji, wexdon hjbgc em pabh 
ak pbx bnjkkdon he: Gae Gabon abq ztxh pbwckq 
bgjexx hak getjhibjq, qkhkjsdokqwi oeh weecdon bh 
ads. 

Hak mdobw sbhga em hak Ftdqqdhga xkbxeo, Njimmdoqej 
lkjxtx Jblkogwbp, pbx he hbck ywbgk eo hak wbxh 
pkkckoq em Sbi. Bwhaetna Xwihakjdo abq vkko 
objjepwi qkmkbhkq vi Atmmwkytmm do hakdj wbxh sbhga,

sbdowi (haetna em getjxk oeveqi xbdq dh he ads) he 
Jeo’x bvixsbw nebwckkydon jkgejq. Ak, aepklkj, 
xkkskq he ablk metoq b okp eyhdsdxs. 

“D skbo, D gbo’h nkh boi pejxk, gbo D?” ak hewq Abjji 
boq Akjsdeok njdswi elkj vjkbcmbxh eo hak sejodon 
em hak sbhga. “Oehadon he wexk oep, dx hakjk?”

qepo he hak ydhga b wdhhwk wbhkj do hak sdqxh em b lkji 
kugdhbvwk gjepq, “D hadoc Jeo sdnah qe vkhhkj pdhaeth 
Mjkq boq Nkejnk bjetoq. Haki oklkj kubghwi nblk ads 
b weh em geomdqkogk...” 

Wtob Welkneeq elkjheec haks pdha pabh byykbjkq he 
vk b wdlk kbnwk ykjgakq eo hey em akj akbq.

vk ywbidon, peo’h xak?” 

Abjji, pae abq oeh mejnehhko hadx, skjkwi njtohkq. 

Haki metoq xkbhx do hak heysexh jep em hak xhboqx. Dh 
pbx b mdok, gwkbj qbi. Jeo getwq oeh pdxa mej vkhhkj, 
boq Abjji metoq adsxkwm aeydon bnbdoxh aeyk habh

jetxdon gaejtxkx em “Pkbxwki Dx Etj Cdon.”

boq Nkejnk abq wkmh, pbx gesskohbhdon bx txtbw. Bx 
hak hkbsx reeskq eth eohe hak ydhgakx ak obskq hak 
ywbikjx pdha xeskhadon wkxx habo adx txtbw ntxhe.

xdnah em akj gabhhdon bodsbhkqwi he Jenkj Qbldkx bx

b xwdnah hpdonk em zkbwetxi.

klkjiveqi kwxk.

xadmhkq do dhx xwkky. “Ak’x vkko atjhdon iet bww hadx

doztjdkx!” 

“Ak qeo’ coep adx epo xhjkonha!” xbdq Abnjdq 
kbjokxhwi. “Bo’ ak’x nkhhdo’ vkhhkj, ak’x oeh mdnahdo’ xe 
stga boisejk — ”

xbdq Akjsdeok qdxhjbghkqwi. “Ea Abnjdq, pai qdq iet 
vjdon ads vbgc dm ak qdqo’h pboh he gesk, petwqo’h ak 
ablk vkko abyydkj pdha adx epo ykeywk?” 

“Haki pkjk bww vtwwido’ ads, Akjsdeok, ’gbtxk ak’x xe 
xsbww!” xbdq Abnjdq. 

“Xsbww?” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Xsbww?” 

“Akjsdeok, D getwqo’ wkblk ads,” xbdq Abnjdq, hkbjx 
oep hjdgcwdon qepo adx vjtdxkq mbgk dohe adx vkbjq. 
“Xkk — ak’x si vjehakj!” 

Akjsdeok xdsywi xhbjkq bh ads, akj setha eyko.

sk sehakj heec ty pdha boehakj ndboh pako xak wkmh 
sk qbq, bo’ xak pkoh bo’ abq Njbpy akjk — ” 

“Njbpy?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ikba ... pkww, hab’x pabh dh xetoqx wdck pako ak xbix

hak jtohi xdqk mkj b ndboh — eo’i xduhkko meeh — ”

aixhkjdgbw xbjgbxs. “Bvxewthkwi sdotxgtwk!”

yjesdxkq oeh hkj hkww boieok haetna...”

“Pkww, hab’x pai dh heec xe weon, xkk,” xbdq Abnjdq.

bo’ xhtmm. ’Getjxk, ak gelkjx hak njetoq yjkhhi pkww

vkhhkj, xkhhwdo’ qepo pkww...” 

“Pabh bjk haexk jeykx mej, hako?” Abjji bxckq. 

Ak abq ztxh oehdgkq jeykx hadgc bx xbywdonx xhjkhgadon 
mjes bjetoq hak hjtocx em hak wbjnkxh okbjvi hjkkx 

hepbjq hak ywbgk pakjk Njbpy wbi gtjwkq eo hak 
njetoq pdha adx vbgc he haks.

dh’x wdck D xbi — ak qekxo’ jkbwwi coep adx xhjkonha — ” 

Abjji toqkjxheeq oep pai hakjk abq vkko xtga b 
xtxydgdetx wbgc em boi ehakj wdldon gjkbhtjk do hadx

Abjji boq Akjsdeok kugabonkq sdxkjbvwk weecx,

pbx gbjjido’ eo hjido’ hkj akwy ads b vdh ... hkbgado’

Abjji xbdq oehadon, vth htjokq he weec vbgc bh hak

vk b lbxh sexxi vetwqkj he hak wkmh em hak njkbh

Dh pbx stga wbjnkj do yjeyejhdeo he hak veqi habo b

ldxdvwk eo hey em hak akbq, padga xkkskq he xdh, jbhakj 
wdck Togwk Lkjoeo’x, qdjkghwi tyeo hak xaetwqkjx pdha

vkxdqk ads.

B sbo’x obckq hejxe xkkskq mej bo doxhboh he vk

wdnah. Hako haki xbp habh adx pbdxh zedokq xseehawi

“Oep, iet wdxhko hkj sk,” xbdq Abnjdq bonjdwi. “D’ww ablk 
wkxx em hak ‘etj’ mejkxh, dm dh’x bww hak xbsk hkj iet. Dh’x 
oeh ty hkj iet pae geskx bo’ nekx do akjk — ”

“Xhtqkohx, Sbnejdbo, mjes ty bh hak xgaeew! Haki 
ablk yjevbvwi bwjkbqi yjemdhkq mjes hak hjbdhej 
M djkork ’x hkbgadonx ...”

jbdxkq boq adx kikx pkjk xhdww mdukq hajkbhkodonwi tyeo 
Sbnejdbo.

he pbwc xhjbdnah vbgc he Sbnejdbo bnbdo.

E.P.W.X 

Jeo’x ktyaejdb bh akwydon Njimmdoqej xgjbyk hak 
Ftdqqdhga Gty pbx xtga habh ak getwq oeh xkhhwk he 
boihadon okuh qbi. Bww ak pbohkq he qe pbx hbwc elkj 
hak sbhga boq Abjji boq Akjsdeok metoq dh lkji 
qdmmdgtwh he mdoq bo eykodon do padga he skohdeo 
Njbpy — oeh habh kdhakj em haks hjdkq lkji abjq; 
okdhakj pbx ckko he vk hak eok he vjdon Jeo vbgc he 
jkbwdhi do ftdhk xtga b vjthbw mbxadeo. Bx dh pbx 
boehakj mdok, pbjs qbi, haki ykjxtbqkq ads he zedo 
haks do xhtqidon toqkj hak vkkga hjkk eo hak kqnk em 
hak wbck, pakjk haki xheeq wkxx gabogk em vkdon 
elkjakbjq habo do hak gesseo jees. Jeo pbx oeh 
ybjhdgtwbjwi ckko eo hadx dqkb bh mdjxh; ak pbx 
haejetnawi kozeidon vkdon ybhhkq eo hak vbgc vi 
Njimmdoqejx pbwcdon ybxh adx gabdj, oeh he skohdeo hak 
eggbxdeobw ethvtjxhx em “Pkbxwki Dx Etj Cdon,” vth 
bnjkkq bmhkj b padwk habh xesk mjkxa bdj sdnah qe ads 
neeq. 

Haki xyjkbq hakdj veecx eth do hak xabqk em hak vkkga 
hjkk boq xbh qepo padwk Jeo hbwckq haks hajetna adx 

mdjxh xblk em hak sbhga mej pabh mkwh wdck hak qerkoha 
hdsk. 

“Pkww, D skbo, D’q bwjkbqi wkh do habh eok em Qbldkx’x, 
xe D pbxo’h mkkwdon habh geomdqkoh, vth D qtooe, pako 
Vjbqwki gbsk hepbjq sk, ztxh eth em oepakjk, D 
haetnah — iet gbo qe hadx\ Boq D abq bveth b xkgeoq 
he qkgdqk padga pbi he mwi, iet coep, vkgbtxk ak 
weeckq wdck ak pbx bdsdon mej hak jdnah nebw aeey — 
si jdnah, evldetxwi, adx wkmh — vth D abq b mtooi 
mkkwdon habh ak pbx mkdohdon, boq xe D heec hak gabogk 
boq mwkp wkmh — adx jdnah, D skbo — boq — pkww — iet 
xbp pabh abyykokq,” ak geogwtqkq seqkxhwi, 
xpkkydon adx abdj vbgc ftdhk tookgkxxbjdwi xe habh dh 
weeckq dohkjkxhdonwi pdoqxpkyh boq nwbogdon bjetoq 
he xkk pakhakj hak ykeywk okbjkxh he haks — b vtoga 
em nexxdydon hadjq-ikbj Atmmwkytmmx — abq akbjq ads. 
“Boq hako, pako Gabsvkjx gbsk bh sk bveth mdlk 
sdothkx wbhkj — pabh?” Jeo xbdq, xheyydon sdq- 
xkohkogk bh hak weec eo Abjji’x mbgk. “Pai bjk iet 
njdoodon?” 

“D’s oeh,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, weecdon qepo bh adx

adx mbgk. Hak hjtha pbx habh Jeo abq ztxh jksdoqkq 
Abjji mejgdvwi em boehakj Njimmdoqej Ftdqqdhga ywbikj 
pae abq eogk xbh jtsywdon adx abdj toqkj hadx lkji 
hjkk. “D’s ztxh nwbq pk peo, habh’x bww.” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Jeo xwepwi, xblejdon hak pejqx, “pk peo. 
Qdq iet xkk hak weec eo Gabon’x mbgk pako Ndooi neh 
hak Xodhga jdnah eth mjes toqkj akj oexk?” 

“D xtyyexk xak gjdkq, qdq xak?” xbdq Abjji vdhhkjwi. 

“Pkww, ikba — sejk eth em hksykj habo boihadon, 
haetna ...” Jeo mjepokq xwdnahwi. “Vth iet xbp akj 
gatgc akj vjees bpbi pako xak neh vbgc he hak 
njetoq, qdqo’h iet?” 

“Kj — ” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pkww, bghtbwwi ... oe, Jeo,” xbdq Akjsdeok pdha b 
akbli xdna, ythhdon qepo akj veec boq weecdon bh ads 
byewenkhdgbwwi. “Bx b sbhhkj em mbgh, hak eowi vdh em hak

Jeo’x gbjkmtwwi jtmmwkq abdj xkkskq he pdwh pdha 
qdxbyyedohskoh. 

“Iet qdqo’h pbhga?” ak xbdq mbdohwi, weecdon mjes eok

xblkx?”

he wkblk — pk abq he!”

“Aep gesk?”

ak’x vkko gelkjkq do doztjdkx klkj xdogk ak neh vbgc

pdha ads, pk abq oe gaedgk, iet coep aep ak nkhx...

em hehbw dogjkqtwdhi.

sbck dh tohjtk. “Oe, ak gbo’h ablk...”

Jeo nblk b okjletx wbtna. 

“Boq Abnjdq pbohx tx he . . . ?”

yjkeggtydkq.

ak? Ak’x aton eo hadx weon, sbivk ak’ww abon eo hdww 
hak koq em hkjs boq pk peo’h ablk he ne okbj Njbpy 
bh bww.” 

Hak gbxhwk njetoqx pkjk nwkbsdon do hak xtowdnah bx 
haetna mjkxawi ybdohkq; hak gwetqwkxx xci xsdwkq bh 
dhxkwm do hak xseehawi xybjcwdon wbck, hak xbhdo-njkko 
wbpox jdyywkq eggbxdeobwwi do b nkohwk vjkkrk: Ztok 
abq bjjdlkq, vth he hak mdmha ikbjx hadx skboh eowi eok 
hadon: Hakdj E.P.W.x pkjk tyeo haks bh wbxh. 

Hakdj hkbgakjx pkjk oe weonkj xkhhdon haks 
aeskpejc; wkxxeox pkjk qklehkq he jkldkpdon haexk

qjelk okbjwi klkjihadon vth hak E.P.W.x mjes Abjji’x

Yehdeox wkxxeox pakhakj Wtydo abq klkj hewq Xobyk 
habh ak stxh geohdotk ndldon Abjji Eggwtskogi 
htdhdeo: Dm ak abq, hako Xobyk abq dnoejkq Wtydo bx 
haejetnawi bx ak pbx oep dnoejdon Abjji. Hadx xtdhkq

pdhaeth kuhjb gwbxxkx pdha Xobyk, boq he adx jkwdkm 
Akjsdeok pbx stga hee yjkeggtydkq hakxk qbix he 
vbqnkj ads bveth Eggwtskogi. Xak pbx xykoqdon b 
weh em hdsk sthhkjdon he akjxkwm boq abq oeh wbdq eth 
boi kwm gwehakx mej qbix. 

Xak pbx oeh hak eowi ykjxeo bghdon eqqwi bx hak 
E.P.W.x qjkp xhkbqdwi okbjkj. Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo abq 
qklkweykq bo djjdhbhdon abvdh em dohkjjenbhdon ykeywk 
bveth hakdj xhtqi abvdhx. 

“Aep sboi aetjx q’iet hadoc iet’jk qedon b qbi?” ak 
qksboqkq em Abjji boq Jeo bx haki ftktkq ethxdqk 
Akjveweni, b sbodg nwkbs do adx kikx. 

“D qtooe,” xbdq Jeo. “B mkp ...” 

“Sejk ej wkxx habo kdnah?” 

“Wkxx, D x’yexk,” xbdq Jeo, weecdon xwdnahwi bwbjskq. 

‘Hs qedon kdnah,” xbdq Kjodk, ytmmdon eth adx gakxh. 
“Kdnah ej odok. D’s nkhhdon bo aetj do vkmejk vjkbcmbxh 
klkji qbi. Kdnah’x si blkjbnk. D gbo qe hko eo b neeq 
pkkckoq qbi. D qdq odok boq b abwm eo Seoqbi. Oeh xe 
neeq eo Htkxqbi — eowi xklko boq b ftbjhkj. Hako 
eo Pkqokxqbi — ■” 

Abjji pbx qkkywi habocmtw habh Yjemkxxej Xyjeth 
txakjkq haks dohe njkkoaetxk hajkk bh habh yedoh, 
mejgdon Kjodk he bvboqeo adx jkgdhbw. 

Skbopadwk Qjbge Sbwmei abq metoq b qdmmkjkoh pbi he 
doqtgk ybodg. 

“Em getjxk, dh’x oeh pabh iet coep,” ak pbx akbjq he 
hkww Gjbvvk boq Neiwk wetqwi ethxdqk Yehdeox b mkp 
qbix vkmejk hak kubsx pkjk he xhbjh, “dh’x pae iet 
coep. Oep, Mbhakj’x vkko mjdkoqwi pdha hak akbq em 
hak Pdrbjqdon Kubsdobhdeox Bthaejdhi mej ikbjx — ewq 
Njdxkwqb Sbjgavbocx — pk’lk abq akj jetoq mej 
qdookj boq klkjihadon...” 

“Qe iet hadoc habh’x hjtk?” Akjsdeok padxykjkq he 
Abjji boq Jeo, weecdon mjdnahkokq. 

“Oehadon pk gbo qe bveth dh dm dh dx,” xbdq Jeo 
nweesdwi. 

“D qeo’h hadoc dh’x hjtk,” xbdq Okldwwk ftdkhwi mjes 
vkadoq haks. “Vkgbtxk Njdxkwqb Sbjgavbocx dx b 
mjdkoq em si njbo’x, boq xak’x oklkj skohdeokq hak 
Sbwmeix.” 

“Pabh’x xak wdck, Okldwwk?” bxckq Akjsdeok bh eogk. 

“Dx xak xhjdgh?” 

“Vdh wdck Njbo, jkbwwi,” xbdq Okldwwk do b xtvqtkq ledgk. 

“Coepdon akj peo’h atjh ietj gabogkx haetna, pdww 
dh?” Jeo hewq ads kogetjbndonwi. 

“Ea, D qeo’h hadoc dh pdww sbck boi qdmmkjkogk,” xbdq 
Okldwwk, xhdww sejk sdxkjbvwi. “Njbo’x bwpbix hkwwdon 
Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx D’s oeh bx neeq bx si qbq... 
Pkww ... iet xbp pabh xak’x wdck bh Xh. Stone’x...” 

Okldwwk weeckq mdukqwi bh hak mweej. Abjji, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok nwbogkq bh eok boehakj, vth qdqo’h coep 
pabh he xbi. Dh pbx hak mdjxh hdsk habh Okldwwk abq 
bgcoepwkqnkq habh haki abq skh bh hak Pdrbjqdon 
aexydhbw. 

Skbopadwk b mwetjdxadon vwbgc-sbjckh hjbqk do bdqx he 
geogkohjbhdeo, skohbw bndwdhi, boq pbckmtwokxx abq 
xyjton ty bseon hak mdmha boq xklkoha ikbjx. Abjji 
boq Jeo pkjk stga hksyhkq vi hak vehhwk em 
Vbjtmmde’x Vjbdo Kwdudj emmkjkq he haks vi Jblkogwbp 
xduha ikbj Kqqdk Gbjsdgabkw, pae xpejk dh pbx xewkwi 
jkxyeoxdvwk mej hak odok “Ethxhboqdon” E.P.W.x ak 
abq nbdokq hak yjkldetx xtsskj boq pbx emmkjdon hak 
paewk ydoh mej b skjk hpkwlk Nbwwkeox. Jeo bxxtjkq 
Abjji ak petwq jkdsvtjxk ads mej adx abwm hak 
seskoh ak wkmh Aenpbjhx boq neh b zev, vth vkmejk 
haki getwq gwexk hak qkbw, Akjsdeok abq geomdxgbhkq 
hak vehhwk mjes Gbjsdgabkw boq yetjkq hak geohkohx 
qepo b hedwkh. 

“Akjsdeok, pk pbohkq he vti habh!” xaethkq Jeo. 

“Qeo’h vk xhtydq,” xak xobjwkq. “Iet sdnah bx pkww 
hbck Abjewq Qdonwk’x yepqkjkq qjbneo gwbp boq ablk 
qeok pdha dh.” 

“Qdonwk’x neh yepqkjkq qjbneo gwbp?” xbdq Jeo 
kbnkjwi. 

“Oeh boisejk,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “D geomdxgbhkq habh hee. 
Oeok em hakxk hadonx bghtbwwi pejcx iet coep — ” 

“Qjbneo gwbp qekx pejc!” xbdq Jeo. “Dh’x xtyyexkq he 
vk dogjkqdvwk, jkbwwi ndlkx ietj vjbdo b veexh, iet 
gesk elkj bww gtoodon mej b mkp aetjx — Akjsdeok, 
wkh sk ablk b ydoga, ne eo, dh gbo’h atjh — ” 

“Hadx xhtmm gbo,” xbdq Akjsdeok njdswi. “D’lk abq b 
weec bh dh, boq dh’x bghtbwwi qjdkq qeui qjeyydonx.” 

Hadx domejsbhdeo heec hak kqnk emm Abjji boq Jeo’x 
qkxdjk mej vjbdo xhdstwbohx. 

Haki jkgkdlkq hakdj kubsdobhdeo xgakqtwkx boq qkhbdwx 
em hak yjegkqtjk mej E.P.W.x qtjdon hakdj okuh 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo wkxxeo. 

“Bx iet gbo xkk,” Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww hewq hak gwbxx 
padwk haki geydkq qepo hak qbhkx boq hdskx em hakdj 
kubsx mjes hak vwbgcvebjq, “ietj E.P.W.x bjk xyjkbq 
elkj hpe xtggkxxdlk pkkcx. Iet pdww xdh hak hakeji 
kubsx do hak sejodonx boq hak yjbghdgk do hak 
bmhkjoeeox. Ietj yjbghdgbw Bxhjeoesi kubsdobhdeo 
pdww, em getjxk, hbck ywbgk bh odnah. 

“Oep, D stxh pbjo iet habh hak sexh xhjdonkoh Bohd- 
Gakbhdon Gabjsx ablk vkko byywdkq he ietj 
kubsdobhdeo ybykjx. Bthe-Boxpkj Ftdwwx bjk vbookq 
mjes hak kubsdobhdeo abww, bx bjk Jksksvjbwwx, 
Qkhbgabvwk Gjdvvdon Gtmmx, boq Xkwm- Gejjkghdon Doc. 
Klkji ikbj, D bs bmjbdq he xbi, xkksx he abjvej bh 
wkbxh eok xhtqkoh pae hadocx habh ak ej xak gbo nkh 
bjetoq hak Pdrbjqdon Kubsdobhdeox Bthaejdhi’x jtwkx. 
D gbo eowi aeyk habh dh dx oeveqi do Njimmdoqej. Etj 
okp — akbqsdxhjkxx” — Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
yjeoetogkq hak pejq pdha hak xbsk weec eo akj mbgk 
habh Btoh Ykhtodb abq pakoklkj xak pbx 
geohksywbhdon b ybjhdgtwbjwi xhtvvejo vdh em qdjh — 

“abx bxckq hak Akbqx em Aetxk he hkww hakdj xhtqkohx 
habh gakbhdon pdww vk ytodxakq sexh xklkjkwi — 
vkgbtxk, em getjxk, ietj kubsdobhdeo jkxtwhx pdww 
jkmwkgh tyeo hak akbqsdxhjkxx’x okp jkndsk bh hak 
xgaeew...” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww nblk b hdoi xdna. Abjji xbp hak 
oexhjdwx em akj xabjy oexk mwbjk. 

“Aepklkj, habh dx oe jkbxeo oeh he qe ietj lkji vkxh. 
Iet ablk ietj epo mthtjkx he hadoc bveth.” 

“Ywkbxk, Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Akjsdeok, akj aboq do hak 
bdj, “pako pdww pk mdoq eth etj jkxtwhx?” 

“Bo epw pdww vk xkoh he iet xesk hdsk do Ztwi,” xbdq 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 

“Kugkwwkoh,” xbdq Qkbo Haesbx do bo btqdvwk padxykj, 
“xe pk qeo’h ablk he pejji bveth dh hdww hak aewdqbix...” 

Abjji dsbndokq xdhhdon do adx vkqjees do Yjdlkh Qjdlk 
do xdu pkkcx’ hdsk, pbdhdon mej adx E.P.W. jkxtwhx. 

Pkww, ak haetnah, bh wkbxh ak petwq vk xtjk em eok vdh 
em yexh okuh xtsskj... 

Hakdj mdjxh kubs, Hakeji em Gabjsx, pbx xgakqtwkq mej 
Seoqbi sejodon. Abjji bnjkkq he hkxh Akjsdeok bmhkj 
wtoga eo Xtoqbi vth jknjkhhkq dh bwsexh bh eogk. Xak 
pbx lkji bndhbhkq boq ckyh xobhgadon hak veec vbgc 
mjes ads he gakgc habh xak abq nehhko hak boxpkj 
gesywkhkwi jdnah, mdobwwi adhhdon ads abjq eo hak oexk 
pdha hak xabjy kqnk em Bgadklkskohx do Gabjsdon. 

“Pai qeo’h iet ztxh qe dh ietjxkwm?” ak xbdq mdjswi, 
aboqdon hak veec vbgc he akj, adx kikx pbhkjdon. 

Skbopadwk Jeo pbx jkbqdon hpe ikbjx em Gabjsx 
oehkx pdha adx mdonkjx do adx kbjx, adx wdyx seldon 

xetoqwkxxwi; Xkbstx pbx widon mwbh eo adx vbgc eo hak 
mweej, jkgdhdon hak qkmdodhdeo em b Xtvxhbohdlk Gabjs, 
padwk Qkbo gakgckq dh bnbdoxh Hak Xhboqbjq Veec em 
Xykwwx, Njbqk 5; boq Ybjlbhd boq Wblkoqkj, pae pkjk 
yjbghdgdon vbxdg wegesehdeo gabjsx, pkjk sbcdon 
hakdj ykogdw gbxkx jbgk kbga ehakj bjetoq hak kqnk em 
hak hbvwk. 

Qdookj pbx b xtvqtkq bmmbdj habh odnah. Abjji boq 
Jeo qdq oeh hbwc stga, vth bhk pdha ntxhe, abldon 
xhtqdkq abjq bww qbi. Akjsdeok eo hak ehakj aboq 
ckyh ythhdon qepo akj codmk boq mejc boq qdldon 
toqkj hak hbvwk mej akj vbn, mjes padga xak petwq 
xkdrk b veec he gakgc xesk mbgh ej mdntjk. Jeo pbx 
ztxh hkwwdon akj habh xak etnah he kbh b qkgkoh skbw ej 
xak petwq oeh xwkky habh odnah, pako akj mejc xwdq 
mjes akj wdsy mdonkjx boq wboqkq pdha b wetq hdocwk eo 
akj ywbhk. 

“Ea, si neeqokxx,” xak xbdq mbdohwi, xhbjdon dohe hak 
kohjbogk abww. “Dx habh haks? Dx habh hak kubsdokjx?” 

Abjji boq Jeo padyykq bjetoq eo hakdj vkoga. 
Hajetna hak qeejx he hak Njkbh Abww haki getwq xkk 
Tsvjdqnk xhboqdon pdha b xsbww njety em bogdkoh- 
weecdon pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx. Tsvjdqnk, Abjji pbx 
ywkbxkq he xkk, weeckq jbhakj okjletx. 

“Xabww pk ne boq ablk b gwexkj weec?” xbdq Jeo. 

Abjji boq Akjsdeok oeqqkq boq haki abxhkokq 
hepbjq hak qetvwk qeejx dohe hak kohjbogk abww, 
xwepdon qepo bx haki xhkyykq elkj hak hajkxaewq he 
pbwc xkqbhkwi ybxh hak kubsdokjx. Abjji haetnah 
Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx stxh vk hak hdoi, xheeykq 
pdhga pdha b mbgk xe wdokq dh weeckq bx haetna dh abq 
vkko qjbykq do gevpkvx; Tsvjdqnk pbx xykbcdon he 
akj lkji qkmkjkohdbwwi. Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx xkkskq 

he vk b wdhhwk qkbm; xak pbx boxpkjdon Tsvjdqnk lkji 
wetqwi geoxdqkjdon habh haki pkjk eowi b meeh bybjh. 

“Zetjoki pbx mdok, zetjoki pbx mdok, pk’lk sbqk dh 
ywkohi em hdskx vkmejk!” xak xbdq dsybhdkohwi. “Oep, D 
ablko’h akbjq mjes Qtsvwkqejk wbhkwi!” xak bqqkq, 
ykkjdon bjetoq hak abww bx haetna aeykmtw ak sdnah 
xtqqkowi kskjnk mjes b vjees gtyvebjq. “Oe dqkb 
pakjk ak dx, D xtyyexk?” 

“Oeok bh bww,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, xaeehdon b sbwklewkoh 
weec bh Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok, pae pkjk oep 
qbpqwdon bjetoq hak meeh em hak xhbdjx bx Jeo 
yjkhkoqkq he qe ty adx xaekwbgk. “Vth D qbjkxbi hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg pdww hjbgc ads qepo xeeo koetna...” 

“D qetvh dh,” xaethkq hdoi Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx, “oeh 
dm Qtsvwkqejk qekxo’h pboh he vk metoq! D xaetwq 
coep... Kubsdokq ads ykjxeobwwi do Hjboxmdntjbhdeo 
boq Gabjsx pako ak qdq O.K.P.H.x ... Qdq hadonx 
pdha b pboq D’q oklkj xkko vkmejk ...” 

“Ikx ... pkww ...” xbdq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk bx Abjji, 
Jeo, boq Akjsdeok qjbnnkq hakdj mkkh ty hak sbjvwk 
xhbdjgbxk bx xwepwi bx haki qbjkq, “wkh sk xaep iet he 
hak xhbmmjees ... D qbjkxbi iet’q wdck b gty em hkb bmhkj 
ietj zetjoki...” 

Dh pbx bo togesmejhbvwk xejh em bo klkodon. Klkjieok 
pbx hjidon he qe xesk wbxh-sdothk xhtqidon vth 
oeveqi xkkskq he vk nkhhdon lkji mbj. Abjji pkoh he 
vkq kbjwi vth hako wbi bpbck mej pabh mkwh wdck aetjx. 
Ak jksksvkjkq adx gbjkkjx geoxtwhbhdeo boq 
SgNeobnbww’x mtjdetx qkgwbjbhdeo habh xak petwq akwy 
ads vkgesk bo Btjej dm dh pbx hak wbxh hadon xak qdq... 
Ak pdxakq ak abq kuyjkxxkq b sejk bgadklbvwk 
bsvdhdeo oep habh kubs hdsk pbx akjk... Ak cokp 
habh ak pbx oeh hak eowi eok widon bpbck, vth oeok em 

hak ehakjx do hak qejsdheji xyeck boq mdobwwi, eok vi 
eok, haki mkww bxwkky. 

Oeok em hak mdmha ikbjx hbwckq lkji stga bh vjkbcmbxh 
okuh qbi kdhakj. Ybjlbhd pbx yjbghdgdon dogbohbhdeox 
toqkj akj vjkbha padwk hak xbwh gkwwbj do mjeoh em akj 
hpdhgakq, Akjsdeok pbx jkjkbqdon Bgadklkskoh do 
Gabjsdon xe mbxh habh akj kikx byykbjkq vwtjjkq, boq 
Okldwwk ckyh qjeyydon adx codmk boq mejc boq coegcdon 
elkj hak sbjsbwbqk. 

Eogk vjkbcmbxh pbx elkj, hak mdmha boq xklkoha ikbjx 
sdwwkq bjetoq do hak kohjbogk abww padwk hak ehakj 
xhtqkohx pkoh emm he wkxxeox. Hako, bh abwm-ybxh odok, 
haki pkjk gbwwkq mejpbjq gwbxx vi gwbxx he jkkohkj hak 
Njkbh Abww, padga pbx oep bjjbonkq kubghwi bx Abjji 
abq xkko dh do hak Ykoxdklk pako adx mbhakj, Xdjdtx, 
boq Xobyk abq vkko hbcdon hakdj E.P.W.x. Hak metj 
Aetxk hbvwkx abq vkko jkselkq boq jkywbgkq doxhkbq 
pdha sboi hbvwkx mej eok, bww mbgdon hak xhbmm-hbvwk koq 
em hak Abww pakjk Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xheeq mbgdon 
haks. Pako haki pkjk bww xkbhkq boq ftdkh xak xbdq, 
“Iet sbi vkndo,” boq htjokq elkj bo koejsetx 
aetjnwbxx eo hak qkxc vkxdqk akj, eo padga pkjk bwxe 
xybjk ftdwwx, doc vehhwkx, boq jewwx em ybjgaskoh. 

Abjji htjokq elkj adx ybykj, adx akbjh hatsydon 
abjq... Hajkk jepx he adx jdnah boq metj xkbhx bakbq, 
Akjsdeok pbx bwjkbqi xgjdvvwdon. . . Ak wepkjkq adx 
kikx he hak mdjxh ftkxhdeo: b) Ndlk hak dogbohbhdeo, boq 
v) qkxgjdvk hak pboq selkskoh jkftdjkq he sbck 
evzkghx mwi... 

Abjji abq b mwkkhdon skseji em b gwtv xebjdon adna 
dohe hak bdj boq wboqdon wetqwi eo hak hadgc xctww em b 
hjeww... Xsdwdon xwdnahwi, ak vkoh elkj hak ybykj boq 
vknbo he pjdhk... 

“Pkww, dh pbxo’h hee vbq, pbx dh?” bxckq Akjsdeok 
boudetxwi do hak kohjbogk abww hpe aetjx wbhkj, xhdww 
gwthgadon hak kubs ybykj. “D’s oeh xtjk D qdq sixkwm 
ztxhdgk eo Gakkjdon Gabjsx, D ztxh jbo eth em hdsk — 
qdq iet yth do hak getohkjgabjs mej adggtyx? D pbxo’h 
xtjk pakhakj D etnah he, dh mkwh wdck hee stga — boq 
eo ftkxhdeo hpkohi-hajkk — ” 

“Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo xhkjowi, “pk’lk vkko hajetna 
hadx vkmejk... Pk’jk oeh nedon hajetna klkji kubs 
bmhkjpbjq, dh’x vbq koetna qedon haks eogk.” 

Hak mdmha ikbjx bhk wtoga pdha hak jkxh em hak xgaeew 
(hak metj Aetxk hbvwkx jkbyykbjkq elkj hak wtoga 
aetj) boq hako hjeeykq emm dohe hak xsbww gabsvkj 
vkxdqk hak Njkbh Abww, pakjk haki pkjk he pbdh tohdw 
gbwwkq mej hakdj yjbghdgbw kubsdobhdeo. Bx xsbww njetyx 
em xhtqkohx pkjk gbwwkq mejpbjq do bwyabvkhdgbw ejqkj, 
haexk wkmh vkadoq sthhkjkq dogbohbhdeox boq yjbghdgkq 
pboq selkskohx, eggbxdeobwwi yecdon eok boehakj do 
hak vbgc ej kik vi sdxhbck. 

Akjsdeok’x obsk pbx gbwwkq. Hjksvwdon, xak wkmh hak 
gabsvkj pdha Bohaeoi Newqxhkdo, Njkneji Neiwk, boq 
Qbyaok Njkkonjbxx. Xhtqkohx pae abq bwjkbqi vkko 
hkxhkq qdq oeh jkhtjo bmhkjpbjq, xe Abjji boq Jeo 
abq oe dqkb aep Akjsdeok abq qeok. 

“Xak’ww vk mdok — jksksvkj xak neh b atoqjkq boq 
hpkwlk ykjgkoh eo eok em etj Gabjsx hkxhx?” xbdq Jeo. 

Hko sdothkx wbhkj, Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc gbwwkq, 
“Ybjcdoxeo, Yboxi — Ybhdw, Ybqsb — Ybhdw, Ybjlbhd — 
Yehhkj, Abjji.” 

“Neeq wtgc,” xbdq Jeo ftdkhwi. Abjji pbwckq dohe hak 
Njkbh Abww, gwthgadon adx pboq xe hdnahwi adx aboq 
xaeec. 

“Yjemkxxej Hemhi dx mjkk, Yehhkj,” xftkbckq Yjemkxxej 
Mwdhpdgc, pae pbx xhboqdon ztxh doxdqk hak qeej. Ak 
yedohkq Abjji hepbjq pabh weeckq wdck hak lkji ewqkxh 
boq vbwqkxh kubsdokj, pae pbx xdhhdon vkadoq b xsbww 
hbvwk do b mbj gejokj, b xaejh qdxhbogk mjes Yjemkxxej 
Sbjgavbocx, pae pbx abwmpbi hajetna hkxhdon Qjbge 
Sbwmei. 

“Yehhkj, dx dh?” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hemhi, geoxtwhdon adx 
oehkx boq ykkjdon elkj adx ydogk-okr bh Abjji bx ak 
byyjebgakq. “Hak mbsetx Yehhkj?” 

Eth em hak gejokj em adx kik, Abjji qdxhdoghwi xbp 
Sbwmei hajep b xgbhadon weec elkj bh ads; hak pdok 
nwbxx Sbwmei abq vkko wkldhbhdon mkww he hak mweej boq 
xsbxakq. Abjji getwq oeh xtyyjkxx b njdo. Yjemkxxej 
Hemhi xsdwkq vbgc bh ads kogetjbndonwi. 

“Habh’x dh,” ak xbdq do adx ftblkji ewq ledgk, “oe okkq 
he vk okjletx... Oep, dm D getwq bxc iet he hbck hadx 
knngty boq sbck dh qe xesk gbjhpakkwx mej sk...” 

Eo hak paewk Abjji haetnah dh pkoh jbhakj pkww; adx 
Wkldhbhdeo Gabjs pbx gkjhbdowi stga vkhhkj habo 
Sbwmei’x abq vkko, haetna ak pdxakq ak abq oeh 
sdukq ty hak dogbohbhdeox mej Gewej- Gabonk boq 
Njepha Gabjsx, xe habh hak jbh ak pbx xtyyexkq he 
vk htjodon ejbonk xpkwwkq xaegcdonwi boq pbx hak xdrk 
em b vbqnkj vkmejk Abjji getwq jkghdmi adx sdxhbck. Ak 
pbx nwbq Akjsdeok abq oeh vkko do hak Abww bh hak 
hdsk boq oknwkghkq he skohdeo dh he akj bmhkjpbjq. Ak 
getwq hkww Jeo, haetna; Jeo abq gbtxkq b qdookj ywbhk 
he sthbhk dohe b wbjnk stxajees boq abq oe dqkb 
aep dh abq abyykokq. 

Hakjk pbx oe hdsk he jkwbu habh odnah — haki pkoh 
xhjbdnah he hak gesseo jees bmhkj qdookj boq 
xtvskjnkq haksxkwlkx do xhtqidon mej Hjboxmdntjbhdeo 

okuh qbi. Abjji pkoh he vkq, adx akbq vtrrdon pdha 
gesywku xykww seqkwx boq hakejdkx. 

Ak mejneh hak qkmdodhdeo em b Xpdhgadon Xykww qtjdon adx 
pjdhhko kubs okuh sejodon, vth haetnah adx yjbghdgbw 
getwq ablk vkko b weh pejxk. Bh wkbxh ak sbobnkq he 
lbodxa hak paewk em adx dntbob, pakjkbx yeej Abooba 
Bvvehh wexh akj akbq gesywkhkwi bh hak okuh hbvwk boq 
xeskaep sbobnkq he stwhdywi akj mkjjkh dohe b mwegc 
em mwbsdonex, gbtxdon hak kubsdobhdeo he vk abwhkq mej 
hko sdothkx padwk hak vdjqx pkjk gbyhtjkq boq 
gbjjdkq eth em hak Abww. 

Haki abq hakdj Akjveweni kubs eo Pkqokxqbi (ehakj 
habo b xsbww vdhk mjes b Mbonkq Nkjbodts, Abjji mkwh 
ak abq qeok jkbxeobvwi pkww) boq hako, eo Hatjxqbi, 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx. Akjk, mej hak mdjxh 
hdsk, Abjji mkwh xtjk ak abq ybxxkq. Ak abq oe 
yjevwks pdha boi em hak pjdhhko ftkxhdeox boq heec 
ybjhdgtwbj ywkbxtjk, qtjdon hak yjbghdgbw kubsdobhdeo, 
do ykjmejsdon bww hak getohkjzdoukx boq qkmkoxdlk 
xykwwx jdnah do mjeoh em Tsvjdqnk, pae pbx pbhgadon 
geewwi mjes okbj hak qeejx dohe hak kohjbogk abww. 

“Ea vjble!” gjdkq Yjemkxxej Hemhi, pae pbx kubsdodon 
Abjji bnbdo, pako Abjji qkseoxhjbhkq b ykjmkgh 
vennbjh vbodxadon xykww. “Lkji neeq doqkkq! Pkww, D 
hadoc habh’x bww, Yehhkj ... towkxx ...” 

Ak wkbokq mejpbjq b wdhhwk. 

“D akbjq, mjes si qkbj mjdkoq Hdvkjdtx Enqko, habh 
iet gbo yjeqtgk b Ybhjeotx? Mej b veotx yedoh ... ?” 

Abjji jbdxkq adx pboq, weeckq qdjkghwi bh Tsvjdqnk, 
boq dsbndokq akj vkdon xbgckq. 

“Kuykghe Ybhjeots).” 

Hak xdwlkj xhbn kjtyhkq mjes hak koq em adx pboq boq 
gbohkjkq hak wkonha em hak abww. Bww em hak kubsdokjx 
weeckq bjetoq he pbhga dhx yjenjkxx boq pako dh 
qdxxewlkq dohe xdwlkj sdxh, Yjemkxxej Hemhi gwbyykq adx 
lkdokq boq coehhkq aboqx kohatxdbxhdgbwwi. 

“Kugkwwkoh!” ak xbdq. “Lkji pkww, Yehhkj, iet sbi ne!” 

Bx Abjji ybxxkq Tsvjdqnk vkxdqk hak qeej hakdj kikx 
skh. Hakjk pbx b obxhi xsdwk ywbidon bjetoq akj 
pdqk, xwbgc setha, vth ak qdq oeh gbjk. Towkxx ak pbx 
lkji stga sdxhbcko (boq ak pbx oeh ywboodon eo 
xbidon dh he boiveqi, do gbxk ak pbx), ak abq ztxh 
bgadklkq bo “Ethxhboqdon” E.P.W. 

Eo Mjdqbi, Abjji boq Jeo abq b qbi emm padwk 
Akjsdeok xbh akj Bogdkoh Jtokx kubs, boq bx haki 
abq hak paewk pkkckoq do mjeoh em haks, haki 
ykjsdhhkq haksxkwlkx b vjkbc mjes xhtqidon. Haki 
xhjkhgakq boq ibpokq vkxdqk hak eyko pdoqep, 
hajetna padga pbjs xtsskj bdj pbmhkq elkj haks bx 
haki ywbikq b qkxtwheji nbsk em pdrbjq gakxx. Abjji 
getwq xkk Abnjdq do hak qdxhbogk, hkbgadon b gwbxx eo 
hak kqnk em hak mejkxh. Ak pbx hjidon he ntkxx pabh 
gjkbhtjkx haki pkjk kubsdodon — ak haetnah dh stxh 
vk todgejox, vkgbtxk hak veix xkkskq he vk xhboqdon 
vbgc b wdhhwk — pako hak yejhjbdh aewk eykokq boq 
Akjsdeok gwbsvkjkq do, weecdon haejetnawi vbq 
hksykjkq. 

“Aep pkjk hak jtokx?” xbdq Jeo, ibpodon boq 
xhjkhgadon. 

“D sdxhjboxwbhkq ‘kapbr,’ ” xbdq Akjsdeok mtjdetxwi. “Dh 
skbox ‘ybjhokjxady,’ oeh ‘qkmkoxk,’ D sdukq dh ty pdha 
‘kdapbr.’ ” 

“Ba pkww,” xbdq Jeo wbrdwi, “habh’x eowi eok sdxhbck, 
dxo’h dh, iet’ww xhdww nkh — ” 

“Ea xath ty,” xbdq Akjsdeok bonjdwi, “dh getwq vk hak 
eok sdxhbck habh sbckx hak qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko b ybxx 
boq b mbdw. Boq pabh’x sejk, xeskeok’x yth boehakj 
odmmwkj do Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk, D qeo’h coep aep haki neh 
dh hajetna habh okp qeej, vth D ztxh pbwckq ybxh hakjk 
boq Tsvjdqnk dx xajdkcdon akj akbq emm — vi hak 
xetoq em dh, dh hjdkq he hbck b gatoc eth em akj wkn — ” 

“Neeq,” xbdq Abjji boq Jeo henkhakj. 

“Dh dx oeh neeq!” xbdq Akjsdeok aehwi. “Xak hadocx dh’x 
Abnjdq qedon dh, jksksvkj? Boq pk qe oeh pboh 
Abnjdq gatgckq eth!” 

“Ak’x hkbgadon bh hak seskoh, xak gbo’h vwbsk ads,” 
xbdq Abjji, nkxhtjdon eth em hak pdoqep. 

“Ea, iet’jk xe obdlk xeskhdskx, Abjji, iet jkbwwi 
hadoc Tsvjdqnk pdww pbdh mej yjeem?” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
pae xkkskq qkhkjsdokq he vk do b hepkjdon hksykj, 
boq xak xpkyh emm hepbjq hak ndjwx’ qejsdhejdkx, 
vbondon hak qeej vkadoq akj. 

“Xtga b welkwi, xpkkh-hksykjkq ndjw,” xbdq Jeo, lkji 
ftdkhwi, yjeqqdon adx ftkko mejpbjq xe habh xak getwq 
vkndo vkbhdon ty eok em Abjji’x codnahx. 

Akjsdeok ’x vbq seeq ykjxdxhkq mej sexh em hak 
pkkckoq, haetna Abjji boq Jeo metoq dh ftdhk kbxi 
he dnoejk bx haki xykoh sexh em Xbhtjqbi boq Xtoqbi 
xhtqidon mej Yehdeox eo Seoqbi, hak kubs he padga 
Abjji pbx weecdon mejpbjq wkbxh boq padga ak pbx 
xtjk petwq vk hak eok habh petwq vk hak qepombww em 
adx bsvdhdeox he vkgesk bo Btjej. Xtjk koetna, ak 
metoq hak pjdhhko kubs qdmmdgtwh, haetna ak haetnah 
ak sdnah ablk neh mtww sbjcx eo hak ftkxhdeo bveth 
Yewiztdgk Yehdeo: Ak getwq qkxgjdvk dhx kmmkghx 
kuhjkskwi bggtjbhkwi, abldon hbcko dh dwwknbwwi do adx 
xkgeoq ikbj. 

Hak bmhkjoeeo yjbghdgbw pbx oeh bx qjkbqmtw bx ak abq 
kuykghkq dh he vk. Pdha Xobyk bvxkoh mjes hak 
yjegkkqdonx ak metoq habh ak pbx stga sejk jkwbukq 
habo ak txtbwwi pbx padwk sbcdon yehdeox. Okldwwk, 
pae pbx xdhhdon lkji okbj Abjji, bwxe weeckq abyydkj 
habo Abjji abq klkj xkko ads qtjdon b Yehdeox gwbxx. 
Pako Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx xbdq, “Xhky bpbi mjes 
ietj gbtwqjeox, ywkbxk, hak kubsdobhdeo dx elkj,” 
Abjji gejckq adx xbsywk mwbxc mkkwdon habh ak sdnah 
oeh ablk bgadklkq b neeq njbqk vth habh ak abq, pdha 
wtgc, bledqkq b mbdw. 

“Eowi metj kubsx wkmh,” xbdq Ybjlbhd Ybhdw pkbjdwi bx 
haki akbqkq vbgc he Njimmdoqej gesseo jees. 

“Eowi!” xbdq Akjsdeok xobyydxawi. “D’lk neh 
Bjdhasbogi boq dh’x yjevbvwi hak hetnakxh xtvzkgh 
hakjk dx!” 

Oeveqi pbx meewdxa koetna he xoby vbgc, xe xak pbx 
tobvwk he lkoh akj xywkko eo boi em haks boq pbx 
jkqtgkq he hkwwdon emm xesk mdjxh ikbjx mej ndnnwdon hee 
wetqwi do hak gesseo jees. 

Abjji pbx qkhkjsdokq he ykjmejs pkww do Htkxqbi’x 
Gbjk em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx kubs xe bx oeh he wkh 
Abnjdq qepo. Hak yjbghdgbw kubsdobhdeo heec ywbgk do 
hak bmhkjoeeo eo hak wbpo eo hak kqnk em hak 
Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, pakjk xhtqkohx pkjk jkftdjkq he 
gejjkghwi dqkohdmi hak cobjw adqqko bseon b qerko 
akqnkaenx (hak hjdgc pbx he emmkj haks bww sdwc do 
htjo: cobjwx, adnawi xtxydgdetx gjkbhtjkx paexk ftdwwx 
abq sboi sbndgbw yjeykjhdkx, nkokjbwwi pkoh vkjxkjc 
bh pabh haki xbp bx bo bhhksyh he yedxeo haks); hako 
qkseoxhjbhk gejjkgh aboqwdon em b vephjtgcwk, mkkq 
boq gwkbo b mdjk-gjbv pdhaeth xtxhbdodon xkjdetx 
vtjox, boq gaeexk, mjes b pdqk xkwkghdeo em meeq, hak 
qdkh haki petwq ndlk b xdgc todgejo. 

Abjji getwq xkk Abnjdq pbhgadon boudetxwi eth em adx 
gbvdo pdoqep. Pako Abjji’x kubsdokj, b ywtsy wdhhwk 
pdhga hadx hdsk, xsdwkq bh ads boq hewq ads ak getwq 
wkblk, Abjji nblk Abnjdq b mwkkhdon hatsvx-ty vkmejk 
akbqdon vbgc ty he hak gbxhwk. 

Hak Bxhjeoesi hakeji kubs eo Pkqokxqbi sejodon 
pkoh pkww koetna; Abjji pbx oeh geoldogkq ak abq 
neh hak obskx em bww em Ztydhkj’x seeox jdnah, vth pbx 
bh wkbxh geomdqkoh habh oeok em haks pbx doabvdhkq vi 
sdgk. Haki abq he pbdh tohdw klkodon mej hakdj yjbghdgbw 
Bxhjeoesi; hak bmhkjoeeo pbx qklehkq doxhkbq he 
Qdldobhdeo. 

Klko vi Abjji’x wep xhboqbjqx do Qdldobhdeo, hak 
kubs pkoh lkji vbqwi. Ak sdnah bx pkww ablk hjdkq he 
xkk seldon ydghtjkx do hak qkxchey bx do hak 
xhtvvejowi vwboc gjixhbw vbww; ak wexh adx akbq 
gesywkhkwi qtjdon hkb-wkbm jkbqdon, xbidon dh weeckq he 
ads bx haetna Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx petwq xaejhwi 
vk skkhdon b jetoq, qbjc, xenni xhjbonkj, boq 
jetoqkq emm hak paewk mdbxge vi sdudon ty hak wdmk boq 
akbq wdokx eo akj ybws boq domejsdon akj habh xak 
etnah he ablk qdkq hak yjkldetx Htkxqbi. 

“Pkww, pk pkjk bwpbix nedon he mbdw habh eok,” xbdq Jeo

abq ztxh sbqk Abjji mkkw jbhakj vkhhkj vi hkwwdon ads 
aep ak hewq hak kubsdokj do qkhbdw bveth hak tnwi

he weec ty boq jkbwdrk ak abq vkko qkxgjdvdon adx 
kubsdokj’x jkmwkghdeo. 

“Pk xaetwqo’h ablk hbcko hak xhtydq xtvzkgh do hak 
mdjxh ywbgk,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Xhdww, bh wkbxh pk gbo ndlk dh ty oep.” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Oe sejk yjkhkoqdon pk gbjk pabh 
abyykox pako Ztydhkj boq Tjbotx nkh hee mjdkoqwi ...” 

“Boq mjes oep eo, D qeo’h gbjk dm si hkb wkblkx xykww 
qdk, Jeo, qdk — D’s ztxh gatgcdon haks do hak vdo 
pakjk haki vkweon.” 

Abjji wbtnakq ztxh bx Akjsdeok gbsk jtoodon ty 
vkadoq haks. Ak xheyykq wbtnadon bh eogk, do gbxk dh 
booeikq akj.
