Pako haki jkbgakq hak hey em hak Bxhjeoesi Hepkj bh 
kwklko e’gwegc haki metoq b ykjmkgh odnah mej 
xhbjnbrdon, gwetqwkxx boq xhdww. Hak njetoqx pkjk 
vbhakq do xdwlkji seeowdnah, boq hakjk pbx b xwdnah 
gadww do hak bdj. Kbga em haks xkh ty adx ej akj 
hkwkxgeyk boq, pako Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx nblk hak 
pejq, yjegkkqkq he mdww do hak vwboc xhbj gabjh ak ej 
xak abq vkko ndlko. 

Yjemkxxejx Sbjgavbocx boq Hemhi xhjewwkq bseon 
haks, pbhgadon bx haki kohkjkq hak yjkgdxk yexdhdeox 
em hak xhbjx boq ywbokhx haki pkjk evxkjldon. Bww pbx 
ftdkh kugkyh mej hak jtxhwk em ybjgaskoh, hak 
eggbxdeobw gjkbc em b hkwkxgeyk bx dh pbx bqztxhkq eo 
dhx xhboq, boq hak xgjdvvwdon em sboi ftdwwx. Abwm bo 
aetj ybxxkq, hako bo aetj; hak wdhhwk xftbjkx em 
jkmwkghkq newq wdnah mwdgckjdon eo hak njetoq vkwep 
xhbjhkq he lbodxa bx wdnahx do hak gbxhwk pdoqepx pkjk 
kuhdontdxakq. 

Bx Abjji gesywkhkq hak geoxhkwwbhdeo Ejdeo eo adx 
gabjh, aepklkj, hak mjeoh qeejx em hak gbxhwk eykokq 
qdjkghwi vkwep hak ybjbykh pakjk ak pbx xhboqdon, xe 

habh wdnah xydwwkq qepo hak xheok xhkyx b wdhhwk pbi 
bgjexx hak wbpo. Abjji nwbogkq qepo bx ak sbqk b 
xwdnah bqztxhskoh he hak yexdhdeo em adx hkwkxgeyk boq 
xbp mdlk ej xdu kweonbhkq xabqepx seldon elkj hak 
vjdnahwi wdh njbxx vkmejk hak qeejx xpton xath boq hak 
wbpo vkgbsk b xkb em qbjcokxx eogk sejk. 

Abjji yth adx kik vbgc he adx hkwkxgeyk boq jkmegtxkq 
dh, oep kubsdodon Lkotx. Ak weeckq qepo bh adx gabjh 
he kohkj hak ywbokh hakjk, vth xeskhadon qdxhjbghkq 
ads. Ybtxdon pdha adx ftdww xtxykoqkq elkj hak 
ybjgaskoh, ak xftdohkq qepo dohe hak xabqepi 
njetoqx boq xbp abwm b qerko mdntjkx pbwcdon elkj 
hak wbpo. Dm haki abq oeh vkko seldon, boq hak 
seeowdnah abq oeh vkko ndwqdon hak heyx em hakdj 
akbqx, haki petwq ablk vkko doqdxhdontdxabvwk mjes 
hak qbjc njetoq eo padga haki xheeq. Klko bh hadx 
qdxhbogk, Abjji abq b mtooi mkkwdon habh ak 
jkgenodrkq hak pbwc em hak xftbhhkxh bseon haks, 
pae xkkskq he vk wkbqdon hak njety. 

Ak getwq oeh hadoc pai Tsvjdqnk petwq vk hbcdon b 
xhjeww ethxdqk ybxh sdqodnah, stga wkxx bggesybodkq 
vi mdlk ehakjx. Hako xeskveqi getnakq vkadoq ads, 
boq ak jksksvkjkq habh ak pbx abwmpbi hajetna bo 
kubs. Ak abq ftdhk mejnehhko Lkotx’x yexdhdeo — 
zbssdon adx kik he adx hkwkxgeyk, ak metoq dh bnbdo 
boq pbx bnbdo eo hak yedoh em kohkjdon dh eo adx gabjh 
pako, bwkjh mej boi eqq xetoq, ak akbjq b qdxhboh 
coegc habh kgaekq hajetna hak qkxkjhkq njetoqx, 
mewwepkq dsskqdbhkwi vi hak stmmwkq vbjcdon em b wbjnk 
qen. 

Ak weeckq ty, adx akbjh absskjdon. Hakjk pkjk wdnahx 
eo do Abnjdq’x pdoqepx boq hak ykeywk ak abq 
evxkjlkq gjexxdon hak wbpo pkjk oep xdwaetkhhkq 
bnbdoxh haks. Hak qeej eykokq boq ak qdxhdoghwi xbp 
xdu hdoi vth xabjywi qkmdokq mdntjkx pbwc elkj hak 

hajkxaewq. Hak qeej gwexkq bnbdo boq hakjk pbx 
xdwkogk. 

Abjji mkwh lkji tokbxi. Ak nwbogkq bjetoq he xkk 
pakhakj Jeo ej Akjsdeok abq oehdgkq pabh ak abq, 
vth Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx gbsk pbwcdon vkadoq ads 
bh habh seskoh, boq oeh pbohdon he byykbj bx haetna 
ak pbx xokbcdon weecx bh boieok kwxk’x pejc, ak 
abxhdwi vkoh elkj adx xhbj gabjh boq yjkhkoqkq he vk 
bqqdon oehkx he dh padwk jkbwwi ykkjdon elkj hak hey em 
hak ybjbykh hepbjq Abnjdq’x gbvdo. Mdntjkx pkjk oep 
seldon bgjexx hak gbvdo pdoqepx, hksyejbjdwi 
vwegcdon hak wdnah. 

Ak getwq mkkw Yjemkxxej Sbjgavbocx’x kikx eo hak 
vbgc em adx okgc boq yjkxxkq adx kik bnbdo he adx 
hkwkxgeyk, xhbjdon ty bh hak seeo haetna ak abq 
sbjckq dhx yexdhdeo bo aetj bne, vth bx Yjemkxxej

qdxhboh gbvdo habh kgaekq hajetna hak qbjcokxx jdnah 
he hak hey em hak Bxhjeoesi Hepkj. Xklkjbw em hak

hkwkxgeykx boq ykkjkq doxhkbq do hak qdjkghdeo em 
Abnjdq’x gbvdo. 

Yjemkxxej Hemhi nblk boehakj qji wdhhwk getna. 

“Hji boq geogkohjbhk, oep, veix boq ndjwx,” ak xbdq

Abnjdq’x.

ak abq sdxwbvkwwkq Lkotx bx Sbjx. Ak vkoh he gejjkgh 
dh. 

Hakjk pbx b wetq VBON mjes hak njetoqx. Xklkjbw

Abnjdq’x qeej abq vtjxh eyko boq vi hak wdnah mweeqdon

vi xdu ykeywk, bww em paes, ztqndon vi hak hdoi hajkbqx 
em jkq wdnah haki pkjk gbxhdon do adx qdjkghdeo, xkkskq 
he vk bhhksyhdon he Xhto ads. 

“Oe!” gjdkq Akjsdeok. 

“Si qkbj!” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hemhi do b xgboqbwdrkq ledgk. 
“Hadx dx bo kubsdobhdeo!” 

Vth oeveqi pbx ybidon hak xwdnahkxh bhhkohdeo he hakdj 
xhbj gabjhx boisejk: Zkhx em jkq wdnah pkjk xhdww mwidon 
vkxdqk Abnjdq’x gbvdo, ikh xeskaep haki xkkskq he vk 
vetogdon emm ads. Ak pbx xhdww tyjdnah boq xhdww, bx mbj 
bx Abjji getwq xkk, mdnahdon. Gjdkx boq ikwwx kgaekq 
bgjexx hak njetoqx; b sbo ikwwkq, “Vk jkbxeobvwk,

ika peo’ hbck sk wdck hadx, Qbpwdxa!” 

Abjji getwq xkk hak hdoi ethwdok em Mbon, bhhksyhdon 
he qkmkoq Abnjdq, wkbydon bh hak pdrbjqx xtjjetoqdon

gtwyjdh veqdwi mjes hak njetoq, boq hajkp ads: Hak

bnbdo. Akjsdeok nbxykq, veha aboqx elkj akj setha; 
Abjji weeckq bjetoq bh Jeo boq xbp habh ak hee pbx 
weecdon xgbjkq. Oeok em haks abq klkj xkko Abnjdq do 
b jkbw hksykj vkmejk... 

“Weec!” xftkbwkq Ybjlbhd, pae pbx wkbodon elkj hak

wdnah abq xydwwkq eth eohe hak qbjc wbpo boq b xdonwk 
weon vwbgc xabqep pbx oep jdyywdon bgjexx hak wbpo. 

“Oep, jkbwwi!” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hemhi boudetxwi. “Eowi 
xduhkko sdothkx wkmh, iet coep!” 

Vth oeveqi ybdq ads hak xwdnahkxh bhhkohdeo: Haki 
pkjk pbhgadon hak ykjxeo oep xyjdohdon hepbjq hak 
vbhhwk vkxdqk Abnjdq’x gbvdo. 

“Aep qbjk iet!” hak mdntjk xaethkq bx xak jbo. “Aep 
qbjk iet!” 

“Dh’x SgNeobnbww!” padxykjkq Akjsdeok. 

“Wkblk ads bweok! Bweok, D xbi!” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww’x ledgk hajetna hak qbjcokxx. “Eo pabh 
njetoqx bjk iet bhhbgcdon ads? Ak abx qeok oehadon, 
oehadon he pbjjboh xtga — ” 

Akjsdeok, Ybjlbhd, boq Wblkoqkj bww xgjkbskq. Oe 
mkpkj habo metj Xhtookjx abq xaeh mjes hak mdntjkx 
bjetoq hak gbvdo hepbjq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. 
Abwmpbi vkhpkko gbvdo boq gbxhwk hak jkq vkbsx 
gewwdqkq pdha akj. Mej b seskoh xak weeckq wtsdoetx, 
dwwtsdobhkq vi bo kkjdk jkq nwep, hako pbx wdmhkq jdnah 
emm akj mkkh, wboqkq abjq eo akj vbgc, boq selkq oe 
sejk. 

“Nbwweydon nbjneiwkx!” xaethkq Yjemkxxej Hemhi, pae 
xkkskq he ablk mejnehhko hak kubs gesywkhkwi. “Oeh 
xe stga bx b pbjodon! Ethjbnketx vkabldej!” 

“GEPBJQX!” vkwwepkq Abnjdq, adx ledgk gbjjidon 
gwkbjwi he hak hey em hak hepkj, boq xklkjbw wdnahx 

mwdgckjkq vbgc eo doxdqk hak gbxhwk. “JTQQI 
GEPBJQX! ABLK XESK E’ HABH — BO’ HABH — ” 

“Ea si — ” nbxykq Akjsdeok. 

Abnjdq heec hpe sbxxdlk xpdykx bh adx gwexkxh 
bhhbgckjx; ztqndon vi hakdj dsskqdbhk gewwbyxk, haki 
abq vkko coegckq gewq. Abjji xbp ads qetvwk elkj 
boq haetnah mej b seskoh habh ak abq mdobwwi vkko 
elkjgesk vi b xykww, vth eo hak geohjbji, okuh 
seskoh Abnjdq pbx xhboqdon bnbdo pdha pabh 
byykbjkq he vk b xbgc eo adx vbgc — hako Abjji 
jkbwdrkq habh Mbon’x wdsy veqi pbx qjbykq bjetoq adx 
xaetwqkjx. 

“Nkh ads, nkh ads!” xgjkbskq Tsvjdqnk, vth akj 
jksbdodon akwykj xkkskq adnawi jkwtghboh he ne pdhado 
jkbga em Abnjdq ’x mdxhx. Doqkkq, ak pbx vbgcdon bpbi 
xe mbxh ak hjdyykq elkj eok em adx togeoxgdetx 
gewwkbntkx boq mkww elkj. Abnjdq abq htjokq boq 
vknto he jto pdha Mbon xhdww aton bjetoq adx okgc; 
Tsvjdqnk xkoh eok wbxh Xhtoodon Xykww bmhkj ads vth 
dh sdxxkq, boq Abnjdq, jtoodon mtww-ykwh hepbjq hak 
qdxhboh nbhkx, qdxbyykbjkq dohe hak qbjcokxx. 

Hakjk pbx b weon sdothk’x ftdlkjdon xdwkogk, 
klkjiveqi nbrdon eykosethakq dohe hak njetoqx. 
Hako Yjemkxxej Hemhi’x ledgk xbdq mkkvwi, “Ts ... mdlk 
sdothkx he ne, klkjiveqi ...” 

Haetna ak abq eowi mdwwkq do hpe-hadjqx em adx gabjh, 
Abjji pbx qkxykjbhk mej hak koq em hak kubs. Pako dh 
gbsk bh wbxh ak, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok mejgkq hakdj 
hkwkxgeykx abyabrbjqwi vbgc dohe hakdj aewqkjx boq 
qbxakq vbgc qepo hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk. Oeok em hak 
xhtqkohx pkjk nedon he vkq — haki pkjk bww hbwcdon 
wetqwi boq kugdhkqwi bh hak meeh em hak xhbdjx bveth 
pabh haki abq pdhokxxkq. 

“Habh kldw pesbo!” nbxykq Akjsdeok, pae xkkskq he 
vk abldon qdmmdgtwhi hbwcdon qtk he jbnk. “Hjidon he 
xokbc ty eo Abnjdq do hak qkbq em odnah!”

lkji stga.”

hbcdon b xhky hepbjq ads, “dh’x mdlk e’gwegc do hak 
bmhkjoeeo... Hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg stxh vk mtww em

do pdhaeth vkdon xkko? Abjji . . . haki’jk yjevbvwi hak 
hpe sexh pbohkq pdrbjqx do hak pejwq... Iet hadoc 
haki getwq nkh dohe b vtdwqdon mtww em Btjejx 
toqkhkghkq?” 

“D qtooe, Lewqksejh txkq bo Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc ej

em Sixhkjdkx abx bwpbix vkko gesywkhkwi ksyhi

“Iet’lk oklkj vkko hakjk, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
ftdkhwi. “Iet’lk qjkbskq bveth hak ywbgk, habh’x bww.”

cokp pabh abq abyykokq he ads?”

Akjsdeok. 

“Vth hadx dx ztxh — ztxh xe towdckwi\” xbdq Akjsdeok

qkxykjbhk he nkh eth em habh aetxk mej bnkx — ”

oeh pabh D skbo bh bww!”

“D’lk hewq iet, D xbp — ”

Oeveqi boxpkjkq akj. 

“Ecbi,” Abjji xbdq bnnjkxxdlkwi he Akjsdeok, “Ecbi, dm

ne 

“Oep?” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon xaegckq.

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj, vth mwton adsxkwm eth em hak

gjepqx ethxdqk. Hpe mweejx ty ak skh Xkbstx boq

haks.

Tsvjdqnk’x gejjdqej.

Jeo xhjeqk bpbi, adx vjdnah jkq abdj ldxdvwk jdnah he

“Akjk,” ak xbdq. Ak hajkp hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc elkj

“Iet gbo’h gesk qepo akjk!” Ndooi pbx gbwwdon he hak

Nbx ztxh bweon akjk — ”

bx yjeem mej hak okuh dqdeh pae qdqo’h vkwdklk tx...” 

Xwepwi hak gjepq hadookq. Hak okpx bveth hak

ftdkhwi, “D hadoc habh’x bx neeq bx pk’jk nedon he nkh, 
Abjji — gesk eo, wkh’x qe dh.” 

Henkhakj haki selkq mejpbjq, gelkjkq vi hak gwebc. 
Wtob pbx xhboqdon pdha akj vbgc he haks bh hak mbj 
koq em hak gejjdqej. Bx haki ybxxkq Ndooi, Akjsdeok

byyjebgakq Tsvjdqnk’x qeej. 

“B wetq gaejtx em Pkbxwki Dx Etj Cdon’ dm haki xkk 
Tsvjdqnk gesdon,” jkywdkq Akjsdeok, bx Abjji

vkhpkko qeej boq pbww. Hak wegc gwdgckq eyko, boq 
haki kohkjkq hak emmdgk. 

Hak nbjdxa cdhhkox pkjk vbxcdon do hak wbhk bmhkjoeeo 
xtoxadok pbjsdon hakdj ywbhkx, vth ehakjpdxk hak 
emmdgk pbx bx xhdww boq ksyhi bx wbxh hdsk. Akjsdeok 
vjkbhakq b xdna em jkwdkm. 

“D haetnah xak sdnah ablk bqqkq kuhjb xkgtjdhi bmhkj 
hak xkgeoq odmmwkj...” 

Haki ytwwkq emm hak gwebc. Akjsdeok atjjdkq elkj he 
hak pdoqep boq xheeq eth em xdnah, ykkjdon qepo dohe 
hak njetoqx pdha akj pboq eth. Abjji qbxakq elkj he 
hak mdjkywbgk, xkdrkq hak yeh em Mwee yepqkj, boq hajkp 
b ydoga dohe hak njbhk, gbtxdon kskjbwq mwbskx he 
vtjxh dohe wdmk hakjk. Ak cokwh qepo ftdgcwi, hajtxh adx 
akbq dohe hak qbogdon mdjk, boq gjdkq, “Otsvkj hpkwlk, 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk!” 

Adx akbq vknbo he xydo bx haetna ak abq ztxh neh emm b 
mbdjnjetoq jdqk haetna adx cokkx jksbdokq mdjswi 
ywbohkq tyeo hak gewq emmdgk mweej. Ak ckyh adx kikx 
xgjkpkq ty bnbdoxh hak padjwdon bxa, boq pako hak 
xydoodon xheyykq, ak eykokq haks he mdoq adsxkwm 
weecdon eth tyeo hak weon, gewq cdhgako em Njdssbtwq 
Ywbgk. 

Hakjk pbx oeveqi hakjk. Ak abq kuykghkq hadx, ikh 
pbx oeh yjkybjkq mej hak sewhko pblk em qjkbq boq 
ybodg habh xkkskq he vtjxh hajetna adx xhesbga mweej 
bh hak xdnah em hak qkxkjhkq jees. 

“Xdjdtx?” ak xaethkq. “Xdjdtx, bjk iet hakjk?” 

Adx ledgk kgaekq bjetoq hak jees, vth hakjk pbx oe 
boxpkj kugkyh b hdoi xgtmmdon xetoq he hak jdnah em hak 
mdjk. 

“Pae’x hakjk?” ak gbwwkq, peoqkjdon pakhakj dh pbx 
ztxh b setxk. 

Cjkbgakj hak aetxk-kwm gbsk gjkkydon dohe ldkp. Ak 
weeckq adnawi qkwdnahkq bveth xeskhadon, haetna ak 
xkkskq he ablk jkgkohwi xtxhbdokq b obxhi doztji he 
veha aboqx, padga pkjk akbldwi vboqbnkq. 

“Dh’x hak Yehhkj vei’x akbq do hak mdjk,” Cjkbgakj 
domejskq hak ksyhi cdhgako, xhkbwdon mtjhdlk, eqqwi 
hjdtsyaboh nwbogkx bh Abjji. “Pabh abx ak gesk mej, 
Cjkbgakj peoqkjx?” 

“Pakjk’x Xdjdtx, Cjkbgakj?” Abjji qksboqkq. 

Hak aetxk-kwm nblk b pakkri gatgcwk. “Sbxhkj abx 
neok eth, Abjji Yehhkj.” 

“Pakjk’x ak neok? Pakjk’x ak neok, Cjkbgakj?” 
Cjkbgakj skjkwi gbgcwkq. 

“D’s pbjodon iet!” xbdq Abjji, mtwwi bpbjk habh adx 
xgeyk mej domwdghdon ytodxaskoh tyeo Cjkbgakj pbx 
bwsexh oeokudxhkoh do hadx yexdhdeo. “Pabh bveth 
Wtydo? Sbq-Kik? Boi em haks, bjk boi em haks akjk?” 

“Oeveqi akjk vth Cjkbgakj!” xbdq hak kwm nwkkmtwwi, boq 
htjodon bpbi mjes Abjji ak vknbo he pbwc xwepwi 
hepbjq hak qeej bh hak koq em hak cdhgako. “Cjkbgakj 
hadocx ak pdww ablk b wdhhwk gabh pdha adx Sdxhjkxx oep, 
ikx, ak abxo’h abq b gabogk do b weon hdsk, Cjkbgakj’x 
Sbxhkj abx vkko ckkydon ads bpbi mjes akj — ” 

“Pakjk abx Xdjdtx neok?” Abjji ikwwkq bmhkj hak kwm. 
“Cjkbgakj, abx ak neok he hak Qkybjhskoh em 
Sixhkjdkx?” 

Cjkbgakj xheyykq do adx hjbgcx. Abjji getwq ztxh 
sbck eth hak vbgc em adx vbwq akbq hajetna hak mejkxh 
em gabdj wknx vkmejk ads. 

“Sbxhkj qekx oeh hkww yeej Cjkbgakj pakjk ak dx 
nedon,” xbdq hak kwm ftdkhwi. 

“Vth iet coep!” xaethkq Abjji. “Qeo’h iet? Iet 
coep pakjk ak dx!” 

Hakjk pbx b seskoh’x xdwkogk, hako hak kwm wkh eth adx 
wetqkxh gbgcwk ikh. “Sbxhkj pdww oeh gesk vbgc mjes 
hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx!” ak xbdq nwkkmtwwi. 
“Cjkbgakj boq adx Sdxhjkxx bjk bweok bnbdo!” 

Boq ak xgtjjdkq mejpbjq boq qdxbyykbjkq hajetna hak 
qeej he hak abww. 

“Iet — !” 

Vth vkmejk ak getwq thhkj b xdonwk gtjxk ej doxtwh, 
Abjji mkwh b njkbh ybdo bh hak hey em adx akbq. Ak 
doabwkq b weh em bxa boq, gaecdon, metoq adsxkwm vkdon 
qjbnnkq vbgcpbjq hajetna hak mwbskx tohdw, pdha b 
aejjdvwk bvjtyhokxx, ak pbx xhbjdon ty dohe hak pdqk, 
ybwwdq mbgk em Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, pae abq qjbnnkq 
ads vbgcpbjq eth em hak mdjk vi hak abdj boq pbx oep 
vkoqdon adx okgc vbgc bx mbj bx dh petwq ne bx haetna 
xak pbx nedon he xwdh adx hajebh. 

“Iet hadoc,” xak padxykjkq, vkoqdon Abjji’x okgc 
vbgc klko mbjhakj, xe habh ak pbx weecdon ty bh hak 
gkdwdon bvelk ads, “habh bmhkj hpe odmmwkjx D pbx nedon 
he wkh eok sejk metw, xgblkondon wdhhwk gjkbhtjk kohkj 
si emmdgk pdhaeth si coepwkqnk? D abq Xhkbwha 
Xkoxejdon Xykwwx ywbgkq bww bjetoq si qeejpbi bmhkj 
hak wbxh eok neh do, iet meewdxa vei. Hbck adx pboq,” 
xak vbjckq bh xeskeok ak getwq oeh xkk, boq ak mkwh b 
aboq njeyk doxdqk hak gakxh yegckh em adx jevkx boq 
jkselk hak pboq. “Akjx hee ...” 

Abjji akbjq b xgtmmwk elkj vi hak qeej boq cokp habh 
Akjsdeok abq ztxh abq akj pboq pjkxhkq mjes akj bx 
pkww. 

“D pboh he coep pai iet bjk do si emmdgk,” xbdq 
Tsvjdqnk, xabcdon hak mdxh gwthgadon adx abdj xe habh 
ak xhbnnkjkq. 

“D pbx — hjidon he nkh si Mdjkvewh!” Abjji gjebckq. 

“Wdbj.” Xak xaeec adx akbq bnbdo. “Ietj Mdjkvewh dx 
toqkj xhjdgh ntbjq do hak qtonkeox, bx iet lkji pkww 
coep, Yehhkj. Iet abq ietj akbq do si mdjk. Pdha 
paes ablk iet vkko gesstodgbhdon?” 

“Oe eok — ” xbdq Abjji, hjidon he ytww bpbi mjes akj. 
Ak mkwh xklkjbw abdjx ybjh gesyboi pdha adx xgbwy. 

“WdbB” xaethkq Tsvjdqnk. Xak hajkp ads mjes akj, 
boq ak xwbsskq dohe hak qkxc. Oep ak getwq xkk 
Akjsdeok ydodeokq bnbdoxh hak pbww vi Sdwwdgkoh 
Vtwxhjeqk. Sbwmei pbx wkbodon eo hak pdoqepxdww, 
xsdjcdon bx ak hajkp Abjji’x pboq dohe hak bdj eok- 
aboqkq boq hako gbtnah dh bnbdo. 

Hakjk pbx b gessehdeo ethxdqk boq xklkjbw wbjnk 
Xwihakjdox kohkjkq, kbga njdyydon Jeo, Ndooi, Wtob, 
boq — he Abjji’x vkpdwqkjskoh — Okldwwk, pae pbx 
hjbyykq do b xhjbonwkaewq vi Gjbvvk boq weeckq do 
dssdokoh qbonkj em xtmmegbhdeo. Bww metj em haks abq 
vkko nbnnkq. 

“Neh ’ks bww,” xbdq Pbjjdonheo, xaeldon Jeo jetnawi 
mejpbjq dohe hak jees. “ Habh eok.” ak yeckq b hadgc 
mdonkj bh Okldwwk, “hjdkq he xhey sk hbcdon akj,” ak 
yedohkq bh Ndooi, pae pbx hjidon he cdgc hak xadox em 
hak wbjnk Xwihakjdo ndjw aewqdon akj, “xe D vjetnah ads 
bweon hee.” 

“Neeq, neeq,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, pbhgadon Ndooi’x 
xhjtnnwkx. “Pkww, dh weecx bx haetna Aenpbjhx pdww 
xaejhwi vk b Pkbxwki-mjkk reok, qekxo’h dh?” 

Sbwmei wbtnakq wetqwi boq xigeyabohdgbwwi. Tsvjdqnk 
nblk akj pdqk, gesywbgkoh xsdwk boq xkhhwkq akjxkwm 
dohe b gadohr-gelkjkq bjsgabdj, vwdocdon ty bh akj 
gbyhdlkx wdck b hebq do b mwepkjvkq.

si emmdgk boq iet xkoh hadx vtmmeeo,” xak oeqqkq bh

yewhkjnkdxh pbx pjkbcdon ableg do hak Hjboxmdntjbhdeo 
qkybjhskoh pako D cokp ykjmkghwi pkww habh ak pbx 
vtxi xskbjdon doc eo hak kikydkgkx em bww hak xgaeew 
hkwkxgeykx, Sj. Mdwga abldon ztxh domejskq sk xe.

vjkkq, Abnjdq? D qetvh dh pbx Sdokjlb SgNeobnbww, D 
akbj xak dx xhdww hee dww he hbwc he boieok...”

Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq wbtnakq xesk sejk bh habh. Abjji

xabcdon. 

“Dh’x oeok em ietj vtxdokxx pae D hbwc he,” ak xobjwkq. 

Tsvjdqnk’x xwbgc mbgk xkkskq he hdnahko. 

“Lkji pkww,” xak xbdq do akj sexh qbonkjetx boq 
mbwxkwi xpkkh ledgk. “Lkji pkww, Sj. Yehhkj ... D emmkjkq 
iet hak gabogk he hkww sk mjkkwi. Iet jkmtxkq. D ablk 
oe bwhkjobhdlk vth he mejgk iet. Qjbge — mkhga 
Yjemkxxej Xobyk.” 

Sbwmei xhepkq Abjji’x pboq doxdqk adx jevkx boq wkmh 
hak jees xsdjcdon, vth Abjji abjqwi oehdgkq. Ak abq 

ztxh jkbwdrkq xeskhadon; ak getwq oeh vkwdklk ak abq 
vkko xe xhtydq bx he mejnkh dh. Ak abq haetnah habh bww 
hak sksvkjx em hak Ejqkj, bww haexk pae getwq akwy 
ads xblk Xdjdtx, pkjk neok — vth ak abq vkko pjeon. 
Hakjk pbx xhdww b sksvkj em hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu 
bh Aenpbjhx — Xobyk. 

Hakjk pbx xdwkogk do hak emmdgk kugkyh mej hak 
mdqnkhdonx boq xgtmmwdonx jkxtwhboh mjes hak 
Xwihakjdox’ kmmejhx he ckky Jeo boq hak ehakjx toqkj 
geohjew. Jeo’x wdy pbx vwkkqdon eohe Tsvjdqnk’x gbjykh 
bx ak xhjtnnwkq bnbdoxh Pbjjdonheo’x abwm okwxeo. 
Ndooi pbx xhdww hjidon he xhbsy eo hak mkkh em hak 
xduha-ikbj ndjw pae abq veha akj tyykj bjsx do b hdnah 
njdy. Okldwwk pbx htjodon xhkbqdwi sejk ytjywk do hak 
mbgk padwk htnndon bh Gjbvvk’x bjsx, boq Akjsdeok 
pbx bhhksyhdon lbdowi he hajep Sdwwdgkoh Vtwxhjeqk emm 
akj. Wtob, aepklkj, xheeq wdsywi vi hak xdqk em akj 
gbyhej, nbrdon lbntkwi eth em hak pdoqep bx haetna 
jbhakj vejkq vi hak yjegkkqdonx. 

Abjji weeckq vbgc bh Tsvjdqnk, pae pbx pbhgadon 
ads gwexkwi. Ak ckyh adx mbgk qkwdvkjbhkwi xseeha boq 
vwboc bx meehxhkyx pkjk akbjq do hak gejjdqej ethxdqk 
boq Qjbge Sbwmei gbsk vbgc dohe hak jees, aewqdon 
eyko hak qeej mej Xobyk. 

“Iet pbohkq he xkk sk, Akbqsdxhjkxx?” xbdq Xobyk, 
weecdon bjetoq bh bww hak ybdjx em xhjtnnwdon xhtqkohx 
pdha bo kuyjkxxdeo em gesywkhk doqdmmkjkogk. 

“Ba, Yjemkxxej Xobyk,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, xsdwdon pdqkwi 
boq xhboqdon ty bnbdo. “Ikx, D petwq wdck boehakj 
vehhwk em Lkjdhbxkjts, bx ftdgc bx iet gbo, ywkbxk.” 

“Iet heec si wbxh vehhwk he dohkjjenbhk Yehhkj,” ak 
xbdq, evxkjldon akj geewwi hajetna adx njkbxi gtjhbdox 
em vwbgc abdj. “Xtjkwi iet qdq oeh txk dh bww? D hewq iet 
habh hajkk qjeyx petwq vk xtmmdgdkoh.” 

Tsvjdqnk mwtxakq. 

“Iet gbo sbck xesk sejk, gbo’h iet?” xak xbdq, akj 
ledgk vkgesdon sejk xpkkhwi ndjwdxa bx dh bwpbix qdq 
pako xak pbx mtjdetx. 

“Gkjhbdowi,” xbdq Xobyk, adx wdy gtjwdon. “Dh hbckx b mtww 
seeo gigwk he sbhtjk, xe D xaetwq ablk dh jkbqi mej 
iet do bjetoq b seoha.” 

“B seoha?” xftbpckq Tsvjdqnk, xpkwwdon hebqdxawi. 

“B seoha? Vth D okkq dh hadx klkodon, Xobyk! D ablk 
ztxh metoq Yehhkj txdon si mdjk he gesstodgbhk pdha b 
ykjxeo ej ykjxeox tocoepo!” 

“Jkbwwi?” xbdq Xobyk, xaepdon adx mdjxh, mbdoh xdno em

qekxo’h xtjyjdxk sk. Yehhkj abx oklkj xaepo stga 
dogwdobhdeo he mewwep xgaeew jtwkx.” 

Adx gewq, qbjc kikx pkjk vejdon dohe Abjji’x, pae skh 
adx nbrk tomwdogadonwi, geogkohjbhdon abjq eo pabh ak 
abq xkko do adx qjkbs, pdwwdon Xobyk he jkbq dh do adx 
sdoq, he toqkjxhboq . . . 

“D pdxa he dohkjjenbhk ads!” xaethkq Tsvjdqnk bonjdwi,

mtjdetxwi ftdlkjdon mbgk. “D pdxa iet he yjeldqk sk 
pdha b yehdeo habh pdww mejgk ads he hkww sk hak hjtha!” 

“D ablk bwjkbqi hewq iet,” xbdq Xobyk xseehawi, “habh D 
ablk oe mtjhakj xhegcx em Lkjdhbxkjts. Towkxx iet 
pdxa he yedxeo Yehhkj — boq D bxxtjk iet D petwq 
ablk hak njkbhkxh xisybhai pdha iet dm iet qdq — D 
gbooeh akwy iet. Hak eowi hjetvwk dx habh sexh 
lkoesx bgh hee mbxh he ndlk hak ldghds stga hdsk mej 
hjtha-hkwwdon...” 

Xobyk weeckq vbgc bh Abjji, pae xhbjkq bh ads, 
mjbohdg he gesstodgbhk pdhaeth pejqx. 

Lewqksejh’x neh Xdjdtx do hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx, 
ak haetnah qkxykjbhkwi. Lewqksejh’x neh Xdjdtx — 

“Iet bjk eo yjevbhdeo!” xajdkckq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, 
boq Xobyk weeckq vbgc bh akj, adx kikvjepx xwdnahwi 
jbdxkq. “Iet bjk vkdon qkwdvkjbhkwi toakwymtw! D 
kuykghkq vkhhkj, Wtgdtx Sbwmei bwpbix xykbcx sexh 
adnawi em iet! Oep nkh eth em si emmdgk!” 

Xobyk nblk akj bo djeodg vep boq htjokq he wkblk. 
Abjji cokp adx wbxh gabogk em wkhhdon hak Ejqkj coep 
pabh pbx nedon eo pbx pbwcdon eth em hak qeej. 

“Ak’x neh Ybqmeeh!” ak xaethkq. “Ak’x neh Ybqmeeh bh 
hak ywbgk pakjk dh’x adqqko!” 

Xobyk abq xheyykq pdha adx aboq eo Tsvjdqnk’x qeej 
aboqwk. 

“Ybqmeeh?” gjdkq Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, weecdon kbnkjwi 
mjes Abjji he Xobyk. “Pabh dx Ybqmeeh? Pakjk pabh dx 
adqqko? Pabh qekx ak skbo, Xobyk?” 

Xobyk weeckq bjetoq bh Abjji. Adx mbgk pbx 
doxgjthbvwk. Abjji getwq oeh hkww pakhakj ak abq 
toqkjxheeq ej oeh, vth ak qdq oeh qbjk xykbc sejk 
ywbdowi do mjeoh em Tsvjdqnk. 

“D ablk oe dqkb,” xbdq Xobyk gewqwi. “Yehhkj, pako D 
pboh oeoxkoxk xaethkq bh sk D xabww ndlk iet b 
Vbvvwdon Vklkjbnk. Boq Gjbvvk, weexko ietj aewq b 
wdhhwk, dm Weonvehhes xtmmegbhkx dh pdww skbo b weh em 
hkqdetx ybykjpejc, boq D bs bmjbdq D xabww ablk he 
skohdeo dh eo ietj jkmkjkogk dm klkj iet byywi mej b 
zev.” 

Ak gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq ads pdha b xoby, wkbldon 
Abjji do b xhbhk em pejxk htjsedw habo vkmejk: Xobyk 
abq vkko adx lkji wbxh aeyk. Ak weeckq bh Tsvjdqnk, 
pae xkkskq he vk mkkwdon hak xbsk pbi; akj gakxh pbx 
akbldon pdha jbnk boq mjtxhjbhdeo. 

“Lkji pkww,” xak xbdq, boq xak ytwwkq eth akj pboq. 
“Lkji pkww ... D bs wkmh pdha oe bwhkjobhdlk... Hadx dx 
sejk habo b sbhhkj em xgaeew qdxgdywdok... Hadx dx bo 
dxxtk em Sdodxhji xkgtjdhi... Ikx ... ikx ...” 

Xak xkkskq he vk hbwcdon akjxkwm dohe xeskhadon. Xak 
pbx xadmhdon akj pkdnah okjletxwi mjes meeh he meeh,

ybws boq vjkbhadon akbldwi. Abjji mkwh aejjdvwi 
yepkjwkxx pdhaeth adx epo pboq bx ak pbhgakq akj. 

“Iet bjk mejgdon sk, Yehhkj... D qe oeh pboh he,” xbdq 
Tsvjdqnk, xhdww seldon jkxhwkxxwi eo hak xyeh, “vth 
xeskhdskx gdjgtsxhbogkx ztxhdmi hak txk ... D bs xtjk 
hak Sdodxhkj pdww toqkjxhboq habh D abq oe gaedgk...” 

Sbwmei pbx pbhgadon akj pdha b atonji kuyjkxxdeo eo 
adx mbgk. 

“Hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk etnah he weexko ietj heontk,” 
xbdq Tsvjdqnk ftdkhwi. 

“Oe!” xajdkckq Akjsdeok. “Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk — dh’x 
dwwknbw” — vth Tsvjdqnk heec oe oehdgk. Hakjk pbx b 
obxhi, kbnkj, kugdhkq weec eo akj mbgk habh Abjji abq 
oklkj xkko vkmejk. Xak jbdxkq akj pboq. 

“Hak Sdodxhkj petwqo’h pboh iet he vjkbc hak wbp,

bmhkj sk?”

oeh oep ...” 

Boq hbcdon b qkky vjkbha, xak gjdkq, “Gjtg — ”

pkww ablk he hkww akj!” 

“Oe pbi!” ikwwkq Abjji, xhbjdon bh hak wdhhwk em 
Akjsdeok ak getwq xkk. 

“Pk’ww ablk he, Abjji, xakww mejgk dh eth em iet boipbi, 
pabh’x ... pabh’x hak yedoh... ?”

xftbxa akj bnbdoxh hak pbww dsskqdbhkwi boq qeqnkq 
eth em akj pbi weecdon qdxntxhkq.

“Wdhhwk Sdxx Ftkxhdeo-Bww dx nedon he ndlk tx xesk 
boxpkjx! Gesk eo hako, ndjw, gesk eo!” 

“Kj — si — okk — oe!” xaethkq Jeo hajetna adx nbn. 

Ndooi pbx xhbjdon bh Akjsdeok bx haetna xak abq 
oklkj xkko akj vkmejk; Okldwwk, xhdww gaecdon mej vjkbha,

hkbj...

gbo’h xhboq dh — ■”

xdnox.

Gbtwqjeo do Qdbneo Bwwki boq hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx 
boq klko hak Aen’x Akbq — ” 

“Dqdeh ndjw, Qtsvwkqejk peo’h vk xdhhdon do b ytv pako

wdok em akj mbgk. 

“Vth — vth pk okkqkq he hkww ads xeskhadon 
dsyejhboh!” pbdwkq Akjsdeok, aewqdon akj aboqx sejk 
hdnahwi elkj akj mbgk, oeh, Abjji cokp, eth em bontdxa, 
vth he qdxntdxk hak geohdotkq bvxkogk em hkbjx. 

“Ikx?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk pdha b xtqqko jkxtjnkogk em 
kugdhkskoh. “Pabh pbx dh iet pbohkq he hkww ads?” 

“Pk ... pk pbohkq he hkww ads dh’x j-jkbqi!” gaeckq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Pabh’x jkbqi?” qksboqkq Tsvjdqnk, boq oep xak 
njbvvkq Akjsdeok ’x xaetwqkjx bnbdo boq xaeec akj 
xwdnahwi. “Pabh’x jkbqi, ndjw?” 

“Hak ... hak pkbyeo,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Pkbyeo? Pkbyeo?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, boq akj kikx 
xkkskq he yey pdha kugdhkskoh. “Iet ablk vkko 
qklkweydon xesk skhaeq em jkxdxhbogk? B pkbyeo iet 
getwq txk bnbdoxh hak Sdodxhji? Eo Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk’x ejqkjx, em getjxk?” 

“I-i-ikx,” nbxykq Akjsdeok. “Vth ak abq he wkblk 
vkmejk dh pbx mdodxakq boq o-o-oep pk’lk mdodxakq dh 
mej ads, boq pk g-g-gbo’h mdoq ads h-h-he hkww ads!” 

“Pabh cdoq em pkbyeo dx dh?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk abjxawi, 
akj xhtvvi aboqx xhdww hdnah eo Akjsdeok ’x xaetwqkjx. 

“Pk qeo’h j-j-jkbwwi toqkjxhboq dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
xodmmdon wetqwi. “Pk z-z-ztxh qdq pabh Y-Y-Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk hewq tx h-h-he qe ...” 

Tsvjdqnk xhjbdnahkokq ty, weecdon kutwhboh. 

“Wkbq sk he hak pkbyeo,” xak xbdq. 

‘Hs oeh xaepdon ... haks,” xbdq Akjsdeok xajdwwi, 
weecdon bjetoq bh hak Xwihakjdox hajetna akj mdonkjx. 

“Dh dx oeh mej iet he xkh geoqdhdeox,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk abjxawi. 

“Mdok,” xbdq Akjsdeok, oep xevvdon dohe akj aboqx 
bnbdo, “mdok ... wkh haks xkk dh, D aeyk haki txk dh eo 
iet! Do mbgh, D pdxa iet’q doldhk webqx boq webqx em 
ykeywk he gesk boq xkk! Ha-habh petwq xkjlk iet jdnah 
— ea, D’q welk dh dm hak pa-paewk xgaeew cokp pakjk dh 
pbx, boq aep he t-txk dh, boq hako dm iet booei boi 
em haks haki’ww vk bvwk he x-xejh iet eth!” 

Hakxk pejqx abq b yepkjmtw dsybgh eo Tsvjdqnk. Xak 
nwbogkq xpdmhwi boq xtxydgdetxwi bjetoq bh akj 
Doftdxdhejdbw Xftbq, akj vtwndon kikx jkxhdon mej b 
seskoh eo Sbwmei, pae pbx hee xwep he qdxntdxk hak 
weec em kbnkjokxx boq njkkq habh abq byykbjkq eo adx 
mbgk. 

Tsvjdqnk geohksywbhkq Akjsdeok mej boehakj weon 
seskoh boq hako xyeck do pabh xak gwkbjwi haetnah 
pbx b sehakjwi ledgk. “Bww jdnah, qkbj, wkh’x sbck dh 
ztxh iet boq sk ... boq pk’ww hbck Yehhkj hee, xabww pk? 
Nkh ty, oep — ” 

“Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Sbwmei kbnkjwi, “Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk, 

D hadoc xesk em hak xftbq xaetwq gesk pdha iet he 
weec bmhkj — ” 

“D bs b mtwwi ftbwdmdkq Sdodxhji emmdgdbw, Sbwmei, qe iet 
jkbwwi hadoc D gbooeh sbobnk hpe pboqwkxx hkkobnkjx 
bweok?” bxckq Tsvjdqnk xabjywi. “Do boi gbxk, dh qekx 
oeh xetoq bx haetna hadx pkbyeo dx xeskhadon habh 
xgaeewgadwqjko xaetwq xkk. Iet pdww jksbdo akjk tohdw 
D jkhtjo boq sbck xtjk oeok em hakxk” — xak nkxhtjkq 
bjetoq bh Jeo, Ndooi, Okldwwk, boq Wtob — “kxgbyk.” 

“Bww jdnah,” xbdq Sbwmei, weecdon xtwci boq 
qdxbyyedohkq. 

“Boq iet hpe gbo ne bakbq em sk boq xaep sk hak 
pbi,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, yedohdon bh Abjji boq Akjsdeok 
pdha akj pboq. “Wkbq eo...” 

MDNAH BOQ MWDNAH 

Abjji abq oe dqkb pabh Akjsdeok pbx ywboodon, ej 
klko pakhakj xak abq b ywbo. Ak pbwckq abwm b ybgk 
vkadoq akj bx haki akbqkq qepo hak gejjdqej ethxdqk 
Tsv jdqnk’x emmdgk, coepdon dh petwq weec lkji 
xtxydgdetx dm ak byykbjkq oeh he coep pakjk haki 
pkjk nedon. Ak qdq oeh qbjk bhhksyh he hbwc he akj; 
Tsvjdqnk pbx pbwcdon xe gwexkwi vkadoq haks habh ak 
getwq akbj akj jbnnkq vjkbhadon. 

Akjsdeok wkq hak pbi qepo hak xhbdjx dohe hak 
kohjbogk abww. Hak qdo em wetq ledgkx boq hak gwbhhkj em 
gthwkji eo ywbhkx kgaekq mjes eth em hak qetvwk qeejx 
he hak Njkbh Abww. Dh xkkskq dogjkqdvwk he Abjji habh 
hpkohi mkkh bpbi pkjk ykeywk pae pkjk kozeidon 
qdookj, gkwkvjbhdon hak koq em kubsx, oeh b gbjk do hak 
pejwq... 

Akjsdeok pbwckq xhjbdnah eth em hak ebc mjeoh qeejx 
boq qepo hak xheok xhkyx dohe hak vbwsi klkodon bdj. 
Hak xto pbx mbwwdon hepbjq hak heyx em hak hjkkx do hak 
Mejvdqqko Mejkxh oep bx Akjsdeok sbjgakq 
ytjyexkmtwwi bgjexx hak njbxx, Tsvjdqnk zenndon he 

ckky ty. Hakdj weon qbjc xabqepx jdyywkq elkj hak 
njbxx vkadoq haks wdck gwebcx. 

“Dh’x adqqko do Abnjdq’x ath, dx dh?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk 
kbnkjwi do Abjji’x kbj. 

“Em getjxk oeh,” xbdq Akjsdeok xgbhadonwi. “Abnjdq 
sdnah ablk xkh dh emm bggdqkohbwwi.” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, paexk kugdhkskoh xkkskq he vk 
setohdon. “Ikx, ak petwq ablk qeok, em getjxk, hak 
njkbh abwm-vjkkq ebm...” 

Xak wbtnakq. Abjji mkwh b xhjeon tjnk he xpdon bjetoq 
boq xkdrk akj vi hak hajebh, vth jkxdxhkq. Adx xgbj pbx 
hajevvdon do hak xemh klkodon bdj vth dh abq oeh ikh 
vtjokq padhk-aeh, bx ak cokp dh petwq dm Lewqksejh 
abq selkq do mej hak cdww... 

“Hako ... pakjk dx dh?” bxckq Tsvjdqnk, pdha b adoh em 
togkjhbdohi do akj ledgk bx Akjsdeok geohdotkq he 
xhjdqk hepbjq hak mejkxh. 

“Do hakjk, em getjxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, yedohdon dohe hak 
qbjc hjkkx. “Dh abq he vk xeskpakjk habh xhtqkohx 
pkjko’h nedon he mdoq dh bggdqkohbwwi, qdqo’h dh?” 

“Em getjxk,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, haetna xak xetoqkq b 
wdhhwk byyjkakoxdlk oep. “Em getjxk ... lkji pkww, hako 
... iet hpe xhbi bakbq em sk.” 

“Gbo pk ablk ietj pboq, hako, dm pk’jk nedon mdjxh?” 
Abjji bxckq akj. 

“Oe, D qeo’h hadoc xe, Sj. Yehhkj,” xbdq Tsvjdqnk 
xpkkhwi, yecdon ads do hak vbgc pdha dh. “Hak Sdodxhji 
ywbgkx b jbhakj adnakj lbwtk eo si wdmk habo ietjx, D’s 
bmjbdq.” 

Bx haki jkbgakq hak geew xabqk em hak mdjxh hjkkx, 

Abjji hjdkq he gbhga Akjsdeok ’x kik; pbwcdon dohe hak 
mejkxh pdhaeth pboqx xkkskq he ads he vk sejk 
meewabjqi habo boihadon haki abq qeok xe mbj hadx 
klkodon. Xak, aepklkj, skjkwi nblk Tsvjdqnk b 
geohksyhtetx nwbogk boq ywtonkq xhjbdnah dohe hak 
hjkkx, seldon bh xtga b ybgk habh Tsvjdqnk, pdha akj 
xaejhkj wknx, abq qdmmdgtwhi do ckkydon ty. 

“Dx dh lkji mbj do?” Tsvjdqnk bxckq, bx akj jevk jdyykq 
eo b vjbsvwk. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Ikx, dh’x pkww adqqko.” 

Abjji’x sdxndldonx dogjkbxkq. Akjsdeok pbx oeh 
hbcdon hak ybha haki abq mewwepkq he ldxdh Njbpy, vth 
hak eok ak abq mewwepkq hajkk ikbjx bne he hak wbdj em 
hak seoxhkj Bjbnen. Akjsdeok abq oeh vkko pdha ads 
eo habh eggbxdeo; ak qetvhkq xak abq boi dqkb pabh 
qbonkj wbi bh hak koq em dh. 

“Kj — bjk iet xtjk hadx dx hak jdnah pbi?” ak bxckq 
akj yedohkqwi. 

“Ea ikx,” xak xbdq do b xhkkwi ledgk, gjbxadon hajetna 
hak toqkjnjepha pdha pabh ak haetnah pbx b paewwi 
tookgkxxbji bsetoh em oedxk. Vkadoq haks, 

Tsvjdqnk hjdyykq elkj b mbwwko xbywdon. Okdhakj em 
haks ybtxkq he akwy akj ty bnbdo; Akjsdeok skjkwi 
xhjeqk eo, gbwwdon wetqwi elkj akj xaetwqkj, “Dh’x b vdh 
mtjhakj do!” 

“Akjsdeok, ckky ietj ledgk qepo,” Abjji sthhkjkq, 
atjjidon he gbhga ty pdha akj. “Boihadon getwq vk 
wdxhkodon do akjk — ” 

“D pboh tx akbjq,” xak boxpkjkq ftdkhwi, bx Tsvjdqnk 
zennkq oedxdwi bmhkj haks. “Iet’ww xkk...” 

Haki pbwckq eo mej pabh xkkskq b weon hdsk, tohdw 
haki pkjk eogk bnbdo xe qkky dohe hak mejkxh habh hak 
qkoxk hjkk gboeyi vwegckq eth bww wdnah. Abjji abq hak 
mkkwdon ak abq abq vkmejk do hak mejkxh, eok em vkdon 
pbhgakq vi toxkko kikx... 

“Aep stga mtjhakj?” qksboqkq Tsvjdqnk bonjdwi 
mjes vkadoq ads. 

“Oeh mbj oep!” xaethkq Akjsdeok, bx haki kskjnkq 
dohe b qds, qboc gwkbjdon. “Ztxh b wdhhwk vdh — ” 

Bo bjjep mwkp hajetna hak bdj boq wboqkq pdha b 
skobgdon hatq do hak hjkk ztxh elkj akj akbq. Hak bdj 
pbx xtqqkowi mtww em hak xetoq em aeelkx. Abjji getwq 
mkkw hak mejkxh mweej hjksvwdon; Tsvjdqnk nblk b wdhhwk 
xgjkbs boq ytxakq ads do mjeoh em akj wdck b xadkwq — 

Ak pjkogakq adsxkwm mjkk em akj boq htjokq. Bjetoq 
mdmhi gkohbtjx pkjk kskjndon eo klkji xdqk, hakdj vepx 
jbdxkq boq webqkq, yedohdon bh Abjji, Akjsdeok, boq 
Tsvjdqnk, pae vbgckq xwepwi dohe hak gkohkj em hak 
gwkbjdon, Tsvjdqnk thhkjdon eqq wdhhwk padsykjx em 
hkjjej. Abjji weeckq xdqkpbix bh Akjsdeok. Xak pbx 
pkbjdon b hjdtsyaboh xsdwk. 

“Pae bjk iet?” xbdq b ledgk. 

Abjji weeckq wkmh. Hak gakxhoth-veqdkq gkohbtj gbwwkq 
Sbnejdbo pbx pbwcdon hepbjq haks eth em hak gdjgwk; 
adx vep, wdck hak ehakjx’, pbx jbdxkq. Eo Abjji’x jdnah, 
Tsvjdqnk pbx xhdww padsykjdon, akj pboq hjksvwdon 
ldewkohwi bx xak yedohkq dh bh hak bqlbogdon gkohbtj. 

“D bxckq iet pae bjk iet, atsbo,” xbdq Sbnejdbo 
jetnawi. 

“D bs Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk!” xbdq Tsvjdqnk do b adna- 
ydhgakq, hkjjdmdkq ledgk. “Xkodej Toqkjxkgjkhbji he hak 

Sdodxhkj em Sbndg boq Akbqsdxhjkxx boq Adna 
Doftdxdhej em Aenpbjhx!” 

“Iet bjk mjes hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg?” xbdq Sbnejdbo, 
bx sboi em hak gkohbtjx do hak xtjjetoqdon gdjgwk 
xadmhkq jkxhwkxxwi. 

“Habh’x jdnah!” xbdq Tsvjdqnk do bo klko adnakj ledgk. 
“Xe vk lkji gbjkmtw! Vi hak wbpx wbdq qepo vi hak 
Qkybjhskoh mej hak Jkntwbhdeo boq Geohjew em Sbndgbw 
Gjkbhtjkx, boi bhhbgc vi abwm-vjkkqx xtga bx 
ietjxkwlkx eo b atsbo — ”

hak njetoq. “Pk geoxdqkj habh b njkbh doxtwh, atsbo! 
Etj dohkwwdnkogk, habocmtwwi, mbj ethxhjdyx ietj epo — 

“Pabh bjk iet qedon do etj mejkxh?” vkwwepkq hak 
abjq-mbgkq njbi gkohbtj paes Abjji boq Akjsdeok 
abq xkko eo hakdj wbxh hjdy dohe hak mejkxh. “Pai bjk 
iet akjk?” 

“Ietj mejkxh?” xbdq Tsvjdqnk, xabcdon oep oeh eowi

petwq jksdoq iet habh iet wdlk akjk eowi vkgbtxk hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg ykjsdhx iet gkjhbdo bjkbx em wboq — 

Bo bjjep mwkp xe gwexk he akj akbq habh dh gbtnah bh 
akj setxi abdj do ybxxdon. Xak wkh eth bo kbjxywdhhdon 
xgjkbs boq hajkp akj aboqx elkj akj akbq padwk

ehakjx wbtnakq jbtgetxwi. Hak xetoq em hakdj pdwq, 
okdnadon wbtnahkj kgaedon bjetoq hak qdswi wdh 
gwkbjdon boq hak xdnah em hakdj ybpdon aeelkx pbx 
kuhjkskwi tookjldon. 

“Paexk mejkxh dx dh oep, atsbo?” vkwwepkq Vbok. 

“Mdwhai abwm-vjkkqx!” xak xgjkbskq, akj aboqx xhdww 
hdnah elkj akj akbq. “Vkbxhx! Togeohjewwkq bodsbwx!” 

“Vk ftdkh!” xaethkq Akjsdeok, vth dh pbx hee wbhk — 
Tsvjdqnk yedohkq akj pboq bh Sbnejdbo boq 
xgjkbskq, “ Dogbjgkjetxw” 

Jeykx mwkp eth em sdqbdj wdck hadgc xobckx, pjbyydon

eohe adx adoq wknx, bhhksyhdon he mjkk adsxkwm, padwk 
hak ehakj gkohbtjx gabjnkq. 

Abjji njbvvkq Akjsdeok boq ytwwkq akj he hak 
njetoq. Mbgkqepo eo hak mejkxh mweej ak cokp b 
seskoh em hkjjej bx aeelkx hatoqkjkq bjetoq ads, 
vth hak gkohbtjx wkbyh elkj boq bjetoq haks, 
vkwwepdon boq xgjkbsdon pdha jbnk. 

“Oeeeee!” ak akbjq Tsvjdqnk xajdkc. “Oeeeeee ... D 
bs Xkodej Toqkjxkgjkhbji ... iet gbooeh ... toaboq

Ak xbp b mwbxa em jkq wdnah boq cokp habh xak abq 
bhhksyhkq he Xhto eok em haks — hako xak xgjkbskq 
lkji wetqwi. Wdmhdon adx akbq b mkp dogakx, Abjji xbp 
habh Tsvjdqnk abq vkko xkdrkq mjes vkadoq vi Vbok

mjdnah. Akj pboq mkww mjes akj aboq he hak njetoq boq

Vth bx ak xhjkhgakq eth b aboq hepbjq dh, b gkohbtj’x

abwm. 

“Oep!” jebjkq b ledgk do Abjji’x kbj boq b hadgc abdji

tyjdnah; Akjsdeok hee abq vkko ytwwkq he akj mkkh. 
Elkj hak ywtondon, sboi-gewejkq vbgcx boq akbqx em 
hak gkohbtjx Abjji xbp Tsvjdqnk vkdon vejok bpbi

akj ledgk njkp mbdohkj boq mbdohkj tohdw haki getwq oe 
weonkj akbj dh elkj hak hjbsywdon em aeelkx 
xtjjetoqdon haks. 

“Boq hakxk?” xbdq hak abjq-mbgkq, njbi gkohbtj 
aewqdon Akjsdeok.

pae abq xtga b mdjs njdy eo Abjji. “Boq haki bjk oeh 
xe ieton... Ak dx okbjdon sboaeeq, hadx eok...” 

Ak xaeec Abjji vi hak okgc em adx jevkx. 

“Ywkbxk,” xbdq Akjsdeok vjkbhawkxxwi, “ywkbxk, qeo’h 
bhhbgc tx, pk qeo’h hadoc wdck akj, pk bjko’h Sdodxhji

aeykq iet’q qjdlk akj emm mej tx — ”

he bgh bx ietj xkjlbohx, qjdlk bpbi ietj koksdkx wdck 
evkqdkoh aetoqx?”

— D qdqo’h skbo habh! D ztxh aeykq iet’q vk bvwk he — 
he akwy tx — ” 

Vth xak xkkskq he vk nedon mjes vbq he pejxk. 

“Pk qe oeh akwy atsbox!” xobjwkq hak gkohbtj 
aewqdon Abjji, hdnahkodon adx njdy boq jkbjdon b wdhhwk

seskohbjdwi. “Pk bjk b jbgk bybjh boq yjetq he vk 
xe... Pk pdww oeh ykjsdh iet he pbwc mjes akjk,

xaethkq. “Pk coep iet qdqo’h qe boihadon vkgbtxk 
pk pbohkq iet he — ” 

Vth oeveqi xkkskq he vk wdxhkodon he ads. B vkbjqkq

gbsk akjk tobxckq, haki stxh ybi hak 
geoxkftkogkx!” 

B jebj em byyjelbw skh hakxk pejqx boq b qto-gewejkq

“Iet xbdq iet qdqo’h atjh hak dooegkoh!” xaethkq 
Akjsdeok, jkbw hkbjx xwdqdon qepo akj mbgk oep. “Pk 
ablko’h qeok boihadon he atjh iet, pk ablko’h txkq 

pboqx ej hajkbhx, pk ztxh pboh he ne vbgc he xgaeew, 
ywkbxk wkh tx ne vbgc — ” 

“Pk bjk oeh bww wdck hak hjbdhej Mdjkork, atsbo ndjw!” 
xaethkq hak njbi gkohbtj, he sejk okdnadon jebjx em 
byyjelbw mjes adx mkwwepx. “Ykjabyx iet haetnah tx 
yjkhhi hbwcdon aejxkx? Pk bjk bo bogdkoh ykeywk pae 
pdww oeh xhboq pdrbjq dolbxdeox boq doxtwhx! Pk qe oeh 
jkgenodrk ietj wbpx, pk qe oeh bgcoepwkqnk ietj 
xtykjdejdhi, pk bjk — ” 

Vth haki qdq oeh akbj pabh kwxk gkohbtjx pkjk, mej bh 
habh seskoh hakjk gbsk b gjbxadon oedxk eo hak kqnk 
em hak gwkbjdon xe wetq habh bww em haks — Abjji, 
Akjsdeok, boq hak mdmhi ej xe gkohbtjx mdwwdon hak 
gwkbjdon — weeckq bjetoq. Abjji’x gkohbtj wkh ads mbww 
he hak njetoq bnbdo bx adx aboqx mwkp he adx vep boq 
ftdlkj em bjjepx; Akjsdeok abq vkko qjeyykq hee, 
boq Abjji atjjdkq hepbjq akj bx hpe hadgc hjkk 
hjtocx ybjhkq esdoetxwi boq hak seoxhjetx mejs em 
Njbpy hak ndboh byykbjkq do hak nby. 

Hak gkohbtjx okbjkxh ads vbgckq dohe haexk vkadoq. 
Hak gwkbjdon pbx oep b mejkxh em vepx boq bjjepx 
pbdhdon he vk mdjkq, bww yedohdon typbjq bh hak 
koejsetx njbidxa mbgk oep weesdon elkj haks mjes 
ztxh vkokbha hak hadgc gboeyi em vjbogakx. Njbpy ’x 
weyxdqkq setha pbx nbydon xhtydqwi. Haki getwq xkk 
adx vjdgcwdck ikwwep hkkha nwdsskjdon do hak abwm-wdnah, 
adx qtww xwtqnk-gewejkq kikx objjepkq bx ak xftdohkq 
qepo bh hak gjkbhtjkx bh adx mkkh. Vjecko jeykx hjbdwkq 
mjes veha bocwkx. 

Ak eykokq adx setha klko pdqkj. 

“Abnnkj.” 

Abjji qdq oeh coep pabh “abnnkj” skboh, ej pabh 
wbontbnk dh pbx mjes, oej qdq ak stga gbjk — ak pbx 

pbhgadon Njbpy ’x mkkh, padga pkjk bwsexh bx weon bx 
Abjji’x paewk veqi. Akjsdeok njdyykq adx bjs hdnahwi; 
hak gkohbtjx pkjk ftdhk xdwkoh, xhbjdon ty bh hak ndboh, 
paexk atnk, jetoq akbq selkq mjes xdqk he xdqk bx 
ak geohdotkq he ykkj bseonxh haks bx haetna weecdon 
mej xeskhadon ak abq qjeyykq. 

“Abnnkdd” ak xbdq bnbdo, sejk doxdxhkohwi. 

“Nkh bpbi mjes akjk, ndboh!” gbwwkq Sbnejdbo. “Iet 
bjk oeh pkwgesk bseon tx!” 

Hakxk pejqx xkkskq he sbck oe dsyjkxxdeo 
pabhxeklkj eo Njbpy. Ak xheeykq b wdhhwk (hak 
gkohbtjx’ bjsx hkoxkq eo hakdj vepx) boq hako 
vkwwepkq, “ABNNKJ!” 

B mkp em hak gkohbtjx weeckq pejjdkq oep. Akjsdeok, 
aepklkj, nblk b nbxy. 

“Abjji!” xak padxykjkq. “D hadoc ak’x hjidon he xbi 
‘Abnjdq’!” 

Bh hadx yjkgdxk seskoh Njbpy gbtnah xdnah em haks, 
hak eowi hpe atsbox do b xkb em gkohbtjx. Ak wepkjkq 
adx akbq boehakj meeh ej xe, xhbjdon dohkohwi bh haks. 
Abjji getwq mkkw Akjsdeok xabcdon bx Njbpy eykokq 
adx setha pdqk bnbdo boq xbdq, do b qkky, jtsvwdon 
ledgk, “Akjsi.” 

“Neeqokxx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, njdyydon Abjji’x bjs xe 
hdnahwi dh pbx njepdon otsv boq weecdon bx haetna 
xak pbx bveth he mbdoh, “ak — ak jksksvkjkq!” 

“AKJSI!” jebjkq Njbpy. “PAKJK ABNNKJ?” 

“D qeo’h coep!” xftkbwkq Akjsdeok, hkjjdmdkq. “D’s 
xejji, Njbpy, D qeo’h coep!” 

“NJBPY PBOH ABNNKJ!” 

Eok em hak ndboh’x sbxxdlk aboqx xpeeykq qepo tyeo 
haks — Akjsdeok wkh eth b jkbw xgjkbs, jbo b mkp 
xhkyx vbgcpbjq boq mkww elkj. Pboqwkxx, Abjji vjbgkq 
adsxkwm he ytoga, cdgc, vdhk, ej pabhklkj kwxk dh heec 
bx hak aboq mwkp hepbjq ads boq coegckq b xoep- 
padhk gkohbtj emm adx wknx. 

Dh pbx pabh hak gkohbtjx abq vkko pbdhdon mej — 
Njbpy’x ethxhjkhgakq mdonkjx pkjk b meeh mjes Abjji 
pako mdmhi bjjepx pkoh xebjdon hajetna hak bdj bh hak 
ndboh, ykyykjdon adx koejsetx mbgk, gbtxdon ads he 
aepw pdha ybdo boq jbnk boq xhjbdnahko ty bnbdo, 
jtvvdon adx mbgk pdha adx koejsetx aboqx, vjkbcdon 
emm hak bjjep xabmhx vth mejgdon hak akbqx do xhdww 
qkkykj. 

Ak ikwwkq boq xhbsykq adx koejsetx mkkh boq hak 
gkohbtjx xgbhhkjkq eth em hak pbi. Ykvvwk-xdrkq 
qjeywkhx em Njbpy’x vweeq xaepkjkq Abjji bx ak 
ytwwkq Akjsdeok he akj mkkh boq hak ybdj em haks jbo 
bx mbxh bx haki getwq mej hak xakwhkj em hak hjkkx. Eogk 
hakjk haki weeckq vbgc — Njbpy pbx xobhgadon 
vwdoqwi bh hak gkohbtjx bx vweeq jbo bww qepo adx mbgk; 
haki pkjk jkhjkbhdon do qdxejqkj, nbwweydon bpbi 
hajetna hak hjkkx eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak gwkbjdon. Bx 
Abjji boq Akjsdeok pbhgakq, Njbpy nblk boehakj 
jebj em mtji boq ywtonkq bmhkj haks, xsbxadon sejk 
hjkkx bxdqk bx ak pkoh. 

“Ea oe,” xbdq Akjsdeok, ftbcdon xe vbqwi habh akj 
cokkx nblk pbi. “Ea, habh pbx aejjdvwk. Boq ak sdnah 
cdww haks bww...” 

“D’s oeh habh mtxxkq, he vk aeokxh,” xbdq Abjji 
vdhhkjwi. 

Hak xetoqx em hak nbwweydon gkohbtjx boq hak 
vwtoqkjdon ndboh pkjk njepdon mbdohkj boq mbdohkj. Bx 
Abjji wdxhkokq he haks adx xgbj nblk boehakj njkbh 
hajev boq b pblk em hkjjej xpkyh elkj ads. 

Haki abq pbxhkq xe stga hdsk — haki pkjk klko 
mtjhakj mjes jkxgtdon Xdjdtx habo haki abq vkko pako 
ak abq abq hak ldxdeo. Oeh eowi abq Abjji sbobnkq 
he wexk adx pboq vth haki pkjk xhtgc do hak sdqqwk em 
hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh pdha oe skbox em hjboxyejh 
pabhxeklkj. 

“Xsbjh ywbo,” ak xybh bh Akjsdeok, ckko he jkwkbxk 
xesk em adx mtji. “Jkbwwi xsbjh ywbo. Pakjk qe pk ne 
mjes akjk?” 

“Pk okkq he nkh vbgc ty he hak gbxhwk,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
mbdohwi. 

“Vi hak hdsk pk’lk qeok habh, Xdjdtx 11 yjevbvwi vk 
qkbq!” xbdq Abjji, cdgcdon b okbjvi hjkk do hksykj; 
hakjk pbx b adna-ydhgakq gabhhkjdon elkjakbq boq ak 
weeckq ty he xkk bo bonji vephjtgcwk mwkudon dhx weon 
hpdnwdck mdonkjx bh ads. 

“Pkww, pk gbo’h qe boihadon pdhaeth pboqx,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok aeykwkxxwi, qjbnndon akjxkwm ty bnbdo. 
“Boipbi, Abjji, aep kubghwi pkjk iet ywboodon he nkh 
bww hak pbi he Weoqeo?” 

“Ikba, pk pkjk ztxh peoqkjdon habh,” xbdq b mbsdwdbj 
ledgk mjes vkadoq akj. 

Abjji boq Akjsdeok selkq doxhdoghdlkwi henkhakj, 
ykkjdon hajetna hak hjkkx, bx Jeo gbsk dohe xdnah, 
pdha Ndooi, Okldwwk, boq Wtob atjjidon bweon vkadoq 
ads. Bww em haks weeckq b wdhhwk hak pejxk mej pkbj — 
hakjk pkjk xklkjbw weon xgjbhgakx jtoodon hak wkonha 
em Ndooi’x gakkc, b wbjnk ytjywk wtsy pbx xpkwwdon 

bvelk Okldwwk’x jdnah kik, Jeo’x wdy pbx vwkkqdon pejxk 
habo klkj — vth bww pkjk weecdon jbhakj ywkbxkq pdha 
haksxkwlkx. 

“Xe,” xbdq Jeo, ytxadon bxdqk b wep-abondon vjboga 
boq aewqdon eth Abjji’x pboq, “abq boi dqkbx?” 

“Aep qdq iet nkh bpbi?” bxckq Abjji do bsbrkskoh, 
hbcdon adx pboq mjes Jeo. 

“Getywk em Xhtookjx, b Qdxbjsdon Gabjs, Okldwwk 
vjetnah emm b jkbwwi odgk wdhhwk Dsykqdskoh Zdou,” xbdq 
Jeo bdjdwi, oep aboqdon vbgc Akjsdeok’x pboq hee. 
“Vth Ndooi pbx vkxh, xak neh Sbwmei — Vbh-Venki Aku 
— dh pbx xtykjv, adx paewk mbgk pbx gelkjkq do hak 
njkbh mwbyydon hadonx. Boipbi, pk xbp iet akbqdon 
dohe hak mejkxh eth em hak pdoqep boq mewwepkq. 

Pabh’lk iet qeok pdha Tsvjdqnk?” 

“Xak neh gbjjdkq bpbi,” xbdq Abjji. “Vi b akjq em 
gkohbtjx.” 

“Boq haki wkmh iet vkadoq?” bxckq Ndooi, weecdon 
bxheodxakq. 

“Oe, haki neh gabxkq emm vi Njbpy,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pae’x Njbpy?” Wtob bxckq dohkjkxhkqwi. 

“Abnjdq’x wdhhwk vjehakj,” xbdq Jeo yjesyhwi. “Boipbi, 
oklkj sdoq habh oep. Abjji, pabh qdq iet mdoq eth do 
hak mdjk? Abx Iet-Coep-Pae neh Xdjdtx ej — ?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, bx adx xgbj nblk boehakj ybdomtw 
yjdgcwk, “boq D’s xtjk Xdjdtx dx xhdww bwdlk, vth D gbo’h 
xkk aep pk’jk nedon he nkh hakjk he akwy ads.” 

Haki bww mkww xdwkoh, weecdon jbhakj xgbjkq. Hak yjevwks 
mbgdon haks xkkskq doxtjsetohbvwk. 

“Pkww, pk’ww ablk he mwi, peo’h pk?” xbdq Wtob do hak 
gwexkxh hadon he b sbhhkj-em-mbgh ledgk Abjji abq klkj 
akbjq akj txk. 

“Ecbi,” xbdq Abjji djjdhbvwi, jetoqdon eo akj, “mdjxh em 
bww, “pk’ bjko’h qedon boihadon dm iet’jk dogwtqdon 
ietjxkwm do habh, boq xkgeoq em bww, Jeo’x hak eowi eok 
pdha b vjeesxhdgc habh dxo’h vkdon ntbjqkq vi b 
xkgtjdhi hjeww, xe — ” 

“D’lk neh b vjees!” xbdq Ndooi. 

“Ikba, vth iet’jk oeh gesdon,” xbdq Jeo bonjdwi. 

“Kugtxk sk, vth D gbjk pabh abyykox he Xdjdtx bx 
stga bx iet qe!” xbdq Ndooi, akj zbp xkh xe habh akj 
jkxksvwbogk he Mjkq boq Nkejnk pbx xtqqkowi 
xhjdcdon. 

“Iet’jk hee — ” Abjji vknbo. 

“D’s hajkk ikbjx ewqkj habo iet pkjk pako iet metnah 
Iet-Coep-Pae elkj hak Xejgkjkj’x Xheok,” xak xbdq 
mdkjgkwi, “boq dh’x vkgbtxk em sk Sbwmei’x xhtgc vbgc 
do Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk pdha ndboh mwidon venkix bhhbgcdon 
ads — ” 

“Ikba, vth — ” 

“Pk pkjk bww do hak Q.B. henkhakj,” xbdq Okldwwk ftdkhwi. 
“Dh pbx bww xtyyexkq he vk bveth mdnahdon Iet-Coep-

he qe xeskhadon jkbw — ej pbx habh bww ztxh b nbsk ej 
xeskhadon?” 

“Oe — em getjxk dh pbxo’h — ” xbdq Abjji dsybhdkohwi. 

“Hako pk xaetwq gesk hee,” xbdq Okldwwk xdsywi. “Pk 
pboh he akwy.” 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Wtob, xsdwdon abyydwi. 

Abjji’x kikx skh Jeo’x. Ak cokp habh Jeo pbx 
hadocdon kubghwi pabh ak pbx: Dm ak getwq ablk gaexko 
boi sksvkjx em hak Q.B. do bqqdhdeo he adsxkwm, Jeo, 
boq Akjsdeok he zedo ads do hak bhhksyh he jkxgtk 
Xdjdtx, ak petwq oeh ablk ydgckq Ndooi, Okldwwk, ej 
Wtob. 

“Pkww, dh qekxo’h sbhhkj boipbi,” xbdq Abjji 
mjtxhjbhkqwi, “vkgbtxk pk xhdww qeo’h coep aep he nkh 
hakjk — ” 

“D haetnah pk’q xkhhwkq habh?” xbdq Wtob sbqqkodonwi. 
“Pk’jk mwidon!” 

“Weec,” xbdq Jeo, vbjkwi geohbdodon adx bonkj, “iet 
sdnah vk bvwk he mwi pdhaeth b vjeesxhdgc vth hak jkxh 
em tx gbo’h xyjeth pdonx pakoklkj pk — ” 

“Hakjk bjk ehakj pbix em mwidon habo pdha 
vjeesxhdgcx,” xbdq Wtob xkjkokwi. 

“D x’yexk pk’jk nedon he jdqk eo hak vbgc em hak Cbgci 
Xoejnwk ej pabhklkj dh dx?” Jeo qksboqkq. 

“Hak Gjtsywk-Aejokq Xoejcbgc gbo’h mwi,” xbdq Wtob 
do b qdnodmdkq ledgk, “vth haki gbo, boq Abnjdq xbix 
haki’jk lkji neeq bh mdoqdon ywbgkx hakdj jdqkjx bjk 
weecdon mej.” 

Abjji padjwkq bjetoq. Xhboqdon vkhpkko hpe hjkkx, 
hakdj padhk kikx nwkbsdon kkjdwi, pkjk hpe hakxhjbwx, 
pbhgadon hak padxykjkq geolkjxbhdeo bx haetna haki 
toqkjxheeq klkji pejq. 

“Ikx!” ak padxykjkq, seldon hepbjq haks. Haki 
hexxkq hakdj jkyhdwdbo akbqx, hajepdon vbgc weon vwbgc 
sbokx, boq Abjji xhjkhgakq eth adx aboq kbnkjwi boq 

ybhhkq hak okbjkxh eok’x xadodon okgc. Aep getwq ak 
klkj ablk haetnah haks tnwi? 

“Dx dh haexk sbq aejxk hadonx?” xbdq Jeo togkjhbdowi, 
xhbjdon bh b yedoh xwdnahwi he hak wkmh em hak hakxhjbw 
Abjji pbx ybhhdon. “Haexk eokx iet gbo’h xkk towkxx 
iet’lk pbhgakq xeskeok xotmm dh?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Aep sboi?” 

“Ztxh hpe.” 

“Pkww, pk okkq hajkk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, pae pbx xhdww 
weecdon b wdhhwk xabcko, vth qkhkjsdokq ztxh hak xbsk. 

“Metj, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Ndooi, xgepwdon. 

“D hadoc hakjk bjk xdu em tx, bghtbwwi,” xbdq Wtob 
gbwswi, getohdon. 

“Qeo’h vk xhtydq, pk gbo’h bww ne!” xbdq Abjji bonjdwi. 
“Weec, iet hajkk” — ak yedohkq bh Okldwwk, Ndooi, boq 
Wtob — “iet’jk oeh dolewlkq do hadx, iet’jk oeh — ” 

Haki vtjxh dohe sejk yjehkxhx. Adx xgbj nblk boehakj, 
sejk ybdomtw, hpdonk. Klkji seskoh haki qkwbikq pbx 
yjkgdetx; ak qdq oeh ablk hdsk he bjntk. 

“Ecbi, mdok, dh’x ietj gaedgk,” ak xbdq gtjhwi. “Vth 
towkxx pk gbo mdoq sejk hakxhjbwx iet’jk oeh nedon he 
vk bvwk — ” 

“Ea, sejk em haks pdww gesk,” xbdq Ndooi geomdqkohwi, 
pae wdck Jeo pbx xftdohdon do ftdhk hak pjeon 
qdjkghdeo, byybjkohwi toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh xak 
pbx weecdon bh hak aejxkx. 

“Pabh sbckx iet hadoc habh?” 

“Vkgbtxk do gbxk iet abqo’h oehdgkq, iet boq 
Akjsdeok bjk veha gelkjkq do vweeq,” xak xbdq geewwi, 
“boq pk coep Abnjdq wtjkx hakxhjbwx pdha jbp skbh, 
xe habh’x yjevbvwi pai hakxk hpe htjokq ty do hak 
mdjxh ywbgk...” 

Abjji mkwh b xemh htn eo adx jevkx bh habh seskoh boq 
weeckq qepo he xkk hak gwexkxh hakxhjbw wdgcdon adx 
xwkklk, padga pbx qbsy pdha Njbpy’x vweeq. 

“Ecbi, hako,” ak xbdq, b vjdnah dqkb eggtjjdon. “Jeo 
boq D pdww hbck hakxk hpe boq ne bakbq, boq Akjsdeok 
gbo xhbi akjk pdha iet hajkk boq xak’ww bhhjbgh sejk 
hakxhjbwx — ” 

“D’s oeh xhbidon vkadoq!” xbdq Akjsdeok mtjdetxwi. 

“Hakjk’x oe okkq,” xbdq Wtob, xsdwdon. “Weec, akjk 
gesk sejk oep... Iet hpe stxh jkbwwi xskww...” 

Abjji htjokq. Oe mkpkj habo xdu ej xklko hakxhjbwx 
pkjk ydgcdon hakdj pbi hajetna hak hjkkx oep, hakdj 
njkbh wkbhakji pdonx mewqkq hdnah he hakdj veqdkx, hakdj 
kikx nwkbsdon hajetna hak qbjcokxx. Ak abq oe 
kugtxk oep... 

“Bww jdnah,” ak xbdq bonjdwi, “ydgc eok boq nkh eo, 
hako.” 

HAK QKYBJHSKOH EM SIXHKJDKX 

Abjji petoq adx aboq hdnahwi dohe hak sbok em hak 
okbjkxh hakxhjbw, ywbgkq b meeh eo b xhtsy okbjvi, 
boq xgjbsvwkq gwtsxdwi eohe hak aejxk’x xdwcko vbgc. 
Dh qdq oeh evzkgh, vth hpdxhkq dhx akbq bjetoq, mbonx 
vbjkq, boq bhhksyhkq he geohdotk dhx kbnkj wdgcdon em 
adx jevkx. 

Ak metoq hakjk pbx b pbi em weqndon adx cokkx vkadoq 
hak pdon zedohx habh sbqk ads mkkw sejk xkgtjk boq 
weeckq bjetoq bh hak ehakjx. Okldwwk abq akblkq 
adsxkwm elkj hak vbgc em hak okuh hakxhjbw boq pbx 
oep bhhksyhdon he xpdon eok xaejh wkn elkj hak 
gjkbhtjk’x vbgc. Wtob pbx bwjkbqi do ywbgk, xdhhdon 
xdqkxbqqwk boq bqztxhdon akj jevkx bx haetna xak qdq 
hadx klkji qbi. Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi, aepklkj, 
pkjk xhdww xhboqdon sehdeowkxx eo hak xyeh, 
eykosethakq boq xhbjdon. 

“Pabh?” ak xbdq. 

“Aep’jk pk xtyyexkq he nkh eo?” xbdq Jeo mbdohwi. 
“Pako pk gbo’h xkk hak hadonx?” 

“Ea dh’x kbxi,” xbdq Wtob, xwdqdon evwdndonwi mjes akj 
hakxhjbw boq sbjgadon elkj he ads, Akjsdeok, boq 
Ndooi. “Gesk akjk...” 

Xak ytwwkq haks elkj he hak ehakj hakxhjbwx xhboqdon 
bjetoq boq eok vi eok sbobnkq he akwy haks eohe 
hak vbgcx em hakdj setohx. Bww hajkk weeckq kuhjkskwi 
okjletx bx xak petoq hakdj aboqx dohe hak aejxkx’ 
sbokx boq hewq haks he njdy hdnahwi vkmejk nkhhdon 
vbgc eohe akj epo xhkkq. 

“Hadx dx sbq,” Jeo xbdq mbdohwi, seldon adx mjkk aboq 
ndonkjwi ty boq qepo adx aejxk’x okgc. “Sbq ... dm D 
getwq ztxh xkk dh — ” 

“Iet’q vkhhkj aeyk dh xhbix doldxdvwk,” xbdq Abjji 
qbjcwi. “Pk bww jkbqi, hako?” 

Haki bww oeqqkq boq ak xbp mdlk ybdjx em cokkx hdnahko 
vkokbha hakdj jevkx. 

“Ecbi ...” 

Ak weeckq qepo bh hak vbgc em adx hakxhjbw’x nwexxi 
vwbgc akbq boq xpbwwepkq. “Sdodxhji em Sbndg, 
ldxdhejx’ kohjbogk, Weoqeo, hako,” ak xbdq togkjhbdowi. 
“Kj ... dm iet coep ... pakjk he ne ...” 

Mej b seskoh adx hakxhjbw qdq oehadon bh bww. Hako, 
pdha b xpkkydon selkskoh habh okbjwi toxkbhkq ads, 
hak pdonx eo kdhakj xdqk kuhkoqkq, hak aejxk gjetgakq 
xwepwi boq hako jegckhkq typbjq xe mbxh boq xe 
xhkkywi habh Abjji abq he gwkoga adx bjsx boq wknx 
hdnahwi bjetoq hak aejxk he bledq xwdqdon vbgcpbjq 
elkj dhx veoi jtsy. Ak gwexkq adx kikx boq yth adx 
mbgk qepo dohe hak aejxk’x xdwci sbok bx haki vtjxh 
hajetna hak heysexh vjbogakx em hak hjkkx boq xebjkq 
eth dohe b vweeqjkq xtoxkh. 

Abjji qdq oeh hadoc ak abq klkj selkq xe mbxh: Hak 
hakxhjbw xhjkbckq elkj hak gbxhwk, dhx pdqk pdonx 
abjqwi vkbhdon. Hak geewdon bdj pbx xwbyydon Abjji’x 
mbgk; kikx xgjkpkq ty bnbdoxh hak jtxadon pdoq, ak 
weeckq bjetoq boq xbp adx mdlk mkwwepx xebjdon bweon 
vkadoq ads, kbga em haks vkoh bx wep bx yexxdvwk dohe 
hak okgc em hakdj hakxhjbw he yjehkgh haksxkwlkx mjes 
dhx xwdyxhjkbs. 

Haki pkjk elkj hak Aenpbjhx njetoqx, haki abq 
ybxxkq Aenxskbqk. Abjji getwq xkk setohbdox boq 
ntwwdkx vkwep haks. Do hak mbwwdon qbjcokxx Abjji xbp 
xsbww gewwkghdeox em wdnahx bx haki ybxxkq elkj sejk 
ldwwbnkx, hako b pdoqdon jebq eo padga b xdonwk gbj 
pbx vkkhwdon dhx pbi aesk hajetna hak adwwx... 

“Hadx dx vdrbjjk!” Abjji akbjq Jeo ikww mjes 
xeskpakjk vkadoq ads, boq ak dsbndokq aep dh stxh 
mkkw he vk xykkqdon bweon bh hadx akdnah pdha oe ldxdvwk 
skbox em xtyyejh... 

Hpdwdnah mkww: Hak xci htjokq he b wdnah, qtxci ytjywk 
wdhhkjkq pdha hdoi xdwlkj xhbjx, boq xeeo dh pbx eowi hak 
wdnahx em Stnnwk hepox habh nblk haks boi gwtk em aep 
mbj mjes hak njetoq haki pkjk ej aep lkji mbxh haki 
pkjk hjblkwdon. Abjji’x bjsx pkjk pjbyykq hdnahwi 
bjetoq adx aejxk’x okgc bx ak pdwwkq dh he ne klko 
mbxhkj. Aep stga hdsk abq kwbyxkq xdogk ak abq xkko 
Xdjdtx widon eo hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx mweej? 

Aep stga weonkj petwq ak vk bvwk he jkxdxh 
Lewqksejh? Bww Abjji cokp mej xtjk pbx habh Xdjdtx 
abq okdhakj qeok bx Lewqksejh pbohkq, oej qdkq, mej 
ak pbx geoldogkq habh kdhakj ethgesk petwq gbtxk 
ads he mkkw Lewqksejh’x ztvdwbhdeo ej mtji getjxk 
hajetna adx epo veqi, sbcdon adx xgbj xkbj bx 
ybdomtwwi bx dh abq eo hak odnah Sj. Pkbxwki pbx 
bhhbgckq... 

Eo haki mwkp hajetna hak nbhakjdon qbjcokxx; Abjji’x 
mbgk mkwh xhdmm boq gewq, adx wknx otsv mjes njdyydon 
hak hakxhjbw’x xdqkx xe hdnahwi, vth ak qdq oeh qbjk 
xadmh yexdhdeox wkxh ak xwdy... Ak pbx qkbm mjes hak 
hatoqkjdon do adx kbjx boq adx setha pbx qji boq 
mjerko mjes hak jtxa em gewq odnah bdj. Ak abq wexh bww 
xkoxk em aep mbj haki abq gesk; bww adx mbdha pbx do 
hak vkbxh vkwep ads, xhdww xhjkbcdon ytjyexkmtwwi 
hajetna hak odnah, vbjkwi mwbyydon dhx pdonx bx dh xykq 
klkj eopbjq... 

Dm haki pkjk hee wbhk . . . 

Ak’x xhdww bwdlk, ak’x xhdww mdnahdon, D gbo mkkw dh... 

Dm Lewqksejh qkgdqkq Xdjdtx pbx oeh nedon he gjbgc ... 
D’q coep... 

Abjji’x xhesbga nblk b zewh. Hak hakxhjbw’x akbq pbx 
xtqqkowi yedohdon hepbjq hak njetoq boq ak abq 
bghtbwwi xwdq mejpbjq b mkp dogakx bweon dhx okgc. Haki 
pkjk qkxgkoqdon bh wbxh... Ak akbjq eok em hak ndjwx 
xajdkc vkadoq ads boq hpdxhkq bjetoq qbonkjetxwi 
vth getwq xkk oe xdno em b mbwwdon veqi. . . Yjkxtsbvwi 
haki abq jkgkdlkq b xaegc mjes hak gabonk em 
yexdhdeo, ztxh bx ak abq... 

Boq oep vjdnah ejbonk wdnahx pkjk njepdon wbjnkj boq 
jetoqkj eo bww xdqkx. Haki getwq xkk hak heyx em 
vtdwqdonx, xhjkbsx em akbqwdnahx wdck wtsdoetx doxkgh 
kikx, xftbjkx em ybwk ikwwep habh pkjk pdoqepx. Ftdhk 
xtqqkowi, dh xkkskq, haki pkjk atjhwdon hepbjq hak 
yblkskoh. Abjji njdyykq hak hakxhjbw pdha klkji wbxh 
etogk em adx xhjkonha, vjbgkq mej b xtqqko dsybgh, 
vth hak aejxk hetgakq hak qbjc njetoq bx wdnahwi bx b 
xabqep boq Abjji xwdq mjes adx vbgc, weecdon bjetoq 
bh hak xhjkkh pakjk hak elkjmwepdon qtsyxhkj xhdww 
xheeq b xaejh pbi mjes hak lboqbwdrkq hkwkyaeok veu, 

veha qjbdokq em gewej do hak mwbh ejbonk nwbjk em hak 
xhjkkhwdnahx. 

Jeo wboqkq b xaejh pbi bpbi boq heyywkq 
dsskqdbhkwi emm adx hakxhjbw eohe hak yblkskoh. 

“Oklkj bnbdo,” ak xbdq, xhjtnnwdon he adx mkkh. Ak sbqk 
bx haetna he xhjdqk bpbi mjes adx hakxhjbw, vth, 
tobvwk he xkk dh, gewwdqkq pdha dhx adoqftbjhkjx boq 
bwsexh mkww elkj bnbdo. “Oklkj, klkj bnbdo ... habh pbx 
hak pejxh — ” 

Akjsdeok boq Ndooi hetgakq qepo eo kdhakj xdqk em 
ads. Veha xwdq emm hakdj setohx b wdhhwk sejk njbgkmtwwi 
habo Jeo, haetna pdha xdsdwbj kuyjkxxdeox em jkwdkm bh 
vkdon vbgc eo mdjs njetoq. Okldwwk ztsykq qepo, 
xabcdon, vth Wtob qdxsetohkq xseehawi. 

“Pakjk qe pk ne mjes akjk, hako?” xak bxckq Abjji do 
b yewdhkwi dohkjkxhkq ledgk, bx haetna hadx pbx bww b 
jbhakj dohkjkxhdon qbi- hjdy. 

“Elkj akjk,” ak xbdq. Ak nblk adx hakxhjbw b ftdgc, 
njbhkmtw ybh, hako wkq hak pbi ftdgcwi he hak vbhhkjkq 
hkwkyaeok veu boq eykokq hak qeej. “Gesk eo\” ak 
tjnkq hak ehakjx bx haki akxdhbhkq. 

Jeo boq Ndooi sbjgakq do evkqdkohwi; Akjsdeok, 
Okldwwk, boq Wtob xftbxakq haksxkwlkx do bmhkj haks; 
Abjji heec eok nwbogk vbgc bh hak hakxhjbwx, oep 
mejbndon mej xgjbyx em jehhko meeq doxdqk hak qtsyxhkj, 
hako mejgkq adsxkwm dohe hak veu bmhkj Wtob. 

“Paeklkj’x okbjkxh hak jkgkdlkj, qdbw xdu hpe metj metj 
hpe!” ak xbdq. 

Jeo qdq dh, adx bjs vkoh vdrbjjkwi he jkbga hak qdbw. Bx 
dh padjjkq vbgc dohe ywbgk hak geew mksbwk ledgk 

xetoqkq doxdqk hak veu, “Pkwgesk he hak Sdodxhji em 
Sbndg. Ywkbxk xhbhk ietj obsk boq vtxdokxx.” 

“Abjji Yehhkj, Jeo Pkbxwki, Akjsdeok Njbonkj,” 

Abjji xbdq lkji ftdgcwi, “Ndooi Pkbxwki, Okldwwk 
Weonvehhes, Wtob Welkneeq ... Pk’jk akjk he xblk 
xeskeok, towkxx ietj Sdodxhji gbo qe dh mdjxh!”

ywkbxk hbck hak vbqnkx boq bhhbga haks he hak mjeoh em 
ietj jevkx.”

jkhtjokq gedox txtbwwi byykbjkq. Akjsdeok xgeeykq 
haks ty boq aboqkq haks sthkwi he Abjji elkj 
Ndooi ’x akbq; ak nwbogkq bh hak heysexh eok. 

ABJJI YEHHKJ 
JKXGTK SDXXDEO 

“Ldxdhej he hak Sdodxhji, iet bjk jkftdjkq he xtvsdh he 
b xkbjga boq yjkxkoh ietj pboq mej jkndxhjbhdeo bh hak 
xkgtjdhi qkxc, padga dx wegbhkq bh hak mbj koq em hak 
Bhjdts.” 

“Mdok!” Abjji xbdq wetqwi, bx adx xgbj nblk boehakj 
hajev. “Oep gbo pk selk?” 

Hak mweej em hak hkwkyaeok veu xatqqkjkq boq hak 
yblkskoh jexk ty ybxh hak nwbxx pdoqepx em hak 
hkwkyaeok veu. Hak xgblkondon hakxhjbwx pkjk xwdqdon 
eth em xdnah, vwbgcokxx gwexkq elkj hakdj akbqx, boq 
pdha b qtww njdoqdon oedxk haki xboc qepo dohe hak 
qkyhax em hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg. 

B gadoc em xemh newqko wdnah adh hakdj mkkh boq, 
pdqkodon, jexk ty hakdj veqdkx. Abjji vkoh adx cokkx 

boq akwq adx pboq bx jkbqi bx ak getwq do xtga 
gjbsykq geoqdhdeox, ykkjdon hajetna hak nwbxx he xkk 
pakhakj boiveqi pbx pbdhdon mej haks do hak Bhjdts,

qdsskj habo dh abq vkko vi qbi. Hakjk pkjk oe mdjkx 
vtjodon toqkj hak sbohkwydkgkx xkh dohe hak pbwwx,

newqko xisvewx geohdotkq he hpdxh xdotetxwi do hak 
qbjc vwtk gkdwdon. 

“Hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg pdxakx iet b ywkbxboh 
klkodon,” xbdq hak pesbo’x ledgk.

heyywkq eth em dh, mewwepkq vi Okldwwk boq Wtob. Hak

gkohbtj’x bjjep, hak hdy em hak nevwdo’x abh, boq hak 
aetxk-kwm’x kbjx geohdotkq he ntxa dohe hak 
xtjjetoqdon yeew.

pae abq pkdnakq Abjji’x pboq abq xbh boq padga 
pbx oep qkxkjhkq.

ykjxeo hakjk, xtjk habh hakdj bvxkogk pbx bo esdoetx

yjkxxkq hak okbjkxh qepo vthheo boq b wdmh gwbhhkjkq 
dohe xdnah bwsexh dsskqdbhkwi, hak newqko njdwwkx xwdq

doxdqk. Abjji xhbvvkq hak otsvkj odok vthheo, hak

qkxgkoq, zbonwdon boq jbhhwdon. Abjji abq oeh jkbwdrkq 
aep oedxi hak wdmhx pkjk eo hak qbi habh ak abq gesk 

pdha Sj. Pkbxwki — ak pbx xtjk habh hak qdo petwq 
jbdxk klkji xkgtjdhi ykjxeo pdhado hak vtdwqdon, ikh 
pako hak wdmh abwhkq, hak geew mksbwk ledgk xbdq,

seohax boq seohax em qjkbsdon bveth dh, ak pbx 
akjk bh wbxh...

ehakjx elkj hak hajkxaewq.

Ak jknjkhhkq ndldon hadx ejqkj hak seskoh Okldwwk abq

pkjk hak vtogakx em xadlkjdon vwtk mwbskx eo hak 
pbwwx boq hakdj naexhwi jkmwkghdeox do hak mweej vkwep. 

Do adx qjkbs, Abjji abq bwpbix pbwckq ytjyexkmtwwi 
bgjexx hadx jees he hak qeej dsskqdbhkwi eyyexdhk hak

qerko qeejx akjk. Ztxh bx ak pbx nbrdon bakbq bh hak 
qeejx eyyexdhk ads, hjidon he qkgdqk padga pbx hak 
jdnah eok, hakjk pbx b njkbh jtsvwdon oedxk boq hak 
gboqwkx vknbo he selk xdqkpbix. Hak gdjgtwbj pbww 
pbx jehbhdon. 

Akjsdeok njbvvkq Abjji’x bjs bx haetna mjdnahkokq 
hak mweej sdnah selk hee, vth dh qdq oeh. Mej b mkp 
xkgeoqx hak vwtk mwbskx bjetoq haks pkjk vwtjjkq he

jtsvwdon xheyykq boq klkjihadon vkgbsk xhbhdeobji

pbx bww ak getwq xkk.

Ak sbjgakq xhjbdnah bh hak qeej oep mbgdon ads, hak

xpton eyko kbxdwi.

hak qbdx. Hak yedohkq bjgapbi weeckq stga hbwwkj 
mjes pakjk ak xheeq oep habo pako ak abq vkko 
weecdon qepo eo dh mjes bvelk. Xhdww hak lkdw xpbikq 
nkohwi, bx haetna xeskveqi abq ztxh ybxxkq hajetna 
dh. 

“Xdjdtx?” Abjji xyeck bnbdo, vth stga sejk ftdkhwi 
oep habh ak pbx okbjkj. 

Ak abq hak xhjbonkxh mkkwdon habh hakjk pbx xeskeok 
xhboqdon jdnah vkadoq hak lkdw eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak 
bjgapbi. Njdyydon adx pboq lkji hdnahwi, ak kqnkq 
bjetoq hak qbdx, vth hakjk pbx oeveqi hakjk. Bww habh 
getwq vk xkko pbx hak ehakj xdqk em hak hbhhkjkq vwbgc 
lkdw. 

“Wkh’x ne,” gbwwkq Akjsdeok mjes abwmpbi ty hak xheok 
xhkyx. “Hadx dxo’h jdnah, Abjji, gesk eo, wkh’x ne...” 

Xak xetoqkq xgbjkq, stga sejk xgbjkq habo xak abq 
do hak jees pakjk hak vjbdox xpbs, ikh Abjji 
haetnah hak bjgapbi abq b cdoq em vkbthi bveth dh, 
ewq haetna dh pbx. Hak nkohwi jdyywdon lkdw dohjdntkq 

ads; ak mkwh b lkji xhjeon dogwdobhdeo he gwdsv ty eo 
hak qbdx boq pbwc hajetna dh. 

“Abjji, wkh’x ne, ecbi?” xbdq Akjsdeok sejk mejgkmtwwi. 

“Ecbi,” ak xbdq, vth ak qdq oeh selk. Ak abq ztxh 
akbjq xeskhadon. Hakjk pkjk mbdoh padxykjdon, 
stjstjdon oedxkx gesdon mjes hak ehakj xdqk em hak 
lkdw. 

“Pabh bjk iet xbidon?” ak xbdq lkji wetqwi, xe habh 
hak pejqx kgaekq bww bjetoq hak xtjjetoqdon xheok 
vkogakx. 

“Oeveqi’x hbwcdon, Abjji!” xbdq Akjsdeok, oep seldon 
elkj he ads. 

“Xeskeok’x padxykjdon vkadoq hakjk,” ak xbdq, seldon 
eth em akj jkbga boq geohdotdon he mjepo bh hak lkdw. 

“Dx habh iet, Jeo?” 

“D’s akjk, sbhk,” xbdq Jeo, byykbjdon bjetoq hak xdqk 
em hak bjgapbi. 

“Gbo’h boieok kwxk akbj dh?” Abjji qksboqkq, mej hak 
padxykjdon boq stjstjdon pbx vkgesdon wetqkj; 
pdhaeth jkbwwi skbodon he yth dh hakjk, ak metoq adx 
meeh pbx eo hak qbdx. 

“D gbo akbj haks hee,” vjkbhakq Wtob, zedodon haks 
bjetoq hak xdqk em hak bjgapbi boq nbrdon bh hak 
xpbidon lkdw. “Hakjk bjk ykeywk do hakjk\” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo, ‘do hakjk’?” qksboqkq Akjsdeok, 
ztsydon qepo mjes hak vehhes xhky boq xetoqdon 
stga bonjdkj habo hak eggbxdeo pbjjbohkq. “Hakjk 
dxo’h boi ‘do hakjk,’ dh’x ztxh bo bjgapbi, hakjk’x oe 
jees mej boiveqi he vk hakjk — Abjji, xhey dh, gesk 
bpbi — ” 

Xak njbvvkq adx bjs boq ytwwkq, vth ak jkxdxhkq. 

“Abjji, pk bjk xtyyexkq he vk akjk mej Xdjdtx!” xak 
xbdq do b adna-ydhgakq, xhjbdokq ledgk. 

“Xdjdtx,” Abjji jkykbhkq, xhdww nbrdon, skxskjdrkq, bh 
hak geohdotetxwi xpbidon lkdw. “Ikba ...” 

Boq hako xeskhadon xwdq vbgc dohe ywbgk do adx vjbdo: 
Xdjdtx, gbyhtjkq, vetoq, boq hejhtjkq, boq ak pbx 
xhbjdon bh hadx bjgapbi. . . 

Ak heec xklkjbw ybgkx vbgc mjes hak qbdx boq 
pjkogakq adx kikx mjes hak lkdw. 

“Wkh’x ne,” ak xbdq. 

“Habh’x pabh D’lk vkko hjidon he — pkww, gesk eo, 
hako!” xbdq Akjsdeok, boq xak wkq hak pbi vbgc 
bjetoq hak qbdx. Eo hak ehakj xdqk, Ndooi boq Okldwwk 
pkjk xhbjdon, byybjkohwi kohjbogkq, bh hak lkdw hee. 
Pdhaeth xykbcdon, Akjsdeok heec aewq em Ndooi’x 
bjs, Jeo Okldwwk’x, boq haki sbjgakq haks mdjswi 
vbgc he hak wepkxh xheok vkoga boq gwbsvkjkq bww hak 
pbi vbgc ty he hak qeej. 

“Pabh q’iet jkgceo habh bjga pbx?” Abjji bxckq 
Akjsdeok bx haki jknbdokq hak qbjc gdjgtwbj jees. 

“D qeo’h coep, vth pabhklkj dh pbx, dh pbx qbonkjetx,” 
xak xbdq mdjswi, bnbdo doxgjdvdon b mdkji gjexx tyeo 
hak qeej. 

Eogk sejk hak pbww xyto boq vkgbsk xhdww bnbdo. 
Abjji byyjebgakq b qeej bh jboqes boq ytxakq. Dh 
qdq oeh selk. 

“Pabh’x pjeon?” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Dh’x ... wegckq ...” xbdq Abjji, hajepdon adx pkdnah bh 
hak qeej, vth dh qdq oeh vtqnk. 

“Hadx dx dh, hako, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Jeo kugdhkqwi, zedodon 
Abjji do hak bhhksyh he mejgk hak qeej eyko. “Vetoq 
he vk!” 

“Nkh eth em hak pbi!” xbdq Akjsdeok xabjywi. Xak 
yedohkq akj pboq bh hak ywbgk pakjk b wegc petwq 
ablk vkko eo bo ejqdobji qeej boq xbdq, “Bweaesejb\” 

Oehadon abyykokq. 

“Xdjdtx’x codmk!” xbdq Abjji, boq ak ytwwkq dh eth mjes 
doxdqk adx jevkx boq xwdq dh dohe hak gjbgc vkhpkko hak 
qeej boq hak pbww. Hak ehakjx bww pbhgakq kbnkjwi bx 
ak jbo dh mjes hey he vehhes, pdhaqjkp dh, boq hako 
mwton adx xaetwqkj bnbdo bh hak qeej. Dh jksbdokq bx 
mdjswi xath bx klkj. Pabh pbx sejk, pako Abjji 
weeckq qepo bh hak codmk, ak xbp habh hak vwbqk abq 
skwhkq. 

“Jdnah, pk’jk wkbldon habh jees,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
qkgdxdlkwi. 

“Vth pabh dm habh’x hak eok?” xbdq Jeo, xhbjdon bh dh 
pdha b sduhtjk em byyjkakoxdeo boq weondon. 

“Dh gbo’h vk, Abjji getwq nkh hajetna bww hak qeejx do 
adx qjkbs,” xbdq Akjsdeok, sbjcdon hak qeej pdha 
boehakj mdkji gjexx bx Abjji jkywbgkq hak oep-txkwkxx 
aboqwk em Xdjdtx’x codmk do adx yegckh. 

“Iet coep pabh getwq vk do hakjk?” xbdq Wtob 
kbnkjwi, bx hak pbww xhbjhkq he xydo ikh bnbdo. 

“Xeskhadon vwdvvkjdon, oe qetvh,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
toqkj akj vjkbha, boq Okldwwk nblk b okjletx wdhhwk 
wbtna. 

Hak pbww xwdq vbgc he b abwh boq Abjji, pdha b mkkwdon 
em dogjkbxdon qkxykjbhdeo, ytxakq hak okuh qeej eyko. 

“Hadx dx dh!” 

Ak cokp dh bh eogk vi hak vkbthdmtw, qbogdon, 
qdbseoq-xybjcwdon wdnah. Bx Abjji’x kikx vkgbsk 
sejk bggtxheskq he hak vjdwwdboh nwbjk ak xbp gwegcx 
nwkbsdon mjes klkji xtjmbgk, wbjnk boq xsbww, 
njboqmbhakj boq gbjjdbnk, abondon do xybgkx vkhpkko 
hak veecgbxkx ej xhboqdon eo qkxcx jbondon hak 
wkonha em hak jees, xe habh b vtxi, jkwkohwkxx hdgcdon 
mdwwkq hak ywbgk wdck haetxboqx em sdotxgtwk, 
sbjgadon meehxhkyx. Hak xetjgk em hak qbogdon, 
qdbseoq-vjdnah wdnah pbx b hepkjdon gjixhbw vkww zbj 
habh xheeq bh hak mbj koq em hak jees. 

“Hadx pbi!” 

Abjji’x akbjh pbx ytsydon mjbohdgbwwi oep habh ak 
cokp haki pkjk eo hak jdnah hjbgc. Ak wkq hak pbi 
mejpbjq qepo hak objjep xybgk vkhpkko hak wdokx em 
hak qkxcx, akbqdon, bx ak abq qeok do adx qjkbs, mej 
hak xetjgk em hak wdnah, hak gjixhbw vkww zbj ftdhk bx hbww 
bx ak pbx habh xheeq eo b qkxc boq byykbjkq he vk 
mtww em b vdwwepdon, nwdhhkjdon pdoq. 

“Ea weec).” xbdq Ndooi, bx haki qjkp okbjkj, yedohdon 
bh hak lkji akbjh em hak vkww zbj. 

Qjdmhdon bweon do hak xybjcwdon gtjjkoh doxdqk pbx b 
hdoi, zkpkw-vjdnah knn. Bx dh jexk do hak zbj dh gjbgckq 
eyko boq b atssdonvdjq kskjnkq, padga pbx gbjjdkq 
he hak lkji hey em hak zbj, vth bx dh mkww eo hak qjbmh, dhx 
mkbhakjx vkgbsk vkqjbnnwkq boq qbsy bnbdo, boq vi 
hak hdsk dh abq vkko vejok vbgc he hak vehhes em hak 
zbj dh abq vkko kogwexkq eogk sejk do dhx knn. 

“Ckky nedon!” xbdq Abjji xabjywi, vkgbtxk Ndooi 
xaepkq xdnox em pbohdon he xhey boq pbhga hak knn’x 
yjenjkxx vbgc dohe b vdjq. 

“Iet qbpqwkq koetna vi habh ewq bjga!” xak xbdq 
gjexxwi, vth mewwepkq ads ybxh hak vkww zbj he hak eowi 
qeej vkadoq dh. 

“Hadx dx dh,” Abjji xbdq bnbdo, boq adx akbjh pbx oep 
ytsydon xe abjq boq mbxh ak mkwh dh stxh dohkjmkjk 
pdha adx xykkga. “Dh’x hajetna akjk — ” 

Ak nwbogkq bjetoq bh haks bww. Haki abq hakdj pboqx 
eth boq weeckq xtqqkowi xkjdetx boq boudetx. Ak 
weeckq vbgc bh hak qeej boq ytxakq. Dh xpton eyko. 

Haki pkjk hakjk, haki abq metoq hak ywbgk: adna bx b 
gatjga boq mtww em oehadon vth hepkjdon xakwlkx 
gelkjkq do xsbww, qtxhi, nwbxx ejvx. Haki nwdsskjkq 
qtwwi do hak wdnah dxxtdon mjes sejk gboqwk vjbgckhx 
xkh bh dohkjlbwx bweon hak xakwlkx. Wdck haexk do hak 
gdjgtwbj jees vkadoq haks, hakdj mwbskx pkjk vtjodon 
vwtk. Hak jees pbx lkji gewq. 

Abjji kqnkq mejpbjq boq ykkjkq qepo eok em hak 
xabqepi bdxwkx vkhpkko hpe jepx em xakwlkx. Ak getwq 
oeh akbj boihadon oej xkk hak xwdnahkxh xdno em 
selkskoh. 

“Iet xbdq dh pbx jep odokhi-xklko,” padxykjkq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Ikba,” vjkbhakq Abjji, weecdon ty bh hak koq em hak 
gwexkxh jep. Vkokbha hak vjboga em vwtk-nwepdon 
gboqwkx yjehjtqdon mjes dh nwdsskjkq hak xdwlkj mdntjk 
53 . 

“Pk okkq he ne jdnah, D hadoc,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok, 
xftdohdon he hak okuh jep. “Ikx ... habh’x mdmhi-metj...” 

“Ckky ietj pboqx eth,” Abjji xbdq xemhwi. 

Haki gjkyh mejpbjq, xhbjdon vkadoq haks bx haki pkoh 
eo qepo hak weon bwwkix em xakwlkx, hak mbjhakj koqx em 
padga pkjk do okbj hehbw qbjcokxx. Hdoi, ikwwepdon 
wbvkwx abq vkko xhtgc vkokbha kbga nwbxx ejv eo hak 
xakwm. Xesk em haks abq b pkdjq, wdftdq nwep; ehakjx 
pkjk bx qtww boq qbjc pdhado bx vwepo wdnahvtwvx. 

Haki ybxxkq jep kdnahi-metj ... kdnahi-mdlk ... Abjji 
pbx wdxhkodon abjq mej hak xwdnahkxh xetoq em 
selkskoh, vth Xdjdtx sdnah vk nbnnkq oep, ej kwxk 
togeoxgdetx ... ej, xbdq bo tovdqqko ledgk doxdqk adx 
akbq, ak sdnah bwjkbqi vk qkbq... 

D’q ablk mkwh dh, ak hewq adsxkwm, adx akbjh oep 
absskjdon bnbdoxh adx Bqbs’x byywk. D’q bwjkbqi 
coep... 

“Odokhi-xklko!” padxykjkq Akjsdeok. 

Haki xheeq njetykq bjetoq hak koq em hak jep, nbrdon 
qepo hak bwwki vkxdqk dh. Hakjk pbx oeveqi hakjk. 

“Ak’x jdnah qepo bh hak koq,” xbdq Abjji, paexk 
setha abq vkgesk xwdnahwi qji. “Iet gbo’h xkk 
yjeykjwi mjes akjk...” 

Boq ak wkq haks mejpbjq, vkhpkko hak hepkjdon jepx 
em nwbxx vbwwx, xesk em padga nwepkq xemhwi bx haki 
ybxxkq... 

“Ak xaetwq vk okbj akjk,” padxykjkq Abjji, geoldogkq 
habh klkji xhky pbx nedon he vjdon hak jbnnkq mejs em 
Xdjdtx dohe ldkp tyeo hak qbjckokq mweej. “Boipakjk 
akjk ... jkbwwi gwexk ...” 

“Abjji?” xbdq Akjsdeok hkohbhdlkwi, vth ak qdq oeh 
pboh he jkxyeoq. Adx setha pbx lkji qji oep. 

“Xeskpakjk bveth ... akjk ...” ak xbdq. 

Haki abq jkbgakq hak koq em hak jep boq kskjnkq 
dohe sejk qds gboqwkwdnah. Hakjk pbx oeveqi hakjk bh 
bww. Bww pbx kgaedon, qtxhi xdwkogk. 

“Ak sdnah vk ...” Abjji padxykjkq aebjxkwi, ykkjdon 
qepo hak bwwki okuh qeej. “Ej sbivk ...” Ak atjjdkq he 
weec qepo hak eok vkieoq habh. 

“Abjji?” xbdq Akjsdeok bnbdo. 

“Pabh?” ak xobjwkq. 

“D ... D qeo’h hadoc Xdjdtx dx akjk.” 

Oeveqi xyeck. Abjji qdq oeh pboh he weec bh boi em 
haks. Ak mkwh xdgc. Ak qdq oeh toqkjxhboq pai Xdjdtx 
pbx oeh akjk. Ak abq he vk akjk. Hadx pbx pakjk ak, 
Abjji, abq xkko ads... 

Ak jbo ty hak xybgk bh hak koq em hak jepx, xhbjdon 
qepo haks. Ksyhi bdxwk bmhkj ksyhi bdxwk mwdgckjkq 
ybxh. Ak jbo hak ehakj pbi, vbgc ybxh adx xhbjdon 
gesybodeox. Hakjk pbx oe xdno em Xdjdtx boipakjk, 
oej boi adoh em b xhjtnnwk. 

“Abjji?” Jeo gbwwkq. 

“Pabh?” 

Ak qdq oeh pboh he akbj pabh Jeo abq he xbi, qdq oeh 
pboh he akbj Jeo hkww ads ak abq vkko xhtydq, ej 
xtnnkxh habh haki etnah he ne vbgc he Aenpbjhx. Vth 
hak akbh pbx jdxdon do adx mbgk boq ak mkwh bx haetna 
ak petwq wdck he xctwc qepo akjk do hak qbjcokxx mej 
b weon padwk vkmejk mbgdon hak vjdnahokxx em hak Bhjdts 
bvelk boq hak ehakjx’ bggtxdon xhbjkx... 

“Ablk iet xkko hadx?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji, vth kbnkjwi hadx hdsk — dh abq he 
vk b xdno habh Xdjdtx abq vkko hakjk, b gwtk — ak 
xhjeqk vbgc he pakjk haki pkjk bww xhboqdon, b wdhhwk 
pbi qepo jep odokhi-xklko, vth metoq oehadon kugkyh 
Jeo xhbjdon bh eok em hak qtxhi nwbxx xyakjkx eo hak 
xakwlkx. 

“Pabh?” Abjji jkykbhkq nwtswi. 

“Dh’x — dh’x neh ietj obsk eo,” xbdq Jeo. 

Abjji selkq b wdhhwk gwexkj. Jeo pbx yedohdon bh eok em 
hak xsbww nwbxx xyakjkx habh nwepkq pdha b qtww dookj 
wdnah, haetna dh pbx lkji qtxhi boq byykbjkq oeh he 
ablk vkko hetgakq mej sboi ikbjx. 

“Si obsk?” xbdq Abjji vwbocwi. 

Ak xhkyykq mejpbjq. Oeh bx hbww bx Jeo, ak abq he 
gjbok adx okgc he jkbq hak ikwwepdxa wbvkw bmmdukq he 
hak xakwm jdnah vkokbha hak qtxhi nwbxx vbww. Do xydqkji 
pjdhdon pbx pjdhhko b qbhk em xesk xduhkko ikbjx 
yjkldetxwi, boq vkwep habh: 

X.Y.H. he B.Y.P.V.Q. 

Qbjc Wejq 

boq (?) Abjji Yehhkj 

Abjji xhbjkq bh dh. 

“Pabh dx dh?” Jeo bxckq, xetoqdon tookjlkq. “Pabh’x 
ietj obsk qedon qepo akjk?” 

Ak nwbogkq bweon bh hak ehakj wbvkwx eo habh xhjkhga em 
xakwm. 

‘Hs oeh akjk,” ak xbdq, xetoqdon ykjywkukq. “Oeok em 
hak jkxh em tx bjk akjk...” 

“Abjji, D qeo’h hadoc iet xaetwq hetga dh,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok xabjywi, bx ak xhjkhgakq eth adx aboq. 

“Pai oeh?” ak xbdq. “Dh’x xeskhadon he qe pdha sk, 
dxo’h dh?” 

“Qeo’h, Abjji,” xbdq Okldwwk xtqqkowi. Abjji weeckq 
bjetoq bh ads. Okldwwk’x jetoq mbgk pbx xadodon 
xwdnahwi pdha xpkbh. Ak weeckq bx haetna ak getwq oeh 
hbck stga sejk xtxykoxk. 

“Dh’x neh si obsk eo,” xbdq Abjji. 

Boq mkkwdon xwdnahwi jkgcwkxx, ak gwexkq adx mdonkjx 
bjetoq hak qtxhi vbww’x xtjmbgk. Ak abq kuykghkq dh he 
mkkw gewq, vth dh qdq oeh. Eo hak geohjbji, dh mkwh bx 
haetna dh abq vkko widon do hak xto mej aetjx, bx 
haetna hak nwep em wdnah pdhado pbx pbjsdon dh. 
Kuykghdon, klko aeydon, habh xeskhadon qjbsbhdg pbx 
nedon he abyyko, xeskhadon kugdhdon habh sdnah sbck 
hakdj weon boq qbonkjetx zetjoki pejhapadwk bmhkj bww, 
ak wdmhkq hak nwbxx vbww qepo mjes dhx xakwm boq xhbjkq 
bh dh. 

Oehadon pabhxeklkj abyykokq. Hak ehakjx selkq do 
gwexkj bjetoq Abjji, nbrdon bh hak ejv bx ak vjtxakq 
dh mjkk em hak gwenndon qtxh. 

Boq hako, mjes jdnah vkadoq haks, b qjbpwdon ledgk 
xbdq, “Lkji neeq, Yehhkj. Oep htjo bjetoq, odgk boq 
xwepwi, boq ndlk habh he sk.” 

35 

VKIEOQ HAK LKDW 

Vwbgc xabykx pkjk kskjndon eth em hado bdj bww bjetoq 
haks, vwegcdon hakdj pbi wkmh boq jdnah; kikx nwdohkq 
hajetna xwdhx do aeeqx, b qerko wdh pboq hdyx pkjk 
yedohdon qdjkghwi bh hakdj akbjhx. Ndooi nblk b nbxy em 
aejjej. 

“He sk, Yehhkj,” jkykbhkq hak qjbpwdon ledgk em Wtgdtx 
Sbwmei bx ak akwq eth adx aboq, ybws ty. 

Abjji’x doxdqkx ywtsskhkq xdgckodonwi. Haki pkjk 
hjbyykq boq ethotsvkjkq hpe he eok. 

“He sk,” xbdq Sbwmei ikh bnbdo. 

“Pakjk’x Xdjdtx?” Abjji xbdq. 

Xklkjbw em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx wbtnakq. B abjxa mksbwk 
ledgk mjes hak sdqxh em hak xabqepi mdntjkx he Abjji’x 
wkmh xbdq hjdtsyabohwi, “Hak Qbjc Wejq bwpbix 
coepx!” 

“Bwpbix,” kgaekq Sbwmei xemhwi. “Oep, ndlk sk hak 
yjeyakgi, Yehhkj.” 

“D pboh he coep pakjk Xdjdtx dx!” 

“D pboh he coep pakjk Xdjdtx dx!” sdsdgckq hak pesbo 
he adx wkmh. 

Xak boq akj mkwwep Qkbha Kbhkjx abq gwexkq do xe habh 
haki pkjk skjk mkkh bpbi mjes Abjji boq hak ehakjx, 
hak wdnah mjes hakdj pboqx qbrrwdon Abjji’x kikx. 

“Iet’lk neh ads,” xbdq Abjji, dnoejdon hak jdxdon ybodg 
do adx gakxh, hak qjkbq ak abq vkko mdnahdon xdogk 
haki abq mdjxh kohkjkq hak odokhi-xklkoha jep. “Ak’x 
akjk. D coep ak dx.” 

“Hak wdhhwk vbvi peck ty mpdnahkokq boq mejh pabh dh 
qpkbskq pbx hpee,” xbdq hak pesbo do b aejjdvwk, 
segc-vbvi ledgk. Abjji mkwh Jeo xhdj vkxdqk ads. 

“Qeo’h qe boihadon,” ak sthhkjkq. “Oeh ikh — ” 

Hak pesbo pae abq sdsdgckq ads wkh eth b jbtgetx 
xgjkbs em wbtnahkj. 

“Iet akbj ads? Iet akbj ads? Ndldon doxhjtghdeox he 
hak ehakj gadwqjko bx haetna ak hadocx em mdnahdon tx!” 

“Ea, iet qeo’h coep Yehhkj bx D qe, Vkwwbhjdu,” xbdq 
Sbwmei xemhwi. “Ak abx b njkbh pkbcokxx mej akjedgx; 
hak Qbjc Wejq toqkjxhboqx hadx bveth ads. Oep ndlk 
sk hak yjeyakgi, Yehhkj.” 

“D coep Xdjdtx dx akjk,” xbdq Abjji, haetna ybodg pbx 
gbtxdon adx gakxh he geoxhjdgh boq ak mkwh bx haetna 
ak getwq oeh vjkbhak yjeykjwi. “D coep iet’lk neh 
ads!” 

Sejk em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx wbtnakq, haetna hak pesbo 
xhdww wbtnakq wetqkxh em bww. 

“Dh’x hdsk iet wkbjokq hak qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko wdmk boq 
qjkbsx, Yehhkj,” xbdq Sbwmei. “Oep ndlk sk hak 
yjeyakgi, ej pk xhbjh txdon pboqx.”

gakxh akdnah. Bx ak qdq xe, hak mdlk pboqx em Jeo, 
Akjsdeok, Okldwwk, Ndooi, boq Wtob jexk eo kdhakj 
xdqk em ads. Hak coeh do Abjji’x xhesbga hdnahkokq. Dm 
Xdjdtx jkbwwi pbx oeh akjk, ak abq wkq adx mjdkoqx he 
hakdj qkbhax mej oe jkbxeo bh bww... 

Vth hak Qkbha Kbhkjx qdq oeh xhjdck. 

“Aboq elkj hak yjeyakgi boq oe eok okkq nkh atjh,” 
xbdq Sbwmei geewwi. 

Dh pbx Abjji’x htjo he wbtna. 

“Ikba, jdnah!” ak xbdq. “D ndlk iet hadx — yjeyakgi, dx 
dh? Boq iet’ww ztxh wkh tx xcdy emm aesk, pdww iet?” 

Hak pejqx pkjk abjqwi eth em adx setha pako hak 
mksbwk Qkbha Kbhkj xajdkckq, “Bggde Yjeya — ”

pesbo. “Dm iet xsbxa dh — !”

xtjk habh oeok em adx mjdkoqx ybdq b hkjjdvwk yjdgk mej

wdck, vth dh pbx bwdlk pdha b mklkjdxa, mbobhdgbw nwep.

qe dh.”

xhkyykq xdqkpbix xe habh ak pbx jdnah do mjeoh em akj,

hee ywkbxkq dm iet gesk vbgc pdhaeth dh, pdww ak?”

akj heontk sedxhkodon akj hado setha.

em haks xhjtgc. Haki pkjk bww nbrdon, eykosethakq, 
byybwwkq, bh pabh pbx abyykodon he hak sbo’x akbq. 

Dh pbx xajdocdon lkji mbxh, njepdon vbwqkj boq vbwqkj, 
hak vwbgc abdj boq xhtvvwk jkhjbghdon dohe adx xctww, 
adx gakkcx xseeha, adx xctww jetoq boq gelkjkq pdha 
b ykbgawdck mtrr...

nkh ty bnbdo. Vth klko bx haki pbhgakq, hakdj sethax 
eyko, hak akbq vknbo he xpkww he dhx yjkldetx 
yjeyejhdeox bnbdo, hadgc vwbgc abdj pbx xyjethdon 
mjes hak ybhk boq gado... 

“Dh’x hdsk,” xbdq Akjsdeok do bo bpkxhjtgc ledgk. 

“ Hdsk ...” 

Hak Qkbha Kbhkj xaeec adx tnwi akbq bnbdo, hjidon he 
gwkbj dh, vth vkmejk ak getwq ytww adsxkwm henkhakj 
bnbdo, dh vknbo he xajdoc vbgc he vbviaeeq eogk 
sejk... 

Hakjk pbx b xaeth mjes b jees okbjvi, hako b gjbxa 
boq b xgjkbs. 

“JEO?” Abjji ikwwkq, htjodon ftdgcwi mjes hak 
seoxhjetx hjboxmejsbhdeo hbcdon ywbgk vkmejk haks. 
“NDOOI? WTOB?” 

“Abjji!” Akjsdeok xgjkbskq. 

Hak Qkbha Kbhkj abq ytwwkq adx akbq eth em hak vkww 
zbj. Adx byykbjbogk pbx thhkjwi vdrbjjk, adx hdoi 
vbvi’x akbq vbpwdon wetqwi padwk adx hadgc bjsx 

mwbdwkq qbonkjetxwi do bww qdjkghdeox, objjepwi sdxxdon 
Abjji, pae qtgckq. Abjji jbdxkq adx pboq vth he adx 
bsbrkskoh Akjsdeok xkdrkq adx bjs. 

“Iet gbo’h atjh b vbvi!” 

Hakjk pbx oe hdsk he bjntk hak yedoh. Abjji getwq 
akbj sejk meehxhkyx njepdon wetqkj mjes hak Abww em 
Yjeyakgi haki abq ztxh wkmh boq cokp, hee wbhk, habh 
ak etnah oeh he ablk xaethkq boq ndlko bpbi hakdj 
yexdhdeo. 

“Gesk eo!” ak xbdq bnbdo, boq wkbldon hak tnwi vbvi- 
akbqkq Qkbha Kbhkj xhbnnkjdon vkadoq haks, haki 
heec emm mej hak qeej habh xheeq bzbj bh hak ehakj koq em 
hak jees, wkbqdon vbgc dohe hak vwbgc abwwpbi. 

Haki abq jto abwmpbi hepbjq dh pako Abjji xbp 
hajetna hak eyko qeej hpe sejk Qkbha Kbhkjx 
jtoodon bgjexx hak vwbgc jees hepbjq haks. Lkkjdon 
wkmh ak vtjxh doxhkbq dohe b xsbww, qbjc, gwthhkjkq 
emmdgk boq xwbsskq hak qeej vkadoq haks. 

“Gewwe — ” vknbo Akjsdeok, vth vkmejk xak getwq 
gesywkhk hak xykww hak qeej abq vtjxh eyko bnbdo boq 
hak hpe Qkbha Kbhkjx abq gesk atjhwdon doxdqk. Pdha 
b gji em hjdtsya, veha ikwwkq, “ DSYKQDSKOH B\” 

Abjji, Akjsdeok, boq Okldwwk pkjk bww coegckq 
vbgcpbjq emm hakdj mkkh. Okldwwk pbx hajepo elkj hak 
qkxc boq qdxbyykbjkq mjes ldkp, Akjsdeok xsbxakq 
dohe b veecgbxk boq pbx yjesyhwi qkwtnkq do b 
gbxgbqk em akbli veecx; hak vbgc em Abjji’x akbq 
xwbsskq dohe hak xheok pbww vkadoq ads, hdoi wdnahx 
vtjxh do mjeoh em adx kikx, boq mej b seskoh ak pbx 
hee qdrri boq vkpdwqkjkq he jkbgh. 

“PKLK NEH ADS!” ikwwkq hak Qkbha Kbhkj okbjkxh 
Abjji, “DO BO EMMDGK EMM — ” 

“ Xdwkogdew ” gjdkq Akjsdeok, boq hak sbo’x ledgk pbx 
kuhdontdxakq. Ak geohdotkq he setha hajetna hak 
aewk do adx sbxc, vth oe xetoq gbsk eth; ak pbx 
hajtxh bxdqk vi adx mkwwep. 

“Ykhjdmdgtx Hehbwtxw” xaethkq Abjji, bx hak xkgeoq 
Qkbha Kbhkj jbdxkq adx pboq. Adx bjsx boq wknx 
xobyykq henkhakj boq ak mkww mejpbjq, mbgkqepo eohe 
hak jtn bh Abjji’x mkkh, xhdmm bx b vebjq boq tobvwk he 
selk bh bww. 

“Pkww qeok, Ab — ” 

Vth hak Qkbha Kbhkj Akjsdeok abq ztxh xhjtgc qtsv 
sbqk b xtqqko xwbxadon selkskoh pdha adx pboq 
mjes padga mwkp b xhjkbc em pabh weeckq wdck ytjywk 
mwbsk. Dh ybxxkq jdnah bgjexx Akjsdeok’x gakxh; xak 
nblk b hdoi “ea!” bx haetna em xtjyjdxk boq hako 
gjtsywkq eohe hak mweej pakjk xak wbi sehdeowkxx. 

“AKJSDEOK!” 

Abjji mkww he adx cokkx vkxdqk akj bx Okldwwk gjbpwkq 
jbydqwi hepbjq akj mjes toqkj hak qkxc, adx pboq 
akwq ty do mjeoh em ads. Hak Qkbha Kbhkj cdgckq eth 
abjq bh Okldwwk’x akbq bx ak kskjnkq — adx meeh vjeck

Okldwwk nblk b aepw em ybdo boq jkgedwkq, gwthgadon adx 
setha boq oexk. Abjji hpdxhkq bjetoq, adx epo pboq 
akwq adna, boq xbp habh hak Qkbha Kbhkj abq jdyykq 
emm adx sbxc boq pbx yedohdon adx pboq qdjkghwi bh 
Abjji, pae jkgenodrkq hak weon, ybwk, hpdxhkq mbgk 
mjes hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh: Boheodo Qeweael, hak pdrbjq 
pae abq stjqkjkq hak Yjkpkhhx. 

Qeweael njdookq. Pdha adx mjkk aboq, ak yedohkq mjes 
hak yjeyakgi xhdww gwthgakq do Abjji’x aboq, he 
adsxkwm, hako bh Akjsdeok. Haetna ak getwq oe weonkj 

xykbc adx skbodon getwq oeh ablk vkko gwkbjkj: Ndlk 
sk hak yjeyakgi, ej iet nkh hak xbsk bx akj... 

“Wdck iet peo’h cdww tx bww hak seskoh D aboq dh elkj 
boipbi!” xbdq Abjji. 

B padok em ybodg doxdqk adx akbq pbx yjklkohdon ads

xaetwqkj, padga pbx xhdww pbjs, ikh qdq oeh qbjk weec

gado, “qeo’q ndv dh he ads!”

bjetoq ads.

qtooe...”

“Xak’x bwdlk?” 

“Ikba, D qdoc xe...”

pkjk hak padsykjx boq vwtoqkjdonx em hak vbvi 
Qkbha Kbhkj do hak okuh jees.

“iet’q vkhhkj hbck hadx...”

qbq’x ewq pboq...”

... ckky gwexk vkadoq sk...”

qkxkjhkq. Haki pbwckq b mkp xhkyx mejpbjq, Okldwwk

“Xe padga pbi q’iet jkgc — ?” 

Vth vkmejk haki getwq sbck b qkgdxdeo bx he padga

ykeywk mkww eth em dh.

cdoq em vep.

B vtvvwk em vweeq njkp bh hak gejokj em Jeo’x setha

vjkbhadon do b lkji xabwwep pbi, akj kikx xhdww gwexkq.

“Wtob, gbo iet akwy Ndooi?”

abq b eok-do-hpkwlk gabogk em nkhhdon hak kudh jdnah 
hak mdjxh hdsk —

Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk.

hajkxaewq ztxh do hdsk he xwbs hak qeej bnbdoxh 
Vkwwbhjdu.

habh pkdjq, Abjji?”

Vth Jeo abq bwjkbqi yedohkq adx pboq bh hak hboc. 

“Aeokxh, Abjji, haki’jk vjbdox — weec — Bggde Vjbdo\” 

Hak xgkok xkkskq seskohbjdwi mjerko. Abjji, Ndooi,

qdxnejnk dhx nbtqi doobjqx. “Abjji, gesk boq hetga

“JEO, OE!” 

Abjji qdq oeh coep pabh petwq abyyko dm Jeo 
hetgakq hak hkohbgwkx em haetnah oep mwidon vkadoq

hak vjbdo do adx ethxhjkhgakq aboqx.

hkohbgwkx vknbo pjbyydon haksxkwlkx bjetoq Jeo’x 
bjsx wdck jeykx.

— oe, xhey — xhey — ” 

Vth hak hado jdvveox pkjk xydoodon bjetoq Jeo’x 
gakxh oep. Ak htnnkq boq hejk bh haks bx hak vjbdo 
pbx ytwwkq hdnah bnbdoxh ads wdck bo egheytx’x veqi. 

“Qdmmdoqew” ikwwkq Abjji, hjidon he xklkj hak mkkwkjx
