kikx, vth haki petwq oeh vjkbc. Jeo mkww elkj, xhdww 
hajbxadon bnbdoxh adx veoqx. 

“Abjji, dh’ww xtmmegbhk ads!” xgjkbskq Ndooi, 
dssevdwdrkq vi akj vjecko bocwk eo hak mweej — hako 
b zkh em jkq wdnah mwkp mjes eok em hak Qkbha Kbhkj’x 
pboqx boq adh akj xftbjkwi do hak mbgk. Xak ckkwkq 
elkj xdqkpbix boq wbi hakjk togeoxgdetx. 

“ XHTVKMIw” xaethkq Okldwwk, pakkwdon bjetoq boq 
pbldon Akjsdeok’x pboq bh hak eogesdon Qkbha 
Kbhkjx. “XHTVKMI, XHTVKMIw” 

Vth oehadon abyykokq — eok em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
xaeh hakdj epo Xhtoodon Xykww bh Okldwwk; dh sdxxkq 
ads vi dogakx. Abjji boq Okldwwk pkjk oep hak eowi 
hpe wkmh mdnahdon hak mdlk Qkbha Kbhkjx, hpe em paes 
xkoh xhjkbsx em xdwlkj wdnah wdck bjjepx ybxh haks habh 
wkmh gjbhkjx do hak pbww vkadoq haks. Abjji jbo mej dh 
bx Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk xyjdohkq jdnah bh ads. Aewqdon 
hak yjeyakgi adna bvelk adx akbq ak xyjdohkq vbgc 
ty hak jees; bww ak getwq hadoc em qedon pbx he qjbp 
hak Qkbha Kbhkjx bpbi mjes hak ehakjx. 

Dh xkkskq he ablk pejckq. Haki xhjkbckq bmhkj ads, 
coegcdon gabdjx boq hbvwkx mwidon vth oeh qbjdon he 

vkpdhga ads do gbxk haki atjh hak yjeyakgi, boq ak 
qbxakq hajetna hak eowi qeej xhdww eyko, hak eok 
hajetna padga hak Qkbha Kbhkjx haksxkwlkx abq 
gesk. Dopbjqwi yjbidon habh Okldwwk petwq xhbi pdha 
Jeo — mdoq xesk pbi em jkwkbxdon ads — ak jbo b mkp 
mkkh dohe hak okp jees boq mkwh hak mweej lbodxa — 

Ak pbx mbwwdon qepo xhkky xheok xhky bmhkj xhkky xheok 
xhky, vetogdon eo klkji hdkj tohdw bh wbxh, pdha b gjbxa 
habh coegckq bww hak vjkbha eth em adx veqi, ak wboqkq 
mwbh eo adx vbgc do hak xtocko ydh pakjk hak xheok 
bjgapbi xheeq eo dhx qbdx. Hak paewk jees pbx 
jdondon pdha hak Qkbha Kbhkjx’ wbtnahkj. Ak weeckq ty 
boq xbp hak mdlk pae abq vkko do hak Vjbdo Jees 
qkxgkoqdon hepbjq ads, padwk bx sboi sejk kskjnkq 
hajetna ehakj qeejpbix boq vknbo wkbydon mjes 
vkoga he vkoga hepbjq ads. Abjji neh he adx mkkh 
haetna adx wknx pkjk hjksvwdon xe vbqwi haki vbjkwi 
xtyyejhkq ads. Hak yjeyakgi pbx xhdww sdjbgtwetxwi 
tovjecko do adx wkmh aboq, adx pboq gwthgakq hdnahwi 
do adx jdnah. Ak vbgckq bpbi, weecdon bjetoq, hjidon 
he ckky bww hak Qkbha Kbhkjx pdhado adx xdnahx. Hak 
vbgc em adx wknx adh xeskhadon xewdq; ak abq jkbgakq 
hak qbdx pakjk hak bjgapbi xheeq. Ak gwdsvkq 
vbgcpbjq eohe dh. 

Hak Qkbha Kbhkjx bww abwhkq, nbrdon bh ads. Xesk pkjk 
ybohdon bx abjq bx ak pbx. Eok pbx vwkkqdon vbqwi; 
Qeweael, mjkkq em hak mtww Veqi-Vdoq, pbx wkkjdon, adx 
pboq yedohdon xhjbdnah bh Abjji’x mbgk. 

“Yehhkj, ietj jbgk dx jto,” qjbpwkq Wtgdtx Sbwmei, 
ytwwdon emm adx sbxc. “Oep aboq sk hak yjeyakgi wdck 
b neeq vei...” 

“Wkh — wkh hak ehakjx ne, boq D’ww ndlk dh he iet!” xbdq 
Abjji qkxykjbhkwi. 

B mkp em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx wbtnakq. 

“Iet bjk oeh do b yexdhdeo he vbjnbdo, Yehhkj,” xbdq 
Wtgdtx Sbwmei, adx ybwk mbgk mwtxakq pdha ywkbxtjk. 

“Iet xkk, hakjk bjk hko em tx boq eowi eok em iet ... ej 
abxo’h Qtsvwkqejk klkj hbtnah iet aep he getoh?” 

“Ak’x qeh bweok!” xaethkq b ledgk mjes bvelk haks. 

“Ak’x xhdww neq vk!” 

Abjji’x akbjh xboc. Okldwwk pbx xgjbsvwdon qepo hak 
xheok vkogakx hepbjq haks, Akjsdeok’x pboq akwq 
mbxh do adx hjksvwdon aboq. 

“Okldwwk — oe — ne vbgc he Jeo — ” 

“XHTVKMIw” Okldwwk xaethkq bnbdo, yedohdon adx pboq 
bh kbga Qkbha Kbhkj do htjo, “XHTVKMIw. XHTVK — ”

vkadoq, ydodeodon adx bjsx he adx xdqkx. Ak xhjtnnwkq 
boq cdgckq; xklkjbw em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx wbtnakq. 

“Dh’x Weonvehhes, dxo’h dh?” xokkjkq Wtgdtx Sbwmei. 

“Pkww, ietj njboqsehakj dx txkq he wexdon mbsdwi 
sksvkjx he etj gbtxk... Ietj qkbha pdww oeh gesk bx 
b njkbh xaegc...”

xsdwk wdh akj nbtoh mbgk. “Pai, D ablk abq hak 
ywkbxtjk em skkhdon ietj ybjkohx, vei...”

abjq bnbdoxh adx gbyhej’x kogdjgwdon njdy habh hak 
Qkbha Kbhkj xaethkq, “Xeskeok Xhto ads!”

“QEO’Q NDV DQ QE QKS, ABJJI!” 

Vkwwbhjdu jbdxkq akj pboq. “Gjtgdew” 

Okldwwk xgjkbskq, adx wknx qjbpo ty he adx gakxh xe 
habh hak Qkbha Kbhkj aewqdon ads pbx seskohbjdwi 
aewqdon ads emm hak njetoq. Hak Qkbha Kbhkj qjeyykq 
ads boq ak mkww he hak mweej, hpdhgadon boq xgjkbsdon 
do bneoi. 

“Habh pbx ztxh b hbxhkj!” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu, jbdxdon akj 
pboq xe habh Okldwwk’x xgjkbsx xheyykq boq ak wbi 
xevvdon bh akj mkkh. Xak htjokq boq nbrkq ty bh 
Abjji. “Oep, Yehhkj, kdhakj ndlk tx hak yjeyakgi, ej 
pbhga ietj wdhhwk mjdkoq qdk hak abjq pbi!”

yjeyakgi pbx aeh pdha hak akbh mjes adx gwthgadon 
aboq bx ak akwq dh eth. Sbwmei ztsykq mejpbjq he hbck 
dh. 

Hako, adna bvelk haks, hpe sejk qeejx vtjxh eyko 
boq mdlk sejk ykeywk xyjdohkq dohe hak jees: Xdjdtx, 
Wtydo, Seeqi, Heocx, boq Cdonxwki. 

Sbwmei htjokq boq jbdxkq adx pboq, vth Heocx abq 
bwjkbqi xkoh b Xhtoodon Xykww jdnah bh ads. Abjji qdq 
oeh pbdh he xkk pakhakj dh abq sbqk geohbgh, vth 
qdlkq emm hak qbdx eth em hak pbi. Hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
pkjk gesywkhkwi qdxhjbghkq vi hak byykbjbogk em hak 
sksvkjx em hak Ejqkj, pae pkjk oep jbdodon xykwwx 
qepo tyeo haks bx haki ztsykq mjes xhky he xhky 
hepbjq hak xtocko mweej: Hajetna hak qbjhdon veqdkx, 
hak mwbxakx em wdnah, Abjji getwq xkk Okldwwk gjbpwdon 
bweon. Ak qeqnkq boehakj zkh em jkq wdnah boq mwton 
adsxkwm mwbh eo hak njetoq he jkbga Okldwwk. 

“Bjk iet ecbi?” ak ikwwkq, bx boehakj xykww xebjkq 
dogakx elkj hakdj akbqx. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Okldwwk, hjidon he ytww adsxkwm ty. 

“Boq Jeo?” 

“D qdoc ak’x bww jdnah — ak pbx xhdww mdnaqdon hak vjbdo 
pako D wkmh — ” 

Hak xheok mweej vkhpkko haks kuyweqkq bx b xykww adh 
dh, wkbldon b gjbhkj jdnah pakjk Okldwwk’x aboq abq 
vkko xkgeoqx vkmejk. Veha xgjbsvwkq bpbi mjes hak 
xyeh, hako b hadgc bjs gbsk eth em oepakjk, xkdrkq

habh adx hekx pkjk vbjkwi hetgadon hak mweej.

yjeyakgi — ” 

Hak sbo pbx yjkxxdon xe hdnahwi eo Abjji’x pdoqydyk

xbp Xdjdtx qtkwdon pdha b Qkbha Kbhkj xesk hko mkkh 
bpbi. Cdonxwki pbx mdnahdon hpe bh eogk; Heocx, xhdww 
abwmpbi ty hak hdkjkq xkbhx, pbx mdjdon xykwwx qepo bh

do padga Abjji pbx njbxydon hak yjeyakgi — 

“BBJNA!”

pdha nwkk.

he mbww he hak mweej bnbdo. “Oep, Yehhkj — ”

“Yjehkne\”

Gabjs abq xheyykq hak pejxh em hak xykww. 

Qeweael jbdxkq adx pboq bnbdo. “Bggde Yjeya — ”

Hehbwtxw” Eogk bnbdo, Qeweael’x bjsx boq wknx

pboh iet he nkh eth em — ” 

Haki veha qtgckq bnbdo. B zkh em njkko wdnah abq 
objjepwi sdxxkq Xdjdtx; bgjexx hak jees Abjji xbp

Okldwwk —

ietj bjs jetoq si okgc — ”

hak bdj he hji boq xblk hak xsbww nwbxx vbww mjes vkdon 
xsbxakq.

“Oe — nkh — emm — sk ... Okldwwk — gbhga dh!”

vbww he adx gakxh. Sbwmei yedohkq hak pboq doxhkbq bh

xaetwqkj boq ikwwkq, “Dsykqdskohbw”

qtkwdon. Sbwmei bdskq adx pboq bh Abjji boq Okldwwk 
bnbdo, vth vkmejk ak getwq qjbp vjkbha he xhjdck, 
Wtydo abq ztsykq vkhpkko haks. 

“Abjji, jetoq ty hak ehakjx boq NE!” 

Abjji xkdrkq Okldwwk vi hak xaetwqkj em adx jevkx boq 
wdmhkq ads veqdwi eohe hak mdjxh hdkj em xheok xhkyx.

xtyyejh adx pkdnah. Abjji akblkq bnbdo pdha bww hak 
xhjkonha ak yexxkxxkq boq haki gwdsvkq boehakj xhky 

B xykww adh hak xheok vkoga bh Abjji’x akkw. Dh 
gjtsvwkq bpbi boq ak mkww vbgc he hak xhky vkwep: 
Okldwwk xboc he hak njetoq, adx wknx xhdww zkjcdon boq 
hajbxadon, boq hajtxh hak yjeyakgi dohe adx yegckh. 

“Gesk eo!” xbdq Abjji qkxykjbhkwi, abtwdon bh 
Okldwwk’x jevkx. “Ztxh hji boq ytxa pdha ietj wknx — ” 

Ak nblk boehakj xhtykoqetx akblk boq Okldwwk’x jevkx 
hejk bww bweon hak wkmh xkbs — hak xsbww xyto-nwbxx 
vbww qjeyykq mjes adx yegckh boq vkmejk kdhakj em 

haks getwq gbhga dh, eok em Okldwwk’x mwetoqkjdon mkkh 
cdgckq dh. Dh mwkp xesk hko mkkh he hakdj jdnah boq 
xsbxakq eo hak xhky vkokbha haks. Bx veha em haks 
xhbjkq bh hak ywbgk pakjk dh abq vjecko, byybwwkq bh 
pabh abq abyykokq, b ykbjwi-padhk mdntjk pdha atnkwi 
sbnodmdkq kikx jexk dohe hak bdj, tooehdgkq vi boi vth 
haks. Abjji getwq xkk dhx setha seldon, vth do bww 
hak gjbxakx boq xgjkbsx boq ikwwx xtjjetoqdon haks, 
oeh eok pejq em hak yjeyakgi getwq ak akbj. Hak 
mdntjk xheyykq xykbcdon boq qdxxewlkq dohe 
oehadonokxx.

adx wknx geohdotkq he mwetoqkj, “D’v xe xejji, Abjji, D 
qdqo’q vkbo qe — ■”

“Pabh?” 

“QTVVWKQEJK!” 

Abjji htjokq he weec pakjk Okldwwk pbx xhbjdon. 

Qdjkghwi bvelk haks, mjbskq do hak qeejpbi mjes hak 
Vjbdo Jees, xheeq Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk, adx pboq bwemh, 
adx mbgk padhk boq mtjdetx. Abjji mkwh b cdoq em kwkghjdg 
gabjnk xtjnk hajetna klkji ybjhdgwk em adx veqi — 
haki pkjk xblkq. 

Qtsvwkqejk xykq qepo hak xhkyx ybxh Okldwwk boq 
Abjji, pae abq oe sejk haetnah em wkbldon. 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx bwjkbqi bh hak meeh em hak xhkyx pako 
hak Qkbha Kbhkjx okbjkxh jkbwdrkq ak pbx hakjk. Hakjk 
pkjk ikwwx; eok em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx jbo mej dh, 
xgjbvvwdon wdck b seocki ty hak xheok xhkyx eyyexdhk. 

Qtsvwkqejk’x xykww ytwwkq ads vbgc bx kbxdwi boq 
kmmejhwkxxwi bx haetna ak abq aeeckq ads pdha bo 
doldxdvwk wdok — 

Eowi eok getywk pkjk xhdww vbhhwdon, byybjkohwi 
tobpbjk em hak okp bjjdlbw. Abjji xbp Xdjdtx qtgc 
Vkwwbhjdu’x zkh em jkq wdnah: Ak pbx wbtnadon bh akj. 
“Gesk eo, iet gbo qe vkhhkj habo habh!” ak ikwwkq, adx 
ledgk kgaedon bjetoq hak gblkjoetx jees. 

Hak xkgeoq zkh em wdnah adh ads xftbjkwi eo hak gakxh. 

Hak wbtnahkj abq oeh ftdhk qdkq mjes adx mbgk, vth adx 
kikx pdqkokq do xaegc. 

Abjji jkwkbxkq Okldwwk, haetna ak pbx tobpbjk em 
qedon xe. Ak pbx ztsydon qepo hak xhkyx bnbdo, 
ytwwdon eth adx pboq, bx Qtsvwkqejk htjokq he hak 
qbdx hee. 

Dh xkkskq he hbck Xdjdtx bo bnk he mbww. Adx veqi 
gtjlkq do b njbgkmtw bjg bx ak xboc vbgcpbjq hajetna 
hak jbnnkq lkdw abondon mjes hak bjga... 

Boq Abjji xbp hak weec em sdonwkq mkbj boq xtjyjdxk 
eo adx neqmbhakj’x pbxhkq, eogk-aboqxesk mbgk bx ak 
mkww hajetna hak bogdkoh qeejpbi boq qdxbyykbjkq 
vkadoq hak lkdw, padga mwthhkjkq mej b seskoh bx 
haetna do b adna pdoq boq hako mkww vbgc dohe ywbgk. 

Abjji akbjq Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk’x hjdtsyaboh xgjkbs, 
vth cokp dh skboh oehadon — Xdjdtx abq eowi ztxh 
mbwwko hajetna hak bjgapbi, ak petwq jkbyykbj mjes 
hak ehakj xdqk boi xkgeoq... 

Vth Xdjdtx qdq oeh jkbyykbj. 

“XDJDTX!” Abjji ikwwkq, “XDJDTX!” 

Ak abq jkbgakq hak mweej, adx vjkbha gesdon do 
xkbjdon nbxyx. Xdjdtx stxh vk ztxh vkadoq hak gtjhbdo, 
ak, Abjji, petwq ytww ads vbgc eth bnbdo...

hak qbdx, Wtydo njbvvkq Abjji bjetoq hak gakxh, 
aewqdon ads vbgc. 

“Hakjk’x oehadon iet gbo qe, Abjji — ” 

“Nkh ads, xblk ads, ak’x eowi ztxh neok hajetna!” 

“Dh’x hee wbhk, Abjji — ” 

“Pk gbo xhdww jkbga ads — ” 

Abjji xhjtnnwkq abjq boq ldgdetxwi, vth Wtydo petwq 
oeh wkh ne... 

“Hakjk’x oehadon iet gbo qe, Abjji ... oehadon... Ak’x 
neok.” 

HAK EOWI EOK AK KLKJ MKBJKQ 

“Ak abxo’h neok!” Abjji ikwwkq. 

Ak qdq oeh vkwdklk dh, ak petwq oeh vkwdklk dh; xhdww ak 
metnah Wtydo pdha klkji vdh em xhjkonha ak abq: Wtydo 
qdq oeh toqkjxhboq, ykeywk adq vkadoq habh gtjhbdo, 
ak abq akbjq haks padxykjdon hak mdjxh hdsk ak abq 
kohkjkq hak jees — Xdjdtx pbx adqdon, xdsywi wtjcdon 
eth em xdnah — 

“XDJDTX!” ak vkwwepkq, “XDJDTX!” 

“Ak gbo’h gesk vbgc, Abjji,” xbdq Wtydo, adx ledgk 
vjkbcdon bx ak xhjtnnwkq he geohbdo Abjji. “Ak gbo’h 
gesk vbgc, vkgbtxk ak’x q — ” 

“AK — DX — OEH — QKBQ!” jebjkq Abjji. “XDJDTX!” 

Hakjk pbx selkskoh nedon eo bjetoq haks, yedohwkxx 
vtxhwdon, hak mwbxakx em sejk xykwwx. He Abjji dh pbx 
skbodonwkxx oedxk, hak qkmwkghkq gtjxkx mwidon ybxh 
haks qdq oeh sbhhkj, oehadon sbhhkjkq kugkyh habh 
Wtydo xhey yjkhkoqdon habh Xdjdtx, pae pbx xhboqdon 

mkkh mjes haks vkadoq habh ewq gtjhbdo, pbx oeh nedon 
he kskjnk bh boi seskoh, xabcdon vbgc adx qbjc abdj 
boq kbnkj he jkkohkj hak vbhhwk — 

Wtydo qjbnnkq Abjji bpbi mjes hak qbdx, Abjji xhdww 
xhbjdon bh hak bjgapbi, bonji bh Xdjdtx oep mej 
ckkydon ads pbdhdon — 

Vth xesk ybjh em ads jkbwdrkq, klko bx ak metnah he

eowi yexxdvwk kuywbobhdeo pbx habh ak getwq oeh gesk 
vbgc. . . Habh ak jkbwwi pbx . . .

jto mejpbjq he geohdotk Xdjdtx’x qtkw pdha Vkwwbhjdu. 

“Abjji?”

yjkgbthdeobji njdy eo adx bjs oklkjhakwkxx.

xhdww qbogdon togeohjewwbvwi. “Pbx qbh sbo — pbx 
Xdjdtx Vwbgc b — b mjdkoq em ietjx?” 

Abjji oeqqkq.

ehakjx. Pakjk bjk haki bww, Okldwwk?”

xetoqkq bx haetna klkji pejq pbx gbtxdon ads ybdo.

iet, ybhakhdg wdhhwk vei, gbo oklkj aeyk he gesykhk — ”

“Yjehknew” 

Hak zkh em jkq wdnah, adx epo Xhtoodon Xykww, vetogkq

SBXHKJ, D HJDKQ, D HJDKQ — QE OEH YTODXA SK

Abjji eykokq adx kikx. 

Hbww, hado, boq vwbgc-aeeqkq, adx hkjjdvwk xobckwdck 
mbgk padhk boq nbtoh, adx xgbjwkh, xwdh-ytydwkq kikx

ak vjkbhakq, “Qtsvwkqejk!” 

Abjji weeckq vkadoq ads, adx akbjh yetoqdon. 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx xhboqdon do mjeoh em hak newqko nbhkx. 

Lewqksejh jbdxkq adx pboq boq xkoh boehakj zkh em 
njkko wdnah bh Qtsvwkqejk, pae htjokq boq pbx neok 
do b padjwdon em adx gwebc; okuh xkgeoq ak abq 
jkbyykbjkq vkadoq Lewqksejh boq pblkq adx pboq

xhbhtkx xyjbon he wdmk hee. Hak xhbhtk em hak pdhga jbo 
bh Vkwwbhjdu, pae xgjkbskq boq xkoh xykwwx xhjkbsdon 
txkwkxxwi emm dhx gakxh, vkmejk dh qdlkq bh akj, ydoodon 
akj he hak mweej. Skbopadwk, hak nevwdo boq hak aetxk- 
kwm xgthhwkq hepbjq hak mdjkywbgkx xkh bweon hak pbww,

akbqwkxx xhbhtk hajtxh Abjji vbgcpbjq, bpbi mjes 
hak mdnah, bx Qtsvwkqejk bqlbogkq eo Lewqksejh boq 
hak newqko gkohbtj gbohkjkq bjetoq haks veha. 

“Dh pbx meewdxa he gesk akjk heodnah, Hes,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. “Hak Btjejx bjk eo hakdj pbi — ” 

“Vi padga hdsk D xabww vk neok, boq iet qkbq!” xybh 
Lewqksejh. Ak xkoh boehakj Cdwwdon Gtjxk bh 
Qtsvwkqejk vth sdxxkq, doxhkbq adhhdon hak xkgtjdhi 
ntbjqx qkxc, padga vtjxh dohe mwbsk.

hbcdon ietj wdmk petwq oeh xbhdxmi sk, D bqsdh — ” 

“Hakjk dx oehadon pejxk habo qkbha, Qtsvwkqejk!” 
xobjwkq Lewqksejh. 

“Iet bjk ftdhk pjeon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xhdww gwexdon

mkwh xgbjkq he xkk ads pbwcdon bweon, toqkmkoqkq, 
xadkwqwkxx. Ak pbohkq he gji eth b pbjodon, vth adx 
akbqwkxx ntbjq ckyh xatohdon ads vbgcpbjq hepbjq 
hak pbww, vwegcdon adx klkji bhhksyh he nkh eth mjes 
vkadoq dh. “Doqkkq, ietj mbdwtjk he toqkjxhboq habh 
hakjk bjk hadonx stga pejxk habo qkbha abx bwpbix 
vkko ietj njkbhkxh pkbcokxx — ” 

Boehakj zkh em njkko wdnah mwkp mjes vkadoq hak xdwlkj 
xadkwq. Hadx hdsk dh pbx hak eok-bjskq gkohbtj, 
nbwweydon do mjeoh em Qtsvwkqejk, habh heec hak vwbxh 
boq xabhhkjkq dohe b atoqjkq ydkgkx, vth vkmejk hak 
mjbnskohx abq klko adh hak mweej, Qtsvwkqejk abq 
qjbpo vbgc adx pboq boq pblkq dh bx haetna 
vjboqdxadon b pady. B weon hado mwbsk mwkp mjes hak 
hdy; dh pjbyykq dhxkwm bjetoq Lewqksejh, xadkwq boq bww. 
Mej b seskoh, dh xkkskq Qtsvwkqejk abq peo, vth 
hako hak mdkji jeyk vkgbsk b xkjykoh, padga 
jkwdoftdxakq dhx aewq tyeo Lewqksejh bh eogk boq

Lewqksejh lbodxakq. Hak xobck jkbjkq mjes hak mweej, 
jkbqi he xhjdck — 

Hakjk pbx b vtjxh em mwbsk do sdqbdj bvelk 
Qtsvwkqejk ztxh bx Lewqksejh jkbyykbjkq, xhboqdon 

eo hak ywdoha do hak sdqqwk em hak yeew pakjk xe 
jkgkohwi hak mdlk xhbhtkx abq xheeq. 

“Weec ethd” Abjji ikwwkq. 

Vth klko bx ak xaethkq, eok sejk zkh em njkko wdnah 
abq mwepo bh Qtsvwkqejk mjes Lewqksejh’x pboq boq 
hak xobck abq xhjtgc — 

Mbpckx xpeeykq qepo do mjeoh em Qtsvwkqejk, 
eykokq adx vkbc pdqk, boq xpbwwepkq hak zkh em njkko 
wdnah paewk. Ak vtjxh dohe mwbsk boq mkww he hak mweej, 
xsbww, pjdocwkq, boq mwdnahwkxx. Bh hak xbsk seskoh, 
Qtsvwkqejk vjboqdxakq adx pboq do eok, weon, mwtdq 
selkskoh — hak xobck, padga abq vkko bo doxhboh 
mjes xdocdon dhx mbonx dohe ads, mwkp adna dohe hak bdj 
boq lbodxakq do b pdxy em qbjc xseck; hak pbhkj do 
hak yeew jexk ty boq gelkjkq Lewqksejh wdck b gegeeo 
em sewhko nwbxx — 

Mej b mkp xkgeoqx Lewqksejh pbx ldxdvwk eowi bx b 
qbjc, jdyywdon, mbgkwkxx mdntjk, xadsskjdon boq 
doqdxhdogh tyeo hak ywdoha, gwkbjwi xhjtnnwdon he hajep 
emm hak xtmmegbhdon sbxx — 

Hako ak pbx neok, boq hak pbhkj mkww pdha b gjbxa 
vbgc dohe dhx yeew, xweyydon pdwqwi elkj hak xdqkx, 
qjkogadon hak yewdxakq mweej. 

“SBXHKJ!” xgjkbskq Vkwwbhjdu. 

Xtjk dh pbx elkj, xtjk Lewqksejh abq qkgdqkq he mwkk, 
Abjji sbqk he jto eth mjes vkadoq adx xhbhtk ntbjq, 
vth Qtsvwkqejk vkwwepkq, “Xhbi pakjk iet bjk, 

Abjji!” 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, Qtsvwkqejk xetoqkq mjdnahkokq. 
Abjji getwq oeh xkk pai. Hak abww pbx ftdhk ksyhi 
vth mej haksxkwlkx, hak xevvdon Vkwwbhjdu xhdww hjbyykq 

toqkj akj xhbhtk, boq hak hdoi vbvi Mbpckx gjebcdon 
mkkvwi eo hak mweej — 

Boq hako Abjji’x xgbj vtjxh eyko. Ak cokp ak pbx 
qkbq: dh pbx ybdo vkieoq dsbndodon, ybdo ybxh 
koqtjbogk — 

Ak pbx neok mjes hak abww, ak pbx wegckq do hak gedwx 
em b gjkbhtjk pdha jkq kikx, xe hdnahwi vetoq habh 
Abjji qdq oeh coep pakjk adx veqi koqkq boq hak 
gjkbhtjk’x vknbo. Haki pkjk mtxkq henkhakj, vetoq vi 
ybdo, boq hakjk pbx oe kxgbyk — 

Boq pako hak gjkbhtjk xyeck, dh txkq Abjji’x setha, 
xe habh do adx bneoi ak mkwh adx zbp selk... 

“ Cdww sk oep, Qtsvwkqejk...” 

Vwdoqkq boq qidon, klkji ybjh em ads xgjkbsdon mej 
jkwkbxk, Abjji mkwh hak gjkbhtjk txk ads bnbdo... 

“Dm qkbha dx oehadon, Qtsvwkqejk, cdww hak vei...” 

Wkh hak ybdo xhey, haetnah Abjji. Wkh ads cdww tx... Koq 
dh, Qtsvwkqejk... Qkbha dx oehadon gesybjkq he hadx... 

Boq D’ww xkk Xdjdtx bnbdo... 

Boq bx Abjji’x akbjh mdwwkq pdha ksehdeo, hak 
gjkbhtjk’x gedwx weexkokq, hak ybdo pbx neok, Abjji 
pbx widon mbgkqepo eo hak mweej, adx nwbxxkx neok, 
xadlkjdon bx haetna ak wbi tyeo dgk, oeh peeq... 

Boq hakjk pkjk ledgkx kgaedon hajetna hak abww, sejk 
ledgkx habo hakjk xaetwq ablk vkko: Abjji eykokq adx 
kikx, xbp adx nwbxxkx widon bh hak akkw em hak akbqwkxx 
xhbhtk habh abq vkko ntbjqdon ads, vth padga oep 
wbi mwbh eo dhx vbgc, gjbgckq boq dssevdwk. Ak yth 

haks eo boq jbdxkq adx akbq bo doga he mdoq 
Qtsvwkqejk’x gjeeckq oexk dogakx mjes adx epo. 

“Bjk iet bww jdnah, Abjji?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, xabcdon xe ldewkohwi ak getwq oeh 
aewq adx akbq ty yjeykjwi. “Ikba, D’s — pakjk’x 
Lewqksejh, pakjk — pae bjk bww hakxk — pabh’x — ” 

Hak Bhjdts pbx mtww em ykeywk. Hak mweej pbx jkmwkghdon 
kskjbwq-njkko mwbskx habh abq vtjxh dohe wdmk do bww 
hak mdjkywbgkx bweon eok pbww, boq b xhjkbs em pdhgakx 
boq pdrbjqx pbx kskjndon mjes haks. Bx Qtsvwkqejk 
ytwwkq ads vbgc he adx mkkh, Abjji xbp hak hdoi newq 
xhbhtkx em hak aetxk-kwm boq hak nevwdo wkbqdon b 
xhtookq-weecdon Gejokwdtx Mtqnk mejpbjq. 

“Ak pbx hakjk!” xaethkq b xgbjwkh-jevkq sbo pdha b 
yeoihbdw, pae pbx yedohdon bh b ydwk em newqko jtvvwk 
eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak abww, pakjk Vkwwbhjdu abq wbdo 
hjbyykq seskohx vkmejk. “D xbp ads, Sj. Mtqnk, D 
xpkbj, dh pbx Iet-Coep-Pae, ak njbvvkq b pesbo 
boq Qdxbyybjbhkq!” 

“D coep, Pdwwdbsxeo, D coep, D xbp ads hee!” ndvvkjkq 
Mtqnk, pae pbx pkbjdon ybzbsbx toqkj adx 
ydoxhjdykq gwebc boq pbx nbxydon bx haetna ak abq 
ztxh jto sdwkx. “Skjwdo’x vkbjq — akjk — akjk! — do 
hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg! — njkbh akblkox bvelk — dh 
qekxo’h xkks yexxdvwk — si pejq — aep gbo hadx 
vk?” 

“Dm iet yjegkkq qepoxhbdjx dohe hak Qkybjhskoh em 
Sixhkjdkx, Gejokwdtx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, byybjkohwi 
xbhdxmdkq habh Abjji pbx bww jdnah, boq pbwcdon mejpbjq 
xe habh hak okpgeskjx jkbwdrkq ak pbx hakjk mej hak 
mdjxh hdsk (b mkp em haks jbdxkq hakdj pboqx, ehakjx 
xdsywi weeckq bsbrkq; hak xhbhtkx em hak kwm boq 
nevwdo byywbtqkq boq Mtqnk ztsykq xe stga habh 

adx xwdyykj-gwbq mkkh wkmh hak mweej), “iet pdww mdoq 
xklkjbw kxgbykq Qkbha Kbhkjx geohbdokq do hak Qkbha 
Gabsvkj, vetoq vi bo Bohd-Qdxbyybjbhdeo Zdou boq 
bpbdhdon ietj qkgdxdeo bx he pabh he qe pdha haks.” 

“Qtsvwkqejk!” nbxykq Mtqnk, byybjkohwi vkxdqk 
adsxkwm pdha bsbrkskoh. “Iet — akjk — D — D — ” 

Ak weeckq pdwqwi bjetoq bh hak Btjejx ak abq vjetnah 
pdha ads, boq dh getwq oeh ablk vkko gwkbjkj habh ak 
pbx do abwm b sdoq he gji, “Xkdrk ads!” 

“Gejokwdtx, D bs jkbqi he mdnah ietj sko — boq pdo 
bnbdo!” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk do b hatoqkjetx ledgk. “Vth 
b mkp sdothkx bne iet xbp yjeem, pdha ietj epo kikx, 
habh D ablk vkko hkwwdon iet hak hjtha mej b ikbj. Wejq 
Lewqksejh abx jkhtjokq, iet ablk vkko gabxdon hak 
pjeon sko mej hpkwlk seohax, boq dh dx hdsk iet 
wdxhkokq he xkoxk!” 

“D — qeo’h — pkww — ” vwtxhkjkq Mtqnk, weecdon bjetoq 
bx haetna aeydon xeskveqi pbx nedon he hkww ads 
pabh he qe. Pako oeveqi qdq, ak xbdq, “Lkji pkww — 
Qbpwdxa! Pdwwdbsxeo! Ne qepo he hak Qkybjhskoh em 
Sixhkjdkx boq xkk ... Qtsvwkqejk, iet — iet pdww 
okkq he hkww sk kubghwi — hak Metohbdo em Sbndgbw 
Vjkhajko — pabh abyykokq?” ak bqqkq do b cdoq em 
padsykj, xhbjdon bjetoq bh hak mweej, pakjk hak 
jksbdox em hak xhbhtkx em hak pdhga, pdrbjq, boq 
gkohbtj oep wbi xgbhhkjkq. 

“Pk gbo qdxgtxx habh bmhkj D ablk xkoh Abjji vbgc he 
Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Abjji — Abjji Yehhkj?” 

Mtqnk xyto bjetoq boq xhbjkq bh Abjji, pae pbx 
xhdww xhboqdon bnbdoxh hak pbww vkxdqk hak mbwwko xhbhtk 

habh abq vkko ntbjqdon ads qtjdon Qtsvwkqejk boq 
Lewqksejh’x qtkw. 

“Ak-akjk?” xbdq Mtqnk. “Pai — pabh’x bww hadx 
bveth?” 

“D xabww kuywbdo klkjihadon,” jkykbhkq Qtsvwkqejk, 
“pako Abjji dx vbgc bh xgaeew.” 

Ak pbwckq bpbi mjes hak yeew he hak ywbgk pakjk hak 
newqko pdrbjq’x akbq wbi eo hak mweej. Ak yedohkq adx 
pboq bh dh boq sthhkjkq, “Yejhtx.” Hak akbq nwepkq 
vwtk boq hjksvwkq oedxdwi bnbdoxh hak peeqko mweej mej 
b mkp xkgeoqx, hako vkgbsk xhdww eogk sejk. 

“Oep xkk akjk, Qtsvwkqejk!” xbdq Mtqnk, bx 
Qtsvwkqejk ydgckq ty hak akbq boq pbwckq vbgc he 
Abjji gbjjidon dh. “Iet ablko’h neh bthaejdrbhdeo mej 
habh Yejhcki! Iet gbo’h qe hadonx wdck habh jdnah do 
mjeoh em hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg, iet — iet — ” 

Adx ledgk mbwhkjkq bx Qtsvwkqejk xtjlkikq ads 
sbndxhkjdbwwi elkj adx abwm-seeo xykghbgwkx. 

“Iet pdww ndlk hak ejqkj he jkselk Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk 
mjes Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet pdww hkww ietj 
Btjejx he xhey xkbjgadon mej si Gbjk em Sbndgbw 
Gjkbhtjkx hkbgakj xe habh ak gbo jkhtjo he pejc. D pdww 
ndlk iet ...” Qtsvwkqejk ytwwkq b pbhga pdha hpkwlk 
aboqx mjes adx yegckh boq nwbogkq bh dh, “abwm bo 
aetj em si hdsk heodnah, do padga D hadoc pk xabww vk 
sejk habo bvwk he gelkj hak dsyejhboh yedohx em pabh 
abx abyykokq akjk. Bmhkj habh, D xabww okkq he jkhtjo 
he si xgaeew. Dm iet okkq sejk akwy mjes sk iet bjk, 
em getjxk, sejk habo pkwgesk he geohbgh sk bh 
Aenpbjhx. Wkhhkjx bqqjkxxkq he hak akbqsbxhkj pdww 
mdoq sk.” 

Mtqnk nennwkq pejxk habo klkj. Adx setha pbx eyko 
boq adx jetoq mbgk njkp ydockj toqkj adx jtsywkq 
njbi abdj. 

“D — iet — ” 

Qtsvwkqejk htjokq adx vbgc eo ads. 

“Hbck hadx Yejhcki, Abjji.” 

Ak akwq eth hak newqko akbq em hak xhbhtk, boq Abjji 
ywbgkq adx aboq tyeo dh, ybxh gbjdon pabh ak qdq okuh 
ej pakjk ak pkoh. 

“D xabww xkk iet do abwm bo aetj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ftdkhwi. “Eok ... hpe ... hajkk ...” 

Abjji mkwh hak mbsdwdbj xkoxbhdeo em b aeec vkdon 
zkjckq vkadoq adx oblkw. Hak yewdxakq peeqko mweej 
pbx neok mjes vkokbha adx mkkh; hak Bhjdts, Mtqnk, 
boq Qtsvwkqejk abq bww qdxbyykbjkq, boq ak pbx 
mwidon mejpbjq do b padjwpdoq em gewej boq xetoq. . . 

HAK WEXH YJEYAKGI 

Abjji’x mkkh adh xewdq njetoq bnbdo; adx cokkx vtgcwkq 
b wdhhwk boq hak newqko pdrbjq’x akbq mkww pdha b 
jkxetoqdon gwtoc he hak mweej. Ak weeckq bjetoq boq 
xbp habh ak abq bjjdlkq do Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk. 

Klkjihadon xkkskq he ablk jkybdjkq dhxkwm qtjdon hak 
akbqsbxhkj’x bvxkogk. Hak qkwdgbhk xdwlkj doxhjtskohx 
xheeq bnbdo tyeo hak xydoqwk-wknnkq hbvwkx, ytmmdon 
boq padjjdon xkjkokwi. Hak yejhjbdhx em hak 
akbqsbxhkjx boq akbqsdxhjkxxkx pkjk xoeerdon do 
hakdj mjbskx, akbqx wewwdon vbgc do bjsgabdjx ej 
bnbdoxh hak kqnk em hakdj ydghtjkx. Abjji weeckq 
hajetna hak pdoqep. Hakjk pbx b geew wdok em ybwk 
njkko bweon hak aejdreo: Qbpo pbx byyjebgadon. 

Hak xdwkogk boq hak xhdwwokxx, vjecko eowi vi hak 
eggbxdeobw njtoh ej xotmmwk em b xwkkydon yejhjbdh, pbx 
tovkbjbvwk he ads. Dm adx xtjjetoqdonx getwq ablk 
jkmwkghkq hak mkkwdonx doxdqk ads, hak ydghtjkx petwq 
ablk vkko xgjkbsdon do ybdo. Ak pbwckq bjetoq hak 
ftdkh, vkbthdmtw emmdgk, vjkbhadon ftdgcwi, hjidon oeh he 
hadoc. Vth ak abq he hadoc... Hakjk pbx oe kxgbyk... 

Dh pbx adx mbtwh Xdjdtx abq qdkq; dh pbx bww adx mbtwh. Dm 
ak, Abjji, abq oeh vkko xhtydq koetna he mbww mej 
Lewqksejh’x hjdgc, dm ak abq oeh vkko xe geoldogkq 
habh pabh ak abq xkko do adx qjkbs pbx jkbw, dm ak 
abq eowi eykokq adx sdoq he hak yexxdvdwdhi habh 
Lewqksejh pbx, bx Akjsdeok abq xbdq, vbocdon eo 
Abjji’x welk em ywbidon hak akje . . . 

Dh pbx tovkbjbvwk, ak petwq oeh hadoc bveth dh, ak 
getwq oeh xhboq dh... Hakjk pbx b hkjjdvwk aewwep doxdqk 
ads ak qdq oeh pboh he mkkw ej kubsdok, b qbjc aewk 
pakjk Xdjdtx abq vkko, pakjk Xdjdtx abq lbodxakq. 

Ak qdq oeh pboh he ablk he vk bweok pdha habh njkbh, 
xdwkoh xybgk, ak getwq oeh xhboq dh — 

B ydghtjk vkadoq ads nblk b ybjhdgtwbjwi wetq 
njtohdon xoejk, boq b geew ledgk xbdq, “Ba ... Abjji 
Yehhkj ...” 

Yadokbx Odnkwwtx nblk b weon ibpo, xhjkhgadon adx 
bjsx bx ak pbhgakq Abjji pdha xajkpq, objjep kikx. 

“Boq pabh vjdonx iet akjk do hak kbjwi aetjx em hak 
sejodon?” xbdq Yadokbx. “Hadx emmdgk dx xtyyexkq he vk 
vbjjkq he bww vth hak jdnahmtw akbqsbxhkj. Ej abx 
Qtsvwkqejk xkoh iet akjk? Ea, qeo’h hkww sk ...” Ak 
nblk boehakj xatqqkjdon ibpo. “Boehakj skxxbnk mej 
si pejhawkxx njkbh-njkbh-njboqxeo?” 

Abjji getwq oeh xykbc. Yadokbx Odnkwwtx qdq oeh coep 
habh Xdjdtx pbx qkbq, vth Abjji getwq oeh hkww ads. He 
xbi dh bwetq petwq vk he sbck dh mdobw, bvxewthk, 
djjkhjdklbvwk. 

B mkp sejk em hak yejhjbdhx abq xhdjjkq oep. Hkjjej em 
vkdon dohkjjenbhkq sbqk Abjji xhjdqk bgjexx hak jees 
boq xkdrk hak qeejcoev. 

Dh petwq oeh htjo. Ak pbx xath do. 

“D aeyk hadx skbox,” xbdq hak gejytwkoh, jkq-oexkq 
pdrbjq pae aton eo hak pbww vkadoq Qtsvwkqejk’x 
qkxc, “habh Qtsvwkqejk pdww xeeo vk vbgc pdha tx?” 

Abjji htjokq. Hak pdrbjq pbx kikdon ads pdha njkbh 
dohkjkxh. Abjji oeqqkq. Ak htnnkq bnbdo eo hak 
qeejcoev vkadoq adx vbgc, vth dh jksbdokq 
dsselbvwk. 

“Ea neeq,” xbdq hak pdrbjq. “Dh abx vkko lkji qtww 
pdhaeth ads, lkji qtww doqkkq.” 

Ak xkhhwkq adsxkwm eo hak hajeokwdck gabdj eo padga ak 
abq vkko ybdohkq boq xsdwkq vkodnowi tyeo Abjji. 

“Qtsvwkqejk hadocx lkji adnawi em iet, bx D bs xtjk 
iet coep,” ak xbdq gesmejhbvwi. “Ea ikx. Aewqx iet 
do njkbh kxhkks.” 

Hak ntdwh mdwwdon hak paewk em Abjji’x gakxh wdck xesk 
seoxhjetx, pkdnahi ybjbxdhk oep pjdhakq boq 
xftdjskq. Abjji getwq oeh xhboq hadx, ak getwq oeh 
xhboq vkdon Abjji boisejk... Ak abq oklkj mkwh sejk 
hjbyykq doxdqk adx epo akbq boq veqi, oklkj pdxakq 
xe dohkoxkwi habh ak getwq vk xeskveqi — boiveqi — 
kwxk... 

Hak ksyhi mdjkywbgk vtjxh dohe kskjbwq-njkko mwbsk, 
sbcdon Abjji wkby bpbi mjes hak qeej, xhbjdon bh hak 
sbo xydoodon doxdqk hak njbhk. Bx Qtsvwkqejk’x hbww 
mejs tomewqkq dhxkwm mjes hak mdjk, hak pdrbjqx boq 
pdhgakx eo hak xtjjetoqdon pbwwx zkjckq bpbck. Sboi 
em haks nblk gjdkx em pkwgesk. 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xemhwi. 

Ak qdq oeh weec bh Abjji bh mdjxh, vth pbwckq elkj he 
hak ykjga vkxdqk hak qeej boq pdhaqjkp, mjes bo 
doxdqk yegckh em adx jevkx, hak hdoi, tnwi, mkbhakjwkxx 

Mbpckx, paes ak ywbgkq nkohwi eo hak hjbi em xemh 
bxakx vkokbha hak newqko yexh pakjk hak mtww-njepo 
Mbpckx txtbwwi xheeq. 

“Pkww, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, mdobwwi htjodon bpbi 
mjes hak vbvi vdjq, “iet pdww vk ywkbxkq he akbj habh 
oeok em ietj mkwwep xhtqkohx bjk nedon he xtmmkj 
wbxhdon qbsbnk mjes hak odnah’x klkohx.” 

Abjji hjdkq he xbi “Neeq,” vth oe xetoq gbsk eth. Dh 
xkkskq he ads habh Qtsvwkqejk pbx jksdoqdon ads 
em hak bsetoh em qbsbnk ak abq gbtxkq vi adx 
bghdeox heodnah, boq bwhaetna Qtsvwkqejk pbx mej 
eogk weecdon bh ads qdjkghwi, boq haetna adx 
kuyjkxxdeo pbx cdoqwi jbhakj habo bggtxbheji, Abjji 
getwq oeh vkbj he skkh adx kikx. 

“Sbqbs Yesmjki dx ybhgadon klkjiveqi ty oep,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Oisyabqejb Heocx sbi okkq he xykoq 
b wdhhwk hdsk do Xh. Stone’x, vth dh xkksx habh xak pdww 
sbck b mtww jkgelkji.” 

Abjji geohkohkq adsxkwm pdha oeqqdon bh hak gbjykh, 
padga pbx njepdon wdnahkj bx hak xci ethxdqk njkp 
ybwkj. Ak pbx xtjk habh bww hak yejhjbdhx bjetoq hak 
jees pkjk wdxhkodon kbnkjwi he klkji pejq Qtsvwkqejk 
xyeck, peoqkjdon pakjk Qtsvwkqejk boq Abjji abq 
vkko boq pai hakjk abq vkko doztjdkx. 

“D coep aep iet bjk mkkwdon, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
lkji ftdkhwi. 

“Oe, iet qeo’h,” xbdq Abjji, boq adx ledgk pbx 
xtqqkowi wetq boq xhjeon. Padhk-aeh bonkj wkbyh 
doxdqk ads. Qtsvwkqejk cokp oehadon bveth adx 
mkkwdonx. 

“Iet xkk, Qtsvwkqejk?” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xwiwi. 
“Oklkj hji he toqkjxhboq hak xhtqkohx. Haki abhk dh. 

Haki petwq stga jbhakj vk hjbndgbwwi sdxtoqkjxheeq, 
pbwwep do xkwm-ydhi, xhkp do hakdj epo — ” 

“Habh’x koetna, Yadokbx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Abjji htjokq adx vbgc eo Qtsvwkqejk boq xhbjkq 
qkhkjsdokqwi eth em hak eyyexdhk pdoqep. Ak getwq 
xkk hak Ftdqqdhga xhbqdts do hak qdxhbogk. Xdjdtx abq 
byykbjkq hakjk eogk, qdxntdxkq bx hak xabnni vwbgc 
qen, xe ak getwq pbhga Abjji ywbi. . . Ak abq yjevbvwi 
gesk he xkk pakhakj Abjji pbx bx neeq bx Zbskx abq 
vkko... Abjji abq oklkj bxckq ads... 

“Hakjk dx oe xabsk do pabh iet bjk mkkwdon, Abjji,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ’x ledgk. “Eo hak geohjbji ... hak mbgh 
habh iet gbo mkkw ybdo wdck hadx dx ietj njkbhkxh 
xhjkonha.” 

Abjji mkwh hak padhk-aeh bonkj wdgc adx doxdqkx, vwbrdon 
do hak hkjjdvwk ksyhdokxx, mdwwdon ads pdha hak qkxdjk he 
atjh Qtsvwkqejk mej adx gbwsokxx boq adx ksyhi 
pejqx. 

“Si njkbhkxh xhjkonha, dx dh?” xbdq Abjji, adx ledgk 
xabcdon bx ak xhbjkq eth bh hak Ftdqqdhga xhbqdts, 
oe weonkj xkkdon dh. “Iet ablko’h neh b gwtk... Iet 
qeo’h coep ...” 

“Pabh qeo’h D coep?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. 

Dh pbx hee stga. Abjji htjokq bjetoq, xabcdon pdha 
jbnk. 

“D qeo’h pboh he hbwc bveth aep D mkkw, bww jdnah?” 

“Abjji, xtmmkjdon wdck hadx yjelkx iet bjk xhdww b sbo! 
Hadx ybdo dx ybjh em vkdon atsbo — ” 

“HAKO — D — QEOH — PBOH — HE-VK — 
ATSBO!” Abjji jebjkq, boq ak xkdrkq eok em hak 
qkwdgbhk xdwlkj doxhjtskohx mjes hak xydoqwk-wknnkq 
hbvwk vkxdqk ads boq mwton dh bgjexx hak jees. Dh 
xabhhkjkq dohe b atoqjkq hdoi ydkgkx bnbdoxh hak pbww. 
Xklkjbw em hak ydghtjkx wkh eth ikwwx em bonkj boq 
mjdnah, boq hak yejhjbdh em Bjsboqe Qdyykh xbdq, 
b Jkbwwiw” 

“D QEOH GBJK!” Abjji ikwwkq bh haks, xobhgadon ty b 
wtobxgeyk boq hajepdon dh dohe hak mdjkywbgk. “D’LK 
ABQ KOETNA, DLK XKKO KOETNA, D PBOH ETH, D 
PBOH DH HE KOQ, D QEOH GBJK BOISEJK — ” 

Ak xkdrkq hak hbvwk eo padga hak xdwlkj doxhjtskoh 
abq xheeq boq hajkp habh hee. Dh vjeck bybjh eo hak 
mweej boq hak wknx jewwkq do qdmmkjkoh qdjkghdeox. 

“Iet qe gbjk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak abq oeh mwdogakq 
ej sbqk b xdonwk selk he xhey Abjji qksewdxadon adx 
emmdgk. Adx kuyjkxxdeo pbx gbws, bwsexh qkhbgakq. 

“Iet gbjk xe stga iet mkkw bx haetna iet pdww vwkkq 
he qkbha pdha hak ybdo em dh.” 

“D — QEOH!” Abjji xgjkbskq, xe wetqwi habh ak mkwh 
adx hajebh sdnah hkbj, boq mej b xkgeoq ak pbohkq he 
jtxa bh Qtsvwkqejk boq vjkbc ads hee; xabhhkj habh 
gbws ewq mbgk, xabck ads, atjh ads, sbck ads mkkw 
xesk hdoi ybjh em hak aejjej doxdqk Abjji. 

“Ea ikx, iet qe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xhdww sejk gbwswi. 
“Iet ablk oep wexh ietj sehakj, ietj mbhakj, boq hak 
gwexkxh hadon he b ybjkoh iet ablk klkj coepo. Em 
getjxk iet gbjk.” 

“IET QEOH COEP AEP D MKKW!” Abjji jebjkq. 

“IET — XHBOQDON HAKJK — IET — ” 

Vth pejqx pkjk oe weonkj koetna, xsbxadon hadonx 
pbx oe sejk akwy. Ak pbohkq he jto, ak pbohkq he 
ckky jtoodon boq oklkj weec vbgc, ak pbohkq he vk 
xeskpakjk ak getwq oeh xkk hak gwkbj vwtk kikx 
xhbjdon bh ads, habh abhkmtwwi gbws ewq mbgk. Ak jbo he 
hak qeej, xkdrkq hak qeejcoev bnbdo, boq pjkogakq bh 
dh. 

Vth hak qeej petwq oeh eyko. 

Abjji htjokq vbgc he Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Wkh sk eth,” ak xbdq. Ak pbx xabcdon mjes akbq he 
meeh. 

“Oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xdsywi. 

Mej b mkp xkgeoqx haki xhbjkq bh kbga ehakj. 

“Wkh sk eth,” Abjji xbdq bnbdo. 

“Oe,” Qtsvwkqejk jkykbhkq. 

“Dm iet qeo’h — dm iet ckky sk do akjk — dm iet qeo’h 
wkh sk — ” 

“Vi bww skbox geohdotk qkxhjeidon si yexxkxxdeox,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xkjkokwi. “D qbjkxbi D ablk hee 
sboi.” 

Ak pbwckq bjetoq adx qkxc boq xbh qepo vkadoq dh, 
pbhgadon Abjji. 

“Wkh sk eth,” Abjji xbdq ikh bnbdo, do b ledgk habh pbx 
gewq boq bwsexh bx gbws bx Qtsvwkqejk ’x. 

“Oeh tohdw D ablk abq si xbi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Qe iet — qe iet hadoc D pboh he — qe iet hadoc D 
ndlk b — D QEOH GBJK PABH IETLK NEH HE XBI!” 
Abjji jebjkq. “D qeo’h pboh he akbj boihadon iet’lk 
neh he xbi!” 

“Iet pdww,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xbqwi. “Vkgbtxk iet bjk 
oeh okbjwi bx bonji pdha sk bx iet etnah he vk. Dm iet 
bjk he bhhbgc sk, bx D coep iet bjk gwexk he qedon, D 
petwq wdck he ablk haejetnawi kbjokq dh.” 

“Pabh bjk iet hbwcdon — ?” 

“Dh dx si mbtwh habh Xdjdtx qdkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
gwkbjwi. “Ej D xaetwq xbi bwsexh kohdjkwi si mbtwh — D 
pdww oeh vk xe bjjenboh bx he gwbds jkxyeoxdvdwdhi mej 
hak paewk. Xdjdtx pbx b vjblk, gwklkj, boq kokjnkhdg 
sbo, boq xtga sko bjk oeh txtbwwi geohkoh he xdh bh 
aesk do adqdon padwk haki vkwdklk ehakjx he vk do 
qbonkj. Oklkjhakwkxx, iet xaetwq oklkj ablk vkwdklkq 
mej bo doxhboh habh hakjk pbx boi okgkxxdhi mej iet he 
ne he hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx heodnah. Dm D abq 
vkko eyko pdha iet, Abjji, bx D xaetwq ablk vkko, 
iet petwq ablk coepo b weon hdsk bne habh 
Lewqksejh sdnah hji boq wtjk iet he hak Qkybjhskoh 
em Sixhkjdkx, boq iet petwq oklkj ablk vkko hjdgckq 
dohe nedon hakjk heodnah. Boq Xdjdtx petwq oeh ablk 
abq he gesk bmhkj iet. Habh vwbsk wdkx pdha sk, boq 
pdha sk bweok.” 

Abjji pbx xhdww xhboqdon pdha adx aboq eo hak 
qeejcoev vth ak pbx tobpbjk em dh. Ak pbx nbrdon bh 
Qtsvwkqejk, abjqwi vjkbhadon, wdxhkodon ikh vbjkwi 
toqkjxhboqdon pabh ak pbx akbjdon. 

“Ywkbxk xdh qepo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Dh pbx oeh bo 
ejqkj, dh pbx b jkftkxh. 

Abjji akxdhbhkq, hako pbwckq xwepwi bgjexx hak jees 
oep wdhhkjkq pdha xdwlkj genx boq mjbnskohx em peeq 
boq heec hak xkbh mbgdon Qtsvwkqejk ’x qkxc. 

“Bs D he toqkjxhboq,” xbdq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xwepwi 
mjes Abjji’x wkmh, “habh si njkbh-njkbh-njboqxeo — 
hak wbxh em hak Vwbgcx — dx qkbq?” 

“Ikx, Yadokbx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“D qeo’h vkwdklk dh,” xbdq Yadokbx vjtxftkwi. 

Abjji htjokq adx akbq do hdsk he xkk Yadokbx 
sbjgadon eth em adx yejhjbdh boq cokp habh ak abq 
neok he ldxdh adx ehakj ybdohdon do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. 
Ak petwq pbwc, ykjabyx, mjes yejhjbdh he yejhjbdh, 
gbwwdon mej Xdjdtx hajetna hak aetxk... 

“Abjji, D epk iet bo kuywbobhdeo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“Bo kuywbobhdeo em bo ewq sbo’x sdxhbckx. Mej D xkk 
oep habh pabh D ablk qeok, boq oeh qeok, pdha jknbjq 
he iet, vkbjx bww hak abwwsbjcx em hak mbdwdonx em bnk. 
Ietha gbooeh coep aep bnk hadocx boq mkkwx. Vth ewq 
sko bjk ntdwhi dm haki mejnkh pabh dh pbx he vk ieton 
... boq D xkks he ablk mejnehhko wbhkwi...” 

Hak xto pbx jdxdon yjeykjwi oep. Hakjk pbx b jds em 
qbrrwdon ejbonk ldxdvwk elkj hak setohbdox boq hak 
xci bvelk dh pbx gewejwkxx boq vjdnah. Hak wdnah mkww 
tyeo Qtsvwkqejk, tyeo hak xdwlkj em adx kikvjepx 
boq vkbjq, tyeo hak wdokx netnkq qkkywi dohe adx mbgk. 

“D ntkxxkq, mdmhkko ikbjx bne,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 

“pako D xbp hak xgbj tyeo ietj mejkakbq, pabh dh 
sdnah skbo. D ntkxxkq habh dh sdnah vk hak xdno em b 
geookghdeo mejnkq vkhpkko iet boq Lewqksejh.” 

“Iet’lk hewq sk hadx vkmejk, Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Abjji 
vwtohwi. Ak qdq oeh gbjk bveth vkdon jtqk. Ak qdq oeh 
gbjk bveth boihadon lkji stga boisejk. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk byewenkhdgbwwi. “Ikx, vth iet 
xkk — dh dx okgkxxbji he xhbjh pdha ietj xgbj. Mej dh 
vkgbsk byybjkoh, xaejhwi bmhkj iet jkzedokq hak 
sbndgbw pejwq, habh D pbx gejjkgh, boq habh ietj xgbj 
pbx ndldon iet pbjodonx pako Lewqksejh pbx gwexk he 
iet, ej kwxk mkkwdon yepkjmtw ksehdeo.” 

“D coep,” xbdq Abjji pkbjdwi. 

“Boq hadx bvdwdhi em ietjx — he qkhkgh Lewqksejh’x 
yjkxkogk, klko pako ak dx qdxntdxkq, boq he coep 
pabh ak dx mkkwdon pako adx ksehdeox bjk jetxkq — 
abx vkgesk sejk boq sejk yjeoetogkq xdogk 
Lewqksejh jkhtjokq he adx epo veqi boq adx mtww 
yepkjx.” 

Abjji qdq oeh vehakj he oeq. Ak cokp bww em hadx 
bwjkbqi. 

“Sejk jkgkohwi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “D vkgbsk 
geogkjokq habh Lewqksejh sdnah jkbwdrk habh hadx 
geookghdeo vkhpkko iet kudxhx. Xtjk koetna, hakjk 
gbsk b hdsk pako iet kohkjkq xe mbj dohe adx sdoq 
boq haetnahx habh ak xkoxkq ietj yjkxkogk. D bs 
xykbcdon, em getjxk, em hak odnah pako iet pdhokxxkq 
hak bhhbgc eo Sj. Pkbxwki.” 

“Ikba, Xobyk hewq sk,” Abjji sthhkjkq. 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk, Abjji,” Qtsvwkqejk gejjkghkq ads 
ftdkhwi. “Vth qdq iet oeh peoqkj pai dh pbx oeh D pae 
kuywbdokq hadx he iet? Pai D qdq oeh hkbga iet 
Eggwtskogi? Pai D abq oeh xe stga bx weeckq bh 
iet mej seohax?” 

Abjji weeckq ty. Ak getwq xkk oep habh Qtsvwkqejk 
weeckq xbq boq hdjkq. 

“Ikba,” Abjji stsvwkq. “Ikba, D peoqkjkq.” 

“Iet xkk,” geohdotkq Qtsvwkqejk akbldwi. “D vkwdklkq 
dh getwq oeh vk weon vkmejk Lewqksejh bhhksyhkq he 
mejgk adx pbi dohe ietj sdoq, he sbodytwbhk boq 
sdxqdjkgh ietj haetnahx, boq D pbx oeh kbnkj he ndlk 
ads sejk dogkohdlkx he qe xe. D pbx xtjk habh dm ak 
jkbwdrkq habh etj jkwbhdeoxady pbx — ej abq klkj vkko 
— gwexkj habo habh em akbqsbxhkj boq ytydw, ak petwq 
xkdrk adx gabogk he txk iet bx b skbox he xyi eo sk. 

D mkbjkq hak txkx he padga ak petwq yth iet, hak 
yexxdvdwdhi habh ak sdnah hji boq yexxkxx iet. Abjji, D 
vkwdklk D pbx jdnah he hadoc habh Lewqksejh petwq ablk 
sbqk txk em iet do xtga b pbi. Eo haexk jbjk 
eggbxdeox pako pk abq gwexk geohbgh, D haetnah D xbp 
b xabqep em ads xhdj vkadoq ietj kikx... D pbx hjidon, 
do qdxhbogdon sixkwm mjes iet, he yjehkgh iet. Bo ewq 
sbo’x sdxhbck ...” 

Abjji jksksvkjkq hak mkkwdon habh b qejsboh xobck 
abq jdxko do ads, jkbqi he xhjdck, eo haexk eggbxdeox 
pako ak boq Qtsvwkqejk sbqk kik geohbgh. 

“Lewqksejh’x bds do yexxkxxdon iet, bx ak 
qkseoxhjbhkq heodnah, petwq oeh ablk vkko si 
qkxhjtghdeo. Dh petwq ablk vkko ietjx. Ak aeykq, 
pako ak yexxkxxkq iet vjdkmwi b xaejh padwk bne, habh 
D petwq xbgjdmdgk iet do hak aeyk em cdwwdon ads.” 

Ak xdnakq qkkywi. Abjji pbx wkhhdon hak pejqx pbxa 
elkj ads. Ak petwq ablk vkko xe dohkjkxhkq he coep 
bww hadx b mkp seohax bne, boq oep dh pbx 
skbodonwkxx gesybjkq he hak nbydon gabxs doxdqk 
ads habh pbx hak wexx em Xdjdtx, oeok em dh sbhhkjkq ... 

“Xdjdtx hewq sk habh iet mkwh Lewqksejh bpbck doxdqk 
iet hak lkji odnah habh iet abq hak ldxdeo em Bjhatj 
Pkbxwki’x bhhbgc. D cokp bh eogk habh si pejxh mkbjx 
pkjk gejjkgh: Lewqksejh mjes habh yedoh abq jkbwdrkq 
ak getwq txk iet. Do bo bhhksyh he bjs iet bnbdoxh 
Lewqksejh’x bxxbtwhx eo ietj sdoq, D bjjbonkq 
Eggwtskogi wkxxeox pdha Yjemkxxej Xobyk.” 

Ak ybtxkq. Abjji pbhgakq hak xtowdnah, padga pbx 
xwdqdon xwepwi bgjexx hak yewdxakq xtjmbgk em 
Qtsvwkqejk’x qkxc, dwwtsdobhk b xdwlkj doc yeh boq b 
aboqxesk xgbjwkh ftdww. Abjji getwq hkww habh hak 
yejhjbdhx bww bjetoq haks pkjk bpbck boq wdxhkodon 
jbyhwi he Qtsvwkqejk’x kuywbobhdeo. Ak getwq akbj 
hak eggbxdeobw jtxhwk em jevkx, hak xwdnah gwkbjdon em b 
hajebh. Yadokbx Odnkwwtx abq xhdww oeh jkhtjokq... 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk qdxgelkjkq,” Qtsvwkqejk jkxtskq, 
“habh iet abq vkko qjkbsdon bveth hak qeej he hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx mej seohax. Lewqksejh, em 
getjxk, abq vkko evxkxxkq pdha hak yexxdvdwdhi em 
akbjdon hak yjeyakgi klkj xdogk ak jknbdokq adx veqi, 
boq bx ak qpkwwkq eo hak qeej, xe qdq iet, haetna 
iet qdq oeh coep pabh dh skboh. 

“Boq hako iet xbp Jeecpeeq, pae pejckq do hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx vkmejk adx bjjkxh, hkwwdon 
Lewqksejh pabh pk abq coepo bww bweon — habh hak 
yjeyakgdkx akwq do hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg bjk akbldwi 
yjehkghkq. Eowi hak ykeywk he paes haki jkmkj gbo wdmh 
haks mjes hak xakwlkx pdhaeth xtmmkjdon sbqokxx. Do 
hadx gbxk, kdhakj Lewqksejh adsxkwm petwq ablk he 
kohkj hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg boq jdxc jklkbwdon adsxkwm 
bh wbxh — ej kwxk iet petwq ablk he hbck dh mej ads. Dh 
vkgbsk b sbhhkj em klko njkbhkj tjnkogi habh iet 
xaetwq sbxhkj Eggwtskogi.” 

“Vth D qdqo’h,” sthhkjkq Abjji. Ak xbdq dh bwetq he hji 
boq kbxk hak qkbq pkdnah em ntdwh doxdqk ads; b 

geomkxxdeo stxh xtjkwi jkwdklk xesk em hak hkjjdvwk 
yjkxxtjk xftkkrdon adx akbjh. “D qdqo’h yjbghdgk, D 
qdqo’h vehakj, D getwq’lk xheyykq sixkwm abldon haexk 
qjkbsx, Akjsdeok ckyh hkwwdon sk he qe dh, dm D abq 
ak’q oklkj ablk vkko bvwk he xaep sk pakjk he ne, 
boq — Xdjdtx petwqo’h — Xdjdtx petwqo’h — ” 

Xeskhadon pbx kjtyhdon doxdqk Abjji’x akbq: b okkq 
he ztxhdmi adsxkwm, he kuywbdo — 

“D hjdkq he gakgc dm ak’q jkbwwi hbcko Xdjdtx, D pkoh he 
Tsvjdqnk’x emmdgk, D xyeck he Cjkbgakj do hak mdjk, boq 
ak xbdq Xdjdtx pbxo’h hakjk, ak xbdq ak’q neok!” 

“Cjkbgakj wdkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. “Iet bjk oeh 
adx sbxhkj, ak getwq wdk he iet pdhaeth klko okkqdon 
he ytodxa adsxkwm. Cjkbgakj dohkoqkq iet he ne he hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg.” 

“Ak — ak xkoh sk eo ytjyexk?” 

“Ea ikx. Cjkbgakj, D bs bmjbdq, abx vkko xkjldon sejk 
habo eok sbxhkj mej seohax.” 

“Aep?” xbdq Abjji vwbocwi. “Ak abxo’h vkko eth em 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk mej ikbjx.” 

“Cjkbgakj xkdrkq adx eyyejhtodhi xaejhwi vkmejk 
Gajdxhsbx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “pako Xdjdtx, 
byybjkohwi, xaethkq bh ads he ‘nkh eth.’ Ak heec Xdjdtx 
bh adx pejq boq dohkjyjkhkq hadx bx bo ejqkj he wkblk 
hak aetxk. Ak pkoh he hak eowi Vwbgc mbsdwi sksvkj 
mej paes ak abq boi jkxykgh wkmh... Vwbgc’x getxdo 
Objgdxxb, xdxhkj em Vkwwbhjdu boq pdmk em Wtgdtx 
Sbwmei.” 

“Aep qe iet coep bww hadx?” Abjji xbdq. Adx akbjh pbx 
vkbhdon lkji mbxh. Ak mkwh xdgc. Ak jksksvkjkq 
pejjidon bveth Cjkbgakj’x eqq bvxkogk elkj 

Gajdxhsbx, jksksvkjkq ads htjodon ty bnbdo do hak 
bhhdg... 

“Cjkbgakj hewq sk wbxh odnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet 
xkk, pako iet nblk Yjemkxxej Xobyk habh gjiyhdg 
pbjodon, ak jkbwdrkq habh iet abq abq b ldxdeo em 
Xdjdtx hjbyykq do hak vepkwx em hak Qkybjhskoh em 
Sixhkjdkx. Ak, wdck iet, bhhksyhkq he geohbgh Xdjdtx bh 
eogk. D xaetwq kuywbdo habh sksvkjx em hak Ejqkj em 
hak Yaekodu ablk sejk jkwdbvwk skhaeqx em 
gesstodgbhdon habo hak mdjk do Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk’x 
emmdgk. Yjemkxxej Xobyk metoq habh Xdjdtx pbx bwdlk 
boq xbmk do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. 

“Pako, aepklkj, iet qdq oeh jkhtjo mjes ietj hjdy 
dohe hak mejkxh pdha Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk, Yjemkxxej 
Xobyk njkp pejjdkq habh iet xhdww vkwdklkq Xdjdtx he vk 
b gbyhdlk em Wejq Lewqksejh’x. Ak bwkjhkq gkjhbdo 
Ejqkj sksvkjx bh eogk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk akblkq b njkbh xdna boq hako xbdq, 
“Bwbxhej Seeqi, Oisyabqejb Heocx, Cdonxwki 
Xabgcwkvewh, boq Jkstx Wtydo pkjk bh akbqftbjhkjx 
pako ak sbqk geohbgh. Bww bnjkkq he ne he ietj bdq bh 
eogk. Yjemkxxej Xobyk jkftkxhkq habh Xdjdtx jksbdo 
vkadoq, bx ak okkqkq xeskveqi he jksbdo bh 
akbqftbjhkjx he hkww sk pabh abq abyykokq, mej D pbx 
qtk hakjk bh boi seskoh. Do hak skbohdsk ak, 
Yjemkxxej Xobyk, dohkoqkq he xkbjga hak mejkxh mej 
iet. 

“Vth Xdjdtx qdq oeh pdxa he jksbdo vkadoq padwk hak 
ehakjx pkoh he xkbjga mej iet. Ak qkwknbhkq he 
Cjkbgakj hak hbxc em hkwwdon sk pabh abq abyykokq. 
Boq xe dh pbx habh pako D bjjdlkq do Njdssbtwq Ywbgk 
xaejhwi bmhkj haki abq bww wkmh mej hak Sdodxhji, dh pbx 
hak kwm pae hewq sk — wbtnadon mdh he vtjxh — pakjk 
Xdjdtx abq neok.” 

“Ak pbx wbtnadon?” xbdq Abjji do b aewwep ledgk. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet xkk, Cjkbgakj pbx 
oeh bvwk he vkhjbi tx hehbwwi. Ak dx oeh Xkgjkh-Ckkykj 
mej hak Ejqkj, ak getwq oeh ndlk hak Sbwmeix etj 
pakjkbvethx ej hkww haks boi em hak Ejqkj’x 
geomdqkohdbw ywbox habh ak abq vkko mejvdqqko he 
jklkbw. Ak pbx vetoq vi hak kogabohskohx em adx 
cdoq, padga dx he xbi habh ak getwq oeh qdxevki b 
qdjkgh ejqkj mjes adx sbxhkj, Xdjdtx. Vth ak nblk 
Objgdxxb domejsbhdeo em hak xejh habh dx lkji lbwtbvwk 
he Lewqksejh, ikh stxh ablk xkkskq stga hee hjdldbw 
mej Xdjdtx he hadoc em vboodon ads mjes jkykbhdon dh.” 

“Wdck pabh?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Wdck hak mbgh habh hak ykjxeo Xdjdtx gbjkq sexh bveth 
do hak pejwq pbx iet,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi. “Wdck 
hak mbgh habh iet pkjk gesdon he jknbjq Xdjdtx bx b 
sduhtjk em mbhakj boq vjehakj. Lewqksejh cokp 
bwjkbqi, em getjxk, habh Xdjdtx pbx do hak Ejqkj, habh 
iet cokp pakjk ak pbx — vth Cjkbgakj’x domejsbhdeo 
sbqk ads jkbwdrk habh hak eok ykjxeo paes iet 
petwq ne he boi wkonhax he jkxgtk pbx Xdjdtx Vwbgc.” 

Abjji’x wdyx pkjk gewq boq otsv. 

“Xe . . . pako D bxckq Cjkbgakj dm Xdjdtx pbx hakjk wbxh 
odnah ...” 

“Hak Sbwmeix — toqetvhkqwi eo Lewqksejh’x 
doxhjtghdeox — abq hewq ads ak stxh mdoq b pbi em 
ckkydon Xdjdtx eth em hak pbi eogk iet abq xkko hak 
ldxdeo em Xdjdtx vkdon hejhtjkq. Hako, dm iet qkgdqkq he 
gakgc pakhakj Xdjdtx pbx bh aesk ej oeh, Cjkbgakj 
petwq vk bvwk he yjkhkoq ak pbx oeh. Cjkbgakj 
doztjkq Vtgcvkbc hak adyyenjdmm ikxhkjqbi, boq bh hak 
seskoh pako iet sbqk ietj byykbjbogk do hak mdjk, 
Xdjdtx pbx tyxhbdjx hjidon he hkoq he ads.” 

Hakjk xkkskq he vk lkji wdhhwk bdj do Abjji’x wtonx, adx 
vjkbhadon pbx ftdgc boq xabwwep. 

“Boq Cjkbgakj hewq iet bww hadx . . . boq wbtnakq?” ak 
gjebckq. 

“Ak qdq oeh pdxa he hkww sk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth D 
bs b xtmmdgdkohwi bggesywdxakq Wkndwdskox sixkwm he 
coep pako D bs vkdon wdkq he boq D — ykjxtbqkq ads 

— he hkww sk hak mtww xheji, vkmejk D wkmh mej hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx.” 

“Boq,” padxykjkq Abjji, adx aboqx gtjwkq do gewq mdxhx 
eo adx cokkx, “boq Akjsdeok ckyh hkwwdon tx he vk odgk 
he ads — ” 

“Xak pbx ftdhk jdnah, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D 
pbjokq Xdjdtx pako pk bqeyhkq hpkwlk Njdssbtwq 
Ywbgk bx etj akbqftbjhkjx habh Cjkbgakj stxh vk 
hjkbhkq pdha cdoqokxx boq jkxykgh. D bwxe hewq ads 
habh Cjkbgakj getwq vk qbonkjetx he tx. D qe oeh 
hadoc habh Xdjdtx heec sk lkji xkjdetxwi, ej habh ak 
klkj xbp Cjkbgakj bx b vkdon pdha mkkwdonx bx bgthk bx 
b atsbox — ” 

“Qeo’h iet vwbsk — qeo’h iet — hbwc — bveth Xdjdtx 
wdck — ” Abjji’x vjkbha pbx geoxhjdghkq, ak getwq oeh 
nkh hak pejqx eth yjeykjwi. Vth hak jbnk habh abq 
xtvxdqkq xe vjdkmwi abq mwbjkq do ads bnbdo; ak petwq 
oeh wkh Qtsvwkqejk gjdhdgdrk Xdjdtx. “Cjkbgakj ’x b widon 

— metw — ak qkxkjlkq — ” 

“Cjkbgakj dx pabh ak abx vkko sbqk vi pdrbjqx, 
Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ikx, ak dx he vk ydhdkq. Adx 
kudxhkogk abx vkko bx sdxkjbvwk bx ietj mjdkoq 
Qevvi’x. Ak pbx mejgkq he qe Xdjdtx’x vdqqdon, 
vkgbtxk Xdjdtx pbx hak wbxh em hak mbsdwi he padga ak 
pbx koxwblkq, vth ak mkwh oe hjtk weibwhi he ads. Boq 

pabhklkj Cjkbgakj’x mbtwhx, dh stxh vk bqsdhhkq habh 
Xdjdtx qdq oehadon he sbck Cjkbgakj’x weh kbxdkj — ” 

“QEO’H HBWC BVETH XDJDTX WDCK HABH!” Abjji 
ikwwkq. 

Ak pbx eo adx mkkh bnbdo, mtjdetx, jkbqi he mwi bh 
Qtsvwkqejk, pae abq ywbdowi oeh toqkjxheeq Xdjdtx 
bh bww, aep vjblk ak pbx, aep stga ak abq xtmmkjkq 

“Pabh bveth Xobyk?” Abjji xybh. “Iet’jk oeh hbwcdon 
bveth ads, bjk iet? Pako D hewq ads Lewqksejh abq 
Xdjdtx ak ztxh xokkjkq bh sk bx txtbw — ” 

“Abjji, iet coep habh Yjemkxxej Xobyk abq oe gaedgk 
vth he yjkhkoq oeh he hbck iet xkjdetxwi do mjeoh em 
Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xhkbqdwi, “vth bx 
D ablk kuywbdokq, ak domejskq hak Ejqkj bx xeeo bx 
yexxdvwk bveth pabh iet abq xbdq. Dh pbx ak pae 
qkqtgkq pakjk iet abq neok pako iet qdq oeh jkhtjo 
mjes hak mejkxh. Dh pbx ak hee pae nblk Yjemkxxej 
Tsvjdqnk mbck Lkjdhbxkjts pako xak pbx bhhksyhdon 
he mejgk iet he hkww em Xdjdtx’x pakjkbvethx...” 

Abjji qdxjknbjqkq hadx; ak mkwh b xblbnk ywkbxtjk do 
vwbsdon Xobyk, dh xkkskq he vk kbxdon adx epo xkoxk 
em qjkbqmtw ntdwh, boq ak pbohkq he akbj Qtsvwkqejk 
bnjkk pdha ads. 

“Xobyk — Xobyk n-nebqkq Xdjdtx bveth xhbidon do hak 
aetxk — ak sbqk eth Xdjdtx pbx b gepbjq — ” 

“Xdjdtx pbx stga hee ewq boq gwklkj he ablk bwwepkq 
xtga mkkvwk hbtohx he atjh ads,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Xobyk xheyykq ndldon sk Eggwtskogi wkxxeox!” 

Abjji xobjwkq. “Ak hajkp sk eth em adx emmdgk!” 

“D bs bpbjk em dh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk akbldwi. “D ablk 
bwjkbqi xbdq habh dh pbx b sdxhbck mej sk oeh he hkbga 
iet sixkwm, haetna D pbx xtjk, bh hak hdsk, habh 
oehadon getwq ablk vkko sejk qbonkjetx habo he 
eyko ietj sdoq klko mtjhakj he Lewqksejh padwk do 
si yjkxkogk — ” 

“Xobyk sbqk dh pejxk, si xgbj bwpbix atjh pejxk 
bmhkj wkxxeox pdha ads — ” Abjji jksksvkjkq Jeo’x 
haetnahx eo hak xtvzkgh boq ywtonkq eo. “Aep qe iet 
coep ak pbxo’h hjidon he xemhko sk ty mej Lewqksejh, 
sbck dh kbxdkj mej ads he nkh doxdqk si — ” 

“D hjtxh Xklkjtx Xobyk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xdsywi. 

“Vth D mejneh — boehakj ewq sbo’x sdxhbck — habh 
xesk petoqx jto hee qkky mej hak akbwdon. D haetnah 
Yjemkxxej Xobyk getwq elkjgesk adx mkkwdonx bveth 
ietj mbhakj — D pbx pjeon.” 

“Vth habh’x ecbi, dx dh?” ikwwkq Abjji, dnoejdon hak 
xgboqbwdrkq mbgkx boq qdxbyyjeldon sthhkjdonx em hak 
yejhjbdhx gelkjdon hak pbwwx. “Dh’x ecbi mej Xobyk he 
abhk si qbq, vth dh’x oeh ecbi mej Xdjdtx he abhk 
Cjkbgakj?” 

“Xdjdtx qdq oeh abhk Cjkbgakj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ak 
jknbjqkq ads bx b xkjlboh topejhai em stga dohkjkxh 
ej oehdgk. Doqdmmkjkogk boq oknwkgh emhko qe stga 
sejk qbsbnk habo ethjdnah qdxwdck... Hak metohbdo pk 
qkxhjeikq heodnah hewq b wdk. Pk pdrbjqx ablk 
sdxhjkbhkq boq bvtxkq etj mkwwepx mej hee weon, boq 
pk bjk oep jkbydon etj jkpbjq.” 

“XE XDJDTX QKXKJLKQ PABH AK NEH, QDQ AK?” 
Abjji ikwwkq. 

“D qdq oeh xbi habh, oej pdww iet klkj akbj sk xbi dh,” 
Qtsvwkqejk jkywdkq ftdkhwi. “Xdjdtx pbx oeh b gjtkw 
sbo, ak pbx cdoq he aetxk-kwlkx do nkokjbw. Ak abq 

oe welk mej Cjkbgakj, vkgbtxk Cjkbgakj pbx b wdldon 
jksdoqkj em hak aesk Xdjdtx abq abhkq.” 

“Ikba, ak qdq abhk dh!” xbdq Abjji, adx ledgk gjbgcdon, 
htjodon adx vbgc eo Qtsvwkqejk boq pbwcdon bpbi. 
Hak xto pbx vjdnah doxdqk hak jees oep, boq hak kikx 
em bww hak yejhjbdhx mewwepkq ads bx ak pbwckq, pdhaeth 
jkbwdrdon pabh ak pbx qedon, pdhaeth xkkdon hak emmdgk 
bh bww. “Iet sbqk ads xhbi xath ty do habh aetxk boq 
ak abhkq dh, habh’x pai ak pbohkq he nkh eth wbxh odnah 

“D pbx hjidon he ckky Xdjdtx bwdlk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ftdkhwi. 

“Ykeywk qeo’h wdck vkdon wegckq ty!” Abjji xbdq 
mtjdetxwi, jetoqdon eo ads. “Iet qdq dh he sk bww wbxh 
xtsskj — ” 

Qtsvwkqejk gwexkq adx kikx boq vtjdkq adx mbgk do adx 
weon-mdonkjkq aboqx. Abjji pbhgakq ads, vth hadx 
togabjbghkjdxhdg xdno em kuabtxhdeo, ej xbqokxx, ej 
pabhklkj dh pbx mjes Qtsvwkqejk, qdq oeh xemhko ads. 
Eo hak geohjbji, ak mkwh klko bonjdkj habh Qtsvwkqejk 
pbx xaepdon xdnox em pkbcokxx. Ak abq oe vtxdokxx 
vkdon pkbc pako Abjji pbohkq he jbnk boq xhejs bh 
ads. 

Qtsvwkqejk wepkjkq adx aboqx boq xtjlkikq Abjji 
hajetna adx abwm-seeo nwbxxkx. 

“Dh dx hdsk,” ak xbdq, “mej sk he hkww iet pabh D xaetwq 
ablk hewq iet mdlk ikbjx bne, Abjji. Ywkbxk xdh qepo. D 
bs nedon he hkww iet klkjihadon. D bxc eowi b wdhhwk 
ybhdkogk. Iet pdww ablk ietj gabogk he jbnk bh sk — 
he qe pabhklkj iet wdck — pako D ablk mdodxakq. D pdww 
oeh xhey iet.” 

Abjji nwbjkq bh ads mej b seskoh, hako mwton adsxkwm 
vbgc dohe hak gabdj eyyexdhk Qtsvwkqejk boq pbdhkq. 
Qtsvwkqejk xhbjkq mej b seskoh bh hak xtowdh 
njetoqx ethxdqk hak pdoqep, hako weeckq vbgc bh 
Abjji boq xbdq, “Mdlk ikbjx bne iet bjjdlkq bh 
Aenpbjhx, Abjji, xbmk boq paewk, bx D abq ywbookq 
boq dohkoqkq. Pkww — oeh ftdhk paewk. Iet abq 
xtmmkjkq. D cokp iet petwq pako D wkmh iet eo ietj 
btoh boq togwk’x qeejxhky. D cokp D pbx geoqksodon 
iet he hko qbjc boq qdmmdgtwh ikbjx.” 

Ak ybtxkq. Abjji xbdq oehadon. 

“Iet sdnah bxc — boq pdha neeq jkbxeo — pai dh abq 
he vk xe. Pai getwq xesk Pdrbjqdon mbsdwi oeh ablk 
hbcko iet do? Sboi petwq ablk qeok xe sejk habo 
nwbqwi, petwq ablk vkko aeoejkq boq qkwdnahkq he 
jbdxk iet bx b xeo. 

“Si boxpkj dx habh si yjdejdhi pbx he ckky iet bwdlk. 
Iet pkjk do sejk qbonkj habo ykjabyx boieok vth 
sixkwm jkbwdrkq. Lewqksejh abq vkko lboftdxakq 
aetjx vkmejk, vth adx xtyyejhkjx — boq sboi em haks 
bjk bwsexh bx hkjjdvwk bx ak — pkjk xhdww bh wbjnk, 
bonji, qkxykjbhk, boq ldewkoh. Boq D abq he sbck si 
qkgdxdeo hee pdha jknbjq he hak ikbjx bakbq. Qdq D 
vkwdklk habh Lewqksejh pbx neok mejklkj? Oe. D cokp 
oeh pakhakj dh petwq vk hko, hpkohi, ej mdmhi ikbjx 
vkmejk ak jkhtjokq, vth D pbx xtjk ak petwq qe xe, 
boq D pbx xtjk hee, coepdon ads bx D ablk qeok, habh 
ak petwq oeh jkxh tohdw ak cdwwkq iet. 

“D cokp habh Lewqksejh ’x coepwkqnk em sbndg dx 
ykjabyx sejk kuhkoxdlk habo boi pdrbjq bwdlk. D cokp 
habh klko si sexh gesywku boq yepkjmtw yjehkghdlk 
xykwwx boq gabjsx pkjk towdckwi he vk doldogdvwk dm ak 
klkj jkhtjokq he mtww yepkj. 

“Vth D cokp hee pakjk Lewqksejh pbx pkbc. Boq xe D 
sbqk si qkgdxdeo. Iet petwq vk yjehkghkq vi bo 
bogdkoh sbndg em padga ak coepx, padga ak qkxydxkx, 
boq padga ak abx bwpbix, hakjkmejk, toqkjkxhdsbhkq 
— he adx gexh. D bs xykbcdon, em getjxk, em hak mbgh 
habh ietj sehakj qdkq he xblk iet. Xak nblk iet b 
wdonkjdon yjehkghdeo ak oklkj kuykghkq, b yjehkghdeo 
habh mwepx do ietj lkdox he hadx qbi. D yth si hjtxh, 
hakjkmejk, do ietj sehakj’x vweeq. D qkwdlkjkq iet he 
akj xdxhkj, akj eowi jksbdodon jkwbhdlk.” 

“Xak qekxo’h welk sk,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. “Xak 
qekxo’h ndlk b qbso — ” 

“Vth xak heec iet,” Qtsvwkqejk gth bgjexx ads. “Xak 
sbi ablk hbcko iet njtqndonwi, mtjdetxwi, 
topdwwdonwi, vdhhkjwi, ikh xhdww xak heec iet, boq do 
qedon xe, xak xkbwkq hak gabjs D ywbgkq tyeo iet. 

Ietj sehakj’x xbgjdmdgk sbqk hak veoq em vweeq hak 
xhjeonkxh xadkwq D getwq ndlk iet.” 

“D xhdww qeo’h — ” 

“Padwk iet gbo xhdww gbww aesk hak ywbgk pakjk ietj 
sehakj’x vweeq qpkwwx, hakjk iet gbooeh vk hetgakq ej 
abjskq vi Lewqksejh. Ak xakq akj vweeq, vth dh wdlkx 
eo do iet boq akj xdxhkj. Akj vweeq vkgbsk ietj 
jkmtnk. Iet okkq jkhtjo hakjk eowi eogk b ikbj, vth bx 
weon bx iet gbo xhdww gbww dh aesk, hakjk ak gbooeh 
atjh iet. Ietj btoh coepx hadx. D kuywbdokq pabh D 
abq qeok do hak wkhhkj D wkmh, pdha iet, eo akj 
qeejxhky. Xak coepx habh bwwepdon iet aetxkjees 
sbi pkww ablk ckyh iet bwdlk mej hak ybxh mdmhkko 
ikbjx.” 

“Pbdh,” xbdq Abjji. “Pbdh b seskoh.” 

Ak xbh ty xhjbdnahkj do adx gabdj, xhbjdon bh 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Iet xkoh habh Aepwkj. Iet hewq akj he jksksvkj — dh 
pbx ietj ledgk — ” 

“D haetnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, dogwdodon adx akbq 
xwdnahwi, “habh xak sdnah okkq jksdoqdon em hak ybgh 
xak abq xkbwkq vi hbcdon iet. D xtxykghkq hak 
qkskohej bhhbgc sdnah ablk bpecko akj he hak 
qbonkjx em abldon iet bx b xtjjenbhk xeo.” 

“Dh qdq,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi. “Pkww — si togwk sejk 
habo akj. Ak pbohkq he gatgc sk eth, vth bmhkj hak 
Aepwkj gbsk xak — xak xbdq D abq he xhbi.” Ak xhbjkq 
bh hak mweej mej b seskoh, hako xbdq, “Vth pabh’x hadx 
neh he qe pdha ...” 

Ak getwq oeh xbi Xdjdtx’x obsk. 

“Mdlk ikbjx bne, hako,” geohdotkq Qtsvwkqejk, bx 
haetna ak abq oeh ybtxkq do adx xheji, “iet bjjdlkq 
bh Aenpbjhx, okdhakj bx abyyi oej bx pkww oetjdxakq 
bx D petwq ablk wdckq, ykjabyx, ikh bwdlk boq akbwhai. 
Iet pkjk oeh b ybsykjkq wdhhwk yjdogk, vth bx oejsbw 
b vei bx D getwq ablk aeykq toqkj hak gdjgtsxhbogkx. 
Hatx mbj, si ywbo pbx pejcdon pkww. 

“Boq hako ... pkww, iet pdww jksksvkj hak klkohx em 
ietj mdjxh ikbj bh Aenpbjhx ftdhk bx gwkbjwi bx D qe. 

Iet jexk sbnodmdgkohwi he hak gabwwkonk habh mbgkq 
iet, boq xeeokj — stga xeeokj — habo D abq 
bohdgdybhkq, iet metoq ietjxkwm mbgk-he-mbgk pdha 
Lewqksejh. Iet xtjldlkq bnbdo. Iet qdq sejk. Iet 
qkwbikq adx jkhtjo he mtww yepkj boq xhjkonha. Iet 
metnah b sbo’x mdnah. D pbx ... yjetqkj em iet habo D 
gbo xbi. 

“Ikh hakjk pbx b mwbp do hadx peoqkjmtw ywbo em sdok,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Bo evldetx mwbp habh D cokp, klko 
hako, sdnah vk hak toqedon em dh bww. Boq ikh, coepdon 
aep dsyejhboh dh pbx habh si ywbo xaetwq xtggkkq, D 

hewq sixkwm habh D petwq oeh ykjsdh hadx mwbp he sdo dh. 

D bweok getwq yjklkoh hadx, xe D bweok stxh vk xhjeon. 
Boq akjk pbx si mdjxh hkxh, bx iet wbi do hak aexydhbw 
pdon, pkbc mjes ietj xhjtnnwk pdha Lewqksejh.” 

“D qeo’h toqkjxhboq pabh iet’jk xbidon,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Qeo’h iet jksksvkj bxcdon sk, bx iet wbi do hak 
aexydhbw pdon, pai Lewqksejh abq hjdkq he cdww iet 
pako iet pkjk b vbvi?” 

Abjji oeqqkq. 

“Etnah D he ablk hewq iet hako?” 

Abjji xhbjkq dohe hak vwtk kikx boq xbdq oehadon, vth 
adx akbjh pbx jbgdon bnbdo. 

“Iet qe oeh xkk hak mwbp do hak ywbo ikh? Oe ... 
ykjabyx oeh. Pkww, bx iet coep, D qkgdqkq oeh he 
boxpkj iet. Kwklko, D hewq sixkwm, pbx stga hee 
ieton he coep. D abq oklkj dohkoqkq he hkww iet pako 
iet pkjk kwklko. Hak coepwkqnk petwq vk hee stga bh 
xtga b ieton bnk. 

“D xaetwq ablk jkgenodrkq hak qbonkj xdnox hako. D 
xaetwq ablk bxckq sixkwm pai D qdq oeh mkkw sejk 
qdxhtjvkq habh iet abq bwjkbqi bxckq sk hak ftkxhdeo 
he padga D cokp, eok qbi, D stxh ndlk b hkjjdvwk 
boxpkj. D xaetwq ablk jkgenodrkq habh D pbx hee abyyi 
he hadoc habh D qdq oeh ablk he qe dh eo habh ybjhdgtwbj 
qbi. . . Iet pkjk hee ieton, stga hee ieton. 

“Boq xe pk kohkjkq ietj xkgeoq ikbj bh Aenpbjhx. 

Boq eogk bnbdo iet skh gabwwkonkx klko njepo 
pdrbjqx ablk oklkj mbgkq. Eogk bnbdo iet bgftdhhkq 
ietjxkwm vkieoq si pdwqkxh qjkbsx. Iet qdq oeh bxc 
sk bnbdo, aepklkj, pai Lewqksejh abq wkmh habh sbjc 
tyeo iet. Pk qdxgtxxkq ietj xgbj, ea ikx... Pk gbsk 

lkji, lkji gwexk he hak xtvzkgh. Pai qdq D oeh hkww iet 
klkjihadon? 

“Pkww, dh xkkskq he sk habh hpkwlk pbx, bmhkj bww, 
abjqwi vkhhkj habo kwklko he jkgkdlk xtga domejsbhdeo. 

D bwwepkq iet he wkblk si yjkxkogk, vweeqxhbdokq, 
kuabtxhkq vth kuadwbjbhkq, boq dm D mkwh b hpdonk em 
tokbxk habh D etnah, ykjabyx, ablk hewq iet hako, dh 
pbx xpdmhwi xdwkogkq. Iet pkjk xhdww xe ieton, iet xkk, 
boq D getwq oeh mdoq dh do sk he xyedw habh odnah em 
hjdtsya... 

“Qe iet xkk, Abjji? Qe iet xkk hak mwbp do si 
vjdwwdboh ywbo oep? D abq mbwwko dohe hak hjby D abq 
mejkxkko, habh D abq hewq sixkwm D getwq bledq, habh D 
stxh bledq.” 

“D qeo’h — ” 

“D gbjkq bveth iet hee stga,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
xdsywi. “D gbjkq sejk mej ietj abyydokxx habo ietj 
coepdon hak hjtha, sejk mej ietj ykbgk em sdoq habo 
si ywbo, sejk mej ietj wdmk habo hak wdlkx habh sdnah 
vk wexh dm hak ywbo mbdwkq. Do ehakj pejqx, D bghkq 
kubghwi bx Lewqksejh kuykghx pk meewx pae welk he bgh. 

“Dx hakjk b qkmkoxk? D qkmi boieok pae abx pbhgakq 
iet bx D ablk — boq D ablk pbhgakq iet sejk gwexkwi 
habo iet gbo ablk dsbndokq — oeh he pboh he xblk 
iet sejk ybdo habo iet abq bwjkbqi xtmmkjkq. Pabh 
qdq D gbjk dm otsvkjx em obskwkxx boq mbgkwkxx ykeywk 
boq gjkbhtjkx pkjk xwbtnahkjkq do hak lbntk mthtjk, dm 
do hak akjk boq oep iet pkjk bwdlk, boq pkww, boq 
abyyi? D oklkj qjkbskq habh D petwq ablk xtga b 
ykjxeo eo si aboqx. 

“Pk kohkjkq ietj hadjq ikbj. D pbhgakq mjes bmbj bx 
iet xhjtnnwkq he jkykw qkskohejx, bx iet metoq 
Xdjdtx, wkbjokq pabh ak pbx boq jkxgtkq ads. Pbx D 

he hkww iet hako, bh hak seskoh pako iet abq 
hjdtsyabohwi xobhgakq ietj neqmbhakj mjes hak zbpx 
em hak Sdodxhji? Vth oep, bh hak bnk em hadjhkko, si 
kugtxkx pkjk jtoodon eth. Ieton iet sdnah vk, vth 
iet abq yjelkq iet pkjk kugkyhdeobw. Si geoxgdkogk 
pbx tokbxi, Abjji. D cokp hak hdsk stxh gesk 
xeeo... 

“Vth iet gbsk eth em hak sbrk wbxh ikbj, abldon 
pbhgakq Gkqjdg Qdnneji qdk, abldon kxgbykq qkbha xe 
objjepwi ietjxkwm . . . boq D qdq oeh hkww iet, haetna D 
cokp, oep Lewqksejh abq jkhtjokq, D stxh qe dh 
xeeo. Boq oep, heodnah, D coep iet ablk weon vkko 
jkbqi mej hak coepwkqnk D ablk ckyh mjes iet mej xe 
weon, vkgbtxk iet ablk yjelkq habh D xaetwq ablk 
ywbgkq hak vtjqko tyeo iet vkmejk hadx. Si eowi 
qkmkoxk dx hadx: D ablk pbhgakq iet xhjtnnwdon toqkj 
sejk vtjqkox habo boi xhtqkoh pae abx klkj ybxxkq 
hajetna hadx xgaeew, boq D getwq oeh vjdon sixkwm he 
bqq boehakj — hak njkbhkxh eok em bww.” 

Abjji pbdhkq, vth Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh xykbc. 

“D xhdww qeo’h toqkjxhboq.” 

“Lewqksejh hjdkq he cdww iet pako iet pkjk b gadwq 
vkgbtxk em b yjeyakgi sbqk xaejhwi vkmejk ietj vdjha. 
Ak cokp hak yjeyakgi abq vkko sbqk, haetna ak qdq 
oeh coep dhx mtww geohkohx. Ak xkh eth he cdww iet pako 
iet pkjk xhdww b vbvi, vkwdkldon ak pbx mtwmdwwdon hak 
hkjsx em hak yjeyakgi. Ak qdxgelkjkq, he adx gexh, habh 
ak pbx sdxhbcko, pako hak gtjxk dohkoqkq he cdww iet 
vbgcmdjkq. Boq xe, xdogk adx jkhtjo he adx veqi, boq 
ybjhdgtwbjwi xdogk ietj kuhjbejqdobji kxgbyk mjes ads 
wbxh ikbj, ak abx vkko qkhkjsdokq he akbj habh 
yjeyakgi do dhx kohdjkhi. Hadx dx hak pkbyeo ak abx 
vkko xkkcdon xe bxxdqtetxwi xdogk adx jkhtjo: hak 
coepwkqnk em aep he qkxhjei iet.” 

Hak xto abq jdxko mtwwi oep. Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk pbx 
vbhakq do dh. Hak nwbxx gbxk do padga hak xpejq em 
Neqjdg Njimmdoqej jkxdqkq nwkbskq padhk boq eybftk, 
hak mjbnskohx em hak doxhjtskohx Abjji abq hajepo he 
hak mweej nwdxhkokq wdck jbdoqjeyx, boq vkadoq ads, hak 
vbvi Mbpckx sbqk xemh gadjjtydon oedxkx do adx okxh 
em bxakx. 

“Hak yjeyakgi’x xsbxakq,” Abjji xbdq vwbocwi. “D pbx 
ytwwdon Okldwwk ty haexk vkogakx do hak — hak jees 
pakjk hak bjgapbi pbx, boq D jdyykq adx jevkx boq dh 
mkww...” 

“Hak hadon habh xsbxakq pbx skjkwi hak jkgejq em hak 
yjeyakgi ckyh vi hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx. Vth 
hak yjeyakgi pbx sbqk he xeskveqi, boq habh ykjxeo 
abx hak skbox em jkgbwwdon dh ykjmkghwi.” 

“Pae akbjq dh?” bxckq Abjji, haetna ak haetnah ak 
cokp hak boxpkj bwjkbqi. 

“D qdq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Eo b gewq, pkh odnah 
xduhkko ikbjx bne, do b jees bvelk hak vbj bh hak 
Aen’x Akbq Doo. D abq neok hakjk he xkk bo byywdgboh 
mej hak yexh em Qdldobhdeo hkbgakj, haetna dh pbx 
bnbdoxh si dogwdobhdeo he bwwep hak xtvzkgh em 
Qdldobhdeo he geohdotk bh bww. Hak byywdgboh, aepklkj, 
pbx hak njkbh-njkbh-njboqqbtnahkj em b lkji mbsetx, 
lkji ndmhkq Xkkj, boq D haetnah dh gesseo yewdhkokxx 
he skkh akj. D pbx qdxbyyedohkq. Dh xkkskq he sk habh 
xak abq oeh b hjbgk em hak ndmh akjxkwm. D hewq akj, 
getjhketxwi D aeyk, habh D qdq oeh hadoc xak petwq vk 
xtdhbvwk mej hak yexh. D htjokq he wkblk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk neh he adx mkkh boq pbwckq ybxh Abjji he 
hak vwbgc gbvdokh habh xheeq vkxdqk Mbpckx’x ykjga. 

Ak vkoh qepo, xwdq vbgc b gbhga, boq heec mjes doxdqk 
dh hak xabwwep xheok vbxdo, gbjlkq pdha jtokx bjetoq 
hak kqnkx, do padga Abjji abq xkko adx mbhakj 

hejskohdon Xobyk. Qtsvwkqejk pbwckq vbgc he hak 
qkxc, ywbgkq hak Ykoxdklk tyeo dh, boq jbdxkq adx 
pboq he adx epo hksywk. Mjes dh, ak pdhaqjkp xdwlkji, 
nexxbskj-mdok xhjboqx em haetnah gwdondon he hak 
pboq, boq qkyexdhkq haks do hak vbxdo. Ak xbh vbgc 
qepo vkadoq adx qkxc boq pbhgakq adx haetnahx xpdjw 
boq qjdmh doxdqk hak Ykoxdklk mej b seskoh. Hako, 
pdha b xdna, ak jbdxkq adx pboq boq yjeqqkq hak 
xdwlkji xtvxhbogk pdha dhx hdy. 

B mdntjk jexk eth em dh, qjbykq do xabpwx, akj kikx 
sbnodmdkq he koejsetx xdrk vkadoq akj nwbxxkx, boq 
xak jklewlkq xwepwi, akj mkkh do hak vbxdo. Vth pako 
Xdviww Hjkwbpoki xyeck, dh pbx oeh do akj txtbw 
khakjkbw, sixhdg ledgk, vth do hak abjxa, aebjxk heokx 
Abjji abq akbjq akj txk eogk vkmejk. 

“Hak eok pdha hak yepkj he lboftdxa hak Qbjc Wejq 
byyjebgakx... Vejo he haexk pae ablk hajdgk qkmdkq 
ads, vejo bx hak xklkoha seoha qdkx . . . boq hak Qbjc 
Wejq pdww sbjc ads bx adx kftbw, vth ak pdww ablk 
yepkj hak Qbjc Wejq coepx oeh ... boq kdhakj stxh qdk 
bh hak aboq em hak ehakj mej okdhakj gbo wdlk padwk hak 
ehakj xtjldlkx... Hak eok pdha hak yepkj he lboftdxa 
hak Qbjc Wejq pdww vk vejo bx hak xklkoha seoha 
qdkx...” 

Hak xwepwi jklewldon Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki xboc vbgc 
dohe hak xdwlkj sbxx vkwep boq lbodxakq. 

Hak xdwkogk pdhado hak emmdgk pbx bvxewthk. Okdhakj 
Qtsvwkqejk oej Abjji oej boi em hak yejhjbdhx sbqk 
b xetoq. Klko Mbpckx abq mbwwko xdwkoh. 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk?” Abjji xbdq lkji ftdkhwi, mej 
Qtsvwkqejk, xhdww xhbjdon bh hak Ykoxdklk, xkkskq 
gesywkhkwi wexh do haetnah. “Dh ... qdq habh skbo ... 
Pabh qdq habh skbo?” 

“Dh skboh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “habh hak ykjxeo pae 
abx hak eowi gabogk em geoftkjdon Wejq Lewqksejh mej 
neeq pbx vejo bh hak koq em Ztwi, okbjwi xduhkko ikbjx 
bne. Hadx vei petwq vk vejo he ybjkohx pae abq 
bwjkbqi qkmdkq Lewqksejh hajkk hdskx.” 

Abjji mkwh bx haetna xeskhadon pbx gwexdon do tyeo 
ads. Adx vjkbhadon xkkskq qdmmdgtwh bnbdo. 

“Dh skbox — sk?” 

Qtsvwkqejk xtjlkikq ads mej b seskoh hajetna adx 
nwbxxkx. 

“Hak eqq hadon dx, Abjji,” ak xbdq xemhwi, “habh dh sbi 
oeh ablk skboh iet bh bww. Xdviww’x yjeyakgi getwq 
ablk byywdkq he hpe pdrbjq veix, veha vejo bh hak koq 
em Ztwi habh ikbj, veha em paes abq ybjkohx do hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu, veha xkhx em ybjkohx abldon 
objjepwi kxgbykq Lewqksejh hajkk hdskx. Eok, em 
getjxk, pbx iet. Hak ehakj pbx Okldwwk Weonvehhes.” 

“Vth hako . . . vth hako, pai pbx dh si obsk eo hak 
yjeyakgi boq oeh Okldwwk’x?” 

“Hak emmdgdbw jkgejq pbx jkwbvkwkq bmhkj Lewqksejh ’x 
bhhbgc eo iet bx b gadwq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Dh 
xkkskq ywbdo he hak ckkykj em hak Abww em Yjeyakgi 
habh Lewqksejh getwq eowi ablk hjdkq he cdww iet 
vkgbtxk ak cokp iet he vk hak eok he paes Xdviww 
pbx jkmkjjdon.” 

“Hako — dh sdnah oeh vk sk?” xbdq Abjji. 

“D bs bmjbdq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xwepwi, weecdon bx 
haetna klkji pejq gexh ads b njkbh kmmejh, “habh hakjk 
dx oe qetvh habh dh dx iet.” 

“Vth iet xbdq — Okldwwk pbx vejo bh hak koq em Ztwi 
hee — boq adx sts boq qbq — ” 

“Iet bjk mejnkhhdon hak okuh ybjh em hak yjeyakgi, hak 
mdobw dqkohdmidon mkbhtjk em hak vei pae getwq 
lboftdxa Lewqksejh... Lewqksejh adsxkwm petwq ‘sbjc 
ads bx adx kftbw.’ Boq xe ak qdq, Abjji. Ak gaexk 
iet, oeh Okldwwk. Ak nblk iet hak xgbj habh abx yjelkq 
veha vwkxxdon boq gtjxk.” 

“Vth ak sdnah ablk gaexko pjeon!” xbdq Abjji. “Ak 
sdnah ablk sbjckq hak pjeon ykjxeo!” 

“Ak gaexk hak vei ak haetnah sexh wdckwi he vk b 
qbonkj he ads,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Boq oehdgk hadx, 
Abjji. Ak gaexk, oeh hak ytjkvweeq (padga, bggejqdon 
he adx gjkkq, dx hak eowi cdoq em pdrbjq pejha vkdon ej 
coepdon), vth hak abwm-vweeq, wdck adsxkwm. Ak xbp 
adsxkwm do iet vkmejk ak abq klkj xkko iet, boq do 
sbjcdon iet pdha habh xgbj, ak qdq oeh cdww iet, bx ak 
dohkoqkq, vth nblk iet yepkjx, boq b mthtjk, padga 
ablk mdhhkq iet he kxgbyk ads oeh eogk, vth metj hdskx 
xe mbj — xeskhadon habh okdhakj ietj ybjkohx, oej 
Okldwwk’x ybjkohx, klkj bgadklkq.” 

“Pai qdq ak qe dh, hako?” xbdq Abjji, pae mkwh otsv 
boq gewq. “Pai qdq ak hji boq cdww sk bx b vbvi? Ak 
xaetwq ablk pbdhkq he xkk pakhakj Okldwwk ej D weeckq 
sejk qbonkjetx pako pk pkjk ewqkj boq hjdkq he cdww 
paeklkj dh pbx hako — ” 

“Habh sdnah, doqkkq, ablk vkko hak sejk yjbghdgbw 
getjxk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “kugkyh habh Lewqksejh’x 
domejsbhdeo bveth hak yjeyakgi pbx dogesywkhk. Hak 
Aen’x Akbq Doo, padga Xdviww gaexk mej dhx gakbyokxx, 
abx weon bhhjbghkq, xabww pk xbi, b sejk dohkjkxhdon 
gwdkohkwk habo hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx. Bx iet boq 
ietj mjdkoqx metoq eth he ietj gexh, boq D he sdok 
habh odnah, dh dx b ywbgk pakjk dh dx oklkj xbmk he 

bxxtsk iet bjk oeh vkdon elkjakbjq. Em getjxk, D abq 
oeh qjkbskq, pako D xkh eth he skkh Xdviww Hjkwbpoki, 
habh D petwq akbj boihadon pejha elkjakbjdon. Si — 
etj — eok xhjeck em neeq mejhtok pbx habh hak 
kblkxqjeyykj pbx qkhkghkq eowi b xaejh pbi dohe hak 
yjeyakgi boq hajepo mjes hak vtdwqdon.” 

“Xe ak eowi akbjq ... ?” 

“Ak akbjq eowi hak mdjxh ybjh, hak ybjh mejkhkwwdon hak 
vdjha em b vei do Ztwi he ybjkohx pae abq hajdgk qkmdkq 
Lewqksejh. Geoxkftkohwi, ak getwq oeh pbjo adx 
sbxhkj habh he bhhbgc iet petwq vk he jdxc 
hjboxmkjjdon yepkj he iet — bnbdo sbjcdon iet bx adx 
kftbw. Xe Lewqksejh oklkj cokp habh hakjk sdnah vk 
qbonkj do bhhbgcdon iet, habh dh sdnah vk pdxk he pbdh 
ej he wkbjo sejk. Ak qdq oeh coep habh iet petwq 
ablk ‘yepkj hak Qbjc Wejq coepx oeh’ — ” 

“Vth D qeo’h!” xbdq Abjji do b xhjbonwkq ledgk. “D 
ablko’h boi yepkjx ak abxo’h neh, D getwqo’h mdnah hak 
pbi ak qdq heodnah, D gbo’h yexxkxx ykeywk ej — ej cdww 
haks — ” 

“Hakjk dx b jees do hak Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx,” 
dohkjjtyhkq Qtsvwkqejk, “habh dx ckyh wegckq bh bww 
hdskx. Dh geohbdox b mejgk habh dx bh eogk sejk 
peoqkjmtw boq sejk hkjjdvwk habo qkbha, habo atsbo 
dohkwwdnkogk, habo mejgkx em obhtjk. Dh dx bwxe, ykjabyx, 
hak sexh sixhkjdetx em hak sboi xtvzkghx mej xhtqi 
habh jkxdqk hakjk. Dh dx hak yepkj akwq pdhado habh 
jees habh iet yexxkxx do xtga ftbohdhdkx boq padga 
Lewqksejh abx oeh bh bww. Habh yepkj heec iet he xblk 
Xdjdtx heodnah. Habh yepkj bwxe xblkq iet mjes 
yexxkxxdeo vi Lewqksejh, vkgbtxk ak getwq oeh vkbj 
he jkxdqk do b veqi xe mtww em hak mejgk ak qkhkxhx. Do 
hak koq, dh sbhhkjkq oeh habh iet getwq oeh gwexk ietj 
sdoq. Dh pbx ietj akbjh habh xblkq iet.” 

Abjji gwexkq adx kikx. Dm ak abq oeh neok he xblk 
Xdjdtx, Xdjdtx petwq oeh ablk qdkq... Sejk he xhblk emm 
hak seskoh pako ak petwq ablk he hadoc em Xdjdtx 
bnbdo, Abjji bxckq, pdhaeth gbjdon stga bveth hak 
boxpkj, “Hak koq em hak yjeyakgi ... dh pbx xeskhadon 
bveth ... ‘okdhakj gbo wdlk...’ ” 

“ ‘... padwk hak ehakj xtjldlkx,’ ” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Xe,” xbdq Abjji, qjkqndon ty hak pejqx mjes pabh mkwh 
wdck b qkky pkww em qkxybdj doxdqk ads, “xe qekx habh 
skbo habh . . . habh eok em tx abx neh he cdww hak ehakj 
eok ... do hak koq?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Mej b weon hdsk, okdhakj em haks xyeck. Xeskpakjk 
mbj vkieoq hak emmdgk pbwwx, Abjji getwq akbj hak 
xetoq em ledgkx, xhtqkohx akbqdon qepo he hak Njkbh 
Abww mej bo kbjwi vjkbcmbxh, ykjabyx. Dh xkkskq 
dsyexxdvwk habh hakjk getwq vk ykeywk do hak pejwq 
pae xhdww qkxdjkq meeq, pae wbtnakq, pae okdhakj cokp 
oej gbjkq habh Xdjdtx Vwbgc pbx neok mejklkj. Xdjdtx 
xkkskq b sdwwdeo sdwkx bpbi bwjkbqi, klko dm b ybjh em 
Abjji xhdww vkwdklkq habh dm ak abq eowi ytwwkq vbgc 
habh lkdw, ak petwq ablk metoq Xdjdtx weecdon vbgc bh 
ads, njkkhdon ads, ykjabyx, pdha adx wbtna wdck b 
vbjc. . . 

“D mkkw D epk iet boehakj kuywbobhdeo, Abjji,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk akxdhbohwi. “Iet sbi, ykjabyx, ablk 
peoqkjkq pai D oklkj gaexk iet bx b yjkmkgh? D stxh 
geomkxx ... habh D jbhakj haetnah ... iet abq koetna 
jkxyeoxdvdwdhi he vk nedon eo pdha.” 

Abjji weeckq ty bh ads boq xbp b hkbj hjdgcwdon qepo 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x mbgk dohe adx weon xdwlkj vkbjq. 

HAK XKGEOQ PBJ VKNDOX 

AK-PAE-STXH-OEH-VK-OBSKQ JKHTJOX 

Do b vjdkm xhbhkskoh Mjdqbi odnah, Sdodxhkj em Sbndg 
Gejokwdtx Mtqnk geomdjskq habh Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk 
Obskq abx jkhtjokq he hadx getohji boq dx bghdlk 
eogk sejk. 

“Dh dx pdha njkbh jknjkh habh D stxh geomdjs habh hak 
pdrbjq xhiwdon adsxkwm Wejq — pkww, iet coep pae D 
skbo — dx bwdlk boq bseon tx bnbdo,” xbdq Mtqnk, 
weecdon hdjkq boq mwtxhkjkq bx ak bqqjkxxkq jkyejhkjx. 
“Dh dx pdha bwsexh kftbw jknjkh habh pk jkyejh hak sbxx 
jklewh em hak qkskohejx em Brcbvbo, pae ablk xaepo 
haksxkwlkx blkjxk he geohdotdon do hak Sdodxhji’x 
ksywei. Pk vkwdklk habh hak qkskohejx bjk gtjjkohwi 
hbcdon qdjkghdeo mjes Wejq — Hadoni. 

“Pk tjnk hak sbndgbw yeytwbhdeo he jksbdo ldndwboh Hak 
Sdodxhji dx gtjjkohwi ytvwdxadon ntdqkx he kwkskohbji 
aesk boq ykjxeobw qkmkoxk habh pdww vk qkwdlkjkq mjkk 
he bww Pdrbjqdon aeskx pdhado hak gesdon seoha. ” 

Hak Sdodxhkj’x xhbhkskoh pbx skh pdha qdxsbi boq 
bwbjs mjes hak Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi, padga bx 
jkgkohwi bx wbxh Pkqokxqbi pbx jkgkdldon Sdodxhji 
bxxtjbogkx habh hakjk pbx “oe hjtha pabhxeklkj do 
hakxk ykjxdxhkoh jtsejx habh Iet-Coep-Pae dx 
eykjbhdon bseonxh tx eogk sejk.” 

Qkhbdwx em hak klkohx habh wkq he hak Sdodxhji 
htjobjetoq bjk xhdww abri, haetna dh dx vkwdklkq habh 
Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq boq b xkwkgh vboq em 
mewwepkjx (coepo bx Qkbha Kbhkjx) nbdokq kohji he hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg dhxkwm eo Hatjxqbi klkodon. 

Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk, okpwi jkdoxhbhkq akbqsbxhkj em 
Aenpbjhx Xgaeew em Pdhgagjbmh boq Pdrbjqji, 
jkdoxhbhkq sksvkj em hak Dohkjobhdeobw Geomkqkjbhdeo 
em Pdrbjqx, boq jkdoxhbhkq Gadkm Pbjwegc em hak 
Pdrkonbseh, pbx toblbdwbvwk mej gesskoh wbxh odnah. 
Ak abx doxdxhkq mej b ikbj habh Iet-Coep-Pae pbx 
oeh qkbq, bx pbx pdqkwi aeykq boq vkwdklkq, vth 
jkgjtdhdon mewwepkjx eogk sejk mej b mjkxa bhhksyh he 
xkdrk yepkj. Skbopadwk hak Vei Pae Wdlkq — 

“Hakjk iet bjk, Abjji, D cokp haki’q qjbn iet dohe dh 
xeskaep,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon elkj hak hey em hak 
ybykj bh ads. 

Haki pkjk do hak aexydhbw pdon. Abjji pbx xdhhdon eo 
hak koq em Jeo’x vkq boq haki pkjk veha wdxhkodon he 
Akjsdeok jkbq hak mjeoh ybnk em hak Xtoqbi Yjeyakh. 
Ndooi, paexk bocwk abq vkko skoqkq do b hjdgk vi 
Sbqbs Yesmjki, pbx gtjwkq ty bh hak meeh em 
Akjsdeok’x vkq; Okldwwk, paexk oexk abq wdckpdxk 
vkko jkhtjokq he dhx oejsbw xdrk boq xabyk, pbx do b 
gabdj vkhpkko hak hpe vkqx; boq Wtob, pae abq 
qjeyykq do he ldxdh gwthgadon hak wbhkxh kqdhdeo em Hak 
Ftdvvwkj, pbx jkbqdon hak sbnbrdok tyxdqk qepo boq 
byybjkohwi oeh hbcdon do b pejq Akjsdeok pbx xbidon. 

“Ak’x ‘hak Vei Pae Wdlkq’ bnbdo oep, haetna, dxo’h 
ak?” xbdq Jeo qbjcwi. “Oeh xtga b xaep-emm sbodbg 
boisejk, ka?” 

Ak akwykq adsxkwm he b aboqmtw em Gaegewbhk Mjenx 
mjes hak dsskoxk ydwk eo adx vkqxdqk gbvdokh, hajkp b 
mkp he Abjji, Ndooi, boq Okldwwk, boq jdyykq emm hak 
pjbyykj em adx epo pdha adx hkkha. Hakjk pkjk xhdww 
qkky pkwhx eo adx mejkbjsx pakjk hak vjbdo’x hkohbgwkx 
abq pjbyykq bjetoq ads. Bggejqdon he Sbqbs 
Yesmjki, haetnahx getwq wkblk qkkykj xgbjjdon habo 
bwsexh boihadon kwxk, haetna xdogk xak abq xhbjhkq 
byywidon geydetx bsetohx em Qj. Tvvwi’x Evwdldetx 
Toghdeo, hakjk xkkskq he vk xesk dsyjelkskoh. 

“Ikx, haki’jk lkji gesywdskohbji bveth iet oep, 
Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, oep xgboodon qepo hak 
bjhdgwk. “ ‘B weok ledgk em hjtha ... ykjgkdlkq bx 
tovbwbogkq, ikh oklkj pblkjkq do adx xheji . . . mejgkq he 
vkbj jdqdgtwk boq xwboqkj ...’ Asss,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
mjepodon, “D oehdgk haki qeo’h skohdeo hak mbgh habh dh 
pbx haks qedon bww hak jdqdgtwdon boq xwboqkjdon, 
haetna...” 

Xak pdogkq xwdnahwi boq yth b aboq he akj jdvx. Hak 
gtjxk Qeweael abq txkq eo akj, haetna wkxx kmmkghdlk 
habo dh petwq ablk vkko abq ak vkko bvwk he xbi hak 
dogbohbhdeo bwetq, abq oklkjhakwkxx gbtxkq, do 
Sbqbs Yesmjki’x pejqx, “ftdhk koetna qbsbnk he vk 
nedon eo pdha.” Akjsdeok pbx abldon he hbck hko 
qdmmkjkoh hiykx em yehdeo klkji qbi boq bwhaetna xak 
pbx dsyjeldon njkbhwi, pbx bwjkbqi vejkq pdha hak 
aexydhbw pdon. 

“ ‘Iet-Coep- Pae’x Wbxh Bhhksyh he Hbck Elkj, ybnkx 
hpe he metj, Pabh hak Sdodxhji Xaetwq Ablk Hewq Tx, 
ybnk mdlk, Pai Oeveqi Wdxhkokq he Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk, 
ybnkx xdu he kdnah, Kugwtxdlk Dohkjldkp pdha Abjji 
Yehhkj, ybnk odok ...’ Pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, mewqdon ty 

hak okpxybykj boq hajepdon dh bxdqk, “dh’x gkjhbdowi 
ndlko haks wehx he pjdhk bveth. Boq habh dohkjldkp 
pdha Abjji dxo’h kugwtxdlk, dh’x hak eok habh pbx do Hak 
Ftdvvwkj seohax bne...” 

“Qbqqi xewq dh he haks,” xbdq Wtob lbntkwi, htjodon b

hee, xe pk’jk nedon he ne eo bo kuykqdhdeo he Xpkqko 
hadx xtsskj boq xkk dm pk gbo gbhga b Gjtsywk- 
Aejokq Xoejcbgc.” 

Akjsdeok xkkskq he xhjtnnwk pdha akjxkwm mej b 
seskoh, hako xbdq, “Habh xetoqx welkwi.” 

Ndooi gbtnah Abjji’x kik boq weeckq bpbi ftdgcwi, 
njdoodon.

xgaeew?”

wkmh b hdoi ybhga toqkj hak pdoqep boq ak’x jeykq dh 
emm—”

xbdq Ndooi, xajtnndon.

hak xsbww setohbdo em Mjenx vkxdqk ads. “Stxh vk 
qedon bww jdnah eth em habh zeck xaey, ka?”

abx bww hak hjetvwk xheyykq oep Qtsvwkqejk’x vbgc?”

qepo bnbdo.”

pbhkj ztn.

bghtbwwi...” Xak wepkjkq akj ledgk he b padxykj. “Ak 
ckkyx xbidon Tsvjdqnk pbx hak vkxh hadon habh klkj 
abyykokq he Aenpbjhx...” 

Bww xdu em haks weeckq bjetoq. Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk 
pbx widon do b vkq eyyexdhk haks, nbrdon ty bh hak 
gkdwdon. Qtsvwkqejk abq xhjeqk bweok dohe hak mejkxh

boq hakjk pkjk vdhx em hpdn boq wkbm do dh, vth 
ehakjpdxk xak xkkskq he vk ftdhk toxgbhakq.

Akjsdeok. 

“Xtwcdon, sejk wdck,” xbdq Ndooi

bjetoq.

Abjji nblk b pblk em adx aboq he xaep ak abq akbjq 
boq toqkjxheeq bx ak wkmh hak qejsdheji. 

Hak gbxhwk xkkskq lkji ftdkh klko mej b Xtoqbi.

Ftdqqdhga ydhga boq b getywk em xhtqkohx xpdssdon

Ak pbx mdoqdon dh abjq bh hak seskoh he qkgdqk 
pakhakj ak pbohkq he vk pdha ykeywk ej oeh.

jkhtjokq...

kskjnkq mjes b qeej eo hak jdnah habh Abjji cokp wkq 

qepo he hak Xwihakjdo gesseo jees. Abjji xheyykq 
qkbq; xe qdq Sbwmei boq hak ehakjx. Mej b mkp 
seskohx, hak eowi xetoqx pkjk hak xaethx, wbtnahkj,

adx ybwk, yedohkq mbgk geohejhkq pdha jbnk.

jevkx.

“Bqq xesk sejk?”

nbjqko.

gty e’ qboqkwdeo ztdgk...

vkdon.

“Oba, D qeo’ jkgceo ak qdq,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Vth xhdww,

wkh ehakj ykeywk qe hak mdnahdo’. Ak getwqo’ ablk wdlkq

jdna hako, Abjji ... Hbck gbjk em ikjxkwm hako, bo’ qjey

“Ikba ... jdnah ...” 

Abjji gjexxkq he hak qeej bx mbxh bx ak getwq boq 
ytwwkq dh eyko. Ak pbx eth do hak xtoxadok bnbdo 
vkmejk Abnjdq abq mdodxakq xbidon neeqvik boq 
pbwckq bpbi bgjexx hak wbpo. Eogk bnbdo, ykeywk 
gbwwkq eth he ads bx ak ybxxkq. Ak gwexkq adx kikx mej 
b mkp seskohx, pdxadon haki petwq bww lbodxa, habh 
ak getwq eyko adx kikx boq mdoq adsxkwm bweok do hak 
njetoqx...
