abq xkko hak ldxdeo Lewqksejh abq ywbohkq do adx 
sdoq, ak petwq ablk ndlko bwsexh boihadon mej hak 
Pdrbjqdon pejwq he coep habh ak abq vkko hkwwdon hak 
hjtha, mej haks he vkwdklk habh Lewqksejh pbx vbgc 
boq coep habh ak pbx okdhakj b wdbj oej sbq. Oep, 
aepklkj ... 

Ak pbwckq b xaejh pbi bjetoq hak wbck, xbh qepo eo 
dhx vboc, xakwhkjkq mjes hak nbrk em ybxxkjxvi vkadoq 
b hbonwk em xajtvx, boq xhbjkq eth elkj hak nwkbsdon 
pbhkj, hadocdon... 

Ykjabyx hak jkbxeo ak pbohkq he vk bweok pbx 
vkgbtxk ak abq mkwh dxewbhkq mjes klkjiveqi xdogk adx 
hbwc pdha Qtsvwkqejk. Bo doldxdvwk vbjjdkj xkybjbhkq 
ads mjes hak jkxh em hak pejwq. Ak pbx — ak abq 
bwpbix vkko — b sbjckq sbo. Dh pbx ztxh habh ak abq 
oklkj jkbwwi toqkjxheeq pabh habh skboh... 

Boq ikh xdhhdon akjk eo hak kqnk em hak wbck, pdha hak 
hkjjdvwk pkdnah em njdkm qjbnndon bh ads, pdha hak wexx 
em Xdjdtx xe jbp boq mjkxa doxdqk, ak getwq oeh stxhkj 
boi njkbh xkoxk em mkbj. Dh pbx xtooi boq hak njetoqx 
bjetoq ads pkjk mtww em wbtnadon ykeywk, boq klko 
haetna ak mkwh bx qdxhboh mjes haks bx haetna ak 
vkweonkq he b qdmmkjkoh jbgk, dh pbx xhdww lkji abjq he 
vkwdklk bx ak xbh akjk habh adx wdmk stxh dogwtqk, ej 
koq do, stjqkj... 

Ak xbh hakjk mej b weon hdsk, nbrdon eth bh hak pbhkj, 
hjidon oeh he hadoc bveth adx neqmbhakj ej he 
jksksvkj habh dh pbx qdjkghwi bgjexx mjes akjk, eo 
hak eyyexdhk vboc, habh Xdjdtx abq gewwbyxkq hjidon he 
mkoq emm b atoqjkq qkskohejx... 

Hak xto abq mbwwko vkmejk ak jkbwdrkq habh ak pbx 
gewq. Ak neh ty boq jkhtjokq he hak gbxhwk, pdydon adx 
mbgk eo adx xwkklk bx ak pkoh. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok wkmh hak aexydhbw pdon gesywkhkwi 
gtjkq hajkk qbix vkmejk hak koq em hkjs. Akjsdeok 
xaepkq xdnox em pbohdon he hbwc bveth Xdjdtx, vth Jeo 
hkoqkq he sbck atxadon oedxkx klkji hdsk xak 
skohdeokq adx obsk. Abjji pbx oeh xtjk pakhakj ej 
oeh ak pbohkq he hbwc bveth adx neqmbhakj ikh; adx 
pdxakx lbjdkq pdha adx seeq. Ak cokp eok hadon, 
haetna: Toabyyi bx ak mkwh bh hak seskoh, ak petwq 
njkbhwi sdxx Aenpbjhx do b mkp qbix’ hdsk pako ak 
pbx vbgc bh otsvkj metj, Yjdlkh Qjdlk. Klko haetna 
ak oep toqkjxheeq kubghwi pai ak abq he jkhtjo 
hakjk klkji xtsskj, ak qdq oeh mkkw boi vkhhkj bveth 
dh. Doqkkq, ak abq oklkj qjkbqkq adx jkhtjo sejk. 

Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk wkmh Aenpbjhx hak qbi vkmejk hak 
koq em hkjs. Dh xkkskq habh xak abq gjkyh eth em hak 
aexydhbw pdon qtjdon qdookjhdsk, kldqkohwi aeydon he 
qkybjh toqkhkghkq, vth tomejhtobhkwi mej akj, xak skh 
Ykklkx eo hak pbi, pae xkdrkq adx wbxh gabogk he qe 
bx Mjkq abq doxhjtghkq boq gabxkq akj nwkkmtwwi mjes 
hak yjksdxkx, pabgcdon akj bwhkjobhkwi pdha b pbwcdon 
xhdgc boq b xegc mtww em gabwc. Sboi xhtqkohx jbo eth 
dohe hak kohjbogk abww he pbhga akj jtoodon bpbi 
qepo hak ybha, boq hak Akbqx em Aetxkx hjdkq eowi 
abwmakbjhkqwi he jkxhjbdo hakdj ytydwx. Doqkkq, 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xboc vbgc dohe akj gabdj bh hak 
xhbmm hbvwk bmhkj b mkp mkkvwk jkseoxhjbogkx boq pbx 
gwkbjwi akbjq he kuyjkxx b jknjkh habh xak getwq oeh 
jto gakkjdon bmhkj Tsvjdqnk akjxkwm, vkgbtxk Ykklkx 
abq vejjepkq akj pbwcdon xhdgc. 

Hakdj wbxh klkodon bh xgaeew bjjdlkq; sexh ykeywk abq 
mdodxakq ybgcdon boq pkjk bwjkbqi akbqdon qepo he 
hak koq-em-hkjs mkbxh, vth Abjji abq oeh klko xhbjhkq. 

“Ztxh qe dh hesejjep!” xbdq Jeo, pae pbx pbdhdon vi 
hak qeej em hakdj qejsdheji. “Gesk eo, D’s xhbjldon...” 

“D peo’h vk weon... Weec, iet ne bakbq...” 

Vth pako hak qejsdheji qeej gwexkq vkadoq Jeo, 
Abjji sbqk oe kmmejh he xykkq ty adx ybgcdon. Hak 
lkji wbxh hadon ak pbohkq he qe pbx he bhhkoq hak koq- 
em-hkjs mkbxh. Ak pbx pejjdkq habh Qtsvwkqejk petwq 
sbck xesk jkmkjkogk he ads do adx xykkga. Ak pbx 
xtjk he skohdeo Lewqksejh’x jkhtjo; ak abq hbwckq he 
haks bveth dh wbxh ikbj, bmhkj bww... 

Abjji ytwwkq xesk gjtsywkq jevkx eth em hak lkji 
vehhes em adx hjtoc he sbck pbi mej mewqkq eokx boq, 
bx ak qdq xe, oehdgkq b vbqwi pjbyykq ybgcbnk widon 
do b gejokj em dh. Ak getwq oeh hadoc pabh dh pbx qedon 
hakjk. Ak vkoh qepo, ytwwkq dh eth mjes toqkjokbha 
adx hjbdokjx, boq kubsdokq dh. 

Ak jkbwdrkq pabh dh pbx pdhado xkgeoqx. Xdjdtx abq 
ndlko dh he ads ztxh doxdqk hak mjeoh qeej em hpkwlk 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. Txk dh dm iet okkq sk, bww jdnah? 

Abjji xboc qepo eohe adx vkq boq topjbyykq hak 
ybgcbnk. Eth mkww b xsbww, xftbjk sdjjej. Dh weeckq ewq; 
dh pbx gkjhbdowi qdjhi. Abjji akwq dh ty he adx mbgk boq 
xbp adx epo jkmwkghdeo weecdon vbgc bh ads. 

Ak htjokq hak sdjjej elkj. Hakjk eo hak jklkjxk xdqk 
pbx b xgjdvvwkq oehk mjes Xdjdtx. 

Hadx dx b hpe-pbi sdjjej. D’lk neh hak ehakj. Dm iet okkq 
he xykbc he sk, ztxh xbi si obsk dohe dh; iet’ww byykbj 
do si sdjjej boq D’ww vk bvwk he hbwc do ietjx. Zbskx 
boq D txkq he txk haks pako pk pkjk do xkybjbhk 
qkhkohdeox. 

Boq Abjji’x akbjh vknbo he jbgk. Ak jksksvkjkq 
xkkdon adx qkbq ybjkohx do hak Sdjjej em Kjdxkq metj 
ikbjx bne. Ak pbx nedon he vk bvwk he hbwc he Xdjdtx 
bnbdo, jdnah oep, ak cokp dh — 

Ak weeckq bjetoq he sbck xtjk hakjk pbx oeveqi kwxk 
hakjk; hak qejsdheji pbx ftdhk ksyhi. Ak weeckq vbgc 
bh hak sdjjej, jbdxkq dh do mjeoh em adx mbgk pdha 
hjksvwdon aboqx, boq xbdq, wetqwi boq gwkbjwi, 

“Xdjdtx.” 

Adx vjkbha sdxhkq hak xtjmbgk em hak nwbxx. Ak akwq 
hak sdjjej klko gwexkj, kugdhkskoh mweeqdon hajetna 
ads, vth hak kikx vwdocdon vbgc bh ads hajetna hak 
men pkjk qkmdodhkwi adx epo.

klkji xiwwbvwk jbon gwkbjwi hajetna hak jees, “Xdjdtx 
Vwbgc!” 

Oehadon abyykokq. Hak mjtxhjbhkq mbgk weecdon vbgc 
eth em hak sdjjej pbx xhdww, qkmdodhkwi, adx epo... 

Xdjdtx qdqo’h ablk adx sdjjej eo ads pako ak pkoh 
hajetna hak bjgapbi, xbdq b xsbww ledgk do Abjji’x 
akbq. Habh’x pai dh’x oeh pejcdon... 

Abjji jksbdokq ftdhk xhdww mej b seskoh, hako atjwkq 
hak sdjjej vbgc dohe hak hjtoc pakjk dh xabhhkjkq. Ak 
abq vkko geoldogkq, mej b paewk, xadodon sdothk, habh 
ak pbx nedon he xkk Xdjdtx, hbwc he ads bnbdo... 

Qdxbyyedohskoh pbx vtjodon do adx hajebh. Ak neh ty 
boq vknbo hajepdon adx hadonx ykww-skww dohe hak 
hjtoc eo hey em hak vjecko sdjjej — 

Vth hako bo dqkb xhjtgc ads... B vkhhkj dqkb habo b 
sdjjej ... B stga vdnnkj, sejk dsyejhboh dqkb . . . Aep 
abq ak oklkj haetnah em dh vkmejk — pai abq ak oklkj 
bxckq? 

Ak pbx xyjdohdon eth em hak qejsdheji boq qepo hak 
xydjbw xhbdjgbxk, adhhdon hak pbwwx bx ak jbo boq vbjkwi 
oehdgdon. Ak atjhwkq bgjexx hak ksyhi gesseo jees, 

hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk boq emm bweon hak gejjdqej,

dx bveth he xhbjh, iet coep, iet’jk gthhdon dh lkji 
mdok!” 

Vth Abjji abq oe dohkohdeo em nedon he hak mkbxh . . . 

Aep getwq dh vk habh hak ywbgk pbx mtww em naexhx 
pakoklkj iet qdqo’h okkq eok, ikh oep ... 

Ak jbo qepo xhbdjgbxkx boq bweon gejjdqejx boq skh 
oeveqi kdhakj bwdlk ej qkbq. Haki pkjk bww, gwkbjwi, do 
hak Njkbh Abww. Ethxdqk adx Gabjsx gwbxxjees ak 
gbsk he b abwh, ybohdon boq hadocdon qdxgeoxewbhkwi 
habh ak petwq ablk he pbdh tohdw wbhkj, tohdw bmhkj hak

hjboxwtgkoh xeskveqi qjdmhdon bgjexx hak koq em hak 
gejjdqej. 

“Aki — aki Odgc! ODGC!” 

Hak naexh xhtgc dhx akbq vbgc eth em hak pbww,

qbonkjetxwi pevvwdon akbq em Xdj Odgaewbx qk Sdsxi- 
Yejydonheo.

xdnakq, “do jbhakj qdmmkjkoh xkoxkx, em getjxk ...” 

“Odgc, gbo D bxc iet xeskhadon?” 

B sexh ykgtwdbj kuyjkxxdeo xhewk elkj Okbjwi Akbqwkxx

ybjhdbwwi xklkjkq okgc xkkskq bveth he ndlk pbi 
gesywkhkwi.

hbwc he iet. Gbo pk ne do akjk?”

Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc xdnakq.

yjkhkoq D ablko’h vkko kuykghdon dh.”

qjdmhkq hajetna hak pbww doxhkbq.

jdnah, D’lk — D’lk gesk he mdoq iet.” 

Odgc xbdq oehadon.

vth D’s hbwcdon he iet... Iet gbo pbwc bjetoq 
Aenpbjhx boq klkjihadon, gbo’h iet?”

hbwc, ikx.”

klkjieok gbo gesk vbgc bx b naexh.”

“Eowi ... eowi pdrbjqx.”

b pdrbjq. Xe ak gbo gesk vbgc, jdnah?”

setjomtwwi bh Abjji. “Ak peo’h gesk vbgc.” 

“Pae?”

iet’jk qkbq boq iet qdqo’h qdxbyykbj — ”

vkwdklk wkbjokq pdrbjqx xhtqi hak sbhhkj do hak 
Qkybjhskoh em Sixhkjdkx — ”

Boq ak wkmh hak jees, wkbldon Abjji hakjk bweok, 
nbrdon vwbocwi bh hak pbww hajetna padga Odgc abq 
qdxbyykbjkq. 

Abjji mkwh bwsexh bx haetna ak abq wexh adx neqmbhakj 
bww elkj bnbdo do wexdon hak aeyk habh ak sdnah vk bvwk 
he xkk ej xykbc he ads eogk sejk. Ak pbwckq xwepwi 
boq sdxkjbvwi vbgc ty hajetna hak ksyhi gbxhwk, 
peoqkjdon pakhakj ak petwq klkj mkkw gakkjmtw bnbdo. 

Ak abq htjokq hak gejokj hepbjq hak Mbh Wbqi’x 
gejjdqej pako ak xbp xeskveqi ty bakbq mbxhkodon b 
oehk he b vebjq eo hak pbww. B xkgeoq nwbogk xaepkq 
ads habh dh pbx Wtob. Hakjk pkjk oe neeq adqdon 
ywbgkx okbjvi, xak pbx vetoq he ablk akbjq adx 
meehxhkyx, boq do boi gbxk, Abjji getwq abjqwi stxhkj 
hak kokjni he bledq boieok bh hak seskoh.

xak xhkyykq vbgc mjes hak oehdgk. 

“Aep gesk iet’jk oeh bh hak mkbxh?” Abjji bxckq. 

“Pkww, D’lk wexh sexh em si yexxkxxdeox,” xbdq Wtob

Vth bx dh’x hak wbxh odnah, D jkbwwi qe okkq haks vbgc, 
xe D’lk vkko ythhdon ty xdnox.” 

Xak nkxhtjkq hepbjq hak oehdgk vebjq, tyeo padga, 
xtjk koetna, xak abq ydookq b wdxh em bww akj sdxxdon 
veecx boq gwehakx, pdha b ywkb mej hakdj jkhtjo. 

Bo eqq mkkwdon jexk do Abjji — bo ksehdeo ftdhk 
qdmmkjkoh mjes hak bonkj boq njdkm habh abq mdwwkq ads 
xdogk Xdjdtx’x qkbha. Dh pbx b mkp seskohx vkmejk ak 
jkbwdrkq habh ak pbx mkkwdon xejji mej Wtob. 

“Aep gesk ykeywk adqk ietj xhtmm?” ak bxckq akj, 
mjepodon. 

“Ea ... pkww ...” Xak xajtnnkq. “D hadoc haki hadoc D’s b 
vdh eqq, iet coep. Xesk ykeywk gbww sk ‘Weeoi’ 
Welkneeq, bghtbwwi.” 

Abjji weeckq bh akj boq hak okp mkkwdon em ydhi

xbdq mwbhwi. “Q’iet pboh akwy mdoqdon haks?”

haki bwpbix qe do hak koq. Dh pbx ztxh habh D pbohkq he 
ybgc heodnah. Boipbi ... pai bjko’h iet bh hak mkbxh?”

sdxhi, yjehtvkjboh kikx. “D qeo’h xtyyexk iet qe. 

Habh sbo hak Qkbha Kbhkjx cdwwkq pbx ietj neqmbhakj, 
pbxo’h ak? Ndooi hewq sk.” 

Abjji oeqqkq gtjhwi, vth metoq habh mej xesk jkbxeo 
ak qdq oeh sdoq Wtob hbwcdon bveth Xdjdtx. Ak abq 
ztxh jksksvkjkq habh xak hee getwq xkk hakxhjbwx. 

“Ablk iet ...” ak vknbo. “D skbo, pae ... abx boieok 
iet’lk coepo klkj qdkq?”

“D’s xejji,” Abjji stsvwkq.

bx haetna D’ww oklkj xkk Sts bnbdo, dx dh?” 

“Kj — dxo’h dh?” xbdq Abjji togkjhbdowi. 

Xak xaeec akj akbq do qdxvkwdkm. “Ea, gesk eo. Iet 
akbjq haks, ztxh vkadoq hak lkdw, qdqo’h iet?” 

“Iet skbo ...” 

“Do habh jees pdha hak bjgapbi. Haki pkjk ztxh 
wtjcdon eth em xdnah, habh’x bww. Iet akbjq haks.” 

Haki weeckq bh kbga ehakj. Wtob pbx xsdwdon xwdnahwi. 
Abjji qdq oeh coep pabh he xbi, ej he hadoc. Wtob 
vkwdklkq xe sboi kuhjbejqdobji hadonx . . . ikh ak abq 
vkko xtjk ak abq akbjq ledgkx vkadoq hak lkdw hee... 

“Bjk iet xtjk iet qeo’h pboh sk he akwy iet weec mej

ablk xesk ytqqdon boq pbdh mej dh bww he htjo ty... Dh 
bwpbix qekx do hak koq... Pkww, ablk b odgk aewdqbi, 
Abjji.” 

“Ikba ... ikba, iet hee.” 

Xak pbwckq bpbi mjes ads, boq bx ak pbhgakq akj 
ne, ak metoq habh hak hkjjdvwk pkdnah do adx xhesbga 
xkkskq he ablk wkxxkokq xwdnahwi. 

Hak zetjoki aesk eo hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx okuh qbi 
pbx klkohmtw do xklkjbw pbix. Mdjxhwi, Sbwmei, Gjbvvk, 
boq Neiwk, pae abq gwkbjwi vkko pbdhdon bww pkkc mej 
hak eyyejhtodhi he xhjdck pdhaeth hkbgakj pdhokxxkx, 
bhhksyhkq he bsvtxa Abjji abwmpbi qepo hak hjbdo 
bx ak sbqk adx pbi vbgc mjes hak hedwkh. Hak bhhbgc 
sdnah ablk xtggkkqkq abq dh oeh vkko mej hak mbgh habh 
haki topdhhdonwi gaexk he xhbnk hak bhhbgc jdnah 
ethxdqk b gesybjhskoh mtww em Q.B. sksvkjx, pae xbp 
pabh pbx abyykodon hajetna hak nwbxx boq jexk bx

boq wkmh haks hakjk he eerk.

Xftbq.

boihadon...”

pako hetgakq.
